K14ratnml_u:2: yaḥ śrīmāñ chrīghano loke saddharmaṃ samupādiśat /

K14ratnml_u:50: tasmiṃś ca samaye tatra śrāvastyāṃ sanmahājanaḥ /

K14ratnml_u:56: tasyaivaṃ ramatas tasyāṃ bhāryāyāṃ sucirād api /
K14ratnml_u:57: putro na duhitā vāpi nodbabhūva kathaṃ cana // Rm_1.27{26} //
K14ratnml_u:59: kapolaṃ svakare dhṛtvā vyacintayad raho gataḥ // Rm_1.28{27} //
K14ratnml_u:60: aho daivān na me putraḥ putrī vādyāpi nāsti yat /
K14ratnml_u:61: tan me syuḥ saṃpado vyarthāyāsāṃ bhoktā na vidyate // Rm_1.29{29/} //

K14ratnml_u:63: yeṣāṃ bhoktā na vidyeta vyarthaṃ mayā hy upārjitaṃ // Rm_1.30{30} //

K14ratnml_u:66: kim upāyaṃ kariṣyāmi yato bhāgyaṃ na vidyate /
K14ratnml_u:67: daivo hi valavāṃl loke kim upāyair guṇair valaiḥ // Rm_1.32{32} //
K14ratnml_u:68: kutrātra śaraṇaṃ yāsye hy aputro 'haṃ kulāntakaḥ /

K14ratnml_u:77: kiṃ duḥsthito 'si sādho 'tra kiṃ cāpi duḥkhacintayā /
K14ratnml_u:78: vaktavyaṃ cet tad asmākaṃ sarvathā vaktum arhasi // Rm_1.37{37} //
K14ratnml_u:80: sarvāṃs tān bāndhavān dṛṣṭvā duḥkhahetum udaharat // Rm_1.38{38} //

K14ratnml_u:85: tat sarvaṃ nakṣyate vyarthaṃ mayā yātnair upārjitaṃ /

K14ratnml_u:90: tan me sarvaṃ nirarthaṃ syāt ko māṃ pāpāt samuddharet // Rm_1.43{43} //
K14ratnml_u:91: iha bhogyaṃ prabhuktvāpi kiṃ me sāram avasthitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:92: kevalaṃ dhanasaktasya paratra sadgatiḥ kathaṃ // Rm_1.44{44} //

K14ratnml_u:94: evaṃ cittavyathākrāntaḥ śalyaviddha ivāsmy ahaṃ // Rm_1.45{45} //
K14ratnml_u:96: anyathā ced ihāmutra vinaṣṭaḥ syāṃ nirāśitaḥ // Rm_1.46{46} //
K14ratnml_u:97: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā sarve te bāndhavā janāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:99: mā mā bhaiṣṭhā mahābhāga tyaja cintāṃ vacaḥ śṛṇu /
K14ratnml_u:100: tadupāyaṃ vayaṃ brūmas tat kuruṣva samāhitaḥ // Rm_1.48{48} //
K14ratnml_u:102: nūnaṃ vaṃśaṃ pradāsyanti devatās te prasāditāḥ // Rm_1.49{49} //
K14ratnml_u:105: putrā duhitaro vāpi jātā devaprasādataḥ // Rm_1.50{50} //
K14ratnml_u:106: tathā naiva pramāṇaṃ syāc chāstre karmapramāṇataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:107: tat tu devaprasādena karmaś śīghraṃ prasiddhyate // Rm_1.51{51} //
K14ratnml_u:108: tad eva devavairuddhe karma vighnair nihanyate /
K14ratnml_u:111: iti matvā bhavāṃś cāpi satputrapratipattaye // Rm_1.53{53} //
K14ratnml_u:112: bhāryyayā saha bhaktyā ca devatāyācanāṃ kuru /
K14ratnml_u:113: tato raktaiḥ priyāṃ bhāryām ṛtusnātāṃ prakāmataḥ // Rm_1.54{54} //
K14ratnml_u:117: iti teṣāṃ vacaḥ śrutvā gṛhastho 'sau vinoditaḥ // Rm_1.56{56} //
K14ratnml_u:118: tatheti ca pratiśrutya bhāryyayā saha moditaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:121: sūryyādīṃś ca grahān sarvā bhairavādyāś ca mātṛkāḥ // Rm_1.58{58} //
K14ratnml_u:123: sarvān evaṃ samārādhya pūjayitvā vidhānataḥ // Rm_1.59{59} //
K14ratnml_u:125: tadā kaścin mahāsatvaḥ svargāc cyutvā bhuvaṃ gataḥ // Rm_1.60{60} //
K14ratnml_u:126: tasya gṛhapateḥ patnyā garbhe sa samupāviśat /
K14ratnml_u:127: tataḥ sā śreṣṭhino bhāryyāpannasatvāśu gurviṇī // Rm_1.61{61} //
K14ratnml_u:128: garbhe satvaṃ samutpannaṃ matvā bharttāram abravīt /
K14ratnml_u:129: svāmin prasīda mā bhūs tvaṃ viṣaṇno 'tra sukhī bhava // Rm_1.62{62} //
K14ratnml_u:130: tava bhāgyād dhi me garbhe nūnaṃ satvaḥ pravarttate /
K14ratnml_u:132: yad garbhe dakṣiṇe bhāge sthitaḥ saṃparivarttate // Rm_1.63{63} //
K14ratnml_u:133: tan nūnaṃ dārako 'yaṃ syāt satyam eva na saṃśayaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:134: iti bhāryāvacaḥ śrutvā gṛhastho 'sau pramoditaḥ // Rm_1.64{64} //
K14ratnml_u:135: bhāryāyā garbham ālokya satyam ity anvamanyata // Rm_1.65{56/} //
K14ratnml_u:137: prāhūya puratas teṣāṃ mudaivaṃ samudānayat // Rm_1.66{66} //
K14ratnml_u:138: aho bhāgyān mamotpannaṃ yad abhivāṃchitaṃ mayā /
K14ratnml_u:141: kṛtyā me pratikurvīta bhṛtaś ca prativibhṛyāt // Rm_1.68{68} //
K14ratnml_u:142: dāyādyaṃ pratipadyeta vaṃśo me sthitiko bhavet /
K14ratnml_u:143: suhṛdo me prasannāḥ syur dviṣantaś ca viṣāditāḥ // Rm_1.69{69} //
K14ratnml_u:144: mayā yāvanti dānāni puṇyāni prakṛtāni ca /
K14ratnml_u:145: etatpuṇyaphalair nityaṃ maṃgalaṃ bhavatu dvayoḥ // Rm_1.70{70} //
K14ratnml_u:147: sukhaṃ sunotu satputraṃ mā pāpaṃ samudāgamat // Rm_1.71{71} //
K14ratnml_u:149: tathāstv ity anumodantaḥ svasvālayaṃ samāyayuḥ // Rm_1.72{72} //

K14ratnml_u:155: dṛṣṭvā taṃ dārakaṃ saumyaṃ naiva tṛptiṃ samāyayau // Rm_1.75{75} //

K14ratnml_u:184: dhig me daivaṃ prayatnaṃ ca sarvaṃ tat syān nirarthakaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:185: kim upāyaṃ kariṣyāmi sarvathāhaṃ vibhagnitaḥ // Rm_1.89{78} //

K14ratnml_u:191: bhagavan bho mahābhijña śāstāsi me prasīda tat /
K14ratnml_u:192: yan mayā pṛchyate kāryyaṃ tat samādeṣṭum arhasi // Rm_1.92{81} //

K14ratnml_u:197: iti tena samādiṣṭaṃ śrutvā gṛhapatir mudā /
K14ratnml_u:198: kṛtāñjalipuṭo natvā taṃ guruṃ samabhāṣata // Rm_1.95{84} //
K14ratnml_u:199: bhagavan bho vijānīyā yo me putraḥ prajāyate /
K14ratnml_u:200: sa pravṛddho nirutsāhī kuśīdo varttate 'dhunā // Rm_1.96{85} //
K14ratnml_u:201: sadā śayyāsthito bhuṅkte bhuktvā śete nirudyamaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:202: notsahati kvacid gaṃtuṃ paśuvat tiṣṭhate gṛhe // Rm_1.97{86} //
K14ratnml_u:203: na śayanāt samutthāya śrotuṃ draṣṭuṃ samicchati /
K14ratnml_u:204: gṛhe śayyāsanārūḍho rogīva vasate sadā // Rm_1.98{87} //

K14ratnml_u:209: ity evaṃ prārthitaṃ tena śrutvāsau pūraṇo yatiḥ /

K14ratnml_u:211: are mā gā viṣādaṃ tvaṃ cintayā kiṃ pratapyase /

K14ratnml_u:213: tad ahaṃ te mahābhāga sārddhaṃ sarvaiś ca tīrthikaiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:214: ṛddhyā gatvā kariṣyāmi dārakaṃ vistayotthitaṃ // Rm_1.103{92} //
K14ratnml_u:215: yadāsau dārako hy asmān sarvān dṛṣṭvā samutthitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:216: kṛtvā praṇāmam asmākaṃ dharmmaṃ śrotuṃ samutsahet // Rm_1.104{93} //
K14ratnml_u:218: tatkuśalaiḥ samāpanno vīryavān sa bhavet sudhīḥ // Rm_1.105{94} //

K14ratnml_u:222: evaṃ me vacanaṃ satyaṃ dṛṣṭvā samyak pramāṇaya /
K14ratnml_u:223: tad viṣādaṃ parityajya karttavyaṃ hi tathā kuru // Rm_1.107{96} //
K14ratnml_u:224: iti tena samādiṣṭaṃ śrutvā sa gṛhabhṛn mudā /
K14ratnml_u:225: sahasā svagṛhaṃ gatvā tad bhojyaṃ samasādhayat // Rm_1.108{97} //
K14ratnml_u:226: athāsau pūraṇo 'nyaiś ca tīrthikaiḥ sārddham āgataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:227: gṛhe gatvā puras tasya paryyaṅke samupāśrayat // Rm_1.109{98} //
K14ratnml_u:228: tathāsau tān samāgatvā kramaśa āsane sthitān /
K14ratnml_u:229: dṛṣṭvā saṃharṣitaḥ śreṣṭhī sahasā putram abravīt // Rm_1.110{99} //
K14ratnml_u:231: tat samutthāya natvaitāñ chāstṝn bhojyaiḥ pravāraya // Rm_1.111{100} //

K14ratnml_u:233: draṣṭum api na cotsehe kiṃ namec ca pravārayet // Rm_1.112{1} //
K14ratnml_u:234: bahuśaḥ preryyamāṇo 'pi pitrā sa bandhubhiḥ saha /

K14ratnml_u:237: tathā śayyāsanārūḍha evaṃ tasthau nirutsavaḥ // Rm_1.114{3} //

K14ratnml_u:242: evaṃ cānutthitaṃ dṛṣṭvā taṃ te sarve ca tīrthikāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:243: haṭhāc cainaṃ samutthāpya vaśīkarttuṃ parākraman // Rm_1.117{6} //
K14ratnml_u:247: tathā taṃ ruditaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve te lajjayā bhiyā /
K14ratnml_u:249: tathā gṛhapatir dṛṣṭvā sarvān etān parāyitān /
K14ratnml_u:252: paśyan satvān samuddhartuṃ dadarśa taṃ kuśīditaṃ // Rm_1.121{10} //
K14ratnml_u:254: tat kuśīdaṃ samuddhartum aryānaṃdaṃ samabravīt // Rm_1.122{11} //

K14ratnml_u:257: asau me darśanād eva nūnaṃ vīryyaṃ samārabhan /
K14ratnml_u:258: sahasotthāya sa natvā dharmaṃ praśṛṇuyān mudā // Rm_1.124{13} //
K14ratnml_u:259: tato me śāsane dharmaṃ pracaret sa sudhīḥ sadā /
K14ratnml_u:260: kramād bodhicarīṃ pūryya saṃbodhiṃ cāpi lapsyati // Rm_1.125{14} //
K14ratnml_u:262: saddharme saṃpratiṣṭhāpya sarvān bodhau niyojaye // Rm_1.126{15} //
K14ratnml_u:263: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvānandaḥ sa harṣitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:264: karttavyaṃ bhagavann evam ity anumodito 'bhavat // Rm_1.127{16} //
K14ratnml_u:266: utsṛṣṭās taiś ca tad geham avabhāsya vyaśodhayat // Rm_1.128{17} //

K14ratnml_u:377: pūjayitvā praṇatvā ca paścād gehaṃ vrajema hi /

K14ratnml_u:382: tatra dṛṣṭvā jinendraṃ taṃ sarvve te saṃpraharṣitāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:383: pādau natvā munes tasya parivṛtyopatasthire // Rm_1.179{69} //
K14ratnml_u:384: athāsau bhagavān dṛṣṭvā sarvān sārthagaṇān api /
K14ratnml_u:386: āgatāḥ stha samāyāta mā stha śrāntāś ca kheditāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:387: yātrāsāphalyasiddhiś ca kaccid vaḥ kuśalāni ca // Rm_1.181{71} //
K14ratnml_u:388: evaṃ pṛṣṭe jinendreṇa sarve te saṃpramoditāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:389: kṛtāñjalipuṭo natvā saṃbuddhaṃ procur ādarāt // Rm_1.182{72} //
K14ratnml_u:392: yātrāsiddhiḥ kathaṃ na syāt sarvatra kuśalaṃ hi naḥ // Rm_1.183{73} //
K14ratnml_u:394: tat sarvaṃ tvatprabhāvena satyam etat pramāṇyate // Rm_1.184{74} //
K14ratnml_u:395: tad bhavantaṃ suśāstāraṃ draṣṭuṃ sarve samāgatāḥ /

K14ratnml_u:399: namas te bhagavan nātha vrajāmaḥ śaraṇaṃ tava /
K14ratnml_u:400: pāhi naḥ sarvadāpy evaṃ tvam eva jagadīśvaraḥ // Rm_1.187{77} //
K14ratnml_u:401: evaṃ stutvā munīndraṃ taṃ sarve te saṃprasāditāḥ /

K14ratnml_u:406: śāstāraṃ sugataṃ natvā svaṃ svaṃ gehaṃ samāyayuḥ // Rm_1.190{80} //
K14ratnml_u:407: tato bhūyas tathānyaiś ca prārthyamānaḥ sa vīryyavān /
K14ratnml_u:408: ṣaḍḍhā ratnākaraṃ gatvā bahuratnāny asādhayat // Rm_1.191{81} //

K14ratnml_u:493: evam etat tathānaṃda yathā tvaṃ bhāṣase kila /
K14ratnml_u:494: nākāraṇe jinaṃ sarvaṃ smitaṃ saṃdarśitaṃ kvacit // Rm_1.233{23} //

K14ratnml_u:515: anumodya guruṃ natvā tatheti prābhyanaṃdata // Rm_1.243{33} //
K14ratnml_u:517: tathā tava mayā khyātaṃ satyam etat pradhāryyatāṃ // Rm_1.244{34} //
K14ratnml_u:518: evaṃ rājaṃs tvayāpy evaṃ kṛtvānumodanāṃ tathā /
K14ratnml_u:521: ity etad guruṇādiṣṭaṃ śrutvāśokaḥ sa bhūmipaḥ // Rm_1.246{36} //
K14ratnml_u:522: satyam evaṃ pratiśrutya prābhyanandat sapārṣadaḥ // Rm_1.247{37/} //

K14ratnml_u:532: bhadanta śrotum ichāmi punar anyat subhāṣitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:533: yathā te guruṇā khyātaṃ tathā me khyātum arhasi // Rm_2.2{2} //
K14ratnml_u:535: upaguptaḥ samāmaṃtrya taṃ kṣitīśaṃ samabravīt // Rm_2.3{3} //
K14ratnml_u:536: sādhu suṣṭhu mahāraja śṛṇu dharmaṃ samāhitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:537: yathā me guruṇādiṣṭaṃ tathātra te pracakṣyate // Rm_2.4{5/} //
K14ratnml_u:539: dharmarājo jagacchāstā sarvajñaḥ sugato jinaḥ // Rm_2.5{6} //
K14ratnml_u:547: caturvarṇaiś ca pauraiś ca tathānyaiś ca śubhārthibhiḥ // Rm_2.9{10} //
K14ratnml_u:552: tasmiṃś ca samaye tatra śrāvastyāṃ ye vaṇigjanāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:555: tatra te bhramitā mārgāt paribhraṣṭā vicerire // Rm_2.13{14} //
K14ratnml_u:557: tatra praptāś ca te sarve madhyāhne dyotitātape // Rm_2.14{15} //
K14ratnml_u:563: tadā sarve 'pi te sārthāḥ śraddhayā śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:565: kecit svayaṃbhuvaṃ smṛtvā kecin nārāyaṇaṃ tathā /
K14ratnml_u:566: kecic chivaṃ mahāraudraṃ kecit sūryyagrahādhipaṃ // Rm_2.18{19} //
K14ratnml_u:567: kecic caṃdraṃ ca tāreśaṃ kecid iṃdraṃ surādhipaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:568: kecid agniṃ yamaṃ caiva naiṛtyaṃ ca tathāpare // Rm_2.19{20} //
K14ratnml_u:569: vāruṇaṃ ca tathā vāyukuveraṃ ca maheśvaraiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:570: bhairavaṃ mātṛkāś caivaṃ kecit skandhaṃ vināyakaṃ // Rm_2.20{21} //
K14ratnml_u:571: mahākālaṃ tathā caivaṃ kecid ṛṣīn yatīśvarān /
K14ratnml_u:572: kecid daityādhipān vīrān kecin nāgādhipāṃs tathā // Rm_2.21{22} //
K14ratnml_u:574: evam anyāṃs tridhātusthāṃs sarvān smṛtvā yayācire // Rm_2.22{23} //
K14ratnml_u:575: tair evaṃ yācyamānānāṃ devatānaṃ na kaś cana /
K14ratnml_u:576: eko 'py āsīt tadā trātā vāṇijāṃ duḥkhabhāgināṃ // Rm_2.23{24} //
K14ratnml_u:579: tatra yaḥ sugatopāsī dṛṣṭasatyaḥ sa dhīravān /
K14ratnml_u:580: tān sārthān vipannāśāṃ dṛṣṭvāmaṃtryaivam abravīt // Rm_2.25{26} //
K14ratnml_u:581: bhavanto mā viṣīdadhvaṃ kiṃ viṣādena setsyate /
K14ratnml_u:582: tasmāt tyaktvā viṣādatvaṃ dhīryyam ālambya tiṣṭhata // Rm_2.26{27} //
K14ratnml_u:583: dhairyyeṇa tārayed duḥkhaṃ mahākṛcchraṃ vipatsv api /
K14ratnml_u:584: tasmād dhairyyaṃ samādhāya smaradhvaṃ ca jinaṃ drutaṃ // Rm_2.27{28} //
K14ratnml_u:586: tad asmadvacanaṃ śrutvā saṃbuddhaṃ smaratādarāt // Rm_2.28{29} //
K14ratnml_u:588: tatrāpy evaṃ bhaye 'smākaṃ trātā ko 'nyo bhaviṣyati /
K14ratnml_u:589: buddha eva jagadbaṃdhus tad vrajadhvaṃ jinaṃ drutaṃ // Rm_2.29{30} //
K14ratnml_u:591: ḍṛṣṭvāsmān karuṇādṛṣṭyā saṃrakṣet sahasā khalu // Rm_2.30{31} //
K14ratnml_u:592: iti tenoditaṃ śrutva sarve te vaṇijas tathā /
K14ratnml_u:593: saṃbuddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ kṛtvā smṛtvābhayaṃ yayācire // Rm_2.31{32} //
K14ratnml_u:594: namas te bhagavan nātha sarvajño 'si jagatprabhuḥ /
K14ratnml_u:595: bhavataiva jagat sarvaṃ pālitaṃ putravat sadā // Rm_2.32{33} //
K14ratnml_u:596: adyāgreṇa vayaṃ sarve yāvajjīvaṃ sadāpi hi /
K14ratnml_u:597: bhavatāṃ śaraṇaṃ yāmas tad rakṣāsmāñ jagadguro // Rm_2.33{34} //
K14ratnml_u:598: bhavān eva jagaddharmaṃ saṃsāre pālitaṃ sadā /
K14ratnml_u:599: bhagavan sarvavin nātha trātum arhasi sarvathā // Rm_2.34{35} //
K14ratnml_u:601: vimārgeṇa carantas te madhyāhne dyotitātape // Rm_2.35{36} //
K14ratnml_u:602: tatra prāptāś ca te sarve vālukāsthale saṃsthitāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:603: bhāno tīkṣṇakare taptā kṣuttṛṣārttā paripīḍitāḥ // Rm_2.36{37} //
K14ratnml_u:605: namo buddhāya dharmāya saṃghāyeti namo namaḥ // Rm_2.37{38} //
K14ratnml_u:607: bhavān eva jagatsvāmiṃ tathā buddhānubhāvatāṃ // Rm_2.38{39} //
K14ratnml_u:608: tadā sa bhagavān tebhya māhendravṛṣṭim ācaran /
K14ratnml_u:609: śītalā vāyavo yāti tena śītatvam āgatāḥ // Rm_2.39{40} //
K14ratnml_u:610: tad dṛṣṭvā sārthapatinā sarvān sārthān samabravīt /
K14ratnml_u:611: bhavantaḥ śrūyatāṃ sarve yan mayā procyate hitaṃ // Rm_2.40{41} //
K14ratnml_u:613: yad vayaṃ mṛtyusaṃprāptā paralokād ivāgatāḥ // Rm_2.41{42} //
K14ratnml_u:615: tasmāt sarve vayaṃ tasya buddhasya śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ // Rm_2.42{43} //
K14ratnml_u:617: anityaṃ khalu saṃsāram anityaṃ jīvitaṃ sukhaṃ // Rm_2.43{44} //
K14ratnml_u:618: kṣaṇadhvaṃsi śarīraṃ ca bhave nityaṃ na kiṃ cana /
K14ratnml_u:619: dharma eva mahāsāraṃ yenaivaṃ rakṣyate jagat // Rm_2.44{45} //
K14ratnml_u:620: tasmād dharmaṃ samādhartuṃ gantavyaṃ śaraṇaṃ muneḥ /
K14ratnml_u:621: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā sarve te vaṇijo mudā // Rm_2.45{46} //
K14ratnml_u:623: atha sārthapatiś caivaṃ kṛtvā taṃ saha saṃmataṃ // Rm_2.46{47} //
K14ratnml_u:625: vihāre sugataṃ draṣṭuṃ dharmaṃ cāptum agān mudā /
K14ratnml_u:627: dṛṣṭvā taṃ sugataṃ natvā viṣasāda puro muneḥ /
K14ratnml_u:630: tadā sarve 'pi te satvāḥ śrutvā taṃ dharmam ādarāt /
K14ratnml_u:633: śrotāpannās tathā kecit sakṛdāgāmino pare // Rm_2.50{51} //
K14ratnml_u:637: kecic chrāvakabodhau ca pratyekāyāṃ tathāpare // Rm_2.52{53} //
K14ratnml_u:638: kecid anuttarāyāṃ ca saṃbodhau praṇidhiṃ dadhuḥ /
K14ratnml_u:639: evaṃ tāḥ parṣadaḥ sarvāḥ saṃbuddhaśaraṇe sthitāḥ // Rm_2.53{54} //
K14ratnml_u:641: atha te bhikṣavo dṛṣṭvā tān sarvān bodhicāriṇaḥ // Rm_2.54{55} //
K14ratnml_u:643: āścaryyaṃ bhagavan yāvad yad ime vaṇijas tathā // Rm_2.55{56} //
K14ratnml_u:646: śītalā vāyavo vātās tat kathaṃ vaktum arhasi /
K14ratnml_u:647: iti tair bhikṣubhiḥ pṛṣṭo bhagavāṃs tān abhāṣata // Rm_2.57{58} //
K14ratnml_u:648: śṛṇudhvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ karmma yan mayā kṛta kṛtaṃ kathyate /
K14ratnml_u:649: yan mayā prakṛtaṃ karma ko 'nyo bhuṃjyād dhi tatphalaṃ // Rm_2.58{59} //
K14ratnml_u:650: yena yat prakṛtaṃ karma sa evādyād dhi tat phalaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:651: abhuktaṃ kṣīyate karma naiva kvāpi kathaṃ cana // Rm_2.59{60} //
K14ratnml_u:653: agnibhir dahyate naiva vāyubhir nāpi śuṣyate /
K14ratnml_u:656: anyathā cāpi karmāṇi na dadanti phalāni ca // Rm_2.61{62} //
K14ratnml_u:657: yathaiva yat kṛtaṃ karma tathaiva tat phalaṃ mataṃ /
K14ratnml_u:658: śubhakarma śubhaṃ dadyāt pāpakarmāśubhaṃ khalu // Rm_2.62{63} //
K14ratnml_u:659: miśritam ubhayaṃ dadyād iti matvā śubhe caret /
K14ratnml_u:660: na praṇaśyaṃti karmāṇi kalpakoṭiśatair api // Rm_2.63{64} //
K14ratnml_u:661: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehināṃ /
K14ratnml_u:662: yan mayā prakṛtaṃ pūrvaṃ tat phalaṃ prāpyate 'dhunā // Rm_2.64{65} //
K14ratnml_u:663: kathyate tat purāvṛttaṃ sādhu śṛṇuta sādaraṃ /
K14ratnml_u:664: puraikasamaye buddhaś caṃdano nāma dharmarāṭ // Rm_2.65{66} //
K14ratnml_u:668: tadaikasamaye tatra caṃdanaḥ sa munīśvaraḥ // Rm_2.67{38/} //
K14ratnml_u:674: atha tadādhipo rājā śrutvā taṃ buddham āgataṃ // Rm_2.70{71} //
K14ratnml_u:675: sa maṃtrijanapauraiś ca saha pratyudyayau mudā /
K14ratnml_u:676: tatrāsau sahasopetya dṛṣṭvā taṃ sugataṃ muniṃ // Rm_2.71{72} //
K14ratnml_u:678: athāsau bhagavān dṛṣṭvā taṃ nṛpaṃ samupasthitaṃ // Rm_2.72{73} //
K14ratnml_u:680: śṛṇu rājan bhave sāraṃ dharmaṃ nityam ataṃdritaṃ // Rm_2.73{74} //
K14ratnml_u:681: dharmeṇa jāyate loko dharmeṇa svargam āruhet /
K14ratnml_u:682: tasmād dharmaṃ puraskṛtya saṃpālayan prajā sadā // Rm_2.74{75} //
K14ratnml_u:683: prajārakṣāvrataṃ dharmaṃ mūlaṃ rājñāṃ vidur budhāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:684: prajārakṣāvrataṃ tyaktvā kim anyair bahubhir vrataiḥ // Rm_2.75{76} //
K14ratnml_u:686: tena rājan tvayā dharme pālanīyāḥ prajāḥ śubhe /
K14ratnml_u:687: tad daśākuśalebhyaś ca vinivārya tvayā sadā // Rm_2.76{77} //
K14ratnml_u:688: yojanīyāḥ prajā dharme tatpuṇyais tvaṃ pramokṣyase /
K14ratnml_u:689: ādau dāne prajān yojyāḥ saṃbodhipadakāraṇe // Rm_2.77{78} //
K14ratnml_u:691: śubhakarmarate loke tatpuṇyaiḥ varddhyate nṛpaḥ // Rm_2.78{79} //
K14ratnml_u:692: tasmād dānaṃ svayaṃ datvā prajā śīle niyojaya /
K14ratnml_u:693: śīlena śuddhyate kāyaḥ śuddhakāyo bhavet sudhīḥ // Rm_2.79{80} //
K14ratnml_u:694: subuddhiḥ kṣamayā sarvāc chatrūṃ jitvā virājate /
K14ratnml_u:695: tato vīryyabalaiḥ sarvān satvān saukhye niyojayet // Rm_2.80{81} //
K14ratnml_u:696: tataḥ kleśān vinirjitya dhyātvā bodhiṃ prasādhayet /
K14ratnml_u:698: tataḥ prājña upāyaiś ca jagad bodhau niyojayet /
K14ratnml_u:699: tato mārān vinirjitya saṃbodhijñānam āpnuyāt // Rm_2.82{83} //
K14ratnml_u:701: tataḥ kṛtvā vaśe sarvāṃs traidhātukanivāśinaḥ // Rm_2.83{84} //
K14ratnml_u:702: saṃsthāpya saugate dharme svayaṃ nirvṛtim ācaret // Rm_2.84{85} //
K14ratnml_u:704: yadi te nirvṛtau vāṃchā tadaitāsu samācara // Rm_2.85{86} //
K14ratnml_u:705: tatas te maṃgalaṃ nityaṃ saṃvṛttisukham āpnuyāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:706: kramāt pāramitāḥ pūryya nirvṛtiṃ samavāpnuyāḥ // Rm_2.86{87} //
K14ratnml_u:707: nirvāṇaṃ paramaṃ jñānaṃ nirvāṇaṃ paramaṃ sukhaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:708: nirvāṇaṃ paramaṃ puṇyaṃ nirvāṇaṃ paramāṃ gatiṃ // Rm_2.87{88} //
K14ratnml_u:709: evaṃ hi sukṛtaṃ sarvaṃ jñātvā nirvāṇakāraṇaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:710: tathā dharme svayaṃ sthitvā preraṇīyāḥ prajā api // Rm_2.88{89} //
K14ratnml_u:711: evaṃ sa caṃdano buddho bodhayitvā ca taṃ nṛpaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:712: bodhimārge pratisthāpya virarāma kṣaṇaṃ tataḥ // Rm_2.89{90} //
K14ratnml_u:713: atha sa nṛpatī rājā śrutvā tad dharmam ādarāt /
K14ratnml_u:717: suprasannamukhaḥ pādau natvā taṃ prārthayan muniṃ // Rm_2.91{92} //
K14ratnml_u:718: namas te bhagavan nātha bhavatāṃ śaraṇaṃ vraje /
K14ratnml_u:719: saddharmam ādiśann atra vijayasva gaṇaiḥ saha // Rm_2.92{93} //
K14ratnml_u:720: iti tena nṛpendreṇa prārthite sa munīśvaraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:722: tataḥ sāntaḥpurā rājā taṃ munīndraṃ sasāṃghikaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:723: sadā satkārapūjāṅgair bhojyaiḥ prārāgayan mudā // Rm_2.94{95} //
K14ratnml_u:725: varṣādhidevatā meghāvṛṣṭiṃ na mumucur bhuvi // Rm_2.95{96} //
K14ratnml_u:736: kecin meghaṃ ca khe dṛṣṭvā prāyācanta divāniśaṃ // Rm_2.101{1} //
K14ratnml_u:737: hā hatāsma iti proktvā kecit tasthur nirāśitāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:740: tad dṛṣṭvā nṛpatiś cāpi mṛtyutrastānukaṃpitaḥ // Rm_2.103{3} //
K14ratnml_u:742: hā kaṣṭaṃ katham atraivaṃ durbhikṣaṃ varttate 'dhunā /
K14ratnml_u:743: kiṃ karomi na manye 'haṃ vadadhvaṃ tat pratikriyāṃ // Rm_2.104{4} //
K14ratnml_u:745: tadupāyaṃ prakuryāma tat kurudhvaṃ yathāvidhiṃ // Rm_2.105{5} //
K14ratnml_u:748: devatā vidhinārādhya tac chāntiṃ saṃyayācire // Rm_2.106{6} //
K14ratnml_u:749: bho devatāḥ prasīdadhvaṃ namo vaḥ praṇatā vayaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:750: aparādhaṃ yad asmāsu kṣantavyaṃ sarvathāpi tat // Rm_2.107{7} //
K14ratnml_u:752: suvṛṣṭiṃ kārayitvātra subhikṣaṃ kuruta dhruvaṃ // Rm_2.108{8} //
K14ratnml_u:753: evaṃ kecid vidhātāraṃ kecid viṣṇuṃ janārdanaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:754: kecic chivaṃ maheśānaṃ iṃdraṃ kecit surādhipaṃ // Rm_2.109{9} //
K14ratnml_u:758: kecin meghān samālokya natvā vṛṣṭiṃ yayācire // Rm_2.111{11} //
K14ratnml_u:761: evaṃ taiḥ prārthyamānās tāḥ sarvāś ca devatā api /
K14ratnml_u:762: tatra vṛṣṭiṃ samutsraṣṭuṃ naiva śekur vighātitāḥ // Rm_2.113{13} //
K14ratnml_u:763: tataḥ sarve ca te lokā dṛṣṭvā tad vṛṣṭighātitāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:765: atha rājā sa tān dṛṣṭvā durbhikṣākṣobhitāśāyān /
K14ratnml_u:766: tathā ca grahām ālokya visaṇṇāsyo vyacintayat // Rm_2.115{15} //
K14ratnml_u:767: aho kaṣṭaṃ mahotpātaṃ mama rājye bhaviṣyati /
K14ratnml_u:768: katham atra pratīkāraṃ tat praśāntyai kariṣyate // Rm_2.116{16} //
K14ratnml_u:770: na śakyaṃte prajā yena rakṣitum ītipīḍite /
K14ratnml_u:771: dhig māṃ nṛpādhamībhūtaṃ kiṃ pāpaṃ prakṛtaṃ mayā /
K14ratnml_u:772: yena yasya prajā eva kṣutpipāsahatā mṛtāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:773: kim eva mama rājye na bhogyaiś cāpi dhanair api /
K14ratnml_u:775: yena rājñā na rakṣyante prajāḥ svaviṣayāśritāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:776: sa kiṃ rājā baliṣṭho 'pi kṛtānta iva manyate // Rm_2.118{19} //
K14ratnml_u:778: yaś ca rājā svabhogyārthaṃ kevalaṃ daṇḍam āharan /
K14ratnml_u:779: na vipatsu prajāḥ pāti sa kiṃ rājāpi cauravat // Rm_2.119{20} //
K14ratnml_u:780: yeṣām eva hitārthāya yaś ca rājābhiṣicyate /
K14ratnml_u:781: sa teṣāṃ na hitaṃ kuryyāt sa kiṃ rājā kṛtārthahā // Rm_2.120{21} //
K14ratnml_u:783: svayaṃ naṣṭaḥ parān hatvā narakeṣu vrajed dhruvaṃ // Rm_2.121{21/} //
K14ratnml_u:784: kiṃ cāham api mānuṣyaḥ samāna iṃdriyair api /
K14ratnml_u:785: yato me kriyate sarvaiḥ sevo nityaṃ samāhitaiḥ // Rm_2.122{22} //
K14ratnml_u:786: yadi na kriyate rakṣā mayāpy eṣāṃ vipatsv api /
K14ratnml_u:787: katham etadṛśair muktaḥ kadā yāsyāmi sadgatiṃ // Rm_2.123{23} //
K14ratnml_u:789: karmabhiḥ preryyamāṇo 'haṃ yāsyāmi narakān dhruvaṃ // Rm_2.124{24} //
K14ratnml_u:791: dṛṣṭvā tāṃ bhīṣaṇāṃ krūrān patiṣyāmi vimohitaḥ // Rm_2.125{25} //
K14ratnml_u:792: tadā tatra na vidyeta kaścit trātā dayānvitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:793: dharma eva tadā rakṣet tad dharmaṃ sādhayec chubhaṃ // Rm_2.126{26} //
K14ratnml_u:794: dharmāś ca bahudhā proktās teṣāṃ prāhur munīśvarāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:796: yenaiva śubhatāṃ kṛtvā sarvatra bhuvaneṣv api /
K14ratnml_u:797: sarvasatvāś ca pālyante sarvadeha paratra ca // Rm_2.128{28} //
K14ratnml_u:798: tathātrāpi śubhaṃ kartuṃ saṃbuddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ vrajan /
K14ratnml_u:799: saddharmaṃ samavāptuṃ ca sevitavyaṃ sasāṃghike // Rm_2.129{29} //
K14ratnml_u:803: tatas taṃ sugataṃ natvā tad durbhikṣaṃ praśāṃtaye // Rm_2.131{31} //
K14ratnml_u:805: tadā sa bhagavān atra suvṛṣṭiṃ cārayed dhruvaṃ // Rm_2.132{32} //
K14ratnml_u:806: sarvatra śubhatāṃ kṛtvā subhikṣaṃ kārayet sadā /
K14ratnml_u:807: tato 'tra sarvadāpy evaṃ durbhikṣaṃ na kadā cana // Rm_2.133{33} //
K14ratnml_u:808: subhikṣaṃ sarvato bhadraṃ bhaven nūnaṃ samaṃtataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:810: iti dhyātvā viniścitya manasā sa narādhipaḥ // Rm_2.134{34} //
K14ratnml_u:812: śṛṇudhvaṃ maṃtriṇo yan me manasā saṃviciṃtitaṃ // Rm_2.135{35} //
K14ratnml_u:814: yad adya jāyate 'vṛṣṭiṃ durbhikṣaṃ copavarttate // Rm_2.136{36} //
K14ratnml_u:817: sasaṃghaṃ sevituṃ nityam iche tad anumodyatāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:818: sa eva bhagavān nāthaḥ kṛtvātra śubhatāṃ sadā // Rm_2.138{38} //
K14ratnml_u:819: suvṛṣṭiṃ cārayitvā ca subhikṣaṃ kārayed dhruvaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:820: tato 'smākaṃ tadāpy atra maṃgalaṃ syāt samaṃtataḥ // Rm_2.139{39} //
K14ratnml_u:821: sadā saddharmam ādhāya saukhyaṃ bhuktvā bhajemahi /
K14ratnml_u:822: dharmeṇa śubhatā nityaṃ dharmeṇa jīyate vipat // Rm_2.140{40} //
K14ratnml_u:823: dharmeṇa pālyate sarvaṃ dharmeṇa sadgatiṃ vrajet /
K14ratnml_u:824: dharmaṃ tu saugataṃ bhadraṃ sarve prāhur munīśvarāḥ // Rm_2.141{41} //
K14ratnml_u:836: yenaiva trijagallokaṃ pālitaṃ putravat sadā // Rm_2.145{47/} //
K14ratnml_u:837: sa eva bhagavān buddhaḥ sevanīyaḥ śubhārthibhiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:839: rājate jayate tena siddho 'yaṃ dharmmarāj jinaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:840: yathā ca triṣu lokeṣu bodhicaryāḥ prakāśayan /
K14ratnml_u:842: karoti bhadratāṃ nityaṃ tathātrāpi kariṣyati // Rm_2.147{19} //
K14ratnml_u:844: satvān prabodhayann asmān niveśayet tathā khalu // Rm_2.148{20} //
K14ratnml_u:845: tataḥ sarve vayaṃ dhṛtvā saddharmaṃ śubhadaṃ śivaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:849: iti saṃbhāṣya taiḥ sarvais tathety abhyanumoditaiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:850: maṃtribhiḥ saha rājā sa prayayau taj jināśramaṃ // Rm_2.151{23} //
K14ratnml_u:851: tatra prāptaḥ praviṣṭaś ca dṛṣṭvā taṃ caṃdanaṃ muniṃ /
K14ratnml_u:852: kṛtāṃjalipuṭo natvā cakāra prārthanām iti // Rm_2.152{24} //
K14ratnml_u:853: namas te bhagavac chāstaḥ vayaṃ te śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:854: tat prasanno bhavāsmākaṃ kṣantavyā cāparādhatā // Rm_2.153{24} //
K14ratnml_u:855: yad avṛṣṭiḥ pravṛttātra tad asmatpāpataḥ khalu /
K14ratnml_u:857: tad bhavantaṃ vayaṃ sarve snāpayitvā sasāṃghikān /
K14ratnml_u:858: yathāśakty upacāraiś ca samichāmo 'rcituṃ pure // Rm_2.155{27} //
K14ratnml_u:859: tat prasīda munīndro 'si yathāsmākaṃ hitaṃ bhavet /
K14ratnml_u:860: tathāsmatpuram āgatvā śubhaṃ kartuṃ samarhasi // Rm_2.156{28} //
K14ratnml_u:861: iti tenārthitaṃ rājñā śrutvā sa caṃdano muniḥ /
K14ratnml_u:862: tūṣṇībhūtvā tathety evaṃ adhyuvāsa sa sāṃghikaḥ // Rm_2.157{29} //
K14ratnml_u:863: tataḥ sa nṛpatir jñātvā tad adhivāsitaṃ muneḥ /
K14ratnml_u:864: pādau natvā punar dṛṣṭvā sahasā svaṃ puraṃ yayau // Rm_2.158{60/} //
K14ratnml_u:865: tataḥ pure ca mārgeṣu śodhayitvā samaṃtataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:869: tatas tan nagare madhye kārayitvā saro varaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:871: tatra puṣpābhiḥ saṃyuktaṃ kṛtvā tīre samaṃtataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:874: āsanāni ca prajñapya sasaṃghasya kramān muneḥ /
K14ratnml_u:878: tato rājā sa sāmātyaiḥ paurikaiś ca samanvitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:879: taṃ buddhaṃ puram ānetuṃ jināśramam agān mudā // Rm_2.165{67} //
K14ratnml_u:880: tatra sa sahasā prāpto dṛṣṭvā taṃ candanaṃ muniṃ /
K14ratnml_u:881: kṛtāṃjalipuṭo natvā gamanaṃ prārthayad iti // Rm_2.166{68} //
K14ratnml_u:883: sarvaṃ ca sādhitaṃ siddhaṃ tadāśv āgantum arhasi // Rm_2.167{69} //
K14ratnml_u:884: evaṃ tenārthite rājñā sa saṃbuddhaḥ sasāṃghikaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:888: tadākampad rasā sābdhir vavau vāyuḥ sumaṃgalaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:889: kṣutpipāsā hatā ye ca te sarve paritṛptitāḥ // Rm_2.170{72} //
K14ratnml_u:890: ye ca hīnendriyāḥ satvās te ca pūrṇendriyā babhuḥ /
K14ratnml_u:891: nirdhanā dhanināś cāsan rogino nirujo 'bhavan // Rm_2.171{73} //
K14ratnml_u:893: unmattāḥ susmṛtiṃ prāptā nagnā āsan suvastrikāḥ // Rm_2.172{74} //
K14ratnml_u:894: gurviṇyā yāś ca tāḥ sarvāḥ pramadāḥ sukhasūtikāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:897: te sarve parisaṃtṛptāḥ puṇyakāmāḥ pracerire // Rm_2.174{76} //
K14ratnml_u:898: evam anye ca ye tatra pāpakā upasargikāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:899: te sarve vilayaṃ yātāḥ te sarve saṃśubhāṅkitāḥ // Rm_2.175{77} //
K14ratnml_u:901: kṛtvā bhadraṃ ca sarvatra sasaṃghaḥ sa pure 'viśat // Rm_2.176{78} //
K14ratnml_u:904: vaṃdyamānas tu taiḥ sarvaiḥ sadevāsuramānavaiḥ // Rm_2.178{80} //
K14ratnml_u:905: taṃ nṛpaṃ purataḥ kṛtvā rājamārgam upāsaran /
K14ratnml_u:906: tat sarovarasaṃprāpto dṛṣṭvā tīre samāśrayat // Rm_2.179{81} //
K14ratnml_u:907: tataḥ sa bhagavān buddho yathā prajñapta āsane /
K14ratnml_u:908: ekacīvarakas tasthau snātuṃ tatra sarovare // Rm_2.180{82} //
K14ratnml_u:909: tato nṛpādayaḥ sarve lokās taṃ caṃdanaṃ muniṃ /
K14ratnml_u:910: sasaṃghaṃ snāpayām āsuḥ svarṇakumbhāmbubhiḥ kramāt // Rm_2.181{83} //
K14ratnml_u:912: sasaṃgho bhagavān tasthau svaprabhāvaṃ pradarśayan // Rm_2.182{84} //
K14ratnml_u:913: atha rājā sa taṃ buddhaṃ samāsīnaṃ sasāṃghikaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:915: tataś ca bhojanaiḥ śuddhaiḥ praṇītair vyañjanair api /
K14ratnml_u:916: paṃcāmṛtaiś ca pānaiś ca sutṛptiṃ samatoṣayat // Rm_2.184{86} //
K14ratnml_u:920: natvā kṣamāpayitvā taṃ sasaṃghaṃ prārthayat tathā // Rm_2.186{88} //
K14ratnml_u:922: prasīda sarvathā rakṣa dṛṣṭvāsmān pāpacāriṇaḥ // Rm_2.187{89} //
K14ratnml_u:925: ity evaṃ prārthite tena rājñā lokahitārthinā /
K14ratnml_u:926: saṃbuddho bhagavāṃś caivaṃ svāśīrvacanam abravīt // Rm_2.189{91} //
K14ratnml_u:927: ārogyam astu te rājan sarvatrāpi ca maṃgalaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:928: subhikṣaṃ sarvadāpy atra nirvighnaṃ bodhim āpnuhi // Rm_2.190{92} //
K14ratnml_u:929: iti svāśīrvaco datvā saṃbuddhaḥ sa sasāṃghikaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:930: tataś ca svāśramaṃ prāgāt sa nṛpajanam anvitaḥ // Rm_2.191{93} //
K14ratnml_u:931: evam asya munīndrasya traimāsyaṃ ca niraṃtaraṃ /
K14ratnml_u:933: tataḥ śakro mahendro 'sau dṛṣṭvā tat sugatārcitāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:937: padmotpalādipuṣpaiś ca channāni rurucus tadā // Rm_2.194{96} //
K14ratnml_u:939: pratichannā haridvastraiḥ prāvṛtaiva rarāja bhūḥ // Rm_2.195{97} //
K14ratnml_u:941: puṣpaiḥ prasphullitair amyaiḥ phalaiś ca saṃcakāsire // Rm_2.196{98} //
K14ratnml_u:942: kramāc caivaṃ prarūḍhāni śasyāni varddhitāni ca /
K14ratnml_u:944: tataḥ sarve janāś caivaṃ saṃprayātāṃ subhikṣatāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:946: atha rājā sa tān sarvān mahāharṣapramoditān /
K14ratnml_u:947: dṛṣṭvā bhūyaḥ samāmaṃtrya vabhāṣa saṃprabodhayan // Rm_2.198{100} //
K14ratnml_u:952: evaṃ yadi sadā cāsya saṃbuddhasya jagatprabhoḥ /
K14ratnml_u:953: pūjābhiḥ satkariṣyanti sadātra maṃgalaṃ bhavet // Rm_2.201{3} //
K14ratnml_u:956: iti saṃbhāṣya rājāsau tais tathety anumoditaiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:957: saha bauddhāśramaṃ gatvā natvā taṃ prārthayan muniṃ // Rm_2.203{5} //
K14ratnml_u:958: namas te bhagavaṃ chāstar vayaṃ te śaraṇasthitāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:959: sadā caivaṃ kariṣyāmo bhavatsevām upāsthitāḥ // Rm_2.204{6} //
K14ratnml_u:960: tat prasīda sadā pātra vihṛtya dharmam ādiśan /
K14ratnml_u:961: vijayasva na cānyatra mā vraja no 'nukaṃpayā // Rm_2.205{7} //
K14ratnml_u:962: tenaivaṃ prārthite rājñā bhagavāṃś ca sa caṃdanaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:964: taṃ nṛpaṃ sajanaṃ dṛṣṭvā prasannāsyo 'bravīt tathā // Rm_2.206{8} //
K14ratnml_u:965: naiva rājan mayā bodhir ekasyārthe prasādhitā /
K14ratnml_u:966: api ca sarvasatvānāṃ hitārthe hy anukaṃpinā // Rm_2.207{9} //
K14ratnml_u:967: tasmād atra sadā naiva sthāsyāmy ahaṃ sasāṃghikaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:969: yadi me śraddhayā nityaṃ sevāṃ kartuṃ samichatha /
K14ratnml_u:971: tatas te 'tra sadā rājye subhikṣaṃ maṃgalaṃ bhavet /
K14ratnml_u:972: durbhikṣatā ca kutrāpi nākramiṣyati kadā cana // Rm_2.210{12} //
K14ratnml_u:973: iti matvā tvayā gatvā triratnaśaraṇaṃ svayaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:974: sarvasatvāś ca saddharme preraṇīyāḥ prayatnataḥ // Rm_2.211{13} //
K14ratnml_u:975: ity ādiśya munīṃdro 'sau chitvā svān nakharāṃs tathā /
K14ratnml_u:976: keśāṃś cāpy avatāryyaivaṃ tasmai rājñe svayaṃ dadau // Rm_2.212{14} //
K14ratnml_u:977: tato rājā sa taṃ buddhaṃ natvā keśāṃ nakhāṃś ca tān /
K14ratnml_u:978: samādāya praharṣeṇa pratyāyayau svam ālayaṃ // Rm_2.213{15} //
K14ratnml_u:979: tatra prāptaḥ pure madhye puṣkariṇyās taṭāntike /
K14ratnml_u:980: tat keśanakharān ropya gaṃdhastūpam akārayat // Rm_2.214{16} //
K14ratnml_u:981: tasmiṃ siddhe pratisthāpya vidhinā ca mahotsavaiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:982: nityaṃ satkārapūjābhiḥ sevāṃ cakre prasannadhīḥ // Rm_2.215{17} //
K14ratnml_u:984: jagalloke hitaṃ kartuṃ bhaveyaṃ sugatas tathā // Rm_2.216{18} //
K14ratnml_u:986: gaṃdhajalaiś ca taṃ stūpaṃ snāpayitvā sadārcayat // Rm_2.217{19} //
K14ratnml_u:987: pratisthāpya mahaṃ cāpi gatvā ca śaraṇe mudā /
K14ratnml_u:988: aṣṭāṃgaiś ca praṇatvaivaṃ mahotsāhair asevayat // Rm_2.218{20} //
K14ratnml_u:989: tathā sarve janāś cāpi śraddhayā taṃ prabhejire /
K14ratnml_u:990: ye gatāḥ śaraṇaṃ tatra te sarve nirvṛtiṃ yayuḥ // Rm_2.219{21} //
K14ratnml_u:991: aham evāvasiṣṭaḥ sa teṣāṃ yo 'bhūn narādhipaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:992: saṃbodhipraṇidhiṃ dhṛtvā naivaṃ nirvāṇam āyayau // Rm_2.220{22} //
K14ratnml_u:995: sarvadāpy abhavat tatra subhikṣaṃ nirupadravaṃ // Rm_2.221{23} //
K14ratnml_u:996: etad dharmānubhāvaiś ca sarvatra sāṃprataṃ labhe /
K14ratnml_u:998: yatra yatra pragachāmi tatra tatra samaṃtataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:1001: śubheṣu sarvadā nityaṃ caritavyaṃ prayatnataḥ // Rm_2.224{26} //
K14ratnml_u:1002: śubhena sukhatā nityaṃ bhavel loke samaṃtataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:1003: pāpena duḥkhatā caivaṃ miśritenāpi miśritā // Rm_2.225{27} //
K14ratnml_u:1004: tasmāt pāpaṃ viramyaivaṃ miśritāni vihāya ca /
K14ratnml_u:1005: śubheṣv eva prayatnena caritavyaṃ sukhārthibhiḥ // Rm_2.226{28} //
K14ratnml_u:1006: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa sarve te sāṃghikās tathā /
K14ratnml_u:1007: śrutvā pramenire satyaṃ karmabhāvaṃ bhavālaye // Rm_2.227{29} //
K14ratnml_u:1008: pāpebhyo viratā nityaṃ miśritebhyo 'pi te sadā /
K14ratnml_u:1009: sadā śubheṣu niratāḥ sarve saṃcerire samāhitāḥ // Rm_2.228{30} //
K14ratnml_u:1010: evaṃ rājaṃs tvayā nityaṃ pāpāc ca miśritād api /
K14ratnml_u:1011: viramya sarvathā dharme caritavyaṃ sukhāptaye // Rm_2.229{31} //
K14ratnml_u:1013: śrāvayitvā ca saddharmaṃ yojanīyāḥ śubhe sadā // Rm_2.230{32} //
K14ratnml_u:1014: tathā te sarvadā nityaṃ sarvatra viṣayeṣv api /
K14ratnml_u:1015: suvṛṣṭiḥ pracarec caivaṃ maṃgalaṃ nirupadravaṃ // Rm_2.231{23/} //
K14ratnml_u:1017: śrutvāśoko nṛpo 'stv evam ity anandat sapārṣadaḥ // Rm_2.232{24} //
K14ratnml_u:1018: snātāvadānaṃ tad idaṃ niśamya ye śrāvayanti pratibodhya lokān /
K14ratnml_u:1019: te pāpanirmuktaviśuddhadehāḥ prayānti nūnaṃ sugatālayeṣu // Rm_2.233{25} //
K14ratnml_u:1024: upaguptaṃ guruṃ prāha śrotum anyat subhāṣitaṃ // Rm_3.1{1} //
K14ratnml_u:1025: bhadanta śrotum ichāmi bhūyo 'py anyat subhāṣitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:1026: yathā te guruṇā khyātaṃ tathā me vaktum arhasi // Rm_3.2{2} //
K14ratnml_u:1027: iti tenārthite rājñā bhūyo 'py asau jināṃśajaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:1028: upagupto yatir bhikṣus taṃ nṛpam evaṃ abravīt // Rm_3.3{3} //
K14ratnml_u:1029: yathā me guruṇādiṣṭaṃ vakṣye 'haṃ te subhāṣitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:1030: sādhu cittaṃ samādhāya śṛṇu rājan samāhitaḥ // Rm_3.4{4} //
K14ratnml_u:1031: yaḥ purāsīn mahābuddhaḥ sarvajñaḥ śrīghano jinaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:1034: sa śākyādhipatir loke hitāya ca samaṃtataḥ // Rm_3.6{6} //
K14ratnml_u:1036: bhikṣuśrāvakasaṃghaiś ca bodhisatvaiś ca sāṃghikaiḥ // Rm_3.7{7} //
K14ratnml_u:1044: brāhmaṇā kṣatriyāś caiva rājāno rājaputrakāḥ // Rm_3.11{11} //
K14ratnml_u:1045: vaiśyāś ca śreṣṭhinaḥ śūdrā maṃtriṇo mātṛkājanāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:1046: sārthavāhāś ca paurāś ca dhaninaś ca vaṇigjanāḥ // Rm_3.12{12} //
K14ratnml_u:1047: evam anye 'pi lokāś ca sarve te saṃpraharṣitāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:1051: parivṛtya puraskṛtya tasthau sarvānya tasthire // Rm_3.14{14} //
K14ratnml_u:1052: saddharmavāṃchitāḥ sarve śrotuṃ tatra samāgatāḥ // Rm_3.15{15} //
K14ratnml_u:1053: tasmiṃś ca samaye pūryyāṃ śrāvastyāṃ subhago vaṇik /
K14ratnml_u:1054: anyattamaḥ sārthavāha āsīn mahādhanaḥ sudhīḥ // Rm_3.16{16} //
K14ratnml_u:1057: tatas tau daṃpatī raktau snehānubandhitau mudā /
K14ratnml_u:1063: dine dine kraṃān nityaṃ ativyayān nirāgamat /
K14ratnml_u:1064: saṃpadaḥ kṣīṇatāṃ yātā griṣmakāla iva hradāḥ // Rm_3.21{21} //
K14ratnml_u:1065: tatas tasya gṛhasthasya bhāryā yā kuladharmikā /
K14ratnml_u:1066: saṃpadaḥ kṣīnatāṃ dṛṣṭvā gṛhe caivaṃ vyacintayat // Rm_3.22{22} //
K14ratnml_u:1067: ayaṃ me puruṣo bharttā sārthavāho vaṇik dhanī /
K14ratnml_u:1068: bhāgyam eva gṛhe bhuktvā nivasati nirudyamaḥ // Rm_3.23{23} //
K14ratnml_u:1070: sā ca saṃpat kiyat kālaṃ tiṣṭhet kṣīṇaṃ vrajet kramāt // Rm_3.24{24} //
K14ratnml_u:1071: tad ayaṃ puruṣaś cāpi kathaṃ sustho bhaviṣyati /
K14ratnml_u:1072: kena saṃdhāryyate lokair vihīne bhogyasaṃcaye // Rm_3.25{25} //
K14ratnml_u:1073: vṛddho 'py ayaṃ bhaven nūnaṃ daridro 'pi bhavet tathā /
K14ratnml_u:1074: tadā kiṃ paribhuktvaivaṃ gṛhe tisthet kathaṃ sukhī // Rm_3.26{26} //
K14ratnml_u:1075: yasya saṃpad gṛhe nāsti kathaṃ sa puruṣaḥ sukhī /
K14ratnml_u:1077: svayaṃ bhoktuṃ na śaktaḥ syāt kiṃ punar dānam ācaret // Rm_3.27{27} //
K14ratnml_u:1078: dānaṃ vinā na saṃsāre kiṃ sārasukham āpsyate /
K14ratnml_u:1079: dānenaiva hi labhyante yaśodharmasukhāni ca // Rm_3.28{28} //
K14ratnml_u:1080: dānena śuddhyate cittaṃ śuddhacitto bhavet sudhiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:1081: sudhiyā sādhyate śīlaṃ śīlavān syāc chubhaṃkarī // Rm_3.29{29} //
K14ratnml_u:1082: śubhakarmā ca saddharmaṃ kṛtvā yāsyati sadgatiṃ /
K14ratnml_u:1083: tasmād aham imaṃ nāthaṃ bharttāraṃ puruṣaṃ prabhuṃ // Rm_3.30{30} //
K14ratnml_u:1085: dhanavān puruṣo loke sarvārthasādhane kṛtī // Rm_3.31{31} //
K14ratnml_u:1089: asya bhartur hy ahaṃ bharyyā satī dharmārthasādhane // Rm_3.33{33} //
K14ratnml_u:1090: manaḥ protsāhitaṃ kṛtvā prerayeyaṃ dhanārjane // Rm_3.34{34/} //
K14ratnml_u:1091: iti niścitya sā sādhvī dṛṣṭvā bharttāram ādarāt /
K14ratnml_u:1093: svāmi bharttāsi me nātho devatāpi tvam eva hi /
K14ratnml_u:1094: tan mayā vakṣyate tathyaṃ paratreha sukhāya te // Rm_3.36{35} //
K14ratnml_u:1095: tathyaṃ ca tacchṛṇuṣvaivam anyathā cet tu mā kuru // Rm_3.37{36} //
K14ratnml_u:1096: yad bhavān purusaḥ prāḍhyaḥ sārthavāho vaṇik prabhuḥ /
K14ratnml_u:1097: sadā bhogyāni bhuktvaiva sthitvā naivaṃ praśobhati // Rm_3.38{37} //
K14ratnml_u:1100: dhanena sādhayed bhogyaṃ bhogyena pālayet tanuṃ /
K14ratnml_u:1101: dehena sādhayed dharmaṃ dharmeṇa satsukhaṃ labhet // Rm_3.40{39} //
K14ratnml_u:1102: kiṃ ca yatra gṛhe svāmī vyavahāranirudyamaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:1103: tatra sarve janāś cāpi niṣatsyaṃty avasādinaḥ // Rm_3.41{40} //
K14ratnml_u:1105: tatra sarve janāś caiva pracareyuḥ samudyamāḥ // Rm_3.42{41} //
K14ratnml_u:1106: yac ca dānamahotsāhaṃ yatra gehe na vidyate /
K14ratnml_u:1107: sa kiṃ geho na ramyaḥ syāc chūnyāraṇye śmaśānavat // Rm_3.43{41/} //
K14ratnml_u:1110: sa eva mandiro ramyasvargavat pratibhāsyate // Rm_3.44{42} //
K14ratnml_u:1112: svayam eva prabhuktvaivaṃ vasate paśuvat sa kiṃ // Rm_3.45{43} //
K14ratnml_u:1114: kṛtvā dānavṛṣotsāhaṃ sukhaṃ bhuktvā vasaṃti ye // Rm_3.46{44} //
K14ratnml_u:1115: teṣām eva hi saṃsāre susāraṃ jīvitaṃ khalu /
K14ratnml_u:1116: ye kṛtvā dānapuṇyāni svayaṃ saukhyaṃ ca bhuṃjate // Rm_3.47{45} //
K14ratnml_u:1118: anyathā naiva lapsyante tataḥ saṃpan nirarthitā // Rm_3.48{46} //
K14ratnml_u:1119: kiyat kālaṃ ca jīveyur ye bhuktvaiva sukhaṃ sthitāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:1120: avaśyaṃ sarvaśo hitvā mṛtā yāyur yamālayaṃ // Rm_3.49{47} //
K14ratnml_u:1121: tatra karmasahāyāṃs tān dṛṣṭvā dharmādhipo yamaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:1122: nirṇayitvā ca tat karma prerayet karmabhuktaye // Rm_3.50{48} //
K14ratnml_u:1123: ye ca pāpakarā duṣṭā prerayet tān tu durgatau /
K14ratnml_u:1124: ye tu puṇyakarā bhadrāḥ prerayet tāṃś ca sadgatau // Rm_3.51{49} //
K14ratnml_u:1126: sukhāni ca sarvatheha paratrāpi bhuṃjate sarvajāṃtavaḥ // Rm_3.52{50} //
K14ratnml_u:1132: yathechayā sukhaṃ bhuktvā pālayasva sadā janān // Rm_3.55{53} //
K14ratnml_u:1133: tatas te maṃgalaṃ nityaṃ bhaved iha paratra ca /
K14ratnml_u:1134: saphalaṃ mānuṣaṃ janma nūnaṃ sadgatim āpnuyāt // Rm_3.56{54} //
K14ratnml_u:1135: iti bhāryāvacaḥ śrutvā sa gṛhastho vaṇik sudhīḥ /
K14ratnml_u:1136: bhāryāṃ tāṃ vallabhāṃ kāntāṃ dṛṣṭvā caivaṃ samabravīt // Rm_3.57{55} //
K14ratnml_u:1138: yat tvayā bhāṣitaṃ satyaṃ tat kariṣyāmi sarvathā // Rm_3.58{56} //
K14ratnml_u:1139: kiṃ tu tvaṃ me priyā bhāryā vallabhātimanoharā /
K14ratnml_u:1140: tat kathaṃ tvāṃ priyāṃ tyaktvā kutra yāsye dhanārthataḥ // Rm_3.59{57} //
K14ratnml_u:1142: sārthavāho hy ahaṃ cāpi tat kathaṃ nīcavṛttibhiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:1143: ratnārjanaṃ kariṣyāmi tato ratnākaraṃ vraje // Rm_3.60{58} //
K14ratnml_u:1145: gṛhakāryyaṃ samādhāryya vasa bhuktvā yathāsukhaṃ // Rm_3.61{59} //
K14ratnml_u:1146: yāvan nāhaṃ gṛhe prāptas tāvad dhairyyaṃ samāśraya /
K14ratnml_u:1147: śīghram evāgamiṣyāmi maṃ smṛtvā mānvatapyathāḥ // Rm_3.62{60} //
K14ratnml_u:1148: iti bharttoditaṃ śrutvā sā ca bhāryānutāpitā /
K14ratnml_u:1149: galadaśrumukhī natvā svāminaṃ tam abhāṣata // Rm_3.63{61} //
K14ratnml_u:1150: he nātha supriya svāmin māṃ vihāya kathaṃ vrajeḥ /
K14ratnml_u:1151: tvayā vinā kathaṃ gehe tiṣṭheyāhaṃ yathā vane // Rm_3.64{62} //
K14ratnml_u:1155: nidrābhoge tathā naiva vidyeta me 'bhilāṣatā // Rm_3.66{64} //
K14ratnml_u:1156: tavaiva smaraṇaṃ kṛtvā niḥśvasantī muhur muhuḥ /
K14ratnml_u:1158: mṛtāyāṃ mayi te gehe ko 'nurakṣen nu saṃpadaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:1159: śrutvā me maraṇaṃ nūnaṃ dhakṣyase virahānalaiḥ // Rm_3.68{66} //
K14ratnml_u:1160: tadaitābhiś ca saṃpattiratnaiś ca kiṃ kariṣyasi /
K14ratnml_u:1161: aputrasya hi sarvasvaṃ nūnaṃ rājā grahīṣyati // Rm_3.69{67} //
K14ratnml_u:1162: tadātmanā vikhidyaivaṃ dūraṃ mā gā vihāyatāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:1163: gṛhe sthitvā mayā sārddhāṃ sukhaṃ bhuktvodyamaṃ kuru // Rm_3.70{68} //
K14ratnml_u:1165: paṇyaṃ prasāryya taṃ sārddhaṃ sādhayasva dhanaṃ sukhaṃ // Rm_3.71{69} //
K14ratnml_u:1166: kiyat kālaṃ ca jīveva santatiś ca na vidyate /
K14ratnml_u:1167: tat kiṃ nau bahubhī ratnair mā gā ratnākaraṃ hy ataḥ // Rm_3.72{70} //
K14ratnml_u:1168: yāvajjīvaṃ sukhaṃ bhuktvā dānaṃ kṛtvā sadārthine /
K14ratnml_u:1169: saṃvṛtyā prārjaya dravyaṃ svagehe saṃsthito rama // Rm_3.73{71} //
K14ratnml_u:1170: mā dhāva priya kutrāpi kiṃ vā ratnākare labhet /
K14ratnml_u:1171: svagṛhe 'pi labhej jantuḥ svakarmanirmitaṃ dhanaṃ // Rm_3.74{72} //
K14ratnml_u:1172: svakṛtaṃ karma tad bhāvi nirmāṇasadṛśaṃ phalaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:1174: sarvatrāpi labhanty eva mahāntaḥ kṣudrikā api // Rm_3.75{73} //
K14ratnml_u:1175: tathā ye sujanā loke sadhanā sadguṇāśrayāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:1176: te 'pi kṣaṇād bhavanty eva nirdhanā bhikṣutāśritāḥ // Rm_3.76{74} //
K14ratnml_u:1177: ye cāpi durjanā loke nirdhanā nirguṇāś ca ye /
K14ratnml_u:1178: te 'pi labhanti mānyārhaṃ sevyante cāpi sajjanaiḥ // Rm_3.77{75} //
K14ratnml_u:1179: tathā ye vaṇijo dhīrāḥ sārthavāhā maṇīchayā /
K14ratnml_u:1180: ratnākaraṃ gatās teṣāṃ ke cit svastisamāgatāḥ // Rm_3.78{76} //
K14ratnml_u:1181: ke cit tatra samudre vā bhagnanaukā dhanaiḥ saha /
K14ratnml_u:1182: patitāḥ sannimajjantā mṛtāś ca vilayaṃ gatāḥ // Rm_3.79{77} //
K14ratnml_u:1186: phalaṃ bhuktvā bhramanty evaṃ saṃsāre ṣaḍgatiṣv api // Rm_3.80{78} //
K14ratnml_u:1188: mā khedaya svam ātmānaṃ dharmaṃ kṛtvā sukhaṃ vasa // Rm_3.81{79} //
K14ratnml_u:1189: tathā nau maṃgalaṃ nityaṃ sarvatrāpi bhavet khalu /
K14ratnml_u:1190: yāvajjīvaṃ sukhaṃ bhuktvā sadgatiṃ ca vrajemahi // Rm_3.82{80} //
K14ratnml_u:1191: iti bhāryoditaṃ śrutvā sārthavāhātmajaḥ sa ca /
K14ratnml_u:1192: taṃ priyāṃ ramaṇīṃ bhāryyāṃ dṛṣṭvaivaṃ samabhāṣata // Rm_3.83{81} //
K14ratnml_u:1193: bhadre satyaṃ tvaṃ yā proktaṃ yat svakarmapramānatā /
K14ratnml_u:1194: iti matvāham ichāmi gantuṃ ratnākare 'pi hi // Rm_3.84{82} //
K14ratnml_u:1195: yad abhāvi na tad bhāvi bhāvi cen na tad anyathā /
K14ratnml_u:1196: sarvatrāpi bhaven nūnaṃ tenābdhiṃ gantum īhyate // Rm_3.85{83} //
K14ratnml_u:1197: yadi bhāgyaṃ mamāsty evaṃ svasti syād gamane khalu /
K14ratnml_u:1198: ratnāni bahuśo labdhā pratyāgacheya siddhitāḥ // Rm_3.86{84} //
K14ratnml_u:1199: atha me bhāgyatā naiva nūnaṃ tatra vipattitā /
K14ratnml_u:1200: mahattīrthe nimagno 'haṃ mṛto yāsye surālayaṃ // Rm_3.87{85} //
K14ratnml_u:1202: śatruṃ jetuṃ mahotsāhair viśanti raṇamaṇḍale // Rm_3.88{86} //
K14ratnml_u:1203: tatra ke cid dhatā vīrā yaśodharmānvitā mṛtāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:1204: sahasā te prayānty evaṃ svargasaukhyānubhoginaḥ // Rm_3.89{87} //
K14ratnml_u:1205: aham api vaṇikputraḥ sārthavāhātmajo hy ahaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:1207: tat tathāhaṃ gaṃiṣyāmi ratnākaraṃ na cānyataḥ // Rm_3.90{88} //
K14ratnml_u:1209: mṛto 'tha nirmalībhūtvā svarge saukhyam avāpnuyāṃ // Rm_3.91{89} //
K14ratnml_u:1210: iti matvā priye bhadre mā viṣīda sukhāṃ vasa /
K14ratnml_u:1211: yāvan nāhaṃ gṛhaṃ prāptas tāvad bhajeṣṭadevatāṃ // Rm_3.92{90} //
K14ratnml_u:1213: anivarttī hy ahaṃ kāryye tan māṃ tvaṃ mā nivāraya // Rm_3.93{91} //
K14ratnml_u:1214: iti bharttur vacaḥ śrutvā nirbandhaṃ gamanaṃ prati /
K14ratnml_u:1215: sā satī taṃ svabharttāraṃ natvā prāha kṛtāṃjaliḥ // Rm_3.94{92} //
K14ratnml_u:1216: svāmiṃs tvaṃ sarvathā gantuṃ yadīchasi mahāmbudhiṃ /
K14ratnml_u:1217: dhairyyam ālamvya saṃpaśyan mārge vraja samāhitaḥ // Rm_3.95{93} //
K14ratnml_u:1218: svasti te vrajato mārge sarvatrāpi divāniśaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:1219: svasti pratyāgate caivaṃ bhūyān nityaṃ śubhaṃ sadā // Rm_3.96{94} //
K14ratnml_u:1221: svasti śīghraṃ samāgacha vrajā te 'stu sadā śivaṃ // Rm_3.97{95} //
K14ratnml_u:1222: iti bhāryoditaṃ śrutvā sārthavāhas tatheti saḥ /
K14ratnml_u:1223: pratijñāya vaṃksaṃghān sarvān āhūya cābravīt // Rm_3.98{96} //
K14ratnml_u:1226: tatra gantuṃ mayā sārddhaṃ yadi yūyaṃ samichatha /
K14ratnml_u:1227: tat paṇyaṃ sahasādāya samāyāta caremahi // Rm_3.100{98} //
K14ratnml_u:1228: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā sarve te vaṇijo mudā /
K14ratnml_u:1229: sahasā paṇyam ādāya tatra gantum upākraman // Rm_3.101{99} //
K14ratnml_u:1230: atha sārthapatiḥ śīghraṃ taiś ca paṃcaśataiḥ saha /
K14ratnml_u:1233: vilaṃghyāraṇyadeśāṃś ca tīraṃ prāpur mahodadheḥ // Rm_3.103{1} //
K14ratnml_u:1234: tato nāvaṃ samāruhya tāni paṃcaśatāni ca /
K14ratnml_u:1235: pravitatya dhvajaṃ śubhraṃ jagāhire 'mbudhau kramāt // Rm_3.104{2} //
K14ratnml_u:1237: kramād dvīpāṃś ca laṃghitvā ratnākaraṃ samāyayuḥ // Rm_3.105{3} //
K14ratnml_u:1239: te mithaḥ kalahaṃ kṛtvā pratyāgaṃtuṃ na śekire // Rm_3.106{4} //
K14ratnml_u:1241: ciram evaṃ virodhitvād ratnāni ca na lebhire /
K14ratnml_u:1242: bāṃdhavāṃś ca muhuḥ smṛtvā tasthuḥ sarve vilaṃvitāḥ // Rm_3.107{5} //
K14ratnml_u:1243: atrāṃtare ca sā nārī sārthavāhapriyā satī /
K14ratnml_u:1244: bharttrā vinā gṛhaṃ śūnyam amanyata nirutsavāt // Rm_3.108{6} //
K14ratnml_u:1245: yad dine prasthito bhartā sārthavāhaḥ purād vahiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:1246: tad dinārabhya sā nārī gaṇayantī dinaṃ prati // Rm_3.109{7} //
K14ratnml_u:1248: niḥśvasantī muhuś caivam adhairyyā paritāpinī // Rm_3.110{8} //
K14ratnml_u:1252: bhojaneṣv api pāne ca sparśane gamaneṣv api // Rm_3.112{10} //
K14ratnml_u:1254: sarvatra viṣayeṣv evaṃ na protsahe yathāturā // Rm_3.113{11} //
K14ratnml_u:1258: bhartāram eva saṃsmṛtvā gṛha eva nyaṣīdata // Rm_3.115{13} //
K14ratnml_u:1259: na nidrāṃ śayane bheje nānyasmṛtau mano 'nudat /
K14ratnml_u:1260: prabhum evaṃ samādhyātvā tasthau dhyāyīva yogavit // Rm_3.116{14} //
K14ratnml_u:1262: kācid ekā sakhī bhadrā saṃnirīkṣyābravīd rahaḥ // Rm_3.117{15} //
K14ratnml_u:1263: bhadre kin te viṣāda tvaṃ vibhāsi tvaiḥ yathāturā /
K14ratnml_u:1264: mā viṣīda yad arthan te tad vadasva mayi priye // Rm_3.118{16} //
K14ratnml_u:1266: kautuke cādbhute cāpi sarvatra viṣayeṣv api // Rm_3.119{17} //
K14ratnml_u:1267: bhojane bhūṣaṇe cāpi draṣṭuṃ śrotuṃ na vāṃchasi /
K14ratnml_u:1268: kiṃ viṣādena siddhaṃ te tat prabhukṣva yathāsukhaṃ // Rm_3.120{18} //
K14ratnml_u:1271: tāṃ sakhīṃ pramadāṃ kāntāṃ dṛṣṭvā caivam abhāṣata // Rm_3.121{19} //
K14ratnml_u:1273: kiṃ tu dharmānuraktāsmi tat kathaṃ svāminaṃ vinā // Rm_3.122{20} //
K14ratnml_u:1274: tenāhaṃ viṣayāṃ tyaktvā smṛtvā bharttāram eva taṃ /
K14ratnml_u:1275: svāgāra eva tiṣṭhāmi bhogyeṣv api ca nispṛhā // Rm_3.123{21} //
K14ratnml_u:1276: kadā sa me priyo bharttā gṛhe pratyāsariṣyati /
K14ratnml_u:1277: iti ciṃtāṃ samādhāya tiṣṭhāmi yoginī yathā // Rm_3.124{22} //
K14ratnml_u:1278: yāvac ca sa priyaḥ svāmī nāyāti svagṛhaṃ prati /
K14ratnml_u:1279: tāvad evaṃ na bhokṣye 'haṃ bhogyāni surasāny api // Rm_3.125{23} //
K14ratnml_u:1280: viṣayeṣv api sarveṣu na me vāṃchā priyaṃ vinā /
K14ratnml_u:1281: nānyacciṃtā ca me citte tasmād evaṃ sthitā sadā // Rm_3.126{24} //
K14ratnml_u:1282: yāvat svāmī na me dṛṣṭas tāvat sthāsyāmy ahaṃ tathā /
K14ratnml_u:1283: api me jivitaṃ yātu na ca yāyāṃ gṛhād bahiḥ // Rm_3.127{25} //
K14ratnml_u:1284: strīṇāṃ hi devatā svāmī dharmo 'pi bhartṛsevayā /
K14ratnml_u:1285: tasmāt smṛtvaiva bharttāraṃ bhājāmy ahaṃ pativratā // Rm_3.128{26} //
K14ratnml_u:1286: kutra dharmaṃ cariṣyāmi yasyā nāsti gṛhe pumān /
K14ratnml_u:1287: tat manasaiva bharttāraṃ dhyātvā bhaje divāniśaṃ // Rm_3.129{27} //
K14ratnml_u:1288: dhig me janma nirarthaṃ syād yasyā na yauvane patiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:1289: vṛddhatve kiṃ kariṣyāmi svāminā ca dhanair api // Rm_3.130{28} //
K14ratnml_u:1290: varam evādya me mṛtyur na mithyā cirajīvitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:1291: yasmāc ciram api sthitvā mṛtyuduḥkhaṃ tad eva hi // Rm_3.131{29} //
K14ratnml_u:1292: yam evālaṃvya jīvāmi sa yadi nāgamiṣyati /
K14ratnml_u:1294: dhanyās tā hi striyo bhadrāḥ svasvāmisahacārikāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:1295: kṛtvā dharmaṃ sadā gehe saukhyaṃ bhuktvā vasanti yāḥ // Rm_3.133{31} //
K14ratnml_u:1296: mā bhūt tu mādṛśi kācid abhadrā duḥkhabhāginī /
K14ratnml_u:1297: samyagbhogyaiś ca kiṃ tasyā yasyā bharttā na yauvane // Rm_3.134{32} //
K14ratnml_u:1298: tathāpi kiṃ kariṣyāmi nāryy ahaṃ hi pativratā /
K14ratnml_u:1299: tasmāt tam eva bharttāraṃ smṛtvā sthāsyāmi sarvadā // Rm_3.135{33} //
K14ratnml_u:1301: iti tayoditaṃ śrutvā sā sakhī hitakāriṇī /
K14ratnml_u:1302: tadupāyahitaṃ kartuṃ tāṃ sakhīṃ ca samabravīt // Rm_3.136{34} //
K14ratnml_u:1303: bhadre satyaṃ tvayā proktaṃ strīṇāṃ hi devatā patiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:1304: tathāpi vakṣyate bhadre tava prītyā ca tac chṛṇu // Rm_3.137{35} //
K14ratnml_u:1306: tāvat strī sevayen nityaṃ dharmaṃ bhartur anujñayā // Rm_3.138{36} //
K14ratnml_u:1307: yadā bharttā gṛhe na syād dūradeśaṃ gatas tathā /
K14ratnml_u:1308: yāvad gṛhaṃ na cāyātas tāvad devaṃ bhajet patiḥ // Rm_3.139{37} //
K14ratnml_u:1309: pates te devatāsmākaṃ viṣṇur nārāyaṇo hariḥ /
K14ratnml_u:1310: tasmād enaṃ prabhor nāmnā smṛtvā nityaṃ bhajārcaya // Rm_3.140{38} //
K14ratnml_u:1313: tasyaiva hy anubhāvena preryyamāno mano bhuvāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:1314: bharttā te sahasā prāyāt svasti ratnaiś ca saṃyutaḥ // Rm_3.142{40} //
K14ratnml_u:1315: tatas te saphalaṃ janma saṃsāre prabhunā saha /
K14ratnml_u:1316: dānaṃ kṛtvā sukhaṃ bhuktvā yāvajjīvaṃ sukhaṃ vasa // Rm_3.143{41} //
K14ratnml_u:1317: evaṃ sakhyoditaṃ Śrutvā ramaṇī sā pativratā /
K14ratnml_u:1318: tatheti pratisaṃśrutya punas tām avadat sakhīṃ // Rm_3.144{42} //
K14ratnml_u:1319: satyaṃ bhadre yathā proktaṃ tvayā me hitakāraṇaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:1320: tathāhaṃ saṃbhajiṣyāmi smṛtvā nāmnā prabhor hariṃ // Rm_3.145{43} //
K14ratnml_u:1322: tadā hy ekaṃ suvarṇasya cakraṃ dāsyāmi viṣṇave // Rm_3.146{44} //
K14ratnml_u:1323: ity evaṃ sā pratijñāya viṣṇum evaṃ samasmarat // Rm_3.147{45} //
K14ratnml_u:1324: namas te bhagavan viṣṇo hare nārāyaṇa prabho /
K14ratnml_u:1325: prasīda paśya māṃ nārīṃ prabhuṃ ca prāpayāśu me // Rm_3.148{46} //
K14ratnml_u:1326: yadā me puruṣo bharttā svasti gehasamāgataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:1328: iti sakhyāḥ puraḥ proktvā smṛtvā nityaṃ hariṃ mudā /
K14ratnml_u:1329: svarṇacakraṃ ca saṃkalpya tasthau bhartuḥ smaranti sa // Rm_3.150{48} //
K14ratnml_u:1331: bahuratnāni saṃgṛhya pratasthe sahasā tataḥ // Rm_3.151{49} //
K14ratnml_u:1333: sarvasārthagaṇaiḥ sārddhaṃ sahasā gṛham āyayau // Rm_3.152{50} //
K14ratnml_u:1335: tatas taṃ gṛhasaṃprāptaṃ dṛṣṭvā sā naṃditā satī /
K14ratnml_u:1336: pādau natvā puraḥ sthitvā svaṃ pravṛttam abhāṣata // Rm_3.153{51} //
K14ratnml_u:1337: svāmin yadā bhavān gehāt prasthito māṃ vihāya ca /
K14ratnml_u:1338: tadārabhya sadā smṛtvā tvām evāsmi sthitā gṛhe // Rm_3.154{52} //
K14ratnml_u:1340: tad duḥkhaṃ me vinodārthaṃ preritā smaraṇe hareḥ // Rm_3.155{53} //
K14ratnml_u:1342: bhajāmi satataṃ bhaktyā tavāśu gamanārthinī // Rm_3.156{54} //
K14ratnml_u:1343: cakraṃ ekaṃ suvarṇasya saṃkalpya śraddhayā mayā /
K14ratnml_u:1344: prārthanāpi kṛtā nityaṃ tava yātrāprasiddhaye // Rm_3.157{55} //
K14ratnml_u:1345: yathā me prārthitaṃ sarvaṃ tathā siddhaṃ hi sāṃprataṃ /
K14ratnml_u:1346: tan me saṃkalpitaṃ deva pūrayeyaṃ tathā prabho // Rm_3.158{56} //
K14ratnml_u:1348: devakulaṃ gamiṣyāmi tad anujñāṃ pradehi me // Rm_3.159{57} //
K14ratnml_u:1350: pūraya tvaṃ priye satyaṃ gacchety evam abhāṣata // Rm_3.160{58} //
K14ratnml_u:1351: tataḥ sānujñayā bhartuḥ satī sārddhaṃ sakhījanaiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:1352: pūjāṃgāni ca taṃ cakraṃ dhṛtvā devakulaṃ yayau // Rm_3.161{59} //
K14ratnml_u:1353: tasmiṃ kṣaṇe sa saṃbuddho bhagavān karuṇāmayaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:1354: loke satvān samuddhartum apaśyad buddhacakṣuṣā // Rm_3.162{60} //
K14ratnml_u:1355: tām evaṃ prasthitāṃ dṛṣṭvā bhadrāṃ saddharmacāriṇīṃ /
K14ratnml_u:1356: praikṣac ca bhagavān enāṃ pratyekabodhilābhinīṃ // Rm_3.163{61} //
K14ratnml_u:1357: tato 'sau bhagavān buddhaḥ saṃnirīkṣya ca tāṃ satīṃ /
K14ratnml_u:1358: sarvān bhikṣugaṇāṃ chiṣyān samāmaṃtryābravīt tathā // Rm_3.164{62} //
K14ratnml_u:1359: paśyadhvaṃ bhikṣavo yūyaṃ dārikaṃ tāṃ subhadrikāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:1360: nūnaṃ maddarśanād eṣā bodhicittam avāpnuyāt // Rm_3.165{63} //
K14ratnml_u:1362: dhruvaṃ pratyekabodhau ca praṇidhānaṃ kariṣyati // Rm_3.166{64} //
K14ratnml_u:1363: tasmāt saṃdarśanaṃ datvā dārikāṃ tāṃ subhāvinīṃ /
K14ratnml_u:1365: tatra ca gantum ichanti ye mayā saha bhikṣavaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:1367: pātracīvaram ādāya te prāyātaṃ caremahi // Rm_3.168{66} //
K14ratnml_u:1368: ity ādiṣṭaṃ jinendreṇa śrutvā sarve 'pi sāṃghikāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:1371: sarvaiś ca sāṃghikaiḥ sārddhaṃ rājagṛham upāsarat // Rm_3.170{68} //
K14ratnml_u:1373: taṃ buddhaṃ śrīghanaṃ dūrād dadarśa saṃprabhāsvaraṃ // Rm_3.171{69} //
K14ratnml_u:1377: puṇḍarīkam ivodbhāsaṃ ratnāṅgam iva jaṃgamaṃ // Rm_3.173{71} //
K14ratnml_u:1379: sahasopetya tac cakram upaḍhaukitum aichata // Rm_3.174{72} //
K14ratnml_u:1380: evaṃ tāṃ cakram ādāya saṃbuddham upaḍhaukituṃ /
K14ratnml_u:1381: prayātaṃ tāṃ sakhī dṛṣṭvā nivārayitum abravīt // Rm_3.175{73} //
K14ratnml_u:1383: tad asmai mā pradehīdaṃ cakraṃ saṃkalpitaṃ hareḥ // Rm_3.176{74} //
K14ratnml_u:1384: evaṃ nivāryyamānāpi sakhībhiḥ sā ca bhadrikā /
K14ratnml_u:1385: saddharmaguṇavāṃchantī tāḥ sakhīḥ punar abravīt // Rm_3.177{175} //
K14ratnml_u:1386: sakhyo bhāgyān mayāpy evaṃ saṃbuddho dṛśyate 'dhunā /
K14ratnml_u:1387: tad adya saphalaṃ janma saṃsāre jīvitaṃ ca me // Rm_3.178{76} //
K14ratnml_u:1398: bodhayitvā ca saddharme sthāpitā nirvṛtāv api // Rm_3.183{81} //
K14ratnml_u:1400: sarve satvā sukhāḍhyāś ca saṃbodhipadacāriṇaḥ // Rm_3.184{82} //
K14ratnml_u:1401: so 'py ayaṃ bhagavān nāthaḥ śāstā trailokyādhipaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:1403: tad ahaṃ kuśalinī syāṃ hi saṃbuddhena darśitā /
K14ratnml_u:1404: mahābhāgyavatī cāsmi yad ayaṃ sadguruḥ sudhīḥ // Rm_3.186{84} //
K14ratnml_u:1406: tad ahaṃ pūjayitvemaṃ cakraṃ ca samupaḍhaukituṃ // Rm_3.187{85} //
K14ratnml_u:1408: api cātra sadā naiva saṃbuddho lapsyate tathā // Rm_3.188{86} //
K14ratnml_u:1409: kadā cid dhi jinotpattiḥ puṣpam audunvaraṃ yathā /
K14ratnml_u:1411: puṇyair eva hi mānuṣyaṃ lapṣyate janma dullabhaṃ // Rm_3.189{87} //
K14ratnml_u:1413: buddhasevāṃ vinā kena bodhicittam avāpnuyāt // Rm_3.190{88} //
K14ratnml_u:1414: bodhicittaṃ vinā kasya saddharmeṣu matiś caret /
K14ratnml_u:1415: vinā dharmamatiṃ ko hi bodhicaryyāṃ samācaret // Rm_3.191{89} //
K14ratnml_u:1416: bodhicaryāṃ vinā loke hitaṃ kartuṃ kathaṃ caret /
K14ratnml_u:1417: loke hitam akṛtvaiva kutaḥ puṇyam avāpnuyāt // Rm_3.192{90} //
K14ratnml_u:1418: apuṇyena kathaṃ kleśān hitvā nirvṛtim āpnuyāt /
K14ratnml_u:1420: imaṃ buddhaṃ jagannātham ichāmy abhyarcituṃ mudā /
K14ratnml_u:1423: tasmād enaṃ samutsṛjya nānyam ichāmi cārcituṃ // Rm_3.195{93} //
K14ratnml_u:1424: asyaiva śaraṇaṃ gatvā bhajiṣyāmi sadāpy ahaṃ // Rm_3.196{94} //
K14ratnml_u:1425: iti sā dārikā proktvā cakram ādāya moditā /
K14ratnml_u:1426: saṃbuddhaṃ cārppituṃ tasmai pūjāṃ kartum upāyayau // Rm_3.197{95} //
K14ratnml_u:1427: atha sā taṃ muniṃ natvā pūjābhiś ca samarcayat /
K14ratnml_u:1428: taṃ cakraṃ samupasthāpya natvaivaṃ praṇidhiṃ vyadhāt // Rm_3.198{96} //
K14ratnml_u:1431: tathāham api śuddhātmā nirvṛtipadam āpnuyāṃ // Rm_3.199{97} //
K14ratnml_u:1432: tathāsau bhagavān buddho dṛṣṭvā tatpraṇidhiṃ tataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:1435: ke cid ūrddhvaṃ gatāḥ ke cid adho yātāś ca te 'ṃśavaḥ // Rm_3.201{99} //
K14ratnml_u:1436: ye ca yātā adholoke te saṃjīvanarake gatāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:1437: kālasūtre ca saṃghāte tathā ca raurave tataḥ // Rm_3.202{100} //
K14ratnml_u:1439: avīcau cārbude cāpi nirarbude tathāṭaṭe // Rm_3.203{1} //
K14ratnml_u:1440: hahave huhuve caivam utpale padmake tathā /
K14ratnml_u:1442: tathopanārakeṣv evaṃ sarveṣv api ca te 'ṃśavaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:1445: ye uṣṇanarakās teṣu śītībhūtā vyabhāsayan // Rm_3.206{4} //
K14ratnml_u:1449: dṛṣṭvaiva saha saṃmīlya mithaś caivam abhāṣata // Rm_3.208{6} //
K14ratnml_u:1450: aho citraṃ bhavanto 'dya kiṃ nu vayam itaś cyutāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:1451: anyatra caritāḥ smaḥ kiṃ vatāhosvin na manyate // Rm_3.209{7} //
K14ratnml_u:1453: bhagavān nirmitaṃ tatra praiṣayac ca samaṃtataḥ // Rm_3.210{8} //
K14ratnml_u:1454: atha taṃ nirmitaṃ saumyaṃ dṛṣṭvā te saṃprasāditāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:1455: bhūyo dṛṣṭvābhimodanto mithaś caivaṃ vabhāṣire // Rm_3.211{9} //
K14ratnml_u:1456: bhavanto nu vayaṃ sarve nānyatra caritā itaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:1457: api tv ayam ihāyātaḥ satvo hy apūrvadarśanaḥ // Rm_3.212{10} //
K14ratnml_u:1460: iti te nirmite tasmin bauddhe cittaṃ prasādya ca // Rm_3.213{11} //
K14ratnml_u:1461: namo buddhāya te tāyinn ity uktvā śaraṇaṃ yayuḥ /
K14ratnml_u:1462: tataḥ sarve ca te satvās tadbuddhasmṛtidhāriṇaḥ // Rm_3.214{12} //
K14ratnml_u:1463: niḥpāpāḥ kuśalādhyāś ca sadgatiṃ sahasā yayuḥ /
K14ratnml_u:1464: ye tathorddhaṃ gatās te ca buddhasmitotsṛtāḥ karāḥ // Rm_3.215{13} //
K14ratnml_u:1466: trayastriṃśāś ca yāmāś ca tathā ca tuṣitāṃ gatāḥ // Rm_3.216{14} //
K14ratnml_u:1470: apramāṇaṃ tato yātā ābhāsvarāṃ tathā gatāḥ // Rm_3.218{16} //
K14ratnml_u:1471: parīttaśubham evaṃ ca hy apramāṇaśubhaṃ tathā /
K14ratnml_u:1473: bṛhatphalaṃ tathā caivam abṛham atapaṃ tathā /
K14ratnml_u:1474: sudṛśaṃ bhuvanaṃ caiva sudarśanaṃ tathā gatāḥ // Rm_3.220{18} //
K14ratnml_u:1475: akaniṣṭhaṃ tathā gatvā proccair evam aghoṣayan // Rm_3.221{19} //
K14ratnml_u:1476: anityaṃ khalu saṃsāraṃ duḥkhaṃ śūnyaṃ hy anātmakaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:1477: iti matvā triratnāni saṃbhajadhvaṃ samāhitāḥ // Rm_3.222{20} //
K14ratnml_u:1479: dhunīta mṛtyusainyāś ca naḍāgāraṃ yathā karī // Rm_3.223{21} //
K14ratnml_u:1480: yo 'py asmin dharmavaineye hy apramattaś cariṣyati /
K14ratnml_u:1481: sa hitvā jātisaṃsāraṃ duḥkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyati // Rm_3.224{22} //
K14ratnml_u:1482: evaṃ tā arciṣaḥ sarvāṃl lokadhātūn samaṃtataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:1483: avabhāsya śubhe satvān vinīya punar āgatāḥ // Rm_3.225{23} //
K14ratnml_u:1485: ūrṇāyāṃ ca munīndrasya sarvā antardadhus tviṣaḥ // Rm_3.226{24} //
K14ratnml_u:1488: jānubhyāṃ bhuvi saṃsthitvā bhagavantaṃ samabravīt // Rm_3.227{25} //
K14ratnml_u:1492: nākāraṇaṃ śaṃkhamṛṇālagauraṃ smitam upadarśayanti jinā jitārayaḥ // Rm_3.229{27} //
K14ratnml_u:1493: tatkālaṃ svayam adhigamya dhīrabuddhyā śrotṝṇāṃ śramaṇajinendra kāṃkṣitānāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:1494: dhīrābhir munivṛṣa vāgbhir uttamābhir utpannaṃ vyapanaya saṃśayaṃ śubhābhiḥ // Rm_3.230{28} //
K14ratnml_u:1495: nākasmāl lavaṇajalādrirājadhairyyāḥ saṃbuddhāḥ smitam upadarśayanti nāthāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:1496: yasyārthe smitam upadarśayanti dhīrās taṃ śrotuṃ samabhilaṣanti janaughāḥ // Rm_3.231{29} //
K14ratnml_u:1497: ity ānaṃdavacaḥ śrutvā saṃbuddho bhagavān asau /
K14ratnml_u:1498: tat smitahetum ādeṣṭuṃ tam ānandaṃ samabravīt // Rm_3.232{30} //
K14ratnml_u:1500: prāviṣkurvanti saṃbuddhā arhantaḥ sugatā jināḥ // Rm_3.233{31} //
K14ratnml_u:1502: pūjayitvā praṇatvā ca bodhau ca praṇidhiḥ kṛtā // Rm_3.234{32} //
K14ratnml_u:1506: tataś cakrāntaro nāma pratyekasugato sudhīḥ // Rm_3.236{34} //
K14ratnml_u:1509: yan mayi sugate buddhe cittam asyāḥ prasīdati /
K14ratnml_u:1511: sugateṣu kṛtaṃ puṇyaṃ na kṣiṇoti kadā cana /
K14ratnml_u:1512: kramāt tena viśuddhātmā saṃbodhim api cāpnuyāt // Rm_3.239{37} //
K14ratnml_u:1513: iti matvā triratneṣu cittam evaṃ prasādya ca /
K14ratnml_u:1515: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā sarve janāś ca te /
K14ratnml_u:1518: tato buddhānubhāvena tac cakraṃ khe samudgataṃ /
K14ratnml_u:1519: kṣaṇaṃ buddhopari sthitvā chatram ivojjvalan babhau // Rm_3.242{40} //
K14ratnml_u:1520: tataś ca viyato gatvā hariharmyopari sthitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:1522: tato 'sau bhagavān buddho dṛṣṭvā tāṃ dārikāṃ svayaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:1523: śirasi pāṇinā spṛṣṭvā svāśīrvacanam ādiśat // Rm_3.244{42} //
K14ratnml_u:1524: bhadre te maṃgalaṃ bhūyā vinipātaṃ na cāpnuhi /
K14ratnml_u:1525: kramāt pāramitāḥ pūryya pratyekaṃ bodhiṃ āpnuhi // Rm_3.245{43} //
K14ratnml_u:1527: tato rājagṛhaṃ gaṃtuṃ upācarat sasāṃghikaḥ // Rm_3.246{44} //
K14ratnml_u:1528: tato 'sau dārikā cāpi natvā taṃ sugataṃ punaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:1529: dṛṣṭvaivaṃ muhuḥ smṛtvā svagehaṃ samupāyayau // Rm_3.247{45} //
K14ratnml_u:1531: bharttur agre ca tadvṛttam ācakhye sarvam ādarāt // Rm_3.248{46} //
K14ratnml_u:1533: tayaivaṃ bhāryayā sārddhaṃ bheje ratnatrayaṃ sadā // Rm_3.249{47} //
K14ratnml_u:1534: evaṃ me guruṇā khyātaṃ tathā te kathyate mayā /
K14ratnml_u:1535: tvam apy evaṃ mahārāja triratnāni sadā bhaja // Rm_3.250{48} //
K14ratnml_u:1536: prajāś cāpi triratnānāṃ bhajane preraya prabho /
K14ratnml_u:1537: tathā te maṃgalaṃ nityaṃ bodhiṃ cāpi samāpnuyāḥ // Rm_3.251{49} //
K14ratnml_u:1539: śrutvāśoko narendro 'sau mumoda saha pārṣadaiḥ // Rm_3.252{50} //
K14ratnml_u:1540: etac cakrāvadānaṃ munivaraguṇadaṃ yaḥ śṛṇoti prasādya /
K14ratnml_u:1541: śrutvā yaś cānumodya pramuditamanasā śrāvayaty evam anyān /
K14ratnml_u:1543: pūtātmā sadguṇāḍhyaḥ munivaranilayaiḥ saṃprayāti pramodāt // Rm_3.253{51} //
K14ratnml_u:1550: yathā me guruṇā proktaṃ tathā vaktuṃ samarhasi // Rm_4.2{2} //
K14ratnml_u:1552: upagupto mahābhijñas taṃ nareśam abhāṣata // Rm_4.3{3} //
K14ratnml_u:1553: yathā me guruṇādiṣṭaṃ tathā vakṣyāmi te 'dhunā /
K14ratnml_u:1554: tathāpi śrūyatāṃ rājan tava dharmapravṛddhaye // Rm_4.4{4} //
K14ratnml_u:1561: garuḍā nāgarājāś ca rākṣasāś ca mahoragāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:1563: rājāno rājamātrāś ca brāhmaṇāś ca mahājanāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:1564: maṃtriṇo śreṣṭhinaś cāpi sārthavāhāś ca paurikāḥ // Rm_4.9{9} //
K14ratnml_u:1566: evam anye 'pi lokāś ca parivṛtya samaṃtataḥ // Rm_4.10{10} //
K14ratnml_u:1568: mānayitvā ca taṃ nāthaṃ dṛṣṭvā tasthuḥ samāhitāḥ // Rm_4.11{11} //
K14ratnml_u:1569: tasmiṃś ca samaye tatra maudgalyāyana ātmavit /
K14ratnml_u:1570: sa pretabhuvane gatvā caran pretīm apaśyata // Rm_4.12{12} //
K14ratnml_u:1576: tatrāyuṣmān sa maudgalyo dṛṣṭvā tāṃ pretikāṃ ciraṃ /
K14ratnml_u:1578: kiṃ tvayā prakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ yenaivaṃ duḥkhabhāginī /
K14ratnml_u:1580: iti tena yatīśena pṛṣṭvā sā pretikā tataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:1581: taṃ yatiṃ saugataṃ natvā praruditvāvadat tathā // Rm_4.17{17} //
K14ratnml_u:1582: bhadanta tad vijānīyāḥ pāpakāriṇy ahaṃ yataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:1586: yadā varṣati deve ca dṛṣṭvā tadambupātitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:1587: pātum ichantl tṛṣṇārttā sahasāhaṃ pradhāvitā // Rm_4.20{20} //
K14ratnml_u:1589: dṛṣṭvaivaṃ nirāśāndhā bhramāmi dikṣu sarvataḥ // Rm_4.21{21} //
K14ratnml_u:1590: kiṃ mayā prakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ yenāsmy evaṃ supāpinī /
K14ratnml_u:1591: tan me pāpaṃ jagacchāstā pṛchyatāṃ bhavatādarāt // Rm_4.22{22} //
K14ratnml_u:1592: nūnaṃ so bhagavāñ chāstā yan me karmapurākṛtaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:1593: vyākariṣyati tat sarvaṃ tathā lokaprabodhane // Rm_4.23{23} //
K14ratnml_u:1594: yac chrutvānye 'pi satvāś ca saṃvignamanaso drutaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:1595: viramya pāpamārgebhyaś cariṣyanti śubhe sadā // Rm_4.24{24} //
K14ratnml_u:1596: tasmād bhadanta sarvajñas tava śāstā sa pṛchyatāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:1597: vyākuryān mama sarvatra yat karma prakṛtaṃ purā // Rm_4.25{25} //
K14ratnml_u:1598: asmannāmnā sa saṃbuddho vaṃdyatāṃ bhavatā yathā /
K14ratnml_u:1599: ity uktvā sā tam ātmajaṃ natvā pretā gṛhaṃ yayau // Rm_4.26{26} //
K14ratnml_u:1600: sa maudgalyas tathety uktvā tat saṃdeśam anusmaran /
K14ratnml_u:1602: tadādau bhagavān dṛṣṭvā tan maudgalyam upāgataṃ /
K14ratnml_u:1604: kaṃcit te kuśalaṃ vatsa kuto 'trāsi samāgataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:1605: lokeṣu kiṃ pravṛttāṃtaṃ tat pracakṣva mahāmate /
K14ratnml_u:1607: iti pṛṣṭe jinendreṇa sa maudgalyaḥ purogataḥ // Rm_4.28{28} //
K14ratnml_u:1608: ādau tasya muner natvā tat pravṛttam udāharat /
K14ratnml_u:1610: tatra sthito 'ham īkṣan tāṃ pretīm ekāṃ bhayānakīṃ /
K14ratnml_u:1617: bhagavan sā mayā dṛṣṭvā tṛṣṇārttā jalalālasā // Rm_4.33{33} //
K14ratnml_u:1621: tasyā darśaṇamātreṇa te sarve 'pi jalāśrayāḥ // Rm_4.35{35} //
K14ratnml_u:1623: tathā viśoṣitāṃ dṛṣṭvā nadyādīṃs tāñ jalāśrayān // Rm_4.36{36} //
K14ratnml_u:1625: tataś ca punar utthāya kṣuttṛṣṇonmādacāriṇī // Rm_4.37{37} //
K14ratnml_u:1626: jalaṃ cānnaṃ samanveṣṭuṃ babhrāma dikṣu sarvataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:1627: tathāpi sā jalaṃ nāsādayat kuhāpi vā // Rm_4.38{38} //
K14ratnml_u:1629: tad api kṛcchrato 'nviṣya bhuktvā tṛptiṃ na sā yayau // Rm_4.39{38} //
K14ratnml_u:1633: svāgataṃ bho bhavān aitu rakṣa māṃ pāpinīṃ laghu // Rm_4.41{41} //
K14ratnml_u:1634: pānīyaṃ dehi me bhadra pānīyaṃ dātum arhasi /
K14ratnml_u:1635: iti proktābhidhāvanti pānīyaṃ mām ayācata // Rm_4.42{42} //
K14ratnml_u:1636: tato 'ham avadaṃ caināṃ pānīyaṃ nātra vidyate /
K14ratnml_u:1637: kātvam evaṃ nu duḥkhāni bhuktvātra vasase kathaṃ // Rm_4.43{43} //
K14ratnml_u:1638: kiṃ tvayā hi kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ yenaivaṃ duḥkhatādhunā /
K14ratnml_u:1640: vaktavyaṃ cec ca tat pāpaṃ sarvaṃ me vaktum arhasi // Rm_4.44{44} //
K14ratnml_u:1641: iti me gaditaṃ śrutvā sa pretī punar abravīt /
K14ratnml_u:1642: kiṃ mayā vakṣyate pāpaṃ yat purā kudhiyā kṛtaṃ // Rm_4.45{45} //
K14ratnml_u:1643: sarvajño hi bhavacchāstā sa evaṃ paripṛchyatāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:1644: tat sarvāṇi ca me pāpaṃ sa vyākuryāt sa sarvavit // Rm_4.46{46} //
K14ratnml_u:1646: iti tayoditaṃ śrutvā pratijñāya tatheti ca // Rm_4.47{47} //
K14ratnml_u:1647: bhavantaṃ praṣṭum āyāmi tat samādeṣṭum arhasi /
K14ratnml_u:1648: ārttasvarā rudantī sā pretī vindati vedanāṃ // Rm_4.48{48} //
K14ratnml_u:1650: tad api kṛcchrato labdhvā bhuṃkte kiṃ cit kadā cana // Rm_4.49{49} //
K14ratnml_u:1651: evaṃ sā pāpinī pretī dṛṣṭātiduḥkhitā mayā /
K14ratnml_u:1652: kiṃ tayā prakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ martyaloke sudāruṇaṃ // Rm_4.50{50} //
K14ratnml_u:1654: kadā sā pāpato muktā kathaṃ ca sugatiṃ vrajet // Rm_4.51{51} //
K14ratnml_u:1656: iti tenārthite cāsau bhagavān punar abravīt // Rm_4.52{52} //
K14ratnml_u:1657: maudgalyāyana sā pretī pāpinī matsarī kudhīḥ /
K14ratnml_u:1658: tayā yat prakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ yena sā duḥkhabhāginī // Rm_4.53{53} //
K14ratnml_u:1659: tat sarvaṃ te pravakṣyāmi śṛṇu śrotuṃ yadīchasi // Rm_4.54{54} //
K14ratnml_u:1660: purāsīd bhagavān buddhaḥ kāśyapo nāma sarvavit /
K14ratnml_u:1667: tasminn eva parṣatmadhye tasthau dharmaṃ samādiśat // Rm_4.58{58} //
K14ratnml_u:1668: tasmiṃś ca samaye tasya bhikṣur anyatamo yatiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:1669: anyatranagare gatvā pratyāgachat svam āśramaṃ // Rm_4.59{59} //
K14ratnml_u:1671: tatra mārge tṛṣārtto 'sau dūrāt kūpaṃ vilokayan /
K14ratnml_u:1673: tadaikā dārikā tatra pūrayitvā ghaṭaṃ jalaiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:1674: sahasā śirasohitvā gṛhaṃ gantum upācarat // Rm_4.61{61} //
K14ratnml_u:1675: sa tṛṣārtto yatir dṛṣṭvā tām ambughaṭavāhikāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:1676: samupetya jalaṃ pātuṃ prārthayan samupācarat // Rm_4.62{62} //
K14ratnml_u:1678: tvāṃ dṛṣṭvā sahasopetya jalaṃ pātum ihāgataḥ // Rm_4.63{63} //
K14ratnml_u:1679: tad bhaginī jalaṃ dehi jīvaya māṃ tṛṣāturaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:1680: datvā me jīvanaṃ tvaṃ tac ciraṃ jīvyā niroginī // Rm_4.64{64} //
K14ratnml_u:1683: are bhikṣo 'tra māyāhi mriyase yadi vā khalu /
K14ratnml_u:1684: na te dadāmi pānīyaṃ ghaṭo pūrṇo bhaven mama // Rm_4.66{66} //
K14ratnml_u:1686: prohitvāyaṃ mayānītas tvadarthe kiṃ na manyate // Rm_4.67{67} //
K14ratnml_u:1687: nirlajja kva nu te lajjā parakīyāmbum ichasi /
K14ratnml_u:1688: rājā kiṃ tvaṃ dhanī vāsi gurur vā kiṃ na manyate // Rm_4.68{68} //
K14ratnml_u:1689: ity ākṣepaṃ pratikṣipya taṃ bhikṣuṃ saugataṃ yatiṃ /
K14ratnml_u:1690: adatvaivāmṛtaṃ kiṃ cit satvarā sā gṛhaṃ yayau // Rm_4.69{69} //
K14ratnml_u:1692: anyatraivaṃ samāyācya pītvā yayau svam āśramaṃ // Rm_4.70{70} //
K14ratnml_u:1693: tatrāśrame taror mūle paryaṇkam upabhujya saḥ /
K14ratnml_u:1694: anuśocaya tāṃ nārīṃ manasaivaṃ vyaciṃtayat // Rm_4.71{71} //
K14ratnml_u:1696: kathaṃ na manyate hy evaṃ mānuṣyajanma durllabhaṃ // Rm_4.72{72} //
K14ratnml_u:1697: mānuṣyaṃ puṇyato labdhvā nisphalaṃ kriyate tayā /
K14ratnml_u:1698: dhik tāṃ durāśayāṃ mūḍhāṃ yasyā janma nirarthakaṃ // Rm_4.73{73} //
K14ratnml_u:1700: mā gāt sā narake duḥkhaṃ bhūyād dharmānumodinī // Rm_4.74{74} //
K14ratnml_u:1703: ity evaṃmanasā bhāṣya sa bhikṣur vijitendriyaḥ // Rm_4.75{75} //
K14ratnml_u:1705: tato 'sau dārikā gehe prāptā bhartuḥ purogatā // Rm_4.76{76} //
K14ratnml_u:1707: svāmin nadyāmbusaṃpūrṇaṃ ghaṭaṃ dhṛtvāgatā pathi // Rm_4.77{77} //
K14ratnml_u:1708: tato bhikṣur upāgatya pānīyaṃ māṃ prayācati /
K14ratnml_u:1709: adatvaivaṃ jalaṃ tasmai bhikṣave satvarāgatā // Rm_4.78{71} //
K14ratnml_u:1710: vahuśo yācyamānāpi kiṃ cin naiva dadāmy ahaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:1711: iti tayoktamātre 'sau bharttā sādhur api krudhā /
K14ratnml_u:1712: tāṃ bhāryāṃ rukṣaṇetreṇa dṛṣṭvā caivam abhāṣata // Rm_4.79{72} //
K14ratnml_u:1713: are pāpini durbuddhe kathaṃ na dīyate tvayā /
K14ratnml_u:1714: kiyad vyeti jalaṃ datvā bhikṣave tṛṣitāya te // Rm_4.80{71/} //
K14ratnml_u:1716: sā kim annaṃ dhanaṃ ratnaṃ kathāṃ dātuṃ samutsahet // Rm_4.81{72} //
K14ratnml_u:1717: dhik tvāṃ pāpinīṃ duṣṭāṃ yasyā nāsti dayārthine /
K14ratnml_u:1718: kiṃ tvayā mama satyāpi yaśodharmapraghātayā // Rm_4.82{73} //
K14ratnml_u:1719: yady evaṃ na pradadyās tvaṃ kasmai cid arthine jalaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:1720: preyasīm api bhārye tvāṃ parityakṣyāmy ahaṃ khalu // Rm_4.83{74} //
K14ratnml_u:1721: yadi me priyatāṃ kartum ichasi snehacetasā /
K14ratnml_u:1722: arthino mānayitvā tad dānaṃ kartuṃ samutsaheḥ // Rm_4.84{75} //
K14ratnml_u:1723: no ced evaṃ mayā tyaktā vraja mā tiṣṭha me gṛhe /
K14ratnml_u:1724: avaśyaṃ nau viyogaḥ syād ekānte maraṇaṃ dhruvaṃ // Rm_4.85{76} //
K14ratnml_u:1725: kiṃ tvādṛśyā striyā puṃsaḥ kevalaṃ dharmahānaye /
K14ratnml_u:1726: dharmaṃ vinā na me kāryyaṃ dākṣiṇyāpi ca bhāryayā // Rm_4.86{77} //
K14ratnml_u:1728: dharma eva vinaśyeta tad vraja mā gṛhe vasa // Rm_4.87{78} //
K14ratnml_u:1729: dharmeṇa rakṣyate lokaḥ kāntayā kiṃ hi rakṣyate /
K14ratnml_u:1730: tat kāntāpi parityājyā yadi pāpanuraginī // Rm_4.88{79} //
K14ratnml_u:1732: bhāryā hi pālanīyā sā yadi dharmārthinī satī /
K14ratnml_u:1733: kiṃ tvaṃ pāpārthinī duṣṭā yaśodharmavināśinī // Rm_4.89{80} //
K14ratnml_u:1734: naivāhaṃ ca tvayā sārddhaṃ bhoktuṃ rantuṃ samutsahe /
K14ratnml_u:1735: kriyate cet tvayā dharmas tathā vasa mayā saha // Rm_4.90{81} //
K14ratnml_u:1736: no ced evaṃ mayā tyaktā tvaṃ mā tiṣṭha gṛhe vraja /
K14ratnml_u:1737: evaṃ bharttrocyamānāpi pramadā sā na bodhitā // Rm_4.91{82} //
K14ratnml_u:1739: naiva sthāsyāmy ahaṃ yāsye kiṃ sthitvaivaṃ vininditā // Rm_4.92{83} //
K14ratnml_u:1740: kiyat tvayy aparādhaṃ me yat tathāhaṃ vimocitā /
K14ratnml_u:1741: kiṃ sa bhikṣur gurur rājā mitraṃ vā te pitā suhṛt // Rm_4.93{84} //
K14ratnml_u:1742: jñātir vā sa sakhā vandhuḥ kiṃ ca bhrātā prabhur dhanī /
K14ratnml_u:1743: pradattaṃ kiṃ adattaṃ ca kiyan naṣṭaṃ bhavet yataḥ // Rm_4.94{85} //
K14ratnml_u:1744: naiva kiṃcic ca dāsyāmi kasmai cid bhikṣave 'rthitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:1745: adatvā me bhavet kiṃ hi dāsyāmy ahaṃ yathechayā // Rm_4.95{86} //
K14ratnml_u:1746: dāsyāmi vā na dāsyāmi kā carcātra tathā tava /
K14ratnml_u:1747: pāpaś cen mayi pacyeta dharmo vāpi tathā mama // Rm_4.96{87} //
K14ratnml_u:1748: tvam atra mā kṛthāś cintāṃ kiṃ tvayātra vicāryyate /
K14ratnml_u:1749: śubhaṃ vāpy aśubhaṃ vā me tava kiṃ tad vicāratā // Rm_4.97{88} //
K14ratnml_u:1750: tathāpi mama doṣaṃ ced yāsyāmi na vasāmy ahaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:1751: varaṃ prāṇaparityājyaṃ na tu dānaṃ dadāmy ahaṃ // Rm_4.98{89} //
K14ratnml_u:1752: ity asau pramadākruṣya bhartur ākṣipya garvitā /
K14ratnml_u:1753: kvacit kiṃcic ca kasmaicid dadau naiva kadācana // Rm_4.99{90} //
K14ratnml_u:1755: vahudhā kruṣya tān gehān nyakāsayad balādapi // Rm_4.100{91} //
K14ratnml_u:1759: koṣṭha eva samāsīnā kadācin na viniryayau // Rm_4.102{93} //
K14ratnml_u:1761: sarvadā svāminā sārddhaṃ kṛtvaivaṃ kalahaṃ muhuḥ /
K14ratnml_u:1762: svayam eva prabhuktvāsau kālam evam ayāpayat // Rm_4.103{94} //
K14ratnml_u:1763: tataḥ kāla upāyāte pramadā sā rujānvitā /
K14ratnml_u:1764: tadāpy evaṃ na cotsehe kiṃcid dātuṃ samarthine // Rm_4.104{95} //
K14ratnml_u:1766: mṛtā sā narake yātā pretī bhavati sāṃprataṃ // Rm_4.105{96} //
K14ratnml_u:1768: saivaiṣā hi tvayā dṛṣṭā pretī narakavāsinī // Rm_4.106{97} //
K14ratnml_u:1770: sarvādā śraddhayārthibhyo dātavyaṃ jalam ādarāt // Rm_4.107{98} //
K14ratnml_u:1772: sarveṣāṃ jīvanaṃ yasmād amṛtaṃ saṃvaraṃ jalaṃ // Rm_4.108{99} //
K14ratnml_u:1773: jalapānaṃ vinā sarve na jīvanti hi jantavaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:1774: tad amṛtaṃ jalaṃ śuddhaṃ dātavyam arthine sadā // Rm_4.109{100} //
K14ratnml_u:1775: jalam eva hi pītvā te nirāhārās tapasvinaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:1778: sarvān na paribhuktvāpi na jīvanti jalair vinā // Rm_4.111{2} //
K14ratnml_u:1781: viśeṣād grīṣmakāle tu tṛṣārttāya ca rogine /
K14ratnml_u:1782: bālavṛddhāturebhyaś ca dātavyaṃ jalam āditaḥ // Rm_4.113{4} //
K14ratnml_u:1784: yenābhidhāryyate prāṇaṃ tat phalaṃ saṃpraśasyate // Rm_4.114{5} //
K14ratnml_u:1788: gavāṃ koṭipradānāc ca jaladānaṃ mahīyate // Rm_4.116{7} //
K14ratnml_u:1792: sarve bhūtāś ca satvāś ca jalenaiva sadāpi hi // Rm_4.118{9} //
K14ratnml_u:1793: tathā dravyāni sarvāṇi bhūtāni hy aśuciny api /
K14ratnml_u:1795: jalaṃ vinā na tṛpyante bhuktvāpi divyabhojanaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:1798: tathā ye ca sudhāṃ pītvā divyakāntā samarpitā /
K14ratnml_u:1799: ramanti tridaśāḥ svarge te hi sarve jalapradāḥ // Rm_4.121{12} //
K14ratnml_u:1801: bhuktvā ramati saṃmodī so 'pi cāmbupradānataḥ // Rm_4.122{13} //
K14ratnml_u:1802: evaṃ cānye 'pi ye lokā yathechā sukhabhoginaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:1803: niḥkleśā nirujā bhadrās te hi sarve jalapradāḥ // Rm_4.123{14} //
K14ratnml_u:1805: yācakāḥ preṣyakāś cāpi sarve te 'mbho'pradānikāḥ // Rm_4.124{15} //
K14ratnml_u:1807: sarvair api munīṃdraiś ca kim anyair vibuddhair janaiḥ // Rm_4.125{16} //
K14ratnml_u:1809: arthibhyaḥ sarvasatvebhyo dātavyaṃ jalam ādarāt // Rm_4.126{17} //
K14ratnml_u:1810: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā sarve ca bhikṣavaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:1811: sarvebhyaḥ sarvadā kartuṃ jaladānaṃ samaichan // Rm_4.127{18} //
K14ratnml_u:1812: athānandaḥ samutthāya natvā taṃ śrīghanaṃ guruṃ /
K14ratnml_u:1814: kadā sā bhagavan pretī tatpāpāt parimokṣyate /
K14ratnml_u:1816: ity ānandena pṛṣṭe 'sau sarvajño bhagavāṃs tadā /
K14ratnml_u:1817: tam ānaṃdaṃ samārabhya prāha pāpavimocanaṃ // Rm_4.130{21} //
K14ratnml_u:1818: śṛṇv ānaṃda samādhāya yena sā parimokṣyate /
K14ratnml_u:1820: sā pretī narakeṣv evaṃ sarveṣu bhramitā sadā /
K14ratnml_u:1822: tataḥ kālāntare saivaṃ smṛtvā ratnatrayaṃ yadi /
K14ratnml_u:1824: namo buddhāya dharmāya saṃghāyeti vaded yadā // Rm_4.133{24} //
K14ratnml_u:1826: dṛṣṭvā tāṃ sahasopetya svaprabhābhiḥ parispṛśet // Rm_4.134{25} //
K14ratnml_u:1827: yadā lokeśvarābhābhiḥ sparśitā sā sudhī satī /
K14ratnml_u:1830: kim āhosvid itaś cyutvāgato 'nyatra vasāmy ahaṃ // Rm_4.136{27} //
K14ratnml_u:1832: dṛṣṭvā lokeśvaraś caināṃ bodhayitum upācaret // Rm_4.137{28} //
K14ratnml_u:1834: vividhair bhojanaiś cāpi pratarppayet sa bodhirāṭ // Rm_4.138{29} //
K14ratnml_u:1835: tato 'sau pāpinī pretī pītvā tat tanujāmṛtaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:1836: paritṛptā viśuddhāṅgā natvā taṃ prārthayet tathā // Rm_4.139{30} //
K14ratnml_u:1837: namas te bhagavan nātha kṛpayā māṃ samuddhara /
K14ratnml_u:1838: darśaya dharmamārgaṃ me sadā te śaraṇaṃ vraje // Rm_4.140{31} //
K14ratnml_u:1841: yāṃ śrutvaiva ca sā pretī sarvapāpavimocitā /
K14ratnml_u:1842: tataś cyutvā viśuddhātmā janma bodhikule labhet // Rm_4.142{33} //
K14ratnml_u:1843: tatra bodhicarīḥ prāptuṃ cared vratam upoṣadhaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:1846: bodhisatvo mahāsatvo bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // Rm_4.144{35} //
K14ratnml_u:1848: sarvadā ca sukhaṃ bhuktvā sukhāvatīṃ gamiṣyati /
K14ratnml_u:1850: saṃbodhijñānaṃ āsādya nirvṛtiṃ cāpy avāpsyati // Rm_4.145{36} //
K14ratnml_u:1851: yady asau smarate pretī triratnānāṃ samāhitā /
K14ratnml_u:1852: tadā caivaṃ tataś cyutvā saukhāvatīṃ gamiṣyati // Rm_4.146{37} //
K14ratnml_u:1853: no ced evaṃ hi sā pretī sadāpi narake vaset /
K14ratnml_u:1854: yāvan na smarate buddhaṃ tāvan na mokṣyate tataḥ // Rm_4.147{38} //
K14ratnml_u:1856: evaṃ sarve 'pi ye satvā yāvanto narakāsthitāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:1857: tāvantas te 'pi sarve ca duṣṭāḥ pāpānucārikāḥ // Rm_4.148{39} //
K14ratnml_u:1859: namo buddhāya dharmāya saṃghāyeti vadaṃti ca // Rm_4.149{40} //
K14ratnml_u:1862: tato lokeśvaro dṛṣṭvā tān satvān dharmabhājanān /
K14ratnml_u:1864: tataḥ sarve ca te satvā bodhipraṇidhimānasāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:1866: tatas te narakāc cyutvā saṃprayāyuḥ sukhāvatīṃ /
K14ratnml_u:1871: evam anye 'pi ye satvā lokeśasaraṇaṃ gatāḥ // Rm_4.155{35} //
K14ratnml_u:1872: te āśu pāpanirmuktāḥ sukhāvatīṃ vrajanti hi /
K14ratnml_u:1873: ye ye lokeśvaraṃ smṛtvā bhajanti satataṃ mudā /
K14ratnml_u:1874: te te sarve ca niḥpāpā bhavanti bodhibhāginaḥ // Rm_4.156{36} //
K14ratnml_u:1875: tasmāl lokeśvaraṃ smṛtvā gatvā ca śaraṇaṃ sadā /
K14ratnml_u:1878: sarveṣāṃ api puṇyānāṃ tadvratapuṇyam uttamaṃ // Rm_4.158{38} //

K14ratnml_u:2179: na jñātibhir na mitraiś ca na sahāyasuhṛjjanaiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:2180: nāpi sālohitaiś cāpi pitṛlokair na cāparaiḥ // Rm_5.77{77} //
K14ratnml_u:2181: na rājñā na cāmātyair na maṃtribhir na ca paurikaiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:2182: na gurubhir na vipraiś ca na yatibhir na tāpasaiḥ // Rm_5.78{78} //
K14ratnml_u:2183: na devair nāpi daityaiś ca nāpi lokādhipair api /
K14ratnml_u:2184: tathānyaiś ca kṛtaṃ naiva yad idaṃ bhavatā kṛtaṃ // Rm_5.79{79} //
K14ratnml_u:2186: asthimayo mahāchailo yad asmābhiś ca laṃghitaḥ // Rm_5.80{80} //
K14ratnml_u:2187: tavānubhāvāt pihitaḥ sughoro hy apāyamārgo bahudoṣayuktaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:2188: apāvṛtā svargagatiḥ supuṇyā nirvāṇamārgaś ca mayopalabdhaḥ // Rm_5.81{81} //
K14ratnml_u:2190: prāptaṃ ca śāntaṃ padam āryyakāntaṃ tīrṇaś ca duḥkhārṇavapāram asmi // Rm_5.82{82} //
K14ratnml_u:2192: bhavasahasrasudullabhadarśane saphalam adya mune tava darśanaṃ // Rm_5.83{83} //
K14ratnml_u:2193: tataḥ praṇatvā caraṇāraviṃdau muneḥ prakṛtvā tṛpradakṣiṇāṃ ca /
K14ratnml_u:2194: prajātaharṣā sugataṃ jineṃdraṃ smṛtvā ca bhūyo divam āyayau sā // Rm_5.84{84} //
K14ratnml_u:2196: yathā vaṇig labdhalābho rogamukto yathāturaḥ // Rm_5.85{85} //
K14ratnml_u:2199: atha te bhikṣavaḥ sarve dṛṣṭvaivam avabhāsitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:2200: saṃdigdhavismitāś caivaṃ paprachus taṃ munīśvarāṃ // Rm_5.87{87} //
K14ratnml_u:2201: bhagavann adya rātrau ko bhavato 'ntikam āgataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:2202: brahmā vā surarājo vā lokapālagaṇā api // Rm_5.88{88} //
K14ratnml_u:2203: asmābhir jñāyate nāyaṃ yo 'dya rātrāv ihāgataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:2205: tad asmān vismitān sarvān bodhayituṃ samarhasi // Rm_5.89{89} //
K14ratnml_u:2206: iti tair bhikṣubhiḥ pṛṣṭo bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:2207: tāṃś ca bhikṣugaṇān sarvān samāmaṃtryābravīt tathā // Rm_5.90{90} //
K14ratnml_u:2208: na hi sa bhikṣavo brahmā nāpi vāsau surādhipaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:2209: naiva lokādhipālāś ca yādya rātrāv ihāgatā // Rm_5.91{91} //
K14ratnml_u:2210: api tu dārikā dṛṣṭā yuṣmābhiḥ sagatā pathi /
K14ratnml_u:2212: sā māṃ puṣpair avākīryya gṛhasyārthe punar vanaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:2213: gatā puṣpāṇy upāhartuṃ vṛkṣārūḍhāpatat taroḥ // Rm_5.93{93} //
K14ratnml_u:2215: triratnāni smaranty eva dehaṃ tyaktvā divaṃ yayau // Rm_5.94{94} //
K14ratnml_u:2216: tatra svarge samāsādya smṛtva māṃ sugataṃ punaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:2217: draṣṭuṃ dharmaṃ ca me śrotum ihāsau samupāgatā // Rm_5.95{95} //
K14ratnml_u:2218: tan mayā deśitaṃ tasyai saṃbodhidharmam uttamaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:2219: śrutvā sā cānumodyaivaṃ saṃharṣitā divaṃ yayau // Rm_5.96{96} //
K14ratnml_u:2220: ity evaṃ bhikṣavo matvā triratnāni śubhārthibhiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:2221: sevitavyāni saṃsmṛtvā gatvā ca śaraṇaṃ sadā // Rm_5.97{97} //
K14ratnml_u:2222: ye bhajanti triratnāni saṃsmṛtvā śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:2223: durgatiṃ te na gachaṃti vrajanti sadgatiṃ sadā // Rm_5.98{98} //
K14ratnml_u:2225: sadgatiṃ te na gachanti vasanti narake sadā // Rm_5.99{99} //
K14ratnml_u:2226: tasmān nityāṃ triratnāni saṃsmṛtvā śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:2227: satkṛtya bhāvayitvā ca bhajadhvaṃ bodhivāṃchayā // Rm_5.100{100} //
K14ratnml_u:2228: tathā vo maṅgalaṃ nityaṃ sarvatra sarvadā bhavet /
K14ratnml_u:2229: kramād bodhicarīṃ pūrya saṃbodhim api lapsyatha // Rm_5.101{1} //
K14ratnml_u:2230: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā te bhikṣavo mudā /
K14ratnml_u:2232: ity evaṃ guruṇādiṣṭaṃ mayaivaṃ te pracakṣyate /
K14ratnml_u:2233: śrutvaitac chrāvayitvā ca triratnāni sadā bhaja // Rm_5.103{3} //
K14ratnml_u:2234: tatas tvaṃ kramaśaś caiva bodhicaryāṃ samācaran /
K14ratnml_u:2238: śrutvā rājā tathety evam abhyanandat sapārṣadaḥ // Rm_5.105{4} //
K14ratnml_u:2240: ye śrutvā śrāvayanti pramuditamanasaḥ śraddhayā bodhikāmāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:2242: kṛtvā loke hitārthaṃ jinavaravasatiṃ saṃprayaṃti praharṣaiḥ // Rm_5.106{5} //
K14ratnml_u:2247: triratnasmṛtijaṃ puṇyaṃ khyātuṃ nṛpam abravīt // Rm_6.1{1} //
K14ratnml_u:2249: tad ahaṃ te pravakṣyāmi śṛṇu rājan samāhitaḥ // Rm_6.2{2} //
K14ratnml_u:2253: amlānāni ca mālyāni mlāyeran sahasā khalu // Rm_6.4{4} //
K14ratnml_u:2254: daurgandhaṃ niḥsared dehāt kakṣābhyāṃ sveda udbhavet /
K14ratnml_u:2255: pracyutisamaye prāpte svāsane na dhṛtiṃ labhet // Rm_6.5{5} //
K14ratnml_u:2259: etatpaṃcanimittāni prādur āsaṃś cyuteḥ puraḥ // Rm_6.7{7} //
K14ratnml_u:2261: avaśyaṃ cyavanaṃ svargān matvā rautsīd adhīritaḥ // Rm_6.8{8} //
K14ratnml_u:2263: punaś caitanyam āsādya vilapaṃ paryyadevataḥ // Rm_6.9{9} //
