K14ratnml_u:2265: tvayi snātvapy ahaṃ cyutvā yāsyāmi durgatiṃ kathaṃ // Rm_6.10{10} //
K14ratnml_u:2266: hā caitraratham utsṛjya kva krīḍeyaṃ yathechayā /
K14ratnml_u:2267: hā nandanavanaṃ ramyaṃ tyaktvāhaṃ kva rameya ca // Rm_6.11{11} //
K14ratnml_u:2268: hā miśrikāvanaṃ divyaṃ tyaktvā ramye kuhādhunā /
K14ratnml_u:2269: hā pāruṣyavanaṃ tyaktvā kva ramyāmy apsarogaṇaiḥ // Rm_6.12{12} //
K14ratnml_u:2272: hā devasamitiṃ tyaktvā kva śroṣyāmi subhāṣitāṃ // Rm_6.13{13} //
K14ratnml_u:2273: hā hā sudarśanaṃ ramyaṃ puraṃ tyaktvā vraje cyutaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:2274: prāsādaṃ vaijayaṃtañ ca kadā drakṣyāmy ahaṃ punaḥ // Rm_6.14{14} //
K14ratnml_u:2276: adhunā me kva tat saukhyaṃ śrotuṃ cāpi na lapsyate // Rm_6.15{15} //
K14ratnml_u:2277: hā devyam amṛtaṃ tyaktvā kiṃ prabhokṣyāmi sāṃprataṃ /
K14ratnml_u:2278: divyakāmasukhaṃ bhuktvā punar durgatim āśrayan // Rm_6.16{16} //
K14ratnml_u:2279: kiyad duḥkhaṃ ca saṃbhoktuṃ yāsyāmi narakeṣv ahaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:2280: etad divyamahotsāhād bhraṣṭo 'haṃ narake gataḥ // Rm_6.17{17} //
K14ratnml_u:2282: hā hato 'smi svapāpena kiṃ pāpaṃ prakṛtaṃ mayā // Rm_6.18{18} //
K14ratnml_u:2283: yenetaḥ svargataś cyutvā punar yāsyāmi nārakān kiṃ /
K14ratnml_u:2284: upāyaṃ kariṣyāmi na yāyāṃ yena durgatiṃ // Rm_6.19{19} //
K14ratnml_u:2285: ko me śāstātra vidyeta yo māṃ dharme niyojayet /
K14ratnml_u:2286: dharmeṇa rakṣyate prāṇī narake saṃsthito 'pi ca // Rm_6.20{20} //
K14ratnml_u:2287: dharmaṃ vinātra devo 'pi svargāt prabhransyate punaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:2288: kiṃ karomi kva yāsyāmi nātropāyaṃ tu manyate // Rm_6.21{21} //
K14ratnml_u:2289: sarvathāham itaś cyutvā gacheyaṃ durgatiṃ khalu /
K14ratnml_u:2290: itaś cyutasya me janma labdhavyaṃ bhuvane kuha // Rm_6.22{22} //
K14ratnml_u:2292: cyutvetaḥ saukaraṃ janma prāptavyaṃ saptame dine // Rm_6.23{23} //
K14ratnml_u:2294: athādrākṣīn mahendras taṃ patitaṃ bhuvi mūrchitaṃ // Rm_6.24{24} //
K14ratnml_u:2296: tato 'sau cetanāṃ labdhvā śanair utthāya taṃ prabhuṃ // Rm_6.25{25} //
K14ratnml_u:2297: dṛṣṭvā pādau pariṣvajya natvaivaṃ prārthayad rudan /
K14ratnml_u:2298: hā hā nātha mahendro 'si sarvalokādhipaḥ prabhuḥ // Rm_6.26{26} //
K14ratnml_u:2299: mām adhaḥ patitaṃ dṛṣṭvā nopekṣāṃ kartum arhasi /
K14ratnml_u:2301: bhavān hi jagatāṃ rājā svāmī bharttā patiḥ prabhuḥ // Rm_6.27{27} //
K14ratnml_u:2302: nātho dharmānuśāstā ca tan māṃ rakṣatum arhasi /
K14ratnml_u:2303: tvadṛte 'nyo na me kaścid rakṣako vidyate 'tra hi // Rm_6.28{28} //
K14ratnml_u:2304: tad anukaṃpayā dṛṣṭyā dhṛtvā mām uddhara prabho /
K14ratnml_u:2305: yadi māṃ rakṣituṃ nātha na śaknoti bhavān api // Rm_6.29{29} //
K14ratnml_u:2306: ko māṃ samuddhared anyo hā hato narake vraje /
K14ratnml_u:2307: maṃḍākinyāṃ tvayā sārddhaṃ snātvā pūtātmako 'py ahaṃ // Rm_6.30{30} //
K14ratnml_u:2308: kathaṃ ca narake gatvā vaseyam aśuciṃ caran /
K14ratnml_u:2309: sahāpsarogaṇair nityaṃ caritvā naṃdane vane // Rm_6.31{31} //
K14ratnml_u:2312: saukaraṃ janma lapsyāmi saptame divase khalu /
K14ratnml_u:2313: tatra mūtrapuriṣādīn amedhyān api kṛcchrataḥ // Rm_6.33{33} //
K14ratnml_u:2317: evaṃ divyāmṛtaṃ bhuktvā ramitvā bhavatā saha // Rm_6.35{35} //
K14ratnml_u:2318: kathaṃ hi nārake gatvā bhokṣye 'medhyāni saṃcaraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:2320: jāṃgalaṃ vṛkṣam āśritya sthito bhokṣyāmi kiṃ tadā /
K14ratnml_u:2321: sarvathāhaṃ cyuto 'smītaḥ prerito hi svakarmaṇā // Rm_6.37{37} //
K14ratnml_u:2322: vividhāni ca duḥkhāni bhoktuṃ yāsyāmi nārake /
K14ratnml_u:2323: tad upāyaṃ pradātavyaṃ bhavatā me 'nukaṃpinā // Rm_6.38{38} //
K14ratnml_u:2324: yenāśu durgater muktaḥ prāgacheyaṃ ca svargatiṃ /
K14ratnml_u:2325: sarvathā rakṣa māṃ nātha yady asti te kṛpā mayi // Rm_6.39{39} //
K14ratnml_u:2326: bhavān māṃ patitaṃ dṛṣṭvā nopekṣāṃ kartum arhati /
K14ratnml_u:2327: bhavān eva jagacchāstā sarvalokādhipaḥ prabhuḥ // Rm_6.40{40} //
K14ratnml_u:2328: tad āśu māṃ prayatnena samuddhartuṃ samarhati /
K14ratnml_u:2329: idaṃ te darśanaṃ nātha paścimaṃ me bhavet khalu // Rm_6.41{41} //
K14ratnml_u:2331: janmaśatasahasraiś ca durlabhaṃ syād dhi saṃgamaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:2332: ity evaṃ vilapaṃ devaputras sa taṃ surādhipaṃ // Rm_6.42{42} //
K14ratnml_u:2334: atha śakraḥ surendro 'sau dṛṣṭvaivaṃ pravilāpitaṃ // Rm_6.43{43} //
K14ratnml_u:2336: mā kṛthā rodanaṃ bhadra samāśvasi hi dhīraya // Rm_6.44{44} //
K14ratnml_u:2337: kriyante kiṃ prayatnāni sarvathā maraṇaṃ dhruvaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:2339: hrīyante mṛtyunā sarve mṛtyuḥ kena nihanyate /
K14ratnml_u:2340: anirvāyo hi sarvatra sarvatraidhātukeṣv api // Rm_6.46{46} //
K14ratnml_u:2341: sarveṣām api jantūnām ekānte maraṇaṃ dhruvaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:2342: tasmān mā bhes tathā mṛtyoḥ kiṃ viṣādena sidhyate // Rm_6.47{47} //
K14ratnml_u:2343: tad dhairyyataiḥ samālaṃvya triratnaṃ śaraṇaṃ vraja /
K14ratnml_u:2344: gatvā ca śaraṇaṃ teṣāṃ smara nityaṃ samāhitaḥ // Rm_6.48{48} //
K14ratnml_u:2345: tatas tvaṃ durgatiṃ muktvā sadgatiṃ samavāpnuyāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:2346: etad eva hi saṃsāre mahopāyaṃ śubhāptaye // Rm_6.49{49} //
K14ratnml_u:2347: nānyad dhi vidyate kiṃcin mṛtyau sādhāraṇe dhruve /
K14ratnml_u:2348: tad anyaccetanāṃ hitvā triratnāny abhisaṃsmaran // Rm_6.50{50} //
K14ratnml_u:2349: namo buddhāya dharmāya saṃghāyeti vadan bhaja /
K14ratnml_u:2350: ye triratnasmṛtiṃ dhṛtvā mṛtās te puṇyabhāginaḥ // Rm_6.51{51} //
K14ratnml_u:2351: kramād bodhicarīṃ prāpya yāyuś cānte sukhavatīṃ /
K14ratnml_u:2352: tvaṃ cāpi triratnānaṃ smṛtvā mṛtaḥ supuṇyadhṛk // Rm_6.52{52} //
K14ratnml_u:2354: itīndreṇa samādiṣṭaṃ śrutvā devasuto 'tha saḥ // Rm_6.53{53} //
K14ratnml_u:2356: adyārabhya mahendrāhaṃ triratnānaṃ sadā smaran // Rm_6.54{54} //
K14ratnml_u:2357: gatvā ca śaraṇaṃ teṣāṃ upāsako bhave khalu /
K14ratnml_u:2358: ity uktvā sa mahendrasya puraḥ sthitvā kṛtāñjaliḥ // Rm_6.55{55} //
K14ratnml_u:2360: namo buddhāya bhadrāya namo dharmāya tāyine // Rm_6.56{56} //
K14ratnml_u:2362: namaḥ saṃghāya nāthāya sarvadāpi name bhaje /
K14ratnml_u:2363: adyārabhya triratnānāṃ sadāhaṃ śaraṇaṃ vraje // Rm_6.57{57} //
K14ratnml_u:2364: upāsako bhaven nityaṃ namāmi satataṃ smaret /
K14ratnml_u:2365: ity uktvā devaputro 'sau kāladharmayutaś cyutaḥ // Rm_6.58{58} //
K14ratnml_u:2367: dharmatā khalu devānāṃ ye devāḥ svargataś cyutāḥ // Rm_6.59{59} //
K14ratnml_u:2369: atha śakro narendro 'sau dṛṣṭvā taṃ svargataś cyutaṃ // Rm_6.60{60} //
K14ratnml_u:2370: kutrāsau labhate janma ity adhastād vyalokayat /
K14ratnml_u:2371: kim asau sūkarīgarbha utpanno vā na veti ca // Rm_6.61{61} //
K14ratnml_u:2372: apaśyat sarvataś cainaṃ na dadarśa kuhāpi sa /
K14ratnml_u:2373: tato 'sau vismitaḥ śakro divyena cakṣuṣā punaḥ // Rm_6.62{62} //
K14ratnml_u:2374: kutrāsau labhate janma ity evaṃ samalokayat /
K14ratnml_u:2375: vata tiryyakṣu jāto 'sau preteṣu ca prajāyate // Rm_6.63{63} //
K14ratnml_u:2376: atha narakeṣu vā jāta ity evaṃ samalokayat /
K14ratnml_u:2377: teṣu triṣv apy apāyeṣu nādrākṣīt taṃ samaṃtataḥ // Rm_6.64{64} //
K14ratnml_u:2378: tato manuṣyalokeṣu jāto veti dadarśa ca /
K14ratnml_u:2379: tatrāpi ca sa sarvatra nādrākṣīt taṃ sureśvaraḥ // Rm_6.65{65} //
K14ratnml_u:2381: iti teṣu ca sarvatra vilokayan dadarśa na // Rm_6.66{66} //
K14ratnml_u:2382: tataś ca vismitaḥ śakras trayastriṃśe vyalokayan /
K14ratnml_u:2383: tatrāpi taṃ na cādrākṣīt kutrāpi ca samaṃtataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:2385: adṛṣṭvā vismitaḥ śakraḥ punar evaṃ vyaciṃtayat /
K14ratnml_u:2386: aho vata mahāścaryyaṃ yan mayāpi na dṛśyate // Rm_6.67{67} //
K14ratnml_u:2387: kutrāsau jāyate nūnaṃ na manye tat pravṛttitāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:2388: ko nu jñāsyati tadvṛttiṃ buddhād anyo na kaścana // Rm_6.68{68} //
K14ratnml_u:2390: tasmād aham ito gatvā saṃbuddhe samupācaran // Rm_6.69{69} //
K14ratnml_u:2392: vijñapyaivaṃ ca tadvṛttiṃ praṣṭum arhāmi sāṃprātaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:2393: ity evaṃ manasā dhyātvā devendro 'sau savismayaḥ // Rm_6.70{70} //
K14ratnml_u:2397: bhagavaṃs tad vijānīyā yad ihāham upāgataḥ // Rm_6.72{72} //
K14ratnml_u:2398: tathāpi praṣṭum ichāmi tat samādeṣṭum arhasi /
K14ratnml_u:2399: ekaḥ kālagato devaputraḥ svargāc cyuto gataḥ // Rm_6.73{73} //
K14ratnml_u:2400: ṣaṭsu lokeṣu sarvatra dṛśyate na mayā hy asau /
K14ratnml_u:2401: kutrāsau jāyate śāstar mayā na dṛśyate kvacit // Rm_6.74{74} //
K14ratnml_u:2402: tasyotpattiḥ kuha sthāne tat samādeṣṭum arhasi /
K14ratnml_u:2403: itīndravacanaiḥ śrutvā sa saṃbuddho munīśvaraḥ // Rm_6.75{75} //
K14ratnml_u:2405: kauśika tuṣito nāma lokadhātuḥ prasiddhitaḥ // Rm_6.76{76} //
K14ratnml_u:2406: tatrāsau modate devo gatvā triśaraṇaṃ cyutaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:2407: ityādiṣṭaṃa munīndreṇa śrutvā sa tridaśādhipaḥ // Rm_6.77{77} //
K14ratnml_u:2409: aho buddham aho dharmam aho saṃghaṃ śubhaṃkaraṃ // Rm_6.78{78} //
K14ratnml_u:2411: ye buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ yānti na te gachaṃti durgatiṃ // Rm_6.79{79} //
K14ratnml_u:2413: ye dharmaṃ śaraṇaṃ yānti na te gachaṃti durgatiṃ /
K14ratnml_u:2414: prahāya mānuṣān kāyān divyān kāyān upāsate // Rm_6.80{80} //
K14ratnml_u:2415: ye saṃghaṃ śaraṇaṃ yānti na te gachanti durgatiṃ /
K14ratnml_u:2418: ye saṃsmṛtvā triratnāni vrajanti maraṇaṃ dhruvaṃ // Rm_6.82{82} //
K14ratnml_u:2420: tathānuvarṇayan prāha kauśikaṃ taṃ surādhipaṃ // Rm_6.83{83} //
K14ratnml_u:2421: evam etad dhi devendra yathaivaṃ tvaṃ prabhāṣase /
K14ratnml_u:2423: dhanyās te puruṣā bhadrā triratnaṃ bhajaṃti ye // Rm_6.84{84} //
K14ratnml_u:2424: ye buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ yānti na te gachanti durgatiṃ /
K14ratnml_u:2426: ye dharmaṃ śaraṇaṃ yānti na te gachanti durgatiṃ /
K14ratnml_u:2428: ye saṃghaṃ śaraṇaṃ yāṃti na te gachaṃti durgatiṃ /
K14ratnml_u:2430: na bhajanti munīndraṃ ye te bhramaṃti bhavārṇave /
K14ratnml_u:2431: saṃbodhimārgato bhraṣṭā naṣṭā gachanti durgatiṃ // Rm_6.87{87} //
K14ratnml_u:2432: ye śṛṇvaṃti na saddharmaṃ te kleśaparidāhitāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:2434: na mānayaṃti ye saṃghaṃ na te jānaṃti sadgatiṃ /
K14ratnml_u:2436: nindanti ye triratnāni te duṣṭā mārapākṣikāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:2437: naiva caraṃti sanmārge vinaṣṭā yaṃti durgatiṃ /
K14ratnml_u:2438: tasmād ye mānavāḥ santo vāṃchanti sadgatiṃ sadā /
K14ratnml_u:2439: taiḥ saṃsmṛtvā triratnānāṃ karttavyaṃ śaraṇaṃ mudā // Rm_6.88{88} //
K14ratnml_u:2440: ye smaranti triratnānāṃ na te gachaṃti durgatiṃ /
K14ratnml_u:2441: prahāya pātakān sarvāñ śīghraṃ yānti sukhāvatīṃ // Rm_6.89{89} //
K14ratnml_u:2444: tatas tāḥ kramataḥ pūryya saṃvṛttipāram āgatāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:2446: idaṃ hi bodhimārgānāṃ vījaṃ vijñāya kauśika /
K14ratnml_u:2449: gatvā ca śaraṇaṃ teṣāṃ triratnānāṃ samācara // Rm_6.93{93} //
K14ratnml_u:2450: evaṃ tena munīndreṇa samādiṣṭaṃ sa kauśikaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:2451: śrutvaivam ity anujñāya prābhyanandat prasāditaḥ // Rm_6.94{94} //
K14ratnml_u:2452: tato 'sau bhagavantaṃ taṃ natvā sa racitāṃjaliḥ /
K14ratnml_u:2453: tridhā pradakṣiṇīkṛtya punar natvā divaṃ yayau // Rm_6.95{95} //
K14ratnml_u:2456: devalokān samāmaṃtrya tat pravṛttaṃ samabravīt // Rm_6.96{96} //
K14ratnml_u:2457: bho bho devagaṇāḥ sarve śṛṇudhvaṃ tat samāhitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:2458: yad adbhutaṃ mahāpuṇyaṃ saṃbodhihetum ucyate // Rm_6.97{97} //
K14ratnml_u:2459: dharmatā khalu devānāṃ ye ye devā hi nākataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:2460: cyutās te te prayānty adho na tūrddhvaṃ yānti ke cana // Rm_6.98{98} //
K14ratnml_u:2461: idānīṃ tu vrajeyus te ye devāḥ svargataś cyutāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:2462: triratnaśaraṇaṃ kṛtvorddhvagatiṃ na tv adhogatiṃ // Rm_6.99{99} //
K14ratnml_u:2464: svargāc cyutvā samutpannas tuṣite 'sau pramodate // Rm_6.100{100} //
K14ratnml_u:2465: yūyam api ca tad dṛṣṭvā triratnānāṃ samāhitāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:2466: gatvā ca śaraṇaṃ nityaṃ smṛtvā bhajadhvam ādarāt // Rm_6.101{1} //
K14ratnml_u:2467: tato yūyaṃ na yāyāta durgatiṣu kadā cana /
K14ratnml_u:2468: sadā divyasukhaṃ bhuktvā prayāsyatha sukhāvatīṃ // Rm_6.102{2} //
K14ratnml_u:2469: ye buddhe śaraṇaṃ yāṃti na te gachanti durgatiṃ /
K14ratnml_u:2471: ye dharme śaraṇaṃ yānti na te gachanti durgatiṃ /
K14ratnml_u:2473: ye saṃghe śaraṇaṃ gatvā na te gachanti durgatiṃ /
K14ratnml_u:2475: na bhajanti triratnaṃ ye te bhramanti bhavārṇave /
K14ratnml_u:2476: saddharmanindakā bhraṣṭā naṣṭā gachanti durgatiṃ // Rm_6.106{6} //
K14ratnml_u:2477: durgatiṣu bhramaṃtas te duḥkhāni vividhāni ca /
K14ratnml_u:2478: bhuktvā caranti duṣṭāṃśā naiva gachaṃti sadgatiṃ // Rm_6.107{7} //
K14ratnml_u:2479: tad duḥkhaṃ hātum ichaṃti sukhaṃ prāptuṃ ca ye sadā /
K14ratnml_u:2480: te triratnaṃ sadā smṛtvā bhajaṃtāṃ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ // Rm_6.108{8} //
K14ratnml_u:2481: tato vo maṃgalaṃ nityaṃ naiva yāyāta durgatiṃ /
K14ratnml_u:2482: sadgatim eva yāyāta saṃbodhim api lapsyatha // Rm_6.109{9} //
K14ratnml_u:2483: iti tena surendreṇa samādiṣṭaṃ hitārthinā / śru
K14ratnml_u:2484: tadā sarve 'pi devāś ca triratnaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:2487: evaṃ devās tadā ye ye triratnaśaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:2488: te te svargād api cyutvā naivāgachann adhogatiṃ // Rm_6.112{12} //
K14ratnml_u:2491: tathā śakraś ca tān sarvān maitreyasamupāśritān /
K14ratnml_u:2492: dṛṣṭvānumodanāṃ kurvan prābhyanandat suraiḥ saha // Rm_6.114{14} //
K14ratnml_u:2493: iti me guruṇā khyātaṃ tathā te vakṣyate mayā /
K14ratnml_u:2494: evaṃ matvā mahārāja triratnaśaraṇaṃ vraja // Rm_6.115{15} //
K14ratnml_u:2495: tatas te maṃgalaṃ nityaṃ sarvatrāpi bhaved dhruvaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:2496: kramād bodhicarīḥ prāpya saṃbodhipadam āpnuyāḥ // Rm_6.116{16} //
K14ratnml_u:2500: śrutvā rājā tathety evaṃ prānvamodat sapārṣadaḥ // Rm_6.118{18} //
K14ratnml_u:2501: ye puṇyaprāptukāmās tad idam avirataṃ sūkarīkāvadānaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:2502: śṛṇvanti śravayanti pramuditamanasā durgatiṃ te na yānti /
K14ratnml_u:2504: maitreyaṃ bodhisatvaṃ tuṣitabhuvanāgāḥ saṃbhajanti prakāmaṃ // Rm_6.119{19} //
K14ratnml_u:2509: upaguptaṃ guruṃ natvā punar evam abhāṣata // Rm_7.1{1} //
K14ratnml_u:2510: bhadanta śrotum ichāmi punar anyat subhāṣitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:2513: upagupto yatiś cāsau dṛṣṭvā taṃ nṛpam abravīt // Rm_7.3{3} //
K14ratnml_u:2515: yathā me guruṇā khyātaṃ tathā te vakṣyate mayā // Rm_7.4{4} //
K14ratnml_u:2521: nyagrodhāramake ramye vyaharac chrāvakaiḥ saha // Rm_7.7{7} //
K14ratnml_u:2522: tasmiṃś ca samaye tatra dharmmaṃ śrotuṃ samāgatāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:2525: yogino yatayaś cāpi munayo brahmacāriṇaḥ // Rm_7.9{9} //
K14ratnml_u:2526: rājānaḥ kṣatriyāś cāpi vaiśyāmātyāś ca maṃtriṇaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:2527: śreṣṭhinaḥ sārthavāhāś ca paurā jānapadā api // Rm_7.10{10} //
K14ratnml_u:2528: evam anye 'pi satvāś ca ye saddharmaguṇavāṃchinaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:2529: te sarve samupāgatya vaṃditvā taṃ munīśvaraṃ // Rm_7.11{11} //
K14ratnml_u:2532: athāsau bhagavān dṛṣṭvā tān sarvān dharmakāṃkṣiṇaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:2534: taṃ ca dharmāmṛtaṃ pītvā sarve te saṃpramoditāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:2536: satkṛtya śraddhayā nityaṃ bhajanta upatasthire // Rm_7.14{14} //
K14ratnml_u:2538: saddharmadeśanāṃ kṛtvā vyaharat sāṃghikaiḥ saha // Rm_7.15{15} //
K14ratnml_u:2539: tasmiṃś ca samaye tatra pure kapilavastuni /
K14ratnml_u:2540: āsīc chākyo mahāsādhur mahābhogo mahādhanaḥ // Rm_7.16{16} //
K14ratnml_u:2542: tayā sa kāntayā sārddhaṃ rarāma paricārayan // Rm_7.17{17} //
K14ratnml_u:2549: tatrāsau janako dṛṣṭvā dārakaṃ taṃ subhadrikaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:2550: moditaḥ sahasā jñātiṃ samāhūyābravīt tathā // Rm_7.21{21} //
K14ratnml_u:2552: asya jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ pracakṣyatāṃ // Rm_7.22{22} //
K14ratnml_u:2553: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā jñātayas te sasaṃmatāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:2554: dṛṣṭvā taṃ vālakaṃ divyaṃ kalyavarṇaṃ susuṃdaraṃ // Rm_7.23{23} //
K14ratnml_u:2558: tasmād bhavatu nāmnāyaṃ vapusmān iti viśrutaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:2559: iti saṃbhāṣaṇāṃ kṛtvā sarve te jñātivargikāḥ // Rm_7.24{24} //
K14ratnml_u:2560: purastāt tasya śākyasya gatvā caivaṃ vabhāṣire /
K14ratnml_u:2561: yad ayaṃ bhavataḥ putro divyavapur guṇānvitaḥ // Rm_7.25{25} //
K14ratnml_u:2562: tasmād bhavatu nāmnāyaṃ vapuṣmān iti viśrutaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:2563: tatheti samabhikhyāya pitrā sa suta ātmajaḥ // Rm_7.26{26} //
K14ratnml_u:2565: tato 'sau dārakas tābhir dhātrībhir upacāraṇaiḥ // Rm_7.27{27} //
K14ratnml_u:2567: pālito varddhitaḥ puṣṭa āsīt padmaṃ yathā hrade /
K14ratnml_u:2568: kramāt pravarddhitaś cāsau kumāro 'bhūd yadā tataḥ // Rm_7.28{28} //
K14ratnml_u:2569: tadā suhṛtsahāyaiś ca sārddhaṃ krīḍitum ācarat /
K14ratnml_u:2570: yatra yatra vapuṣmān sa cakrāma bhuvi saṃcaraṃ // Rm_7.29{29} //
K14ratnml_u:2574: dharmakāmaḥ subhadrātmā pūjyo mānyo jitendriyaḥ // Rm_7.31{31} //
K14ratnml_u:2577: sa vapuṣmān suhṛtsaṃghaiḥ sārddhaṃ puro viniryayau /
K14ratnml_u:2578: tato 'sau jetakāraṇyaṃ dūrād dṛṣṭvā pramoditaḥ // Rm_7.33{33} //
K14ratnml_u:2582: tatrāsau bhagavantaṃ taṃ dadarśa samitisthitaṃ // Rm_7.35{35} //
K14ratnml_u:2587: pādau tasya muner natvā dharmaṃ śrotum upāviśat /
K14ratnml_u:2588: athāsau bhagavān dṛṣṭvā tasya cittaṃ viśodhitaṃ // Rm_7.38{38} //
K14ratnml_u:2590: tac chrutvā sugatoditaṃ vapuṣmān sa praharṣitaḥ // Rm_7.39{39} //
K14ratnml_u:2596: tato 'sau purato gatvā munīndrasya kṛtāṃjaliḥ // Rm_7.42{42} //
K14ratnml_u:2597: pādau natvā prasannāsyaḥ pravrajyāṃ samayācata // Rm_7.43{43} //
K14ratnml_u:2598: namas te bhagavañ chāstaḥ śaraṇaṃ bhavatāṃ vraje /
K14ratnml_u:2600: tat pravrajyāvrataṃ dehi cariṣye brahmacārikāṃ // Rm_7.44{44} //
K14ratnml_u:2601: iti tenārthitaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhagavāṃs taṃ kumārakaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:2603: kumāra yadi te vāṃchā pravrajyācaraṇe 'sti hi /
K14ratnml_u:2604: pitror ādeśam āsādya prāgacha dāsyate tadā // Rm_7.46{46} //
K14ratnml_u:2605: iti śrutvā munīndrasya nirdeśaṃ tat tatheti saḥ /
K14ratnml_u:2606: naṃditaś caraṇau natvā svagṛhaṃ sahasāgataḥ // Rm_7.47{47} //
K14ratnml_u:2607: tato gṛhe samāsādya pitroś ca purataḥ sthitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:2611: saṃsthitaḥ parṣadāṃ madhye bhāṣati dharmam uttamaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:2613: tatsubhāṣitasudhāṃ pītvā cittaṃ me tṛpyate na hi /
K14ratnml_u:2614: bhūyas tad amṛtaṃ pātuṃ vratam ichāmi sāṃprataṃ // Rm_7.51{51} //
K14ratnml_u:2615: anye 'pi bahavo dṛṣṭvā bhikṣavo brahmacāriṇaḥ // Rm_7.52{52} //
K14ratnml_u:2617: tat sabhāgavrataṃ cartum ichāmi khalu sāṃprataṃ // Rm_7.53{53} //
K14ratnml_u:2618: tad anujñāṃ pradattaṃ me kṛpāsti yadi vāṃ mayi /
K14ratnml_u:2619: evaṃ tasya svaputrasya vacanaṃ vajrasannibhaṃ // Rm_7.54{54} //
K14ratnml_u:2620: tau mātāpitarau śrutvā mūrchitau petatur bhuvi /
K14ratnml_u:2621: tataḥ putraprayatnena cetanāṃ prāpya tau punaḥ // Rm_7.55{55} //
K14ratnml_u:2622: pariṣvajya svakaṃ putraṃ tam evaṃ paryyadevatāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:2623: hā putra katham ajño 'si hātmaja vallabho 'si naḥ // Rm_7.56{56} //
K14ratnml_u:2624: hā suta vaṃcyase kena hā tāta kiṃ nu vāṃchasi /
K14ratnml_u:2625: hā jīva katham ekānte tyaktvāsmān kva nu yāsyase // Rm_7.57{57} //
K14ratnml_u:2626: nandanaḥ supriyāś cāsi kena duḥkhena yāsyase /
K14ratnml_u:2627: kiṃcid duḥkhaṃ na te dattaṃ asmābhir vā kadā cana // Rm_7.58{58} //
K14ratnml_u:2628: kutaḥ kiṃ jāyate duḥkhaṃ tad vadasva yadīhasi /
K14ratnml_u:2629: ity evaṃ paridevitvā pitāsau cetasātmajaṃ // Rm_7.59{59} //
K14ratnml_u:2632: tvaṃ kumāra vayastho 'si sukomalaḥ sukhaidhitaḥ // Rm_7.60{60} //
K14ratnml_u:2634: kiṃcid duḥkhānabhijñas tvaṃ tat kathaṃ pravrajeḥ suta // Rm_7.61{61} //
K14ratnml_u:2635: pravrajito gṛhaṃ tyaktvā bahirdeśe vases sadā /
K14ratnml_u:2636: cīvaraprāvṛtaḥ piṇḍaṃ yācitvā svayam āhareḥ // Rm_7.62{62} //
K14ratnml_u:2638: jaṃgale durgame naikacaurākīrṇe kathaṃ careḥ // Rm_7.63{63} //
K14ratnml_u:2639: ekākī ca kathaṃ tiṣṭher vṛkṣamūle ca nirjane /
K14ratnml_u:2640: śmaśāne saṃsthitaḥ paśyan mṛtakānto traseḥ kathaṃ // Rm_7.64{64} //
K14ratnml_u:2641: śayithāś ca kathaṃ śūnye gṛhe bhūtanivāsite /
K14ratnml_u:2642: evaṃ suduṣkarīṃ caryyāṃ carituṃ katham ichasi // Rm_7.65{65} //
K14ratnml_u:2643: tat pravrajyāvrate cittaṃ mā kṛthās tvaṃ nivarttaya /
K14ratnml_u:2644: iti madvacanaṃ śrutvā gṛhe sthitvā sukhaṃ rama // Rm_7.66{66} //
K14ratnml_u:2645: nityaṃ pravrajatāṃ duḥkhaṃ kiṃ siddhaṃ duḥkhacaryyayā /
K14ratnml_u:2646: dharme vaṃchāsti cet putra gṛhe sthitvā cara vrataṃ // Rm_7.67{67} //
K14ratnml_u:2647: śṛṇvaṃś ca dharmaśāstrāṇi śrāvayaṃś ca bahūñ janān /
K14ratnml_u:2648: dānaṃ kṛtvā viśuddhātmā triratnaṃ satataṃ bhaja // Rm_7.68{68} //
K14ratnml_u:2649: yasya kiṃcid gṛhe nāsti jñātir vaṃdhuś ca kaścana /
K14ratnml_u:2650: nāpi mitragatiś cāpi pravrajyā tasya yujyate /
K14ratnml_u:2651: kiṃ tava setsyate putra pravrajyāṃ pākuniṣṭhayā /
K14ratnml_u:2652: sarvathā tyaja tadvāṃchā gṛhe dharmaṃ sukhaṃ cara /
K14ratnml_u:2653: iti pitroditaṃ śrutvā vapuṣmān sa viśaṃkitaḥ // Rm_7.69{69} //
K14ratnml_u:2654: pitroḥ pādān punar natvā pratyuvāca prabodhayan /
K14ratnml_u:2655: satyaṃ tāta gṛhe saukhyaṃ dharmāṇāṃ caram uttamaṃ // Rm_7.70{70} //
K14ratnml_u:2657: gṛhe parigrahāḥ poṣyās tad arthaṃ dhanam arjayet // Rm_7.71{71} //
K14ratnml_u:2661: kṣaṇād dhareyur ākṛṣya tad duḥkhaṃ sahituṃ kathaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:2662: saṃpado 'nte vipattiḥ syāt kasya saṃpadviniścalā // Rm_7.73{73} //
K14ratnml_u:2663: vipattau hīyate dhairyyam adhairyyāt kleśito bhavet /
K14ratnml_u:2664: kleśito doṣam āpnoti tadā puṇye matiḥ kutaḥ // Rm_7.74{74} //
K14ratnml_u:2666: lakṣmīvirahite gehe kuto dharmasya gocaraṃ // Rm_7.75{75} //
K14ratnml_u:2667: saṃpattau tu labhen mānaṃ mānād dhi jāyate madaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:2668: madād pramādito dharme tadā dharmo gṛhe kutaḥ // Rm_7.76{76} //
K14ratnml_u:2670: kāmārthe kleśitā lokāḥ kāmārthe duḥkhabhāginaḥ // Rm_7.77{77} //
K14ratnml_u:2671: kāmārthe pratihanyante tena kāme sukhaṃ kathaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:2672: saṃty evaṃ tāta sarvatra bhayāni vividhāni hi // Rm_7.78{78} //
K14ratnml_u:2674: daivāt sarvatra jāyante duḥkhāni ca sukhāni ca // Rm_7.79{79} //
K14ratnml_u:2676: yatra yatrāpi saṃyāti kleśitātmā sukhechayā // Rm_7.80{80} //
K14ratnml_u:2677: tatra tatrāpi karmotthair duḥkhair bhayaiś ca hanyate /
K14ratnml_u:2679: tatra tatrāpi sarvatra nirbhayaś carate sukhaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:2680: yal lokānāṃ bhayasthānaṃ tatraiva ramate yatiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:2681: vivikte nirjane 'raṇye vṛkṣamūle guhāsu ca // Rm_7.81{81} //
K14ratnml_u:2682: śūnyagehe śmaśāne 'pi sukhaṃ dhyātvā yatir vaset /
K14ratnml_u:2683: svadharmai rakṣito yogī saṃyatātmā kuto bhayaḥ // Rm_7.82{82} //
K14ratnml_u:2685: tan nirvātuṃ svadehe 'pi nirapekṣaḥ parivraje // Rm_7.83{83} //
K14ratnml_u:2687: yadi na dīyate 'nujñā mariṣye 'haṃ na saṃśayaḥ // Rm_7.84{84} //
K14ratnml_u:2690: śrutvā viyogaduḥkhārttaḥ punas taṃ sutam abravīt // Rm_7.85{85} //
K14ratnml_u:2691: mā putra sahasā kārṣī maraṇābhilāṣitaṃ manaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:2692: sarvathāpy anivarttī tvam avaśyaṃ ced gamiṣyasi // Rm_7.86{86} //
K14ratnml_u:2693: yad ichasi vrataṃ kartuṃ saddharmārthimanas tava /
K14ratnml_u:2694: pravraja śraddhayā putra svākhyāte buddhaśāsane // Rm_7.87{87} //
K14ratnml_u:2695: evaṃ bharttroditaṃ śrutvā tan mātā mūrchitāpatat /
K14ratnml_u:2696: cirāt sā cetanāṃ prāptā rudantī cāvadat sutaṃ // Rm_7.88{88} //
K14ratnml_u:2697: hā putra katham ekānte māṃ vihāya kva yāsyasi /
K14ratnml_u:2698: hā me jīvo 'si kiṃ paśyaṃ pravrajituṃ samīhasi // Rm_7.89{89} //
K14ratnml_u:2699: kiṃcid duḥkhaṃ na te dattaṃ mayāmvāyā kadā cana /
K14ratnml_u:2700: kena duḥkhena te cittaṃ pravrajituṃ samichati // Rm_7.90{90} //
K14ratnml_u:2701: pravrajyā śobhate putra vṛddhatve vā daridrite /
K14ratnml_u:2702: tvaṃ tu dahara ityaś ca tat pravrajyāṃ careḥ kathaṃ // Rm_7.91{91} //
K14ratnml_u:2703: yāvac ca jivitaṃ me 'sti tāvan mā gāḥ suta kvacit /
K14ratnml_u:2704: yāvac cāsti gṛhe saṃpat tāvad bhuktvā sukhaṃ vasa // Rm_7.92{92} //
K14ratnml_u:2705: yadāhaṃ maraṇaṃ yātā yadā cāpattitā gṛhe /
K14ratnml_u:2707: ity ukte 'pi tayoḥ pitror udator vighnaśaṃkitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:2708: pādāṃ natvā vapuṣmān sa sahasā niryayau gṛhāt // Rm_7.94{94} //
K14ratnml_u:2709: tato veṇuvanaṃ gatvā praṇamya munim ādarāt /
K14ratnml_u:2712: tat pravrajyāṃ vrataṃ dehi paṃcaśikṣāpadāni ca // Rm_7.96{96} //
K14ratnml_u:2717: ity ukte bhagavān dṛṣṭvā pṛṣṭvā hastena tac chiraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:2718: ehi bhikṣo kumāreti saṃvadaṃs taṃ samagrahīt // Rm_7.99{99} //
K14ratnml_u:2719: ehīti prokte sugatena muṇḍaḥ pātrī vapuṣmān sakaṣāyavāsāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:2721: sadyapraśāntendriya eva tasthau svarṇṇaprabho buddhamanorathena // Rm_7.100{100} //
K14ratnml_u:2722: saccittalabdhaḥ sa muneḥ prasādāt prayujyamāno vyaharat samādhau /
K14ratnml_u:2723: vyāyachamānaḥ khalu bodhimārge saṃbuddhadharme ghaṭamāna evaṃ // Rm_7.101{1} //
K14ratnml_u:2724: sarvaṃ ca saṃsāram anityatāhataṃ matvā ca traidhātugatiṃ vighātinīṃ /
K14ratnml_u:2725: kleśāṃś ca sarvān pravihāya saṃyataḥ sākṣād varo 'rhaṃ sa babhūva sāṃghikaḥ // Rm_7.102{2} //
K14ratnml_u:2727: bhindann avidyāṃgam ivāṇḍakośaṃ prāptād abhijñāḥ pratisaṃvidaś ca // Rm_7.103{3} //
K14ratnml_u:2729: pūjyaś ca mānyo 'py abhivandanīyo babhūva sa brahmavihāracārī // Rm_7.104{4} //
K14ratnml_u:2730: atha te bhikṣavaḥ sarve taṃ dṛṣṭvā vismayānvitāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:2731: bhagavantaṃ praṇamyaivaṃ paprachus tasya karmatāṃ // Rm_7.105{5} //
K14ratnml_u:2733: pravrajya sahasārhatvaṃ prāpto bhavati cātmavit // Rm_7.106{6} //
K14ratnml_u:2734: iti pṛṣṭe ca tair nātho bhagavāṃs tān samabravīt /
K14ratnml_u:2735: bhikṣavaḥ śrūyatāṃ vakṣye tasya ca karma yat kṛtaṃ // Rm_7.107{7} //
K14ratnml_u:2736: etena yat kṛtaṃ karma tat kenānyena bhokṣyate /
K14ratnml_u:2737: yenaiva yat kṛtaṃ karma tenaiva tad dhi bhujyate // Rm_7.108{8} //
K14ratnml_u:2745: sārddhaṃ bhikṣugaṇaiḥ śiṣyai bodhisatvagaṇair api // Rm_7.112{12} //
K14ratnml_u:2748: tataḥ sa buddhakāryyāṇi kṛtvā sarvāṇy aśeṣataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:2749: nirvāṇam āyayau śānto vahnir ivendhanakṣayāt // Rm_7.114{14} //
K14ratnml_u:2750: tato vandhumatā rājñā tat tanuḥ saṃskṛto 'gninā /
K14ratnml_u:2752: taddhātūś ca samāropya stūpa uccair mahān kṛtaḥ // Rm_7.115{15} //
K14ratnml_u:2757: ekasmin divase tatra pumān eko daridritaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:2763: ayaṃ caityo munīndrasya vipaścino guṇāṃbudheḥ // Rm_7.120{20} //
K14ratnml_u:2765: etan nirmālyapuṣpais tu mlānitaiḥ pavaneritaiḥ // Rm_7.121{21} //
K14ratnml_u:2766: ākīrṇo malinībhūto hy aśuddheḥ syād aśobhitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:2767: tasmād etāni puṣpāṇi nirmālyāni samaṃtataḥ // Rm_7.122{22} //
K14ratnml_u:2768: apanīya viśuddhāya mārjayeyam iha drutaṃ // Rm_7.123{23} //
K14ratnml_u:2769: iti dhyātvā daridro 'sau nirmālyāny apanīya vai // Rm_7.124{25} //
K14ratnml_u:2773: yan mayātra jinastūpe nirmālyāny apanīya vai /
K14ratnml_u:2777: evaṃvidhaṃ ca śāstāraṃ saṃbuddhaṃ jñānabhāskaraṃ // Rm_7.126{27} //
K14ratnml_u:2779: praṇidhānaṃ tathā dhṛtvā nityam evam upāśrayan // Rm_7.127{28} //
K14ratnml_u:2780: tatstūpe śaraṇaṃ gatvā bhaje ratnatrayaṃ sadā /
K14ratnml_u:2781: bhikṣavaḥ kiṃ nu manyadhve yo puruṣaḥ daridrikaḥ // Rm_7.128{29} //
K14ratnml_u:2783: ayam eva vapuṣmān sa jñeyo hi nānyathā khalu /
K14ratnml_u:2787: divyābhisundaraḥ kāntaḥ sa vapuṣmān bhavaty ayaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:2788: yat praṇidhiḥ kṛtaḥ stūpe natvā tena sucetasā // Rm_7.131{32} //
K14ratnml_u:2789: tena me śāsane 'py adya pravrajyārhan bhavaty ayaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:2790: ārāgitas tathārhañ ca saṃbuddhaḥ sugato jinaḥ // Rm_7.132{33} //
K14ratnml_u:2792: ity evaṃ karma jānīta sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ bhave // Rm_7.133{34} //
K14ratnml_u:2793: yenaiva yat kṛtaṃ karma tenaiva tat phalaṃ gataṃ /
K14ratnml_u:2794: na naśyanti hi karmāṇi kalpakoṭiśatair api // Rm_7.134{35} //
K14ratnml_u:2795: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalaṃti khalu dehināṃ /
K14ratnml_u:2796: abhuktaṃ kṣīyate naiva karma kvāpi kathaṃ cana // Rm_7.135{36} //
K14ratnml_u:2797: nāgnibhir dahyate karma vāyubhiś ca na śuṣyate /
K14ratnml_u:2798: jalaiś ca klidyate nāpi kṣīyate nāpi bhūmiṣu // Rm_7.136{37} //
K14ratnml_u:2799: anyathāpi bhaven naiva karmaṇāṃ gatir ābhavaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:2800: śuklānāṃ śubhataiva syāt kṛṣṇānāṃ durgatis sadā // Rm_7.137{38} //
K14ratnml_u:2802: tasmād apāsya kṛṣṇāni karmāṇi miśritāni ca // Rm_7.138{39} //
K14ratnml_u:2804: tatheti bhikṣavaḥ sarve te ca lokāḥ sabhāśritāḥ // Rm_7.139{40} //
K14ratnml_u:2806: evam etan mahārāja śrutaṃ me gurubhāṣitaṃ // Rm_7.140{41} //
K14ratnml_u:2807: evaṃ śrutvā tvayāpy evaṃ karttavyaṃ puṇyam eva hi /
K14ratnml_u:2808: puṇyam eva bhavet trātā suhṛn mitraṃ hitaṃkaraḥ // Rm_7.141{42} //
K14ratnml_u:2810: tasmāt puṇyaṃ svayaṃ śrutvā karttavyam ādarāt sadā // Rm_7.142{43} //
K14ratnml_u:2811: prajāś ca śrāvayitvaivaṃ puṇye saṃsthāpaya sadā /
K14ratnml_u:2812: ity evaṃ guruṇādiṣṭaṃ upaguptena bhikṣuṇā // Rm_7.143{44} //
K14ratnml_u:2813: śrutvā rājā janaiḥ sārddhaṃ tatheti prābhyanaṃdata /
K14ratnml_u:2815: śṛṇvanti ye śrāvayantīha yaś ca vapuṣmato 'daḥ prathitāvadānaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:2816: te kleśanirmuktaviśuddhacittāḥ prayānti nūnaṃ sugatālayeṣu // Rm_7.144{45} //
K14ratnml_u:2821: upaguptaṃ guruṃ natvā prāṃjaliś caivam abravīt // Rm_8.1{1} //
K14ratnml_u:2822: bhadanta śrotum ichāmi punar anyat subhāṣitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:2823: yathā te guruṇādiṣṭaṃ tathā me khyātum arhasi // Rm_8.2{12} //
K14ratnml_u:2824: iti tena narendreṇa pṛṣṭe 'sau ca jināṃśajaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:2825: upagupto yatir bhūyas taṃ nṛpeśam abhāṣata // Rm_8.3{31} //
K14ratnml_u:2826: śṛṇu rājaṃs tathā vakṣye yathā me guruṇoditaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:2827: śrutvā ca bhavatāpy evaṃ karttavyaṃ dharmasādhanaṃ // Rm_8.4{41} //
K14ratnml_u:2829: sarvajñaḥ sugato nāthaḥ śāstā traidhātukādhipaḥ // Rm_8.5{5} //
K14ratnml_u:2833: jetavane vihārasthe vyaharac chrāvakaiḥ saha // Rm_8.7{7} //
K14ratnml_u:2837: sarvasatvaiś ca pauraiś ca saddharmaguṇavāṃchibhiḥ // Rm_8.9{9} //
K14ratnml_u:2839: sa bhagavān sabhāmadhye siṃhāsane sthito vabhau // Rm_8.10{10} //
K14ratnml_u:2840: tadā sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā tāṃ sabhāṃ samupasthitāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:2842: te tad dharmāmṛtaṃ pītvā sarve lokāḥ pramoditāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:2843: bhagavantaṃ punar natvā svasvasthānaṃ pratīyire // Rm_8.12{12} //
K14ratnml_u:2846: tadaikā devatā tasyāṃ rātrau svargāt samāgatā /
K14ratnml_u:2847: svakāntyā bhāsayaṃty evaṃ jetavanam upāviśat // Rm_8.14{14} //
K14ratnml_u:2849: tatas tāṃ bhagavān dṛṣṭvā devatāṃ samupāgatāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:2851: devate svāgataṃ kacci kuśalaṃ te samehi bho /
K14ratnml_u:2852: prāyātāsi yad arthena tad vadasva prapūraye // Rm_8.16{16} //
K14ratnml_u:2853: ity ādiṣṭe munīndreṇa tenāsau devatā mudā /
K14ratnml_u:2855: tatrāsau purato gatvā natvā pādau kṛtāṃjaliḥ /
K14ratnml_u:2856: pradakṣiṇatrayaṃ kṛtvā tasthāv ekāntike muneḥ // Rm_8.18{18} //
K14ratnml_u:2860: vismitāḥ sahasotthāya dṛṣṭvā tam upatasthire // Rm_8.20{20} //
K14ratnml_u:2862: bhagavantaṃ munīndraṃ taṃ praṇatvaivam apṛchata // Rm_8.21{21} //
K14ratnml_u:2864: tadarthaṃ tvaṃ samādiśya cittaṃ me paribodhaya // Rm_8.22{22} //
K14ratnml_u:2865: ke narāḥ sugatiṃ yānti ke narāḥ svargagāminaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:2866: keṣāṃ cāpi divārātrau sadā puṇyaṃ pravarddhate // Rm_8.23{23} //
K14ratnml_u:2867: ke cāpi durgatiṃ yāṃti ke cādhaḥ patitā narāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:2868: keṣāṃ cāpi divārātrau sadā pāpaṃ pravarddhate // Rm_8.24{24} //
K14ratnml_u:2869: kiṃdado valavāṃ syāc ca kiṃdadaś ca praśobhitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:2870: kiṃdadaḥ sukhito lokaḥ cakṣuṣmān api kiṃpradaḥ // Rm_8.25{25} //
K14ratnml_u:2871: kiṃ nu vā niśitaṃ śastraṃ kiṃ vā hālāhalaṃ viṣaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:2872: kiṃ ca prajvalito vahniḥ kiṃ mahad dāruṇaṃ tamaḥ // Rm_8.26{26} //
K14ratnml_u:2873: gṛhītaṃ kiṃ nu martyena kin teneha samujjhitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:2874: abhedyaṃ kavacaṃ kiṃ ca kiṃ vā tīkṣṇam ihāyudhaṃ // Rm_8.27{27} //
K14ratnml_u:2875: ko nv asau procyate cauro dhanaṃ kiṃ vā satāṃ mataṃ /
K14ratnml_u:2876: ke vā traidhātuke loke procyante muṣitaiti // Rm_8.28{28} //
K14ratnml_u:2877: kaś ceha satsukhī loke ko vā ca parameśvaraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:2878: ko vibhūṣito nityaṃ kaś cāpy atra vidaṃvitaḥ // Rm_8.29{29} //
K14ratnml_u:2879: vatsalo vāṃdhavo ko nu ko vā duṣṭāśayo ripuḥ /
K14ratnml_u:2880: kiṃ mahad dāruṇaṃ duḥkhaṃ kiṃ mahat paramaṃ sukhaṃ // Rm_8.30{30} //
K14ratnml_u:2882: kiṃ ca loke priyo pathyaḥ kiṃ vāpathyaṃ na cāpriyaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:2883: ko nu pīḍākaro vyādhiḥ ko nu vai ko bhiṣagvaraḥ // Rm_8.31{31} //
K14ratnml_u:2884: kenāyam āvṛto lokaḥ kena loko vaśīkṛtaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:2885: kena tyajati mitrāṇi kena svargaṃ na gachati // Rm_8.32{32} //
K14ratnml_u:2886: kena mitrāṇi varddhyaṃte kena śāmyaṃti śatravaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:2887: kena svargam avāpnoti kena mokṣaṃ ca gachati // Rm_8.33{33} //
K14ratnml_u:2888: kenāyaṃ badhyate lokaḥ kena loko vimucyate /
K14ratnml_u:2889: kasyeha viprahāṇena nirvāṇam iti kathyate // Rm_8.34{34} //
K14ratnml_u:2890: kiṃ nu rājā ca caurāś ca syaṃdamānāḥ samudyatāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:2891: no śaknuvanty apāhartuṃ striyo vā puruṣasya ca // Rm_8.35{35} //
K14ratnml_u:2892: kiṃ na dahati saptārciḥ kiṃ na bhinatti mārutaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:2893: kiṃ vā na kledayaṃty āpaḥ kiṃ na kṣīṇaṃ ca bhūmiṣu // Rm_8.36{36} //
K14ratnml_u:2894: imaṃ saṃśayam adyāpi mama tac chetum arhasi /
K14ratnml_u:2895: asmāl lokāt paraṃ lokaṃ ko gato 'tyaṃtavaṃcitaḥ // Rm_8.37{37} //
K14ratnml_u:2896: kiṃ nu hatvā sukhaṃ śete kiṃ ca hatvā na śocati /
K14ratnml_u:2897: kasya caikasya dharmasya vadhaṃ saṃśasi gautama // Rm_8.38{38} //
K14ratnml_u:2898: mayaitad bhagavan pṛṣṭaḥ sarvajño 'si yato sudhīḥ /
K14ratnml_u:2899: tan mama saṃśayaṃ chetuṃ samyag ādeṣṭum arhasi // Rm_8.39{39} //
K14ratnml_u:2901: devatāṃ tāṃ samālokya tat praśnottaram abravīt // Rm_8.40{40} //
K14ratnml_u:2902: śṛṇu tvaṃ devate samyak kṛtvā cittaṃ samāhitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:2904: ārāmāropakā ye 'tra ye ca vā setukārakāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:2907: te narāḥ sugatiṃ yānti te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ // Rm_8.43{43} //
K14ratnml_u:2908: teṣām eva hi martyānāṃ divārātrau niraṃtaraṃ /
K14ratnml_u:2909: avichinnāḥ puṇyadhārāḥ pravarddhyante sadā khalu // Rm_8.44{44} //
K14ratnml_u:2911: te narā durgatiṃ yānti bhramanti pāpacāriṇaḥ // Rm_8.45{45} //
K14ratnml_u:2913: te narāḥ patitā yanti narake duḥkhabhāginaḥ // Rm_8.46{46} //
K14ratnml_u:2916: avichinnāḥ pāpadhārāḥ pravahante sadā khalu // Rm_8.47{47} //
K14ratnml_u:2917: annado valavān bhogī vastradaḥ śobhito bhavet /
K14ratnml_u:2918: pānadaḥ sukhitaḥ tṛptaś cakṣuṣmān bhavati dīpadaḥ // Rm_8.48{48} //
K14ratnml_u:2919: duṣṭavāg niśitaṃ śastraṃ rāgo hālahalaṃ viṣaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:2920: dveṣaḥ prajvalito vahnir avidyā dāruṇaṃ tamaḥ // Rm_8.49{49} //
K14ratnml_u:2921: gṛhītaṃ yat svayaṃ dattaṃ yad gṛhe tad ihojjhitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:2922: abhedyaṃ kavacaṃ kṣāntiḥ prajñā tīkṣṇaṃ mahāyudhaṃ // Rm_8.50{50} //
K14ratnml_u:2923: vitarko 'kuśalaś cauraḥ śilaṃ dhanaṃ satāṃ mataṃ /
K14ratnml_u:2924: te eva muṣitā loke yaiḥ śīlaṃ vinipātitaṃ // Rm_8.51{51} //
K14ratnml_u:2926: śīlavān bhūṣito nityaṃ naṣṭaśīlo vidaṃvitaḥ // Rm_8.52{52} //
K14ratnml_u:2927: vatsalo vāndhavaḥ puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ duṣṭāśayo ripuḥ /
K14ratnml_u:2928: nārakaṃ dāruṇaṃ duḥkhaṃ skaṃdhābhāvaparaṃ sukhaṃ // Rm_8.53{53} //
K14ratnml_u:2929: kāmāḥ priyā apathyā hi mokṣaḥ pathyo priyaḥ satāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:2930: dveṣaḥ pīḍākaro vyādhiḥ buddha eko bhiṣagvaraḥ // Rm_8.54{54} //
K14ratnml_u:2932: lobhāt tyajati mitrāṇi saṃgāt svargaṃ na gachati // Rm_8.55{55} //
K14ratnml_u:2933: tyāgān mitrāṇi varddhante maitryā śāmyanti śatravaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:2934: śīlāt svargam avāpnoti jñānān mokṣaṃ su gachati // Rm_8.56{56} //
K14ratnml_u:2935: ichayā badhyate loko nīchayā ca vimucyate /
K14ratnml_u:2936: tṛṣṇāyā viprahāṇena nirvāṇam iti kathyate // Rm_8.57{57} //
K14ratnml_u:2937: puṇyaṃ rājā ca caurāś ca syaṃdamānāḥ samudyatāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:2938: na śaknuvaṃty apāhartuṃ striyo vā puruṣasya ca // Rm_8.58{58} //
K14ratnml_u:2939: puṇyaṃ na dahate vahnir bhinatti ca na mārutaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:2940: puṇyaṃ na kledayaṃty āpo naiva kṣīṇvaṃti bhūmayaḥ // Rm_8.59{59} //
K14ratnml_u:2941: vidyamāneṣu bhogyeṣu puṇyaṃ yena na saṃcitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:2942: asmāl lokāt paraṃ lokaṃ sa gato 'tyaṃtavaṃcitaḥ // Rm_8.60{60} //
K14ratnml_u:2943: krodhaṃ hatvā sukhaṃ śete krodhaṃ hatvā na śocati /
K14ratnml_u:2945: krodhasyaikasya dharmasya vadhaṃ saṃśāmi sarvadā // Rm_8.61{61} //
K14ratnml_u:2947: bhagavaṃtaṃ punar natvā prasaṃśyaivam avocata // Rm_8.62{62} //
K14ratnml_u:2949: sarvajño jagatāṃ śāstā ṣaḍabhijño munīśvaraḥ // Rm_8.63{63} //
K14ratnml_u:2950: vīrasya ca na paśyāmi brāhmaṇyaṃ parinirvṛtiṃ /
K14ratnml_u:2952: ity uktvā devatā bhūyaḥ kṛtvā pradakṣiṇatrayaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:2953: natvā pādau munīndrasya tata eva divaṃ yayau // Rm_8.65{6} //
K14ratnml_u:2954: atha te bhikṣavaḥ sarve śrutvā śāstrānudeśitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:2955: satyam evaṃ parijñāya samyak karmasu cerire // Rm_8.66{66} //
K14ratnml_u:2956: evam etan mahārāja guruṇā me prabhāṣitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:2957: śrutvā caivaṃ parijñāya saddharme nirato bhava // Rm_8.67{67} //
K14ratnml_u:2958: dharmeṇa sugatiṃ yāyāt pāpena durgatiṃ vrajet /
K14ratnml_u:2959: tasmād dharmaṃ puraskṛtya prajāḥ samyak prapālaya // Rm_8.68{68} //
K14ratnml_u:2963: dveṣāgniśamanaṃ kṛtvā hy avidyā saṃpraghātyatāṃ // Rm_8.70{70} //
K14ratnml_u:2967: kṣamāsv āvaraṇaṃ dhṛtvā duṣṭasaṃghān vijīyatāṃ // Rm_8.72{72} //
K14ratnml_u:2973: dṛṣṭvā prajñāpradīpena preryatāṃ sugateḥ pathi // Rm_8.75{(75)} //
K14ratnml_u:2974: evaṃ rājan bhavān matvā duṣṭasaṃgān vivarjayet /
K14ratnml_u:2976: satsaṃgaṃ nirato nityaṃ triratnasevako bhava // Rm_8.76{(76)} //
K14ratnml_u:2977: sarvā api prajāś caivaṃ paribodhya prayatnataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:2978: preraṇīyā tvayā rājan saṃvṛtticaraṇe sadā // Rm_8.77{(77)} //
K14ratnml_u:2979: evaṃ matvā bhavāṃ rājā saṃsārasāram āpnuvan /
K14ratnml_u:2980: kramād bodhicarī pūrya saṃbuddhapadam āpnuyāt // Rm_8.78{(78)} //
K14ratnml_u:2982: śrutvā tatheti rājāsāv abhyanaṃdat saparṣikāḥ // Rm_8.79{(79)} //
K14ratnml_u:2984: śrāvayaṃti ca te saukhyaṃ bhuktvā yāṃti sukhāvatīṃ // Rm_8.80{(80)} //
K14ratnml_u:2989: upaguptaṃ guruṃ natvā punaḥ śrotuṃ samarthayat // Rm_9.1{(1)} //
K14ratnml_u:2990: bhadaṃta śrotum ichāmi punar anyat subhāṣitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:2991: yathā te guruṇādiṣṭaṃ tan mamākhyātum arhasi // Rm_9.2{(2)} //
K14ratnml_u:2993: tam aśokaṃ mahīnāthaṃ saṃnirīkṣya samabravīt // Rm_9.3{(3)} //
K14ratnml_u:2994: śṛṇu vakṣyāmi te rājaṃ yathā me guruṇoditaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:2995: śrutvaitad bhavatāpy evaṃ karttavyaṃ dharmam ādarāt // Rm_9.4{(4)} //
K14ratnml_u:2997: sarvajño dharmarāṇ nāthaḥ śāstā traidhātukādhipaḥ // Rm_9.5{(5)} //
K14ratnml_u:2999: jino 'rhan sugato buddhas tathāgato vināyakaḥ // Rm_9.6{(6)} //
K14ratnml_u:3004: tad dharmaṃ śrotum āyātair upāsakaiś ca cailakaiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:3009: bhagavān sa sabhāmadhye siṃhāsanasthito vabhau // Rm_9.11{(11)} //
K14ratnml_u:3010: tatra sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā sabhāṃ tāṃ samupasthitāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:3012: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pītvā sarve satvāś ca moditāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:3013: tathainaṃ śrīghanaṃ nityaṃ bhejire dharmalālasāḥ // Rm_9.13{(13)} //
K14ratnml_u:3014: tasmiṃś ca samaye tatra pure kapilavastuni /
K14ratnml_u:3017: dātā sādhur mahā dhīraḥ pratyuvāsa sukhānvitaḥ // Rm_9.15{15} //
K14ratnml_u:3020: tato 'sau rohiṇaḥ śākyas tayaiva kāntayā saha /
K14ratnml_u:3024: na putro na sutā vāpi sucireṇāpy ajāyata // Rm_9.18{18} //
K14ratnml_u:3026: putracintāparaḥ koṣṭhe sthitvaivaṃ ca vyacintayat // Rm_9.19{19} //
K14ratnml_u:3027: īyatsaṃpad gṛhe me 'sti na ca putrasutāpi na /
K14ratnml_u:3028: etā me saṃpado rājā mamātyayād grahīṣyati // Rm_9.20{20} //
K14ratnml_u:3029: hā me saṃpad vinaṣṭā syāt paratrāpi gatir na hi /
K14ratnml_u:3030: vyarthas majjanma saṃsāre yato me santatir na hi // Rm_9.21{21} //
K14ratnml_u:3031: ko me kuryāc ca saṃskāraṃ kaś ca piṇḍaṃ pradāsyati /
K14ratnml_u:3032: kutrāhaṃ śaraṇaṃ yāyāṃ hā daivanihato 'smy ahaṃ // Rm_9.22{22} //
K14ratnml_u:3035: evaṃ cintāsamākrāntaṃ rohiṇaṃ taṃ nirutsukaṃ // Rm_9.24{24} //
K14ratnml_u:3036: dṛṣṭvā sarve suhṛnmitrā vāndhavāś ca vyabodhayan /
K14ratnml_u:3037: kim evaṃ tiṣṭhase bhadra kiṃ ca duḥkhaṃ prajāyate // Rm_9.25{25} //
K14ratnml_u:3038: vaktavyaṃ cet tathāsmākaṃ vaktum arhasi sarvathā /
K14ratnml_u:3039: iti pṛṣṭe ca taiḥ sarvair vandhumitrasuhṛjjanaiḥ // Rm_9.26{26} //
K14ratnml_u:3040: rohiṇo 'sau puras teṣāṃ sarvam evam abhāṣata /
K14ratnml_u:3041: bhavantaḥ śṛṇuta sarve kathyate duḥkhatā mayā // Rm_9.27{27} //
K14ratnml_u:3042: mahatī me gṛhe saṃpad asyā bhoktā na vidyate /
K14ratnml_u:3043: kathaṃ me vidyate vaṃśas tat prakāraṃ na manyate // Rm_9.28{28} //
K14ratnml_u:3044: yadi vo 'sti mayi snehas tad upāyaṃ pracakṣyatāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:3045: evaṃ tenārthitaṃ śrutvā sarve te snehavaṃdhitāḥ // Rm_9.29{29} //
K14ratnml_u:3047: mā kārṣīḥ śokatāṃ bhadra tad upāyaṃ nu vidyate // Rm_9.30{30} //
K14ratnml_u:3049: avaśyaṃ devatānāṃ te prasannānāṃ prasādataḥ // Rm_9.31{31} //
K14ratnml_u:3050: putro vā duhitā vāpi bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:3051: ity etat taiḥ samādiṣṭaṃ śrutvāsau rohiṇo mudā // Rm_9.32{32} //
K14ratnml_u:3053: pūjāṅgaiḥ pūjāyitvā ca brāhmaṇaṃ harim īśvaraṃ // Rm_9.33{33} //
K14ratnml_u:3056: evaṃ putrābhinandī sa sadāraḥ vaṃśakāmyayā // Rm_9.34{34} //
K14ratnml_u:3059: na putro na ca putrī vā suciram apy ajāyata /
K14ratnml_u:3060: tato 'sau rohiṇaḥ śākyo devatāsu nirāśayā // Rm_9.36{36} //
K14ratnml_u:3062: asti caiṣa mahārāja pravādo laukikodbhavaḥ // Rm_9.37{37} //
K14ratnml_u:3064: evaṃ ced vā tathā rājann ekaikasya bhavet khalu // Rm_9.38{38} //
K14ratnml_u:3066: api tu saṃmukhībhāvāt tristhānānāṃ nṛpeśvara // Rm_9.39{39} //
K14ratnml_u:3067: putrā vāpi sutāś cāpi jāyaṃte prāṇināṃ khalu /
K14ratnml_u:3068: tadyathā pitarau raktau kalyā cartumatī prasūḥ /
K14ratnml_u:3069: gaṃdharvaḥ prasthitaḥ kāle tadā garbhe samudbhavet // Rm_9.40{40} //
K14ratnml_u:3071: bhāryyā kalyāvatībhūtā snātvā ratiṃ samārabhat // Rm_9.41{41} //
K14ratnml_u:3073: tasya śākyasya bhāryyāyā garbhe sā samupāviśat // Rm_9.42{42} //
K14ratnml_u:3075: svāmino 'gre rahaḥ sthitvā harṣitaivaṃ nyavedayat // Rm_9.43{43} //
K14ratnml_u:3077: tad bhavān sarvakṛyāni kārayatv anumoditaḥ // Rm_9.44{44} //
K14ratnml_u:3079: bhāryāṃ tāṃ garbhiṇīṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃsmitaḥ pratyabhāṣata // Rm_9.45{45} //
K14ratnml_u:3080: satyaṃ me bhāṣitaṃ bhadre matvā bhava samāhitā // Rm_9.46{45/} //
K14ratnml_u:3081: pramādam atra mā kārṣī yadi snehāsti te mayi /
K14ratnml_u:3082: evaṃ te kuśalaṃ bhadre yadi putraṃ janiṣyasi // Rm_9.47{46} //
K14ratnml_u:3083: tadā niṣkāśayāmi tvāṃ yadi putrīṃ janiṣyasi /
K14ratnml_u:3084: iti bhartur vacaḥ śrutvā sā strī vivṛddhadohadā /
K14ratnml_u:3087: yāvat sā samaye sūta dārikāṃ divyasuṃdarīṃ /
K14ratnml_u:3089: tatas tāṃ dārikāṃ jātāṃ śrutvāsau rohiṇo ruṣā /
K14ratnml_u:3090: pratyākhyātuṃ svayaṃ bhāryāṃ viveśa sūtikāgṛhe // Rm_9.50{49} //
K14ratnml_u:3091: prajāpatyā tayā bhartur upanītā puraḥ sutā /
K14ratnml_u:3093: tataḥ sa rohiṇo dṛṣṭvā tāṃ sutāṃ divyasuṃdarīṃ /
K14ratnml_u:3095: aho bhāgyān mayā labdhā suteyaṃ bhadrarūpiṇī /
K14ratnml_u:3096: yad eṣā sahajaiḥ śuklavastraiḥ prāvṛtya jāyate // Rm_9.53{52} //
K14ratnml_u:3098: saddharmacāriṇī bhadrā bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // Rm_9.54{53} //
K14ratnml_u:3099: ity uktvāsau pitā śākyaḥ paśyaṃs tāṃ dārikāṃ cirāt /
K14ratnml_u:3100: atṛpto niścalākṣaś ca tasthau saṃmūrchito yathā // Rm_9.55{54} //
K14ratnml_u:3101: tato jñātīn samāhūya kṛtvā jātimahaṃ mudā /
K14ratnml_u:3102: tan nāmakaraṇaṃ tasyās tān punaḥ sa samabravīt // Rm_9.56{55} //
K14ratnml_u:3104: nāmadheyaṃ prasiddhena karttavyaṃ kriyatāṃ śubhaṃ // Rm_9.57{56} //
K14ratnml_u:3105: iti tenārthite tasyāḥ sarve te jātayas tathā /
K14ratnml_u:3107: yad iyaṃ dārikā saumyā bhadrāṃgī divyasuṃdarī /
K14ratnml_u:3108: śuklavastrāvṛtā jātā tac chukleti prasidhyatu // Rm_9.59{58} //
K14ratnml_u:3109: iti saṃbhāṣaṇāṃ kṛtvā sarve te jñātayas tathā /
K14ratnml_u:3110: rohiṇaṃ taṃ samāmaṃtrya tathaivaṃ samudāharat // Rm_9.60{59} //
K14ratnml_u:3111: yad iyaṃ te sutā bhadra bhadrāṅgī divyasuṃdarī /
K14ratnml_u:3112: śuklavastrāvṛtā jātā tac chukleti pracakṣyatāṃ // Rm_9.61{60} //
K14ratnml_u:3113: tathety anumataṃ kṛtvā tena pitrā prasāditā /
K14ratnml_u:3114: śuklā sā duhitāṣṭāsu dhātrīṣu samupārpitā // Rm_9.62{61} //
K14ratnml_u:3116: varddhitābhūt suramyāṅgī hradastham iva paṃkajaṃ // Rm_9.63{62} //
K14ratnml_u:3117: yathā yathā ca sā śuklā parivṛddhābhavat kramāt /
K14ratnml_u:3119: tathā tathā ca tad vastraṃ vavṛddhe nirmalī 'bhavat // Rm_9.64{63} //
K14ratnml_u:3120: na ca kāyo 'py abhūt tasmāt malābhiliptadurbhagaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:3121: vabhau tu nirmalaḥ śuddhaḥ sugaṃdhiparivāhakaḥ // Rm_9.65{64} //
K14ratnml_u:3122: yadā sā dārikā śuklā parivṛddhā kramād abhūt /
K14ratnml_u:3124: tataḥ sā śikṣituṃ vidyā guruṇāṃ samupāśritā /
K14ratnml_u:3125: śikṣitvā kramaśo vidyāṃ pāram āśu yayau sudhīḥ // Rm_9.67{66} //
K14ratnml_u:3126: tadā ye ye ca tāṃ śuklām apaśyad divyasuṃdarīṃ /
K14ratnml_u:3127: te te sarve 'pi paśyanto vismitā moham āyayuḥ // Rm_9.68{67} //
K14ratnml_u:3129: svasvadūtena tāṃ śuklāṃ rohiṇaṃ prārthayan muhuḥ // Rm_9.69{68} //
K14ratnml_u:3130: jātiśreṣṭho hy ahaṃ vipras tac chuklāṃ me dātum arhasi /
K14ratnml_u:3131: iti tāṃ brāhmaṇaputrā rohiṇaṃ pratyayācayan // Rm_9.70{[69]} //
K14ratnml_u:3132: rājaputro 'smy ahaṃ vīras tat sutā me pradīyatāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:3133: iti rājakumārās taṃ rohiṇaṃ tāṃ samarthayan // Rm_9.71{[70]} //
K14ratnml_u:3134: ahaṃ vaiśyaḥ prajābhartā tac chuklāṃ me dātum arhasi /
K14ratnml_u:3135: iti vaiśyakumārās tāṃ rohiṇaṃ prārthayari muhuḥ // Rm_9.72{[71]} //
K14ratnml_u:3136: ahaṃ maṃtrisuto vijñas tac chuklā me pradīyatāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:3137: iti maṃtrisutāḥ sarve rohiṇaṃ pratyayācayan // Rm_9.73{71/} //
K14ratnml_u:3138: mahāmātyasuto 'haṃ hi tac chuklāṃ me prayachatāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:3139: ity āmātyakumārās tāṃ rohiṇaṃ pratyayācayan // Rm_9.74{72} //
K14ratnml_u:3141: svasvadūtena tāṃ śuklāṃ rohiṇaṃ pratyayācayan // Rm_9.75{73} //
K14ratnml_u:3142: evaṃ sarvaiś ca tair nityaiḥ prārthyamāno mahājanaiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:3143: rohiṇaḥ sa viṣaṇṇātmā sthitvaivaṃ ca vyacintayat // Rm_9.76{74} //
K14ratnml_u:3144: hā me duḥkhāni jātāni katham atra pratikriyā /
K14ratnml_u:3145: sarvathāhaṃ praṇaṣṭaḥ syāṃ sutayāḥ kāraṇe 'dhunā // Rm_9.77{75} //
K14ratnml_u:3146: yady ekasmai pradāsyāmi sutām etāṃ manoharāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:3147: anye sarve 'pi me vairā bhaviṣyaṃti tadā khalu // Rm_9.78{76} //
K14ratnml_u:3148: avaśyaṃ me sutā hīyaṃ vairiṇī māṃ haniṣyati /
K14ratnml_u:3149: evaṃ duḥkhānudāyinyā putryāpi kiṃ mamaitayā // Rm_9.79{77} //
K14ratnml_u:3152: kapolaṃ svakare sthāpya tasthau koṣṭhe nirutsavaḥ // Rm_9.80{78} //
K14ratnml_u:3154: sā śuklā duhitā dṛṣṭvā praṇatvaivam abhāṣata // Rm_9.81{79} //
K14ratnml_u:3155: kim evaṃ tiṣṭhase tāta kiṃ te duḥkhaṃ nu jāyate /
K14ratnml_u:3156: kathyatāṃ tad yadi sneho mayi te varttate pitaḥ // Rm_9.82{80} //
K14ratnml_u:3157: iti putryā vacaḥ śrutvā pitā sa ruṣitāśayaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:3158: niḥsnehas tāṃ sutāṃ śuklāṃ dṛṣṭvaivaṃ paryyabhāṣata // Rm_9.83{81} //
K14ratnml_u:3159: tvan nimitte mahad duḥkhaṃ jāyate me kuputrike /
K14ratnml_u:3160: kiṃ tavāgre kathitvaitaṃ yato naiva pratikriyā // Rm_9.84{82} //
K14ratnml_u:3161: avaśyaṃ tvaṃ sutā śatruḥ sarvathā māṃ haniṣyasi /
K14ratnml_u:3162: evaṃ duḥkhābhidāyinyā putryāpi kiṃ mama tvayā // Rm_9.85{83} //
K14ratnml_u:3163: iti pitroditaṃ śrutvā sā śuklā prahatāśayā /
K14ratnml_u:3165: tāta kiṃ me nimittena duḥkhaṃ te jāyate kathaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:3167: tad upāyaṃ kariṣyāmi yena duḥkhaṃ nihanyate // Rm_9.86{84} //
K14ratnml_u:3168: tad etat sarvathā tāta mamāgre vaktum arhasi /
K14ratnml_u:3169: iti putryodite bhūyaḥ pitāsau rohiṇo 'vadat // Rm_9.87{85} //
K14ratnml_u:3170: tat kin te kathyate putri yato nāsti pratikriyā /
K14ratnml_u:3172: kumārā brāhmaṇā vaiśyāḥ śūdrāś ca maṃtrinaṃdanāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:3176: etaiḥ sarvair ahaṃ nityaṃ sumudritas tvadarthibhiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:3177: katham atra kariṣyāmi cetanā me na vidyate // Rm_9.91{89} //
K14ratnml_u:3178: tvam evaikā hi me putrī bahavo yācakāś ca te /
K14ratnml_u:3179: ekasmai yadi dāsyāmi sarve 'nye syur mamāhitāḥ // Rm_9.92{90} //
K14ratnml_u:3180: atas tvāṃ khaṇḍaśaḥ kṛtvā sarvebhyo 'py arpaye ca vai /
K14ratnml_u:3181: evaṃ tu kriyamāṇe me kuśalatvaṃ bhaviṣyati // Rm_9.93{91} //
K14ratnml_u:3182: anyathā ced bhaven naiva kuśalaṃ me sadāpi hi /
K14ratnml_u:3184: iti pitroditaṃ śrutvā śuklā sā mṛtyuśaṃkita // Rm_9.94{92} //
K14ratnml_u:3186: prasīda mā kṛthāḥ khedaṃ mamaitat kāraṇe pitaḥ // Rm_9.95{93} //
K14ratnml_u:3187: tathāhaṃ te kariṣyāmi yathā doṣo na vidyate /
K14ratnml_u:3188: nāhaṃ kāmārthinī tāta tad anujñāṃ pradehi me // Rm_9.96{94} //
K14ratnml_u:3190: ity etad bhāṣitaṃ putryā śrutvāsau rohiṇaḥ pitā // Rm_9.97{95} //
K14ratnml_u:3192: mā kṛthāḥ sarvathā putri pravrajyācaraṇe manaḥ // Rm_9.98{96} //
K14ratnml_u:3193: tvaṃ strī vālā na śaknuyāḥ pravrajyāṃ carituṃ sute /
K14ratnml_u:3194: pravrajyāyāṃ vrataṃ kaṣṭaṃ puruṣair api duṣkaraṃ // Rm_9.99{97} //
K14ratnml_u:3195: tvaṃ tu vālā subhadrāṃgī komalā divyasuṃdarī /
K14ratnml_u:3196: kathaṃ tad duṣkarasthāne vrataṃ kartuṃ saheḥ sute // Rm_9.100{98} //
K14ratnml_u:3197: tan mā kṛthās tathā vāle pravrajyāyāṃ manas tyaja /
K14ratnml_u:3198: yadi kāmārthinī nāsi kasmai cid dāsyate na hi // Rm_9.101{99} //
K14ratnml_u:3199: tat putri svagṛhe sthitvā vrataṃ dhṛtvā sukhaṃ vasa /
K14ratnml_u:3200: yadi kāmārthinī vāsi putri teṣāṃ tvadarthināṃ // Rm_9.102{100} //
K14ratnml_u:3201: svayaṃvaravidhiṃ kṛtvā svayaṃ vara yam ichasi /
K14ratnml_u:3202: tadā me dūṣaṇaṃ nāsti tavāpi dūṣaṇaṃ na hi // Rm_9.103{1} //
K14ratnml_u:3203: sarvatrāpi hi lokeṣu vidhir eṣa pravarttate /
K14ratnml_u:3204: tasmāt teṣāṃ kumārāṇāṃ patiṃ bhadraṃ svayaṃ vara // Rm_9.104{2} //
K14ratnml_u:3205: tenaiva patinā sārddhaṃ vrataṃ kṛtvā sukhaṃ cara /
K14ratnml_u:3206: tadā santatim utpādya bhuktvā bhogyaṃ yathā sukhaṃ // Rm_9.105{3} //
K14ratnml_u:3208: tenaivaṃ mā kṛthāḥ putri pravrajyācaraṇe manaḥ // Rm_9.106{4} //
K14ratnml_u:3210: ity ukte janakenāsau śuklā kāmaparāṅmukhā // Rm_9.107{5} //
K14ratnml_u:3213: tasmād bhogyāny api tyaktvā caritum ichāmi sadvrataṃ /
K14ratnml_u:3214: sabhayāḥ saraṇāḥ kāmāḥ sakleśāś ca viṣopamāḥ // Rm_9.109{7} //
K14ratnml_u:3215: tasmāt kāme na me vāṃchā nirvāṇe eva me manaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:3218: sarve te kleśitāś cāndhāś caranti pātakeṣv api /
K14ratnml_u:3219: kṛtvā te pātakāny evaṃ gachanti durgatiṣv api // Rm_9.111{9} //
K14ratnml_u:3221: brāhmaṇā api dhīrāś ca vaidikā brahmacāriṇaḥ // Rm_9.112{10} //
K14ratnml_u:3225: yatayo yoginaś cāpi nirgraṃthāś ca digaṃvarāḥ // Rm_9.113{11} //
K14ratnml_u:3227: rājānaḥ kṣatriyāś cāpi kṛtvā yuddhaṃ parasparaṃ // Rm_9.114{12} //
K14ratnml_u:3228: āhave nidhanaṃ yānti tad api kāmakāraṇe /
K14ratnml_u:3229: amātyā maṃtriṇaś cāpi mārayanti parārdhinaḥ // Rm_9.115{13} //
K14ratnml_u:3230: tatpāpair durgatiṃ yānti tad api kāmahetunā /
K14ratnml_u:3231: yodhāraś ca mahāvīrā yuddhaṃ kṛtvā parasparaṃ // Rm_9.116{14} //
K14ratnml_u:3232: saṃgrāme nidhanaṃ yānti tad api kāmakāraṇe /
K14ratnml_u:3234: samudre patitāḥ kecin mṛtāḥ kecic ca jaṃgale /
K14ratnml_u:3235: kecin mṛtā mahāraṇye cauraiḥ kecid upadrutāḥ // Rm_9.118{16} //
K14ratnml_u:3238: kecid gṛhagatā eva mṛtāḥ kecic ca roginaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:3239: kecid bhāraṃ vahantaś ca mṛtāḥ kecid bhayānvitāḥ // Rm_9.120{18} //
K14ratnml_u:3240: jantubhiḥ khāditāḥ kecit tat sarvaṃ kāmahetunā /
K14ratnml_u:3241: kṛṣiṇaś ca dinaṃ yāvat kṣatrakarmasamudyatāḥ // Rm_9.121{19} //
K14ratnml_u:3242: dinānte gṛham agatya śerate te mṛtā iva /
K14ratnml_u:3243: evam anye 'pi lokāś ca śilpipreṣyajanādayaḥ // Rm_9.122{20} //
K14ratnml_u:3246: vahaṃti kheditāḥ kleśaṃ tat sarvaṃ kāmahetunā /
K14ratnml_u:3248: pātakāny api kurvanti tad api kāmakāraṇe /
K14ratnml_u:3249: kecic ca paradravyāṇi haranti hārayanti ca // Rm_9.125{23} //
K14ratnml_u:3251: dhanārthe kiṃ na kurvanti duṣṭā lubdhāś ca nirdayāḥ // Rm_9.126{24} //
K14ratnml_u:3253: praghnanti pitarau kecit te 'pi ghnanti gurūn api /
K14ratnml_u:3254: kecid vighnanti mitrāṇi jñātivandhujanān api // Rm_9.127{[125]} //
K14ratnml_u:3255: patnīputraduhitṝś ca bhrātrīṃś ca bhāginīr api /
K14ratnml_u:3256: kecid ghnanti sahāyāṃś ca dāsadāsījanāny api // Rm_9.128{26} //
K14ratnml_u:3257: bālān vṛddhāṃś ca nārīṃś ca tat sarvaṃ kāmakāraṇe /
K14ratnml_u:3259: hatvā khādanti pāpiṣṭhās tad api kāmakāraṇe /
K14ratnml_u:3264: mithyākāmaratāḥ kecit paradārāṃś ca kāminīḥ // Rm_9.132{30} //
K14ratnml_u:3265: haranti chadmanā cāpi tad api kāmakāraṇe /
K14ratnml_u:3269: virodhaṃ kārayanty evaṃ tad api kāmahetunā // Rm_9.134{[132]} //
K14ratnml_u:3271: paribhāṣya vinindanti tad api kāmakāraṇe // Rm_9.135{[133]} //
K14ratnml_u:3273: cittāni bhedayanty evaṃ tad api kāmakāraṇe // Rm_9.136{[134]} //
K14ratnml_u:3275: prabhedayanti cittāni tad api kāmahetunā // Rm_9.137{[135]} //
K14ratnml_u:3277: vyāpādaṃ cintayanty evaṃ tad api kāmakāraṇe // Rm_9.138{[136]} //
K14ratnml_u:3279: bhogyāni bhuṃjate hṛtvā tad api kāmakāraṇe // Rm_9.139{[137]} //
K14ratnml_u:3281: svakuladharmabhraṣṭāś ca tad api kāmakāraṇe // Rm_9.140{[138]} //
K14ratnml_u:3283: kāmarthe kleśitātmāno bhramanti durgatau sadā // Rm_9.141{[139]} //
K14ratnml_u:3285: evaṃ yāvanti duḥkhāni saṃsāre ṣaḍgatiṣv api /
K14ratnml_u:3286: tāni sarvāṇi satvānāṃ jāyante kāmahetunā // Rm_9.142{[130]} //
K14ratnml_u:3287: evaṃ matvā tu ye vijñāḥ kāmaṃ tyaktvā virāgiṇaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:3288: pravrajitvā suniḥkleśā brahmacaryyaṃ caranti te // Rm_9.143{[131]} //
K14ratnml_u:3289: tato me sabhaye kāme saraṇe ca viṣopame /
K14ratnml_u:3290: vidvadbhir garhite tāta manovāṃchā na varttate // Rm_9.144{32} //
K14ratnml_u:3292: brahmacaryyaṃ caritvāhaṃ prāptum ichāmi nirvṛtiṃ // Rm_9.145{33} //
K14ratnml_u:3293: buddho hi jagatāṃ śāstā dharmarājo vināyakaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:3294: tat tasya śaraṇe gatvā caritum ichāmi saccarīṃ // Rm_9.146{34} //
K14ratnml_u:3295: yady asti te mayi snehaḥ saddharme cānurāgatā /
K14ratnml_u:3296: tad anumodanāṃ kṛtvānujñāṃ me dātum arhasi // Rm_9.147{35} //
K14ratnml_u:3297: yadi tu saugate dharme 'py anujñāṃ me dadāsi na /
K14ratnml_u:3299: iti putrīvacaḥ śrutya śākyo 'sau rohiṇaḥ pitā /
K14ratnml_u:3301: yad iyaṃ me sutā bhadrā nirāśravā virāginī /
K14ratnml_u:3302: avaśyaṃ svagṛhaṃ tyaktvā pravrajet sarvathā khalu // Rm_9.150{38} //
K14ratnml_u:3303: avaśyaṃ me 'nayā putryā viyogaṃ sarvathā bhavet /
K14ratnml_u:3304: sarvathā hy anivāryyeyaṃ vrajatu saugatāśrame // Rm_9.151{39} //
K14ratnml_u:3306: brahmacaryyaṃ caraty evaṃ tato nirvṛtim āpnuyāt // Rm_9.152{40} //
K14ratnml_u:3307: yad iyaṃ me sutā kāntā subhadrā divyasuṃdarī /
K14ratnml_u:3308: yadi gehaṃ parityaktvā tīrthayātrāṃ kariṣyati // Rm_9.153{41} //
K14ratnml_u:3310: kuladharmaparibhraṣṭā vinaṣṭā syān na saṃśayaḥ // Rm_9.154{42} //
K14ratnml_u:3312: tasyāś ca dūragāminyā darśanaṃ syāt sudullabhaṃ // Rm_9.155{43} //
K14ratnml_u:3314: tasmād asyā na karttavyā vāraṇā dharmasādhane /
K14ratnml_u:3315: caratu saugatīṃ caryyām iyaṃ hi nirvṛtaye // Rm_9.156{44} //
K14ratnml_u:3316: tathā cet saphalaṃ janma mānuṣye syān mamāpi ca /
K14ratnml_u:3317: teneyaṃ jagatāṃ bhartuḥ śāsane caratu vrataṃ // Rm_9.157{45} //
K14ratnml_u:3318: ity evaṃ manasā dhyātvā śākyo 'sau rohiṇaḥ pitā /
K14ratnml_u:3319: śuklāṃ tāṃ svātmajāṃ bhadrāṃ saṃnirīkṣyaivam abravīt // Rm_9.158{46} //
K14ratnml_u:3320: satyam evaṃ sute bhadre yathoddiṣṭaṃ tvayā khalu /
K14ratnml_u:3321: kiṃ tu tvaṃ dārikā nārī pravrajyāṃ tat kathaṃ careḥ // Rm_9.159{47} //
K14ratnml_u:3323: tat pravrajyāvrate sthitvā mā paścāt paritapyathāḥ // Rm_9.160{48} //
K14ratnml_u:3325: tac carasva munīndrasya śāsane vratam ādarāt // Rm_9.161{49} //
K14ratnml_u:3326: yathā ca guruṇādiṣṭaṃ śrutvā tathā samāhitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:3327: samyak chikṣāḥ samādhāya cara nityam atandritā // Rm_9.162{50} //
K14ratnml_u:3330: iti pitrā samādiṣṭe śuklā sā pratimoditā /
K14ratnml_u:3331: natvā pādau pituś caivaṃ jananyāś caraṇe 'namat // Rm_9.164{52} //
K14ratnml_u:3332: tataḥ sā jananī dṛṣṭvā tāṃ śuklāṃ svātmajāṃ priyāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:3333: pariṣvajya rudanty evaṃ pravrajyāyāṃ nyavārayat // Rm_9.165{53} //
K14ratnml_u:3334: hā putri katham ekānte māṃ tyaktvā kva vrajiṣyase /
K14ratnml_u:3335: hā jīva kiṃ nu paśyantī pravrajituṃ tvam īhase // Rm_9.166{54} //
K14ratnml_u:3336: kiṃ cid duḥkhaṃ na te dattaṃ mayāmvayā kadā cana /
K14ratnml_u:3337: kenaivaṃ hetunā putrī pravrajituṃ tvam ichasi // Rm_9.167{55} //
K14ratnml_u:3338: tvaṃ tu nārī subhādrāṅgī kumārī divyasuṃdarī /
K14ratnml_u:3339: kiṃcid duḥkhānabhijñā ca tat pravrajyāṃ kathaṃ care // Rm_9.168{56} //
K14ratnml_u:3340: yāvaj jīvāmy ahaṃ caiva tāvat mā gāḥ kuhāpi hi /
K14ratnml_u:3341: yāvac cāsti gṛhe saṃpat tāvad bhuktvā sukhaṃ vasa // Rm_9.169{57} //
K14ratnml_u:3342: yadāhaṃ maraṇaṃ yātā yadā cāpi gṛhe vipat /
K14ratnml_u:3343: jñātimitrajanais tyaktvā tadā vrajasva vāṃchayā // Rm_9.170{58} //
K14ratnml_u:3344: iti mātrā niṣiddhe 'pi śuklā sā vighnaśaṃkitās /
K14ratnml_u:3345: mātuḥ pādau praṇatvaiva sahasā niryayau gṛhāt // Rm_9.171{59} //
K14ratnml_u:3347: tataḥ sā satvarā gatvā nyagrodhārama āśrame /
K14ratnml_u:3349: tān sarvān kramato natvā vihāre samupāviśat /
K14ratnml_u:3350: tatrasthaṃ sugataṃ nātham apaśyac chrighanaṃ jinaṃ // Rm_9.173{61} //
K14ratnml_u:3354: ratnarāśim ivojjvālaṃ sumerum iva jaṃgamaṃ // Rm_9.175{63} //
K14ratnml_u:3356: dṛṣṭvaivaṃ sucirāt tasya śrīghanasyāntike yayau // Rm_9.176{64} //
K14ratnml_u:3357: tathaivaṃ samupāyātāṃ dṛṣṭvā tāṃ bhagavān muniḥ /
K14ratnml_u:3358: svāgataṃ dārike bhadre ehīty uktvā samagrahīt // Rm_9.177{65} //
K14ratnml_u:3360: ity uktvā prāṃjaliṃ kṛtvā nanāma caraṇau muneḥ // Rm_9.178{66} //
K14ratnml_u:3361: tato bhagavatā tena preṣitā mātur antike /
K14ratnml_u:3362: sā śuklā sahasā gatvā gautamyāc caraṇe 'namat // Rm_9.179{67} //
K14ratnml_u:3364: dṛṣṭvā sā gautamī spṛṣṭvā hastenaiva samagrahīt // Rm_9.180{68} //
K14ratnml_u:3365: tataḥ pravrājayitvā sā gautamyā bhikṣuṇī kṛtā /
K14ratnml_u:3368: tataḥ paṃcasuraktaṃ jātāni cīvarāṇy api // Rm_9.182{70} //
K14ratnml_u:3369: tair eva civarai raktaiḥ prāvṛtā pariśobhitā /
K14ratnml_u:3370: sā śuklā suprasannāsyā muṇḍitāpy abhyarocata // Rm_9.183{71} //
K14ratnml_u:3372: jitvā kleśārivargāṃś ca śikṣāpāraṃ samāyayau // Rm_9.184{72} //
K14ratnml_u:3385: vaṃdanīyā cābhitoṣyā ca vabhūva brahmacāriṇī // Rm_9.190{78} //
K14ratnml_u:3386: atha te bhikṣavaḥ sarve dṛṣṭvā tāṃ brahmacāriṇīṃ /
K14ratnml_u:3387: vismitāḥ sugataṃ natvā paprachur iti sādaraṃ // Rm_9.191{79} //
K14ratnml_u:3388: bhagavan kim iyaṃ śuklā purā karmākaroc chubhaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:3389: yena vastrāvṛtā jātā bhavaty evaṃ ca bhikṣuṇī // Rm_9.192{80} //
K14ratnml_u:3390: tat sarvaṃ naḥ samādeṣṭum arhasi sarvavid guro /
K14ratnml_u:3391: yad anayā kṛtaṃ karma bhikṣuṇyā śuklayā purā // Rm_9.193{81} //
K14ratnml_u:3392: iti tair bhikṣubhiḥ pṛṣṭe bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:3393: tān bhikṣusāṃghikān sarvān saṃnirīkṣyaivam abravīt // Rm_9.194{82} //
K14ratnml_u:3394: śṛṇudhvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ sarve yad anayā kṛtaṃ purā /
K14ratnml_u:3396: purāsminn eva bhadrākhye kalpe 'bhūt kāśyapo jinaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:3397: saṃbuddhaḥ sugato nātho dharmarājas tathāgataḥ // Rm_9.196{84} //
K14ratnml_u:3399: sarvajño bhagavān arhan brahmacārī hitaṃkaraḥ // Rm_9.197{85} //
K14ratnml_u:3401: mṛgadāve vane ramye vyaharac chrāvakaiḥ saha // Rm_9.198{86} //
K14ratnml_u:3403: sārddham upāsikābhiś ca yatibhiś ca maharṣibhiḥ // Rm_9.199{87} //
K14ratnml_u:3409: tatra bhikṣūn kramād dṛṣṭvā saṃbuddhāntikam upāyayau // Rm_9.202{90} //
K14ratnml_u:3410: tatra sā samupāgatya dadarśa taṃ munīśvaraṃ /
K14ratnml_u:3416: tathā dṛṣṭvaiva prāmodāt sāṃjaliṃ samupāgatā // Rm_9.205{93} //
K14ratnml_u:3417: natvā pādau munes tasthāv ekāntike kṛtāṃjaliḥ /
K14ratnml_u:3418: tataḥ sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā tasyāś cittaṃ viśodhitaṃ // Rm_9.206{94} //
K14ratnml_u:3420: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pītvā sā śūdrī pariharṣitā // Rm_9.207{95} //
K14ratnml_u:3422: tataḥ sā svagṛhe gatvā sādhayitvā subhojanaṃ // Rm_9.208{96} //
K14ratnml_u:3424: tatra svasvāsanāsīnaṃ saṃbuddhaṃ taṃ sasāṃghikaṃ // Rm_9.209{97} //
K14ratnml_u:3426: tataḥ sā śraddhayā tebhyaḥ sarvebhyo 'pi prasannitā // Rm_9.210{98} //
K14ratnml_u:3428: tato nityaṃ ca sā bhaktyā cakre saṃbuddhasevanāṃ // Rm_9.211{99} //
K14ratnml_u:3432: tasmāt kiṃ bhikṣavo yūyaṃ manyadhve yābhavat tadā // Rm_9.213{1} //
K14ratnml_u:3433: śreṣṭhibhāryā na cānyā sā śuklaivaiṣeti manyata /
K14ratnml_u:3435: pratyekaṃ cīvaraṃ dattaṃ pravrajyā cāpi sādhitā /
K14ratnml_u:3438: ity evaṃ karmajaṃ bhogyaṃ prāṇino bhuṃjate bhave // Rm_9.216{4} //
K14ratnml_u:3439: yenaiva yat kṛtaṃ karma tenaiva bhujyate phalaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:3440: na naśyaṃti hi karmāṇi kalpakoṭiśatair api // Rm_9.217{5} //
K14ratnml_u:3441: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalaṃti khalu dehināṃ /
K14ratnml_u:3442: abhuktaṃ kṣīyate naiva karma kvāpi kathaṃ cana // Rm_9.218{6} //
K14ratnml_u:3443: nāgnibhir dahyate karma vāyubhiś ca na śuṣyate /
K14ratnml_u:3444: jalaiś ca klidyate nāpi kṣīyate nāpi bhūmiṣu // Rm_9.219{7} //
K14ratnml_u:3445: anyathā ca bhaven naiva karmagatiḥ kathaṃ cana /
K14ratnml_u:3446: śuklānāṃ śubhatā nityaṃ kṛṣṇānāṃ duḥkhatā sadā // Rm_9.220{8} //
K14ratnml_u:3447: miśritā miśritānāṃ ca jaṃtubhir bhujyate gatiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:3448: tasmād apāsya kṛṣṇāni karmāṇi miśritāni ca // Rm_9.221{9} //
K14ratnml_u:3451: tatheti bhikṣavaḥ sarve te ca lokaḥ sabhāsthitāḥ // Rm_9.222{10} //
K14ratnml_u:3453: evam etan mahārāja guruṇā me prabhāṣitaṃ // Rm_9.223{11} //
K14ratnml_u:3454: evaṃ rājaṃs tvayāpy evaṃ karttavyaṃ puṇyam ādarāt /
K14ratnml_u:3455: puṇyam eva bhave vandhubhrātā mitraṃ suhṛtsakhā // Rm_9.224{12} //
K14ratnml_u:3456: nānyaḥ puṇyāt paraḥ kaścid vidyate bhavacāriṇāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:3457: tasmāt puṇyaṃ svayaṃ kṛtvā lokeṣv api pracāraya // Rm_9.225{13} //
K14ratnml_u:3459: ity evaṃ guruṇādiṣṭam upaguptena bhikṣuṇā // Rm_9.226{14} //
K14ratnml_u:3460: śrutvā tatheti rājāsau prābhyanandaj janaiḥ saha // Rm_9.227{15} //
K14ratnml_u:3461: ya idaṃ śuklāvadānaṃ jinavarakathitaṃ puṇyahetor narāṇāṃ
K14ratnml_u:3463: te sarve kleśamuktāḥ suvimalamanaso bodhicaryā carantaḥ
K14ratnml_u:3464: satsaukhyāny eva bhuktvā munivaranilaye saṃprayātā vasanti // Rm_9.228{16} //
K14ratnml_u:3469: kṛtāṃjalipuṭo natvā punar evam abhāṣata // Rm_10.1{1} //
K14ratnml_u:3470: bhadanta śrotum ichāmi punar anyat subhāṣitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:3471: yathā te guruṇā khyātaṃ tathā vaktuṃ samarhasi // Rm_10.2{2} //
K14ratnml_u:3472: evaṃ tena nṛpendreṇa prārthite sa jinātmajaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:3473: upagupto mahābhijñas taṃ nṛpaṃ caivam abravīt // Rm_10.3{3} //
K14ratnml_u:3474: śṛṇu rājaṃs tathā vakṣye yathā me guruṇoditaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:3475: śrutvā caivaṃ sadā bodhicaryāṃ cara samāhitaḥ // Rm_10.4{4} //
K14ratnml_u:3477: sarvajñaḥ sugato nāthaḥ śāstā traidhātukādhipaḥ // Rm_10.5{5} //
K14ratnml_u:3479: jino 'rhaṃ bhagavān buddho dharmarājo vināyakaḥ // Rm_10.6{6} //
K14ratnml_u:3483: triratnopāsikābhiś ca cailakaiś ca śubhāśayaiḥ // Rm_10.8{8} //
K14ratnml_u:3487: devā daityāś ca nāgāś ca yakṣagaṃdharvakinnarāḥ // Rm_10.10{10} //
K14ratnml_u:3489: brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyāś cāpi vaiśyāḥ śūdrāś ca maṃtriṇaḥ // Rm_10.11{11} //
K14ratnml_u:3490: amātyāḥ śreṣṭhinaś cāpi dhaninaś ca mahājanāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:3491: vaṇijaḥ sārthavāhāś ca tadanye 'pi ca sajjanāḥ // Rm_10.12{12} //
K14ratnml_u:3492: paurā jānapadāś cāpi sarve te samupāgatāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:3493: taṃ buddhaṃ sugataṃ natvā pūjayitvā samaṃtataḥ // Rm_10.13{13} //
K14ratnml_u:3495: athāsau bhagavān dṛṣṭvā tān sarvān samupāsthitān /
K14ratnml_u:3497: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pītvā sarve satvāḥ surādayaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:3500: evaṃ nityaṃ ca te satvāḥ pītvā dharmāmṛtaṃ muneḥ /
K14ratnml_u:3502: tadaiva samaye tasyāṃ śrāvastyāṃ puri saṃsthitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:3507: na putro na ca putrī vā samudapādi daivataḥ // Rm_10.19{19} //
K14ratnml_u:3509: kapolaṃ svakare sthāpya viṣādyaivaṃ vyacintayat // Rm_10.20{20} //
K14ratnml_u:3512: putro me duhitā vāpi vidyate na kathaṃ cana /
K14ratnml_u:3513: saṃpado 'pi nirarthāḥ syur yato bhoktā na vidyate // Rm_10.22{22} //
K14ratnml_u:3514: hā hā sarvaṃ vinaṣṭaṃ syād yato me santatir na hi /
K14ratnml_u:3515: kiṃ me 'nayā samṛddhyāpi yatra vaṃśo na vidyate // Rm_10.23{23} //
K14ratnml_u:3516: vyartham eva mayā dravyaṃ kaṣṭena samupārjitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:3517: kiṃ kariṣyāmi taddravyaṃ sarvathā maraṇe sati // Rm_10.24{24} //
K14ratnml_u:3518: ke hi grastā na saṃsāre mṛtyusarppeṇa jaṃtavaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:3519: mayi mṛtyuprayāte 'tra saṃskāraṃ kaḥ kariṣyati // Rm_10.25{25} //
K14ratnml_u:3520: durgatiśodhanaṃ kaś ca piṇḍam ekaṃ pradāsyati /
K14ratnml_u:3521: nūnaṃ madatyayād rājā sarvasvam āhariṣyati // Rm_10.26{26} //
K14ratnml_u:3522: tadā nāmāpi me loke na kaś cana grahīṣyati /
K14ratnml_u:3523: yad artham eva saṃpattīḥ sādhayāmi prayatnataḥ // Rm_10.27{27} //
K14ratnml_u:3524: tad eva yadi nāsty evaṃ tat kiṃ me syāt sujīvite // Rm_10.28{28/} //
K14ratnml_u:3526: yasmāc ciram api sthitvā mṛtyuduḥkhaṃ tadaiva hi // Rm_10.29{29} //
K14ratnml_u:3527: tan me bhogye 'pi vāṃchā na bhuktvāpi kiṃ sukhaṃ vinā /
K14ratnml_u:3528: aputrasya sukhaṃ naiva paratreha niranvayāt // Rm_10.30{30} //
K14ratnml_u:3529: tan me janmāpi vyarthaṃ syād dhy aputro 'smi niranvayāt /
K14ratnml_u:3530: hā hato 'haṃ svadaivena kiṃ mayātra kariṣyate // Rm_10.31{31} //
K14ratnml_u:3531: kasyāgre saṃvadiṣyāmi ko me buddhiṃ pradāsyati /
K14ratnml_u:3533: kasyāhaṃ śaraṇaṃ yāsye ko māṃ samuddhariṣyati // Rm_10.32{32} //
K14ratnml_u:3535: nirutsāhī gṛhān naiva nirapāyāt kadācana // Rm_10.33{33} //
K14ratnml_u:3538: kiṃ te duḥkhaṃ samutpannaṃ kenaivaṃ tiṣṭhase sakhe /
K14ratnml_u:3539: vaktavyaṃ cet tadā āśu sarvathā vaktum arhasi // Rm_10.35{31} //
K14ratnml_u:3540: iti pṛṣṭe suhṛdbhis tair gṛhasthaḥ sa viniśvasan /
K14ratnml_u:3541: tān sarvān suhṛdo dṛṣṭvā tad duḥkhaṃ samudāharat // Rm_10.36{36} //
K14ratnml_u:3542: suhṛdo me bhavanto hi tan mayātra pracakṣyate /
K14ratnml_u:3543: saṃpattir mahatī me 'sti putro naiva sutāpi naḥ // Rm_10.37{37} //
K14ratnml_u:3544: tena me saṃpadaḥ sarvā vinakṣyanti nirarthitāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:3547: tan me janmāpi vyarthaṃ syād aputrasya niranvayāt // Rm_10.39{39} //
K14ratnml_u:3548: tathā hato 'haṃ svadaivena kiṃ mayātra cariṣyate /
K14ratnml_u:3550: tasya grīhapateś caivāṃ tad upāyaṃ samādiśat /
K14ratnml_u:3551: kiṃ bhadrātra viṣādena yatra devādhikāratā // Rm_10.41{41} //
K14ratnml_u:3552: tathāpi kriyatāṃ yatnaṃ klaibyaṃ tyaktvā tvayādhunā /
K14ratnml_u:3553: yad aśakyaṃ valair dravyais tad upāyena śakyate // Rm_10.42{42} //
K14ratnml_u:3554: tasmāt klaibyam iha tyaktvā kuru yatnaṃ samāhitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:3555: devatārādhanāṃ kṛtvā sarvakāryyaṃ hi sādhayet // Rm_10.43{43} //
K14ratnml_u:3556: tadādau devatāḥ pūjya yācasva putram ātmanā /
K14ratnml_u:3558: putro vā duhitā vāpi samupapatsyate dhruvaṃ // Rm_10.44{44} //
K14ratnml_u:3559: tatas te saṃtatiś caivaṃ varddhiṣyati kramāt tathā /
K14ratnml_u:3560: tadāpi bhṛśato muktaḥ sadgatiṃ samavāpnuyāt // Rm_10.45{45} //
K14ratnml_u:3566: evaṃ putrābhilāsī sa sadā ca santatīchayā /
K14ratnml_u:3567: devatārādhanaṃ kṛtvā tasthau nityaṃ samutsukaḥ // Rm_10.48{48} //
K14ratnml_u:3569: na putro duhitā vāpi nodapādi cirād api // Rm_10.49{49} //
K14ratnml_u:3572: tataḥ kaścit suhṛt sādhuḥ saṃbuddhopāsakaḥ sudhīḥ /
K14ratnml_u:3573: taṃ gṛhastham upāgatya tathaivaṃ paryyabodhayat // Rm_10.51{51} //
K14ratnml_u:3574: sādho kin te viṣādena tad dhīraṃ samupāśraya /
K14ratnml_u:3575: yadi te santatau vāṃchā tan me śrutvā tataś cara // Rm_10.52{52} //
K14ratnml_u:3576: kim evaṃ devatāḥ pūjya yācase putram ādarāt /
K14ratnml_u:3577: yatra daivādhikāratvaṃ tatra kiṃ devatā valaṃ // Rm_10.53{53} //
K14ratnml_u:3578: vaṃśārthe yadi te bhaktir asty evaṃ devatāsu tat /
K14ratnml_u:3581: nūnaṃ te satsutaḥ śīghram utpatsyati na saṃśayaḥ // Rm_10.55{55} //
K14ratnml_u:3583: puṇyam utpatsyate nūnaṃ tena sadgatim āpnuyāt // Rm_10.56{56} //
K14ratnml_u:3584: ye buddhaśaraṇaṃ yānti te labhanti śubhāśayaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:3585: ye viśuddhāśayā loke saddharmaṃ te śṛṇvanti hi // Rm_10.57{57} //
K14ratnml_u:3586: ye saddharmānuśṛṇvan to bodhicittaṃ labhanti te /
K14ratnml_u:3587: pralabdhabodhicittā ye te caranti guṇārthinaḥ // Rm_10.58{58} //
K14ratnml_u:3588: guṇakāmāś ca ye loke te bhajanti jinātmajān /
K14ratnml_u:3590: bodhicaryāratā ye ca na te gachaṃti durgatiṃ /
K14ratnml_u:3592: evaṃ matvā jinaṃ smṛtvā saddharmaṃ samupāśrayeḥ /
K14ratnml_u:3593: tatas te saṃbhaved bhadram ihāmutrāpi sarvataḥ // Rm_10.61{61} //
K14ratnml_u:3595: tatheti pratisaṃśrutya saṃbuddhaṃ smartum aichata // Rm_10.62{62} //
K14ratnml_u:3597: saṃbuddhaṃ sugataṃ smṛtvā vaṃśam evam ayācata // Rm_10.63{63} //
K14ratnml_u:3598: namas te bhagavan nātha bhavatāṃ śaraṇaṃ vraje /
K14ratnml_u:3600: tan māṃ karuṇāya dṛṣṭyā draṣṭum arhasi sarvathā // Rm_10.64{64} //
K14ratnml_u:3602: tvayā mahyaṃ hitārthāya satputraṃ dātum arhasi // Rm_10.65{65} //
K14ratnml_u:3603: ity evaṃ sa gṛhī sādhuḥ putrābhilaṣitaḥ sadā /
K14ratnml_u:3604: sabhāryyaḥ sugataṃ smṛtvā tathā nityaṃ samutsukaḥ // Rm_10.66{66} //
K14ratnml_u:3605: tadaiva samaye kaścid devaputro divaś cyutaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:3607: tataḥ svāpannasatvābhūt sā bhāryā gṛhiṇaḥ satī /
K14ratnml_u:3609: pravṛddhagarbhā sā dṛṣṭvā svayaṃ ca garbham ādarāt /
K14ratnml_u:3610: dakṣapārśvagataṃ satvaṃ matvā caivaṃ vyaciṃtayat // Rm_10.69{69} //
K14ratnml_u:3611: nūnaṃ me jāyate garbhe satvo buddhānubhāvataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:3612: yad ayaṃ dakṣiṇe vartti tena putro bhavet khalu // Rm_10.70{70} //
K14ratnml_u:3613: iti niścitya sā nārī putrotpatyāśayā mudā /
K14ratnml_u:3614: svasvāmino pure sthitvā rahasyaivaṃ nyavedayat // Rm_10.71{71} //
K14ratnml_u:3615: dṛṣṭyāryyaputra varddhasva yad ahaṃ garbhiṇī bhave /
K14ratnml_u:3616: nūnam ayaṃ bhavet putro yat sthito dakṣiṇodare // Rm_10.72{72} //
K14ratnml_u:3617: iti bhāryoditaṃ śrutvā sa gṛhasthaḥ pramoditaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:3618: daksiṇaṃ vāhum unnamya nandann evam udānayat // Rm_10.73{73} //
K14ratnml_u:3620: jātaḥ syān nāmajātā me kulavaṃśasthitir bhavet // Rm_10.74{74} //
K14ratnml_u:3621: kṛtyāni ca prakurvīta bibhṛyād bharaṇaṃ prati /
K14ratnml_u:3623: yad asmākaṃ kṛtaṃ pūrvaṃ karma dānādikaṃ śubhaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:3624: etat puṇyānubhāvena bhavet kuśalam etayoḥ // Rm_10.76{76} //
K14ratnml_u:3625: tatas tena sadā bharttā saha saṃmodacāriṇī /
K14ratnml_u:3627: tataḥ sā samaye sūta putraṃ divyātisuṃdaraṃ /
K14ratnml_u:3631: tataḥ sā jananī tasya vālakasya karadvayaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:3635: sakhībhir veditaṃ śrutvā vismito draṣṭum āyayau // Rm_10.81{81} //
K14ratnml_u:3637: darśayitvā sutaṃ putraṃ śaṃkitaivaṃ nyavedayat // Rm_10.82{82} //
K14ratnml_u:3638: svāmiṃ paśya mahāścaryyam asya hemānvitau karau /
K14ratnml_u:3639: tac chubhaṃ vāpy aśubhaṃ vā darśayitvā vicāraya // Rm_10.83{83} //
K14ratnml_u:3640: iti bhāryyoditaṃ śrutvā dṛṣṭvā taṃ vālakaṃ ciraṃ /
K14ratnml_u:3641: dīnāraṃ bhujayoḥ paśyaṃ tasthau savismayānvitaḥ // Rm_10.84{84} //
K14ratnml_u:3642: tatas tasya gṛhastho 'sau nimittaṃ jñātum ādarāt /
K14ratnml_u:3643: naimittikaṃ samāhūya dārakaṃ tam adarśayat // Rm_10.85{86} //
K14ratnml_u:3645: tan nimittaṃ parijñāya tat phalaṃ vaktum arhatha // Rm_10.86{86} //
K14ratnml_u:3646: ity ukte tena te sarve dṛṣṭvā taṃ dārakaṃ śubhaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:3647: dīnāre bhujayoś cāpi parijñāyaivam abravīt // Rm_10.87{87} //
K14ratnml_u:3648: sādho gṛhapate hy asya dārakasya karadvayaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:3649: suvarṇalakṣaṇopetaṃ tat te bhadraṃ bhavet khalu // Rm_10.88{88} //
K14ratnml_u:3650: tavāyaṃ dārako dātā maheśākhyo bhavet kila /
K14ratnml_u:3652: apanīya svayaṃ hastād idaṃ dīnāram arpayet /
K14ratnml_u:3653: apanīte punar anyat prādur bhavet tato 'dhikaṃ // Rm_10.90{90} //
K14ratnml_u:3654: ity evaṃ taiḥ samādiṣṭaṃ śrutvā saṃharṣito gṛhī /
K14ratnml_u:3655: tato jātimahaṃ kṛtvā jñātīn evam abhāṣata // Rm_10.91{91} //
K14ratnml_u:3658: iti tenārthitaṃ śrutvā sarve te jñātayas tathā /
K14ratnml_u:3659: dṛṣṭvā tasya nimittāni saṃmatenaivam abruvan // Rm_10.93{93} //
K14ratnml_u:3661: tan nāmnā prasiddho 'stu hiraṇyapāṇir ity ayaṃ // Rm_10.94{94} //
K14ratnml_u:3663: tatheti tasya putrasya cakre nāmavyavasthitaṃ // Rm_10.95{95} //
K14ratnml_u:3665: aṣṭāsu yo 'pi dhātrīṣu tena pitrā samarpitaḥ // Rm_10.96{96} //
K14ratnml_u:3667: varddhito 'bhūt kramād āśu hradastham iva paṃkajaṃ // Rm_10.97{97} //
K14ratnml_u:3671: tataḥ sa śikṣituṃ vidyāḥ sadguruṃ samupāśrayat /
K14ratnml_u:3672: kramāt teṣāṃ prasādāc ca vidyāpāraṃ yayau laghuḥ // Rm_10.99{99} //
K14ratnml_u:3674: svahastaṃ saṃprasāryyaiva dadau dānaṃ yathepsitaṃ // Rm_10.100{100} //
K14ratnml_u:3675: gurubhyo brāhmaṇebhyaś ca yācakebhyaḥ sa dārakaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:3676: svahastaṃ saṃprasāryyaiva dadau hemaṃ yathepsitaṃ // Rm_10.101{1} //
K14ratnml_u:3678: arthino dhanalubdhāś ca saṃpratīyuḥ samaṃtataḥ // Rm_10.102{2} //
K14ratnml_u:3681: tadā hiraṇyapāṇiḥ sa dṛṣṭvaitān arthino mudā /
K14ratnml_u:3682: sarvopakaraṇaiś cāpi sarvāṃs tān samatoṣayat // Rm_10.104{4} //
K14ratnml_u:3683: tatas te yācakāḥ sarve tenaiva paritarpitāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:3684: yathechayā sukhaṃ bhuktvā pracerur dharmamānasā // Rm_10.105{5} //
K14ratnml_u:3685: tathā vīthigataś caivaṃ hastadvayaṃ prasārya saḥ /
K14ratnml_u:3686: hemarāśiṃ samutthāpya sarvebhyaḥ pradadau mudā // Rm_10.106{6} //
K14ratnml_u:3687: tathā sarve 'pi te lokā dhanāḍhyāḥ sukhino 'bhavan /
K14ratnml_u:3688: naiko 'bhūt kṛpano duḥkhī no 'pi kaścid daridritaḥ // Rm_10.107{7} //
K14ratnml_u:3691: tadā tasyaiva tat kīrttiḥ sarvatra bhuvaneṣv api /
K14ratnml_u:3694: tad yaśaḥ pratilabdhaṃ sa manasaivaṃ vyacintayat // Rm_10.110{10} //
K14ratnml_u:3695: yad asya bhujayor hema cintāmaṇisamaṃ khalu /
K14ratnml_u:3698: tad ahaṃ prārthanāṃ kṛtvā pratigṛhṇīya tat maṇiṃ // Rm_10.112{12} //
K14ratnml_u:3699: ity asau manasā dhyatvā lobhākṛṣṭo tvarānvitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:3701: taṃ hiraṇyabhujaṃ pretya tad dīnāraṃ samayācata // Rm_10.113{13} //
K14ratnml_u:3702: jayo 'stu te sadā sādho dīrghāyuś ca sumaṃgalaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:3703: tathaiva tvaṃ sadā bhūyā arthināṃ kalpapādapaḥ // Rm_10.114{14} //
K14ratnml_u:3705: tadarthaṃ pūrayitvā me cittaṃ harṣaya sarvataḥ // Rm_10.115{15} //
K14ratnml_u:3707: dṛṣṭvā hiraṇyapāṇiḥ sa taṃ vipraṃ pratyabhāṣata // Rm_10.116{16} //
K14ratnml_u:3708: sādhu vipra prasīda tvaṃ yadarthaṃ samupāgataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:3709: tadarthaṃ saṃpradatvādya harṣayiṣyāmi te manaḥ // Rm_10.117{17} //
K14ratnml_u:3710: tac chaṃkā mā kṛthā hy atra yad yat te hṛdi rocate /
K14ratnml_u:3711: tat tan nūnaṃ pradāsye te tad vadasva yad īhitaṃ // Rm_10.118{18} //
K14ratnml_u:3713: svastīty āśīrvaco datvā tad dīnāram ayācata // Rm_10.119{19} //
K14ratnml_u:3715: tad dīnāraṃ pradatvā me cittaṃ saṃharṣayārthadaḥ // Rm_10.120{20} //
K14ratnml_u:3716: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā tat pitāsau suvismitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:3717: savandhujñātimitras taṃ putram evam abhāṣata // Rm_10.121{21} //
K14ratnml_u:3718: śṛṇu putra mayā proktaṃ tavaiva hitakāraṇaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:3719: yadi te svāminī prītis tat karttavyaṃ hi sarvathā // Rm_10.122{22} //
K14ratnml_u:3720: tvaṃ hi putra mayā labdhaḥ saṃbuddhasyānubhāvataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:3721: tat saṃbuddhaśāsane kāryyam eva dātu samarhasi // Rm_10.123{23} //
K14ratnml_u:3722: yac cedan bhujayor jātaṃ dīnāraṃ maṇisaṃnibhaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:3723: tad api sugatasyaiva prabhāvān manyatāṃ khalu // Rm_10.124{24} //
K14ratnml_u:3724: yac cedaṃ te karodbhūtaṃ jīvitaṃ sahajendriyaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:3725: tat svakarāt samuddhṛtya kathaṃ dadyā dvijātaye // Rm_10.125{25} //
K14ratnml_u:3726: yadīdaṃ dāsyate hastāt samuddhṛtya valād api /
K14ratnml_u:3727: tadā te jīvitaṃ vāpi sahānena vrajaṃ khalu // Rm_10.126{26} //
K14ratnml_u:3728: tasmād evaṃ parijñāya yadi te jīvita priyaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:3729: tad evaṃ sahajaṃ hema mā pradāhi dvijātaye // Rm_10.127{27} //
K14ratnml_u:3730: tad anyad dīyatāṃ tasmai yad yad vastu samīchitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:3731: idaṃ tu sarvathānyasmai dātavyaṃ naiva yatnataḥ // Rm_10.128{28} //
K14ratnml_u:3733: tena yadā paribhraṣṭas tadā kiṃ tena manyase // Rm_10.129{29} //
K14ratnml_u:3734: yenāpi ca tvayā sarve yācakāḥ saṃpratarpitāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:3736: tac cintāmaṇisāmānyaṃ kathaṃ dātuṃ samichasi // Rm_10.130{30} //
K14ratnml_u:3737: yat tvayā sukṛtaṃ karma prakṛtvā puṇyam ācitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:3738: nūnaṃ tasya vipākatvaṃ bhuṃjayos te pratiṣṭhitaṃ // Rm_10.131{31} //
K14ratnml_u:3739: tasmād idaṃ mahāratnaṃ kasmiñcin mā pradīyatāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:3740: datvā tv idaṃ mahāratnaṃ kim anyal labdham ichasi // Rm_10.132{32} //
K14ratnml_u:3741: yadi tv idaṃ mahāratnaṃ dātum evaṃ pratiṣṭhitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:3742: saṃpradehi jinendrāya tat puṇyam akṣayaṃ vahuṃ // Rm_10.133{33} //
K14ratnml_u:3744: puṇyena dīyate kīrttiṃ nirvṛtiṃ ca samāpnuyāt // Rm_10.134{34} //
K14ratnml_u:3745: yadi puṇye 'sti te vāṃchā tad buddhaśaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:3746: dehi buddhānuśāsinyā tad dānaṃ hi mahatphalaṃ // Rm_10.135{35} //
K14ratnml_u:3747: tato nityaṃ sukhaṃ bhuktvā kṛtvā saṃbodhisādhanaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:3748: kramād bodhicariṃ prāpte nirvṛtiṃ vā samāpnuyāḥ // Rm_10.136{36} //
K14ratnml_u:3749: iti pitrā samādiṣṭaṃ śrutvāsau hemabhṛt sudhīḥ /
K14ratnml_u:3750: tatheti niścayaṃ kṛtvā punar evam abhāṣata // Rm_10.137{37} //
K14ratnml_u:3751: satyaṃ tāta tvayādiṣṭaṃ tat sarvaṃ hitam eva me /
K14ratnml_u:3752: tasmāt tathā cariṣyāmi tvadājñāṃ śirasā vahan // Rm_10.138{38} //
K14ratnml_u:3753: kiṃ tu satyaṃ mayā proktām idaṃ dātuṃ dvijātaye /
K14ratnml_u:3754: tat katham anyathā kṛtvā puṇyam eva samāpnuyāt // Rm_10.139{39} //
K14ratnml_u:3755: tat satyaṃ pūraṇe tāta pradadyāmi mamātmanaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:3756: atha na dāsyate hy atra kiyat kālaṃ hi jīvitaṃ // Rm_10.140{40} //
K14ratnml_u:3758: tathaivaṃ sahajīvena vinakṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // Rm_10.141{41} //
K14ratnml_u:3760: tathaivaṃ saṃpradatvāsmai punaḥ prāpsyāmi te 'dhikaṃ // Rm_10.142{42} //
K14ratnml_u:3762: tathā satyānubhāvena punar anyaj janiṣyate // Rm_10.143{43} //
K14ratnml_u:3763: dharmeṇa tuṣyate buddho mūlaṃ dharmasya satyavāk /
K14ratnml_u:3764: tat satyapāraṇārthena dāsyāmy aham idaṃ maṇiṃ // Rm_10.144{44} //
K14ratnml_u:3765: satyaṃ vinā na phullante puṇyāni prakṛtāny api /
K14ratnml_u:3767: satyena varddhate dharmaṃ dharmeṇa pālyate naraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:3768: dharmiṣṭhaḥ sadgatiṃ yāti tasmāt satyaṃ mahadvalī // Rm_10.146{46} //
K14ratnml_u:3770: sarvathāsmai pradāsyāmi mā kṛthās taṃ nivāraṇaṃ // Rm_10.147{47} //
K14ratnml_u:3772: iti putravacaḥ śrutvā pitā sa vismayānvitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:3773: tathety abhyanumoditvā tasthau tūṣṇī vilokayan // Rm_10.148{48} //
K14ratnml_u:3775: tad dīnāraṃ sahasotkṛtya viprāya pradadau mudā // Rm_10.149{49} //
K14ratnml_u:3776: tat pradattam asau vipraḥ pratigṛhya pramoditaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:3777: datvāśīrvacanaṃ tasmai svagṛhaṃ sahasā yayau // Rm_10.150{50} //
K14ratnml_u:3781: dṛṣṭvā śrutvā ca sarve te lokā āśu suvismitāḥ // Rm_10.152{52} //
K14ratnml_u:3782: tato hiraṇyapāṇiḥ sa evaṃ lokān praharṣayan /
K14ratnml_u:3785: saṃbuddhaṃ sugataṃ draṣṭuṃ vihāraṃ samupāviśat // Rm_10.154{54} //
K14ratnml_u:3791: natvā pādau munes tasya purastāt samupāśrayan // Rm_10.157{57} //
K14ratnml_u:3796: bhadanta dātum ichāmi saṃghebhyo bhojanaṃ khalu /
K14ratnml_u:3797: tad ājñāṃ dehi me śāsta yadi te 'sti kṛpā mayi // Rm_10.160{60} //
K14ratnml_u:3799: sa ānaṃdaḥ samālokya dārakaṃ taṃ samādiśat // Rm_10.161{61} //
K14ratnml_u:3800: sādhu vatsa mahābhāgyād bhadram ālocitaṃ tvayā /
K14ratnml_u:3801: yady atra dāsyate bhojyaṃ kārṣāpaṇaṃ pradīyatāṃ // Rm_10.162{62} //
K14ratnml_u:3802: evaṃkṛte tu te vatsa maṃgalaṃ sarvadā bhavet /
K14ratnml_u:3803: ataś ca durgatiṃ hitvā sadgatiṃ samavāpnuyāḥ // Rm_10.163{63} //
K14ratnml_u:3805: svayaṃ hastau prasāryyaiva hemarāśiṃ vyadhāt punaḥ // Rm_10.164{64} //
K14ratnml_u:3806: tāṃ dṛṣṭvā bhikṣavaḥ sarve vismitāḥ saṃpraharṣitāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:3808: taddravyaiḥ sādhayāmāsa bhojyāni surasāni ca // Rm_10.165{65} //
K14ratnml_u:3809: tataḥ sa dārako bhojyais taiḥ praṇītasusādhitaiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:3812: sarvasaṃghaṃ praṇamyaivaṃ punas tasthau kṛtāṃjaliḥ // Rm_10.167{67} //
K14ratnml_u:3814: āryyasatyaṃ samāyuktaṃ dideśa dharmam uttamaṃ // Rm_10.168{68} //
K14ratnml_u:3818: saṃbuddhasagaṇaṃ natvā svagehaṃ harṣito yayau // Rm_10.170{70} //
K14ratnml_u:3819: tatra sarvaṃ sa tadvṛttaṃ pitror ākhyāya harṣitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:3822: tad anujñāṃ pradattaṃ me hitaṃ mayi yadīcchatha // Rm_10.172{72} //
K14ratnml_u:3823: iti putroditaṃ śrutvā svātmajaṃ sa pitāvadat /
K14ratnml_u:3824: mā kṛthā sahasā putra pravrajyācaraṇe manaḥ // Rm_10.173{73} //
K14ratnml_u:3826: tvaṃ vṛddhimān mahādātā tat pravrajyāṃ kutaś careḥ // Rm_10.174{74} //
K14ratnml_u:3827: kiṃ vāpyate vivāhas tvaṃ daharaś ca kumārikaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:3828: pravrajyā duṣkaraṃ sthānaṃ tat kathaṃ pracaret sutaḥ // Rm_10.175{75} //
K14ratnml_u:3829: tat tāvat tvaṃ yuvā putra vivāhitvā kulastriyaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:3830: bhuktvā saukhyaṃ yathākāmaṃ gṛhe dharmaṃ samācara // Rm_10.176{76} //
K14ratnml_u:3832: kuladharmaṃ pratisthāpya tataḥ pravraja vārddhikaḥ // Rm_10.177{77} //
K14ratnml_u:3833: yadā vṛddho daridraś ca pravrajyāṃ hi tadā caret /
K14ratnml_u:3834: yāvad yuvā samṛddhaś ca tāvat tvaṃ pravraja kathaṃ // Rm_10.178{78} //
K14ratnml_u:3836: tadetadā kathaṃ putra pravrajyāvratam ācareḥ // Rm_10.179{79} //
K14ratnml_u:3837: ity etad duṣkaraṃ matvā pravrajyācaraṇe manaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:3838: sarvathā tvaṃ vinirvārya kuladharmaṃ samācara // Rm_10.180{80} //
K14ratnml_u:3839: tatas te maṃgalaṃ nityaṃ imu putra bhaved dhruvaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:3843: bodhayan pitaraṃ dharme punar evam abhāṣata // Rm_10.182{82} //
