K14ratnml_u:3844: satyam eva tathā tāta yad etad bhāṣyate tvayā /
K14ratnml_u:3845: tathāpi śrūyatāṃ tāta yad abhiprāyakaṃ mama // Rm_10.183{83} //
K14ratnml_u:3846: anityaṃ khalu saṃsāraṃ jīvitaṃ cāpi bhaṃguraṃ /
K14ratnml_u:3847: kṣaṇadhvaṃsi śarīraṃ ca kṣaṇasaṃpad ghanopamaṃ // Rm_10.184{84} //
K14ratnml_u:3849: pravrajyāvratam āśritya prāptum ichāmi nirvṛtiṃ // Rm_10.185{85} //
K14ratnml_u:3850: api ca dullabhaṃ janma mānuṣaṃ bhavacāriṇāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:3851: sarveṣām api jantūnāṃ maraṇaṃ sarvathā dhruvaṃ // Rm_10.186{86} //
K14ratnml_u:3853: vinā dharmānubhāvena kathaṃ sadgatim āpnuyāt // Rm_10.187{87} //
K14ratnml_u:3854: saṃbuddho 'pi sasaṃgho 'yaṃ sthāsyati na sadeha ca /
K14ratnml_u:3855: anyatrāpi vrajen nūnaṃ nirvṛtiṃ vā gamiṣyati // Rm_10.188{88} //
K14ratnml_u:3859: sarvalokāś ca kāmāṃdhā bhaveyuḥ kleśamāninaḥ // Rm_10.190{90} //
K14ratnml_u:3860: tada dharmānusaṃvṛttau matiḥ kasyāpi no caret /
K14ratnml_u:3861: pravrajyāsaṃvaraṃ dhartuṃ kaḥ samartho bhaviṣyati // Rm_10.191{91} //
K14ratnml_u:3863: aviśodhitacittātmā na yāyāt paramāṃ gatiṃ // Rm_10.192{92} //
K14ratnml_u:3865: pravrajyāsaṃvaraṃ dharttuṃ ichāmi tāta sāṃprataṃ // Rm_10.193{93} //
K14ratnml_u:3866: tad yadi me hitaṃ draṣṭum ichasi tāta sarvadā /
K14ratnml_u:3867: tad anujñāṃ samādātum arhasi mātra cāraye // Rm_10.194{94} //
K14ratnml_u:3868: iti puroditaṃ śrutvā pitā sa paribodhitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:3870: tadā tajjananī cāsau dṛṣṭvā taṃ sutam ātmajaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:3871: snehād aśru vimocantī nivārayitum abravīt // Rm_10.196{96} //
K14ratnml_u:3872: hā putra katham ekānte māṃ vihāya kva yāsyase /
K14ratnml_u:3873: mā putra sahasā gacha kiṃcit kālaṃ vinodaya // Rm_10.197{97} //
K14ratnml_u:3874: yāvaj jīvāmy ahaṃ tāta tāvan mā gāḥ kuhāpi ca /
K14ratnml_u:3876: mṛtāyāṃ mayi bho putra tadā vrajasva vāṃchite // Rm_10.198{98} //
K14ratnml_u:3877: acireṇaiva māṃ mṛtyur grahīṣyati na saṃśayaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:3878: tāvad eva gṛhe sthitvā dānaṃ kurvan sukhaṃ vasa // Rm_10.199{99} //
K14ratnml_u:3880: natvā tāṃ jananīm evaṃ bodhayitum abhāṣata // Rm_10.200{100} //
K14ratnml_u:3881: yat tvayāmve rudanty evaṃ mṛtyunāma prakīrtitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:3882: tena me coditaṃ cittaṃ pravrajyāvratasādhane // Rm_10.201{1} //
K14ratnml_u:3883: dhruvaṃ janmavatāṃ mṛtyur mṛtānāṃ janma ca dhruvaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:3884: parivarttini saṃsāre mṛtaḥ ko hi na jāyate // Rm_10.202{2} //
K14ratnml_u:3885: dharmiṣṭho vīryāvāṃś cāpi maraṇaṃ yāti sarvataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:3886: pāpiṣṭho nighnitaś cāpi maraṇaṃ yāti sarvataḥ // Rm_10.203{3} //
K14ratnml_u:3887: dharmiṣṭhaḥ satsukhaṃ bhuktvā mṛto yāty eva sadgatiṃ /
K14ratnml_u:3888: pāpiṣṭho duḥkhatāṃ bhuktvā mṛto gachati durgatiṃ // Rm_10.204{4} //
K14ratnml_u:3890: tadā saṃtyajyate sarvair vaṃdhumitrajanair api // Rm_10.205{5} //
K14ratnml_u:3891: tadā na vidyate ko 'pi hitakārī sahānugaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:3892: dharma ekaḥ sahāyaḥ syāt sarvatrāpi hitārthakṛt // Rm_10.206{6} //
K14ratnml_u:3893: tasmāt mātaḥ prayatnena karttavyaṃ dharmam ādarāt /
K14ratnml_u:3894: dharmeṇa rakṣyate sarva ihāmutra sahāpi hi // Rm_10.207{7} //
K14ratnml_u:3896: dharmeṇa sudhṛtāḥ satvā nimagnā duḥkhasāgare // Rm_10.208{8} //
K14ratnml_u:3897: dharmeṇa jīyate duṣṭo dharmeṇa jīyate kaliḥ /
K14ratnml_u:3898: dharmeṇa jīyate rāgo mṛtyur dharmeṇa jīyate // Rm_10.209{9} //
K14ratnml_u:3899: dharmeṇa sukule janma lakṣmī dharmeṇa sthīyate /
K14ratnml_u:3900: vidyāyaśo 'rthamoksāś ca prāpyante dharmataḥ khalu // Rm_10.210{10} //
K14ratnml_u:3903: yam āśritya mahāsatvā jitvā kleśagaṇān laghuḥ /
K14ratnml_u:3904: sākṣād arhatpadaṃ prāpya vrajanti nirvṛtiṃ parāṃ // Rm_10.212{12} //
K14ratnml_u:3905: iti matvā hi te sarve bhikṣavo bhavanispṛhāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:3908: tad anujñāṃ pradatvā me nātra kāryo viṣāditaḥ // Rm_10.214{14} //
K14ratnml_u:3910: yadi na dīyate 'nujñā tad api no viyogataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:3911: akasmān mṛtyunā ghrāya grasiṣyati puro hi naḥ // Rm_10.215{15} //
K14ratnml_u:3912: tadā kiṃ te kariṣyāmi mamāpi kiṃ kariṣyasi /
K14ratnml_u:3913: kṛtvānuśocanāṃ caiva yāsyāmo maraṇaṃ dhruvaṃ // Rm_10.216{16} //
K14ratnml_u:3914: iti mātaḥ parijñāya tad anujñāṃ pradehi me /
K14ratnml_u:3915: viṣādaṃ mā kṛthā atra prasādīnī bhavet prabhu // Rm_10.217{17} //
K14ratnml_u:3916: tathā te maṃgalaṃ nityam ihāmutrāpi saṃbhavet /
K14ratnml_u:3917: ahaṃ ca saugataṃ dharmaṃ dhṛtvā nirvṛtim āpnuyāṃ // Rm_10.218{18} //
K14ratnml_u:3921: tayoś ca caraṇe natvā sahasā niryayau gṛhāt // Rm_10.220{20} //
K14ratnml_u:3925: āśu jetavanaṃ gatvā vihāraṃ samupāviśat // Rm_10.222{22} //
K14ratnml_u:3927: bhagavaṃtaṃ tam ānamya pravrajyāṃ samayācata // Rm_10.223{23} //
K14ratnml_u:3928: namas te bhagavac chāsta bhavatāṃ caraṇaṃ vraje /
K14ratnml_u:3929: tat pravrajyāvrataṃ datvā brahmacaryaṃ pradehi me // Rm_10.224{24} //
K14ratnml_u:3931: ehi bhikṣo kumāra tvaṃ brahmacaryaṃ carehi sa // Rm_10.225{25} //
K14ratnml_u:3932: iti prokto munīndro 'sau pāṇinā tac chiraḥ spṛśan /
K14ratnml_u:3937: vyāyacchad ghaṭamānaś ca samādhiṣu samāhitaḥ // Rm_10.228{28} //
K14ratnml_u:3938: tad idaṃ paṃcagaṃdaṃ ca bhavacakraṃ calācalaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:3940: bhiṃdan sarvam avidyāṅgaṃ prāpya vidyāḥ śubhaṃkarāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:3949: pūjyo mānyo 'bhivaṃdyaś ca babhūva sa hiraṇyabhṛt /
K14ratnml_u:3950: tatas te bhikṣavaḥ sarve dṛṣṭvā taṃ dārakaṃ yatiṃ // Rm_10.234{34} //
K14ratnml_u:3951: vismitāḥ śrīghanaṃ natvā paprachus tasya karmatāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:3952: bhagavan kena dharmeṇa hiraṇyapāṇir ayaṃ sudhīḥ // Rm_10.235{35} //
K14ratnml_u:3953: sarvārthino hi saṃtarpya sākṣād arhan bhavaty api /
K14ratnml_u:3954: iti tair bhikṣubhiḥ pṛṣṭe bhagavān tān tathābravīt // Rm_10.236{36} //
K14ratnml_u:3956: anena yat kṛtaṃ karma tan mayā kathyate 'dhunā // Rm_10.237{37} //
K14ratnml_u:3960: bodhicaryāṃ samādiśya kṛtvā dharmamayaṃ jagat // Rm_10.239{39} //
K14ratnml_u:3962: tadā rājā kṛkī nāma matvā taṃ nirvṛtiṃ gataṃ // Rm_10.240{40} //
K14ratnml_u:3964: tatas taddhāturatnāni garbha āropya sādarāt // Rm_10.241{41} //
K14ratnml_u:3965: hemaratnamayaṃ stūpaṃ kārayām āsa sa prabhuḥ /
K14ratnml_u:3966: tat susiddhaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya sadvidhānair mahotsavaiḥ // Rm_10.242{42} //
K14ratnml_u:3967: mahaś cāpi tadā tatra sthāpayitvā bhajan nṛpaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:3970: tataḥ sa pādayor natvā praṇidhānaṃ vyadhāt tathā // Rm_10.244{44} //
K14ratnml_u:3972: yat puṇyaṃ ca vipākena jāyeyaṃ sukule sadā // Rm_10.245{45} //
K14ratnml_u:3974: evaṃvidhaṃ ca śāstāram ārogya samupāśritaḥ // Rm_10.246{46} //
K14ratnml_u:3975: etad dharmaṃ samāsādya prāpnuyāṃ paramāṃ gatiṃ /
K14ratnml_u:3977: hiraṇyapāṇir ayaṃ dātā bhavaty arhaṃ sa sāṃprataṃ /
K14ratnml_u:3978: evaṃ sarve 'pi saṃsāre bhuṃjate karmajaṃ phalaṃ // Rm_10.248{48} //
K14ratnml_u:3980: yenaivaṃ yat kṛtaṃ karma tenaiva bhuṃjyate phalaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:3981: abhuktaṃ kṣīyate naiva karma kvāpi kadā cana // Rm_10.249{49} //
K14ratnml_u:3982: śubhaṃ vāpy aśubhaṃ vāpi bhuktaṃ tu kṣīyate khalu /
K14ratnml_u:3983: nāgnibhir dahyate karma klidyate nodakair api // Rm_10.250{50} //
K14ratnml_u:3984: vāyubhiḥ śuṣyate nāpi bhūmiṣu kṣīyate na hi /
K14ratnml_u:3985: anyathāpi bhaven naiva saṃsāre karmaṇo gatiḥ // Rm_10.251{51} //
K14ratnml_u:3986: śubhasya śubhataiva syāt kṛṣṇasya kṛṣṇataiva hi /
K14ratnml_u:3987: miśrasya miśritaiva syād anyathā na sadā bhavet // Rm_10.252{52} //
K14ratnml_u:3988: evaṃ matvātha saṃsāre caritavyaṃ sadā śubhaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:3989: na praṇasyaṃti karmāṇi kalpakoṭiśatair api // Rm_10.253{53} //
K14ratnml_u:3990: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti prāṇināṃ khalu /
K14ratnml_u:3991: ity asau bhagavān buddhaḥ satkarmadeśanāmataiḥ // Rm_10.254{54} //
K14ratnml_u:3992: tarpayan sa kalāṃl lokān tato viśrāntam ādadhau /
K14ratnml_u:3993: iti śāstroditaṃ śrutvā sarve te bhikṣusāṃghikāḥ // Rm_10.255{55} //
K14ratnml_u:3994: śubheṣv eva sadā nityaṃ saṃpraceruḥ samāhitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:3995: mahārāja tvayāpy evaṃ caritavyaṃ śubhe sadā // Rm_10.256{56} //
K14ratnml_u:3996: bodhayitvā prajāñ caivaṃ sthāpanīyāḥ śubhe sadā /
K14ratnml_u:3997: tatas te maṃgalaṃ nityaṃ sarvatrāpi bhavet khalu /
K14ratnml_u:3998: kramād bodhicarīṃ prāpya saṃbodhipadam āpuṇyāḥ // Rm_10.257{57} //
K14ratnml_u:3999: iti tena samādiṣṭaṃ śrutvā sa nṛpatīśvaraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4001: śṛṇvanti ye śrāvayantīha yaś ca hiraṇyapāṇer avadānam etat /
K14ratnml_u:4002: te kleśamuktāḥ sugatānubhaktāḥ prayānti nūnaṃ sugatālayeṣu // Rm_10.259{59} //
K14ratnml_u:4007: upaguptaṃ guruṃ natvā bhūyo 'py evam abhāṣata // Rm_11.1{1} //
K14ratnml_u:4008: bhadanta śrotum ichāmi punar anyat subhāṣitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:4009: yathā te guruṇākhyātaṃ tathā me vaktum arhasi // Rm_11.2{2} //
K14ratnml_u:4011: upagupto mahābhijñas taṃ nṛpaṃ pratyabhāṣata // Rm_11.3{3} //
K14ratnml_u:4012: śṛṇu rājan mahābhāga yathā me guruṇoditaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:4013: tathāhaṃ te pravakṣyāmi tad anumodanāṃ kuru // Rm_11.4{4} //
K14ratnml_u:4018: bhikṣubhiḥ śrāvakaiḥ sārddhaṃ upāsakaiś ca cailakaiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4019: bodhisatvair mahāsatvais tadanyaiś ca maharṣibhiḥ // Rm_11.7{7} //
K14ratnml_u:4021: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pātuṃ prayayur bodhikāminaḥ // Rm_11.8{8} //
K14ratnml_u:4023: brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyāḥ śūdrāś ca maṃtriṇo janāḥ // Rm_11.9{9} //
K14ratnml_u:4024: amātyāḥ sādhavaḥ paurā dhaninaś ca mahājanāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4025: vaṇijaḥ sārthavāhāś ca tathānye sarvajātikāḥ // Rm_11.10{10} //
K14ratnml_u:4027: taṃ buddhaṃ sugataṃ nāthaṃ pūjayitvā samaṃtataḥ // Rm_11.11{11} //
K14ratnml_u:4030: athāsau bhagavān dṛṣṭvā tān sarvān samupasthitān /
K14ratnml_u:4035: āsīd gṛhapatiḥ prāḍhyaḥ kuveravat samṛddhimān // Rm_11.15{15} //
K14ratnml_u:4041: tasyāsau ramaṇī bhāryā saṃvṛttā garbhiṇī satī /
K14ratnml_u:4042: asūta samaye putraṃ prāsādikaṃ manoharaṃ // Rm_11.18{18} //
K14ratnml_u:4043: sa ca jātismaro vālo jātamātraḥ svakau bhujau /
K14ratnml_u:4045: aho vatādya me hastau sucireṇa samudbhavau /
K14ratnml_u:4046: aho labdhāv imau hastau sucireṇa mayādhunā // Rm_11.20{20} //
K14ratnml_u:4048: dṛṣṭvā śrutvā ca sā mātā trāsitā vismitābhavat // Rm_11.21{21} //
K14ratnml_u:4049: kim etad iti saṃtrastā dṛṣṭvā taṃ dārakaṃ mudā /
K14ratnml_u:4050: bharttāraṃ sahasāhūya agram enam adarśayat // Rm_11.22{22} //
K14ratnml_u:4051: tadāsau dārakaś cāpi dṛṣṭvā taṃ janakaṃ mudā /
K14ratnml_u:4052: hastau dṛṣṭvā tathāliṃgya cuṃvayitvā caivam abravīt // Rm_11.23{23} //
K14ratnml_u:4053: aho vatādya me hastau sucireṇa samudbhavau /
K14ratnml_u:4054: aho labdhāv imau hastau sucireṇa mayādhunā // Rm_11.24{24} //
K14ratnml_u:4055: iti saṃdarśayaṃ hastāv evaṃ cāpy avadac chiśuḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4056: dārako 'sau punaḥ supto nidrāṃ bheje yad ichayā // Rm_11.25{25} //
K14ratnml_u:4057: tato 'sau janako 'py etad dṛṣṭvā śrutvā pravismitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4058: kiṃ etad iti sāśaṃkā jñātin āhūya cābravīt /
K14ratnml_u:4060: tan nimittaṃ nirīkṣyaitat satyaṃ me vaktum arhatha /
K14ratnml_u:4061: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā sarve te jñātayo mudā /
K14ratnml_u:4062: tat putraṃ dārakaṃ draṣṭuṃ tat koṣṭhaṃ samupādiśat /
K14ratnml_u:4063: tathāsau dārakaś caivaṃ tān dṛṣṭvā samupasthitān /
K14ratnml_u:4065: aho vatādya me hastau sucireṇa mayādhunā /
K14ratnml_u:4066: bhavanto 'rhatsu mā cittaṃ dūṣayata kadā cana /
K14ratnml_u:4067: kharāṃ vācaṃ ca mārhatsu niścārayata sarvadā /
K14ratnml_u:4068: evaṃ saṃdarśayaṃ hastau vacanaṃ saṃvadaṃ śiśuḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4069: dārako 'sau punaḥ supto nidrāṃ bheje yad ichayā /
K14ratnml_u:4070: etat te jñātayo dṛṣṭvā śrutvā sarve 'pi vismitāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4071: kim etad iti bhāṣanto vabhūvuḥ parisaṃkitāḥ // Rm_11.26{26} //
K14ratnml_u:4072: tatas te jñātayaḥ sarve vijñāya tasya lakṣaṇaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:4073: saṃmīlya tam upāmaṃtrya gṛhasthaḥ pratiharṣitaḥ // Rm_11.27{27} //
K14ratnml_u:4074: tasya jātimahaṃ kṛtvā punar evam avocata /
K14ratnml_u:4078: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā sarve te jñātayas tataḥ // Rm_11.29{29} //
K14ratnml_u:4079: saṃmīlya saṃmataṃ kṛtvā taṃ gṛhasthaṃ samabruvan /
K14ratnml_u:4080: yad ayaṃ te suto vālo jātamātraḥ svakau bhujau // Rm_11.30{30} //
K14ratnml_u:4081: paśyan āliṃgyā cuṃvitva mudā caivaṃ prabhāṣate /
K14ratnml_u:4082: tad ayaṃ dārako nāmnā hastaka iti viśrutaḥ // Rm_11.31{31} //
K14ratnml_u:4085: tena nāmnā prasiddhena prathayām āsa taṃ sutaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:4088: tatas tāsāṃ prayatnaiḥ sa pathyopacāraṇaiḥ kramāt /
K14ratnml_u:4089: dine dine pravṛddho 'bhūd hradastham iva paṃkajaṃ // Rm_11.34{34} //
K14ratnml_u:4090: evaṃ sa hastakas tābhiḥ pālyamānaḥ pravarddhitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4091: kumāraḥ sakhibhiḥ sārddhaṃ krīḍāsthānaṃ gato 'ramat // Rm_11.35{35} //
K14ratnml_u:4092: tatra teṣāṃ sakhīnāṃ ca hastako 'sau puraḥsthitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4093: hastāv āliṃgya saṃrakṣya cuṃvitvaivam abhāṣata // Rm_11.36{36} //
K14ratnml_u:4094: aho vatādya me hastau sucireṇa samudbhavau /
K14ratnml_u:4095: aho labdhāv imau hastau sucireṇa mayādhunā // Rm_11.37{37} //
K14ratnml_u:4097: kharāṃ vācaṃ ca mārhatsu niścārayata keṣu cit // Rm_11.38{38} //
K14ratnml_u:4098: iti saṃrakṣitau hastau tenaivaṃ ca prabhāṣitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:4101: guruṃ samyag upāśritya vidyāpāraṃ yayau laghu // Rm_11.40{40} //
K14ratnml_u:4102: tatra teṣāṃ guruṇāṃ ca hastako 'sau puraḥsthitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4103: hastau dṛṣṭvā samāliṃgya cuṃvitvā caivam abravīt // Rm_11.41{41} //
K14ratnml_u:4104: aho vatādya me hastau sucireṇa samudbhavau /
K14ratnml_u:4105: aho labdhav imau hastau sucireṇa mayādhunā // Rm_11.42{42} //
K14ratnml_u:4106: bhavanto 'rhatsu mā cittaṃ dūṣayata kadā cana /
K14ratnml_u:4107: kharāṃ vācaṃ ca mārhatsu niścārayata keṣu cit // Rm_11.43{43} //
K14ratnml_u:4108: iti dṛṣṭvā ca saṃśrutya sarve te guravo 'pi ca /
K14ratnml_u:4109: sarve śiṣya gaṇāś cāpi vabhūvur vismayānvitāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4110: yasmiṃś ca samaye tatra deśe bhayaupakrame /
K14ratnml_u:4113: tadāsau hastako 'py evaṃ samudbhrāntaḥ svakau bhujau /
K14ratnml_u:4115: aho vatādya me hastau sucireṇa samudbhavau /
K14ratnml_u:4116: aho labdhāv imau hastau sucireṇa mayādhunā /
K14ratnml_u:4117: bhavanto 'rhatsu mā cittaṃ dūṣayata kadā cana /
K14ratnml_u:4118: kharāṃ vācaiva mārhatsu niścārayata keṣu cit /
K14ratnml_u:4119: evaṃ hastau susaṃrakṣya tenaivaṃ ca prabhāṣitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:4120: dṛṣṭvā śrutvā ca te sarve lokā āsan suvismitāḥ // Rm_11.44{44} //
K14ratnml_u:4128: pādau tasya muner natvā dharmaṃ śrotuṃ puro 'viśat // Rm_11.48{48} //
K14ratnml_u:4135: saṃbuddhasugataṃ natvā svagehaṃ sahasā yayau // Rm_11.52{52} //
K14ratnml_u:4139: tad anujñāṃ pradattaṃ me hitaṃ mayi yadīchatha // Rm_11.54{54} //
K14ratnml_u:4141: mā kṛthāḥ sahasā putra pravrajyāsādhane manaḥ // Rm_11.55{55} //
K14ratnml_u:4142: pravrajyā duṣkaraṃ sthānaṃ tad anyadvratam ācara /
K14ratnml_u:4145: kiṃcid duḥkhe 'nabhijñāya tat pravrajyāṃ careḥ kathaṃ // Rm_11.57{57} //
K14ratnml_u:4146: tad yāvad yauvanaṃ dehaṃ yāvat saṃpac ca te gṛhe /
K14ratnml_u:4147: tāvad gehe sukhaṃ bhuktvā gṛhī dharmaṃ samācara // Rm_11.58{58} //
K14ratnml_u:4148: yadā vṛddho daridro ca pravrajyāyāṃ tadā cara /
K14ratnml_u:4150: yāvad yuvā samṛddhaś ca tāvat tvaṃ pravrajeḥ kathaṃ // Rm_11.59{59} //
K14ratnml_u:4152: tad etasmiṃ kathaṃ putra pravrajyāvratam ācareḥ // Rm_11.60{60} //
K14ratnml_u:4153: ity etad duṣkaraṃ matvā pravrajyācaraṇe manaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4155: tatas te maṃgalaṃ nityam ihāmutrāpi sarvataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4157: iti vākyaṃ pituḥ śrutvā hastako 'sau viśaṃkitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4158: pitarau bodhayan dharme punar evam abhāṣata // Rm_11.63{63} //
K14ratnml_u:4159: satyam etat tathā tāta tvayaivaṃ satyam ucyate /
K14ratnml_u:4160: atrāpi śrūyatāṃ tāta mamābhiprāyam ucyatāṃ // Rm_11.64{64} //
K14ratnml_u:4161: anityaṃ khalu saṃsāraṃ jīvitaṃ cāpi caṃcaraṃ /
K14ratnml_u:4162: kṣaṇadhvaṃsi śarīraṃ ca saṃpac cāpi ghanopamā // Rm_11.65{65} //
K14ratnml_u:4164: pravrajyāvratam ādhāya prāptum ichāmi sadgatiṃ // Rm_11.66{66} //
K14ratnml_u:4165: api ca janma mānuṣyaṃ dullabhaṃ bhavacāriṇāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:4166: tatrāpi maraṇaṃ nityaṃ purataḥ sarvasaṃmukhaṃ // Rm_11.67{67} //
K14ratnml_u:4168: vinā dharmānucāreṇa sadgatiṃ katham āpnuyāṃ // Rm_11.68{68} //
K14ratnml_u:4170: ato 'nyatrāpi yāyād vā nirvṛtiṃ cāvrajet khalu // Rm_11.69{69} //
K14ratnml_u:4171: saṃbuddhe nirvṛtiṃ yāte saddharma lapsyate kutaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4174: sarve satvāś ca kāmārttā bhaveyuḥ kleśabhāginaḥ // Rm_11.71{71} //
K14ratnml_u:4175: tadā dharmānucāreṣu buddhiḥ kasya kathaṃ caret /
K14ratnml_u:4176: pravrajyāsaṃvaraṃ sthātuṃ kaḥ samartho bhavet tadā // Rm_11.72{72} //
K14ratnml_u:4177: na ca saṃśuddhyate cittaṃ pravrajyāsaṃvaraṃ vinā /
K14ratnml_u:4178: aviśodhitacitte hi naiva yāyāc chivāṃ gatiṃ // Rm_11.73{73} //
K14ratnml_u:4179: tac cittapariśuddhyarthaṃ nirvṛte ca yad āptaye /
K14ratnml_u:4180: pravrajyāvratam ādātum ichāmi tāta sāṃprataṃ // Rm_11.74{74} //
K14ratnml_u:4181: yad atra yadi me tāta hitaṃ kartuṃ samichasi /
K14ratnml_u:4182: pravrajyāsādhane 'nujñāṃ dātuṃ me prārhasi drutaṃ // Rm_11.75{75} //
K14ratnml_u:4185: tathety abhyanumoditvā tad anujñāṃ vyasṛjata // Rm_11.76{76} //
K14ratnml_u:4186: tac chrutvā jananī cāsau dṛṣṭvā taṃ putram ātmajaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:4188: hā putra katham ekānte māṃ vihāya kva yāsyasi /
K14ratnml_u:4189: sahasā putra mā kārṣī pravrajyācaritaṃ manaḥ // Rm_11.78{78} //
K14ratnml_u:4190: yāvaj jīvāmy ahaṃ jīva tāvan mā pravrajātmaje /
K14ratnml_u:4191: mṛtāyāṃ mayi putra tvaṃ pravrajasva yathechayā // Rm_11.79{79} //
K14ratnml_u:4192: acireṇa hi me mṛtyur bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4193: tāvad eva gṛhe dharmaṃ kurvan bhuktvā sukhaṃ vasa // Rm_11.80{80} //
K14ratnml_u:4194: iti mātur vacaḥ śrutvā putro 'sau paricoditaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4195: mātaraṃ tāṃ praṇatvaivaṃ bodhayitum abhāṣata // Rm_11.81{81} //
K14ratnml_u:4196: yat tvayāmve rudanty evaṃ mṛtyunāmātra kīrttyate /
K14ratnml_u:4197: tena me preritaṃ cittaṃ pravrajyāvratadhāraṇe // Rm_11.82{82} //
K14ratnml_u:4199: jāto na mriyate ko hi mṛtaḥ kaś ca na jāyate // Rm_11.83{83} //
K14ratnml_u:4200: gṛhastho dharmakṛc cāpi yāty evaṃ maraṇaṃ dhruvaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:4201: brahmacārī vanastho 'pi yāty evaṃ maraṇaṃ khalu // Rm_11.84{84} //
K14ratnml_u:4203: kṛcchreṇa sādhayan dharmaṃ mṛto yāti surālayaṃ // Rm_11.85{85} //
K14ratnml_u:4204: yāvad dharmaphalaṃ svarge tāvad bhuktvā sukhaṃ vaset /
K14ratnml_u:4205: tato dharmaphale hīne svargāc cyuto yated adhaḥ // Rm_11.86{86} //
K14ratnml_u:4207: vividhāni ca duḥkhāni bhuktvā jīvaṃ ciraṃ vaset // Rm_11.87{87} //
K14ratnml_u:4208: yāvan na jāyate tasya puṇyānumodanā matau /
K14ratnml_u:4209: tāvat karmajaduḥkhāni prabhuktvā narake caret // Rm_11.88{88} //
K14ratnml_u:4210: yadā tu jāyate tasya triratnasmaraṇe matiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4213: tadā taṃ sugataṃ dṛṣṭvā dharmākaraiḥ parispṛśet // Rm_11.90{90} //
K14ratnml_u:4216: tatrāpi yadi dharmeṣu caran nityam ataṃdritaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4217: kramād bodhicarīṃ prāpya prayāyāt paramāṃ gatiṃ // Rm_11.92{92} //
K14ratnml_u:4218: evaṃ māta gṛhastho hi kṛtvāpi dharmam ādarāt /
K14ratnml_u:4220: sukhaduḥkhāni saṃbhuktvā saṃsāre carate bhraman // Rm_11.93{93} //
K14ratnml_u:4224: tan mamātra tvayā māta naiva kāryā nivāraṇā // Rm_11.95{95} //
K14ratnml_u:4225: yadi puṇye 'sti te vāṃchā tad anujñāśu dīyatāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:4226: yadi na dīyate 'nujñā tad api nau viyogatā // Rm_11.96{96} //
K14ratnml_u:4227: akasmāt mṛtyur āgatya bhaviṣyati purāpi nau /
K14ratnml_u:4228: tadā te kiṃ kariṣyāmi kiṃ mamāpi kariṣyasi // Rm_11.97{97} //
K14ratnml_u:4230: iti mātar viditvā tvaṃ tadanujñāṃ pradehi me // Rm_11.98{98} //
K14ratnml_u:4231: vighnatāṃ mā kṛthā hy atra dharme bhavānumodinī /
K14ratnml_u:4232: tathā cec chubhatā nityam ihāmutrāpi te bhavet // Rm_11.99{99} //
K14ratnml_u:4233: ahaṃ ca saugatiṃ caryāṃ kṛtvā yāsyāmi nirvṛtīṃ /
K14ratnml_u:4234: iti putroditaṃ śrutvā matāsau paribodhitā // Rm_11.100{100} //
K14ratnml_u:4237: tayoḥ pādān praṇatvaivaṃ sahasā niryayau gṛhāt // Rm_11.102{2} //
K14ratnml_u:4239: sarvān atithivargāṃś ca vāṃchitārthaiḥ pratoṣayan // Rm_11.103{3} //
K14ratnml_u:4241: jetavanaṃ pragatvā sa vihāraṃ samupāviśat // Rm_11.104{4} //
K14ratnml_u:4244: namas te bhagavan nātha bhavatāṃ śaraṇaṃ vraje /
K14ratnml_u:4245: tat pravrajyāṃ vrataṃ dehi cariṣye brahmasaṃvaraṃ // Rm_11.106{6} //
K14ratnml_u:4246: iti tenārthite buddho bhagavān tam abhāṣata /
K14ratnml_u:4247: ehi bhikṣo kumārātra cara brahmavrataṃ varaṃ // Rm_11.107{7} //
K14ratnml_u:4248: ity ādiśya munīndro 'sau pāṇinā tac chiraḥ spṛśan /
K14ratnml_u:4249: samyak pravrājayitvāśu svasaṃghe taṃ samagrahīt // Rm_11.108{8} //
K14ratnml_u:4253: vyāyaccha ghaṭamānaś ca samādhiṣu samāhitaḥ // Rm_11.110{10} //
K14ratnml_u:4254: tad idaṃ paṃcagaṃḍaṃ ca bhavacakraṃ calācalaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:4256: bhindan sarvam avidyāṅgaṃ prāpya vidyāgaṇāḥ śivāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4258: pratisaṃvidguṇāḥ prāpya jitvā kleśagaṇāṃ yatiḥ // Rm_11.112{12} //
K14ratnml_u:4266: sahasā kleśagaṇāñ jitvā sākṣād arhan bhavaty api // Rm_11.116{16} //
K14ratnml_u:4267: tatas te bhikṣavaḥ sarve dṛṣṭvā taṃ dārakaṃ yatiṃ /
K14ratnml_u:4268: vismitāḥ śrīghanaṃ natvā paprachus tasya karmatāṃ // Rm_11.117{17} //
K14ratnml_u:4270: yad anena kṛtaṃ karma tat samādeṣṭum arhati // Rm_11.118{18} //
K14ratnml_u:4271: iti te bhikṣubhiḥ pṛṣṭe bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4272: tān svaśiṣyān yatīn bhikṣūn samāmaṃtryābravīt tathā // Rm_11.119{19} //
K14ratnml_u:4273: śṛṇudhvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ sarve yūyaṃ hi vismayānvitāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4274: yad anena kṛtaṃ karma tan mayā vaḥ pracakṣyatāṃ // Rm_11.120{20} //
K14ratnml_u:4275: purāsīd bhagavān buddhaḥ kāśyapo nāma sarvavit /
K14ratnml_u:4282: śāsane dvau yatī bhikṣū saṃśītikau vabhūvatuḥ // Rm_11.124{24} //
K14ratnml_u:4286: sa jñāto 'rhan mahāpuṇyaḥ sarvalokaiḥ prapūjitaḥ // Rm_11.126{26} //
K14ratnml_u:4288: sa kena cit pūjito naivaṃ yathā so 'rhaṃ yatiḥ sudhīḥ // Rm_11.127{27} //
K14ratnml_u:4289: yadā so 'rhan mahābhijño yatra yatra nimaṃtritaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4293: gantukāmas tadā tatra paścācchramaṇam aicchata // Rm_11.129{29} //
K14ratnml_u:4294: tad āgamanam anviṣya naiva pratyalabhat kvacit /
K14ratnml_u:4295: tatas taddarśanābhāvād anyam āhūya bhikṣukaṃ // Rm_11.130{30} //
K14ratnml_u:4296: taṃ paścācchramaṇaṃ kṛtvā dātur gṛham upācarat /
K14ratnml_u:4298: tam arhantam apaśyan sa tasthau tūṣṇī nirāśitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4299: tathaivaṃ taṃ niṣīdantaṃ dṛṣṭvā te bhikṣavo narāḥ // Rm_11.132{32} //
K14ratnml_u:4301: bhadanta paśyatādyāyaṃ tenāhato na nīyate // Rm_11.133{33} //
K14ratnml_u:4303: iti tair bhikṣubhiḥ proktaṃ śrutvāsau pratibheditaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4305: yad adya māṃ parityajya samāhūyānyato harāt /
K14ratnml_u:4306: gachata bhojanaṃ bhoktuṃ tad ahasto bhavatv asau // Rm_11.135{35} //
K14ratnml_u:4307: tadāsau bhojanaṃ bhuktvā tenaivaṃ bhikṣuṇā saha /
K14ratnml_u:4308: svāśramaṃ samupāyātas tam adrākṣīd ruṣākulaṃ // Rm_11.136{36} //
K14ratnml_u:4309: ity evaṃ śapitaṃ vāpi matvā so 'rhaṃ mahāmatiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4310: dṛṣṭvā taṃ kṛpayā dṛṣṭyā tūṣṇībhūtvā vyaciṃtayat // Rm_11.137{37} //
K14ratnml_u:4311: aho ayaṃ mahāmūḍha īdṛg mayi prabhāṣate /
K14ratnml_u:4312: etat karmaphalaṃ ghoraṃ kathaṃ bhokṣyati nārake // Rm_11.138{38} //
K14ratnml_u:4313: yad ayaṃ mama doṣeṇa krodhenaivaṃ khalīkṛtaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4314: tad etat karmavaipākyaṃ mayaiva paripācyatāṃ // Rm_11.139{39} //
K14ratnml_u:4315: ity evaṃ manasā dhyātvā sa mahārhaṃ kṛpānidhiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4317: tataḥ so 'py ayatir bhikṣur dṛṣṭvā taṃ dhyānasaṃsthitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:4320: procitaṃ pātakaṃ ghoraṃ tad bhavān kṣantum arhati // Rm_11.142{42} //
K14ratnml_u:4323: tadatyayaṃ bhavāñ chāstaḥ pratihartuṃ samarhati // Rm_11.143{43} //
K14ratnml_u:4324: adyāgreṇa sadā cāpi bhavatāṃ śaraṇaṃ vraje /
K14ratnml_u:4325: tan me yad aparādhatvaṃ tat sarvaṃ kṣantum arhati // Rm_11.144{43/} //
K14ratnml_u:4326: punar naitat kariṣye 'haṃ akarttavyaṃ yady atra hi /
K14ratnml_u:4327: avaktavyaṃ ca yat kiṃ cin na tad vakṣyāmi sarvathā // Rm_11.145{44} //
K14ratnml_u:4328: abhāvyaṃ cāpi yat kiṃcid bhāvayiṣye na tat punaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4329: yad eva taṃ prakarttavyaṃ tad eva hi karomy ahaṃ // Rm_11.146{45} //
K14ratnml_u:4330: vaktavyam eva vakṣye 'haṃ bhāvyam eva prabhāvaye /
K14ratnml_u:4331: etat sarvaṃ samāsena samādeṣṭuṃ samarhati // Rm_11.147{46} //
K14ratnml_u:4332: bhavadājñāṃ śirodhṛtvā satyam evaṃ caret sadā // Rm_11.148{47/} //
K14ratnml_u:4333: iti tenārthitaṃ śrutvā sa samādheḥ samutthitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4334: taṃ bhikṣuṃ kṛpayā dṛṣṭvā paśyann evaṃ samabravīt // Rm_11.149{48} //
K14ratnml_u:4335: śṛṇu vatsa samādhāya tvām atrāhaṃ prabodhaye /
K14ratnml_u:4336: yathā me gaditaṃ śrutvā tathā kuru samāhitaḥ // Rm_11.150{49} //
K14ratnml_u:4338: strīṇāṃ saṃgānurāgaṃ ca akarttavyaṃ kadā cana // Rm_11.151{50} //
K14ratnml_u:4340: saṃbhinnapralāpaṃ ca pāruṣyaṃ ca kadā cana // Rm_11.152{51} //
K14ratnml_u:4341: mithyādṛṣṭir abhidhyā ca vyāpādaṃ ca tathā sadā /
K14ratnml_u:4342: bhikṣubhir manasā naiva ciṃtanīyā kadā cana // Rm_11.153{52} //
K14ratnml_u:4344: tasmād evaṃ parijñāya tyaktavyāni sukhārthibhiḥ // Rm_11.154{53} //
K14ratnml_u:4346: saddharmāṇāṃ pratikṣepaṃ kartavyaṃ na kadā cana // Rm_11.155{54} //
K14ratnml_u:4347: tathā vāryāpavādatvaṃ vaktavyaṃ na kadā cana /
K14ratnml_u:4348: paṃcānaṃtaryapāpāni naiva kāryāṇi kena cit // Rm_11.156{55} //
K14ratnml_u:4350: patanto narakeṣv eva kleśāndhāni ca santi hi // Rm_11.157{56} //
K14ratnml_u:4351: tasmād etāni karmāṇi mānasāpi ca mā kṛthā /
K14ratnml_u:4354: āryāṣṭāṃgikamārge ca caritvā vratam ādarāt // Rm_11.159{58} //
K14ratnml_u:4357: pravaraṃ vratam ākhyātaṃ sarvair api munīśvaraiḥ // Rm_11.160{59} //
K14ratnml_u:4360: evam etat parijñāya vrataṃ kṛtvā samācaran /
K14ratnml_u:4361: tatas te kramataḥ pāpaṃ niḥśeṣaṃ kṣiṇuyād drutaṃ // Rm_11.162{61} //
K14ratnml_u:4362: tataś ca kramaśaḥ śikṣāḥ śikṣitvātra samāhitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4364: tatas tvaṃ kramaśaś caivaṃ śodhayitvā trimaṃḍalaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:4367: tatheti ca parijñāya tadvrataṃ kartum aichata // Rm_11.165{64} //
K14ratnml_u:4368: tathā tasyārhataḥ śāstuḥ sadaivaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4369: kramāc chikṣāś ca śikṣitvā tad upoṣadham ācarat // Rm_11.166{65} //
K14ratnml_u:4372: bhikṣavo jñāyatām eṣa yo 'sau bhikṣuḥ pṛthagjanaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4373: yad anenārhate śāstre śapitaṃ ruṣṭacetasā // Rm_11.168{67} //
K14ratnml_u:4375: yac cānenārhataḥ śastur gatvā ca śaraṇaṃ sadā // Rm_11.169{68} //
K14ratnml_u:4377: tenāyaṃ śāsanenātra pravrajyārhaṃ bhavaty api // Rm_11.170{69} //
K14ratnml_u:4378: iti hi bhikṣavo matvā caritavyaṃ śubhe sadā /
K14ratnml_u:4379: śubhena sadgatiṃ yāṃti kṛṣṇena durgatiṃ sadā // Rm_11.171{70} //
K14ratnml_u:4381: yenaiva yat kṛtaṃ karma tasyaiva karmaṇaḥ phalaṃ // Rm_11.172{71} //
K14ratnml_u:4382: tenaiva bhujyate loke nānyena spṛśyate kvacit /
K14ratnml_u:4383: abhuktaṃ kṣīyate naiva karma kvāpi kadā cana // Rm_11.173{72} //
K14ratnml_u:4384: bhuktaṃ tu kṣīyate karma śubhaṃ vāpy aśubhaṃ tathā /
K14ratnml_u:4385: nāgnibhir dahyate kena vāyubhiś ca na śuṣyate // Rm_11.174{73} //
K14ratnml_u:4386: klidyate nodakaiś cāpi kṣīyate naiva bhūmiṣu /
K14ratnml_u:4387: na praṇaśyanti karmāṇi kalpakoṭiśatair api // Rm_11.175{74} //
K14ratnml_u:4388: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti prāṇināṃ khalu /
K14ratnml_u:4389: evam etat prabhaṣitvā jinendro 'sau mahāmuniḥ // Rm_11.176{75} //
K14ratnml_u:4390: bodhayan sakalāṃl lokān samādhiṃ vidadhe tataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4391: iti śāstrā samādiṣṭaṃ śrutvā sarve ca sāṃghikāḥ // Rm_11.177{76} //
K14ratnml_u:4392: śubheṣv eva sadā raktāḥ pracerire samāhitāḥ // Rm_11.178{77} //
K14ratnml_u:4393: ity evaṃ me samākhyātaṃ guruṇā śāṇavāsinā /
K14ratnml_u:4395: tathaivaṃ te mayā khyātaṃ śrutvā caivaṃ śubhe cara // Rm_11.179{78} //
K14ratnml_u:4398: tatas te maṃgalaṃ nityaṃ sarvatrāpi bhaved dhruvaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:4399: kramād bodhipathaḥ prāpya saṃbodhim āpnuyāḥ khalu // Rm_11.181{80} //
K14ratnml_u:4401: śrutvā tatheti vaṃditvā prābhyanandat sapārṣadaḥ // Rm_11.182{81} //
K14ratnml_u:4403: ye cāpi śrāvayanti pratidinam aniśaṃ bodhicaryābhiraktāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4404: te sarve kleśamuktāḥ suvimalamanaso bodhisatvā guṇāḍhyā
K14ratnml_u:4405: bhuktvā saukhyaṃ prakāmaṃ munivaranilayaṃ saṃprayāṃti pramodāḥ // Rm_11.183{82} //
K14ratnml_u:4410: upaguptaṃ guruṃ natvā punar evam abhāṣata // Rm_12.1{1} //
K14ratnml_u:4411: bhadanta śrotum ichāmi punar anyat subhāṣitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:4412: yathā te guruṇādiṣṭaṃ tathā me khyātum arhasi // Rm_12.2{2} //
K14ratnml_u:4414: upagupto yatiś caivaṃ taṃ nṛpaṃ pratyabhāṣata // Rm_12.3{3} //
K14ratnml_u:4415: śṛṇu rājan samādhāya yathā me guruṇoditaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:4416: tathāhaṃ te pravakṣyāmi tac chrutvā mudito bhava // Rm_12.4{4} //
K14ratnml_u:4423: śrāvakair bhikṣubhiḥ sārddham upāsakaiś ca cailakaiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4424: bodhisatvagaṇaiś cāpi tathānyaiś ca maharṣibhiḥ // Rm_12.8{8} //
K14ratnml_u:4426: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pātuṃ prāyayur bodhivāṃchinaḥ // Rm_12.9{9} //
K14ratnml_u:4428: brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyāś cāpi vaiśyāḥ śūdrāś ca maṃtriṇaḥ // Rm_12.10{10} //
K14ratnml_u:4429: amātyā dhaninaḥ paurāḥ sādhavaś ca mahājanāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4430: vaṇijaḥ sārthavāhāś ca tathānye sarvajātikāḥ // Rm_12.11{11} //
K14ratnml_u:4432: saṃbuddhaṃ śrīghanaṃ natvā pūjayitvā samaṃtataḥ // Rm_12.12{12} //
K14ratnml_u:4435: athāsau bhagavān dṛṣṭvā tān sarvān samupāśritān /
K14ratnml_u:4439: tadaiva samaye tasyāṃ śrāvastyāṃ puri saṃsthitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4444: tato 'sau svāṃ priyāṃ bhāryāṃ bodhayitvā prayatnataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4445: svasahāyāś ca tāṃ sarvāṃ samāhūya samabravīt // Rm_12.18{18} //
K14ratnml_u:4446: bhavaṃto śrūyatāṃ sarve yad abhilaṣitaṃ mama /
K14ratnml_u:4447: atrāsti yadi vo vāṃchā tan me svāgantum arhatha // Rm_12.19{19} //
K14ratnml_u:4449: tat prāyāta mayā sārddhaṃ yadi saṃpattim ichatha // Rm_12.20{20} //
K14ratnml_u:4450: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā sarve te ratnalobhitāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4451: sahasā gaṃtum ichante ratnākare mahodadhau // Rm_12.21{21} //
K14ratnml_u:4452: tato 'sau sārthabhṛc chīghraṃ sarve sārthagaṇaiḥ saha /
K14ratnml_u:4455: sarve te pracaranto vai tīraṃ prāpur mahodadheḥ // Rm_12.23{23} //
K14ratnml_u:4456: tato bhāṃḍāni naukāyām āropyāruhya ca svayaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:4461: tataḥ pratyāgatā abdhes tīrāntikaṃ samāyayuḥ // Rm_12.26{26} //
K14ratnml_u:4463: bhidyate vahanaṃ teṣāṃ hṛdayaiḥ sā sahāśu tat // Rm_12.27{27} //
K14ratnml_u:4467: kecid vāhuvalādhānaṃ samuttīrya sthalaṃ yayuḥ // Rm_12.29{29} //
K14ratnml_u:4469: utpravanto nimajjantaḥ kheditā nidhanaṃ yayuḥ // Rm_12.30{30} //
K14ratnml_u:4470: tatas te vaṇijaḥ sarve ye viśiṣṭā viṣāditāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4471: te yaśodhanavibhraṣṭāḥ śūnyahastā gṛhaṃ yayuḥ // Rm_12.31{31} //
K14ratnml_u:4473: etad vṛttaṃ svabhāryāyāḥ kathitvaivaṃ vyacintayat // Rm_12.32{32} //
K14ratnml_u:4474: hā hā me mandabhāgyatvāj jāyate mīdṛśī vipat /
K14ratnml_u:4476: atrāhaṃ kiṃ kariṣyāmi yato bhāgyaṃ na vidyate // Rm_12.33{33} //
K14ratnml_u:4477: bhāgyavān puruṣo dhīro bhāgyavān kuśalī sudhīḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4478: bhāgyena labhyate saṃpad yaśaḥ saukhyaguṇānvitaḥ // Rm_12.34{34} //
K14ratnml_u:4480: etadādyā guṇāḥ sarve śobhanti bhāgyam āśritāḥ // Rm_12.35{35} //
K14ratnml_u:4482: etadādyādiguṇāḥ sarve na prasiddhyaṃti sarvataḥ // Rm_12.36{36} //
K14ratnml_u:4483: tad atra kiṃ kariṣye 'haṃ kva yāsyāmi dhanāptaye /
K14ratnml_u:4484: dhanahīnā na śobhante gṛhasthāḥ sādhavo 'pi hi // Rm_12.37{37} //
K14ratnml_u:4485: varaṃ prāṇaparityāgaṃ na tu dravyair vinā gṛhe /
K14ratnml_u:4486: paśuvan nirasaṃ bhuktvā sthāsyāmy evaṃ nirutsavaṃ // Rm_12.38{38} //
K14ratnml_u:4487: bhāgyena labhyate dravyaṃ bhāgyaṃ dharmeṇa labhyate /
K14ratnml_u:4488: dharme hi jāyate sveṣṭadevatāyāḥ prasādataḥ // Rm_12.39{39} //
K14ratnml_u:4490: samyag ārādhayitvaivaṃ yāyāṃ ratnākaraṃ punaḥ // Rm_12.40{40} //
K14ratnml_u:4493: namas te devate nityaṃ bhaje 'haṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4495: itthaṃ sā devatā samyag ārādhya saṃpramoditā /
K14ratnml_u:4496: sarvasārthān samāhūya punar evam abhāṣata // Rm_12.43{43} //
K14ratnml_u:4497: bho bhavanto vijānīdhvaṃ vayaṃ sarve vaṇigjanāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4498: tad atra bhavatām agre kathyate me samīhitaṃ // Rm_12.44{44} //
K14ratnml_u:4500: tat tathaiva gṛhe sthitvā naiva śobhāṃ vrajemahi // Rm_12.45{45} //
K14ratnml_u:4503: dhanahīnā na śobhante gṛhasthā hi kuṭuṃvinaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4506: dhairyyam ālamvya sarvaiś ca karttavyaṃ dhanasādhanaṃ // Rm_12.48{48} //
K14ratnml_u:4508: dhanena sādhayed dharmaṃ dharmeṇa sadgatiṃ vrajet // Rm_12.49{49} //
K14ratnml_u:4510: arjanīyaṃ prayatnena dhanaṃ dānāya bhuktaye // Rm_12.50{50} //
K14ratnml_u:4513: dānaṃ svargasya sopānaṃ dānaṃ śāntikaraṃ sadā // Rm_12.51{51} //
K14ratnml_u:4514: asmād dānaṃ sadā kartuṃ bhoktuṃ saukhyaṃ yathechayā /
K14ratnml_u:4515: bhūyo ratnākaraṃ gaṃtum arhāmahe dhanārjane // Rm_12.52{52} //
K14ratnml_u:4517: yāvaj jīvaṃ sukhaṃ bhuktvā dānaṃ kṛtvā vasemahi // Rm_12.53{53} //
K14ratnml_u:4518: yadi daivo vipattiḥ syāt samudre patitā vayaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:4519: tīrtharāje mṛtāḥ sarve yāsyāmaḥ svargatiṃ dhruvaṃ // Rm_12.54{54} //
K14ratnml_u:4520: yadi bhāgyād athāsmākaṃ devānāṃ ca prasādataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4521: yātrāsiddhir bhaven nūnaṃ yāvaj jīvaṃ sukhaṃ tadā // Rm_12.55{55} //
K14ratnml_u:4523: tat prāyāta mayā sārddhaṃ yadi saṃpattim ichatha // Rm_12.56{56} //
K14ratnml_u:4524: iti tasyoditaṃ śrutvā te sarve vaṇijo mudā /
K14ratnml_u:4525: tathā tena sahaichānta gantuṃ ratnākaraiḥ punaḥ // Rm_12.57{57} //
K14ratnml_u:4526: tato 'sau sārthabhṛc chīghraṃ dhṛtvā svastyayanaṃ mudā /
K14ratnml_u:4527: sarve sārthagaṇaiḥ sārddhaṃ pratasthe svapurād vahi // Rm_12.58{58} //
K14ratnml_u:4529: pracarantaś ca te sarve tīraṃ prāpur mahodadheḥ // Rm_12.59{59} //
K14ratnml_u:4530: tatra sarve 'pi te sārthā bhāṇḍāni vahane kramāt /
K14ratnml_u:4535: tataḥ pratyāgatāś cābdhes tīrāntikam upāyayuḥ // Rm_12.62{62} //
K14ratnml_u:4537: sā naukā bhidyate caivaṃ teṣāṃ vai hṛdayaiḥ saha // Rm_12.63{63} //
K14ratnml_u:4540: tatra te vilayaṃ prāptā nirālaṃvā nirāśrayāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4541: unmajjanto nimajjantaḥ preritās tīram ūrmibhiḥ // Rm_12.65{65} //
K14ratnml_u:4543: kecid vāhuvalādhānaiḥ samuttīryya sthalaṃ yayuḥ // Rm_12.66{66} //
K14ratnml_u:4545: utplavantā nimajjantaḥ kheditā nidhanaṃ yayuḥ // Rm_12.67{67} //
K14ratnml_u:4546: tatas teṣāṃ ca sārthānāṃ ye 'vaśiṣṭā sujīvinaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4548: yaśoratnaviyuktās te śūnyahastā gṛhaṃ yayuḥ // Rm_12.68{68} //
K14ratnml_u:4550: etad vṛttaṃ svavaṃdhūnāṃ kathitvaivam abhāṣata // Rm_12.69{69} //
K14ratnml_u:4551: hā mayā kiṃ kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ yenedrig jāyate vipat /
K14ratnml_u:4552: dvidhāpi siddhyate naiva yato bhāgyaṃ na vidyate // Rm_12.70{70} //
K14ratnml_u:4553: pāpair na siddhyate karma atra yatnasya kiṃ valaiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4554: dharmeṇa siddhyate karma tasmād dharmo valottamaḥ // Rm_12.71{71} //
K14ratnml_u:4556: dravyena sādhayet karma sadgatiṃ samavāpnuyāḥ // Rm_12.72{72} //
K14ratnml_u:4557: karma tu siddhyate samyak kulavṛttiṃ ca cāriṇāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:4558: kulavṛttiṃ parityajya yo 'nyavṛttau caret kudhīḥ // Rm_12.73{73} //
K14ratnml_u:4559: sa ihāpi paribhraṣṭaḥ paratra durgatiṃ vrajet /
K14ratnml_u:4560: yenaivaṃ sadgatiprāptis tadaiva karmma sādhayet // Rm_12.74{74} //
K14ratnml_u:4561: yato 'pi durgatiṃ prāptis tat karma tarhitaṃ budhaiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4562: tad atra kiṃ kariṣye 'haṃ kva yāsyāmy artham arjituṃ /
K14ratnml_u:4563: arthaṃ vinā kathaṃ dharmaṃ karttavyaṃ hi kuṭuṃvibhiḥ // Rm_12.75{75} //
K14ratnml_u:4564: vinā dharmaṃ hi saṃsāre janma jīvaṃ ca nisphalaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:4565: kiṃ te na pauruṣeṇāpi yena dharmaṃ na sādhyate // Rm_12.76{76} //
K14ratnml_u:4566: dhig dhig me janma saṃsāre jīvituṃ na tathotsahe /
K14ratnml_u:4567: varaṃ prāṇaparityāgaṃ na tv evaṃ cirajīvitaṃ // Rm_12.77{77} //
K14ratnml_u:4568: avaśyaṃ jantubhir mṛtyur gantavyaṃ ekadhā dhruvaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:4569: tato 'tra martum ichāmi na tv evam uṣituṃ gṛhe // Rm_12.78{(78)} //
K14ratnml_u:4571: kathaṃ me śāmyate duḥkhaṃ yenāhaṃ parikheditaḥ // Rm_12.79{(78)} //
K14ratnml_u:4572: kiṃ karttavyaṃ kva gantavyaṃ yatnaṃ cātra na vidyate /
K14ratnml_u:4573: sarvathāhaṃ vinaṣṭo 'smi ko me 'sti rakṣako janaḥ // Rm_12.80{79} //
K14ratnml_u:4577: vinā dharmmaṃ yaśodravyaḥ kiṃ saukhyaṃ gṛhavāsināṃ // Rm_12.82{81} //
K14ratnml_u:4578: vinā dharmayaśodravyair yo gṛhasthaḥ paśuḥ khalu /
K14ratnml_u:4581: puṇyenaiva pralabhyante caturvargā api dhruvaṃ // Rm_12.84{83} //
K14ratnml_u:4583: tad eteṣāṃ mamaiko 'pi na vidyate kathaṃ cana /
K14ratnml_u:4584: hā hato 'smi svadaivena kiṃ karomi vikheditaḥ // Rm_12.85{84} //
K14ratnml_u:4586: evaṃ teṣāṃ svavaṃdhūnāṃ vilapītvā sa sārthapaḥ // Rm_12.86{85} //
K14ratnml_u:4588: evaṃ vyavasthitaṃ dṛṣṭvā taṃ te sarve 'pi vāṃdhavāḥ // Rm_12.87{86} //
K14ratnml_u:4590: sādho sārthapate satyaṃ tat sarvaṃ yat tvayocyate // Rm_12.88{87} //
K14ratnml_u:4591: tad evaṃ dhairyyam ālaṃvya prodyamasva gṛhe vasan /
K14ratnml_u:4592: sādho kutrāpi mā dhāva nirmāṇasadṛśaṃ phalaṃ // Rm_12.89{88} //
K14ratnml_u:4594: yad abhāvi na tad bhāvi bhāvi naiva tad anyathā // Rm_12.90{89} //
K14ratnml_u:4596: avaśyaṃ bhāvino bhāvā na bhaveyus tathā yadi // Rm_12.91{90} //
K14ratnml_u:4597: pitrā tyaktaḥ kathaṃ rāmo rājyabhraṣṭo vanaṃ yayau /
K14ratnml_u:4598: tatrāpi vasatas tasya bhāryā śītā pativratā // Rm_12.92{91} //
K14ratnml_u:4600: tato rāmeṇa vīryeṇa hatvāsau rāvaṇas tataḥ // Rm_12.93{92} //
K14ratnml_u:4601: pratyānīya punaḥ śītā tyaktā bharttrā svayaṃ kathaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:4602: punar ṛṣeḥ samānīya sabhāmadhye parikṣitā // Rm_12.94{93} //
K14ratnml_u:4603: tataḥ pṛthyā svayaṃ gṛhya sītānītā rasātalaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:4605: nadyāṃ prāṇasvayaṃ tyaktvā janaṃ sārddhaṃ divaṃ yayau /
K14ratnml_u:4607: rājyabhraṣṭā vane gatvā vibhramus te 'pi daivataḥ // Rm_12.96{95} //
K14ratnml_u:4609: uttamā adhamā madhyā saṃti te 'pi svadaivataḥ // Rm_12.97{96} //
K14ratnml_u:4610: kecid gṛhe mṛtāḥ kecij jāyamānā mṛtā api /
K14ratnml_u:4611: kecid vālye mṛtāḥ kecit kaumāratve mṛtās tathā // Rm_12.98{97} //
K14ratnml_u:4612: yauvane 'pi mṛtāḥ kecin mṛtā vṛddhe vadanti me /
K14ratnml_u:4613: sarve 'py evaṃ mṛtā lokāḥ svasvadaivapramāṇataḥ // Rm_12.99{98} //
K14ratnml_u:4616: kecid vālye sukhaṃ bhuktvā yauvane duḥkhabhāginaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4617: kecic ca yauvane saukhyaṃ bhuktvā vṛddhe suduḥkhitāḥ // Rm_12.101{100} //
K14ratnml_u:4619: kecic ca duḥkhitā vālye yauvane saukhyabhāginaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4620: vṛddhatvasya sukhībhūtā bhavaṃti te 'pi hi daivataḥ // Rm_12.102{1} //
K14ratnml_u:4621: sarve 'pi sukham ichanti duḥkhaṃ nechati kaś cana /
K14ratnml_u:4622: tathā sukhāni saṃprāptuṃ yatnaṃ kurvanty anekaśaḥ // Rm_12.103{2} //
K14ratnml_u:4623: keṣāṃ cit siddhyate yatnaṃ keṣāṃ cid vā na siddhyati /
K14ratnml_u:4624: keṣāṃ cid vighnatāṃ yāti tat sarvaṃ daivayogataḥ // Rm_12.104{3} //
K14ratnml_u:4625: tathā ca rogiṇāṃ rogā vaidyopacāraṇair api /
K14ratnml_u:4626: varddhyante naiva śāmyante tad api daivayogataḥ // Rm_12.105{4} //
K14ratnml_u:4627: keṣāṃ cid rogiṇāṃ rogā vinā vaidyopacāraṇe /
K14ratnml_u:4628: śāmyaṃte yatnato cāpi tad api daivayogataḥ // Rm_12.106{5} //
K14ratnml_u:4629: tathā cald maṃtriṇāṃ maṃtrāḥ siddhyante yatnato laghuḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4630: keṣāṃ cid vighnatāṃ yānti tad api daivakāraṇāt // Rm_12.107{6} //
K14ratnml_u:4631: tathaivaṃ vaṇijāṃ lābhoḥ siddhyante yatnato 'pi ca /
K14ratnml_u:4632: keṣāṃ cin naiva yatnena tad api daivayogataḥ // Rm_12.108{7} //
K14ratnml_u:4633: tathā vīrā raṇe śatruṃ vinā yatnaṃ jayaṃty api /
K14ratnml_u:4634: kecit tu ripunā yuddhe hanyamānā mṛtāḥ pare // Rm_12.109{8} //
K14ratnml_u:4636: tyaktvā dehaṃ gatāḥ svargaṃ tad api daivayogataḥ // Rm_12.110{9} //
K14ratnml_u:4637: evaṃ sāṃyātrikā ratnaṃ prāptuṃ ratnākaraṃ gatāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4638: kecid ratnāni saṃgṛhya svasti pratyāgatā gṛhaṃ // Rm_12.111{10} //
K14ratnml_u:4639: kecid ratnam alabdhaṃ vai śūnyahastā gṛhāgatāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4640: kecic ca nidhanaṃ yātās tatraiva makarālaye // Rm_12.112{11} //
K14ratnml_u:4641: kecid yatnāt samuttīrya jīvanto gṛham āgatāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4642: kecic ca jāṃgale caurair nihatā maraṇaṃ gatāḥ // Rm_12.113{12} //
K14ratnml_u:4643: kecic ca jaṃtubhir mārge hiṃsyamāne mṛtā vane /
K14ratnml_u:4644: keṣāṃ cit siddhyate yātrā mahallābhasamanvitāḥ // Rm_12.114{13} //
K14ratnml_u:4645: keṣāṃ cid vighnatāṃ yānti tathāpi daivayogataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4646: kaiś cid gṛhe nidhiḥ prāptaḥ kaiś cid deśāntare vane // Rm_12.115{14} //
K14ratnml_u:4647: kaiś cid dūre bhramadbhiś ca naiva kiṃ cit kva cid dhanaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:4648: keṣāṃ cid varddhate saṃpad yatnāyāsaṃ vinā laghu // Rm_12.116{15} //
K14ratnml_u:4649: keṣāṃ cid dhīyate saṃpad rakṣitāpi prayatnataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4650: keṣāṃ cit susthirā saṃpat keṣāṃ cid vala asthirā // Rm_12.117{16} //
K14ratnml_u:4651: keṣāṃ cij jāyate naiva nānopāyārjanair api /
K14ratnml_u:4652: evaṃ nānāprakāraiś ca satvās traidhātukodbhavāḥ // Rm_12.118{17} //
K14ratnml_u:4655: sukhasyānte hi duḥkhāni duḥkhasyānte sukhāni ca // Rm_12.119{18} //
K14ratnml_u:4656: bhuṃjante jaṃtavaḥ sarve bhramante ṣaḍgatiṣv api /
K14ratnml_u:4657: tathā bhavanti mitrāṇi dviṣo 'pi hitakāriṇaḥ // Rm_12.120{19} //
K14ratnml_u:4658: mitrāṇy api dviṣo duṣṭā bhavaṃti daivayogataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4659: tathāmṛtaṃ viṣībhūtaṃ viṣaṃ cāpy amṛtī bhavet // Rm_12.121{20} //
K14ratnml_u:4660: tad api daivayogena tasmād daivaṃ mahad varaṃ // Rm_12.122{21} //
K14ratnml_u:4661: tathā ca brahmaṇaḥ śīrṣaṃ nikṛttaṃ śūlapāṇinā /
K14ratnml_u:4662: tad api daivayogena tasmād daivaṃ mahāvalī // Rm_12.123{22} //
K14ratnml_u:4663: tathā cakrī suvīro 'pi vyādheṣu nihato mṛtaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4664: tad api daivayogena tasmād daivaṃ mahad valaṃ // Rm_12.124{23} //
K14ratnml_u:4665: yaś ca bhūtādhipaś ceśaḥ so 'py umatto digaṃvaraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4666: tad api daivayogena tasmād daivaṃ maheśvaraḥ // Rm_12.125{24} //
K14ratnml_u:4667: caṃdro 'pi ca kalaṃkāṅko māse māse 'pi hīyate /
K14ratnml_u:4668: tad api daivayogena tasmād daivaṃ mahadvalaṃ // Rm_12.126{25} //
K14ratnml_u:4670: tad api daivayogena tasmād daivaṃ mahāvalī // Rm_12.127{26} //
K14ratnml_u:4672: tad api daivayogena tasmād daivaṃ mahāvalī // Rm_12.128{27} //
K14ratnml_u:4674: tad api daivayogena tasmād daivaṃ mahāvalaṃ // Rm_12.129{28} //
K14ratnml_u:4675: tathā ca parśurāmeṇa mātāpi nihatā krudhā /
K14ratnml_u:4676: tad api daivayogena tasmād daivaṃ mahāvalaḥ // Rm_12.130{29} //
K14ratnml_u:4678: vaṃdhane māritaṃ caivaṃ tad api daivayogataḥ // Rm_12.131{30} //
K14ratnml_u:4679: tasmāc ca brahmadattena dharmapālo sa nandanaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4680: māritaḥ pramadātuṣṭyai tad api daivayogataḥ // Rm_12.132{31} //
K14ratnml_u:4681: rājñī ca durpatī mātā svātmajasyāpi rohitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:4682: pītvaiva nirdayā tuṣṭā tad api daivayogataḥ // Rm_12.133{32} //
K14ratnml_u:4684: asinā ghātito 'raṇye tad api daivayogataḥ // Rm_12.134{33} //
K14ratnml_u:4686: nirvāsito vane bhrāntas tad api daivayogataḥ // Rm_12.135{34} //
K14ratnml_u:4687: evam anye 'pi rājāno hatvā jñātī svavāṃdhavān /
K14ratnml_u:4688: bhuṃjate prāpya rājyāni tad api daivayogataḥ // Rm_12.136{35} //
K14ratnml_u:4689: evaṃ pitrā sutās tyaktvā mātrā ca svātmajā api /
K14ratnml_u:4691: bhāryāpi svāminā tyaktvā bharttāpi bhāryyayā tathā /
K14ratnml_u:4693: tad api daivayogena tasmād daivaṃ mahattaraṃ // Rm_12.138{37} //
K14ratnml_u:4694: putreṇāpi pitā tyaktaṃ mātāpi jananī tathā /
K14ratnml_u:4695: dhātrī cāpi parityaktās tathā pautrapitāmahaḥ // Rm_12.139{38} //
K14ratnml_u:4696: tathā pitāmahas tyaktaḥ putraiś cāpy atinirdayaiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4697: tad api daivayogena tasmād daivaṃ mahattaraṃ // Rm_12.140{39} //
K14ratnml_u:4698: tathā rājñā svabhṛtyāś ca sevakā api sajjanāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4699: aparādhaṃ vinā tyaktās tad api daivayogataḥ // Rm_12.141{40} //
K14ratnml_u:4701: parityaktvā nihaṃty ante tad api daivayogataḥ // Rm_12.142{40*} //
K14ratnml_u:4702: tathā śiṣyān gurur hanti śiṣyo hanti gurum api /
K14ratnml_u:4703: tad api daivayogena tasmād daivaṃ mahattaraṃ // Rm_12.143{41} //
K14ratnml_u:4704: tathāpi ghnanti bharttāraṃ svāminaṃ sevakānn api /
K14ratnml_u:4705: tad api daivayogena tasmād daivaṃ mahattaraṃ // Rm_12.144{42} //
K14ratnml_u:4706: tathā ca svayam ātmānaṃ ghnanti kecid ruṣānvitāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4707: tad api daivayogena tasmād daivaṃ mahattamaḥ // Rm_12.145{43} //
K14ratnml_u:4708: kecic chastraiḥ svayaṃ hatvā kecid bhuktvā viṣādikaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:4709: kecid agnau jale svabhre prapātāt patitā mṛtāḥ // Rm_12.146{44} //
K14ratnml_u:4710: kecit pāśaiḥ svayaṃ badhya mṛtāḥ kecic ca vaṃdhane /
K14ratnml_u:4711: kecit pānāśanādīṃś ca tyaktvā yāṃti yamālayaṃ // Rm_12.147{45} //
K14ratnml_u:4712: evaṃ kṛtvāpi yānty eva kecid vāpi surālayaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:4713: kecic ca narake yānti tat sarvaṃ daivayogataḥ // Rm_12.148{46} //
K14ratnml_u:4715: devatāś ca dadanty evaṃ phalaṃ daivaniyogataḥ // Rm_12.149{47} //
K14ratnml_u:4716: pare 'pi svajanā iṣṭāḥ sahajā api ca dviṣaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4717: bhavanti tat kṣaṇād eva tad api daivayogataḥ // Rm_12.150{48} //
K14ratnml_u:4718: evaṃ traidhātukotpannāḥ sarve satvāś ca jaṃtavaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4719: ṣaḍgatiṣu bhramantas te caranti daivayogataḥ // Rm_12.151{49} //
K14ratnml_u:4720: kecid vīrā guṇāḍhyāś ca suṃdarā bhāgyamāninaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4722: kecic ca nirguṇāḥ prāḍhyāḥ kecin nirguṇinaḥ śaṭhāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4723: kecic ca vikalāṃgāś ca guṇasaṃpattibhāginaḥ // Rm_12.153{51} //
K14ratnml_u:4724: kecic ca suṃdarā mūrkhā nirdhanā nirguṇāḥ śaṭhāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4725: kecic ca guṇinaḥ prāḍhyā nīcakarmānucāriṇaḥ // Rm_12.154{52} //
K14ratnml_u:4730: kṛpaṇā vikalāṃgāś ca nirdayāś ca durāśayāḥ // Rm_12.156{54} //
K14ratnml_u:4731: kecid vīrā hy alābhijñāḥ kulīnāḥ sādhavo 'pi ye /
K14ratnml_u:4732: te 'pi jātinihīne 'pi bhajaṃti śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ // Rm_12.157{55} //
K14ratnml_u:4734: pretavad bhujyamānāś ca caraṃti bhikṣukā bhuvi // Rm_12.158{56} //
K14ratnml_u:4735: kecic ca nirguṇā vāpi vaṃcakā duṣṭamānasāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4736: mānyante sādhuval loke tad api daivayogataḥ // Rm_12.159{57} //
K14ratnml_u:4740: kenāpi śakyate naiva vaśe netuṃ kathaṃ cana // Rm_12.161{59} //
K14ratnml_u:4742: sraṣṭā bharttā ca harttā ca traidhātuvāsinām api // Rm_12.162{60} //
K14ratnml_u:4744: tat tasya śaraṇaṃ gatvā bhaktyā nityaṃ samarcaya // Rm_12.163{61} //
K14ratnml_u:4745: tasmiṃ tuṣṭe vidhau devaiḥ parituṣṭaṃ bhaved dhruvaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:4746: tato daivaprasādena sarvatra maṃgalaṃ bhavet // Rm_12.164{62} //
K14ratnml_u:4748: viruddhe tu na siddhyante yatnaiḥ saṃsādhitāny api // Rm_12.165{63} //
K14ratnml_u:4752: tatas te maṃgalaṃ nityaṃ sarvakāryyeṣu saṃbhavet // Rm_12.167{65} //
K14ratnml_u:4755: tathā cet sarvathā nityaṃ yātrāyaṃ maṃgalaṃ bhavet /
K14ratnml_u:4756: anyad vā cintitaṃ kāryaṃ sarvāpy evaṃ prasatsyate // Rm_12.169{67} //
K14ratnml_u:4757: yadi vāṃchāsti te bhūyo gantuṃ ratnākaraṃ prati /
K14ratnml_u:4758: tathābhyarcya vidhātāraṃ gachet svasti bhavet khalu // Rm_12.170{68} //
K14ratnml_u:4759: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā sārthavāhas tatheti saḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4760: pratijñāya samabhyarcya brahmāṇaṃ prārthayat tadā // Rm_12.171{69} //
K14ratnml_u:4761: namas te bhagavan brahmaṃ yātrāsiddhiṃ kuruṣva me /
K14ratnml_u:4762: evaṃ vidhiṃ samārādhya sa sārthādhipatis tataḥ // Rm_12.172{70} //
K14ratnml_u:4763: ratnaṃ prāptyai punaḥ sārthān samāhūyābravīt tathā /
K14ratnml_u:4765: bhavantaḥ śrūyatāṃ vākyaṃ yan mayā samudīritaṃ // Rm_12.173{71} //
K14ratnml_u:4766: atrāsti yadi vo vāṃchā tathā kartuṃ samudyatāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:4767: ahaṃ ratnākaraṃ bhūyo gantuṃ ichāmi sāṃprataṃ // Rm_12.174{72} //
K14ratnml_u:4768: tad yadīchatha ratnāni tathā yāta mayā saha /
K14ratnml_u:4769: kiṃ cāpy atra vayaṃ sarve sārthavāhakulodbhavāḥ // Rm_12.175{73} //
K14ratnml_u:4770: tad gṛhe paśuvad bhuktvā kathaṃ śobhī vrajemahi /
K14ratnml_u:4771: saṃsāre sarvajaṃtūnāṃ ekadhā maraṇaṃ dhruvaṃ // Rm_12.176{74} //
K14ratnml_u:4772: tat kiṃ no maraṇe bhītyā mṛtyuṃ kena nivāryyate /
K14ratnml_u:4773: yadi daivād vipattiḥ syād asmākaṃ karmmadoṣataḥ // Rm_12.177{75} //
K14ratnml_u:4775: yadi bhāgyāc ca no yātrā siddhā svastimatī bhavet /
K14ratnml_u:4776: tadā jīvaṃ sukhaṃ dānaṃ kṛtvā svargaṃ vrajemahi /
K14ratnml_u:4779: iti tasya vacaḥ śrutvā sarve te vaṇijo mudā // Rm_12.179{77} //
K14ratnml_u:4780: tatheti ca samutsāhaṃ kṛtvā gaṃtuṃ samudyatāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4781: tataḥ sarve 'pi te sārthā dhṛtvā svastyayanaṃ vidhiṃ // Rm_12.180{78} //
K14ratnml_u:4782: paṇyam ādāya tenaiva saha sārthabhṛtā yayuḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4783: tatas te prasthitāḥ sarve grāmāraṇyavanasthalīḥ // Rm_12.181{79} //
K14ratnml_u:4784: samuttīryya kramād yātās tīraṃ prāpur mahodadheḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4787: tatas teṣāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ daivayogānuyogataḥ // Rm_12.183{81} //
K14ratnml_u:4789: tadā sarve 'pi te sārthā dṛṣṭvā naukāṃ vibheditāṃ // Rm_12.184{82} //
K14ratnml_u:4791: tatas te vaṇijaḥ sarve vipaṃnāśā viṣāditāḥ // Rm_12.185{83} //
K14ratnml_u:4794: kheditātmā gṛhe tasthau mūkavad dhi natotsavaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4796: dṛṣṭvā taṃ vikalībhūtaṃ samupetyābravīt punaḥ // Rm_12.187{85} //
K14ratnml_u:4797: mā viṣādaṃ kṛthāḥ svāminn atra dhairyyaṃ samāśrayaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4798: dharmiṣṭhe śaraṇaṃ gatvā kuruṣva dharmasādhanaṃ // Rm_12.188{86} //
K14ratnml_u:4801: śuddhacitto viśuddhātmā puṇyātmā bhāgyam āpnuyāt // Rm_12.189{87} //
K14ratnml_u:4802: tato bhāgyavataḥ puṃso yad yat karmaṇi sādhitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:4803: tat tat sarvaṃ prasiddhyeta tasmād dharmaṃ carottamaṃ // Rm_12.190{88} //
K14ratnml_u:4804: dharmam eva suhṛd mitram ihāmutra sahānugaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4805: dharmmeṇa pālyate sarvaṃ tasmād dharmo jagatsuhṛt // Rm_12.191{89} //
K14ratnml_u:4807: sarveṣām api dharmāṇāṃ dayā dharme viśiṣyate // Rm_12.192{90} //
K14ratnml_u:4812: tasmāt tasya munīndrasya sadbhaktyā śaraṇaṃ vrajan /
K14ratnml_u:4813: saddharmaśaraṇaṃ kṛtvā bhaja nityam upāsakaḥ // Rm_12.195{93} //
K14ratnml_u:4814: tatas te naśyate pāpaṃ maṃgalaṃ ca bhaved dhruvaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:4815: tadaiva sarvakāryāṇi sametsyaṃte na saṃśayaḥ // Rm_12.196{94} //
K14ratnml_u:4816: iti bhāryoditaṃ śrutvā sa sārthādhipatir mudā /
K14ratnml_u:4818: namas te bhagavan nātha pāpistho 'haṃ sudurbhagaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4819: bhavatāṃ śaraṇaṃ gache tan māṃ dṛṣṭvāśu rakṣatāṃ // Rm_12.198{96} //
K14ratnml_u:4820: yan mayā prakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ kāritaṃ vānumoditaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4821: tat sarvaṃ deśayiṣyāmi tan me dehi śubhāṃ gatiṃ // Rm_12.199{97} //
K14ratnml_u:4822: bhavatāṃ sarvadā nātha śaraṇaṃ yāmy upāsakaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4823: anyo me śaraṇaṃ nāsti tan māṃ rakṣa sadā bhaje // Rm_12.200{98} //
K14ratnml_u:4824: tridhāpi me jagannātha yātrā bhagnā svadaivataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4825: gṛhasthaḥ sārthavāho 'haṃ tan me dehi susaṃpadaḥ // Rm_12.201{99} //
K14ratnml_u:4826: yanv ahaṃ sāṃprataṃ nātha bhavataṃ śaraṇaṃ vrajan /
K14ratnml_u:4827: bhūyo ratnākaraṃ gantuṃ ichāmi ratnalabdhaye // Rm_12.202{100} //
K14ratnml_u:4828: yadi yātrā bhavet siddhi yāval lābhaṃ ca lapsyate /
K14ratnml_u:4830: ity evaṃ niścayaṃ kṛtvā saṃbuddhaṃ saṃsmaran muhuḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4831: tāṃ bhāryyāṃ bhadrikāṃ dṛṣṭvā punar evam abhāṣata // Rm_12.204{2} //
K14ratnml_u:4832: bhadre tvayā yad ādiṣṭaṃ tathā kartuṃ samutsahe /
K14ratnml_u:4833: adyāgreṇa jagannāthaṃ śaraṇaṃ yāsyāmy upāsakaḥ // Rm_12.205{3} //
K14ratnml_u:4835: bhadre nāmnā jinendrasya yāsye ratnākare punaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4836: yadi yātrā bhavet siddhi yāval lābhaṃ ca lapsyate // Rm_12.206{4} //
K14ratnml_u:4838: yathārhaṃ pūjayiṣye 'ham iti saṃkalpitaṃ mayā // Rm_12.207{5} //
K14ratnml_u:4839: yadi daivād vipattiḥ syāt saṃbuddhanāma saṃsmaran /
K14ratnml_u:4841: tad atra yadi me kāryyaṃ śubhaṃ kartuṃ samichasi /
K14ratnml_u:4842: tad viṣādaṃ parityajya dhairyyaṃ kṛtvā sukhaṃ vasa // Rm_12.209{7} //
K14ratnml_u:4843: iti bharttroditaṃ śrutvā sā bhāryyā bhadrikā satī /
K14ratnml_u:4844: tatheti pratisaṃmodya svāminaṃ taṃ samabravīt // Rm_12.210{8} //
K14ratnml_u:4845: yady evaṃ te samīhāsti kṛtv etaṃ niścayaṃ prabho /
K14ratnml_u:4846: saṃbuddhasmaraṇaṃ dhṛtvā gacha svastiṃ samācara // Rm_12.211{9} //
K14ratnml_u:4848: tathāvaśyaṃ sa saṃbuddhaḥ paśyan tvāṃ cāpy acet khalu // Rm_12.212{10} //
K14ratnml_u:4849: tadā te maṅgalaṃ nityaṃ yātrā svastimatī bhavet /
K14ratnml_u:4850: tatas te janma saṃsāre sāphalyaṃ ca bhavet khalu // Rm_12.213{11} //
K14ratnml_u:4852: gacha yātrā susiddhāstu svasti pratyāgatāśu ca // Rm_12.214{12} //
K14ratnml_u:4853: iti bhāryoditaṃ śrutvā sa sārthādhipatir mudā /
K14ratnml_u:4854: bhūyaḥ sārthagaṇān sarvān samāhūyābravīt tathā // Rm_12.215{13} //
K14ratnml_u:4855: bhavanta śrūyatāṃ vākyaṃ yan mayātra samīhitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:4856: ahaṃ ratnākaraṃ bhūyo gantum ichāmi sāṃprataṃ // Rm_12.216{14} //
K14ratnml_u:4857: tad asti yadi vo vāṃchā yaśaḥsaṃpatsukhāptaye /
K14ratnml_u:4858: samāyāta mayā sārddhaṃ ratnākaraṃ vrajemahi // Rm_12.217{15} //
K14ratnml_u:4859: yadi bhāgyād dhi no yātrā siddhā svastimatir bhavet /
K14ratnml_u:4860: yāvajīvaṃ sukhaṃ dharmaṃ kṛtvā svargaṃ vrajemahi /
K14ratnml_u:4861: atha vā syād vipattir naḥ sarvatīrthajalāśraye /
K14ratnml_u:4862: mṛtāḥ svargaṃ gamiṣyāmo hy avaśyaṃ maraṇe sati // Rm_12.218{16} //
K14ratnml_u:4863: paśuvat kiṃ gṛhe sthitvā sukhaṃ vā kiṃ yaśo vinā /
K14ratnml_u:4864: yaśonvitā mṛtā ye hi tatpumāṃso narottamāḥ // Rm_12.219{17} //
K14ratnml_u:4865: yad artham eva jīvāmas tad arthaṃ yan na vidyate /
K14ratnml_u:4866: kiṃ tena jīvitenāpi kevalaṃ duḥkhabhāginaḥ // Rm_12.220{18} //
K14ratnml_u:4867: varam evādya me mṛtyur na vyarthaṃ cirajīvitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:4869: yasmāc ciram api sthitvā mṛtyur kena nivāryyate // Rm_12.221{19} //
K14ratnml_u:4873: bodhyamānā vaṇiksaṃghāḥ kiṃ cin naiva samūcire // Rm_12.223{21} //
K14ratnml_u:4874: abhadro 'yaṃ pumāṃ cāpi yato yātrā na siddhyati /
K14ratnml_u:4875: iti tena mahāṃbhodhau naiko 'pi gantum aichata // Rm_12.224{22} //
K14ratnml_u:4876: atha sārthapatir dṛṣṭvā tān sarvān viratotsavān /
K14ratnml_u:4877: eko 'pi vā svayaṃ gantum aichad ratnākaraṃ prati // Rm_12.225{23} //
K14ratnml_u:4879: svastyayanavidhiṃ kṛtvā pratasthe bhārakaiḥ saha // Rm_12.226{24} //
K14ratnml_u:4881: purād vahi vinirgatya kramād deśāṃtaraṃ yayau // Rm_12.227{25} //
K14ratnml_u:4883: parikraman samullaṃghya prāpus tīraṃ mahodadheḥ // Rm_12.228{26} //
K14ratnml_u:4884: tatrāsau sārthabhṛd dṛṣṭvā taṃ samudraṃ mahāmbudhiṃ /
K14ratnml_u:4885: kṛtāṃjalipuṭo natvā prārthayac charaṇaṃ gataḥ // Rm_12.229{27} //
K14ratnml_u:4887: tvadāsayā samāyāmi tad āśāṃ me prapūraya // Rm_12.230{28} //
K14ratnml_u:4891: tat svasti cārayan naukāṃ yātrāsiddhiṃ prasādhaya // Rm_12.232{30} //
K14ratnml_u:4894: yathā mātā ca garbhasthaṃ vālakaṃ saṃprarakṣate /
K14ratnml_u:4895: tathā mām eva garbhasthe nauke mātaḥ prarakṣatāṃ // Rm_12.234{32} //
K14ratnml_u:4896: tataś ca sugataṃ smṛtvā triratnaśaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4898: namas te bhagavan nātha yathā trāsi jagattrayaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:4899: tathā māṃ kṛpayā dṛṣṭvā pāhi vraje ratnākare // Rm_12.236{34} //
K14ratnml_u:4900: ity evaṃ sārthavāho 'sau praṇatvā sugataṃ smaran /
K14ratnml_u:4902: bhāṇḍāny āropya naukāyaṃ samārohaj janaṃ saha // Rm_12.237{35} //
K14ratnml_u:4905: yat tatra sārthavāho 'sau saṃsmaran sugataṃ muhuḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4906: tena puṇyabalenaiva sā naukā svastim ācaran // Rm_12.239{37} //
K14ratnml_u:4907: tathā kramāc caranty evaṃ dvīpalokāntarāṇi ca /
K14ratnml_u:4910: tato ratnāni saṃgṛhya pratasthe vahanāsthitaḥ // Rm_12.241{39} //
K14ratnml_u:4914: grāmāṃ deśāṃ parikramya śrāvastyāṃ puram āyayau // Rm_12.243{41} //
K14ratnml_u:4915: tato gṛhe praviṣṭo 'sau bharyyayā saha moditaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4917: tataḥ sadyar gṛhastho 'sau bhāryyayā saha naṃditaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4918: bhāṇḍam udghāṭya ratnāni pratyavekṣitum ārabhat // Rm_12.245{43} //
K14ratnml_u:4920: dṛṣṭvā harṣaṃ samāsādya punar evaṃ vabhāṣate // Rm_12.246{44} //
K14ratnml_u:4924: tasmād yathāpratijñātaṃ śraddhayā sāṃprataṃ mayā // Rm_12.248{46} //
K14ratnml_u:4926: tad upārddhaṃ kathaṃ cānudātavyaṃ munaye 'rhate // Rm_12.249{47} //
K14ratnml_u:4927: yadi rājā vijānīyād etad arddhaṃ hare mama /
K14ratnml_u:4928: ratnalubdho nareśo yaṃ daṇḍaṃ vā praṇayaṃ mayi // Rm_12.250{48} //
K14ratnml_u:4929: tadā me syād vipattiś ca tat kathaṃ kriyate mayā /
K14ratnml_u:4930: aho daivād vipattir mām adyāpi ca na muṃcati /
K14ratnml_u:4931: tat kathaṃ vā pratijñātaṃ pūrayituṃ na manyate /
K14ratnml_u:4932: namas te bhagavan nātha sarvajño 'si munīśvaraḥ // Rm_12.251{49} //
K14ratnml_u:4934: ity asau sugataṃ smṛtvā taccintāvyathitāśayaḥ // Rm_12.252{50} //
K14ratnml_u:4935: kapolaṃ svakare dhṛtvā tasthau koṣṭhe nirutsavaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4937: tathaivaṃ sthitam ālokya svāmi naṃ taṃ viṣāditaṃ // Rm_12.253{51} //
K14ratnml_u:4938: sā bhāryā bhadrikopetya puraḥ sthitvābravīt tathā /
K14ratnml_u:4939: svāmiṃ bharttaḥ kim eva tvaṃ sthito 'si duḥkhito yathā // Rm_12.254{52} //
K14ratnml_u:4940: kiṃ vā te jāyate duḥkhaṃ tad vaca cet priyāsmi te // Rm_12.255{53} //
K14ratnml_u:4941: iti bhāryoditaṃ śrutvā sa sārthādhipatiḥ punaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4942: tāṃ bhāryyāṃ samupāmaṃtrya punaś caivam abhāṣata // Rm_12.256{54} //
K14ratnml_u:4943: bhadre yaj jāyate duḥkhaṃ tat pravakṣye śṛṇu priye /
K14ratnml_u:4944: yathā mayā pratijñātaṃ pūrayituṃ kathaṃ tathā // Rm_12.257{55} //
K14ratnml_u:4946: etad arddhaṃ hared rājā lobhān me daṇḍayed api // Rm_12.258{56} //
K14ratnml_u:4948: tan me nātra pratīkāro kathaṃ kartuṃ na manyate // Rm_12.259{57} //
K14ratnml_u:4949: iti bharttroditaṃ śrutvā sā bhāryā punar abravīt /
K14ratnml_u:4950: viṣādaṃ mā kṛthāḥ svāmiṃ śṛṇu yan me samīhitaiḥ // Rm_12.260{58} //
K14ratnml_u:4951: tāvad imāni saṃkalpaḥ paścāt tat samayāgate /
K14ratnml_u:4952: pūjayā saha bhojaiś ca sasaṃghāyārhate 'rcayet // Rm_12.261{59} //
K14ratnml_u:4953: evaṃ kṛte tathā svāmin pratijñā tena setsyate /
K14ratnml_u:4954: bhītiś cāpi na vidyeta tasmād evaṃ kuru prabho // Rm_12.262{60} //
K14ratnml_u:4955: iti bhāryāvacaḥ śrutvā sa sārthādhipatir mudā /
K14ratnml_u:4956: tatheti pratisaṃśrutya punar evam abhāṣata // Rm_12.263{61} //
K14ratnml_u:4957: tāvad imāni sarvāṇi ratnāni te samarppaye /
K14ratnml_u:4958: paścāt kāle sasaṃghaṃ taṃ pūjayiṣye munīśvaraṃ // Rm_12.264{62} //
K14ratnml_u:4960: ity uktvā sarvaratnāni bhāryāyāṃ sa nyadhāpayet // Rm_12.265{63} //
K14ratnml_u:4962: gatvā jetavane vihāre tatra dvāre sthito gurum adhūpayet // Rm_12.266{64} //
K14ratnml_u:4964: kṛtāṃjalipuṭo natvā saṃsmaran prārthayat tathā // Rm_12.267{65} //
K14ratnml_u:4966: tadyathā me pratijñātaiḥ pūrayituṃ samarhasi // Rm_12.268{66} //
K14ratnml_u:4970: yena sa dhūpa ākāśe prābhyudgamya purīṃ ca tāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:4972: tatrāsau sārthabhṛd dṛṣṭvā prātihāryaṃ tad adbhutaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:4974: naitan me pratirūpaṃ syād yad ayaṃ sugato jinaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4975: mayā nābhyarcito ratnair dhig me cittabhayād drutaṃ // Rm_12.272{70} //
K14ratnml_u:4976: yanv ahaṃ sāṃprataṃ nāthaṃ prārthayitvā sasāṃghikaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:4977: saratnaiḥ pūjayiṣyāmi bhojanaiś ca svake gṛhe // Rm_12.273{71} //
K14ratnml_u:4978: ity asau niścayaṃ kṛtvā kṛtāṃjalipuṭo mudā /
K14ratnml_u:4981: bhavatāṃ pūjanāṃ kartum ichāmi me prasīdatu // Rm_12.275{73} //
K14ratnml_u:4982: ity evaṃ prārthite tena sa saṃbuddho munīśvaraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4985: praṇatvā ca muneḥ pādau sahasā svagṛhaṃ yayau // Rm_12.277{75} //
K14ratnml_u:4986: tatra sa bhāryyayā sārddhaṃ vaṃdhumitra janair api /
K14ratnml_u:4987: praṇītaṃ bhojyapūjāṃgaṃ sādhayām āsa satvaraṃ // Rm_12.278{76} //
K14ratnml_u:4989: vihāre sahasā gatvā natvā taṃ prārthayan muniṃ // Rm_12.279{77} //
K14ratnml_u:4991: tad bhavān sāṃghikaiḥ sārddhaṃ samāgantuṃ samarhati // Rm_12.280{78} //
K14ratnml_u:4992: ity evaṃ prārthite tena sa saṃbuddhaḥ sasāṃghikaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:4993: pratasthe sūryyavan mārge prātihāryaṃ pradarśayan // Rm_12.281{79} //
K14ratnml_u:4994: tataḥ kramāt purīṃ prāpya tad gṛhaṃ samupāviśat /
K14ratnml_u:4995: tad datte pādyaṃ ādāya śuddhāsane nyaṣīdata // Rm_12.282{80} //
K14ratnml_u:4996: tatas tān sāṃghikān sarvān saṃbuddhapramukhān kramāt /
K14ratnml_u:5000: tataś ca bhojanānte sa śodhayitvā bhujādikaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:5002: apanīya ca pātrāṇi tāmbūlādīn aḍhaukayat // Rm_12.285{83} //
K14ratnml_u:5004: etaiḥ sarvaṃ suratnais taṃ saṃbuddhaiḥ samavākiran // Rm_12.286{84} //
K14ratnml_u:5006: muner upari khe gatvā chatrībhūtvā sthitā vabhau // Rm_12.287{85} //
K14ratnml_u:5007: tatas taṃ sa gṛhī dṛṣṭvā dviguṇasaṃpramoditaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5008: pādau tasya muner natvā praṇidhānaṃ vyadhāt tathā // Rm_12.288{86} //
K14ratnml_u:5012: bhītān āśvāsya saṃbodhau sthāpayiṣyāmi nirvṛtau // Rm_12.290{88} //
K14ratnml_u:5014: saṃbodhau nihitaṃ cittaṃ jñātvā smitaṃ vyadhāt tathā // Rm_12.291{89} //
K14ratnml_u:5017: tatas te bhāsvarāḥ sarve pravisṛtāḥ samaṃtataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5018: kecid ūrddhaṃ gatāḥ kecin madhyaṃ kecid rasātale // Rm_12.293{91} //
K14ratnml_u:5019: kecid adho gatā yās te sarve te narakeṣu ca /
K14ratnml_u:5022: ye śītanarakās teṣu nyapatad uṣṇikāś ca te // Rm_12.295{93} //
K14ratnml_u:5023: ye ye taiḥ kiraṇaiḥ spṛṣṭās te te sarve sukhānvitāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5024: yadā te sukhasaṃprāptās tadā te vismayānvitāḥ // Rm_12.296{94} //
K14ratnml_u:5025: aho naḥ sukham adyaivaṃ katham etad vyacintayan /
K14ratnml_u:5026: kiṃ nu vayam itaś cyutvā kutra yātāsma sāṃprataṃ // Rm_12.297{95} //
K14ratnml_u:5027: āhosvid upapannāḥ syur anyatra bhuvaneṣv api /
K14ratnml_u:5028: iti saṃdehināṃ teṣāṃ satvānāṃ paribodhane // Rm_12.298{96} //
K14ratnml_u:5029: bhagavān nirmite buddhaṃ preṣayan narakān prati /
K14ratnml_u:5030: dṛṣṭvā taṃ nirmitaṃ muniṃ vismitā harṣitāś ca vai // Rm_12.299{97} //
K14ratnml_u:5031: te sarve narakā lokāḥ saṃmīlya saṃvabhāṣire /
K14ratnml_u:5032: na bhavanta itaś cyutvā gatāsmānyatra bhūmiṣu // Rm_12.300{98} //
K14ratnml_u:5033: kiṃs tv ayaṃ nu mahāsatvaḥ hy apūrvadarśanaḥ pumān /
K14ratnml_u:5035: nūnam asyānubhāvena duḥkhāni samitāni ca // Rm_12.301{99} //
K14ratnml_u:5036: tad vayam enam ānamya vaṃde mayā pramuktaye /
K14ratnml_u:5037: iti saṃbhāṣya te sarve natvā tac charaṇaṃ gatāḥ // Rm_12.302{100} //
K14ratnml_u:5039: iti te nirmite tasmin prasādya cittam āratāḥ // Rm_12.303{1} //
K14ratnml_u:5041: evaṃ te bhānavaḥ sarve sarvatra narakeṣv api // Rm_12.304{2} //
K14ratnml_u:5042: prodyante nārakān sarvān pratyāyayur muneḥ puraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5043: tathā tad bhānavaś caivam upariṣṭāṃ gatā api // Rm_12.305{3} //
K14ratnml_u:5045: avabhāsya kramāt sarvān devalokān abhāsayan // Rm_12.306{4} //
K14ratnml_u:5047: evaṃ sarvāś ca tān sarvān avabhāsya samaṃtataḥ // Rm_12.307{5} //
K14ratnml_u:5048: gāthāḥ prodghoṣayantaś ca pralayaṃ saugate vṛṣe /
K14ratnml_u:5049: anityaṃ khalu saṃsāraṃ duḥkhaśūnyaṃ hy anātmakaṃ // Rm_12.308{6} //
K14ratnml_u:5050: tasmāt māraṃ parityajya gachadhvaṃ śaraṇaṃ muneḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5053: yo 'py asmin dharmavinaye hy apramattaś cariṣyati // Rm_12.310{8} //
K14ratnml_u:5055: atha te bhānavaḥ sarve traidhātubhuvaneṣv api /
K14ratnml_u:5056: sarvān satvān samuddhṛtya punaḥ pratyāyayur muneḥ // Rm_12.312{10} //
K14ratnml_u:5057: atha te bhānavaḥ sarve bhagavantaṃ munīśvaraṃ /
K14ratnml_u:5058: pradakṣiṇatrayaṃ kṛtvā mūrddhni cāntardadhur muneḥ // Rm_12.313{11} //
K14ratnml_u:5060: tat tadadbhutam ālokya vabhūvur vismayoddhatāḥ // Rm_12.314{12} //
K14ratnml_u:5062: bhagavantaṃ guruṃ natvā papracha smitakāraṇaṃ // Rm_12.315{12/} //
K14ratnml_u:5064: vinirgatā diśaḥ sarvān avabhāsya śatā punaḥ // Rm_12.316{13} //
K14ratnml_u:5065: bhavān hi sugato śāstā saṃbuddho bhagavañ jinaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5068: tad bhava bhagavaṃ kasmāt smitaiḥ karoti sāṃprataṃ /
K14ratnml_u:5069: dṛṣṭvaivaṃ taṃ smitaṃ sarve ime lokāḥ pravismitāḥ // Rm_12.318{15} //
K14ratnml_u:5071: darśayanti smitaṃ kecit tat kena bhavataḥ smṛtaṃ // Rm_12.319{16} //
K14ratnml_u:5072: tad etad dhetum ichanti śrotuṃ sarve ime janāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5073: tad etat kāraṇaṃ śāstaḥ samādeṣṭuṃ samarhati // Rm_12.320{17} //
K14ratnml_u:5075: tatheti pratisaṃmodya tam ānaṃdaṃ vabhāṣata // Rm_12.321{18} //
K14ratnml_u:5076: evam etat tathānaṃda yathaiva bhāṣasi tvayā /
K14ratnml_u:5077: tat smitaṃ yadarthaṃ me tad vakṣye śṛṇutādarāt // Rm_12.322{19} //
K14ratnml_u:5079: ebhī ratnaiś ca satkṛtya kṛtā pūjā svabhaktitaḥ // Rm_12.323{20} //
K14ratnml_u:5081: kramād bodhicarīṃ prāpya pūryya pāramitā daśa // Rm_12.324{21} //
K14ratnml_u:5083: saṃbodhiṃ samavāpyaivaṃ jitvā māragaṇān api // Rm_12.325{22} //
K14ratnml_u:5085: dharmarājo jagaṃnātho loke śāstā bhaviṣyati // Rm_12.326{23} //
K14ratnml_u:5089: dharnio hi jagatāṃ mitram ihāmutra samantataḥ // Rm_12.328{25} //
K14ratnml_u:5091: tasmād dharmaṃ samādhāya saṃcaradhvaṃ samāhitaḥ // Rm_12.329{26} //
K14ratnml_u:5092: tena vā maṃgalaṃ nityaṃ sarvabhāvī bhaved dhruvaṃ // Rm_12.330{27} //
K14ratnml_u:5094: tatheti moditas taṃ ca guruṃ natvā sa naṃdataḥ // Rm_12.331{28} //
K14ratnml_u:5095: so 'pi sārthapatiś caiva svakaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ kila /
K14ratnml_u:5098: bhagavaṃtaṃ sasaṃghaṃ taṃ praṇatvaivaṃ vyatijñapat // Rm_12.333{30} //
K14ratnml_u:5101: bhavatāṃ śaraṇaṃ kṛtvā bhavāmy aham upāsakaḥ // Rm_12.334{31} //
K14ratnml_u:5102: yan mayā prakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ kāritaṃ cānumoditaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:5103: tat sarvaṃ deśayiṣyāmi tan me dehi śubhāṃ cariṃ // Rm_12.335{32} //
K14ratnml_u:5105: kṣamasva me 'parādhatvaṃ tan māṃ rakṣa mudā tathā // Rm_12.336{33} //
K14ratnml_u:5106: evaṃ tenārthitaṃ śrutvā sa saṃbuddho 'bhyadhāt punaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5107: yathā te 'bhihitaṃ sādho tathā saṃsetsyate dhruvaṃ // Rm_12.337{34} //
K14ratnml_u:5110: tatas tvaṃ kramato hy evaṃ pūrya pāramitā drutaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:5111: bodhisatvo mahāsatvo bhaved bodhim avāpnuyāt // Rm_12.339{36} //
K14ratnml_u:5113: tena te maṃgalaṃ nityaṃ sarvatrāpi bhaved dhruvaṃ // Rm_12.340{37} //
K14ratnml_u:5114: jayo 'stu te sadā bodhau siddhyatu praṇihitaṃ drutaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:5115: ciraṃ jīvaṃ hitaṃ loke dharmaṃ dhṛtvā sukhaṃ vasa // Rm_12.341{38} //
K14ratnml_u:5116: ity asau bhagavān buddhas tasmai datvāśiṣaṃ śubhāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:5117: saṃghaiḥ saha samutthāya svaṃ vihāraṃ yayau tataḥ // Rm_12.342{39} //
K14ratnml_u:5120: tathā sarve 'pi satvāś ca śrutvā tasya pravṛttitāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:5122: etat me guruṇākhyātaṃ saṃśrutaṃ yathā mayā /
K14ratnml_u:5123: tathātraivaṃ tava prītyā kathyate saṃprabudhyatāṃ // Rm_12.345{42} //
K14ratnml_u:5124: tathā rājan tvayāpy evaṃ svayaṃ dhṛtvā vṛṣaṃ śubhe /
K14ratnml_u:5125: bodhayitvā prajāś cāpi sthāpanīyāḥ sadā śubhe // Rm_12.346{43} //
K14ratnml_u:5126: evaṃ cet te sadāpy evaṃ sarvatrāpi sumaṃgalaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:5127: bhaven nūnaṃ mahārājan satyam etan na saṃśayaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5128: dharmeṇa nirjitaṃ pāpaṃ dharmeṇa jīyate kudhīḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5129: dharmeṇa nirjitā mārā dharmeṇa bodhim āpnuyāt /
K14ratnml_u:5132: tathā taṃ kramaṇo rāja bodhicaryyāhitāya ca /
K14ratnml_u:5136: śrutvā rājo tathety evaṃ pratyanandan sapārṣadaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5145: yaḥ śrīmāñ chrīghano loke saddharmaiḥ samupādiśat /
K14ratnml_u:5146: śāsanāni trilokeṣu jayantu tasya sarvadā // Rm_13.1{1} //
K14ratnml_u:5147: avadānatatvaṃ vakṣyāmi natvā taṃ śrīghanaṃ guruṃ /
K14ratnml_u:5150: ekasmin samaye tatra sa rājā svajanaiḥ saha // Rm_13.3{3} //
K14ratnml_u:5151: paurikaiś ca sabhāṃ kṛtvā saddharmaṃ śrotum aicchata /
K14ratnml_u:5152: tadā sa saugato bhikṣur upagupto jināṃśajaḥ // Rm_13.4{4} //
K14ratnml_u:5156: athāśoko mahīpālaḥ sa maṃtripaurikaiḥ saha // Rm_13.6{6} //
K14ratnml_u:5158: sthitvā bhūmau svajānubhyām uttarāsaṅgam udvahan // Rm_13.7{7} //
K14ratnml_u:5159: kṛtāñjaliḥ puṭo natvā punar evam abhāṣata /
K14ratnml_u:5160: bhadanta śrotum icchāmi saddharmaṃ sukhasaṃpradaṃ // Rm_13.8{8} //
K14ratnml_u:5161: yathoktaṃ śrīmunīndreṇa tathā deṣṭuṃ ca me 'rhati /
K14ratnml_u:5162: evaṃ tena mahīndreṇa prārthite sa yatīśvaraḥ // Rm_13.9{9} //
K14ratnml_u:5164: sādhu suṣṭhu mahārāja śṛṇu saddharmam ādarāt // Rm_13.10{10} //
K14ratnml_u:5165: yathā me guruṇā khyātaṃ tathā vakṣyāmi te hite /
K14ratnml_u:5166: purā sa bhagavān buddhaḥ śakyasiṃho śubhākaraḥ // Rm_13.11{11} //
K14ratnml_u:5180: śrāvakair bhikṣubhiḥ sārddhaṃ bodhisatvair upāsakaiḥ // Rm_13.18{18} //
K14ratnml_u:5183: evaṃ tatra sabhāsīnaṃ saṃbuddhaṃ dharmabhāṣiṇaṃ // Rm_13.19{19} //
K14ratnml_u:5184: dṛṣṭvā dharmāmṛtaṃ pātuṃ sarvalokāḥ samāyayuḥ // Rm_13.20{19/} //
K14ratnml_u:5185: daivā daityāś ca siddhāś ca yakṣagaṃdharvakinnarāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5186: grahā vidyādharāḥ sādhyā nāgeṃdrā garuḍā api // Rm_13.21{20} //
K14ratnml_u:5187: sarve 'pi lokapālāś ca munayaś ca maharṣayaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5188: yatayo yoginaś cāpi tīrthikāś ca tapaśvinaḥ // Rm_13.22{21} //
K14ratnml_u:5189: brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyāś cāpi vaiśyāḥ śūdrāś ca maṃtriṇaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5190: amātyāḥ koṭṭavārāś ca sārthavāhā mahājanāḥ // Rm_13.23{22} //
K14ratnml_u:5191: śilpino vaṇijaś cāpi gṛhasthāḥ paurikā janāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5192: tathā jānapadāś cāpi grāmyāḥ kārpaṭikā api // Rm_13.24{23} //
K14ratnml_u:5196: tatra sarve praviṣṭās te dṛṣṭvā taṃ sugataṃ jinaṃ // Rm_13.26{25} //
K14ratnml_u:5197: vanditvānanditāḥ sarve pūjāṃ cakrur yathākramaṃ // Rm_13.27{26/} //
K14ratnml_u:5199: dharmmaṃ śrotuṃ puraskṛtya tasthuḥ sāñjalayo mudā // Rm_13.28{27} //
K14ratnml_u:5200: atha sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā tāṃl lokān dharmavāñchinaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5203: dharmaṃ prakāśayaṃ loke tasthau dīptāṃśumān iva // Rm_13.30{29} //
K14ratnml_u:5209: ādāya ratisaṃrakto reme nityaṃ yathāsukhaṃ // Rm_13.33{32} //
K14ratnml_u:5211: tataḥ pravṛddhagarbhā sā pāṇḍuvarṇā vyarājata // Rm_13.34{33} //
K14ratnml_u:5212: tataḥ sā garbhasaṃjātaṃ putraṃ tasyām upāśritaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:5213: putraṃ matvābhinaṃdaṃtī bharttāram evam abravīt // Rm_13.35{34} //
K14ratnml_u:5214: svāmin garbhe prajāto me yat kukṣau dakṣiṇāśritaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5215: dārako 'yaṃ bhavet putraḥ nūnaṃ tasmāt pramodaya // Rm_13.36{35} //
K14ratnml_u:5216: iti bhāryoditaṃ śrutvā sa gṛhasthaḥ praharṣitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5217: garbhe sa vyāśritaṃ dṛṣṭvā mudaivaṃ samudānayat // Rm_13.37{36} //
K14ratnml_u:5218: vata me jāyate putras tad ahaṃ bhāgyavān bhave /
K14ratnml_u:5219: putramukhaṃ hi paśyeyaṃ vaṃśasthitir bhaved api // Rm_13.38{37} //
K14ratnml_u:5221: tenānayor dvayor astu jananīputrayoḥ śivaṃ // Rm_13.39{38} //
K14ratnml_u:5222: evaṃ proktvā gṛhasthaḥ sa śraddhayā saṃpramoditaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5223: bhikṣvarthibrāhmaṇebhyaś ca dadau dānaṃ yathepsitaṃ // Rm_13.40{39} //
K14ratnml_u:5226: tac chubhaṃ prārthayan nityaṃ tasthau putrasamutsukaḥ // Rm_13.41{40} //
K14ratnml_u:5228: asūta samaye putraṃ suṃdaraṃ lakṣaṇānvitaṃ // Rm_13.42{41} //
K14ratnml_u:5229: tataḥ sa janakaḥ śrutvā saṃprajātaṃ sutaṃ mudā /
K14ratnml_u:5230: sahasā samupāsritya dadarśa taṃ sasuṃdaraṃ // Rm_13.43{42} //
K14ratnml_u:5232: dṛṣṭvāpi suciraṃ paśyann eva tasthāv atṛptitaḥ // Rm_13.44{43} //
K14ratnml_u:5233: tato jātimahaṃ kṛtvā tasya pitrā prasādinā /
K14ratnml_u:5234: vaḍika iti nāmnā prakhyāpito 'bhūt sa dārakaḥ // Rm_13.45{45/} //
K14ratnml_u:5237: tathā sa vaḍiko vālo 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir ādarāt /
K14ratnml_u:5238: pālyamānaḥ pravṛddho 'bhūt hradastham iva paṃkajaṃ // Rm_13.47{47} //
K14ratnml_u:5241: tatra sa sadguruṃ natvā kramāl lipīn mudāgrahīt /
K14ratnml_u:5243: tataḥ sa gurubhiḥ samyac chiṣyamāṇaḥ subuddhimān /
K14ratnml_u:5244: adhītya sarvaśāstrāṇi vidyāpāraṃ yayau laghu // Rm_13.50{50} //
K14ratnml_u:5246: dehe kasmāt samutpanno mahāvyādhiḥ parākramat // Rm_13.51{51} //
K14ratnml_u:5250: krandantaṃ sa pitā dṛṣṭvā kṛpayaivaṃ vyaciṃtayat // Rm_13.53{53} //
K14ratnml_u:5252: asahyavedanākrānto bhoktum api na vāñchati // Rm_13.54{54} //
K14ratnml_u:5253: avaśyaṃ maraṇaṃ yāyāt kathaṃ jīved abhuktavān /
K14ratnml_u:5254: mṛte putre mariṣye 'haṃ snehaduḥkhaṃ kathaṃ sahe // Rm_13.55{55} //
K14ratnml_u:5256: tam eva svātmajaṃ paśyaṃs tasthau snehābhivandhitaḥ // Rm_13.56{56} //
K14ratnml_u:5261: sarve te rogiṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā snehārttā evam abruvan // Rm_13.58{58} //
K14ratnml_u:5262: kiṃ bho svasthaṃ na te dehe bhoktuṃ kiṃ vā na vāñchasi /
K14ratnml_u:5263: bhuṃkṣva yathepsitaṃ pathyaṃ tiṣṭha dhairyaṃ samāśrayan // Rm_13.59{59} //
K14ratnml_u:5264: iti prokte 'pi taiḥ sarvaiḥ sa vaḍiko jvarānvitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5265: dṛṣṭvaiva tān muhuḥ paśyan naiva kiñcid abhāṣata // Rm_13.60{60} //
K14ratnml_u:5266: tataḥ sarve 'pi te dṛṣṭvā taṃ vaḍikaṃ rujāturaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:5269: sahasā vaidyam āhūya darśayasva samāhitaḥ // Rm_13.62{62} //
K14ratnml_u:5270: upadiṣṭaṃ yathā tena vaidyena sudhiyā tathā /
K14ratnml_u:5273: kramād asya śarīrastho rogaḥ śāntiṃ vrajed dhruvaṃ // Rm_13.64{64} //
K14ratnml_u:5275: svakuladharmam ādhāya sukhaṃ jīvec chubhe caran // Rm_13.65{65} //
K14ratnml_u:5276: iti matvā mahābhāga mā kṛthās tad viṣādanaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:5277: dhairyam ālamvya devāṃś ca smṛtvā bhuktvā sukhaṃ vasa // Rm_13.66{66} //
K14ratnml_u:5278: ity evaṃ samupādiśya tad gṛhasthāt samutthitāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5279: sarve te snehaduḥkhārttāḥ svasvageham upācarat // Rm_13.67{67} //
K14ratnml_u:5280: tataḥ sa gṛhabhṛt tasya putrasya rogaśāṃtaye /
K14ratnml_u:5282: tasya roganimittaṃ sa vaidyo dṛṣṭvā samīkṣya ca /
K14ratnml_u:5284: tathāpi tasya tadrogaḥ parivṛddho dine dine /
K14ratnml_u:5285: kenāpi hy upacāreṇa naiva śāntim upāyayau // Rm_13.70{70} //
K14ratnml_u:5286: tadrogaṃ varddhitaṃ dṛṣṭvā janakaḥ sa viṣāditaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5288: tataḥ sa bhūtiko dṛṣṭvā tasya rogapraśāntaye /
K14ratnml_u:5289: sa bhūtadevatābhyaś ca valiṃ prādād yathāvidhi // Rm_13.72{72} //
K14ratnml_u:5291: kiñcid api viśeṣeṇa naiva śāntim upāyayau // Rm_13.73{73} //
K14ratnml_u:5292: tataḥ sa janako dṛṣṭvā tad rogaṃ parivarddhitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:5297: tathā sa janakas tasya rogiṇo grahaśāntaye /
K14ratnml_u:5299: tathāpi tasya tadrogo varddhito na śamaṃ yayau /
K14ratnml_u:5300: daivena samupāghrāte tadupāye na siddhyate // Rm_13.77{77} //
K14ratnml_u:5301: tathā sa janakas tasya putrasya rogavṛddhitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:5302: dṛṣṭvā nirāśayā bhinnacitto mūrcchām upāyayau // Rm_13.78{78} //
K14ratnml_u:5303: tadā sā supriyā bhāryā bharttāraṃ taṃ vimohitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:5305: svāmin dhairyyaṃ samālambya tyaja citte vimohatāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:5306: kim asmākaṃ prayatnena daivasyātra pramāṇike // Rm_13.80{80} //
K14ratnml_u:5308: yad abhāvi na tad bhāvi bhāvi cen na tad anyathā // Rm_13.81{81} //
K14ratnml_u:5312: kuladevaṃ samabhyarcya prārthayad evam ādarāt // Rm_13.83{83} //
K14ratnml_u:5313: prasīda me kuleśa tvaṃ kṣamasva hy aparādhatāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:5314: tavaiva śaraṇastho 'haṃ tan me putraṃ prarakṣatāṃ // Rm_13.84{84} //
K14ratnml_u:5316: tasya rogo vivṛddho 'bhūn naiva śāmyam upākramat // Rm_13.85{85} //
K14ratnml_u:5317: tathā brahmādidevāṃś ca sarvān lokādhipān api /
K14ratnml_u:5323: tathāpi tasya rogo na śamito 'bhūt pravarddhitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5324: tatas taṃ janako dṛṣṭvā nirāśā mūrchito 'patat // Rm_13.89{89} //
K14ratnml_u:5325: tadā sa vaḍiko rogī pitaraṃ taṃ vimūrchitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:5326: pṛthivyāṃ patitaṃ dṛṣṭvā śanair nīcasvaro 'vadat // Rm_13.90{90} //
K14ratnml_u:5327: hā hā me jāvate pāpaṃ yenāyaṃ patitaḥ pitā /
K14ratnml_u:5330: hā tātottiṣṭha māṃ paśya mā tyajātmajaṃ āturaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:5331: dhairyyam ālamvya saṃdhāya rakṣa māṃ samupasthitaḥ // Rm_13.92{92} //
K14ratnml_u:5332: ity asau vilapan putraḥ pitaraṃ taṃ vimūrchitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:5333: dṛṣṭvā bhojanakety aśru muñcaṃs tasthau nirāśritaḥ // Rm_13.93{93} //
K14ratnml_u:5334: tadā sā supriyā bhāryyā bharttāraṃ taṃ vimūrchitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:5336: svāmin dhairyaṃ samālaṃbya paśya māṃ te priyaṃ satīṃ /
K14ratnml_u:5337: tyaktvā dainyaṃ samādhāya paśyan rakṣātmakaṃ priyaṃ // Rm_13.95{95} //
K14ratnml_u:5338: iti bhāryoditaṃ śrutvā sa gṛhastho samutthitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5339: dṛṣṭvā tāṃ supriyāṃ bhāryāṃ putraṃ caivam abhāṣata // Rm_13.96{96} //
K14ratnml_u:5340: hā daiva kiṃ mayā pāpaṃ prakṛtaṃ dāruṇaṃ purā /
K14ratnml_u:5341: yenāyaṃ sukṛtī putraḥ tyaktvā māṃ kva prayāsyati // Rm_13.97{97} //
K14ratnml_u:5342: hā hā me saṃpadaś caitāḥ samṛddhāḥ samupārjitāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5343: ko nu bhoktā bhaved āsāṃ vyarthaṃ nakṣyanti sarvaśaḥ // Rm_13.98{98} //
K14ratnml_u:5344: kim atrāhaṃ kariṣyāmi yāsyāmi śaraṇaṃ ca kaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:5345: ko nu māṃ sahasā rakṣed datvā putrasya jīvitaṃ // Rm_13.99{99} //
K14ratnml_u:5346: kim atrāsya rujaḥ śāntyai kariṣyāmi pratikriyāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:5347: na jāne parimūḍho 'smi cetanā me na vidyate // Rm_13.100{100} //
K14ratnml_u:5350: yad ime tīrthikā vijñā bhagavanto vicakṣaṇāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5351: sarvajñāḥ sadguṇādhārāḥ śāstāro me hitaṃkarāḥ // Rm_13.102{102} //
K14ratnml_u:5352: tat tān sarvān samāmaṃtrya gṛhe bhokṣyaiḥ samarcayan /
K14ratnml_u:5353: imaṃ putraṃ puraḥ sthāpya darśayeyaṃ śubhāptaye // Rm_13.103{103} //
K14ratnml_u:5354: tat sudṛṣṭiprasādena nūnam asya bhavec chuvaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:5355: tato hi kramaśo rogāḥ śāmyeyuḥ sarvathā laghu // Rm_13.104{104} //
K14ratnml_u:5356: tadāyam ātmajaḥ puṣṭo na rogī sutanuḥ sukhī /
K14ratnml_u:5357: kṛtī śubharato bhogī kuladharme samācaret // Rm_13.105{105} //
K14ratnml_u:5358: iti niścitya sa śreṣṭhī tatra tīrthyāśrame gataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5359: tān sarvāṃs tīrthikān natvā prārthayed evam ādarāt // Rm_13.106{106} //
K14ratnml_u:5360: namo vo brahmavijñebhyo bhavatāṃ śaraṇaṃ vraje /
K14ratnml_u:5361: vijñapyate yad arthaṃ tad anugrahītum arhata // Rm_13.107{107} //
K14ratnml_u:5364: sarve taṃ samupāmaṃtrya pramodayitum abruvan // Rm_13.108{108} //
K14ratnml_u:5365: sādhu vada mahāsādho yat te kāryaṃ samīhitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:5366: tat sarvaṃ sarvathāsmābhiḥ kṛtam evaṃ kariṣyate // Rm_13.109{109} //
K14ratnml_u:5367: iti tais tīrthikaiḥ prokte sa śreṣṭhī saṃprasāditaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5368: kṛtāñjalipuṭo natvā punar evam abhāṣata // Rm_13.110{110} //
K14ratnml_u:5370: tat sarvaṃ pratijānīta yad arthaṃ samupācare // Rm_13.111{111} //
K14ratnml_u:5371: tathāpi cārthayiṣye 'tra yan me kaṣṭaṃ pravarttate /
K14ratnml_u:5372: tad vo vijñāpanaṃ kartuṃ bhavataḥ śaraṇaṃ vraje // Rm_13.112{112} //
K14ratnml_u:5373: yan mayā prakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ tena me svātmajādhunā /
K14ratnml_u:5375: nānāsvastividhānair hi tasya rogo na śāmyati /
K14ratnml_u:5376: bhiṣajāṃ kṛtayatnāni na siddhyanti kathaṃ cana // Rm_13.114{114} //
K14ratnml_u:5377: anekā devatāś cāpi prābhyarcya prārthito mayā /
K14ratnml_u:5378: tathāpi śāmyate naiva tasya rogo vivarddhitaḥ // Rm_13.115{115} //
K14ratnml_u:5380: tathā tathā na tadrogaḥ praśāmyati pravarddhyate // Rm_13.116{116} //
K14ratnml_u:5381: kim upāyaṃ kariṣyāmi kena śāmyeta tadgadaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5382: tad upāyaṃ pradātavyaṃ yenāśu śāmyate kramāt // Rm_13.117{117} //
K14ratnml_u:5383: iti vijñāpanāṃ kartuṃ bhavatāṃ śaraṇaṃ vraje /
K14ratnml_u:5384: tan me 'nukampayāsu no rogaśāntir vidhīyatāṃ // Rm_13.118{118} //
K14ratnml_u:5386: tan me sukṛpayā dṛṣṭyā paritrātuṃ samarhata // Rm_13.119{119} //
K14ratnml_u:5387: iti tenārthitaṃ śrutvā sarve te tīrthikā api /
K14ratnml_u:5388: śreṣṭhinaṃ taṃ samāmaṃtrya punar evaṃ samabruvan // Rm_13.120{120} //
K14ratnml_u:5389: śṛṇu sādho yad asmābhir hitārthaṃ te pracakṣyatāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:5390: tat satyaṃ naḥ parijñāya pramāṇīkriyatāṃ kila // Rm_13.121{121} //
K14ratnml_u:5392: tasmād atra viṣādatvaṃ mā kṛthā dhairyam āśraya // Rm_13.122{122} //
K14ratnml_u:5393: adyaiva sahasā gatvā vayaṃ dṛṣṭvā tavātmajaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:5394: niḥpāpaṃ nīrujaṃ svāsthyaṃ kariṣyāmaḥ sujīvitaṃ // Rm_13.123{123} //
K14ratnml_u:5395: apy etad vacanaṃ satyaṃ śrutvā dṛṣṭvā pramāṇaya /
K14ratnml_u:5397: anyathā na bhavet kvāpi hy asmākaṃ brahmacāriṇāṃ // Rm_13.124{124} //
K14ratnml_u:5398: iti tais tīrthikaiḥ proktaṃ śrutvā sa gṛhasattamaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5399: tatheti pratiharṣitvā natvā tān svagṛhaṃ yayau // Rm_13.125{125} //
K14ratnml_u:5400: tatra sa gṛha āsādya dāsidāsajanaiḥ saha /
K14ratnml_u:5402: tasminn eva kṣaṇe tatra sarve te tīrthikā mudā /
K14ratnml_u:5404: tathā tān samupāsīnān dṛṣṭvā śreṣṭhī sa moditaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5406: tataś ca bhojanānte sa vaḍikaṃ taṃ priyātmajaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:5408: te sarve tīrthikā dṛṣṭvā vaḍikaṃ taṃ rujānvitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:5411: tatpātakavimuktyai tu dātavyaṃ dānam ādarāt // Rm_13.131{131} //
K14ratnml_u:5414: yady etad dīyate dānaṃ tvayā gṛhapate tathā /
K14ratnml_u:5419: tataḥ sarve 'pi rogāś ca vinakṣyanti kramād drutaṃ // Rm_13.135{135} //
K14ratnml_u:5420: tato rogair vimukto 'yaṃ kuśalī svāsthyam āpnuyāt /
K14ratnml_u:5421: tataḥ puṣṭo viśuddhāṅgaḥ suśīlaḥ sukṛtī sudhīḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5423: iti matvā tvayā sādho dātavyaṃ dānam ādarāt /
K14ratnml_u:5424: anyathā na bhavet svasti tavāsya naṃdanasya ca // Rm_13.137{167} //
K14ratnml_u:5425: iti tair gaditaṃ śrutvā sa śreṣṭhī paribodhitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5426: tasyātmajasya trāṇārthaṃ tathā dātum udācarat // Rm_13.138{[138]} //
K14ratnml_u:5427: tataḥ sa punar abhyarcya tān sarvāns tīrthikān patīn /
K14ratnml_u:5429: tatas te tīrthikāḥ sarve dṛṣṭvā tāni pramoditāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5430: sarvāny api pratigṛhya tathāśīrvacanaṃ daduḥ // Rm_13.140{140} //
K14ratnml_u:5431: svasty astu te sadā sādho kalyāṇam astu sarvathā /
K14ratnml_u:5433: nīrogī suciraṃ jīvyā jayo 'stu te samantataḥ // Rm_13.141{141} //
K14ratnml_u:5434: etad eva samādiśya sarve te tīrthikās tataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5435: tāni sarvāṇi vastūni pratigṛhyāśramaṃ yayuḥ // Rm_13.142{142} //
K14ratnml_u:5436: tathāpi tasya rogā na śamitā varddhitāḥ kramāt /
K14ratnml_u:5438: tatas taj janako dṛṣṭvā svātmajaṃ taṃ rujāturaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:5439: nirāśāmūrchito bhūmau nipataṃ vyalapat tathā // Rm_13.144{144} //
K14ratnml_u:5440: hā daiva kiṃ mayā pāpaṃ dāruṇaṃ prakṛtaṃ purā /
