K14ratnml_u:5441: yato 'yaṃ svātmajaḥ putraḥ puro me maraṇaṃ vrajet // Rm_13.145{145} //
K14ratnml_u:5443: sarvāṇy etāni matpāpair nisphalāni bhavanti hi // Rm_13.146{146} //
K14ratnml_u:5444: kiṃ mayātrāpi karttavyaṃ ko 'tra me hitam ādiśet /
K14ratnml_u:5445: sarvathāhaṃ vinaṣṭo 'smi ko 'pi trātā na vidyate // Rm_13.147{147} //
K14ratnml_u:5446: kasyātra śaraṇaṃ yāsye ko no rakṣed dayādṛśā /
K14ratnml_u:5447: sarve vayaṃ vinaṣṭāsma hā daiva śaraṇaṃ vraje // Rm_13.148{148} //
K14ratnml_u:5448: ity evaṃ vilapaṃtaṃ taṃ janakaṃ vaḍiko 'pi saḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5449: dṛṣṭvā śanaiḥ samāhūya pura evam abhāṣata // Rm_13.149{149} //
K14ratnml_u:5450: bho tāta kiṃ tvayātrāpi karttavyaṃ hi mayāpi ca /
K14ratnml_u:5451: sarveṣām api jantūnāṃ daivagatiḥ pramāṇikā // Rm_13.150{150} //
K14ratnml_u:5452: iti matvā viṣādatvaṃ hṛdaye mā kṛthās tyaja /
K14ratnml_u:5453: saṃbuddhaśaraṇaṃ kṛtvā bhaja nityam anusmaran // Rm_13.151{151} //
K14ratnml_u:5456: tad evaṃ sugataṃ smṛtvā saddharmaṃ samupāśrayan /
K14ratnml_u:5457: saṃghānāṃ bhajanaṃ kṛtvā cinu puṇyaṃ samāhitaḥ // Rm_13.153{153} //
K14ratnml_u:5458: triratne sādhitaṃ puṇyaṃ na kṣiṇuyāt kadā cana /
K14ratnml_u:5459: yadi daivād vipattiḥ syāt puṇyaṃ tu labhate varaṃ // Rm_13.154{154} //
K14ratnml_u:5460: puṇyena rakṣyate lokaḥ puṇyena sadgatiṃ vrajet /
K14ratnml_u:5461: tasmāt puṇyaṃ mahāratnaṃ cinu dhairyaṃ samāśrayan // Rm_13.155{155} //
K14ratnml_u:5463: iti matvāpi taṃ buddhaṃ smṛtvā bhaja samāhitaḥ // Rm_13.156{156} //
K14ratnml_u:5464: tathāhaṃ vā tam evātra saṃbuddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ vrajan /
K14ratnml_u:5465: saṃsmṛtvā bhajanaṃ kurvan vrajeya maraṇaṃ dhruvaṃ // Rm_13.157{157} //
K14ratnml_u:5466: yadi tasya jinendrasya kṛpāsti mayi pāpini /
K14ratnml_u:5470: sarvathā durgatiṃ tyaktvā sadgatiṃ punar āpnuyāṃ // Rm_13.159{159} //
K14ratnml_u:5471: evaṃ jñātvā tvayā tāta mā kriyatāṃ viṣādatā /
K14ratnml_u:5472: saṃsāre 'vaśyaṃ marttavyaṃ sarveṣām api janmināṃ // Rm_13.160{160} //
K14ratnml_u:5473: ity uktvā sa rujārtto 'pi vaḍiko dhairyyam āśrayan /
K14ratnml_u:5474: saṃbuddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ kṛtvā smṛtvā tasthau samāhitaḥ // Rm_13.161{161} //
K14ratnml_u:5475: tathā sa gṛhabhṛc chreṣṭhī śrutvaitad ātmajoditaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:5476: satyam etat parijñāya buddhaṃ smṛtvā tathāvadat // Rm_13.162{162} //
K14ratnml_u:5477: namo buddhāya dharmāya saṃghāya ca sadā smare /
K14ratnml_u:5478: adyārabhya sadā nityaṃ bhavatāṃ śaraṇaṃ vraje // Rm_13.163{163} //
K14ratnml_u:5479: yadi vo 'sti kṛpā loke rakṣantu naḥ suduḥkhinaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5480: sarvathā kṛpayā dṛṣṭyā dṛṣṭvāśu trātum arhati // Rm_13.164{164} //
K14ratnml_u:5482: tathāsmān kṛpayā dṛṣṭvā trātum arhati sarvathā // Rm_13.165{165} //
K14ratnml_u:5484: kṛpayānugrahaṃ kṛtvā putraratnaṃ prayaccha me // Rm_13.166{166} //
K14ratnml_u:5486: bhavatāṃ śaraṇe sthitvā caratu vratam ādarāt // Rm_13.167{167} //
K14ratnml_u:5487: ity evaṃ smaraṇaṃ kṛtvā saṃbuddhaśaraṇaṃ vrajan /
K14ratnml_u:5488: sa śreṣṭhī taṃ sutaṃ dṛṣṭvā tasthau mohavinoditaḥ // Rm_13.168{168} //
K14ratnml_u:5489: tasminn eva kṣaṇe lokāṃ trātuṃ sa bhagavān muniḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5490: saṃpaśyan kṛpayā dṛṣṭyā prādrākṣīt tān saduḥkhinaḥ // Rm_13.169{169} //
K14ratnml_u:5491: tathā tān duḥkhino dṛṣṭvā bhagavān sa jineśvaraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5492: sahasā tān paritrātuṃ buddharasmiṃ vyamuñcata // Rm_13.170{170} //
K14ratnml_u:5494: samantāt samatikramya tad gṛham avabhāsitaṃ // Rm_13.171{171} //
K14ratnml_u:5495: tato maitryaṃśavaś cāpi tena bhagavatā punaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5496: samutṣṛṣṭās tanau tasya paryaspṛśan prasāditāḥ // Rm_13.172{172} //
K14ratnml_u:5497: tatas tasya tanus taiḥ saṃspṛṣṭamātre samaṃtataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5499: tataḥ sa vaḍikaḥ svāsthyaṃ prāpya nirmalamānasaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5500: vismitaḥ pitaraṃ paśyan samāmaṃtryaivam abravīt // Rm_13.174{174} //
K14ratnml_u:5502: aho saṃghaprabhāvatvaṃ paśya tāta muneḥ prabhāṃ // Rm_13.175{175} //
K14ratnml_u:5505: dhanyo 'yaṃ bhagavān buddho jayatv evaṃ sadā sthitaḥ // Rm_13.176{176} //
K14ratnml_u:5507: pāpaiś cāpi vimukto 'ham iti satyaṃ pramanyate // Rm_13.177{177} //
K14ratnml_u:5508: tasmāt tam eva śāstāraṃ saṃbuddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ vraje /
K14ratnml_u:5510: evaṃ buddhaguṇān smṛtvā vaḍikaḥ sa pramoditaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5511: kṛtāñjaliḥ smaran bhūyaḥ praṇatvaivam ayācata // Rm_13.179{179} //
K14ratnml_u:5512: namas te bhagavan nātha bhavatāṃ śaraṇaṃ vraje /
K14ratnml_u:5513: yāvadbhavaṃ triratnānāṃ bhaveyaṃ sevakaḥ sadā // Rm_13.180{180} //
K14ratnml_u:5514: ity evaṃ sugataṃ smṛtvā vaḍikaḥ so 'bhibodhitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5515: bhūyo bhūyaḥ smaran natvā tasthau svāsthyatvam āgataḥ // Rm_13.181{181} //
K14ratnml_u:5516: tadā sa bhagavān buddho dṛṣṭvā taṃ śuddhamānasaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:5517: saddharmaṃ samupādeṣṭuṃ tad dvāre samupāsarat // Rm_13.182{182} //
K14ratnml_u:5519: dṛṣṭvaiva vismito dvāsthaḥ sahasā gṛham āviśat // Rm_13.183{183} //
K14ratnml_u:5520: tatra gṛhapatiṃ dṛṣṭvā vaḍikaṃ taṃ ca sādaraṃ /
K14ratnml_u:5523: tad atra sahasopetya samāmaṃtrya praveśaya // Rm_13.185{185} //
K14ratnml_u:5524: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā vaḍikaḥ sa prasāditaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5525: utthitaḥ sahasopetya taṃ munīndraṃ mudānamat // Rm_13.186{186} //
K14ratnml_u:5526: natvā taṃ sugataṃ gehe prajñapya svāsanaṃ mudā /
K14ratnml_u:5528: svāgataṃ bhagavan vāṃche bhavatāṃ śaraṇaṃ mune /
K14ratnml_u:5530: iti tenodite buddho bhagavān sa samāviśan /
K14ratnml_u:5531: svāsane samupāsīno vaḍikaṃ taṃ tathāvadat // Rm_13.189{1691} //
K14ratnml_u:5532: kiṃ te vaḍika duḥkhatvaṃ vādhakaś ca kathaṃ vada /
K14ratnml_u:5533: iti bhagavatā pṛṣṭo vaḍikaḥ sa tathāvadat // Rm_13.190{190} //
K14ratnml_u:5534: kāyikaṃ jāyate duḥkhaṃ cetasikaṃ ca me mune /
K14ratnml_u:5535: tad bhavān kṛpayā dṛṣṭyā śamayet tat prabādhanaṃ // Rm_13.191{191} //
K14ratnml_u:5536: iti tad vijñāpitaṃ śrutvā bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5540: anena te manodāhaṃ praśāmyeta sadāpi hi // Rm_13.193{193} //
K14ratnml_u:5541: ity ādiśya munīndraḥ sa punar evaṃ vyaciṃtayat /
K14ratnml_u:5544: ādāya kṣīrikāṃ nāma mahauṣadhīm upānayat // Rm_13.195{195} //
K14ratnml_u:5545: tatra so surarājas taṃ bhagavantaṃ praṇamya tāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:5546: mahauṣadhīm upasthāpya pura evaṃ samabravīt // Rm_13.196{196} //
K14ratnml_u:5549: ity ukte tena śakreṇa dṛṣṭvā tāṃ bhagavān muniḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5550: gṛhītvā vaḍikāyaivaṃ pradatvā caivam ādiśat // Rm_13.198{198} //
K14ratnml_u:5552: anayā te śarīre saṃskriyatām upacāraṇaiḥ // Rm_13.199{199} //
K14ratnml_u:5554: tatheti tāṃ samādāya yathādiṣṭam upācarat // Rm_13.200{200} //
K14ratnml_u:5555: tatas tasya tanū rogair vimuktā paripuṣṭitā /
K14ratnml_u:5557: tataḥ śāstrā yathādiṣṭaṃ vaḍikena tathā hṛdi /
K14ratnml_u:5558: maitrī prabhāvitā loke svātmaje supriye yathā // Rm_13.202{202} //
K14ratnml_u:5559: tadā tasya mahadduḥkhaṃ cetasikaṃ śaśāma tat /
K14ratnml_u:5561: tataḥ sa vaḍikaḥ svasthaḥ pariśuddhendriyaḥ sudhīḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5562: bhagavantaṃ tam ānamya prārthayad evam ādarāt // Rm_13.204{104} //
K14ratnml_u:5563: vande 'haṃ bhavatāṃ pādau sarvadā śaraṇaṃ vraje /
K14ratnml_u:5564: tathā ca sarvadā nātha kṛpayā trātum arhati // Rm_13.205{105} //
K14ratnml_u:5565: yady evaṃ bhavatāṃ śāstaḥ kṛpādṛṣṭir na vidyate /
K14ratnml_u:5566: mṛto 'haṃ narake 'dyāpi gato duḥkhāny avāpnuyāṃ // Rm_13.206{106} //
K14ratnml_u:5567: yad evaṃ svasthito jīve tat te kṛpāmbubhāvataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5568: tathā me 'nugrahaṃ kartuṃ nityam arhati sarvadā // Rm_13.207{107} //
K14ratnml_u:5569: ity evaṃ prārthanāṃ kṛtvā bhūyaḥ sa vaḍiko mudā /
K14ratnml_u:5570: sāñjaliḥ praṇatiṃ kṛtvā paśyaṃs tasthau munīśvaraṃ // Rm_13.208{108} //
K14ratnml_u:5572: triratne śaraṇaṃ kṛtvā saṃbuddhaṃ taṃ samarcayat // Rm_13.209{109} //
K14ratnml_u:5574: tataḥ sa gṛhabhṛc chreṣṭhī dṛṣṭvā taṃ sugataṃ mudā /
K14ratnml_u:5575: kṛtāñjalipuṭo natvā prārthayad evam ādarāt // Rm_13.210{210} //
K14ratnml_u:5576: vande te caraṇau śāstaḥ sarvadā śaraṇaṃ vraje /
K14ratnml_u:5577: evaṃ no 'nugrahaṃ kartuṃm arhati kṛpayā sadā // Rm_13.211{211} //
K14ratnml_u:5578: tataḥ sa bhagavān buddhas tathāstv iti samādiśat /
K14ratnml_u:5579: ṛddhyākāśaṃ samutplutya svam āśramam upāyayau // Rm_13.212{212} //
K14ratnml_u:5580: tatra sa bhagavān prāptaḥ sabhāmadhye samāśritaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5581: etad vṛṣṭi samākhyāya tasthau dharmaṃ samādiśat // Rm_13.213{213} //
K14ratnml_u:5582: tadā sa vaḍiko bhūyo buddhaguṇān anusmaran /
K14ratnml_u:5583: sa saṃghaṃ sugataṃ bhojyaiḥ pūjayituṃ samaichata // Rm_13.214{214} //
K14ratnml_u:5584: tadā sa nṛpate rājñaḥ prasenajita ānataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5585: etat sarvaṃ pravṛttāṃtaṃ nivedyaivam abhāṣata // Rm_13.215{215} //
K14ratnml_u:5587: tat triratnakṛpādṛṣṭer jīve rogair vimocitaḥ // Rm_13.216{216} //
K14ratnml_u:5588: tan mayā sa munīndro 'pi sarvasaṃghaiḥ sahādhunā /
K14ratnml_u:5589: samāmaṃtrya gṛhe bhojyaiḥ pūjayituṃ samicchyate // Rm_13.217{217} //
K14ratnml_u:5593: vaḍikaṃ taiḥ samālokya praśaṃsyaiva samādiśat // Rm_13.219{219} //
K14ratnml_u:5594: vaḍika tvaṃ mahāsādhus tad buddhaśaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5595: tathānuśraddhayā nityaṃ bhaja ratnatrayaṃ sadā // Rm_13.220{220} //
K14ratnml_u:5596: iti rājñābhyanujñātaṃ śrutvā sa vaḍiko mudā /
K14ratnml_u:5597: nṛpatiṃ taṃ praṇatvaivaṃ svagṛhaṃ samupāyayau // Rm_13.221{221} //
K14ratnml_u:5599: śāstu nimaṃtraṇāṃ kartuṃ vihāre samudācaran // Rm_13.222{222} //
K14ratnml_u:5600: tatra sa samupāviṣṭo dṛṣṭvā taṃ śrīghanaṃ mudā /
K14ratnml_u:5601: kṛtāñjalipuṭo natvā prārthayad evam ādarāt // Rm_13.223{223} //
K14ratnml_u:5603: tathāpy atra bhavadagre prārthaye 'nugrahaṃ kuru // Rm_13.224{224} //
K14ratnml_u:5604: yad ahaṃ roganirmuktaḥ puna janma ivāptavān /
K14ratnml_u:5605: tad bhavatāṃ kṛpādṛṣṭeḥ prasādād itin manyate // Rm_13.225{225} //
K14ratnml_u:5606: tad ahaṃ bhavatāṃ sarvasaṃghānāṃ bhojanair gṛhe /
K14ratnml_u:5607: pūjayituṃ samiche tad anugrahītum arhati // Rm_13.226{226} //
K14ratnml_u:5609: iti saṃprārthitaṃ tena śrutvā sa bhagavān muniḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5612: mudā tasya muneḥ pādau natvāśu svagṛhaṃ yayau // Rm_13.228{228} //
K14ratnml_u:5613: tatra sa sahasā gehe vandhumitrajanaiḥ saha /
K14ratnml_u:5616: prajñapya śuddhite bhūmau maṃdayitvā samantataḥ // Rm_13.230{230} //
K14ratnml_u:5617: tatas taṃ śrīghanaṃ buddhaṃ sasaṃghaṃ svajanaiḥ saha /
K14ratnml_u:5618: āmaṃtrituṃ vihāre sa sahasā samupācarat // Rm_13.231{231} //
K14ratnml_u:5619: tatra sa samupāviṣṭo dṛṣṭvā taṃ śrīghanaṃ mudā /
K14ratnml_u:5620: sasaṃghaṃ sāṃjalir natvā prārthayad evam ādarāt // Rm_13.232{232} //
K14ratnml_u:5622: tad bhavāṃ sāṃghikaiḥ sārddhaṃ vijayituṃ samarhati // Rm_13.233{233} //
K14ratnml_u:5623: iti tenārthitaṃ śrutvā tatheti sa munīśvaraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5625: tatra mārgeṣu sarvatra nagare ca samantataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5626: prakāśayan prātihāryaṃ tad gṛhaṃ samupāviśat // Rm_13.235{235} //
K14ratnml_u:5627: tatra gṛhe samāsādya pādārghaṃ pratigṛhya saḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5628: svāsane samupāviśya kramāt tasthau sasāṃghikaḥ // Rm_13.236{236} //
K14ratnml_u:5629: tadā sa vaḍiko dṛṣṭvā taṃ buddhaṃ svāsane sthitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:5631: tataś ca surasair bhojyaiḥ supraṇītaiḥ suhādhitaiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5633: tataś ca bhojanānte sa pātrādīny apanīya ca /
K14ratnml_u:5634: mukhādīṃ śodhayitvā ca pūgauṣadhīn praḍhaukayat // Rm_13.239{269} //
K14ratnml_u:5635: tataḥ sa prāñjalir natvā sasaṃghaṃ sugataṃ mudā /
K14ratnml_u:5636: purastho manasā hy evaṃ praṇidhānaṃ vyadhāt smaran // Rm_13.240{270} //
K14ratnml_u:5638: yathāyaṃ bhagavān buddhas tathā bhūyāsam ātmavit // Rm_13.241{271} //
K14ratnml_u:5644: ity evaṃ manasā tena praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ mudā /
K14ratnml_u:5645: matvā sa bhagavān buddho smitaṃ prāvirvyadhān mudā // Rm_13.244{274} //
K14ratnml_u:5646: tadā tasya munīndrasya mukhāt paṃca surasmayaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5647: nisṛtya triṣu lokeṣu bhāsayantaḥ samāsaran // Rm_13.245{275} //
K14ratnml_u:5648: yāpi kāś cid adholoke prasṛtā narakeṣu tāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5650: tadā tābhiḥ parispṛṣṭāḥ sarve nairayikā janāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5651: mahatsaukhyaṃ samāsādya vismitāś caivam ālapat // Rm_13.247{277} //
K14ratnml_u:5652: aho saukhyaṃ kathaṃ hy evam anyatra kiṃ gatā vayaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:5653: kasya puṇyānubhāvena kvāsmākaṃ jāyate sukhaṃ // Rm_13.248{278} //
K14ratnml_u:5655: bhagavān nirmitaṃ buddhaṃ saṃpreṣya samadarśayat // Rm_13.249{279} //
K14ratnml_u:5656: tatra taṃ nirmitaṃ buddhaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve 'pi te mudā /
K14ratnml_u:5657: vismitāḥ sahasaṃmīlya punar evaṃ vabhāṣire // Rm_13.250{280} //
K14ratnml_u:5659: nūnam asyānubhāvena saukhyaṃ no jāyate khalu // Rm_13.251{281} //
K14ratnml_u:5660: iti saṃbhāṣya te sarve tasmin buddhe prasāditāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5661: namo buddhāya dharmāya saṃghāya ceti prāvadan // Rm_13.252{282} //
K14ratnml_u:5664: evaṃ tā raśmayaḥ sarvā avabhāsya samaṃtataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5665: sarvasatvān samuddhṛtya muneḥ pratyāyayuḥ punaḥ // Rm_13.254{284} //
K14ratnml_u:5666: tathā yā raśmayaḥ kāścid upariṣṭāt prasāritāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5667: tāḥ sarvān devalokānāṃ avabhāsya samantataḥ // Rm_13.255{285} //
K14ratnml_u:5669: evaṃ cāpi mahāśabdam udghuṣya samudācaran // Rm_13.256{286} //
K14ratnml_u:5670: anityaṃ khalu saṃsāraṃ duḥkhaṃ śūnyam anātmakaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:5671: tad bhave sadgatiṃ hitvā saddharmaṃ bhajatādarāt // Rm_13.257{287} //
K14ratnml_u:5673: dhunīta mṛtyusainyaṃ ca naḍāgāram iva dvipaḥ // Rm_13.258{288} //
K14ratnml_u:5674: yo 'py asmin dharmavaineye hy apramattaś caret sadā /
K14ratnml_u:5676: sa hitvā jātisaṃsāraṃ duḥkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyati // Rm_13.259{289} //
K14ratnml_u:5677: ity evaṃ tan mahāśabdaṃ śrutvā sarve 'pi te surāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5679: tathā tā arciṣaḥ sarvā avabhāsya samaṃtataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5680: punaḥ pratyāgatās tasya muner antikam āyayuḥ // Rm_13.261{291} //
K14ratnml_u:5681: tatas tā arciṣaḥ sarvāḥ saṃmīlya samupāsthitāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5682: kṛtvā pradakṣiṇāṃ traidham uṣṇīṣe 'ntardadhau muneḥ // Rm_13.262{292} //
K14ratnml_u:5686: vinisṛtā diśaḥ sarvā bhāṣayanti samantataḥ // Rm_13.264{294} //
K14ratnml_u:5687: nākāraṇaṃ jinā buddhā darśayanti smitaṃ kvacit /
K14ratnml_u:5688: bhavatsmitaṃ samālokya sarve bhavanti vismitāḥ // Rm_13.265{295} //
K14ratnml_u:5690: tad eṣāṃ saṃśayaṃ chetuṃ taddhetu samupādiśa // Rm_13.266{296} //
K14ratnml_u:5691: iti tenārthitaṃ śrutvā bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5692: tāṃ ca sarvāṃ sabhāṃ dṛṣṭvā tathānandam abhāṣata // Rm_13.267{297} //
K14ratnml_u:5694: saṃgheṣu śraddhayā bhaktyā satkṛtya bhajanaṃ kṛtaṃ // Rm_13.268{298} //
K14ratnml_u:5696: kramād bodhicarīḥ pūrya daśabhūmīśvaro bhavan // Rm_13.269{299} //
K14ratnml_u:5700: praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ tena saṃbuddho 'yaṃ bhaved dhruvaṃ // Rm_13.271{301} //
K14ratnml_u:5702: satkṛtya samupāśritya bhaja nityaṃ samāhitaḥ // Rm_13.272{302} //
K14ratnml_u:5703: ye satvāḥ śraddhayā smṛtvā triratnaśaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5704: durgatiṃ te na gachanti bhavanti bodhibhāginaḥ // Rm_13.273{303} //
K14ratnml_u:5705: evaṃ matvā triratnānāṃ satkṛtya śraddhayā mudā /
K14ratnml_u:5706: saṃsmṛtya śaraṇaṃ gatvā bhaktavyaṃ bodhivāṃchibhiḥ // Rm_13.274{304} //
K14ratnml_u:5707: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvānaṃdaḥ sa moditaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5708: sāṃghikaṃ saha lokaiś ca tatheti prābhyanaṃdata // Rm_13.275{305} //
K14ratnml_u:5709: tataḥ sa bhagavāṃs tasmai vaḍikāya subhāgine /
K14ratnml_u:5710: datvāśīrvacanaṃ bhūyaḥ samāmaṃtrya tam abravīt // Rm_13.276{306} //
K14ratnml_u:5712: vaḍika tvaṃ mahābhāga triratnaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5713: bodhicaryyāṃ caran nityaṃ saṃbodhiṃ samavāpnuyāḥ // Rm_13.277{307} //
K14ratnml_u:5715: tathā ratnatrayaṃ smṛtvā bhaja nityaṃ samāhitaḥ // Rm_13.278{308} //
K14ratnml_u:5716: ity ādiśya munīndraḥ sa saṃghaiḥ sārddhaṃ samutthitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5717: vaḍikaṃ taṃ samāmaṃtrya svavihāraṃ yayau tathā // Rm_13.279{309} //
K14ratnml_u:5718: tathā sa vaḍiko nityaṃ triratnaśaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5719: sadā lokahitaṃ kṛtvā bodhicaryāṃ samācarat // Rm_13.280{310} //
K14ratnml_u:5720: etan me guruṇādiṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ mayā narādhipa /
K14ratnml_u:5721: tathā te kathyate rājaṃ śrutvā caivaṃ prakāśaya // Rm_13.281{311} //
K14ratnml_u:5724: tathā te sarvadā nityaṃ sarvatra maṃgalaṃ bhavet /
K14ratnml_u:5725: kramād bodhicarīṃ pūrya saṃbodhim api cāpnuyāḥ // Rm_13.283{313} //
K14ratnml_u:5726: iti matvā mahārāja prajāś cāpi prabodhayan /
K14ratnml_u:5727: saddharme saṃpratisthāpya sarvathā trātum arhasi // Rm_13.284{314} //
K14ratnml_u:5729: rājā tatheti vijñapya prābhyanandat sapārṣadaḥ // Rm_13.285{315} //
K14ratnml_u:5730: śrutvāvadānaṃ vaḍikasya sādhor idaṃ narā ye 'bhyanumodayanti /
K14ratnml_u:5731: sarve 'pi te lokahitānuraktā bhavanti bodhiguṇalābhikā hi // Rm_13.286{316} //
K14ratnml_u:5736: upaguptaṃ yatiṃ natvā prārthayad evam ādarāt // Rm_14.1{1} //
K14ratnml_u:5737: bhadanta śrotum icchāmi punar anyat subhāṣitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:5738: tad yathā guruṇākhyātaṃ tathādeṣṭuṃ ca me 'rhati // Rm_14.2{2} //
K14ratnml_u:5739: iti tena narendreṇa prārthitaṃ sa jinātmajaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5740: śrutvā taṃ nṛpatiṃ dṛṣṭvā punar evaṃ samādiśat // Rm_14.3{3} //
K14ratnml_u:5741: śṛṇu rājan mayākhyātaṃ yathā me guruṇoditaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:5742: tathā śrūtvānumoditvā śubhe caritum arhasi // Rm_14.4{4} //
K14ratnml_u:5743: purā sa bhagavān buddhaḥ śrāvastyāṃ bahir āśrame /
K14ratnml_u:5745: bhikṣubhiḥ śrāvakaiḥ sārddhaṃ cailakair vratibhis tathā /
K14ratnml_u:5746: bhikṣuṇībhis tathānyaiś cā mahāsātvair upāsakaiḥ // Rm_14.6{6} //
K14ratnml_u:5750: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pātuṃ sarve satvā upagatāḥ // Rm_14.8{8} //
K14ratnml_u:5754: garuḍāḥ kinnarendrāś ca tathānye 'pi samāgatāḥ // Rm_14.10{10} //
K14ratnml_u:5756: yatayo yogino vijñās tathānye tīrthikā api // Rm_14.11{11} //
K14ratnml_u:5758: amātyā maṃtriṇaś cāpi vaiśyāś cāpi prajādhipāḥ // Rm_14.12{12} //
K14ratnml_u:5760: paurā jānapadā grāmyās tathā kārpaṭikā api // Rm_14.13{13} //
K14ratnml_u:5761: evaṃ anye 'pi satvāś ca sarve lokāḥ samāgatāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5762: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pātuṃ tad vihāre upāviśat // Rm_14.14{14} //
K14ratnml_u:5763: tatra taṃ śrīghanaṃ dṛṣṭvā samabhyarcya praṇamya ca /
K14ratnml_u:5765: taṃ muṇīndraṃ samālokya śrotuṃ tad dharmadeśanāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:5767: tathā tān samupāsīnān dṛṣṭvā sa bhagavāñ jinaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5769: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pītvā sarve satvāḥ pramoditāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5773: śrāvastyāṃ puri jātāni samadāni pracerire // Rm_14.19{19} //
K14ratnml_u:5774: tadā tāṃ samadān dṛṣṭvā gaṃdharvādhipateḥ sutaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5775: supriyo nāma tan mādam īrṣyayā hantum udyayau // Rm_14.20{20} //
K14ratnml_u:5779: samudghoṣayamānaḥ ca svamatiṃ darśayan yayau // Rm_14.22{22} //
K14ratnml_u:5781: samudghoṣayamānaś ca śrāvastīṃ sa upāviśat // Rm_14.23{23} //
K14ratnml_u:5782: tatra taṃ samupāviṣṭaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve 'pi paurikāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5783: śrutvā tad adbhutaṃ nādaṃ vismitāḥ samupācaran // Rm_14.24{24} //
K14ratnml_u:5785: śrutvā dṛṣṭvā ca sarvāṇi vismayaṃ samupāyayuḥ // Rm_14.25{25} //
K14ratnml_u:5786: tada tāni ca sarvāṇi dṛṣṭvā paṃcaśatāny api /
K14ratnml_u:5788: tataḥ sarve 'pi te tena sahavāde bhayānvitāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5789: nṛpater antikaṃ gatvā tat pravṛttiṃ nyavedayan // Rm_14.27{27} //
K14ratnml_u:5790: jaya prabho vijānīyād yad vayaṃ samupāgatāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5791: tad atra no bhayatrastāṃ trātum arhati sarvathā // Rm_14.28{28} //
K14ratnml_u:5793: nūnaṃ no madaghātāya vijetuṃ samupāgataḥ // Rm_14.29{29} //
K14ratnml_u:5795: kriyatāṃ sahasāsmākam iti vijñāpanāṃ śṛṇu // Rm_14.30{30} //
K14ratnml_u:5796: iti vijñāpitaṃ sarvais taiḥ śrutvā sa narādhipaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5797: sarvāns tān samupāmaṃtrya pura evaṃ samādiśat // Rm_14.31{31} //
K14ratnml_u:5799: bhaviṣyāmo 'tra kālajñāś caratu sa yathechayā // Rm_14.32{32} //
K14ratnml_u:5801: tad vivādabhayātaṃkaṃ tyaktvā sarve prasedire // Rm_14.33{33} //
K14ratnml_u:5802: tadā sa supriyas tatra dṛṣṭvā tān abhimānikān /
K14ratnml_u:5805: tad anena sahātrāhaṃ vādaṃ kuryāṃ sabhāśraye // Rm_14.35{35} //
K14ratnml_u:5806: ity evaṃ niścayaṃ kṛtvā supriyaḥ so 'bhimānikaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5807: nṛpatiṃ tam upālabdhuṃ tat sabhāṃ samupācarat // Rm_14.36{36} //
K14ratnml_u:5808: tatra sa nṛpatir dṛṣṭvā supriyaṃ tam upāgataṃ /
K14ratnml_u:5810: svāgataṃ te bhavann atra tiṣṭhāsane prasīda me /
K14ratnml_u:5811: kim arthe 'tra samāyāsi tad ādeṣṭuṃ hi me 'rhasi // Rm_14.38{38} //
K14ratnml_u:5813: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā supriyaḥ sa sabhāsthitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5814: nṛpatiṃ taṃ samālokya pura evam abhāṣata // Rm_14.39{39} //
K14ratnml_u:5815: śṛṇu rājan mayākhyātaṃ śrutaṃ yat te yaśo mahat /
K14ratnml_u:5816: tad guṇān bhavato draṣṭum ihāhaṃ samupācare // Rm_14.40{40} //
K14ratnml_u:5817: tan me darśaya rājendra gāndharvaguṇām ātmanaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5818: kas te sāstā gurur vāsti taṃ cāpi me pradarśaya // Rm_14.41{41} //
K14ratnml_u:5819: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā sa rājā pratibhāṇavān /
K14ratnml_u:5820: supriyaṃ taṃ samālokya tathety evam abhāṣata // Rm_14.42{42} //
K14ratnml_u:5821: sādhu paśya mahābhāga darśayisyāmi taṃ guruṃ /
K14ratnml_u:5822: yo me śāstā mahābhijñaḥ sarvavidyāguṇādhipaḥ // Rm_14.43{43} //
K14ratnml_u:5824: jetāraṇye mahodyāne nivaśati vṛṣaṃ diśan // Rm_14.44{44} //
K14ratnml_u:5825: sādhu paśya mahābhāga taṃ guruṃ me hitārthadaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:5826: tad ehi saha yāsyāma śāstāraṃ darśayāmi taṃ // Rm_14.45{45} //
K14ratnml_u:5827: iti tena narendreṇa samākhyātaṃ sa supriyaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5828: śrutvā tatheti pramodya gantum abhāṣata // Rm_14.46{46} //
K14ratnml_u:5829: sādhu rājan samichāmi śāstāraṃ tat pradarśaya /
K14ratnml_u:5830: tena saha vivādāni kuryāṃ tatra nayāśu māṃ // Rm_14.47{47} //
K14ratnml_u:5831: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā nṛpatiḥ sa tatheti hi /
K14ratnml_u:5832: supriyaṃ taṃ samādāya vihāre gantum aichata // Rm_14.48{48} //
K14ratnml_u:5834: taiś ca paṃcaśatair anyair gāndharvikaiḥ sahācarat // Rm_14.49{49} //
K14ratnml_u:5835: tasminn avasare buddho bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5836: loke satvān samuddhartuṃ kṛpayā samapaśyata // Rm_14.50{50} //
K14ratnml_u:5837: tadā tena nareśena sārddham evam upāgataṃ /
K14ratnml_u:5838: supriyaṃ taṃ sa ālokya manasaiva vyacintayat // Rm_14.51{51} //
K14ratnml_u:5839: aho vata sudhīr yā sā gandharvādhipanandanaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5842: matvā pañcaśikhaḥ so 'pi tathāgantuṃ samaichata // Rm_14.53{53} //
K14ratnml_u:5845: tathā sa saṃkramaṃs tatra vihāre samupāviśan /
K14ratnml_u:5846: dṛṣṭvā taṃ śrīghanaṃ natvā tāṃ vīṇāṃ samupānayat // Rm_14.55{55} //
K14ratnml_u:5847: tataḥ sa sugataṃ bhaktyā samabhyarcya prasannadhīḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5848: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pātuṃ tat sabhāyām upāśrayat // Rm_14.56{56} //
K14ratnml_u:5849: tadā sa supriyo 'py enaṃ dṛṣṭvā mānābhigarvitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5850: tāṃ vīṇāṃ kvanayann agre 'nuśrāvituṃ samārabhat // Rm_14.57{57} //
K14ratnml_u:5851: tatprakvāṇāt svarā sapta ekai viṃśati mūrchanāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5853: tadā sarve 'pi te lokāḥ śrutvā tat prakvaṇān mudā /
K14ratnml_u:5854: nṛpatipramukhāś cāpi paraṃ vismayam āyajuḥ // Rm_14.59{59} //
K14ratnml_u:5856: tataḥ sa bhagavāṃś cāpi tasya mānābhighātane /
K14ratnml_u:5859: mūrchanāś ca tathā nānāvidhā niścāritās tathā // Rm_14.61{61} //
K14ratnml_u:5860: tataḥ śabdāt samuccerur gāthā evaṃ pracodināḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5861: tadyatheha bhave sarvaṃ duḥkhaṃ śūnyaṃ hy anātmakaṃ // Rm_14.62{62} //
K14ratnml_u:5862: idaṃ kāyaṃ ca vīṇāvad indriyāṇi svarānī ca /
K14ratnml_u:5863: mūrchanā iva cittāni jñātvā bodhau samācara // Rm_14.63{63} //
K14ratnml_u:5865: satyam etad iti jñātvā bodhicittaṃ pralehire // Rm_14.64{64} //
K14ratnml_u:5866: tadā sa supriyo 'py evaṃ śrutvā matvānumoditaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5868: tato niryātya vīṇāṃ sa gandhakuṭyāṃ virāgitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5870: tadā taṃ śrīghanaṃ natvā supriyaḥ so 'numoditaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5871: kṛtāñjaliḥ puraḥ sthitvā pravrajyāṃ samayācata // Rm_14.67{67} //
K14ratnml_u:5872: vaṃde te caraṇau śāsta bhavatāṃ śaraṇaṃ vraje /
K14ratnml_u:5873: tan me 'trānugrahaṃ kṛtvā pravrajyāṃ dātum arhati // Rm_14.68{68} //
K14ratnml_u:5874: iti tenārthitaṃ śrutvā bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5875: dṛṣṭvā tad āśayaṃ śuddhaṃ gaṃdharvaṃ taṃ tathāvadat // Rm_14.69{69} //
K14ratnml_u:5877: pitror ājñāṃ samāsādya prehi dāsyāmi te vrataṃ // Rm_14.70{70} //
K14ratnml_u:5878: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā sa supriyo mudā /
K14ratnml_u:5879: tatheti taṃ muniṃ natvā sahasarddhyā gṛhaṃ yayau // Rm_14.71{71} //
K14ratnml_u:5880: tatra sa sahasā prāpto natvā tau pitarau mudā /
K14ratnml_u:5881: sāñjaliḥ purataḥ sthitvā prārthayad evam ādarāt // Rm_14.72{72} //
K14ratnml_u:5882: śṛṇu me vāñchitaṃ tāta yadi te kṛpayā mayi /
K14ratnml_u:5883: tan mamānugrahaṃ kṛtvā saddharme māṃ niyojaya // Rm_14.73{73} //
K14ratnml_u:5884: ahaṃ hi saugataṃ dharmaṃ dṛṣṭvā vāñchāmi tad vrataṃ /
K14ratnml_u:5885: tat pravrajyāṃ samāsādya prāptum ichāmi nirvṛtiṃ // Rm_14.74{74} //
K14ratnml_u:5886: anityaṃ khalu saṃsāraṃ tad atrāpi na me ratiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5887: avaśyaṃ hi bhaven mṛtyuḥ sarveṣāṃ prāṇinām api // Rm_14.75{75} //
K14ratnml_u:5888: evaṃ dṛṣṭvātra saṃsāre bhogyaṃ nechāmi niḥspṛhaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5889: tat pravrajyāvrataṃ dhṛtvā prāptum iche sunirvṛtiṃ // Rm_14.76{76} //
K14ratnml_u:5890: api cāsau munīndro hi sadātraiva na tiṣṭhati /
K14ratnml_u:5891: buddhakāryaṃ samāpyaiva nirvṛtiṃ sarvathā vrajet // Rm_14.77{77} //
K14ratnml_u:5892: kiṃ cātra sarvadā naivam utpatsyate munīśvaraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5893: kadā cid evam utpanno loke bodhiṃ samādiśet // Rm_14.78{78} //
K14ratnml_u:5894: tathā ca durlabhaṃ janma sadgatau ca kṣaṇaṃ tathā /
K14ratnml_u:5896: dharmaṃ vinātra saṃsāre kiṃ sāraṃ sukhino 'pi hi /
K14ratnml_u:5897: kṣaṇadhvansi śarīraṃ hi jīvitaṃ ca tṛṇāmbuvat // Rm_14.80{80} //
K14ratnml_u:5899: dharmeṇa sadgatiṃ yāyāt saṃbodhim api prāpnuyāt /
K14ratnml_u:5900: tat pravrajyācariṃ dhṛtvā prāptum iche 'tra nirvṛtiṃ // Rm_14.81{81} //
K14ratnml_u:5901: tad ātra yadi vāṃ tāta kṛpāsti svātmaje mayi /
K14ratnml_u:5902: sarvathānugrahaṃ kṛtvā tad anujñāṃ pradehi me // Rm_14.82{82} //
K14ratnml_u:5903: iti tenārthitaṃ śrutvā sa gandharvādhipaḥ sudhīḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5904: suciraṃ taṃ sutaṃ dṛṣṭvā snehād evam abhaṣata // Rm_14.83{83} //
K14ratnml_u:5905: satyam evaṃ sutākhyātaṃ tathāpi me vacaḥ śṛṇu /
K14ratnml_u:5906: pravrajyā duṣkarīcaryyā tat kathaṃ tvaṃ samācareḥ // Rm_14.84{84} //
K14ratnml_u:5908: kāmabhogyasukhāraktas tat kathaṃ tad vrataṃ careḥ // Rm_14.85{85} //
K14ratnml_u:5910: sarvān parigrahāns tyaktvā sadaikāntī vane vase // Rm_14.86{86} //
K14ratnml_u:5912: bhuṃjīthās tat kathaṃ bhuktvā samādhiṃ saṃpradhāsyasi // Rm_14.87{87} //
K14ratnml_u:5914: sahasā mā kṛthāś cittaṃ nivāraya samāhitaḥ // Rm_14.88{88} //
K14ratnml_u:5916: vṛddhatve samupāśritya triratnaṃ tad vrataṃ cara // Rm_14.89{89} //
K14ratnml_u:5917: tat tvaṃ yāvad yuvā gehe saukhyaṃ bhuktvā yathepsitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:5918: vṛddhatve tad vrataṃ dhṛtvā triratnāni sadā bhaja // Rm_14.90{90} //
K14ratnml_u:5919: tathā cet te bhavej janma sāphalyaṃ bhavacāraṇe /
K14ratnml_u:5920: sukhaṃ bhuktvā vrataṃ dhṛtvā nirvṛtiṃ vā samāpnuyāḥ // Rm_14.91{91} //
K14ratnml_u:5921: iti me vacanaṃ śrutvā matvaivaṃ tat prabodhitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5922: tāvad gṛhe sukhaṃ bhuktvā smṛtvā ratnatrayaṃ vasa // Rm_14.92{92} //
K14ratnml_u:5924: punas taṃ pitaraṃ dṛṣṭvā bodhayann evam abravīt // Rm_14.93{93} //
K14ratnml_u:5925: satyam evaṃ bhave tāta tathāpi vakṣyate mayā /
K14ratnml_u:5926: tac chrutvāpi tvayā parijñāya vibudhyatāṃ // Rm_14.94{94} //
K14ratnml_u:5927: satkule durlabhaṃ janma tatrāpi durlabhaṃ kṣaṇaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:5928: durlabhaṃ sugatotpādaṃ durlabhaṃ tadvrataṃ bhave // Rm_14.95{95} //
K14ratnml_u:5930: avaśyaṃ maraṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā prāptum iche 'tra nirvṛtiṃ // Rm_14.96{96} //
K14ratnml_u:5931: tad atra kṛpayā mahyam anujñāṃ dātum arhasi /
K14ratnml_u:5932: yūyaṃ cāpi hi tad dharmabhāṇaiḥ sadgatim āpsyatha // Rm_14.97{97} //
K14ratnml_u:5933: iti hetoḥ pita tatra vilambaṃma kṛthā ciraṃ /
K14ratnml_u:5934: sahasānugrahaṃ kṛtvā tad anujñāṃ pradehi me // Rm_14.98{98} //
K14ratnml_u:5935: iti tenārthitaṃ śrutvā sa gaṃdharvādhipaś cirāt /
K14ratnml_u:5937: ayi supriya putra tvaṃ snehān mayā nivāryasa /
K14ratnml_u:5938: yady ativāṃchase prāptuṃ nirvṛtiṃ tan samācara // Rm_14.100{100} //
K14ratnml_u:5941: triratnabhajanaṃ kṛtvā cara nityaṃ samāhitaḥ // Rm_14.101{1} //
K14ratnml_u:5943: pitroḥ pādān praṇatvaiva sahasā niryayau gṛhāt // Rm_14.102{2} //
K14ratnml_u:5944: tataḥ sa sahasā gatvā vihāraṃ samupācarat /
K14ratnml_u:5945: tatra prāpto munīndraṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvaiva samupāviśat // Rm_14.103{3} //
K14ratnml_u:5946: tatra taṃ śrīghanaṃ nātvā prāñjaliḥ pura āśrayan /
K14ratnml_u:5949: tathānujñāṃ pituḥ prāpya prāgatāham ihādhunā // Rm_14.105{5} //
K14ratnml_u:5950: tad atra bhavatāṃ śāstaḥ śaraṇaṃ samupāgataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5951: brahmacaryaṃ cariṣyāmi tat pravrajyāṃ pradehi me // Rm_14.106{6} //
K14ratnml_u:5952: iti tenārthitaṃ śrutvā bhagavān sa jagadguruḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5953: dṛṣṭvā tasyāśayaṃ śuddhaṃ punar eva samādiśat // Rm_14.107{7} //
K14ratnml_u:5954: ehi supriya bhikṣo 'tra cara brahmacariṃ śivāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:5955: triratnaṃ śaraṇaṃ kṛtvā samādhiṃ samupāśrayat // Rm_14.108{8} //
K14ratnml_u:5957: paṃcagaṃḍamayaṃ dehaṃ jīvitaṃ ca trināmvuvat // Rm_14.109{9} //
K14ratnml_u:5959: sarvakleśaripuñ jitvā sākṣād arhatpadaṃ yayau // Rm_14.110{10} //
K14ratnml_u:5960: tataḥ supriyo bhikṣuḥ prāptābhijñaḥ kṛtī sudhīḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5961: bhindan sarvam avidyāṅgaṃ nirvikalpo 'bhavad yatiḥ // Rm_14.111{11} //
K14ratnml_u:5967: vaṃdyaḥ pūjyo 'bhinaṃdyaś ca mānanīyo bhavan babhau // Rm_14.114{14} //
K14ratnml_u:5969: prālokya vismitāḥ sarve tatsabhāsthāḥ prasedire // Rm_14.115{15} //
K14ratnml_u:5970: tadā sarve 'pi te lokā devā daityāś ca kinnarāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5971: yakṣāḥ siddhāś ca gaṃdharvā nāgāś ca rākṣasā api // Rm_14.116{16} //
K14ratnml_u:5972: garuḍāś ca tathānye 'pi vidyādharāś ca sāpsarāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5973: sarve lokādhipāś cāpi triratnaśaraṇaṃ gatāḥ // Rm_14.117{17} //
K14ratnml_u:5976: tad dṛṣṭvā tāni pañcāpi gāṃdharvikaśatāni ca /
K14ratnml_u:5978: ete sarve vayaṃ nīce karmaṇi parivarttikāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5980: yad asmābhiḥ purā puṇyaṃ kiṃ cid vāpi na sādhitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:5981: tenāsyātra vayaṃ sarve duḥkhino nīcavṛttayaḥ // Rm_14.121{21} //
K14ratnml_u:5982: tad asmābhir ayam śāstā munīśvaraḥ sasāṃghikaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:5983: satkṛtya bhojanair vāpi pūjanīyo yathāvidhiḥ // Rm_14.122{22} //
K14ratnml_u:5987: tataḥ krameṇa saṃprāpya bodhicaryyāṃ śubhāṃ carīṃ /
K14ratnml_u:5988: carantas tadvipākaiś ca nirvṛtiṃ saṃlabhemahi // Rm_14.124{24} //
K14ratnml_u:5989: iti matvā vayaṃ sarve vijñapya nṛpatiṃ tathā /
K14ratnml_u:5990: sasaṃghaṃ sugataṃ bhojyair arhāmahe samarcituṃ // Rm_14.125{25} //
K14ratnml_u:5992: nṛpater vijñāpanāṃ kartuṃ sahasā samupācaran // Rm_14.126{26} //
K14ratnml_u:5993: tatra te samupāsṛtya dṛṣṭvā taṃ nṛpatiṃ mudā /
K14ratnml_u:5994: kṛtāñjalipuṭo natvā prārthayann evam ādarāt // Rm_14.127{27} //
K14ratnml_u:5995: jaya deva mahārāja lokān dharmeṇa pālaya /
K14ratnml_u:5996: kiñcid vijñāpanāṃ karttuṃ vayam upāgatāḥ // Rm_14.128{28} //
K14ratnml_u:5997: vijānīyād bhavān hy etat tathāpi prārthayāmahe /
K14ratnml_u:5998: śrutvā no 'nugrahaṃ kṛtvā kṛpayā tat prasīdatu // Rm_14.129{29} //
K14ratnml_u:6000: tat sasaṃghaṃ muniṃ bhojyaiḥ samichāmaḥ samarcituṃ // Rm_14.130{30} //
K14ratnml_u:6001: tad anujñāṃ pradatvā naḥ kṛpayoddhartum arhasi /
K14ratnml_u:6002: etad vijñāpanāṃ kurmas tat prasīda nṛpādhipa // Rm_14.131{31} //
K14ratnml_u:6003: iti taiḥ prārthitaṃ śrutvā nṛpatiḥ so 'numoditaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6004: tān sarvān samupāmaṃtrya punar evaṃ samādiśat // Rm_14.132{32} //
K14ratnml_u:6006: tat tathā kriyatāṃ buddhe satkāraṃ śraddhayādarāt // Rm_14.133{33} //
K14ratnml_u:6007: saṃbuddhe yat kṛtaṃ karma tat phalaṃ kṣiṇuyān na hi /
K14ratnml_u:6008: kramād bodhicariṃ pūrya nirvṛtiṃ samavāpnuyāt // Rm_14.134{34} //
K14ratnml_u:6009: tad atra sarvathā yūyaṃ sasaṃghaṃ śrīghanaṃ muniṃ /
K14ratnml_u:6011: ity ādiṣṭam ḥ - ndreṇa śrutvā sarve 'pi te mudā /
K14ratnml_u:6012: tatheti pratinaṃditvā nṛpaṃ natvā tato 'caran // Rm_14.136{36} //
K14ratnml_u:6013: tatas te saṃmataṃ kṛtvā vihāre sahasā gatāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6014: dṛṣṭvā taṃ śrīghanaṃ natvā prārthayann evam ādarāt // Rm_14.137{37} //
K14ratnml_u:6015: bhagavaṃs tad vijānīyād yad arthaṃ samupāgatāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6018: pūjayituṃ samichāmo satkartuṃ bhojanair api // Rm_14.139{39} //
K14ratnml_u:6019: tad bhavāṃ kṛpayā dṛṣṭvā kṛtvāsmākaṃ anugrahaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:6020: pure śvaḥ sāṃghikaiḥ sārddhaṃ vijayituṃ samarhasi // Rm_14.140{40} //
K14ratnml_u:6021: iti taiḥ prārthite sarvair bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6024: bhūyas taṃ śrīghanaṃ natvā svaṃ puraṃ sahasā yayuḥ // Rm_14.142{42} //
K14ratnml_u:6025: tatra sarve 'pi te bhūmiṃ śodhayitvā samantataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6026: prajñapya svāsanāny evaṃ sāmagriṃ samasādhayan // Rm_14.143{43} //
K14ratnml_u:6030: tatra taṃ sugataṃ sarvaṃ saṃghaṃ cāmaṃtrituṃ yayuḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6033: saṃbuddhapramukhaṃ saṃghaṃ prārthayann evam ādarāt // Rm_14.146{46} //
K14ratnml_u:6035: tad bhavān saṃghikaiḥ sārddhaṃ vijayituṃ samarhati // Rm_14.147{47} //
K14ratnml_u:6036: iti taiḥ prārthite dṛṣṭvā bhagavān sa sasāṃghikaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6039: sarveṣāṃ śubhatāṃ kṛtvā tat pure samupāviśat // Rm_14.149{49} //
K14ratnml_u:6041: bhāsayaṃ bhadratāṃ kurvan tatpradeśe samācaran // Rm_14.150{50} //
K14ratnml_u:6042: tatra pādyārgham ādāya krameṇa saha sāṃghikaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:6043: svāsane samupāviśya tasthau bhānur ivojvalan // Rm_14.151{51} //
K14ratnml_u:6044: tadā taṃ śrīghanaṃ sarvasaṃghaṃ ca svāsane sthitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:6045: dṛṣṭvā sarve 'pi te harṣāt pūjayituṃ samārabhan // Rm_14.152{52} //
K14ratnml_u:6046: tathā krameṇa saṃpūjya taṃ buddhapramukhaṃ gaṇaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:6048: tatas te bhojanāṃte tatpātrāṇi vyapanīya ca /
K14ratnml_u:6049: karādīñ chodhayitvā tad bhūmiṃ ca paryaśodhayan // Rm_14.154{54} //
K14ratnml_u:6050: tataḥ pūgādikaṃ datvā punaḥ sarve 'pi te mudā /
K14ratnml_u:6052: te ca gāṃdharvikāḥ sarve triratnaśaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6055: upasthitya sasaṃghaṃ taṃ śrīghanaṃ samatoṣayat // Rm_14.157{57} //
K14ratnml_u:6056: tada sa bhagavāṃ dṛṣṭvā teṣāṃ bhaktiprasādinīṃ /
K14ratnml_u:6057: sarveṣāṃ śuddhacittāni vyamuñcat smitam uddhavāt // Rm_14.158{58} //
K14ratnml_u:6059: sarvatra bhuvane gatvā pracerur amṛtāṃśuvat // Rm_14.159{59} //
K14ratnml_u:6060: teṣāṃ ke cid adhogatvā narakeṣu samantataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6061: avabhāsya parispṛṣṭvā sarvatrāpi sukhaṃ daduḥ // Rm_14.160{60} //
K14ratnml_u:6062: tadā te nārakīyās tat prabhāspṛṣṭāḥ sukhānvitāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6063: kim etad iti saṃdigdhāḥ saṃmīlyaivaṃ vabhāṣire // Rm_14.161{61} //
K14ratnml_u:6064: aho nu jāyate saukhyam asmākaṃ sāṃprataṃ kathaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:6065: vatānyatra gatāḥ smo 'dya kasya puṇyānubhāvataḥ // Rm_14.162{62} //
K14ratnml_u:6067: bhagavān nirmitaṃ buddhaṃ saṃpreṣayan samaṃtataḥ // Rm_14.163{63} //
K14ratnml_u:6068: tatrā taṃ saugataṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve te narakasthitāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6071: namo buddhāya dharmāya saṃghāya ca namas sadā /
K14ratnml_u:6072: iti proktvā praṇatvā taccharaṇaṃ samupāyayuḥ // Rm_14.165{65} //
K14ratnml_u:6074: sahasā svargatiṃ yātāḥ saddharme samudācaran // Rm_14.166{66} //
K14ratnml_u:6075: evaṃ tān sarvasatvāṃś ca samuddhṛtya samantataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6076: sarve te 'py aṃśavo bhūyas saṃbuddhāntikam upācaran // Rm_14.167{67} //
K14ratnml_u:6077: ke cid ūrddhvagatā yāvad akaniṣṭhaṃ samantataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6079: anityaṃ khalu saṃsāraṃ śūnyaṃ hy anātmakaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:6080: iti satyaṃ parijñāya triratnaṃ bhajatādarāt // Rm_14.169{69} //
K14ratnml_u:6082: dhunīta mārasainyāś ca naḍāgāraṃ yathā karī // Rm_14.170{70} //
K14ratnml_u:6083: yo 'py asmin saugate dharme hy apramattaś caret sadā /
K14ratnml_u:6084: sa tyaktvā janma saṃsāre duḥkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyati // Rm_14.171{71} //
K14ratnml_u:6085: iti saṃcodayantas tāṃ sārvān devāṃś ca sarvataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6086: te sarve 'py aṃśavo bhāyaḥ sugatāntikam āyayuḥ // Rm_14.172{72} //
K14ratnml_u:6087: tatas te 'py aṃśavaḥ sarve saṃmīlya saṃgatā muneḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6090: kim etad iti saṃcintya sarve tasthuḥ śakautukāḥ // Rm_14.174{74} //
K14ratnml_u:6092: utthāya sāñjalir natvā śāstāraṃ taṃ samabravīt // Rm_14.175{75} //
K14ratnml_u:6093: bhagavans te mukhād bhāsiḥ paṃcavarṇā vinirgatā /
K14ratnml_u:6094: avabhāsya diśaḥ sarvā ūrṇāyāṃ ca viśanti tāḥ // Rm_14.176{76} //
K14ratnml_u:6096: taddhetuṃ śrotum ichanti tad upādeṣṭum arhati // Rm_14.177{77} //
K14ratnml_u:6097: nāhetu hi smitaṃ buddhā darśayanti kadā cana /
K14ratnml_u:6098: yad dhetau bhavatā śāstur hasitaṃ tat samādiśa // Rm_14.178{78} //
K14ratnml_u:6100: tam ānaṃdaiḥ sabhāṃ cāpi samālokyaivam ādiśat // Rm_14.179{79} //
K14ratnml_u:6101: paśyānaṃda yad etair hi sarvai gāndharvikair api /
K14ratnml_u:6102: mama sasāṃghikasyaivaṃ satkāraṃ prakṛtaṃ mudā // Rm_14.180{80} //
K14ratnml_u:6104: kramād bodhicarīṃ prāptā niḥkleśā vimalāśayāḥ // Rm_14.181{81} //
K14ratnml_u:6109: evam etāt samālokya yūyaṃ yadi samichatha /
K14ratnml_u:6110: tathātra śraddhayā nityaṃ triratnaṃ bhajatādarāt // Rm_14.184{84} //
K14ratnml_u:6111: ye triratnaṃ sadā bhaktyā satkṛtyaivaṃ bhajanti te /
K14ratnml_u:6112: vihāya durgatiṃ nityaṃ sadgatiṃ samavāpnuyuḥ // Rm_14.185{85} //
K14ratnml_u:6114: iti matvātra saṃsāre yeṣāṃ vāṃchā sukhe śive /
K14ratnml_u:6115: te satkṛtya triratneṣu śraddhayā bhajatāniśaṃ // Rm_14.186{86} //
K14ratnml_u:6116: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā sarve ca te janāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6117: satyam evaṃ pratijñāya triratnaṃ sarvadābhajan // Rm_14.187{87} //
K14ratnml_u:6119: kṛtāñjalipuṭā natvā paprachus taṃ munīśvaraṃ // Rm_14.188{88} //
K14ratnml_u:6120: yad evaṃ bhagavann ebhiḥ satkāraṃ prakṛtaṃ mahat /
K14ratnml_u:6121: tat te kena supuṇyena samyag ādeṣṭum arhati // Rm_14.189{89} //
K14ratnml_u:6122: evaṃ tair bhikṣubhiḥ sarvaiḥ prārthite sa jineśvaraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6123: sarvāns tāñ chrāvakān bhikṣūn samālokyaivam ādiśat // Rm_14.190{90} //
K14ratnml_u:6124: śṛṇudhvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ puṇyaṃ yan mayā prakṛtaṃ purā /
K14ratnml_u:6125: tad atra kathitaṃ śrutvā śraddhayābhyanumodata // Rm_14.191{91} //
K14ratnml_u:6127: sarvajñaḥ sugataḥ śāstā dharmarājo munīśvaraḥ // Rm_14.192{92} //
K14ratnml_u:6129: mārajil lokavid bharttā subhadro 'rhan hitaṃkaraḥ // Rm_14.193{93} //
K14ratnml_u:6130: tadā sa bhagavān buddho janapadeṣu cārikāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:6131: carann anyāṃ rājadhānīm anuprāptaḥ sasāṃghikaḥ // Rm_14.194{94} //
K14ratnml_u:6132: tatra tasya narendrasya krīḍodyāne taror adhaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6133: praviśya svāsanāsīnas tasthau vahnir ivojvalan // Rm_14.195{95} //
K14ratnml_u:6135: saṃgītaiḥ saha saṃrakto ramituṃ samupāviśat // Rm_14.196{96} //
K14ratnml_u:6137: dṛṣṭvaiva sahasopetya natvā kṛtvā pradakṣiṇāṃ // Rm_14.197{97} //
K14ratnml_u:6138: samādhisthaṃ tam ālokya taṣṭhau ciram upāśrayan /
K14ratnml_u:6140: vādyamānaiḥ satair vādyair muniṃ prābodhayan nṛpaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6141: tataḥ sa sugato buddho samādheḥ śīghram utthitaḥ // Rm_14.199{99} //
K14ratnml_u:6143: tadā taṃ nṛpatiṃ dṛṣṭvā sa saṃbuddhaḥ prabodhanaḥ // Rm_14.200{100} //
K14ratnml_u:6145: ehi rājan mahāvāho svāgataṃ te mahīpate // Rm_14.201{1} //
K14ratnml_u:6147: sadā dānaṃ pradatvātra śīlaṃ dhṛtvā samāhitaḥ // Rm_14.202{2} //
K14ratnml_u:6149: bodhau cittaṃ samādhāya prajñāratnam upārjaya // Rm_14.203{3} //
K14ratnml_u:6151: tatas te maṅgalaṃ nityam ihāmutre sadā bhavet // Rm_14.204{4} //
K14ratnml_u:6153: iti matvā mahārāja saddharmaṃ samupāśrayan // Rm_14.205{5} //
K14ratnml_u:6154: triratnaṃ śaraṇaṃ kṛtvā satkṛtya bhaja sarvadā /
K14ratnml_u:6155: triratneṣu kṛtaṃ puṇyaṃ na kṣiṇoti kadā cana // Rm_14.206{6} //
K14ratnml_u:6157: sarvadā satphalāny eva sūte bodhiṃ samarpayet /
K14ratnml_u:6158: iti matvā mahārāja triratnaśaraṇaṃ gataḥ // Rm_14.207{7} //
K14ratnml_u:6160: tathā te maṃgalaṃ nityaṃ sarvatrāpi bhaved dhruvaṃ // Rm_14.208{8} //
K14ratnml_u:6162: iti tenārhatādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa sa bhūpatiḥ // Rm_14.209{9} //
K14ratnml_u:6164: tataḥ sa mudito rājā taṃ munīndraṃ sasāṃghikaṃ // Rm_14.210{10} //
K14ratnml_u:6166: tataś ca bhojanānte sa nṛpatiḥ sāñjalir mudā /
K14ratnml_u:6167: taṃ munīndraṃ praṇatvaivaṃ praṇidhānaṃ hṛdo vyadhāt // Rm_14.211{11} //
K14ratnml_u:6169: samyag bodhiṃ samāgamya bhaveyaṃ sugato jinaḥ // Rm_14.212{12} //
K14ratnml_u:6170: etat tena narendreṇa praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ mudā /
K14ratnml_u:6171: matvā sa sugatas tasya tathāśīrvacanaṃ dadau // Rm_14.213{13} //
K14ratnml_u:6172: jayo 'stu te sadā rājaṃ dharmeṇa pālaya prajāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6173: praṇidhānaṃ yathā bodhau tathā te siddhyatu dhruvaṃ // Rm_14.214{14} //
K14ratnml_u:6174: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa tena śrutvā sa bhūpatiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6175: muditaḥ sāñjalir natvā taṃ munīndraṃ samabravīt // Rm_14.215{15} //
K14ratnml_u:6178: tad bhavān kṛpayā dṛṣṭyā sadā māṃ draṣṭum arhati /
K14ratnml_u:6179: sarvadā bhavatām eva śaraṇe 'smi samāsthitaḥ // Rm_14.217{17} //
K14ratnml_u:6180: iti saṃprārthanāṃ kṛtvā rājā sa sajano mudā /
K14ratnml_u:6181: bhagavaṃtaṃ tam ānamya sānaṃdaḥ svapuraṃ yayau // Rm_14.218{18} //
K14ratnml_u:6182: tataḥ sa bhagavāñ chāstā samutthāya sasāṃghikaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6183: sarvatra bhadratāṃ kṛtvā svāśrame samupāyayau // Rm_14.219{19} //
K14ratnml_u:6185: aham eva tadābhūvan nānyo draṣṭavya eva saḥ // Rm_14.220{20} //
K14ratnml_u:6186: yan mayā śraddhayā tasya prabodhanasya tāyinaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6189: etair gāndharvikair evaṃ satkāraḥ prakṛtādhunā // Rm_14.222{22} //
K14ratnml_u:6191: triratnaṃ śaraṇaṃ kṛtvā bhajanīyaṃ śubhārthibhiḥ // Rm_14.223{23} //
K14ratnml_u:6192: yūyaṃ cāpi sadā nityaṃ śāstāraṃ sadguruṃ jinaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:6194: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā te bhikṣavo mudā /
K14ratnml_u:6195: sarve tatheti vijñapya triratnāni sadābhajan // Rm_14.225{25} //
K14ratnml_u:6196: iti me guruṇādiṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ mayā narādhipa /
K14ratnml_u:6198: evaṃ rājaṃs tvayāpy evaṃ triratnaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6199: saṃbuddhaśāsanaṃ dhṛtvā cara dharmaṃ samāhitaḥ // Rm_14.227{27} //
K14ratnml_u:6201: prajāś cāpi tathā rājaṃ bodhayitvā prayatnataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6203: tathā cet te sadā bhadraṃ bhaven nūnaṃ samantataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6204: kramād bodhiṃ samāsādya saṃbuddhapadam āpnuyāḥ // Rm_14.229{29} //
K14ratnml_u:6205: iti śāstrā samādeṣṭaṃ śrutvāśokaḥ sa bhūpatiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6207: gāṃdharvikānām avadānam etac chrutvānumodanti narā mudā ye /
K14ratnml_u:6208: te sarva enaḥparimuktacittā bhuktvā sukhāny eva labhanti bodhiṃ /
K14ratnml_u:6213: upaguptaṃ guruṃ natvā punar evam abhāṣata // Rm_15.1{1} //
K14ratnml_u:6214: bhadanta śrotum ichāmi punar anyat subhāṣitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:6215: tadyathā guruṇākhyātaṃ tathādeṣṭuṃ ca me 'rhasi // Rm_15.2{2} //
K14ratnml_u:6216: iti saṃprārthite rājñā sa yatiḥ sugatātmajaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6217: aśokaṃ taṃ nṛpaṃ dṛṣṭvā punar evam upādiśat // Rm_15.3{3} //
K14ratnml_u:6218: śṛṇu rājan mahābhāga yathā me guruṇoditaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:6219: tathāhaṃ te pravakṣyāmi śrutvāpy evaṃ pramodaya // Rm_15.4{4} //
K14ratnml_u:6220: purā sa bhagavān buddhaḥ śākyasiṃho jagadguruḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6222: tasmiṃś ca samaye tatra sarve bhikṣugaṇā api /
K14ratnml_u:6223: śrāvakāś cailakāś caiva sarva upāsakā api // Rm_15.6{6} //
K14ratnml_u:6229: bhadradharmāmṛtaṃ pātuṃ sarve lokāḥ samāgatāḥ // Rm_15.9{9} //
K14ratnml_u:6234: rājāno rājaputrāś ca vaiśyā maṃtrijanā api /
K14ratnml_u:6235: amātyāḥ śreṣṭhino bhaṭṭāḥ paurikāś ca gṛhādhipāḥ // Rm_15.12{12} //
K14ratnml_u:6237: vaṇijaḥ śilpinaś cāpi grāmyāḥ kārpaṭikā api // Rm_15.13{13} //
K14ratnml_u:6239: sarve dharmāmṛtaṃ pātuṃ vihāre samupāgatāḥ // Rm_15.14{14} //
K14ratnml_u:6241: śrīghanaṃ taṃ samālokya praṇatvā samupācaran // Rm_15.15{15} //
K14ratnml_u:6242: tatra te samupāsṛtya sarve taṃ śrīghanaṃ muniṃ /
K14ratnml_u:6244: tataḥ sarve 'pi te lokāḥ parivṛtya samantataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6246: tadā sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā sarvāṃs tān samupasthitān /
K14ratnml_u:6248: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pītvā sarve te tridaśādayaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6251: tasminn avasare tatra śrāvastyāṃ pauriko gṛhī /
K14ratnml_u:6252: śreṣṭhī mahājanaḥ śrimāñ chrāddho bhadrāśayābhavat // Rm_15.20{20} //
K14ratnml_u:6253: sa ekasmiṃ dine svasmin bhāṇḍālakoṣṭhake viśan /
K14ratnml_u:6255: aho me jāyate saṃpad dīyatī saṃpravarddhitā /
K14ratnml_u:6256: tathāpi varddhyate tṛṣṇā yataḥ saukhyaṃ na kiṃ cana // Rm_15.22{22} //
K14ratnml_u:6257: yad ime caṃcalā bhogā jalacaṃdranibhā mama /
K14ratnml_u:6259: tad atra kiṃ mano 'dyāpi tṛṣṇayākṛṣyate mama /
K14ratnml_u:6260: yena carāmy ahaṃ loke duḥkhī bhavikalāśayaḥ // Rm_15.24{24} //
K14ratnml_u:6261: tat kiṃ me saṃpadā sāraṃ yataḥ saukhyaṃ na vidyate /
K14ratnml_u:6262: dharmārthe gocaraṃ naiva kevalaṃ madavṛddhaye // Rm_15.25{25} //
K14ratnml_u:6263: madena varddhate mānaṃ mānāl loke pramādatā /
K14ratnml_u:6264: pramādād dīpyate cerṣyā kopāgnir dīpyate tataḥ // Rm_15.26{26} //
K14ratnml_u:6267: svayaṃ naṣṭaḥ parāṃś cāpi nāśayati durāśayaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6272: narakeṣu bhraman nityaṃ duḥkhāny eva sadāśnuyāt // Rm_15.30{30} //
K14ratnml_u:6273: yad vātrāpi ca saṃsāre jīvitam adhruvaṃ khalu /
K14ratnml_u:6274: kṣaṇadhvaṃsi śarīraṃ ca sārveṣāṃ maraṇaṃ dhruvaṃ // Rm_15.31{31} //
K14ratnml_u:6275: tad atrāham asārebhyo bhogebhyaḥ sāram uttamaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:6276: saddharmaṃ samupādātuṃ yatnaṃ kuryāṃ samādarāt // Rm_15.32{32} //
K14ratnml_u:6277: saddharmaṃ saugataṃ dharmam ity ākhyātaṃ purāvidaiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6278: tad atra saugate kṣetre dānaṃ kurvīya sāṃprataṃ // Rm_15.33{33} //
K14ratnml_u:6279: bauddhakṣetre kṛtaṃ dānaṃ bodhivījaṃ bhaved dhruvaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:6280: etad evātra saṃsāre sādhanīyaṃ śubhāptaye // Rm_15.34{34} //
K14ratnml_u:6281: dānena śuddhyate cittaṃ sucittaḥ sumatiṃ labhet /
K14ratnml_u:6292: ity arhadbhir mahābhijñaiḥ samākhyātaṃ mayā śrutaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:6293: tat saṃbuddhapadāṃ praptuṃ buddhaṃ bhajeya sāṃprataṃ // Rm_15.40{40} //
K14ratnml_u:6295: tad buddhapramukhaṃ sarvasaṃghaṃ pūjeya sādaraṃ // Rm_15.41{41} //
K14ratnml_u:6296: iti niścitya sa śrīmān gṛhasthaḥ saṃpramoditaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6297: bhagavaṃtaṃ sasaṃghan taṃ pūjayituṃ samaichata // Rm_15.42{42} //
K14ratnml_u:6300: tatra taṃ śrīghanaṃ dṛṣṭvā sa gṛhasthaḥ pramoditaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6302: tataḥ sa sajano natvā sāñjaliḥ saṃpramoditaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6303: munīndraṃ taṃ samālokya puraḥ sthitvaivam abravīt // Rm_15.45{45} //
K14ratnml_u:6304: sarvajña bhagavaṃ chāstar bhavatāṃ śaraṇaṃ vraje /
K14ratnml_u:6307: pūjayituṃ samichāmi tad anujñāṃ dadātu me // Rm_15.47{47} //
K14ratnml_u:6308: iti saṃprārthite tena bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6309: tathāstv iti pratijñāya tūṣṇībhūtvādhyuvāsa tat // Rm_15.48{48} //
K14ratnml_u:6310: tataḥ sa gṛhabhṛn matvā bhagavatādhyuvāsa taṃ /
K14ratnml_u:6311: sāñjalis taṃ muniṃ natvā muditaḥ svagṛhaṃ yayau // Rm_15.49{49} //
K14ratnml_u:6312: tatra sa svajanaiḥ svasmiṃ gṛhe margeṣu sarvataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6318: tato 'nye dyur gṛhasthaḥ sa snātvā śuddhāṃvarāvṛtaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6319: saṃbuddhāmaṃtraṇaṃ kartuṃ vihāre sajano yayau // Rm_15.53{53} //
K14ratnml_u:6320: tatra taṃ śrīghanaṃ dṛṣṭvā sasaṃghaṃ sa purogataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6321: kṛtāñjalipuṭo natvā prārthayad evam ādarāt // Rm_15.54{54} //
K14ratnml_u:6323: tat sasaṃgho mamāvāse bhāvān āgantum arhati // Rm_15.55{55} //
K14ratnml_u:6324: iti saṃprārthite tena bhagavān sa sasāṃghikaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6326: tatra sa bhagavān mārge kṛtvā bhadraṃ prabhāsayan /
K14ratnml_u:6329: upadravāṇi sarvāṇi sahasā vilayaṃ yayuḥ // Rm_15.58{58} //
K14ratnml_u:6330: andhā rūpāṇi paśyantaḥ śṛṇvanto vadhirā ravān /
K14ratnml_u:6331: hīnendriyāś ca ye te 'pi pratilabdhendriyā vavuḥ // Rm_15.59{59} //
K14ratnml_u:6333: rogiṇo nīrujā āsan kuvelā rucirāmvarāḥ // Rm_15.60{60} //
K14ratnml_u:6335: mūkā āsan pravaktāro jaḍāś cāpi suvāgminaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6337: ye ca caṇḍāśāyāḥ krūrās te 'py abhūvan dayālavaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6338: ye ca duṣṭā durācārās te santas samyamodyatāḥ // Rm_15.62{62} //
K14ratnml_u:6340: ye śaṭhā vaṃcakāś cauras te āryāḥ satyavādinaḥ // Rm_15.63{63} //
K14ratnml_u:6341: evaṃ ye duḥkhinaḥ satvās te sarve sukhino 'bhavan /
K14ratnml_u:6342: evaṃ sa bhagavāṃs tatra kṛtvā bhadraṃ samantataḥ // Rm_15.64{64} //
K14ratnml_u:6344: tatra tasya munīndrasya sa gṛhastho yathākramaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:6345: pādyaṃ dadau sasaṃghasya sadārāḥ śucināmbunā // Rm_15.65{65} //
K14ratnml_u:6346: tataḥ sa suprāsannātmā sasaṃghaṃ taṃ munīśvaraṃ /
K14ratnml_u:6347: prajñapte svāsane tatra yathākramaṃ nyaveśayat // Rm_15.66{66} //
K14ratnml_u:6348: tatra te sāṃghikāḥ sarve saṃbuddhapramukhāḥ kramāt /
K14ratnml_u:6351: tān sarvān sa gṛhī dṛṣṭvā yathāvidhi samarcayat // Rm_15.68{68} //
K14ratnml_u:6352: tataḥ sa sajanaḥ śreṣṭhī svahastena sasāṃghikaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:6353: taṃ munīndraṃ sudhākalpair bhojanaiḥ samatarpayet // Rm_15.69{69} //
K14ratnml_u:6354: tataḥ saṃtṛptitaṃ dṛṣṭvā sasaṃghaṃ taṃ munīśvaraṃ /
K14ratnml_u:6355: apanīya sa pātrāṇi tad dhastādīn vyaśodhayat // Rm_15.70{70} //
K14ratnml_u:6356: tataḥ sa sāñjalir natvā tān buddhapramukhān yatīn /
K14ratnml_u:6357: puro nīcāsanāsīno dharmaṃ śrotum upāśrayat // Rm_15.71{71} //
K14ratnml_u:6358: tataḥ sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā taṃ gṛhaṣṭhaṃ subhāvinaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:6360: ārogyam astu te nityaṃ gṛhapate sadā śivaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:6361: bodhau cittaṃ samādhāya cara dharmaṃ samāhitaḥ // Rm_15.73{73} //
K14ratnml_u:6362: dharmeṇa jīyate pāpaṃ niṣpāpaḥ sadgatiṃ vrajet /
K14ratnml_u:6363: sadgatau satsukhāny eva bhuktvā saṃcarate sadā // Rm_15.74{74} //
K14ratnml_u:6365: sudhiro guṇavān vijño bhavec chrīmān maharddhikaḥ // Rm_15.75{75} //
K14ratnml_u:6366: dharmeṇa suciraṃ jīved ārogyaṃ ca sadā tanau /
K14ratnml_u:6367: sarvatrāpi bhaven nityaṃ maṃgalaṃ nirupadravaṃ // Rm_15.76{76} //
K14ratnml_u:6368: dharmo na naśyate kvapi hriyate nāpi kena cit /
K14ratnml_u:6369: kenāpi naśyate naiva cālayituṃ kadā cana // Rm_15.77{77} //
K14ratnml_u:6370: nāgnibhir dahyate dharmaḥ klidyate nāpi codakaiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6371: vāyubhiḥ śuṣyate naiva kṣīyate nāpi bhūmiṣu // Rm_15.78{78} //
K14ratnml_u:6373: dharmeṇa calate vāyur dharmeṇa vahate jalaḥ // Rm_15.79{79} //
K14ratnml_u:6376: meghā dharmeṇa varṣāṇā bhūmiḥ śaṣyauṣadhībharāḥ // Rm_15.80{80} //
K14ratnml_u:6379: dharmo na śīyate kvāpi dharmo na paribhūyate /
K14ratnml_u:6380: sarvatra jayate dharmo dharmo hi śobhate sadā // Rm_15.82{82} //
K14ratnml_u:6381: dharmahīnā na śobhante śrimanto guṇino 'pi ca /
K14ratnml_u:6382: dharmmiṣṭhā eva śobhante daridrā nirguṇā api // Rm_15.83{83} //
K14ratnml_u:6386: mahāmbudhiṃ samuttīrya ratnāny api labhanti ca // Rm_15.85{85} //
K14ratnml_u:6392: rājyakāryāṇi sarvāṇi sādhayanto jayanty arīn // Rm_15.88{88} //
K14ratnml_u:6397: tathā dharmadharā eva yatayo yogino 'pi ca /
K14ratnml_u:6398: sarvakleśagaṇāñ jitvā labhanti paramaṃ padaṃ // Rm_15.91{91} //
K14ratnml_u:6400: yathābhilaṣitāṃ siddhiṃ prāpya mokṣaṃ vrajanti ca // Rm_15.92{92} //
K14ratnml_u:6403: tathā ca mānavāḥ sarve lokā dharmānusārataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6408: sukhāni suciraṃ bhuktvā pravasanti pramoditāḥ // Rm_15.96{96} //
K14ratnml_u:6410: sarve satvāḥ sukhaprāptāḥ pracaranti yathechayā // Rm_15.97{97} //
K14ratnml_u:6413: kim atra vahunoktena dharma eva jagatprabhuḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6414: dharmeṇaiva sadā nityaṃ rakṣitaḥ pracarec chubhe // Rm_15.99{99} //
K14ratnml_u:6415: ṣubhena siddhyate cittaṃ śuddhacittaḥ sudhīr bhavet /
K14ratnml_u:6418: bodhicittaṃ samādhāya triratnāni sadā bhajet // Rm_15.101{1} //
K14ratnml_u:6421: bodhisatvo mahāsatvo bodhicaryāṃ vrataṃ caret // Rm_15.102{2} //
K14ratnml_u:6422: tato māragaṇāñ jitvā pūrya pāramitāḥ kramāt /
K14ratnml_u:6423: trividhāṃ bodhim āsādya saṃbuddhapadam āpnuyāt // Rm_15.103{3} //
K14ratnml_u:6426: mṛtyukāle vipattau ca dharmma evānugas suhṛt /
K14ratnml_u:6427: tadā sarve tyajanty āśu ko 'pi naiva sahānugaḥ // Rm_15.105{5} //
K14ratnml_u:6428: dharma eva tadā trātā sarvatrāpy anugaḥ suhṛt /
K14ratnml_u:6429: tasmād dharmo mahāratnaṃ sādhanīyaṃ prayatnataḥ // Rm_15.106{6} //
K14ratnml_u:6431: samādiśya kṣaṇaṃ tasthau tūṣṇībhūtvā samāhitaḥ // Rm_15.107{7} //
K14ratnml_u:6432: tatas tasya munīndrasya pādau sa mudito gṛhī /
K14ratnml_u:6433: praṇatvā manasā caivaṃ praṇidhānaṃ sāmadadhe // Rm_15.108{8} //
K14ratnml_u:6435: pratyekāṃ bodhim āsādya nirvṛtiṃ samavāpnuyāt // Rm_15.109{9} //
K14ratnml_u:6436: tataḥ sa suprasannāsyo gṛhasthaḥ sajano mudā /
K14ratnml_u:6437: bhagavataṃ tam ālokya puras tasthau samāhitaḥ // Rm_15.110{10} //
K14ratnml_u:6438: tadā sa bhagavāṃs tasya śrīmato hṛdaye sthitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:6442: tāsāṃ yā raśmayo yātā adholoke samantataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6443: tāḥ sarvanarakeṣv evam avabhyāsya samāsarat // Rm_15.113{13} //
K14ratnml_u:6444: tadā tābhiḥ parispṛṣṭāḥ sarve te narakasthitāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6448: aho citraṃ kim adyaivaṃ mahat saukhyaṃ prajāyate /
K14ratnml_u:6449: kiṃ nu vayaṃ bhavanto 'smāc cyutā anyatra cāgatāḥ // Rm_15.116{16} //
K14ratnml_u:6450: yad asmākaṃ mahad duḥkhaṃ tat sarvaṃ śāmyate 'dhunā /
K14ratnml_u:6451: saṃjāyate mahāsaukhyaṃ tad adbhutaṃ na manyate // Rm_15.117{17} //
K14ratnml_u:6453: yasmād iyaṃ mahāraśmir avabhāsya prasaryati // Rm_15.118{18} //
K14ratnml_u:6455: bhagavān nirmitaṃ buddhaṃ sarvatra tatra preṣayet // Rm_15.119{19} //
K14ratnml_u:6456: tadā taṃ saugatiṃ mūrttiṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve 'pi te mudā /
K14ratnml_u:6457: aho citram iti proktvā vismitāś caivam abruvan // Rm_15.120{20} //
K14ratnml_u:6458: nehaivetaś cyutāḥ sarve nāpy anyatra gatā vayaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:6459: ihaiva saṃsthitāḥ sarve narake pravasāmahe // Rm_15.121{21} //
K14ratnml_u:6460: api tv ayaṃ mahān satvo 'pūrvadarśana āgataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6461: nūnam asyānubhāvena saṃjāyante sukhāni naḥ // Rm_15.122{22} //
K14ratnml_u:6462: tad asmiṃ sugatākare vayaṃ sarve prasāditāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6463: upetya praṇatiṃ kṛtvā sarvathā saṃbhajemahi // Rm_15.123{23} //
K14ratnml_u:6464: iti saṃbhāṣya sarve te nārakīyāḥ pramoditāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6467: namo buddhāya dharmāya saṃghāye ca namaḥ sadā /
K14ratnml_u:6468: ity uktvā ca triratnānāṃ saṃsmṛtvā śaraṇaṃ yayuḥ // Rm_15.125{25} //
K14ratnml_u:6469: iti te nirmite tasmiṃ cittaṃ prasādya nirmalāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6471: tathā corddhagatā yās tāḥ kramāc cāturmahādhipān /
K14ratnml_u:6472: samārabhya trayastriṃśān sarvāṃś cāpi surālayāt // Rm_15.127{27} //
K14ratnml_u:6474: tathā cāpi samodghuṣya sarvān devān anodayan /
K14ratnml_u:6475: anityaṃ khalu saṃsāraṃ duḥkham śūnyam anātmakaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:6476: iti matvā śubhe nityaṃ caritavyaṃ sadāpi ca // Rm_15.129{28} //
K14ratnml_u:6478: dhunīta mṛtyusainyāni naḍāgāraṃ karī yathā // Rm_15.130{29} //
K14ratnml_u:6479: yo hy asmiṃ dharmavinaye hy apramattaś cariṣyati /
K14ratnml_u:6480: tyaktvā janmātra saṃsāre duḥkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyati // Rm_15.131{30} //
K14ratnml_u:6482: tac chraddhayā triratnāni bhajadhvaṃ sarvadādarāt // Rm_15.132{31} //
K14ratnml_u:6483: etac chabdaṃ samākarṇya sarve devāḥ prabodhitāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6484: triratnaṃ śaraṇaṃ kṛtvā prabhejire sadādṛtāḥ // Rm_15.133{32} //
K14ratnml_u:6485: evaṃ tā raśmayaḥ sarvāḥ sarvāṃl lokāṃc chubhe vṛṣe /
K14ratnml_u:6486: bodhayitvā pratisthāpya pratyāyayur muneḥ puraḥ // Rm_15.134{33} //
K14ratnml_u:6487: tatra tā raśmayaḥ sarvāḥ piṇḍitās tasya tāyinaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6488: tridhā pradakṣiṇīkṛtvā sūrṇāyāṃ nyaviśat punaḥ // Rm_15.135{34} //
K14ratnml_u:6489: tad dṛṣṭvā vismitāḥ sarve lokās te samitisthitāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6490: kiṃ dharmam ādiśed buddha iti saṃciṃtya tasthire // Rm_15.136{35} //
K14ratnml_u:6492: puraḥ sthito munīndraṃ taṃ praṇatvā prārthayat tathā // Rm_15.137{36} //
K14ratnml_u:6498: tad yad arthaṃ bhavān smitaṃ darśayati munīśvara /
K14ratnml_u:6499: tad arthaṃ śrotum icchaṃti sarve lokā ime 'dhunā // Rm_15.140{39} //
K14ratnml_u:6500: tad bhavāṃ yat samādeṣṭum ichati sāṃprataṃ mune /
K14ratnml_u:6501: tad dharmaṃ samupādiśya prasādayatv imāṃ sabhāṃ // Rm_15.141{40} //
K14ratnml_u:6502: iti tena vaśiṣyeṇa prārthite sa munīśvaraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6503: tam āyuṣmantam ānandaṃ samāmaṃtryaivam abravīt // Rm_15.142{41} //
K14ratnml_u:6505: saṃbuddhā api te sarve darśayanti kadā cana // Rm_15.143{42} //
K14ratnml_u:6506: yad arthe smitam ānaṃda darśitaṃ sāṃprataṃ mayā /
K14ratnml_u:6508: tad arthaṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi tac chṛṇudhvaṃ samāhitāḥ // Rm_15.144{43} //
K14ratnml_u:6509: paśyasi tvaṃ tadānaṃda śreṣṭhinānena yan mama /
K14ratnml_u:6510: evaṃvidhaṃ sasaṃghasya satkāraṃ śraddhayā kṛtaṃ // Rm_15.145{44} //
K14ratnml_u:6512: ayaṃ śrīmān mahāsatvo bodhisatvo bhavet sudhīḥ // Rm_15.146{45} //
K14ratnml_u:6514: sūkṣmatvag iti vikhyātaḥ pratyekabuddha ātmavit // Rm_15.147{46} //
K14ratnml_u:6518: buddhakṣetre kṛtaṃ puṇyaṃ na kṣiṇoti kadā cana /
K14ratnml_u:6519: saṃbodhisatphalaṃ dadyān nānyad dharmaphalaṃ khalu // Rm_15.150{49} //
K14ratnml_u:6521: matvā taccharaṇaṃ kṛtvā triratnaṃ bhajatādarāt // Rm_15.151{50} //
K14ratnml_u:6523: te sadā sadgatiṃ yātāś caraṃti bodhisaṃvaraṃ // Rm_15.152{51} //
K14ratnml_u:6524: ye dharmaṃ śaraṇaṃ kṛtvā śrutvā bhajanti sādaraṃ /
K14ratnml_u:6525: sarve te 'kleśino bhadrāḥ saṃprayānti jinālayaṃ // Rm_15.153{52} //
K14ratnml_u:6526: ye saṃghe śaraṇaṃ gatvā bhajanti śraddhayā sadā /
K14ratnml_u:6527: na te gacchanti duḥkhatvaṃ sadā yānti sukhāvatīṃ // Rm_15.154{53} //
K14ratnml_u:6528: iti matvā tathā yūyaṃ sadā nityaṃ samāhitāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6531: trividhāṃ bodhim āsādya saṃbuddhapadam āpsyatha // Rm_15.156{55} //
K14ratnml_u:6533: sarve 'pi sāṃghikāḥ sarve lokāś ca saṃpramoditāḥ // Rm_15.157{56} //
K14ratnml_u:6535: satkṛtya śraddhayā nityaṃ prabhejire samāhitāḥ // Rm_15.158{57} //
K14ratnml_u:6536: so 'pi śreṣṭhī tathā śāstrā samādiṣṭaṃ tadātmanaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:6538: tataḥ prabhṛti sa śrīmāṃs triratnaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6539: satkṛtya śraddhayā nityaṃ sadā bheje pramoditaḥ // Rm_15.160{59} //
K14ratnml_u:6540: tataḥ sa bhagavāñ chāstā sasāṃghikaḥ samutthitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6541: tathā sarvatra bhadrāṇi prakurvan svāśramaṃ yayau // Rm_15.161{60} //
K14ratnml_u:6542: ity evaṃ guruṇākhyātaṃ tathā mayātra kathyate /
K14ratnml_u:6543: tvam apy evaṃ mahārāja śrutvā dharmaṃ śubhe cara // Rm_15.162{61} //
K14ratnml_u:6544: prajāś cāpi tathā dharmaṃ śrāvayitvā prabodhayan /
K14ratnml_u:6546: tathā te sarvadā nityaṃ maṃgalaṃ nirupadravaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:6547: bhaven nūnaṃ mahārāja satyam etat prabudhyatāṃ // Rm_15.164{63} //
K14ratnml_u:6549: paripūryya krameṇaivaṃ saṃbodhim api cāpsyai // Rm_15.165{64} //
K14ratnml_u:6550: evaṃ satyaṃ parijñāya triratnaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6551: satkṛtya śraddhayā nityaṃ bhaja bodhiṃ yadīchasi // Rm_15.166{65} //
K14ratnml_u:6553: iti tenārhatā śāstrā samādiṣṭaṃ niśamya saḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6554: nṛpas tatheti saṃśrutya prābhyanandat sapārṣadaḥ // Rm_15.167{66} //
K14ratnml_u:6555: sūkṣmatvaco 'vadānaṃ yat tad idaṃ ye narā mudā /
K14ratnml_u:6556: satkṛtya śraddhayā bhaktyā śṛṇvanti śrāvayanti ca // Rm_15.168{67} //
K14ratnml_u:6557: te sarve sadgatiṃ yātā bhuktvā saukhyāni sarvadā /
K14ratnml_u:6563: upaguptaṃ yatiṃ natvā punar eva samabravīt // Rm_16.1{1} //
K14ratnml_u:6564: bhadanta śrotum ichāmi punar anyat subhāṣitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:6565: tadyathā guruṇādiṣṭaṃ tathādeṣṭuṃ ca me 'rhasi // Rm_16.2{2} //
K14ratnml_u:6566: iti saṃprārthitaṃ tena rājñā sa yatir ātmavit /
K14ratnml_u:6567: tam aśokaṃ mahīpālaṃ samālokyaivam ādiśat // Rm_16.3{3} //
K14ratnml_u:6568: śṛṇu rājan mahābhāga yathā me guruṇoditaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:6569: tathāhaṃ te pravakṣyāmi śrutvānumodanāṃ kuru // Rm_16.4{4} //
K14ratnml_u:6570: purā sa bhagavān buddhaḥ śākyasiṃho jagadguruḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6571: sarvajñaḥ sugataḥ śāstā dharmarājas tathāgataḥ // Rm_16.5{5} //
K14ratnml_u:6584: ṛṣayo brahmaṇāś cāpi yatayo yogino 'pi ca /
K14ratnml_u:6585: rājāno rājaputrāś ca maṃtriṇo 'pi ca // Rm_16.12{12} //
K14ratnml_u:6587: vaṇijaḥ śilpinaś cāpi gṛhasthāḥ paurikā janāḥ // Rm_16.13{13} //
K14ratnml_u:6588: grāmyā jānapadāś cāpi kārpaṭikāś ca nairgamāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6590: tatra sarve 'pi te lokā vihāre samupāgatāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6591: taṃ munīndraṃ samāsīnaṃ dṛṣṭvā natvā pramoditāḥ // Rm_16.15{15} //
K14ratnml_u:6593: natvā sāñjalayaḥ sarve parivṛtya samaṃtataḥ // Rm_16.16{16} //
K14ratnml_u:6595: śrīghanaṃ taṃ samālokya samātasthuḥ samāhitāḥ // Rm_16.17{17} //
K14ratnml_u:6596: tadā sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā tān sarvān samupasthitān /
K14ratnml_u:6598: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pītvā lokāḥ sarve 'pi te mudā /
K14ratnml_u:6608: vibhramanti sadā kvāpi kiñci sthitiṃ na lebhire // Rm_16.23{23} //
K14ratnml_u:6610: āyuṣmān saugato bhikṣur mahābhijño dayānvitaḥ // Rm_16.24{24} //
K14ratnml_u:6612: rājagṛhe pure piṇḍaṃ yācituṃ samupācaran // Rm_16.25{25} //
K14ratnml_u:6613: tatra yatiḥ sa tāṃ pretāṃ sarvān vibhramato 'mvare /
K14ratnml_u:6614: dṛṣṭvene ka iti dhyātvā paśyañ janair upācaran // Rm_16.26{26} //
K14ratnml_u:6615: te sarve pretakāś cāpi dṛṣṭvā taṃ bhikṣum āgataṃ /
K14ratnml_u:6616: sahasopetya natvāgre rudanta etad abruvan // Rm_16.27{27} //
K14ratnml_u:6618: tad asmākaṃ hitaṃ kṛtvā kṛpayā trātum arhati // Rm_16.28{28} //
K14ratnml_u:6619: vayaṃ rājagṛhe jātāḥ paurāḥ paṃcaśatāny api /
K14ratnml_u:6621: tadā vayam ime sarve gṛhasthāḥ śreṣṭhino narāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6625: naiva kiñ cit tadā dānam adadmahi kadā cana /
K14ratnml_u:6626: arthinam āgataṃ dṛṣṭvā prākuṣyāmahi roṣitāḥ // Rm_16.32{32} //
K14ratnml_u:6627: paradattāny api śrutvā dṛṣṭvā cāpi praroṣitāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6629: saugatā api cārhantaḥ pretā iveyam āgatāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6631: tata ete vayaṃ sarve kālaṃ kṛtvā ca sāṃprataṃ /
K14ratnml_u:6633: iti bhadanta vijñāya gatvā rājagṛhe bhavān /
K14ratnml_u:6638: asmannāmnā prakarttavyaṃ praṇāmam api sadguro // Rm_16.38{38} //
K14ratnml_u:6641: bhavatā kārayitavyā ity asmāsu kṛpāṃ kuru // Rm_16.39{39} //
K14ratnml_u:6642: yathāsmākam itaḥ pretalokā muktir bhaved dhruvaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:6643: tathāsmāsu bhavāmc chāstā kṛpayā kartum arhāti // Rm_16.40{40} //
K14ratnml_u:6644: iti taiḥ prārthitaṃ sarvaiḥ sa maudgalyāyanaḥ sudhīḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6645: śrutvā tatheti saṃśrutya tūṣṇībhūtvādhyuvāsa tat // Rm_16.41{41} //
K14ratnml_u:6646: tatas tān pretikān sarvān sa maudgalyāyano yatiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6647: samālokya samāśvāsya punar etat samabravīt // Rm_16.42{42} //
K14ratnml_u:6648: tatra yūyaṃ ca sarva śvaḥ pravṛtte saṃghabhojane /
K14ratnml_u:6649: sasaṃghaṃ śrīghanaṃ draṣṭuṃ samāyāta samādarāt // Rm_16.43{43} //
K14ratnml_u:6650: iti tenārhātādiṣṭaṃ śrutvā te pretakā api /
K14ratnml_u:6651: tatheti hi pratijñāya praṇatvā taṃ vane yayuḥ // Rm_16.44{44} //
K14ratnml_u:6652: tataḥ sa saugato bhikṣur maudgalyo yatir ātmavit /
K14ratnml_u:6653: gatvā rājagṛhe teṣāṃ jñātīnāṃ samupācaran // Rm_16.45{45} //
K14ratnml_u:6654: tatra sarvatra teṣāṃ tat jñātīnāṃ bhavaneṣu sa /
K14ratnml_u:6655: gatvā teṣāṃ pravṛttāṃtaṃ sarvam evaṃ nyavedayat // Rm_16.46{46} //
K14ratnml_u:6656: tataḥ sa tatra sarvāṃs tāṃ jñātīn āhūya sādaraṃ /
K14ratnml_u:6657: teṣāṃ pretagater muktihetor evaṃ samabravīt // Rm_16.47{'47} //
K14ratnml_u:6658: śṛṇuta bho mahābhāgya yūyaṃ sarve samāhitāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6662: nāpi dānaṃ pradattaṃ taiḥ kasmai ci kvāpi kiṃ cana /
K14ratnml_u:6663: paradattāny api śrutvā dṛṣṭvā vā paryabhāṣyata // Rm_16.50{50} //
K14ratnml_u:6664: arhanto bhikṣavo vā tair yācakāś ca gṛhāgatāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6667: ity arhato yatī cāpi dṛṣṭvaiva te 'bhyanindayan // Rm_16.52{52} //
K14ratnml_u:6671: saṃbuddhaśāsane dānaṃ kartum ichāmy ahaṃ khalu // Rm_16.54{54} //
K14ratnml_u:6673: tadā tat pāpamuktās te sarve yāyur divaṃ dhruvaṃ // Rm_16.55{55} //
K14ratnml_u:6674: tad atra śraddhayā yūyaṃ yathāśakti mayārthitāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6676: saṃghabhojye pravṛtte 'tra sarve te pretikā api /
K14ratnml_u:6677: draṣṭuṃ samāgamiṣyanti yūyaṃ cāgaṃtum arhatha // Rm_16.57{57} //
K14ratnml_u:6678: ity uktvā prārthite tena maudgalyena dayālunā /
K14ratnml_u:6679: śrutvā taj jātayaḥ sarve vismayāṃ samupāyayuḥ // Rm_16.58{58} //
K14ratnml_u:6680: tatas te vismitāḥ sarve tat pretagatimuktaye /
K14ratnml_u:6682: tat bhojyasāmagrīṃ śraddhayā dātum icchire // Rm_16.59{59} //
K14ratnml_u:6683: ke cit tasmai suvarṇāni ke cid ratnāni saṃdaduḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6684: ke cid ropyādi dhātūṃś ca dravyāni vividhāni cā // Rm_16.60{60} //
K14ratnml_u:6685: taṇḍulāni daduḥ ke cid dadur dhānyāni ke cana /
K14ratnml_u:6686: ke cid daduḥ kalāyāṃś ca godhūmāṃś ca yavān api // Rm_16.61{61} //
K14ratnml_u:6688: mudgāṃś cāpi tathānyāṃś ca sarvān vrīhin daduḥ pare // Rm_16.62{62} //
K14ratnml_u:6692: surasāni supathyāni pradaduś cāpare mudā // Rm_16.64{64} //
K14ratnml_u:6694: śunṭhīś ca pippirīś cāpi maricāni dadur mudā // Rm_16.65{65} //
K14ratnml_u:6695: hiṅguṃ ca jīrakāṃś cānye viḍarkasaiṃdhavādi ca /
K14ratnml_u:6696: anye ghṛtāni tailāni pradaduḥ śraddhayā mudā // Rm_16.66{66} //
K14ratnml_u:6697: śaktūṃś ca piṣṭakāṃś cānyamodakāṃś ca dadur mudā /
K14ratnml_u:6698: tathā dadhīni dugdhāni madhuni ca guḍāni ca // Rm_16.67{67} //
K14ratnml_u:6699: tathānye sarkarāś cāpi pradaduḥ śraddhayā mudā /
K14ratnml_u:6700: tathauṣadhāni pathyāni pācakāni daduḥ pare // Rm_16.68{68} //
K14ratnml_u:6703: sarve te jñātayas teṣāṃ saṃghabhokṣyāya saṃdaduḥ // Rm_16.69{69} //
K14ratnml_u:6704: evaṃ te sarvavastūni datvā sarve pramoditāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6705: sāṃjalayaḥ praṇatvā taṃ maudgalyaṃ yatim ūcire // Rm_16.70{70} //
K14ratnml_u:6709: tān pretān samupāyātān sarvān draṣṭuṃ sabāndhavāḥ // Rm_16.72{72} //
K14ratnml_u:6710: iti taiḥ prārthitaṃ śrutvā tatheti sa prabodhayan /
K14ratnml_u:6711: tāni dravyāni sarvāṇi gṛhītvā svāśrame yayau // Rm_16.73{73} //
K14ratnml_u:6712: tataḥ sa bhikṣur āyuṣmān vihāre samupācaran /
K14ratnml_u:6713: dṛṣṭvā taṃ śrīghanaṃ natvā sāñjaliḥ samupāśrayan // Rm_16.74{73} //
K14ratnml_u:6714: tatra sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā taṃ maudgalyam upasthitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:6716: kaṃ cit te kuśalaṃ vatsa kuto 'trāsi samāgataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6717: lokeṣu kiṃ pravṛttāṃtaṃ tan pracakṣva mahāmate // Rm_16.76{75} //
K14ratnml_u:6718: ity ādiṣṭe munīndreṇa sa maudgalyāyanaḥ sudhīḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6719: bhagavantaṃ tam ānatvā sāñjalir etad abravīt // Rm_16.77{76} //
K14ratnml_u:6720: bhagavan kṛpayā śāstaḥ sarvatra kauśalaṃ mama /
K14ratnml_u:6721: rājagṛhe pure piṃḍaṃ yācituṃ samupācaran // Rm_16.78{77} //
K14ratnml_u:6722: tatra mārge vanopānte paṃca pretaśatāny api /
K14ratnml_u:6723: dṛṣṭvā māṃ samupasṛtya praṇatvaitad vadanti vai // Rm_16.79{78} //
K14ratnml_u:6724: bhadanta tad vijānīyā yad vayaṃ pretikā ime /
K14ratnml_u:6725: sarve rājagṛhe jātā gṛhasthāḥ paurikāḥ khalu // Rm_16.80{79} //
K14ratnml_u:6730: jñātīnām api sarveṣāṃ karmaplotiṃ nivedya hi // Rm_16.82{81} //
K14ratnml_u:6738: bodhimārge pratisthāpya pātum arhati sarvadā // Rm_16.86{85} //
K14ratnml_u:6739: iti teṣāṃ vacaḥ śrutvā tathā rājagṛhe gataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6740: tad jñātīnāṃ puras teṣāṃ pravṛttāṃtaṃ nivedya ca // Rm_16.87{86} //
K14ratnml_u:6743: iti me prārthanāṃ kṛtvā bhavāṃ chāstā jagadguruḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6744: tad adhivāsanāṃ kṛtvā kṛpayā tān samuddhara // Rm_16.89{88} //
K14ratnml_u:6745: iti saṃprārthitaṃ tena bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6750: sāñjalis taṃ munīndraṃ ca praṇatvaitat samabravīt // Rm_16.92{91} //
K14ratnml_u:6752: tat sarvasāṃghikaiḥ sārddhaṃ sahasāgaṃtum arhati // Rm_16.93{92} //
K14ratnml_u:6753: iti saṃprārthite tena bhagavāṃ sa munīśvaraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6754: bhikṣuṃ prāha samāhūya gaṇḍīm ākoṭyatām iti // Rm_16.94{93} //
K14ratnml_u:6755: tadādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā bhikṣus tatheti saḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6756: āśrutya sahasādāya gaṇḍīm ākoṭayat tadā // Rm_16.95{94} //
K14ratnml_u:6757: tad gaṇḍīśabdam ākarṇya sarve te sāṃghikā api /
K14ratnml_u:6759: tataḥ sa bhagavāṃs tatra svāsane samupāviśat /
K14ratnml_u:6760: sarve te sāṃghikāś cāpi kramāt svasvāsane 'viśan // Rm_16.97{96} //
K14ratnml_u:6761: tatas tad jñātayaḥ sarve tatrānye paurikā api /
K14ratnml_u:6762: tān pretān draṣṭum āyātā upatasthuḥ sakautukāḥ // Rm_16.98{97} //
K14ratnml_u:6763: tadā te pretikāḥ sarve prakṣiptāḥ karmavāyubhiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6764: bahulokāntare dure yātās tasthur vimohitāḥ // Rm_16.99{98} //
K14ratnml_u:6765: tadā sa yatir ālokya sarvasaṃghān samāsthitān /
K14ratnml_u:6766: tadjñātibandhuvargāṃś ca pretān draṣṭuṃ samācarat // Rm_16.100{99} //
K14ratnml_u:6767: tatra pretān adṛṣṭvā sa maudgalyo vismitāśayaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6768: kiṃ te 'tra nāgatā veti samantato vyalokayat // Rm_16.101{100} //
K14ratnml_u:6770: vilokayan sa sarvatra nādrakṣīt tāṃ samaṃtataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6771: sa saṃdigdhaḥ punas tatra samyagdṛṣṭyā vyalokayat // Rm_16.102{1} //
K14ratnml_u:6772: sarvatrāpi sa tāṃ pretān adṛṣṭvā vismayānvitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6774: tatrāpi ca sa sarvatra naiva kaṃ cid apaśyate /
K14ratnml_u:6777: tatrāpi tān adṛṣṭvā sa narakeṣu samantataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6778: divyena cakṣuṣā paśyan na ca tatrāpy apaśyata // Rm_16.105{4} //
K14ratnml_u:6780: sa divyacakṣuṣā paśyaṃs tatrāpi nābhyapaśyata // Rm_16.106{5} //
K14ratnml_u:6781: tatrāpi tān adṛṣṭvā sa maudgalyo vismayānvitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6785: tatra sa purato gatvā śāstāraṃ taṃ munīśvaraṃ /
K14ratnml_u:6788: mayā na dṛśyate kaś cit te pretāḥ kvādhunā gatāḥ // Rm_16.110{9} //
K14ratnml_u:6789: teṣāṃ nāmnā bhavatpūjāṃ karttum etat prasādhitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:6790: yad atra nāgatāḥ kecit tat te pretā gatāḥ kuha // Rm_16.111{10} //
K14ratnml_u:6791: dṛśyante na mayā kvāpi sarvatrāpi samīkṣyate /
K14ratnml_u:6792: eko 'pi nāgato hy atra kva gatās te 'dhunā khalu // Rm_16.112{11} //
K14ratnml_u:6793: tan me cittaṃ prasaṃdigdhaṃ dṛṣṭvā śāstā bhavān sudṛk /
K14ratnml_u:6794: teṣāṃ gatiṃ samākhyāya saṃbodhayitum arhati // Rm_16.113{12} //
K14ratnml_u:6795: iti saṃprārthite tena maudgalyena sa sarvavit /
K14ratnml_u:6796: bhagavāṃs taṃ samālokya maudgalyam etad abravīt // Rm_16.114{13} //
K14ratnml_u:6797: maudgalya mā kṛthā yatnaṃ khedam evābhipatsyase /
K14ratnml_u:6798: gatās te pretikāḥ sarve sudūrabhuvane 'dhunā // Rm_16.115{14} //
K14ratnml_u:6800: adṛśye viṣaye yātāḥ preritāḥ karmavāyubhiḥ // Rm_16.116{15} //
K14ratnml_u:6801: yadi sarvāṃ ca tāṃ draṣṭuṃ vāṃchasi tvam ihāśritaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6802: sarvāṃs tāṃ darśayiṣyāmi paśya buddhānubhāvatāṃ // Rm_16.117{16} //
K14ratnml_u:6803: tad atra tvaṃ samādāya gaṇḍīm ākoṭaya drutaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:6804: oṃ namo bhagavate aparimitāyurjñānasuviniścitatejorājāya tathāgatāyārhate samyakambuddhāya // tadyathā //
K14ratnml_u:6805: oṃ puṇye puṇye mahāpuṇye aparimitapuṇye aparimitapuṇyajñānasaṃbhāropacite /
K14ratnml_u:6806: oṃ sarvasaṃskārapariśuddhe dharmate gagaṇasamudgate svabhāvaviśuddhe mahānayaparivāre svāhā /
K14ratnml_u:6809: iti śāstrā samādiṣṭaṃ śrutvā sa pratibodhitaḥ // Rm_16.119{18} //
K14ratnml_u:6810: sahasā tat sabhāmadhye gaṇḍīm ākoṭayat tathā /
K14ratnml_u:6811: tad gaṇḍīśabdam ākarṇya sarve te pretikā api /
K14ratnml_u:6814: tatra sarve 'pi te pretā dṛṣṭvā taṃ śrīghanaṃ mudā /
K14ratnml_u:6816: kramāt tāṃ sarvasaṃghāṃś ca praṇatvā te pramoditāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6817: sarve 'py ekāntam āśritya paśyanta upatasthire // Rm_16.122{21} //
K14ratnml_u:6818: tatra tad jñātayaḥ sarve paurikāś cāpare 'pi ca /
K14ratnml_u:6819: tān pretān samupāsīnān dṛṣṭvā tasthuḥ sakautukāḥ // Rm_16.123{22} //
K14ratnml_u:6820: evaṃ sarve 'pi te pretāḥ svasvajñātīn upasthitān /
K14ratnml_u:6821: bhātrādīn bandhuvargāṃś ca dṛṣṭvaivam upatasthire // Rm_16.124{23} //
K14ratnml_u:6822: tataḥ so 'rhan mahābhijño maudgalyas tān upasthitān /
K14ratnml_u:6823: pretān sarvān samālokya natvāhaivaṃ munīśvaraṃ // Rm_16.125{24} //
K14ratnml_u:6824: bhagavan nātha sarvajña te pretāḥ sarva āgatāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6825: tad eṣāṃ bhagavāṃ cchāstānugrahaṃ karttum arhati // Rm_16.126{25} //
K14ratnml_u:6827: sarvaṃ saṃghaṃ samabhyarcya bhojayan samatoṣayat // Rm_16.127{26} //
K14ratnml_u:6828: tataḥ sa sarvasaṃghaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃtṛptikaṃ mudā /
K14ratnml_u:6831: datvā kṣamārthanāṃ kṛtvā prārthayat sa munīśvaraṃ // Rm_16.129{28} //
K14ratnml_u:6832: bhagavan nātha sarvajña bhavāṃ chāstā sasāṃghikaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6833: dakṣiṇādeśanām ebhyaḥ pretebhyaḥ kartum arhati // Rm_16.130{29} //
K14ratnml_u:6834: iti saṃprārthitaṃ śrutvā sarve te pretikā mudā /
K14ratnml_u:6835: sasaṃghaṃ taṃ muniṃ natvā sādaram upatasthire // Rm_16.131{30} //
K14ratnml_u:6836: tataḥ sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā sasaṃghas tān upasthitān /
K14ratnml_u:6837: dakṣiṇādeśanāṃ tebhyaḥ sarvebhyo vidadhe śubhāṃ // Rm_16.132{31} //
K14ratnml_u:6838: ito dānād dhi yat puṇyaṃ tat pretān anugachatu /
K14ratnml_u:6839: uttiṣṭhantaḥ prayānty ete sarve pretāḥ surālayaṃ // Rm_16.133{21} //
K14ratnml_u:6840: ity ādiśya punas tatra bhagavāṃ sa munīśvaraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6846: duḥkhāny eva bhave nityaṃ puṇye matiḥ kathaṃ caret // Rm_16.137{25} //
K14ratnml_u:6847: vinā puṇyamatiṃ jantuḥ saddharme katham ācaret /
K14ratnml_u:6848: vinā saddharmabhāvena sadgatiṃ katham āpnuyāt // Rm_16.138{26} //
K14ratnml_u:6850: tiryakṣu narakeṣv eva bhraman duḥkhāny avāpnuyāt // Rm_16.139{27} //
K14ratnml_u:6851: tad atra mānuṣe janmaprāptair yatnena mānavaiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6852: satkṛtya śraddhayā nityaṃ śrotavyaṃ sadvṛṣaṃ mudā // Rm_16.140{28} //
K14ratnml_u:6854: etat puṇyavipākena sadgurau sarvadā bhajet // Rm_16.141{29} //
K14ratnml_u:6858: tatra sukhāni saṃbhuktvā saṃcareta śubhe sadā // Rm_16.143{31} //
K14ratnml_u:6861: dānena varddhyate lakṣmīr lakṣmīmāṃ cchobhate pumān /
K14ratnml_u:6864: triratnaśaraṇaṃ kṛtvā bhajed bhaktyā sadādarāt // Rm_16.146{34} //
K14ratnml_u:6866: bodhicitte hi labdhe hi bodhisatvo bhavet kṛtī // Rm_16.147{35} //
K14ratnml_u:6868: paripūrya mahāsatvas trividhāṃ bodhim āpnuyāt // Rm_16.148{36} //
K14ratnml_u:6870: qsākṣād arhatpadaṃ prāpya nirvṛtipadam āpnuyāt // Rm_16.149{37} //
K14ratnml_u:6871: evaṃ vijñāya martyena karttavyaṃ dānam arthine /
K14ratnml_u:6872: dānena sadgatiṃ yāyād adātā durgatiṃ vrajet // Rm_16.150{38} //
K14ratnml_u:6873: durgatiṣu sadā bhuktvā duḥkhāni vividhāṃ sa /
K14ratnml_u:6874: sarvadā duḥkhasaṃkliṣṭaḥ pāpeṣv evārataś caret // Rm_16.151{39} //
K14ratnml_u:6876: nirato hy aviśaṃkena saṃcareta pramādataḥ // Rm_16.152{40} //
K14ratnml_u:6877: tataḥ so hy atipāpiṣṭhaḥ saddharmanindakaḥ kudhīḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6878: svayaṃ naṣṭaḥ parāṃś cāpi nāśayen nāstikaḥ śaṭhaḥ // Rm_16.153{41} //
K14ratnml_u:6880: ghoreṣu narakeṣv eva gatvā bhraman sadā vaset // Rm_16.154{42} //
K14ratnml_u:6881: sadāpi narakeṣv evaṃ bhramatas tasya duḥkhinaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6882: kaścin naiva samuddhartuṃ śaknuyāt saugatād ṛte // Rm_16.155{43} //
K14ratnml_u:6883: yāvan na smarate buddhaṃ tāvat sa narake vaset /
K14ratnml_u:6884: yad eva smarate buddhaṃ tadā syāc chuddhitāśayaḥ // Rm_16.156{44} //
K14ratnml_u:6885: tadā taṃ kṛpayā buddho dṛṣṭvā bauddhena cakṣuṣā /
K14ratnml_u:6886: puṇyakareṇa saṃspṛṣṭvā samuddhared araṃ tataḥ // Rm_16.157{45} //
K14ratnml_u:6887: tatas taṃ pāpinaṃ bauddhā dharmāmbubhir viśodhya ca /
K14ratnml_u:6890: triratnaśaraṇaṃ kṛtvā saddharma eva prācaret // Rm_16.159{47} //
K14ratnml_u:6892: kramāt pāramitāḥ sarvā pūrayituṃ samudyamet // Rm_16.160{48} //
K14ratnml_u:6894: bodhisatvo mahāsatvo buddhātmajo bhaved api // Rm_16.161{49} //
K14ratnml_u:6896: trividhāṃ bodhim āsādya nirvṛtipadam āpnuyāt // Rm_16.162{50} //
K14ratnml_u:6897: evaṃ matvā sadā nityaṃ triratnaśaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6898: saddharmaṃ samupāśritya caradhvaṃ mānavā mudā // Rm_16.163{51} //
K14ratnml_u:6899: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā te brāhmaṇādayaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6901: sarve lokā parijñāya dṛṣṭasatyās tathācaran // Rm_16.164{52} //
K14ratnml_u:6902: tathā sarve 'pi te pretāḥ śrutvā tad dharmadeśanāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:6903: mudā taṃ śrīghanaṃ natvā śuddhātmānas tato 'caran // Rm_16.165{53} //
K14ratnml_u:6904: tatas tad jñātayaḥ sarve dṛṣṭvā śrutvā sakautukāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6905: sasaṃghaṃ taṃ muniṃ natvā svasvālayaṃ yayur mudā // Rm_16.166{54} //
K14ratnml_u:6906: tataḥ sa bhagavān buddhaḥ samutthāya saṣāṃghikaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6909: śāstāraṃ taṃ praṇatvaivaṃ svam āśramaṃ samāśrayat // Rm_16.168{56} //
K14ratnml_u:6911: triratnasmaraṇaṃ kṛtvā tataś cyutā divaṃ yayuḥ // Rm_16.169{57} //
K14ratnml_u:6915: kutaś cyutāḥ kuhāyāmaḥ karmaṇā kena vā vayaṃ // Rm_16.171{59} //
K14ratnml_u:6918: bhavanto yad vayaṃ sarve pretā buddhānubhāvataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6924: etat satyaṃ parijñāya tasya śāstur jagadguroḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6925: punaḥ sarve vayaṃ gatvā satkṛtya prabhajemahi // Rm_16.176{64} //
K14ratnml_u:6926: iti saṃbhāṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā sarve te pretapūrvakāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6930: sarvaṃ veṇuvanaṃ bhābhir avabhāsya samantataḥ // Rm_16.178{66} //
K14ratnml_u:6931: vihāre samupāsṛtya dṛṣṭvā taṃ śrīghanaṃ mudā /
K14ratnml_u:6933: tatra divyopacārais taiḥ pūjāṃgais taṃ munīśvaraṃ /
K14ratnml_u:6934: sarve 'pi te samabhyarcya satkṛtya śraddhayābhajan // Rm_16.180{68} //
K14ratnml_u:6937: atha sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā tān sarvān samupasthitān /
K14ratnml_u:6939: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pītvā sarve te pretapūrvakāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6940: devaputrāś ca dharmāṇāṃ viśeṣatvaṃ pralebhire // Rm_16.183{71} //
K14ratnml_u:6942: śāstāraṃ taṃ punar natvā samālokyaitad abruvan // Rm_16.184{72} //
K14ratnml_u:6945: pretalokāt paricyutvā svarge yātāḥ sma sāṃprataṃ // Rm_16.185{73} //
K14ratnml_u:6948: tat kṛpālo yatas tasya maudgalyasya mahāmateḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6950: tad bhavaddarśanaṃ prāpya pītvā dharmāmṛtāny api /
K14ratnml_u:6951: muditāḥ śraddhayā bhaktyā triratnaṃ saṃbhajāmahe // Rm_16.188{76} //
K14ratnml_u:6953: bhavatāṃ darśanaṃ kartuṃ bhūyaḥ prāyāmahe vayaṃ // Rm_16.189{77} //
K14ratnml_u:6955: āryadharmāmṛtaṃ pītvā saṃtuṣṭiṃ na labhāmahe // Rm_16.190{78} //
K14ratnml_u:6956: tad vayaṃ bhavatām evaṃ sarvadā śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6957: satkṛtya samupāsṛtya bhaktum ichāmahe punaḥ // Rm_16.191{79} //
K14ratnml_u:6958: tad bhavān kṛpayāsmā kaṃ kṛtvānugraham ābhavaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:6959: saddharmaṃ samupādiśya sarvadā trātum arhati // Rm_16.192{80} //
K14ratnml_u:6962: jñānacakṣuś ca saṃprāptaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ māyāmayaṃ bhavaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:6963: āryamārgaś ca saṃprāptaḥ prāptā ca nirvṛtiśrutiḥ // Rm_16.194{82} //
K14ratnml_u:6964: dhanyā ime vayaṃ sarve yad bhavaccharaṇaṃ gatāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6966: dhanyās te puruṣāḥ sarve ye buddhaśaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6967: sadā dharmāmṛtaṃ pītvā kārāṃ kurvanti śāsane // Rm_16.196{84} //
K14ratnml_u:6969: saddharmaṃ samupādiśya tiṣṭhatu sarvadā sukhaṃ // Rm_16.197{85} //
K14ratnml_u:6970: iti prabhākhya sarve te devaputrāḥ pramoditāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6971: taṃ munīndraṃ praṇatvā ca suprasannā divaṃ yayuḥ // Rm_16.198{86} //
K14ratnml_u:6972: tatra sarve 'pi te devās triratnaśaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6975: taṃ maudgalyāyanaṃ śiṣyaṃ samāmaṃtryaivam abravīt // Rm_16.200{88} //
K14ratnml_u:6976: sādhu maudgalya saṃvṛttaṃ saphalaṃ te kṛpāmate /
K14ratnml_u:6977: yat tvayā prakṛtaṃ kāyaṃ vaiyāvṛttaṃ suśobhitaṃ // Rm_16.201{89} //
K14ratnml_u:6978: yannāmnā bhikṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā buddhapūjā kṛtā tvayā /
K14ratnml_u:6979: te sarve devalokeṣu samutpannāḥ pratisthitāḥ // Rm_16.202{90} //
K14ratnml_u:6981: teṣāṃ bhadrāśayaṃ dṛṣṭvā saddharmo deśito mayā // Rm_16.203{91} //
K14ratnml_u:6982: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pītvā te sarve 'pi pramoditāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6983: dṛṣṭasatyāḥ prakrāntāś ca gachanti tridaśālaye // Rm_16.204{92} //
K14ratnml_u:6984: tatra svarge 'pi te sarve triratnaśaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6986: yannāmnā yat kṛtaṃ karma tat phalaṃ te prabhuṃjate /
K14ratnml_u:6988: evaṃ lokahitaṃ kartuṃ karttavyaṃ puṇyasādhanaṃ // Rm_16.206{94} //
K14ratnml_u:6989: evaṃ lokahitaṃ kṛtvā prakurvanti śubhāni ye /
K14ratnml_u:6990: te pumāṃso mahāsatvā bodhisatvā jinātmajāḥ // Rm_16.207{95} //
K14ratnml_u:6991: evaṃ vijñāya lokānāṃ hitaṃ kartuṃ samudyataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6993: iti śāstrā samādiṣṭaṃ śrutvā so 'rhaṃ mahāmatiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:6994: satyam iti pratijñāya prābhyanandat prabodhitaḥ // Rm_16.209{97} //
K14ratnml_u:6995: tataḥ so 'rhan mahābhijñas tac chāstrādiṣṭam ādarāt /
K14ratnml_u:6996: tad jñātīnāṃ purogatvā sarvam evaṃ nyavedayat // Rm_16.210{98} //
K14ratnml_u:6997: te 'pi ca jñātayaḥ sarve tenārhatā niveditaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:6998: śrutvā satyam iti jñātvā prāmodyaṃ pratilebhire // Rm_16.211{99} //
K14ratnml_u:6999: tatas te jñātayaḥ sarve triratnaśaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7000: satkṛtya śraddhayā nityaṃ prabhejire samādarāt // Rm_16.212{100} //
K14ratnml_u:7001: iti me guruṇādiṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ mayā narādhipa /
K14ratnml_u:7004: triratnabhajanaṃ lokaiḥ kārayituṃ tvam arhasi // Rm_16.214{2} //
K14ratnml_u:7005: tathā te maṃgalaṃ nityaṃ bhaven nūnaṃ samaṃtataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7007: iti matvā mahārāja lokān sarvān prabodhayan /
K14ratnml_u:7008: pratiṣṭhāpya śubhe dharme pālayasva samāhitaḥ // Rm_16.216{4} //
K14ratnml_u:7009: iti śāstrā samādiṣṭaṃ śrutvāśokaḥ sa bhūpatiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7011: pretāvadānaṃ manujā idaṃ ye śṛṇvanti ye cāpi niśāmayanti /
K14ratnml_u:7012: te sarva evaṃ pratilabdhapuṇyā bhuktvā sukhāni pracaranti loke // Rm_16.218{6} //
K14ratnml_u:7017: upaguptaṃ yatiṃ natvā punar evaṃ abhāṣata // Rm_17.1{1} //
K14ratnml_u:7018: bhadanta śrotum icchāmi punar anyat subhāṣitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:7019: tadyathā guruṇādiṣṭaṃ tathādeṣṭuṃ ca me 'rhati // Rm_17.2{2} //
K14ratnml_u:7020: iti saṃprārthitaṃ rājñā śrutvā so 'rhan yatiḥ sudhīḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7021: upagupto nareṃdrāṃ taṃ samalokyaivam ādiśat // Rm_17.3{3} //
K14ratnml_u:7022: sādhu śṛṇu mahārāja yathā me guruṇoditaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:7023: tathāhaṃ te pravakṣyāmi śrutvā cāpy anumodaya // Rm_17.4{4} //
K14ratnml_u:7025: sarvajñaḥ sugataḥ sāstā dharmarājo vināyakaḥ // Rm_17.5{5} //
