K14ratnml_u:7027: vihāre śrāvakaiḥ sārddhaṃ bhikṣubhiś cailakair api // Rm_17.6{6} //
K14ratnml_u:7032: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pātuṃ sarve lokāḥ samāgatāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7035: garuḍā vidyādharāś cāpi sarve te saṃpracerire // Rm_17.10{10} //
K14ratnml_u:7036: tataḥ sarve 'pi te tatra puraskṛtya samantataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7037: parivṛtya sasaṃghaṃ tam upatasthuḥ samāhitāḥ // Rm_17.11{11} //
K14ratnml_u:7038: tadā sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā tān sarvān samupasthitān /
K14ratnml_u:7040: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pītvā sarve te saṃpramoditāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7044: tatra tāṃ bhagavān dṛṣṭvā matvā janmāntaraprasūṃ /
K14ratnml_u:7045: ānaṃdaṃ samupāmaṃtrya pura evam abhāṣata // Rm_17.15{15} //
K14ratnml_u:7047: bhagavāṃs tṛṣito mātas tad ambu dīyatām iti // Rm_17.16{16} //
K14ratnml_u:7049: sahasā samupāśritya tāṃ vṛddhām evam abravīt // Rm_17.17{17} //
K14ratnml_u:7050: mātar me bhagavāñ chāstā tṛṣito 'yam ihādhunā /
K14ratnml_u:7051: tat pānīyaṃ pradatvā me mahaddharmam avāpnuhi // Rm_17.18{18} //
K14ratnml_u:7053: iti saṃprārthitaṃ tena śrutvā sā sthavirā satī /
K14ratnml_u:7054: tam ānandaṃ samālokya muditaivam abhāṣata // Rm_17.19{19} //
K14ratnml_u:7056: svayam eva samānīya dāsyāmi vrajatāṃ bhavān // Rm_17.20{20} //
K14ratnml_u:7057: iti tayoditaṃ śrutvā sa ānaṃdaḥ prabodhitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7058: upetyaivaṃ samākhyāya śāstuḥ pura upāśrayat // Rm_17.21{21} //
K14ratnml_u:7059: tadā sā sahasā kṛtvā ghaṭaṃ śuddhāmbupūritaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:7061: tatra sā samupāśritya prādrākṣīt taṃ munīśvaraṃ /
K14ratnml_u:7064: jaṃgamam iva ratnābhaṃ saumyaṃ samantabhadrakaṃ // Rm_17.24{24} //
K14ratnml_u:7066: stanābhyāṃ praśrutās tasyāḥ kṣīradhārā niraṃtaraṃ // Rm_17.25{25} //
K14ratnml_u:7068: putra putreti soktvā taṃ pariṣvektum upācarat // Rm_17.26{26} //
K14ratnml_u:7069: tadā te bhikṣavaḥ sarve evaṃ tāṃ samupadrutāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:7071: tad dṛṣṭvā bhagavāṃ chastā sarvāṃs tāṃ sāṃghikān api /
K14ratnml_u:7072: sahasā samupāmaṃtrya punar evaṃ samādiśat // Rm_17.28{28} //
K14ratnml_u:7073: mā bhikṣava imāṃ vṛddhāṃ dhārāyatātra muñcata /
K14ratnml_u:7074: paṃcajanmaśatāny eṣā mātā me bhūyataḥ purā // Rm_17.29{29} //
K14ratnml_u:7076: samāliṃgatum īchantī mama gātre pradhāvati // Rm_17.30{30} //
K14ratnml_u:7077: yady atraiṣā nivāryyete gātra me śleṣmaṇād api /
K14ratnml_u:7078: idānīṃ rudhiraṃ hy uṣṇaṃ kamṭhād asyāḥ kṣaret kṣaṇāt // Rm_17.31{31} //
K14ratnml_u:7081: iti śāstrā samādiṣṭaṃ śrutvā te sarvasāṃghikāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7082: tāṃ śāstuḥ pūrvaprasūṃ matvā vyavatasthuḥ savismayāḥ // Rm_17.33{33} //
K14ratnml_u:7083: tatkṣaṇād urddhavāhuḥ sā samīkṣya taṃ munīśvaraṃ /
K14ratnml_u:7084: sahasā saṃpradhāvitvā samāliṃgya namac ciraṃ // Rm_17.34{34} //
K14ratnml_u:7085: tataś cirāt samutthāya sā vṛddhā sāñjalir mudā /
K14ratnml_u:7086: śrīghanaṃ taṃ samālokya puras tasthau samāhitā // Rm_17.35{35} //
K14ratnml_u:7087: tadā sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā tāṃ puraḥ samupāsthitāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:7089: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pītvā sa vṛddhāpi kacaṃgalā /
K14ratnml_u:7094: sāṃjalis taṃ muniṃ natvā gāthā imā abhāṣata // Rm_17.39{39} //
K14ratnml_u:7097: tat kṛtaṃ bhavatā me 'tra cittaṃ mokṣaparāyaṇaṃ // Rm_17.40{40} //
K14ratnml_u:7098: durgatibhyaḥ samuddhṛtya svarge mokṣaṃ ca sāṃprataṃ /
K14ratnml_u:7101: pravrajyāsaṃvaraṃ dātum arhati sāṃprataṃ bhavān // Rm_17.42{42} //
K14ratnml_u:7104: ity arthitaṃ tayā śrutvā bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7106: yadi śraddhāsti te mātaḥ pravrajyāsadhane khalu /
K14ratnml_u:7107: bharttur anujñāṃ samāsādya prāgacha cara saṃvaraṃ // Rm_17.45{44} //
K14ratnml_u:7108: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā sā saṃpramoditā /
K14ratnml_u:7109: tathā hīti pratijñāya muniṃ natvā tato 'carat // Rm_17.46{45} //
K14ratnml_u:7110: tatra sā sahasā gehe gatvā taṃ svāminaṃ mudā /
K14ratnml_u:7111: kṛtāṃjalipuṭo natvā puraḥ sthitvaivam abravīt // Rm_17.47{46} //
K14ratnml_u:7112: svāmi cchṛṇv adbhutaṃ vakṣye yad adyāhaṃ jalārthinī /
K14ratnml_u:7113: ghaṭaṃ dhṛtvā vahir deśe kūpāntikam upācare // Rm_17.48{47} //
K14ratnml_u:7116: tato 'haṃ sahasā śuddhaiḥ pūrayitvā jalair ghaṭaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:7117: dhṛtvā svayaṃ pradātuṃ tat sabhāyām upasaṃcare // Rm_17.50{49} //
K14ratnml_u:7118: tatra tam śrīghanaṃ dṛṣṭvā cittaṃ me snehamohitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:7119: kṣāradhārā stanābhyāṃ ca saṃpraśrutā niraṃtaraṃ // Rm_17.51{50} //
K14ratnml_u:7120: tatrāhaṃ sneharāgāṃdhā svātmajam iva taṃ muniṃ /
K14ratnml_u:7122: evaṃ mām abhidhāvantīṃ dṛṣṭvā te sāṃghikā api /
K14ratnml_u:7123: sarve pradhātum ichantaḥ pradhāvanti samutthitāḥ // Rm_17.53{52} //
K14ratnml_u:7124: tadā sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā tān sarvān evam utthitān /
K14ratnml_u:7125: sahasā samupāmaṃtrya pura evaṃ samādiśat // Rm_17.54{53} //
K14ratnml_u:7126: mā imāṃ sarvathā yūyaṃ nivārayitum arhatha /
K14ratnml_u:7127: yan mameyaṃ puṇyaṃ ca śatajanmaprasū kila // Rm_17.55{54} //
K14ratnml_u:7130: yady atreṣātra dhāryyeta purato me vimūrchitā /
K14ratnml_u:7131: uṣṇaṃ rudhiram utsṛjya mṛtyuṃ yāyān na saṃśayaḥ // Rm_17.57{56} //
K14ratnml_u:7132: etac chāstrā samādiṣṭaṃ śrutvā te sāṃghikās tathā /
K14ratnml_u:7133: prabodhitāḥ praṇatvā māṃ svasvāsane samāśritāḥ // Rm_17.58{57} //
K14ratnml_u:7134: evaṃ tena munīndreṇa samākhyātaṃ niśamya tat /
K14ratnml_u:7135: sarvaṃ prabudhyamānāhaṃ purāvṛttaṃ smarāmi hi // Rm_17.59{58} //
K14ratnml_u:7138: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pātum upatiṣṭhāmi sādaraṃ // Rm_17.60{59} //
K14ratnml_u:7139: tatra sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā mām evaṃ samupasthitāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:7142: bhūyo 'pi tad rasāsvādatṛṣitaṃ pātum ichate // Rm_17.62{61} //
K14ratnml_u:7150: vihāre samupāsīnāḥ pradṛśyante mayā prabho // Rm_17.66{65} //
K14ratnml_u:7151: tat sabhāgaṃ cariṃ prāptuṃ pravrajyāvratam ichyate /
K14ratnml_u:7152: tad atra kṛpayā bharttas tad anujñāṃ pradehi me // Rm_17.67{66} //
K14ratnml_u:7154: sāścaryastambhitas tasthau paśyaṃs tām eva niścalaḥ // Rm_17.68{67} //
K14ratnml_u:7155: tataḥ sa suciraṃ bhāryāṃ tām evam abhilokayan /
K14ratnml_u:7156: viyogaśaṃkayā trastaḥ śanair evam abhāṣata // Rm_17.69{68} //
K14ratnml_u:7157: are nāri pramūdhāsi kim evaṃ tvaṃ prabhāṣase /
K14ratnml_u:7158: katham evaṃ tvayākhyātaṃ ko 'tra satyaṃ pratīṣyati // Rm_17.70{69} //
K14ratnml_u:7162: munīndro mārajid arhan ṣaḍabhijñas tathāgataḥ // Rm_17.72{71} //
K14ratnml_u:7166: śaraṇyo mānanīyo hi vandyaḥ pūjyo bhavaty api // Rm_17.74{73} //
K14ratnml_u:7168: dāsī paravatī preṣyā kṛpaṇā duḥkṛtākṛtiḥ // Rm_17.75{74} //
K14ratnml_u:7169: katham evaṃvidhāyās te garbhe jāto 'py asau mahān /
K14ratnml_u:7172: adhunā bodhim āsādya saṃbuddho 'yaṃ bhavaty api // Rm_17.77{76} //
K14ratnml_u:7174: adyāpīdṛgavasthā hi kiṃ cit saukhyaṃ na vidyate // Rm_17.78{77} //
K14ratnml_u:7175: tad atra mā vadaivaṃ ca tathoktvā naiva śobhase /
K14ratnml_u:7176: kas tavaitad vacaḥ śrutvā supratītaḥ pramāṇayet // Rm_17.79{78} //
K14ratnml_u:7178: vamitvā rudhiraṃ hy uṣṇaṃ tvaṃ nūnaṃ maraṇaṃ vrajeḥ // Rm_17.80{79} //
K14ratnml_u:7180: tvam api ca tathā nūnaṃ narake na vrajeḥ kathaṃ // Rm_17.81{80} //
K14ratnml_u:7182: narakeṣu sadā nityaṃ duḥkhāni vividhāni vai /
K14ratnml_u:7184: iti bharttroditaṃ śrutvā sā vṛddhā strī kacaṃgalā /
K14ratnml_u:7186: tadā sā sucireṇaiva saṃprāpya cetanāṃ tataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7187: bharttāraṃ taṃ punar dṛṣṭvā bodhayitum abhāṣata // Rm_17.84{83} //
K14ratnml_u:7188: svāminn atra prasīda tvaṃ mām evaṃ vada sarvathā /
K14ratnml_u:7189: satyam etan mayā proktaṃ na mithyeti prakalpaya // Rm_17.85{84} //
K14ratnml_u:7190: yadi mithyāvacaḥ syān me tenāhaṃ narake vraje /
K14ratnml_u:7191: atha me vacanaṃ satyam atrāhaṃ sadgatiṃ vraje // Rm_17.86{85} //
K14ratnml_u:7192: tenātrobhayathāpy eva viyogaṃ nau bhavet khalu /
K14ratnml_u:7193: sarveṣām api jaṃtūnām avaśyaṃ maraṇaṃ bhave // Rm_17.87{86} //
K14ratnml_u:7195: yatra na vidyate dharmmaṃ tatra kiṃ sukhatāpi ca // Rm_17.88{87} //
K14ratnml_u:7197: dharmaṃ vinā kim etair naḥ kevalaṃ duḥkhatāptaye // Rm_17.89{88} //
K14ratnml_u:7199: sarvān parigrahān tyaktvā pravrajanti jināśrame // Rm_17.90{89} //
K14ratnml_u:7201: saddharmasādhanaṃ karttum ichāmi sāṃprataṃ prabho // Rm_17.91{90} //
K14ratnml_u:7203: etatpuṇyavibhāgena tvaṃ cāpi sadgatiṃ vrajeḥ // Rm_17.92{91} //
K14ratnml_u:7205: akasmāt mṛtyunāghrāte tadā kathaṃ nivāraye // Rm_17.93{92} //
K14ratnml_u:7206: kiyat kālaṃ ca jīveyaṃ vṛddhāhaṃ jirṇitendriyā /
K14ratnml_u:7207: iti matvātra māṃ naivaṃ nivārayitum arhasi // Rm_17.94{93} //
K14ratnml_u:7208: kiṃ cāhaṃ jaratī vṛddhā tat te kiṃ snehatā mayi /
K14ratnml_u:7209: vṛddhayā durbalāṅgātra kārye kiṃ nu prayojanaṃ // Rm_17.95{94} //
K14ratnml_u:7211: tat kiṃ te sneharāgeṇa vṛddhāyā mayi sāṃprataṃ // Rm_17.96{95} //
K14ratnml_u:7213: avaśyaṃ mṛtyur atrāvāṃ samākramya grasiṣyati // Rm_17.97{96} //
K14ratnml_u:7214: tadāhaṃ kiṃ kariṣyāmi tvaṃ cāpi kiṃ kariṣyasi /
K14ratnml_u:7215: śocitveva niṣatsyāmi tvam apy evaṃ niṣatsyasi // Rm_17.98{97} //
K14ratnml_u:7216: avaśyam atra saṃsāre bhāvi bhāvā phalanty api /
K14ratnml_u:7217: kasyāpi bhūyate nātra bhāvi bhāvānyathā kvacit // Rm_17.99{98} //
K14ratnml_u:7219: yātā yānti ca yāsyaṃti dehaṃ tyaktvā yamālayaṃ // Rm_17.100{99} //
K14ratnml_u:7221: dharmiṇaḥ sadgatiṃ yātāḥ pāpino durgatiṃ gatāḥ // Rm_17.101{100} //
K14ratnml_u:7223: sasukhāni ca duḥkhāni bhuktvā bhramanti sarvadā // Rm_17.102{1} //
K14ratnml_u:7226: dharmam evātra saṃsāre karttavyaṃ yatnataḥ sadā // Rm_17.103{2} //
K14ratnml_u:7228: iti buddhaiḥ samākhyātaṃ tvayāpy etac chrutaṃ na kiṃ // Rm_17.104{3} //
K14ratnml_u:7229: tasmād ahaṃ munīndrasya śāsane śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7230: pravrajyāsaṃvaraṃ dharttum ichāmi sāṃprataṃ prabho // Rm_17.105{4} //
K14ratnml_u:7232: sākṣād arhatpadaṃ prāpya nirvṛtipadam āpnuyāṃ // Rm_17.106{5} //
K14ratnml_u:7233: etad dharmavibhāgena tvaṃ cāpi sadgatiṃ vrajeḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7234: iti matvā tathā svāmiṃs tad anujñāṃ dadātu me // Rm_17.107{6} //
K14ratnml_u:7235: tvam atra svagṛhe sthitvā triratnaśaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7236: yāvaj jīvaṃ sukhaṃ bhuktvā śubhe cara sadādarāt // Rm_17.108{7} //
K14ratnml_u:7237: etatpuṇyavipākena tvaṃ cāpy evaṃ sudhīr bhaveḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7238: tatas te saugate dharme vāṃchā jāyeta cetasi // Rm_17.109{8} //
K14ratnml_u:7239: tatas tvaṃ śraddhayā gatvā saṃbuddhaśāsane svayaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:7240: pravrajyāsaṃvaraṃ prāpya sākṣād arhatvam āpnuyāḥ // Rm_17.110{9} //
K14ratnml_u:7241: iti matvā bhavān svāmin saddharmaṃ yadi vāñchati /
K14ratnml_u:7242: tat pravrajyāvratānujñāṃ mahyaṃ pradātum arhati // Rm_17.111{10} //
K14ratnml_u:7243: iti tayoditaṃ śrutvā sa daridraḥ prabodhitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7244: tāṃ bhāryāṃ suciraṃ dṛṣṭvā śanair evam abhāṣata // Rm_17.112{11} //
K14ratnml_u:7245: hā priye katham eva tvaṃ māṃ vihātuṃ samichasi /
K14ratnml_u:7246: kim atrāhaṃ vadiṣyāmi tvayaivaṃ pratibhāṣate // Rm_17.113{12} //
K14ratnml_u:7247: yadi te 'sti mano dhairyyaṃ kṛtvā śraddhānvitāśrayā /
K14ratnml_u:7248: pravraja saṃvaraṃ dhṛtvā cara satyasamāhitā // Rm_17.114{13} //
K14ratnml_u:7249: iti bhartroditaṃ śrutvā sā vṛddhāpi kacaṃgalā /
K14ratnml_u:7250: bharttāraṃ taṃ praṇatvaivaṃ tato 'carat pramoditā // Rm_17.115{14} //
K14ratnml_u:7251: tataḥ sā sahasā gatvā tatrāśrame upāgatā /
K14ratnml_u:7252: śrīghanaṃ taṃ samālokya purataḥ samupācarat // Rm_17.116{15} //
K14ratnml_u:7253: tatra tat purato gatvā sāñjaliḥ sā pramoditā /
K14ratnml_u:7254: munīndraṃ taṃ praṇatvaivaṃ pravrajyāṃ samayācata // Rm_17.117{16} //
K14ratnml_u:7255: bhagavan nātha sarvajña bhavatāṃ śaraṇaṃ vraje /
K14ratnml_u:7256: tad bhavāṃ kṛtvā kṛpayā mahyaṃ pravrajyāṃ dātum arhati // Rm_17.118{17} //
K14ratnml_u:7257: tayeti prārthitaṃ śrutvā bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7258: savyena pāṇinā tasyā vṛddhāyāḥ śirasi spṛśan // Rm_17.119{18} //
K14ratnml_u:7259: ehi mataś cara brahmacārikāṃ tvaṃ samāhitā /
K14ratnml_u:7260: ity uktvā tāṃ samāgṛhya sāṃghike punar abravīt // Rm_17.120{19} //
K14ratnml_u:7261: gacha māta prajāpatyā gautamyāḥ śaraṇaṃ vraja /
K14ratnml_u:7262: sārhantī bhikṣuṇīmātā pravrajyāṃ te pradāsyati // Rm_17.121{20} //
K14ratnml_u:7263: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā sā pratinaṃditā /
K14ratnml_u:7264: tathety āśrutya śāstāraṃ taṃ praṇatvā tato 'carat // Rm_17.122{21} //
K14ratnml_u:7265: tatra sā samupāsṛtya dṛṣṭvā tāṃ gautamīṃ mudā /
K14ratnml_u:7267: upetya sāṃjalir natvā pravrajyāṃ samayācata // Rm_17.123{22} //
K14ratnml_u:7268: mātar atra samāyāmi bhavatyāḥ śaraṇaṃ mudā /
K14ratnml_u:7269: tad bhavantī jaganmātā pravrajyāṃ pradadātu me // Rm_17.124{23} //
K14ratnml_u:7271: hastena śirasi spṛṣṭvā sāṃghikatāṃ samagrahīt // Rm_17.125{24} //
K14ratnml_u:7276: tataḥ sā bhikṣuṇī śāstu gautamyāś ca prasādataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7283: sākṣād arhatpadaṃ prāpya vabhūva brahmacāriṇī // Rm_17.131{32} //
K14ratnml_u:7289: vaṃdyā pūjyābhimānyā ca vabhūva sā subhāṣiṇī // Rm_17.134{35} //
K14ratnml_u:7290: yadā sa bhagavañ chāstā bhikṣuṇīnāṃ subhāṣitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:7292: tadā sā bhikṣuṇī tatra kacaṃgalā subhāṣiṇī /
K14ratnml_u:7294: tac chrutvā bhagavāṃs tatra tayā sūtrāṃtadeśite /
K14ratnml_u:7295: sarvāns tān sāṃghikān bhikṣūn samāmaṃtryaivam ādiśat // Rm_17.137{38} //
K14ratnml_u:7298: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā sarve 'pi sāṃghikāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7299: savismayā munīndraṃ taṃ paprachus tat purākṛtaṃ // Rm_17.139{40} //
K14ratnml_u:7300: bhagavann anayā karmaṃ kiṃ prakṛtaṃ purākṛtaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:7301: imān sarvān sabhāsīnān prabodhayitum arhati // Rm_17.140{41} //
K14ratnml_u:7303: sākṣād arhatvam āsādya bhavati brahmacāriṇī // Rm_17.141{42} //
K14ratnml_u:7304: kiṃ vānayā purākarma kṛtaṃ kutra kadā kathaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:7306: kiṃcāpi prakṛtaṃ karmaṃ purānayā kadā kathaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:7307: yenātra paścime garbhāvāse na dhārito bhavān // Rm_17.143{44} //
K14ratnml_u:7308: etat sarvaiḥ parijñāya bhagavānn asyāḥ purākṛtaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:7309: imān sarvān sabhāsīnān prabodhayitum arhati // Rm_17.144{45} //
K14ratnml_u:7311: iti tair bhikṣubhiḥ sarvaiḥ prārthite sa munīśvaraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7312: sarvāṃs tān sāṃghikān dṛṣṭvā samāmaṃtryaivam ādiśat // Rm_17.145{46} //
K14ratnml_u:7313: śṛṇuta bhikṣavaḥ sarve yad yat kṛtaṃ purānayā /
K14ratnml_u:7314: tat tat sarvaṃ pravakṣyāmi yuṣmākaṃ cittabodhane // Rm_17.146{47} //
K14ratnml_u:7316: paṃcajanmaśatāny eṣā janany āsīn niraṃtaraṃ // Rm_17.147{48} //
K14ratnml_u:7317: tadā me dadato dānam antarāyaḥ kṛto 'nayā /
K14ratnml_u:7318: tenādyāpi daridreyaṃ durbhagā ca bhavaty api // Rm_17.148{49} //
K14ratnml_u:7319: pravrajyāyai tadai caiṣā vahudhā prārthitā mayā /
K14ratnml_u:7320: naivānujñāṃ dadau mahyaṃ vighnam eva vyadhād dhaṭhāt // Rm_17.149{50} //
K14ratnml_u:7322: pravrajyāsaṃvaraṃ prāptā carati mama śāsane // Rm_17.150{51} //
K14ratnml_u:7323: yadi naiṣā tadā dānaṃ vighnā mamākariṣyati /
K14ratnml_u:7324: naiṣādhunā daridrātra bhavati hi kadā cana // Rm_17.151{52} //
K14ratnml_u:7325: pravrajyāyāṃ ca me vighnaṃ yadi naiṣākariṣyata /
K14ratnml_u:7326: acariṣyad vrataṃ vālye na tu vṛddhātra sāṃprataṃ // Rm_17.152{53} //
K14ratnml_u:7327: yan mamaivaṃ kṛtaṃ vighnaṃ dāne vrate tadānayā /
K14ratnml_u:7328: tenādhunā daridraiṣā vṛddhā vrataṃ caraty api // Rm_17.153{54} //
K14ratnml_u:7329: yat tadā sukṛtaṃ kiṃ cit prakṛtaṃ nānayā purā /
K14ratnml_u:7330: tenāhaṃ paścime garbhāvāse 'dhunā na dhāritaḥ // Rm_17.154{55} //
K14ratnml_u:7332: tenāhaṃ paścime garbhāvāse tayātra dhāritaḥ // Rm_17.155{56} //
K14ratnml_u:7333: bhūyo 'py eṣā purā tatra vāraṇasyāṃ dvijātmajāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7336: śāsane śaraṇaṃ gatvā pravrajitācarad vrataṃ // Rm_17.157{58} //
K14ratnml_u:7339: tadā sā bhikṣuṇī tatra kiñcit kāryārtharoṣitāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7340: sarvās tā bhikṣuṇīr dāsīvādena paryabhāṣata // Rm_17.159{60} //
K14ratnml_u:7343: yac cānayā tadā tatra vidyābhyāsīkṛtaṃ mudā /
K14ratnml_u:7345: yac cāpy esā tadā tatra sūtrāntaṃ samupādiśat /
K14ratnml_u:7346: tena sūtrāntavaktānām agrā bhavati sāṃprataṃ // Rm_17.162{63} //
K14ratnml_u:7347: evaṃ hi bhikṣavaḥ sarve manyadhvaṃ karmasaṃbhavaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:7348: sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ ca saṃsāre bhramatāṃ sarvadehināṃ // Rm_17.163{64} //
K14ratnml_u:7349: yenaiva yat kṛtaṃ karmaṃ tenaivaṃ bhujyate phalaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:7350: abhuktaṃ kṣīyate naiva karmaṃ kvāpi kadā cana // Rm_17.164{65} //
K14ratnml_u:7351: nāgnibhir dahyate karmaṃ klidyate nodakair api /
K14ratnml_u:7352: vāyubhiḥ śuṣyate naiva kṣīyate na ca bhūmiṣu // Rm_17.165{66} //
K14ratnml_u:7354: ahyathāpi bhaven naiva vipāke karmaṇaḥ phalaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:7355: yad uptaṃ bhūtale bījaṃ tad eva sūyate phalaṃ // Rm_17.166{67} //
K14ratnml_u:7356: anyathā na bhavet kvāpi kṛtaṃ karmaṃ phalaṃ bhave /
K14ratnml_u:7357: śubhasya karmaṇaḥ pāke śubhataiva sadā bhave // Rm_17.167{68} //
K14ratnml_u:7359: evaṃ vijñāya kṛṣṇāni vihāya miśritāni ca // Rm_17.168{69} //
K14ratnml_u:7360: śubha eva sadāpy atra caritavyaṃ śubhārthibhiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7361: śubhena sadgatiṃ yāyāt kṛṣṇena durgatiṃ sadā // Rm_17.169{70} //
K14ratnml_u:7362: miśritena tathohe ca gatīr yāyād bhaved dhruvaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:7364: triratnabhajanaṃ kṛtvā caritavyaṃ śubhe sadā // Rm_17.170{71} //
K14ratnml_u:7365: ye bhajanti sadā buddhaṃ na te gacchanti durgatiṃ /
K14ratnml_u:7366: sarvadā sadgatau bhadraṃ kṛtvā yānti jinālayaṃ // Rm_17.171{72} //
K14ratnml_u:7367: ye śṛṇvanti sadā dharmmaṃ na yānti te 'pi durgatiṃ /
K14ratnml_u:7368: sarvadā bhadrasaukhyāni bhuktvā yānti sukhāvatīṃ // Rm_17.172{73} //
K14ratnml_u:7369: dānaṃ dadanti ye saṃghe te 'pi na yānti durgatiṃ /
K14ratnml_u:7370: sarvadā śubhasaukhyāni bhuktvā yānti jināśrayaṃ // Rm_17.173{74} //
K14ratnml_u:7371: evaṃ matvātra saṃsāre triratnaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7372: satkṛtya śraddhayā nityaṃ bhajadhvaṃ samupāsthitāḥ // Rm_17.174{75} //
K14ratnml_u:7381: jitvā māragaṇāñ cāpi prāpya saṃbodhim uttamāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:7382: sarvatra dharmasotkṛtvā tato nirvṛtim āyayuḥ // Rm_17.179{80} //
K14ratnml_u:7384: kramād bodhiṃ samāsādya nirvṛtipadam āgatāḥ // Rm_17.180{81} //
K14ratnml_u:7386: puṇyair bodhiṃ samāsādya gacheyur nirvṛtiṃ tathā // Rm_17.181{82} //
K14ratnml_u:7388: puṇyair evaṃ kramād bodhiṃ prāpya yāsyanti nirvṛtiṃ // Rm_17.182{83} //
K14ratnml_u:7391: tathāham api sarvatra kṛtvā dharmamayaṃ jagat /
K14ratnml_u:7392: sarvān bodhau niyojyaivaṃ yāsyāmi nirvṛtiṃ dhruvaṃ // Rm_17.184{85} //
K14ratnml_u:7393: evaṃ ye ye bhajanty atra triratnaśaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7394: te te sarve 'pi saṃbodhiṃ prāpya nirvṛtim āyayuḥ // Rm_17.185{86} //
K14ratnml_u:7397: triratnabhajanaṃ kṛtvā pracaradhvaṃ śubhe sadā // Rm_17.186{87} //
K14ratnml_u:7399: kramād bodhiṃ samāsādya nirvṛtiṃ samavāpsyatha // Rm_17.187{88} //
K14ratnml_u:7400: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā sarve 'pi te janāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7401: sāṃghikāś ca tathety uktvā prābhyanaṃdat prabodhitāḥ // Rm_17.188{89} //
K14ratnml_u:7402: tadā tatra janāḥ sarve triratnaśaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7406: iti me guruṇākhyātaṃ śrutaṃ mayā tathocyate /
K14ratnml_u:7407: śrutvā rājans tvam apy evaṃ triratnaṃ bhaja sarvadā // Rm_17.191{92} //
K14ratnml_u:7408: prajāś cāpi tathā dharmaṃ śrāvayitvā prabodhayan /
K14ratnml_u:7410: tathā te maṃgalaṃ nityaṃ sarvatrāpi bhaved dhruvaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:7411: kramāt pāramitā pūrya bodhiṃ cāpi samāpsyasi // Rm_17.193{94} //
K14ratnml_u:7413: tathā hīti pratijñāya prābhyanandan sapārṣadaḥ // Rm_17.194{95} //
K14ratnml_u:7414: kacaṃgalāyā avadānam etac chṛṇvanti ye śrāvayatīha yaś ca /
K14ratnml_u:7415: vihāya pāpaṃ khalu te 'pi sarve bhuktvā sukhāny eva sugatiṃ vrajanti // Rm_17.195{96} //
K14ratnml_u:7420: upaguptaṃ guruṃ natvā punar evaṃ samabravīt // Rm_18.1{1} //
K14ratnml_u:7421: bhadanta śrotum icchāmi punar anyat subhāṣitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:7422: tadyathā guruṇādiṣṭaṃ tathādeṣṭuṃ ca me 'rhati // Rm_18.2{2} //
K14ratnml_u:7423: iti saṃprārthitaṃ rājñā śrutvā so 'rhan sudhīr yatiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7424: upagupto narendraṃ taṃ samālokyaivam abravīt // Rm_18.3{3} //
K14ratnml_u:7425: śṛṇu rājan samādhāya yathā me guruṇoditaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:7428: sarvajñaḥ sugataḥ śāstā dharmarājo vināyakaḥ // Rm_18.5{5} //
K14ratnml_u:7429: bhikṣubhiḥ śrāvakaiḥ sārddhaṃ bhikṣuṇībhiś ca cailakaiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7435: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pātuṃ tatra sarve samāgatāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7438: garuḍā nāgarājāś ca vidyādharāś ca dānavāḥ // Rm_18.10{10} //
K14ratnml_u:7440: brahmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā bhūpā rājāno 'pi narādhipāḥ // Rm_18.11{11} //
K14ratnml_u:7441: tathā rājakumārāś ca vaiśyā maṃtrijanā api /
K14ratnml_u:7442: gṛhasthāḥ śreṣṭhinaḥ paurāḥ sārthavāhā mahājanāḥ // Rm_18.12{12} //
K14ratnml_u:7444: grāmyā jānapadāś cāpi tathā kārpaṭikā api // Rm_18.13{13} //
K14ratnml_u:7446: sarve te samupāyātās tatrādrākṣus tam īśvaraṃ // Rm_18.14{14} //
K14ratnml_u:7448: śrīghanaṃ taṃ samālokya sarve te samupāśritāḥ // Rm_18.15{15} //
K14ratnml_u:7451: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pātum upatasthuḥ samāhitāḥ // Rm_18.16{16} //
K14ratnml_u:7452: tadā sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā tān sarvān samupasthitān /
K14ratnml_u:7456: tadā te dharmavaiśeṣyaṃ matvā pratinanaṃdire // Rm_18.18{18} //
K14ratnml_u:7457: tadā tatra mahāpūryyāṃ vaiśālyāṃ pauriko mahān /
K14ratnml_u:7458: gṛhastho dhaniko nāma śrīmān sarvaguṇī sudhīḥ // Rm_18.19{19} //
K14ratnml_u:7462: tanayaś ca vaṃdānyākhyaḥ satyavatyabhidhā snuṣā // Rm_18.21{21} //
K14ratnml_u:7463: tadā tatra dvijā sarve bhaktimanto jagadguroḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7464: pūjānimaṃtraṇe cakruḥ samayaṃ saṃmatās tathā // Rm_18.22{22} //
K14ratnml_u:7468: ato nimaṃtraṇīyo 'tra sarvaiḥ saṃbhūya nānyathā // Rm_18.24{24} //
K14ratnml_u:7469: ekaś cet kurute dravyamadād asya nimaṃtraṇaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:7471: tadā sa dhaniko 'jñātvā samayaṃ tais tathā kṛtaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:7472: svayam eva munīndraṃ taṃ pūjayituṃ samichata // Rm_18.26{26} //
K14ratnml_u:7474: svayaṃ nimaṃtraṇaṃ karttuṃ sasaṃghasya muner yayau // Rm_18.27{27} //
K14ratnml_u:7475: tatra sa samupāsṛtya natvā taṃ śrīghanaṃ mudā /
K14ratnml_u:7476: sasaṃghaṃ tat puraḥ sthitvā prārthayad eva sāṃjaliḥ // Rm_18.28{28} //
K14ratnml_u:7478: pūjayituṃ samichāmi paśyan me 'nugrahaṃ kuru // Rm_18.29{29} //
K14ratnml_u:7479: iti saṃprārthitaṃ tena bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7480: tathā hīti pratiśrutvā tūṣṇībhūtvādhyuvāsa tat // Rm_18.30{30} //
K14ratnml_u:7481: tadā te brāhmaṇāḥ sarve saṃbhūya samupāgatāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7482: bhagavataś caraṇau natvā cakrur bhojyanimaṃtraṇaṃ // Rm_18.31{31} //
K14ratnml_u:7483: tac chrutvā bhagavān prāha tān dṛṣṭvā bhaktimānasān /
K14ratnml_u:7484: pūrvam eva sasaṃghāham anenodya nimaṃtritaḥ // Rm_18.32{32} //
K14ratnml_u:7485: etad ākarṇya sarve te brāhmaṇā bheditāśayāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7486: paraṃ pratīkṣyamānāś ca śanaiḥ svasvagṛhaṃ yayuḥ // Rm_18.33{33} //
K14ratnml_u:7488: muditas taṃ muniṃ natvā sahasā svagṛhaṃ yayau // Rm_18.34{34} //
K14ratnml_u:7489: tatra sa svagṛhe gatvā vāṃdhaveṣṭajanais saha /
K14ratnml_u:7492: ratnadhvajair vitānaiś ca sa patākair amaṇḍayat // Rm_18.36{36} //
K14ratnml_u:7496: tataḥ sa prātar utthāya snātvā śuddhāmvarāvṛtaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7499: sāñjalis taṃ muniṃ natvā prārthayad evam ādarāt // Rm_18.39{39} //
K14ratnml_u:7501: tat sasaṃgho mamāvāse vijayituṃ samarhasi // Rm_18.40{40} //
K14ratnml_u:7502: iti saṃprārthite tena bhagavān sa sasāṃghikaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7504: tatra sa bhagavān mārge kṛtvā bhadraṃ samantataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7507: dṛṣṭvā vaiśālikāḥ lokāḥ sarve 'pi samapūjayan // Rm_18.43{43} //
K14ratnml_u:7509: bhāsayan bhadratāṃ kṛtvā saṃghaiḥ saha samācarat // Rm_18.44{44} //
K14ratnml_u:7510: tatra tasya gṛhe gatvā sasaṃghaḥ sa munīśvaraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7511: tad dattaṃ pādyam ādāya svāsane samupāśrayat // Rm_18.45{45} //
K14ratnml_u:7512: tatas te sāṃghikāś cāpi sarve tatra yathākramaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:7513: tad dattaṃ pādyam ādāya svasvāsane samāśrayan // Rm_18.46{46} //
K14ratnml_u:7514: tataḥ sa dhaniko dṛṣṭvā sasaṃghaṃ taṃ munīśvaraṃ /
K14ratnml_u:7518: tadbhojyaṃ surasaṃ bhuktvā bhagavān sa sasāṃghikaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7519: amṛtair iva saṃtuṣṭas tṛptiṃ yayau pramoditaḥ // Rm_18.49{49} //
K14ratnml_u:7520: asaṃghaiḥ taṃ muniṃ tṛptaṃ dṛṣṭvā sa dhaniko mudā /
K14ratnml_u:7523: buddhapramukhasaṃghebhyo muditaḥ sa svayaṃ dadau // Rm_18.51{51} //
K14ratnml_u:7524: tataḥ sa harṣito natvā taṃ munīndraṃ sasāṃghikaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:7525: purataḥ sāñjaliḥ sthitvā prārthayad evam ādarāt // Rm_18.52{52} //
K14ratnml_u:7526: bhagavan nātha sarvajña bhavatāṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7527: bhaktyaiva bhajanaṃ kurve tat kṣamasvāparādhatāṃ // Rm_18.53{53} //
K14ratnml_u:7528: sadaivaṃ kṛpayā dṛṣṭya paśyan bhavān sasāṃghikaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7529: mamānugraham ādhāya trātum arhati sarvathā // Rm_18.54{54} //
K14ratnml_u:7531: dhanikaṃ taṃ samālokya naṃdayann evam ādiśat // Rm_18.55{55} //
K14ratnml_u:7532: gṛhapate sadā nityam ārogyam astu vo dhruvaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:7533: bodhipraṇidhisiddhiś ca bhūyād bhadraṃ ca sarvadā // Rm_18.56{56} //
K14ratnml_u:7534: tatas tasya priyā bhāryā śīlavaty anumoditā /
K14ratnml_u:7535: sāñjaliḥ praṇatiṃ kṛtvā prārthayat taṃ munīśvaraṃ // Rm_18.57{57} //
K14ratnml_u:7536: bhagavan nātha sarvajña śvaś cātra bhavatām ahaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:7538: pūjāṃ kartuṃ samicche tad anugrahītum arhati // Rm_18.58{58} //
K14ratnml_u:7539: tayeti prārthite dṛṣṭvā bhagavān sa tad āśayaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:7541: tataḥ sa bhagavāñ chāstā samutthāya sasāṃghikaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7542: bhāsayaṃ bhadratāṃ kṛtvā svāśrame ca samāśrayat // Rm_18.60{60} //
K14ratnml_u:7544: sādhitvā sarvasāmagrīṃ sā dūtaṃ preṣayan munau // Rm_18.61{61} //
K14ratnml_u:7545: sa dūtaḥ sahasā gatvā vihare taṃ munīśvaraṃ /
K14ratnml_u:7546: sasaṃghaṃ sāṃjalir natvā punar evaṃ nyavedayat // Rm_18.62{62} //
K14ratnml_u:7548: tat sasaṃgho bhavāṃs tatra sahasāgantum arhati // Rm_18.63{63} //
K14ratnml_u:7549: tataḥ sa bhagavānn evaṃ bhadraṃ kṛtvā sasāṃghikaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7550: dhanikasya gṛhe gatvā pādyaṃ gṛhyāsane 'viśat // Rm_18.64{64} //
K14ratnml_u:7552: dṛṣṭvā śīlavatī sātha yathāvidhi samarcayat // Rm_18.65{65} //
K14ratnml_u:7553: tataś ca sā muditā sarvaṃ saṃghaṃ buddhādikaṃ tathā /
K14ratnml_u:7556: datvā tāmvurapūgādiṃ natvā sā samupāśrayat // Rm_18.67{67} //
K14ratnml_u:7557: tataḥ sa bhagavān tasmai datvāśiṣaṃ sasāṃghikaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7558: samutthāya tataś caivaṃ svavihāre samāśrayat // Rm_18.68{68} //
K14ratnml_u:7560: tat paredyu vihāraṃ taṃ gatvā natvā nyamaṃtrayat // Rm_18.69{69} //
K14ratnml_u:7561: bhagavānn api tasyaivaṃ dṛṣṭvā śraddhānvitaṃ manaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7563: tataḥ sas taṃ muniṃ natvā svagṛhaṃ sahasāgataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7566: vihāre samupāsṛtya natvaivaṃ munim abravīt // Rm_18.72{72} //
K14ratnml_u:7568: tat saṃgho bhavān gehe mamāgantuṃ samarhati // Rm_18.73{73} //
K14ratnml_u:7569: tataḥ sasaṃgha utthāya bhagavān sa tathācarat /
K14ratnml_u:7570: tadgṛhe pādyam ādāya tatrāsane samāśrayat // Rm_18.74{74} //
K14ratnml_u:7574: datvā pūgādikaṃ natvā purataḥ samupāśrayat // Rm_18.76{76} //
K14ratnml_u:7575: punaḥ sa sāṃjalir natvā prakṛtvā ca kṣamārthanāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:7576: sasaṃghaṃ taṃ munīndraṃ tam saṃdṛṣṭvaivaṃ samupāśrayat // Rm_18.77{77} //
K14ratnml_u:7577: tadā tasya snuṣā cāpi satyavatī pramoditā /
K14ratnml_u:7578: bhagavaṃtaṃ sasaṃghaṃ taṃ praṇatvaivaṃ nyamaṃtrayat // Rm_18.78{78} //
K14ratnml_u:7580: bhagavānn api tasyāś ca dṛṣṭva śraddhānvitaṃ manaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7581: tatheti pratimoditvā tuṣṇībhūtvā radhāṃ vyadhāt // Rm_18.79{79} //
K14ratnml_u:7582: tataḥ sa bhagavāṃs tasmai datvāśiṣaṃ sasāṃghikaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7583: tathā kṛtvā śubhaṃ loke gatvāśrame samāśrayat // Rm_18.80{80} //
K14ratnml_u:7584: tataḥ sāpi tathā prātaḥ snātvā śuddhāmvarāvṛtā /
K14ratnml_u:7585: dūtenāpi munīndraṃ taṃ sasaṃghaṃ samacodayat // Rm_18.81{81} //
K14ratnml_u:7586: tathā sa bhagavāṃś cāpi sasāṃghikaḥ samutthitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7587: pracaran bhadratāṃ kṛtvā tasyā gehe samāviśat // Rm_18.82{82} //
K14ratnml_u:7588: tatra pādyārgham ādāya bhagavān sa sasāṃghikaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7589: śubhāsane samāsīnas tasthau tatra prabhāsayan // Rm_18.83{83} //
K14ratnml_u:7591: yathāvidhi samabhyarcya tathā bhojyair atoṣayat // Rm_18.84{84} //
K14ratnml_u:7592: tātas taṃ sugataṃ tṛptaṃ sasāṃghikaṃ samīkṣya sā /
K14ratnml_u:7594: tataḥ pūgādikaṃ datvā prārthayitvā kṣamāṃ tathā /
K14ratnml_u:7595: sasaṃghaṃ taṃ muniṃ natvā sā sāñjalir upāśrayat // Rm_18.86{86} //
K14ratnml_u:7596: tathā sa bhagavāṃs tasyai datvāśīṣaṃ sasāṃghikaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7597: tato vihāyasā gatvā svāśrame ca samāśrayat // Rm_18.87{87} //
K14ratnml_u:7598: tathā sa dhaniko bhaktyā bhagavantaṃ sasāṃghikaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:7601: sasaṃgho bhagavānn evaṃ divyabhogair nimaṃtritaḥ // Rm_18.89{90} //
K14ratnml_u:7602: tac chrutvā tad dvijāḥ sarve vaiśālikāḥ prajā api /
K14ratnml_u:7604: tatas te saṃmataṃ kṛtvā sarve viprāḥ sapaurikāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7605: dhanikāya puraṃ kruddhāś cakrur nikāsanodyamaṃ // Rm_18.91{92} //
K14ratnml_u:7606: evaṃ tat samataṃ jñātvā bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7607: dhanikaṃ taṃ samāhūya pura evam upādiśat // Rm_18.92{93} //
K14ratnml_u:7608: sādho gṛhapate sarve ime vaiśālikā dvijāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7609: kruddhās te saṃghabhojye 'tra hy alabdhāvasarā mama // Rm_18.93{94} //
K14ratnml_u:7610: tad atra tvaṃ kṣamāṃ kṛtvā dvijān sarvān prabodhaya /
K14ratnml_u:7611: kṛtvātra vinayaṃ dharme prasādayitum arhasi // Rm_18.94{95} //
K14ratnml_u:7612: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā sa dhanikas tathā /
K14ratnml_u:7613: ity āśrutya dvijān sarvān samupetyaivam abravīt // Rm_18.95{96} //
K14ratnml_u:7614: bhavanto na mayā jñātaṃ bhavatāṃ kopakāraṇaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:7615: tad atra me samākhyāta yad arthe kupyate 'dhunā // Rm_18.96{97} //
K14ratnml_u:7616: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā sarve te brāhmaṇā /
K14ratnml_u:7619: dhanikaṃ taṃ samāmaṃtrya bodhayituṃ samabravīt // Rm_18.98{99} //
K14ratnml_u:7622: tathā tat te pravakṣyāmi śrutvā tat pratibudhyatāṃ // Rm_18.99{100} //
K14ratnml_u:7626: ato nimaṃtraṇīyo 'tra sarvaiḥ saṃbhūya nānyathā // Rm_18.101{2} //
K14ratnml_u:7627: ekaś cet kurute vittamadād asya nimaṃtraṇaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:7629: ity asmābhiḥ kṛtaṃ sādho samayaṃ sarvasaṃmataṃ /
K14ratnml_u:7630: tad vilaṃghya tvayaikena śāstuḥ pūjā kṛtā sadā // Rm_18.103{4} //
K14ratnml_u:7631: etad dheto ime sārve brāhmaṇā ruṣitās tathā /
K14ratnml_u:7633: kiṃ cāpi bhagavān atra sarvadā sthāsyate na hi /
K14ratnml_u:7634: tat sarve bhagavatpūjāṃ kartuṃ vāṃchanti sāṃprataṃ // Rm_18.105{6} //
K14ratnml_u:7635: yac cāyaṃ bhagavāñ chāstā dharmarājo munīśvaraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7638: saddharmaṃ samupādiśya caraty ayaṃ samaṃtataḥ // Rm_18.107{8} //
K14ratnml_u:7642: dātum arhasi sarveṣām api puṇyapravṛddhaye // Rm_18.109{10} //
K14ratnml_u:7643: eka eva tvaṃ evaṃ tu mā kṛthā bhajanaṃ sadā /
K14ratnml_u:7644: sarvaiḥ saṃbhūya te sāstuḥ karttavyaṃ bhajanaṃ sadā // Rm_18.110{11} //
K14ratnml_u:7645: iti tenoditam śrutvā dhanikaḥ sa vivodhitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7646: brāhmaṇaṃ taṃ samālokya praṇatvaivam abhāṣata // Rm_18.111{12} //
K14ratnml_u:7647: mayā na jñāyate hy evaṃ bhavadbhiḥ samayaṃ kṛtaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:7648: tad atra me 'parādhatvaṃ kṣantum arhanti sarvathā // Rm_18.112{13} //
K14ratnml_u:7649: yadi vo vidyate śraddhā triratnabhajane sadā /
K14ratnml_u:7650: kurudhvaṃ sarvadāpy atra saṃbuddhabhajanaṃ khalu // Rm_18.113{14} //
K14ratnml_u:7651: yadā na vidyate pūjā saṃbuddhe 'smin sasāṃghike /
K14ratnml_u:7653: iti tena samākhyātaṃ śrutvā sarve 'pi te dvijāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7654: satyam iti parijñāya vabhūvus tat prasāditāḥ // Rm_18.115{16} //
K14ratnml_u:7655: tatas te brāhmaṇāḥ sarve saṃbhūya saha paurikaiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7657: tatra te brāhmaṇāḥ sarve sametya saha paurikaiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7658: sāñjalayo munīndraṃ taṃ natvaivaṃ prārthayan mudā // Rm_18.117{18} //
K14ratnml_u:7659: bhagavan nātha sarvajña trimāsyaṃ bhavatāṃ sadā /
K14ratnml_u:7660: satkāraṃ kartum ichāma tvadanujñāṃ dadātu naḥ // Rm_18.118{19} //
K14ratnml_u:7661: iti taiḥ prārthite sarvair dṛṣṭvā sa bhagavān muniḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7665: matvā sapaurikā natvā taṃ muṇiṃ svapure 'caran // Rm_18.120{21} //
K14ratnml_u:7666: tatra te paurikā viprāḥ śodhayitvā samamṭataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7667: bhojyakṣatre dhvajair uccair vitānaiḥ paryaśobhayan // Rm_18.121{22} //
K14ratnml_u:7669: kṛtvā sarve 'pi te lokā mahotsāhaṃ pracakrire // Rm_18.122{23} //
K14ratnml_u:7670: tatas te brāhmaṇāḥ prātaḥ snātvā śuddhāmvarāvṛtāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7671: tatrāśrame sametyaivaṃ natvā taṃ prārthayan muniṃ // Rm_18.123{24} //
K14ratnml_u:7673: tat sasaṃgho bhavāṃs tatra pure āgantum arhati // Rm_18.124{25} //
K14ratnml_u:7674: tataḥ sa bhagavān buddhaḥ sasaṃghaś cīvarāvṛtaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7676: tatra mārgeṣu sarvatra bhagavān sa sasāṃghikaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7677: bhāsayaṃ bhadratāṃ kṛtvā pracaraṃs tatpure 'viśat // Rm_18.126{27} //
K14ratnml_u:7678: tatra sa bhagavān kṣetre suśodhite sasāṃghikaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7679: tad dattaṃ pādyam ādāya svāsane samupāśrayat // Rm_18.127{28} //
K14ratnml_u:7681: tatas taṃ sugataṃ tṛptaṃ saṃghaṃ cāpi vilokyate // Rm_18.128{29} //
K14ratnml_u:7682: tat pātrāṇy upanītvā tad dhastādīkaṃ vyaśodhayat /
K14ratnml_u:7684: datvā kṣamārthanaṃ kṛtvā taṃ sasaṃghaṃ praṇemire /
K14ratnml_u:7685: tatas te brāhmaṇāḥ sarve paurāś cāpi pramoditāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7686: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pātim upātasthuḥ samāhitāḥ // Rm_18.130{31} //
K14ratnml_u:7687: tatra sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā sarvāṃs tān samupasthitān /
K14ratnml_u:7689: tato bhadrāśiṣaṃ datvā bhagavān saha saṃghikaiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7690: bhāsayaṃ bhadratāṃ kurvan gatvā svāśramam āśrayat // Rm_18.132{33} //
K14ratnml_u:7691: evaṃ vaiśālikā lokās te traimāsyaṃ niraṃtaraṃ /
K14ratnml_u:7693: tato 'nte dhanikaś cāpi patnī putraḥ snuṣāpi ca /
K14ratnml_u:7695: bhagavānn api tathā tebhyo datvā śubhāśiṣaṃ tataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7696: samutthāya sasaṃghaś ca gatvāśrame samāśrayat // Rm_18.135{36} //
K14ratnml_u:7700: sarvalokahitaṃ kṛtvā pracacāra śubhe sadā // Rm_18.137{38} //
K14ratnml_u:7701: tad dṛṣṭvā vismitāḥ sarve bhikṣavaḥ samupāśritāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7702: bhagavantaṃ praṇatvaivaṃ paprachus tat purākṛtaṃ // Rm_18.138{39} //
K14ratnml_u:7703: bhagavan kiṃ purānena dhanikena vṛṣaṃ kṛtaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:7704: kutra kathaṃ kadaitan naḥ sarvam ākhyātum arhati // Rm_18.139{40} //
K14ratnml_u:7706: iti tair bhikṣubhiḥ pṛṣṭe bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7707: sarvāns tāṃ saṃghikān dṛṣṭvā tadaivaṃ samupādiśat // Rm_18.140{41} //
K14ratnml_u:7708: śṛṇuta bhikṣavaḥ sarve yad anena vṛṣaṃ kṛtaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:7709: tat patnyā ca putreṇa snuṣayā ca tad ucyate // Rm_18.141{42} //
K14ratnml_u:7711: durbhikṣakṣapite kāle parāṃ durgatim āgataḥ // Rm_18.142{43} //
K14ratnml_u:7713: pāṭalokhyā snuṣā ceti vabhūvus tasya saṃmatāḥ // Rm_18.143{44} //
K14ratnml_u:7715: udyāne sāyam āgatya pratyekabuddha āśrayet // Rm_18.144{45} //
K14ratnml_u:7716: te sarve ekavastrā hi paryyāyena nṛpālaye /
K14ratnml_u:7717: datvā puṣpāṇi prāyātāḥ svabhavane niṣīdire // Rm_18.145{46} //
K14ratnml_u:7718: tadā sa ca gṛhasthās te tatrodāne jvalat prabhāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:7719: dṛṣṭvā kiṃ mahojvālam udyāne iti vismitāḥ // Rm_18.146{47} //
K14ratnml_u:7721: sarvagatāḥ samīkṣantaḥ dadṛśus taṃ prabhāsayaṃ // Rm_18.147{48} //
K14ratnml_u:7722: tatra te samupāśritya dṛṣṭvā taṃ dhyānasaṃsthitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:7723: sāñjalayaḥ praṇatvaiva muditā svagṛhaṃ yayuḥ // Rm_18.148{49} //
K14ratnml_u:7725: nirddhanās tad vyathāṃ prāpu lūnapakṣāḥ khagā iva // Rm_18.149{50} //
K14ratnml_u:7726: tadā sa mālikas tasmai pūjāṃ kartuṃ samutsukaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7727: tad dravyaṃ svagṛhe samyag anviṣya samalokayat // Rm_18.150{51} //
K14ratnml_u:7728: tatra gṛhe sa sarvatra samanviṣya samaṃtataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7729: kañci mātram api dravyam alabdhaivaṃ vyaciṃtayat // Rm_18.151{52} //
K14ratnml_u:7730: aho mayā purā pāpaṃ prakṛtaṃ kiṃ yato 'dhunā /
K14ratnml_u:7731: akiṃcanyo daridro 'smi kim atra jīvitena me // Rm_18.152{53} //
K14ratnml_u:7732: yato na vidyate dravyaṃ kiṃ cid api gṛhe mama /
K14ratnml_u:7733: tat kena kariṣyāmi pūjām asya mahātmanaḥ // Rm_18.153{54} //
K14ratnml_u:7735: pratyekabuddha ātmajo dhyātvā tiṣṭhati bhāsayan // Rm_18.154{55} //
K14ratnml_u:7736: tad asya sugatasyātra karttavyā satkṛtir mayā /
K14ratnml_u:7737: kadāyaṃ puri ramyatra samāgachet svayaṃ punaḥ // Rm_18.155{56} //
K14ratnml_u:7738: tat prātaḥ śūnyapātreṇa gached ito mamātmavit /
K14ratnml_u:7739: tan mamātra bhave śūnyam iva janmāpi nisphalaṃ // Rm_18.156{57} //
K14ratnml_u:7740: yato mānyo 'bhipūjyo yaṃ pūjyate na kathaṃ cana /
K14ratnml_u:7741: tatra kiṃ jāyate bhadraṃ puṇyaṃ vāsya kathaṃ kutaḥ // Rm_18.157{58} //
K14ratnml_u:7742: puṇyaṃ vinātra saṃsāre kiṃ sāraṃ janma nisphalaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:7743: bhuktvāpi kiṃ sukhāny atra suciraṃ jīvite nanu // Rm_18.158{59} //
K14ratnml_u:7744: puṇyārthe jīvitaṃ janma tad atra yadi naśyati /
K14ratnml_u:7745: kim eva jīvitenāpi janmanā pāpasādhinā // Rm_18.159{60} //
K14ratnml_u:7746: tan mṛtyur me varaṃ hy atra na mithyācirajīvitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:7747: avaśyam eva saṃsāre sarvatra maraṇaṃ dhruvaṃ // Rm_18.160{61} //
K14ratnml_u:7748: kim evaṃ dehapuṣṭena bhuktvā duḥkhāṃ sarvadā /
K14ratnml_u:7749: tat kenāpi pradānena pūjayeyam imaṃ jinaṃ // Rm_18.161{62} //
K14ratnml_u:7751: puṇyena sadgatiṃ yāyāṃ pāpena durgatiṃ sadā /
K14ratnml_u:7752: tat pāpaṃ parityaktuṃ puṇyaṃ prāptu yateya hi // Rm_18.162{63} //
K14ratnml_u:7753: yady atra pūjyate nāyaṃ drakṣyate ca kadā kuha /
K14ratnml_u:7754: buddhapūjāṃ vinā bhadre puṇyaṃ ca lapsyate kutaḥ // Rm_18.163{64} //
K14ratnml_u:7755: yāvan na prāpyate puṇyaṃ tāvad durgaticāraṇaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:7756: tasmāt puṇyaṃ prayatnena karttavyaṃ sukhatāptaye // Rm_18.164{65} //
K14ratnml_u:7757: tad atra śraddhayā kiṃcin mātreṇāpi svavastunā /
K14ratnml_u:7760: bhāryāṃ putraṃ snuṣāṃ cāpi samāmaṃtryaivam abravīt // Rm_18.166{67} //
K14ratnml_u:7761: aye priye snuṣe putra yūyaṃ śṛṇuta madvacaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7762: yad atra kartum ichāmi tatra yūyaṃ prasādataḥ // Rm_18.167{68} //
K14ratnml_u:7763: yad atrāyaṃ mahābhijñaḥ svayam eva samāgataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7764: asmākaṃ gṛhe dravyaṃ kiñcit mātraṃ na vidyate // Rm_18.168{69} //
K14ratnml_u:7765: tat kenātra kariṣyāmaḥ pūjām asya mahātmanaḥ // Rm_18.169{69/} //
K14ratnml_u:7766: yadi na pūjyate 'smābhiḥ sugato 'yaṃ munir yatiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7767: tadā puṇyaṃ vayaṃ kutra lapsyāmahe kadā kathaṃ // Rm_18.170{70} //
K14ratnml_u:7768: puṇyaṃ vinātra saṃsāre nisphalaṃ janma jīvitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:7769: tad vayaṃ puṇyato prāptuṃ yatema sarvathā vayaṃ // Rm_18.171{71} //
K14ratnml_u:7770: puṇyena sadgatiṃ prāpya pāpena durgatiṃ sadā /
K14ratnml_u:7771: tat sadgatisukhaprāptyai puṇyaṃ kurvīmahi dhruvaṃ // Rm_18.172{72} //
K14ratnml_u:7773: anenāpy enam āchādya prabhajamahi sāṃprataṃ // Rm_18.173{73} //
K14ratnml_u:7775: etat me vacanaṃ śrutvābhyanumoditum arhatha // Rm_18.174{74} //
K14ratnml_u:7776: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā patnī putraḥ snuṣāpi te /
K14ratnml_u:7777: sarve 'py abhyanumoditvā tathā kurv iti procire // Rm_18.175{76/} //
K14ratnml_u:7778: ity etat samayaṃ kṛtvā sarve te śraddhayānvitāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7779: gatvā tenaikavastreṇa taṃ prāchādya samārcayan // Rm_18.176{77} //
K14ratnml_u:7780: tatas te muditāḥ sarve kṛtāñjalipuṭā muneḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7781: tasya pādau praṇatvaivaṃ praṇidhānaṃ pracakrire // Rm_18.177{78} //
K14ratnml_u:7784: śāstāraṃ sugataṃ buddhaṃ samārādhya sadā bhave /
K14ratnml_u:7786: iti tair muditaiḥ sarvaiḥ praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ tathā /
K14ratnml_u:7787: viditvā sa mahāvijñas tathāstv iti samādiśat // Rm_18.180{81} //
K14ratnml_u:7788: tatas tesāṃ manoharṣaṃ kṛtvā sa sugato muniḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7789: tata uḍḍīya pakṣīva bhāsayan svāśrame yayau // Rm_18.181{82} //
K14ratnml_u:7790: tad dṛṣṭvā te nanditāḥ sarve buddhadharmānuśaṃsinaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7791: triratnasmaraṇaṃ kṛtvā pracerire sukhaṃ sadā // Rm_18.182{83} //
K14ratnml_u:7796: bhavanty alaghvyāḥ saṃkalpaiḥ saṃpadaḥ satvaśālināṃ // Rm_18.184{85} //
K14ratnml_u:7797: buddhakṣetreṣu yat karma sukṛtaṃ duḥkṛtaṃ tathā /
K14ratnml_u:7798: mahattaratvam āsādya phalaty eva sadā bhave // Rm_18.185{86} //
K14ratnml_u:7799: iti matvātra saṃsāre karttavyaṃ sukṛtaṃ sadā /
K14ratnml_u:7801: iti śāstrā samādiṣṭaṃ śrutvā sarve 'pi sāṃghikāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7803: tac chrutvā brāhmaṇās te 'pi tatpuṇyavismitā mudā /
K14ratnml_u:7805: tathā te brāhmaṇāś cāpi sarve 'pi paurikās tathā /
K14ratnml_u:7807: helārpitaṃ ratnadhanaṃ tṛṇāgraṃ śraddhāvatīrṇaṃ tṛṇam apy anarghaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:7808: anekaśobhānubhavaṃ hi cittaṃ cittaṃ nimittaṃ śubhasaṃbhavānāṃ // Rm_18.190{91} //
K14ratnml_u:7809: iti me guruṇādiṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ mayā tathocyate /
K14ratnml_u:7810: śrutvāpy evaṃ mahārāja karttavyaṃ sukṛtaṃ sadā // Rm_18.191{92} //
K14ratnml_u:7812: kramād bodhiṃ samāsādya saṃbuddhapadam āpnuyāḥ // Rm_18.192{94} //
K14ratnml_u:7814: tathā hīti pratijñāya prābhyanandat sapārṣadaḥ // Rm_18.193{95} //
K14ratnml_u:7815: idaṃ narā ye dhanikāvadānaṃ śṛṇvanti ye cāpi niśāmayanti /
K14ratnml_u:7816: sukhāni bhuktvā sa śubhe sadā te sarve 'pi śamyānti jinālayan te /
K14ratnml_u:7821: upaguptaṃ guruṃ natvā punar evam abhāṣata // Rm_19.1{1} //
K14ratnml_u:7822: bhadanta śrotum ichāmi punar anyat subhāṣitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:7823: tadyathā guruṇākhyātaṃ tathādeṣṭum ca me 'rhati // Rm_19.2{2} //
K14ratnml_u:7824: iti sāṃprārthitaṃ rājñā śrutvā so 'rhaṃ mahāmatiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7825: upagupto narendraṃ taṃ samālokyaivam ādiśat // Rm_19.3{3} //
K14ratnml_u:7826: sādhu śṛṇu mahārāja yathā me guruṇoditaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:7827: tathāhaṃ te pravakṣyāmi śrutvaivaṃ paribudhyatāṃ // Rm_19.4{4} //
K14ratnml_u:7828: krauryeṇa dvirasanāḥ śuciveṣṭitānāṃ mithyāpavādaviṣamaṃ viṣam utsṛjanti /
K14ratnml_u:7835: dhenuvatsā vane naṣṭā vabhūvur yūthanirgatāḥ // Rm_19.8{8} //
K14ratnml_u:7836: tadā sa brāhmaṇo dṛṣṭvā taṃ duṣṭāśitaśaṃkitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7837: sarvatrāpi samanviṣṭā tatrāpy anveṣituṃ yayau // Rm_19.9{9} //
K14ratnml_u:7839: dhūmaṃ sa dvija ālokya vatsapākam amanyata // Rm_19.10{10} //
K14ratnml_u:7840: tataḥ sa brāhmaṇaḥ sārddhaṃ svajanaiḥ śastrapāṇibhiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7841: tad draṣṭuṃ śailam āruhya sahasāgāt tadantike // Rm_19.11{11} //
K14ratnml_u:7842: tatra taṃ raivataṃ bhikṣuṃ dṛṣṭvā sa dvija ādarāt /
K14ratnml_u:7844: tad dṛṣṭvā śaṃkitaś cāsau vinayān samupāsaran /
K14ratnml_u:7845: kim etat kriyate bhikṣor iti taṃ paryapṛchata // Rm_19.13{13} //
K14ratnml_u:7846: iti pṛṣṭe dvijenāsau raivato bhikṣur ādarāt /
K14ratnml_u:7847: tatra cīvararāgo 'yam iti taṃ dvijam abravīt // Rm_19.14{14} //
K14ratnml_u:7850: sukhaṃ duḥkhatvam ānāti śuklam apy eti kālatāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:7851: vidhau vidhuratāṃ yāte dharmo 'py āyāty adharmatāṃ // Rm_19.16{16} //
K14ratnml_u:7855: doṣaḥ samunmiṣati yāty aguṇaḥ prakāśaṃ kāryaṃ viparyayam upeti viśīryate dhīḥ // Rm_19.18{18} //
K14ratnml_u:7856: puṃsāṃ purāvihitaḥ duḥkṛtapākakāle ke ke na nāma nipatanti mahābhighātāḥ // Rm_19.19{19} //
K14ratnml_u:7857: tataḥ sa brāhmaṇo 'py atra kumbhe kim iti śaṃkitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7860: apaśyan sa dvijaḥ kumbhe māṃsapiṇḍaṃ supakvitaiḥ // Rm_19.21{21} //
K14ratnml_u:7863: aho vata sadācāraḥ sthito 'yaṃ vijane vane /
K14ratnml_u:7864: yasyedṛśāni karmāṇi na kasyacid iha paśyati // Rm_19.23{23} //
K14ratnml_u:7867: ity ukte tena sākṣepaṃ sa raivato 'py aciṃtayat /
K14ratnml_u:7868: doṣe pratyakṣalakṣyasmin kiṃ bravīmi niruttaraḥ // Rm_19.25{25} //
K14ratnml_u:7869: mama daivāya ghāto 'yam ity ukte ko 'numanyate /
K14ratnml_u:7871: upasthitaṃ sahe sarvaṃ maunam ālambya kevalaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:7872: ayaṃ me niḥpratīkāraḥ salilād agnidutthitaḥ // Rm_19.27{27} //
K14ratnml_u:7873: doṣe guṇātiśayam āśu guṇe 'pi doṣaṃ paiyūṣadhāmni viṣam apy amṛtaṃ viṣe ca //
K14ratnml_u:7874: saṃdarśayaty aniśam adbhutarūpam eva kālendrajālikāvadhūr bhavitavyeyaṃ // Rm_19.28{28} //
K14ratnml_u:7875: ity evaṃ manasā dhyātvā raivataḥ sa mahāmatiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7877: iti dhyānaṃ samālambya sthitaṃ taṃ raivataṃ muniṃ /
K14ratnml_u:7879: are re durmate bhikṣo kiṃ atra durjane vane /
K14ratnml_u:7880: sthitvevaṃ dāruṇaṃ pāpaṃ sādhayitvā niṣīdasi // Rm_19.31{31} //
K14ratnml_u:7881: are pāpiṣṭha bhāṣasva yad arthe vālakāṃ vṛṣaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:7882: hatvātra pacyate māṃsa tvayātmano pareṇa vā // Rm_19.32{32} //
K14ratnml_u:7883: pareṇāpi hataṃ dṛṣṭvā tat pāpaiḥ parilipyase /
K14ratnml_u:7884: tat tvayā vṛṣabhī hatvā kathaṃ pāpair na dahyase // Rm_19.33{33} //
K14ratnml_u:7885: dhig dhik tvām atra rebhikṣo saṃbuddhaśāsane yataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7886: pravrajyāsaṃvaraṃ dhṛtvā nirjane vana āśrayan // Rm_19.34{34} //
K14ratnml_u:7888: are re śrūyate kiṃ na tvayā saṃbuddhabhāṣitaṃ // Rm_19.35{35} //
K14ratnml_u:7889: atha śrutvāpi te tatra śraddhā na vidyate khalu /
K14ratnml_u:7890: kim evaṃ pātakaṃ kṛtvā pravrajyāsaṃvaraṃ caran // Rm_19.36{36} //
K14ratnml_u:7894: adattaṃ kasya cid dravyaṃ gṛhīyān na kathaṃ cana /
K14ratnml_u:7897: kāmabhogam adharmeṇa naiva bhuṃjyāt kadā cana /
K14ratnml_u:7898: mṛṣāvādaṃ kadāpy atra naiva brūyāt kathaṃ cana // Rm_19.40{39} //
K14ratnml_u:7899: pāruṣyavacanaṃ cāpi naiva brūyāt kathaṃ cana /
K14ratnml_u:7900: paiśunyavacanaṃ vāpi vaden na kasya cit puraḥ // Rm_19.41{40} //
K14ratnml_u:7901: saṃbhinnapralāpaṃ ca na pravadet kasya cid api /
K14ratnml_u:7902: vyāpādaṃ kasya cic cāpi bhāvayen na kathaṃ cana // Rm_19.42{41} //
K14ratnml_u:7903: abhidhyāṃ ca tathā naiva ciṃtayet kasya cid api // Rm_19.43{42} //
K14ratnml_u:7904: mithyādṛṣṭiṃ sadā kvāpi bhāvayen na kadā cana /
K14ratnml_u:7905: etāni daśapāpānāṃ mūlāni sarvathā tyajet // Rm_19.44{43} //
K14ratnml_u:7907: te sarve kleśasaṃtaptā bhramanti duḥkhino bhave // Rm_19.45{44} //
K14ratnml_u:7909: duḥkhāny eva sadā bhuktvā narakeṣu bhramanti te // Rm_19.46{45} //
K14ratnml_u:7910: iti matvātra saṃsāre tyaktvaitāni daśāpi hi /
K14ratnml_u:7911: santo nityam śubheṣv eva pracaranti samāhitāḥ // Rm_19.47{46} //
K14ratnml_u:7912: śubhena sadgatiṃ yānti papina durgatiṃ sadā /
K14ratnml_u:7913: ity ākhyātaṃ jinaiḥ sarvaiḥ kiṃ naitac chrūyate tvayā // Rm_19.48{47} //
K14ratnml_u:7914: katham etad avajñāya pravrajitas tvam ācareḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7915: dhik te cittaṃ yad evaṃ me govatsaṃ bhoktum ichati // Rm_19.49{48} //
K14ratnml_u:7923: sākṣād arhatvam āsādya brahmacaryaṃ samācaret // Rm_19.53{52} //
K14ratnml_u:7924: evaṃ pravrajito bhikṣuś caran nityaṃ suśīlabhṛt /
K14ratnml_u:7925: śivāṃ bodhiṃ samāsādya nirvṛtipadam āpnuyāt // Rm_19.54{53} //
K14ratnml_u:7927: kṛtvātra nirjane bhuktvā carase mlechacārikāṃ // Rm_19.55{54} //
K14ratnml_u:7928: hā vatātra vinaṣṭo 'si yad etat pātakānvitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7929: sahasā narake gatvā ciraṃ duḥkhāni bhokṣyasi // Rm_19.56{55} //
K14ratnml_u:7930: kiṃ tvayā prakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ purā janmāntare kathaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:7931: yad atra saugate dharmaṃ prāpto 'py evaṃ durāśayaḥ // Rm_19.57{56} //
K14ratnml_u:7934: tathā te śuddhite kāye maṃgalaṃ ca bhavet kramāt /
K14ratnml_u:7935: pariśuddhas trikāyaś ca pravrajyāsaṃvaraṃ cara // Rm_19.59{58} //
K14ratnml_u:7936: tadā tvaṃ sarvathā jitvā kleśān māragaṇānn api /
K14ratnml_u:7937: sākṣād arhatvam āsādya brahmacārī bhaviṣyati // Rm_19.60{59} //
K14ratnml_u:7940: śivāṃ bodhiṃ samāsādya nirvṛtipadam āpnuyāḥ // Rm_19.61{60} //
K14ratnml_u:7941: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā raivataḥ sa prabodhitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7942: tathāpi maunam ādhāya tathau daivābhyanusmaran // Rm_19.62{61} //
K14ratnml_u:7943: evaṃ sthitaṃ tam ālokya brāhmaṇaḥ sa ruṣānvitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7944: evaṃ dvidhā tridhāpy enaṃ paribhāṣyābhyanindayat // Rm_19.63{62} //
K14ratnml_u:7945: evaṃ dvidhā tridhāpy ukte brāhmaṇena sa raivataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7947: svadaivacintayas tasya maunāt sa brāhmaṇo ruṣā /
K14ratnml_u:7948: raivataṃ tāṃ katākṣeṇa dṛṣṭvainaṃ paryabhāṣata // Rm_19.65{64} //
K14ratnml_u:7949: are re durmate bhikṣo kim evaṃ tiṣṭhase 'dhunā /
K14ratnml_u:7950: uttiṣṭhātra pravaṃdhitva nayāmi tvāṃ nṛpāntike // Rm_19.66{65} //
K14ratnml_u:7951: evaṃ tenodite 'py eva sthitaḥ sa raivato yatiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7952: kiṃ cin naivāvaden maunam evālambya nyaṣīdata // Rm_19.67{66} //
K14ratnml_u:7953: tataḥ sa brāhmaṇas tasya maunād atiprakopitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7954: murddhni pāpam iva sthūlaṃ laguḍaṃ marpayātayat // Rm_19.68{67} //
K14ratnml_u:7957: tathāsthitaṃ taṃ munim ātmavidyaṃ daivaṃ smaraṃtaṃ hy akṛtāparādhaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:7958: nināya paścātkṛtavāhudaṃḍaṃ sadas tadā naṃdanabhūmibhartuḥ // Rm_19.70{69} //
K14ratnml_u:7959: tathāsthitaṃ tam ālokya sa dvijaḥ pratiroṣitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7960: raktākṣaṃ raivataṃ vaddhvā sahasānayan nṛpāntike // Rm_19.71{70} //
K14ratnml_u:7961: tatra sa brāhmaṇo nītvā taṃ rājñaḥ sthitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7963: tataḥ sa brāhmaṇaḥ krūras tasya bhikṣo savistaraṃ /
K14ratnml_u:7964: sarvavṛttāṃtam ākhyāya taṃ nṛpaṃ paryakopayat // Rm_19.73{72} //
K14ratnml_u:7965: tad vatsamāṃsam ālokya nṛpatiḥ sa prakopitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7966: raivataṃ taṃ yatiṃ vaddhvā cakre kārāgṛhātithiṃ // Rm_19.74{73} //
K14ratnml_u:7968: jānāti kasya kaḥ śuddhiṃ citrākāreṣv asākṣiṣu // Rm_19.75{74} //
K14ratnml_u:7969: tatra sa vaṃdhanāgāre vaṃdhito 'pi sa sanmatiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7972: kāle na visnito rājā tad vicāre 'pi nāsmarat // Rm_19.77{76} //
K14ratnml_u:7973: tadānyasmin dine tatra te vatsāḥ sarva āgatāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7974: mātṛbhiḥ saha saṃsaktās tṛṇaṃ bhuktvā niṣedire // Rm_19.78{77/} //
K14ratnml_u:7975: tān vatsān mātṛsaṃsaktān sarvān ālokya sa dvijaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7976: vismitaḥ punar ālokya paśyann evaṃ vyaciṃtayat // Rm_19.79{78} //
K14ratnml_u:7977: aho vatsā ime sarve kutra gatvādhunāgatāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7980: hā mamātra mahatpāpo jāyate sāṃprataṃ kathaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:7981: yan mayā sahasā bhikṣor asamīkṣyāparādhyate // Rm_19.81{80} //
K14ratnml_u:7982: yathā bhikṣor ghaṭe mānsaṃ dṛṣṭvaiṣām iti cintayat /
K14ratnml_u:7983: caurāyam iti taṃ bhikṣuṃ paryabhāṣaṃ ruṣābhṛtaṃ // Rm_19.82{81} //
K14ratnml_u:7985: vaddhvā taṃ sahasā rājñaḥ puro 'tra samupānayaṃ // Rm_19.83{82} //
K14ratnml_u:7988: tad atra kiṃ kariṣyāmi vatsāḥ sarve ihāgatāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7989: aparādhā yater neti vadeya sāṃprataṃ kathaṃ // Rm_19.85{84} //
K14ratnml_u:7990: yady avakṣyaṃ tathā rājā tadā me kupito nṛpaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:7991: sarvasvam apahṛtvāpi prāhariṣyate mām iha // Rm_19.86{85} //
K14ratnml_u:7992: atha yadi bhayād rājño nāvadiṣyaṃs tathā kvacit /
K14ratnml_u:7993: nūnaṃ taṃ yatim arhantam api rājā haniṣyate // Rm_19.87{86} //
K14ratnml_u:7996: tad atra kiṃ kariṣyāmi yatropāyaṃ na vidyate /
K14ratnml_u:7997: sarvathāhaṃ vinaṣṭo 'smi vrajeya śaraṇaṃ kuha // Rm_19.89{88} //
K14ratnml_u:7998: yad imaṃ saugataṃ bhikṣum arhantaṃ brahmacāriṇaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:7999: anaparādhinaṃ hatvā kathaṃ pāpair na lepsyate // Rm_19.90{89} //
K14ratnml_u:8000: etair hi pātakair ghorair ahaṃ rājā janā ime /
K14ratnml_u:8001: sarve vatsyāmahe 'vīcau bhuktvā duḥkhāni sarvadā // Rm_19.91{90} //
K14ratnml_u:8002: hā me daivād yateś cāpi nirjane vasato 'pi yat /
K14ratnml_u:8004: avaśyaṃ bhāvino bhāvā bhavanty eva na cānyathā /
K14ratnml_u:8005: tad atra kiṃ kariṣyāmi bhikṣur vā kiṃ kariṣyati // Rm_19.93{92} //
K14ratnml_u:8007: atha mamaiva daivena tad iti manyate na hi // Rm_19.94{93} //
K14ratnml_u:8008: tad atra kiṃ vadeyāhaṃ daivaṃ hi sarvakarmakṛti /
K14ratnml_u:8009: iti mamārho 'py asya dūṣaṇaṃ nātra vidyate // Rm_19.95{94} //
K14ratnml_u:8010: tathapy etat pravṛttir na vaktavyaṃ kasya cid api /
K14ratnml_u:8011: na gaṃtavyaṃ vahiḥ kvāpi sthātavyaṃ svagṛhe sadā // Rm_19.96{95} //
K14ratnml_u:8012: kadā cit skhalitā buddhir vāṇī ca vismṛtasya me /
K14ratnml_u:8013: etad dhi pātakaṃ ghoraṃ samācakṣata kutra cit // Rm_19.97{96} //
K14ratnml_u:8015: bhratsyamānaḥ kathaṃ loke cariṣye duṣṭajaṃtuvat // Rm_19.98{97} //
K14ratnml_u:8016: iti dhyātvā viniścitya brāhmaṇaḥ sa viṣāditaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:8017: kasyāpy etat pravṛttāṃtaṃ noce daurjanyalajjayā // Rm_19.99{98} //
K14ratnml_u:8018: tat pātakāgnisaṃtaptaḥ smṛtvārhantaṃ tam eva saḥ /
K14ratnml_u:8019: prāyaścittavrataṃ kurvann iva tasthau gṛhāśritaḥ // Rm_19.100{99} //
K14ratnml_u:8023: atha dvādaśavarṣānte tac chiṣyāḥ sarva āgatāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:8024: tat pravṛttiṃ samākarṇya vismitās te 'bhavaṃs tadā // Rm_19.102{1} //
K14ratnml_u:8025: tataḥ sarve 'pi te śiṣyāḥ saṃmīlya nṛpateḥ puraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:8027: ārogyam astu te rājan lokān dharmeṇa pālaya /
K14ratnml_u:8028: yadarthe vayam āyāmas tatra bhavān prasīdatu // Rm_19.104{3} //
K14ratnml_u:8029: yad asmākaṃ gurur bhikṣur aparādhaṃ vinā kathaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:8030: bhavatā vaṃdhanāgāre sthāpitas tad vicāraya // Rm_19.105{4} //
K14ratnml_u:8031: iti tair bhikṣubhiḥ sarvais tac chiṣyaiḥ prārthite tadā /
K14ratnml_u:8032: vyomavāṇī tathākhyāya narendraṃ taṃ vyabodhayat // Rm_19.106{5} //
K14ratnml_u:8033: tat khavāṇiṃ samākarṇya nṛpaḥ sa paribodhitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:8034: tac chiṣyaiḥ sārito bhikṣuṃ taṃ mumocāśu vaṃdhanāt // Rm_19.107{6} //
K14ratnml_u:8036: prāptabhijño 'pi yat prāpa krūrakleśadaśāṃ tathā // Rm_19.108{7} //
K14ratnml_u:8037: taṃ yatiṃ nirgataṃ dṛṣṭvā sa rājābhyānutāpitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:8038: ninindā mandapuṇyatvaṃ pramādād dhatam ātmanaḥ // Rm_19.109{8} //
K14ratnml_u:8039: tadā sa nṛpati rājā sahasā tasya pādayoḥ /
K14ratnml_u:8040: sāṃjaliḥ praṇatiṃ kṛtvā samutthāyaivam abravīt // Rm_19.110{9} //
K14ratnml_u:8041: bhadanto vicāryaiva pramadā yad bhavān mayā /
K14ratnml_u:8042: sthāpito vaṃdhane tan me 'parādhaṃ kṣaṃtum arhati // Rm_19.111{10} //
K14ratnml_u:8043: vismṛtā me sahāyāṃ ca parijñātā na kena cit /
K14ratnml_u:8044: daṇḍaḥ patati śuddheṣu prāptaḥ pāpe mahīpatau // Rm_19.112{11} //
K14ratnml_u:8046: raivataḥ sa nareṃdraṃ taṃ samālokyaivam abravīt // Rm_19.113{12} //
K14ratnml_u:8047: rājan na te 'parādhatvaṃ mamaitat karmajaṃ phalaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:8048: tad atra mā kṛthāḥ kheṭaṃ saugata ātmavidyutaṃ // Rm_19.114{13} //
K14ratnml_u:8049: tatas taṃ yatim arhantaṃ sa rājā sahasādarāt /
K14ratnml_u:8051: tadaitad vṛttim ākarṇya brāhmaṇaḥ sa tvarānvitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:8052: āgatya tat sabhāmadhye dattāśīḥ samupācarat // Rm_19.116{15} //
K14ratnml_u:8053: tatra sa samupāsṛtya rājñe datvā jayāśiṣāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:8054: taṃ yatiṃ sāñjalir natvā prārthayan vinayāt kṣamāṃ // Rm_19.117{16} //
K14ratnml_u:8056: tan me 'parādhatāṃ kṣaṃtum arhati sarvathā bhavān // Rm_19.118{17} //
K14ratnml_u:8057: ity ukte tena vipreṇa raivataḥ sa viśuddhadhīḥ /
K14ratnml_u:8058: brāhmaṇaṃ taṃ viṣaṇṇāsyaṃ samālokyaivam abravīt // Rm_19.119{18} //
K14ratnml_u:8059: na manyur vidyate vipra na tvayāpakṛtaṃ mayi /
K14ratnml_u:8060: mamaiva daivayā kena māṃsībhūtaṃ hi cīvaraṃ // Rm_19.120{19} //
K14ratnml_u:8062: tenātra kiṃ vadiṣyāmi daivā hi valavān bhave // Rm_19.121{20} //
K14ratnml_u:8065: tan mamopanataṃ pāke svakarmasadṛśaṃ phalaṃ // Rm_19.122{21} //
K14ratnml_u:8066: yat sautkaṇṭhatayaiva sarvavipadaḥ kurvanti kaṇṭhagrahaṃ sarvāṅgaprasabhopabhogasubhagāḥ kliśyanti yat saṃpadaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:8067: yat svāchaṃdyasukhāspadaṃ viharaṇaṃ dīrghaṃ ca yad vaṃdhanaṃ tat puṃsāṃ nijakarmapākaśavalaṃ saṃsāravallīphalaṃ // Rm_19.123{22} //
K14ratnml_u:8068: iti tenārhatākhyātaṃ śrutvā naṃdaḥ sa bhūpatiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:8069: vismitaḥ kautukāc caivaṃ dṛṣṭvā taṃ yatim abravīt // Rm_19.124{23} //
K14ratnml_u:8070: tavāpi sumate kasya phalam etat kukarmaṇaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:8071: kiṃ purā prakṛtaṃ karman tat samākhyātum arhati // Rm_19.125{24} //
K14ratnml_u:8072: iti pṛṣṭe narendreṇa raivataḥ sa sudhir yatiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:8073: taṃ nareṃdraṃ samālokya bodhayituṃ tathāvadat // Rm_19.126{25} //
K14ratnml_u:8074: sādhu śṛṇu mahārāja yan mayā prakṛtaṃ purā /
K14ratnml_u:8078: kadā cit sa vane gatvā hatvā govatsam ātmanā /
K14ratnml_u:8079: tad vatsamāṃsam ādāya sahasā tato viniryayau // Rm_19.129{28} //
K14ratnml_u:8081: dṛṣṭvā taṃ māṃsabhārārttaṃ kopāt samabhidudruvuḥ // Rm_19.130{29} //
K14ratnml_u:8082: tatra sa kutha ālokya tān sarvān samupadrutān /
K14ratnml_u:8085: upanikṣipya tan māṃsaṃ tatraikānte nyalīyata // Rm_19.132{31} //
K14ratnml_u:8087: tatra pratyekabuddhaṃ tam ālokya samupācaran // Rm_19.133{32} //
K14ratnml_u:8088: tatra sa kutha āgatya teṣāṃ gorakṣiṇāṃ puraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:8089: gomāṃsaṃ darśayitvā taṃ caurāyam ity adarśayat // Rm_19.134{33} //
K14ratnml_u:8090: tatra te gobhṛtaḥ sarve gomāṃsaṃ tan muneḥ puraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:8091: dṛṣṭvaiva sahasā kopāt taṃ munim abhyaghātayat // Rm_19.135{34} //
K14ratnml_u:8092: vadhyo 'yam iti taṃ vadhvā gopālās te prakopitāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:8094: tataḥ sa kutha ākarṇya taṃ yatiṃ vaṃdhane dhṛtaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:8096: hā mayā pāpināpy evaṃ sādhyate pātakāni ca /
K14ratnml_u:8097: avaśyaṃ vahnināvīcau kuṃhbhyāṃ pakṣye rataṃś ciraṃ // Rm_19.138{37} //
K14ratnml_u:8098: yad ayaṃ nirjane dhyāto pratyekabuddha ātmavit /
K14ratnml_u:8099: caurāyam iti saṃdarśya vaṃdhane sthāpitomayā // Rm_19.139{38} //
K14ratnml_u:8101: tīvraduḥkhāgnisaṃtapta ante māṃ svakṛte phalaṃ // Rm_19.140{39} //
K14ratnml_u:8102: hā mayaivaṃ mahāghoraṃ pātakaṃ durdhiyā kṛtaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:8103: kadā tat pātakān mukto vrajeyaṃ sadgatiṃ kathaṃ // Rm_19.141{40} //
K14ratnml_u:8105: hā sarvajña namas tubhyaṃ paśya mām atipāpinaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:8106: bhavānn eva jagattrātā tan me 'pi trātum arhati // Rm_19.142{41} //
K14ratnml_u:8108: tad vimuktyām upāyaṃ me kṛpayā dātum arhati // Rm_19.143{42} //
K14ratnml_u:8109: iti kuthaḥ sa cāṇḍālaḥ smṛtvā saṃbuddham ādarāt /
K14ratnml_u:8112: sahasā tata utthāya tadantike upācarat // Rm_19.145{44} //
K14ratnml_u:8113: tatra sa samupāsṛtya tesāṃ gorakṣiṇaṃ puraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:8115: bhavanto 'tra mayā pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ tat pratidekṣyate /
K14ratnml_u:8116: tad bhavaṃtaḥ samākarṇya kṣaṃtum arhaṃti sarvathā // Rm_19.147{46} //
K14ratnml_u:8117: asya pratyekabuddhasya hy aparādho na vidyate /
K14ratnml_u:8118: tatra mayātiduṣṭena cauro 'yam iti darśitaḥ // Rm_19.148{47} //
K14ratnml_u:8119: tad atra mucyatām eṣa pratyekasugato muniḥ /
K14ratnml_u:8120: satkṛtyābhyarcya piṃḍena mānanīyo hi sarvadā // Rm_19.149{48} //
K14ratnml_u:8121: atraitat pātakaṃ nāsya mamaiva mastake pacet /
K14ratnml_u:8122: tad aham eva vadhyo 'tra tad ayaṃ mucyatāṃ yatiḥ // Rm_19.150{49} //
K14ratnml_u:8123: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā sarve gorakṣiṇo 'pi te /
K14ratnml_u:8124: ruṣṭās taṃ sahasā vaddhvā paryyākhyāyātyatāḍayat // Rm_19.151{50} //
K14ratnml_u:8125: tat tāḍanaravaṃ śrutvā sa pratyekajinaḥ sudhīḥ /
K14ratnml_u:8126: gopālāṃs tān samāmaṃtrya punar evaṃ samādiśat // Rm_19.152{51} //
K14ratnml_u:8128: kṣamā hi paramaṃ dharmaṃ tat kurvantu kṣamām iha // Rm_19.153{52} //
K14ratnml_u:8130: kiṃ daivaṃ nihataṃ hatvā yuṣmākaṃ setsyate phalaṃ // Rm_19.154{53} //
K14ratnml_u:8132: tad asyāpy aparādho 'tra nāstīty eṣa vimucyatāṃ // Rm_19.155{54} //
K14ratnml_u:8134: tatheti pratibuddhitvā tat kopaṃ mumucus tadā // Rm_19.156{55} //
K14ratnml_u:8135: atha te gobhṛtaḥ sarve śrutvā tasya muner vacaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:8136: sahasā vinatiṃ kṛtvā vaṃdhanāt taṃ vyamuṃcayat // Rm_19.157{56} //
K14ratnml_u:8137: tatas te gobhṛtaḥ sarve taṃ pratyekamuniṃ mudā /
K14ratnml_u:8140: tad aparādhasaṃtaptāḥ prārthayann evam ādarāt // Rm_19.159{58} //
K14ratnml_u:8142: tenāsmākaṃ kṣamāṃ kartum arhaty atra bhavān api // Rm_19.160{59} //
K14ratnml_u:8143: iti taiḥ prārthitaṃ śrutvā sa pratyekajinaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:8144: tān sarvān gobhṛto dṛṣṭvā samāśvāsyaivam abravīt // Rm_19.161{60} //
K14ratnml_u:8145: bhavanto mā viṣīdantu dūṣaṇaṃ vā na vidyate /
K14ratnml_u:8146: etad vṛttiṃ vijānāmi saugatā hi bhavārthavit // Rm_19.162{61} //
K14ratnml_u:8148: ity ādiśya sa sarvajñaḥ pratyekabuddha utthitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:8149: tata ākāśa utplutya svāśramaṃ gate āśrayan // Rm_19.163{62} //
K14ratnml_u:8150: tad dṛṣṭvā te janāḥ sarve gopālāḥ prativismitāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:8151: tam eva sugataṃ smṛtvā saddharme sarvadācaran // Rm_19.164{63} //
K14ratnml_u:8153: tatpāpair narakeṣv evaṃ ciraṃ duḥkhāni bhuktavān // Rm_19.165{64} //
K14ratnml_u:8155: tad asyātrāparādhaṃ na mamaitad daivayogataḥ // Rm_19.166{65} //
K14ratnml_u:8157: saṃsāre 'tra sadā puṇyaṃ karttavyaṃ satsukhārthibhiḥ // Rm_19.167{66} //
K14ratnml_u:8159: puṇyaṃ vinā na siddhyante kṛtakarmāṇi sarvathā // Rm_19.168{67} //
K14ratnml_u:8160: puṇyena jāyate svarge puṇyena yānti sadgatiṃ /
K14ratnml_u:8161: puṇyena sarvadā bhadraṃ kṛtvā yāṃti jinālayaṃ // Rm_19.169{68} //
K14ratnml_u:8166: sarve te puṇyakarttāra iti jñeyā narādhipa /
K14ratnml_u:8167: puṇyena śuddhyate cittaṃ śuddhāśayo bhavet sudhīḥ // Rm_19.172{71} //
K14ratnml_u:8168: subuddhiḥ sarvadā nityaṃ śubheṣv eva samācaret /
K14ratnml_u:8174: dānaṃ kṛtvā sadā saukhyaṃ bhuktyā nityaṃ śubhe caret /
K14ratnml_u:8186: sarvasatvahitaṃ kṛtvā śubhe nityaṃ samācaret // Rm_19.181{80} //
K14ratnml_u:8188: sarveṣāṃ maṃgalaṃ kṛtvā bhadracaryāṃ samācaret // Rm_19.182{81} //
K14ratnml_u:8190: sarvamārān vinirjitya cared bodhivrataṃ sadā // Rm_19.183{82} //
K14ratnml_u:8194: tataḥ sarvatra lokeṣu kṛtvā bhadrāṇi sarvadā /
K14ratnml_u:8197: satvān bodhau pratisthāpya kṛtvā dharmamayaṃ jagat // Rm_19.186{85} //
K14ratnml_u:8199: nirvṛta ālayalīno mahābuddho bhaved dhruvaṃ // Rm_19.187{86} //
K14ratnml_u:8201: yadīchasi tathā puṇyam eva karttavyam ābhavaiḥ // Rm_19.188{87} //
K14ratnml_u:8205: puṇyāny evātra saṃsāre karttavyāni hi sarvadā // Rm_19.190{89} //
K14ratnml_u:8206: pāpena sarvadāpy evaṃ durgatīṣv eva saṃgatāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:8209: sarve te pāpakarttāra iti buddhaiḥ prakathyate // Rm_19.192{91} //
K14ratnml_u:8210: iti matvā mahārāja sadā bhadraṃ yadīchasi /
K14ratnml_u:8211: hitvā pāpānurāgatvaṃ saddharmaṃ cinu sādaraṃ // Rm_19.193{92} //
K14ratnml_u:8212: saddharmaṃ saugataṃ dharmaṃ yal lokaṃ hitasādhanaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:8213: tenātra sarvadharmāṇāṃ pravaram agram ucyate // Rm_19.194{93} //
K14ratnml_u:8215: satkṛtya śraddhayā nityaṃ bhajasva samupasthitaḥ // Rm_19.195{94} //
K14ratnml_u:8216: triratne yat kṛtaṃ karmaṃ śubhaṃ vāpy aśubhaṃ tathā /
K14ratnml_u:8217: tat phalam aprameyam asaṃkhyeya mahattaraṃ // Rm_19.196{95} //
K14ratnml_u:8219: jagad dharmamayaṃ kṛtvā niḥkleśā parinirvṛtāḥ // Rm_19.197{96} //
K14ratnml_u:8220: evaṃ vijñāya bhūmīndra hitvā pāparatiṃ sadā /
K14ratnml_u:8221: triratnabhajanaṃ kṛtvā cara nityaṃ sadā śubhe // Rm_19.198{97} //
K14ratnml_u:8222: abhuktaṃ kṣīyate naiva kvāpi karma śubhāśubhaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:8223: yenaiva yat kṛtaṃ karmaṃ tenaiva bhujyate phalaṃ // Rm_19.199{98} //
K14ratnml_u:8224: nāgnibhir dahyate karmaṃ dahyate deha eva hi /
K14ratnml_u:8225: nodakaiḥ klidyate karmaṃ klidyate tanur eva ca // Rm_19.200{99} //
K14ratnml_u:8227: na kṣītau kṣīyate karmaṃ kṣīyate tanur eva hi // Rm_19.201{100} //
K14ratnml_u:8228: anyathāpi bhaven naiva vipāke karmaṇaḥ phalaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:8229: yathaiva yat kṛtaṃ yena tenaiva bhujyate tathā // Rm_19.202{1} //
K14ratnml_u:8230: kṛṣṇasya karmaṇaḥ pāke duḥkhataiva sadā bhave /
K14ratnml_u:8231: śubhasya sukhatā nityaṃ miśritasyobhayaṃ tathā // Rm_19.203{2} //
K14ratnml_u:8233: bhuktvā sarvatra saṃsāre bhramanti sarvajaṃtavaḥ // Rm_19.204{3} //
K14ratnml_u:8234: evaṃ matvā mahārāja kṛṣṇāni miśritāni ca /
K14ratnml_u:8235: vihāyātra śobheṣv eva caritavyaṃ sadā bhave // Rm_19.205{4} //
K14ratnml_u:8238: tatheti prativijñapya sajanaḥ prābhya naṃdataḥ // Rm_19.206{5} //
K14ratnml_u:8239: tataḥ sa nṛpatir bhūyo raivataṃ taṃ mahāmatiṃ /
K14ratnml_u:8240: sucīvaraiḥ samāchādya sāṃjaliḥ praṇatiṃ vyadhāt // Rm_19.207{6} //
K14ratnml_u:8241: punar utthāya bhūpālas tam arhantaṃ kṛtāṃjaliḥ /
K14ratnml_u:8242: praṇatvā vinayaṃ kurvan kramāc ca prārthayat tathā // Rm_19.208{7} //
K14ratnml_u:8244: sarvadā darśanaṃ datvānugrahaṃ kartum arhasi // Rm_19.209{8} //
K14ratnml_u:8245: ity ukte 'nena bhūpena raivataḥ sa prasāditaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:8246: haṃsarāja ivāplutya bhāsayan khe samāyayau // Rm_19.210{9} //
K14ratnml_u:8248: lokaiḥ saṃdṛśyamāno 'sau dhyātvā tasthau samujvalan // Rm_19.211{10} //
K14ratnml_u:8249: tatas tair bhikṣubhiḥ śiṣyaiḥ samanvitaḥ prabhāsayan /
K14ratnml_u:8250: tathākāśāś caraṃ gatvā svāśrame samupāśrayan // Rm_19.212{11} //
K14ratnml_u:8251: tad dṛṣṭvā sa nṛpo lokaiḥ sahātivismayānvitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:8252: triratnabhajanaṃ kurvan pracacāra sadā mudā // Rm_19.213{12} //
K14ratnml_u:8254: alaṃkṛtaḥ sādhujanaḥ khalena nighnīkṛto 'pi na vikāram eti // Rm_19.214{13} //
K14ratnml_u:8256: tan nānyasyāparādhatvaṃ vaktavyaṃ kena cit kva cit // Rm_19.215{14} //
K14ratnml_u:8257: iti me guruṇākhyātaṃ tathātra kathyate mayā /
K14ratnml_u:8258: iti matvā mahārāja sadā dharme samācara // Rm_19.216{15} //
K14ratnml_u:8259: prajāś cāpi tathā rājan bodhayitvā prayatnataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:8261: tathā te maṃgalaṃ nityaṃ sarvaṃ cāpi bhavet sadā /
K14ratnml_u:8262: kramād bodhiṃ samāsādya saṃbuddhapadam āpnuyāḥ // Rm_19.218{17} //
K14ratnml_u:8264: satkṛtya śraddhayā nityaṃ bhajasvātra samāhitaḥ // Rm_19.219{18} //
K14ratnml_u:8266: tathā hīti pratijñapya prābhyanandat sapārṣadaḥ // Rm_19.220{19} //
K14ratnml_u:8267: satkṛtyedaṃ narā ye kalimatidaraṇaṃ raivatasyāvadanaṃ śṛṇvanti śrāvayanti pramuditamanaso bhaktiśraddhāprasannāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:8268: te sarve 'py evam atra vimalasumanasaḥ sarvadā satsukhāni bhuktvā kṛtvā subhadraṃ jinavaranilaye saṃprayānti pramodāṃ // Rm_19.221{20} //
K14ratnml_u:8273: upaguptaṃ guruṃ natvā punar evam abhāṣata // Rm_20.1{1} //
K14ratnml_u:8274: bhadanta śrotum ichāmi punar anyat subhāṣitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:8275: tadyathā guruṇākhyātaṃ tathādeṣṭuṃ ca me 'rhati // Rm_20.2{2} //
K14ratnml_u:8276: iti saṃprārthitaṃ rājñā śrutvā so 'rhan mahāmatiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:8277: upagupto nareṃdraṃ taṃ samālokyaivam ādiśat // Rm_20.3{3} //
K14ratnml_u:8278: sādhu śṛṇu mahārāja yathā me guruṇoditaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:8279: tathāhaṃ te pravakṣyāmi sarve lokaprabodhane // Rm_20.4{4} //
K14ratnml_u:8281: sarvajñaḥ sugataḥ śāstā dharmarājo vināyakaḥ // Rm_20.5{5} //
K14ratnml_u:8283: puraikasamaye sārddhaṃ bhikṣubhiḥ śrāvakaiḥ saha // Rm_20.6{6} //
K14ratnml_u:8287: sarve lokādhipaiś cāpi dānavendraiḥ śubhārthibhiḥ // Rm_20.8{8} //
K14ratnml_u:8289: grahai vidyādharaiś cāpi tathānyaiś ca vṛṣārthibhiḥ // Rm_20.9{9} //
K14ratnml_u:8293: tathā ca kośale rāṣṭre varaṃ dharmam upādiśat // Rm_20.11{11} //
K14ratnml_u:8295: tatrānyasmin vane prāpto bhagavān sa sasāṃghikaḥ // Rm_20.12{12} //
K14ratnml_u:8296: sarvatra maṃgalaṃ kṛtvā pracacāra śanaiḥ kramāt /
K14ratnml_u:8297: tatrārāṇye mahān yūtho mahiṣīṇāṃ samācarat // Rm_20.13{13} //
K14ratnml_u:8302: tadaikasmin dine tatra bhagavān sa sasaṃghikaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:8303: pracaraṃs tatpradeśe taṃ mahiṣīyutham aikṣata // Rm_20.16{16} //
K14ratnml_u:8304: tadā te mahiṣīpālā taṃ munīṃdraṃ sasaṃghikaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:8305: samupāyātam ālokya dūrād evam aghoṣayan // Rm_20.17{17} //
K14ratnml_u:8307: asty atra mahiṣo duṣṭas tat sahasā carānyata // Rm_20.18{18} //
K14ratnml_u:8309: iti taiḥ śabditaṃ śrutvā bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:8310: sasaṃghaḥ samupāśritya tāṃ dṛṣṭvaivam ahhāṣata // Rm_20.19{19} //
K14ratnml_u:8311: alpotsukābhavatv atra bhagavantaḥ kiṃ kuto bhayaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:8313: tadā sa mahiṣo duṣṭas taṃ munīndraṃ sasāṃghikaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:8314: dūrād dṛṣṭvā samutthāya pradudrāva tadantike // Rm_20.21{21} //
K14ratnml_u:8315: tatra tadgaṃdham āghrāya dṛṣṭvā taṃ raktacīvaraṃ /
K14ratnml_u:8316: ruṣā lāṃgūlam unnāmya saṃmukhaḥ prābhyadhāvata // Rm_20.22{22} //
K14ratnml_u:8320: ubhayoḥ pārśvayos tasya sthāpito bhīmanisvanau // Rm_20.24{24} //
K14ratnml_u:8322: upariṣṭāt pratiṣṭhāpya darśitā tasya bhītaye // Rm_20.25{25} //
K14ratnml_u:8323: tatra sa mahiṣo 'drākṣīt tān siṃhān pṛṣṭhasaṃsthitān /
K14ratnml_u:8324: pārśvayor ubhayor agniskaṃdhaur uparitāṃ śilāṃ // Rm_20.26{26} //
K14ratnml_u:8325: evaṃ sa mahiṣo duṣṭo mahābhayam upasthitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:8327: tatra sa trasito dṛṣṭvā parāyituṃ caturdiśaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:8328: samantato bhayād vignas tasthau trāṇanirāśrayaḥ // Rm_20.28{28} //
K14ratnml_u:8330: upetya caraṇau natvā śaraṇaṃ samupāyayau // Rm_20.29{29} //
K14ratnml_u:8332: bhagavaṃtaṃ tam ālokya tasthau 'trāṇāśrayo puraḥ // Rm_20.30{30} //
K14ratnml_u:8333: tadā sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā mahiṣyaṃ tam upasthitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:8334: śaraṇāgatam ālokya dharmam evam upādiśat // Rm_20.31{31} //
K14ratnml_u:8336: sarvadharmā anātmanaḥ śāntaṃ nirvāṇam eva hi // Rm_20.32{32} //
K14ratnml_u:8337: iti dharmaravam śrutvā sa tat puṇyānubhāvataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:8339: evaṃ taṃ ruditaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhagavān sa munīśvara /
K14ratnml_u:8343: sādhu prasādyatāṃ cittaṃ mayi kāruṇike jine /
K14ratnml_u:8344: tiryagyoniṃ virāgyeha tataḥ svargaṃ gamiṣyasi // Rm_20.36{26} //
K14ratnml_u:8345: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā sa mahiṣas tadā /
K14ratnml_u:8346: sarvaṃ smṛtvā purāvṛttaṃ manasaivaṃ vyaciṃtayat // Rm_20.37{27} //
K14ratnml_u:8348: krodhāgninā svayaṃ dagdhā saṃtāpare 'pi tāpitā // Rm_20.38{28} //
K14ratnml_u:8352: tad atra kiṃ kariṣyāmi tiryakjātir ihādhunā /
K14ratnml_u:8353: kiṃ mamānena kāyena duḥkhe pāpānusādhinā // Rm_20.40{30} //
K14ratnml_u:8354: yatra puṇyaṃ sukhaṃ nāsti tatra kiṃ jīvitena me /
K14ratnml_u:8355: varam evādya me mṛtyur na tv evaṃ cirajīvitaṃ // Rm_20.41{31} //
K14ratnml_u:8356: avaśyaṃ mṛtyum āpnuyāṃ sarveṣāṃ maraṇaṃ dhruvaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:8357: tad atra me śarīre kā snehatā jīvite 'pi vā // Rm_20.42{32} //
K14ratnml_u:8358: dhik kāyaṃ jīvitaṃ cāpi yena puṇyaṃ na sādhyate /
K14ratnml_u:8359: puṇyam eva bhave sāraṃ sarvatra satsukhapradaṃ // Rm_20.43{33} //
K14ratnml_u:8361: sarvaṃ vihāya gaṃtavyaṃ puṇyām ekaṃ tadānugaḥ // Rm_20.44{34} //
K14ratnml_u:8362: puṇyam eva jaganmitraṃ puṇyam eva sadānugaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:8363: puṇyam eva mahatsāraṃ puṇyam eva hitārthadaṃ // Rm_20.45{35} //
K14ratnml_u:8364: tasmāt puṇyaṃ prayatnena sādhanīyaṃ bhave sadā /
K14ratnml_u:8365: sarvatra sukhatāhetu puṇyam eveti kathyate // Rm_20.46{36} //
K14ratnml_u:8367: sarvathā smaraṇaṃ kṛtvā bhajeyeha samāhitaḥ // Rm_20.47{37} //
K14ratnml_u:8368: ity evaṃ manasā dhyātvā mahiṣaḥ sa prabodhitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:8369: taṃ buddhaṃ śrīghanaṃ natvānusmṛtvābhajān mudā // Rm_20.48{38} //
K14ratnml_u:8371: saddharmaṃ samupādiśya sasaṃghaḥ svāśrame yayau // Rm_20.49{39} //
K14ratnml_u:8375: brahmaśakrādayo devā lokapālāś ca dānavāḥ // Rm_20.51{41} //
K14ratnml_u:8377: garuḍā nāgarājāś ca rākṣasāś ca śubhārthinaḥ // Rm_20.52{42} //
K14ratnml_u:8379: vaiśyāc ca maṃtriṇo 'mātyā gṛhasthāś ca mahājanāḥ // Rm_20.53{43} //
K14ratnml_u:8380: vaṇijaḥ sārthavāhāś ca śilpinaḥ paurikā api /
K14ratnml_u:8381: grāmyā jānapadāś cāpi tīrthyāḥ kārpaṭikā api // Rm_20.54{44} //
K14ratnml_u:8382: evam anye 'pi lokāś ca saddharmaguṇavāṃ chinaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:8383: sarve te samupāgatya tatrāśrame samāviśat // Rm_20.55{45} //
K14ratnml_u:8386: tatas te praṇatiṃ kṛtvā parivṛtya samaṃtataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:8387: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pātum upatasthuḥ samāhitāḥ // Rm_20.57{47} //
K14ratnml_u:8388: tadā sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā tān sarvān samupasthitāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:8390: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pītvā sarve te saṃprabodhitāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:8393: tadā taddeham utsraṣṭuṃ manasaivaṃ vyaciṃtayat // Rm_20.60{50} //
K14ratnml_u:8394: hā duṣṭena mayā pūrvam ācitaṃ ghorapātakaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:8396: tenāhaṃ mahiṣo duṣṭo bhavāmy atra yathoditaṃ // Rm_20.61{51} //
K14ratnml_u:8397: tad atra kiṃ prakurvīya paśus tat pāpaśodhaṇaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:8398: tat triratnam anusmṛtvā careyāham upoṣadhaṃ // Rm_20.62{52} //
K14ratnml_u:8400: manasā sugataṃ dhyātvā martuṃ tiṣṭheya sāṃprataṃ // Rm_20.63{53} //
K14ratnml_u:8402: asthimajjādi sarvaṃ ca bhujantu prāṇino mudā // Rm_20.64{54} //
K14ratnml_u:8403: ye ye satvā imaṃ dehaṃ bhujanti surasaṃ mudā /
K14ratnml_u:8404: te te sarve sadā dharmaṃ kṛtvā yāntu surālāyaṃ // Rm_20.65{55} //
K14ratnml_u:8406: āsādya sadgatau janma bhajeyaṃ sugataṃ sadā // Rm_20.66{56} //
K14ratnml_u:8407: iti dhyātvā viniścitya mahiṣaḥ sa prasannadhīḥ /
K14ratnml_u:8408: tyaktvāhāraṃ tapaśvīva buddhaṃ smṛtvācarat tapaḥ // Rm_20.67{57} //
K14ratnml_u:8409: tathā sa mahiṣo dhyātvā triratnaṃ cābhyanusmaran /
K14ratnml_u:8410: dehaṃ tyaktvā viśuddhātmā surālayaṃ samāyayau // Rm_20.68{58} //
K14ratnml_u:8413: aho hi jāyate saukhyaṃ kutaś cyutvā kuhācare /
K14ratnml_u:8414: kasya puṇyavipākena mamaivaṃ jāyate śubhaṃ // Rm_20.70{60} //
K14ratnml_u:8419: tad ahaṃ tasya munīndrasya draṣṭuṃ gacheya sāṃprataṃ /
K14ratnml_u:8420: śraddhayā samupāśritya saddharmaṃ śṛṇuyāṃ punaḥ // Rm_20.73{63} //
K14ratnml_u:8422: tatra tasya munīndrasya darśane gaṃtum aichata // Rm_20.74{64} //
K14ratnml_u:8426: tasyāṃ rātrau munīndrasya bhāsayann āśrame yayau // Rm_20.76{66} //
K14ratnml_u:8427: tatra taṃ śrīghanaṃ dṛṣṭvā muditaḥ samupāsaran /
K14ratnml_u:8429: tatas tasya munīndrasya sāṃjaliḥ sa praṇamya ca /
K14ratnml_u:8431: tathā te tat sahāyāś ca devaputrāḥ prasāditāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:8433: tataḥ sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā sarvāns tān samupasthitān /
K14ratnml_u:8436: devo mahiṣapūrvi sa dharmaviśeṣam āptavān // Rm_20.81{71} //
K14ratnml_u:8440: tātaḥ sa dṛṣṭasatyas taṃ bhagavantaṃ munīśvaraṃ /
K14ratnml_u:8441: kṛtāṃjaliḥ puṭo natvā trir udānam udānayat // Rm_20.83{73} //
K14ratnml_u:8442: bhagavann idam asmākaṃ kṛtaṃ na janakena hi /
K14ratnml_u:8443: na mātrā na ca rājñāpi nānyena kena cit khalu // Rm_20.84{74} //
K14ratnml_u:8447: vivṛtāḥ svargamārgāś ca mokṣamārgaś ca darśitaḥ // Rm_20.86{76} //
K14ratnml_u:8448: mayāptaṃ vimalaṃ cakṣuḥ śāntam āryapadaṃ tathā /
K14ratnml_u:8450: tad bhavatāṃ kṛpādṛṣṭeḥ prasādān mama sāṃprataṃ /
K14ratnml_u:8451: saṃsārajanma sāphalyaṃ buddhaputrāsmy ahaṃ yataḥ // Rm_20.88{78} //
K14ratnml_u:8452: adyārabhya sadā nityaṃ bhavatāṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:8453: bodhau cittaṃ samādhāya cariṣyāmi śubhāṃ cariṃ // Rm_20.89{79} //
K14ratnml_u:8454: tad atrānugrahaṃ kṛtvā bhavāñ chāstā jagaguruḥ /
K14ratnml_u:8455: kṛpayā sarvadā paśyann evaṃ māṃ trātum arhati // Rm_20.90{80} //
K14ratnml_u:8456: iti saṃprārthitaṃ tena suparvaṇā niśamya saḥ /
K14ratnml_u:8457: śāstā tasyāśayaṃ śuddhaṃ samalokyaivam ādiśat // Rm_20.91{81} //
K14ratnml_u:8458: sadho śṛṇu hitaṃ vakṣye sadā bhadraṃ yadīchasi /
K14ratnml_u:8459: triratnaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatvā bhaja nityaṃ samādarāt // Rm_20.92{82} //
K14ratnml_u:8460: ye buddhaśaraṇaṃ kṛtvā bhajaṃti śraddhayā sadā /
K14ratnml_u:8462: ye dharmaṃ saugataṃ nityaṃ śṛṇvanti śraddhayā mudā /
K14ratnml_u:8464: ye ca saṃghe prakurvanti satkāraṃ śraddhayādarāt /
K14ratnml_u:8465: te sarve durgater muktvā saṃprayānti surālayaṃ // Rm_20.95{85} //
K14ratnml_u:8467: durgatiṃ te na gachaṃti sadā gachaṃti sadgatiṃ // Rm_20.96{86} //
K14ratnml_u:8468: sadgatau te sadā sthitvā triratnaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:8469: kṛtvā lokahitaṃ saukhyaṃ bhuktvā ramanti sarvadā // Rm_20.97{87} //
K14ratnml_u:8471: trividhāṃ bodhim āsadya nirvṛtiṃ samavāpnuyuḥ // Rm_20.98{88} //
K14ratnml_u:8473: triratnaṃ śaraṇaṃ kṛtvā bhaja nityaṃ samāhitaḥ // Rm_20.99{89} //
K14ratnml_u:8475: kramād bodhiṃ samāsādya saṃbuddhapadam āpnuyāḥ // Rm_20.100{90} //
K14ratnml_u:8476: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā sa paribodhitāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:8477: tathety abhyanumoditvā punar evam abhāṣata // Rm_20.101{91} //
K14ratnml_u:8482: iti saṃprārthanāṃ kṛtvā devaputraḥ sa moditaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:8484: śrīghanaṃ taiḥ punar natvā sasahāyo divaṃ yayau // Rm_20.104{94} //
K14ratnml_u:8485: tatra svarge sa saṃprāpto devaiḥ saha samāśritaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:8486: triratnasmaraṇaṃ kurvan saukhyaṃ bhuktvā samācarat // Rm_20.105{95} //
K14ratnml_u:8487: tasyāṃ rātrau mahatkāntiṃ prabhāṃ dṛṣṭvā savismayāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:8488: sarve te mahiṣīpālā vabhūvuḥ śaṃkitāśayāḥ // Rm_20.106{96} //
K14ratnml_u:8489: tataḥ prātaḥ samutthāya sarve te kautukānvitāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:8490: saṃmīlya sahasā tatra buddhāśrame upācaran // Rm_20.107{97} //
K14ratnml_u:8491: tatra taṃ śrīghanaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve te pratimoditāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:8493: tadā sa bhagāvān dṛṣṭvā tān sarvān samupasthitān /
K14ratnml_u:8495: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pītvā sarve te pratibodhitāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:8496: bhagavaṃtaṃ punar natvā paprachur evam ādarāt // Rm_20.110{100} //
K14ratnml_u:8497: bhagavann adya rātrau ka ihāśrame prabhāsayan /
K14ratnml_u:8498: bhavatāṃ samupāyātas tat samādeṣṭum arhati // Rm_20.111{1} //
K14ratnml_u:8499: iti tair mahiṣīpālaiḥ paripṛṣṭe sa sarvavit /
K14ratnml_u:8500: bhagavāṃs tān samālokya purāvṛttim upādiśat // Rm_20.112{2} //
K14ratnml_u:8502: samantato bhayaṃ dṛṣṭvā trasto me śaraṇaṃ gataḥ // Rm_20.113{3} //
K14ratnml_u:8504: mayi cittaṃ prasādyaiva tyaktvāhārā tyajan tanuṃ // Rm_20.114{4} //
K14ratnml_u:8506: svargaloke samutpanno devo bhavati sāṃprataṃ // Rm_20.115{5} //
K14ratnml_u:8507: sa eṣa devaputro 'dya niśāyām atra bhāsayan /
K14ratnml_u:8510: devasaṃghaiḥ saha svarge svālaye pragatas tathā // Rm_20.117{7} //
K14ratnml_u:8512: sarve te mahiṣīpālā mitha evaṃ samabruvan // Rm_20.118{8} //
K14ratnml_u:8513: aho citra hi yan nāma tiryyagyonigato 'pi saḥ /
K14ratnml_u:8514: buddhaṃ sadgurum āsādya dharmaṃ śrutvābhavat sudhīḥ // Rm_20.119{9} //
K14ratnml_u:8516: trirātnasmaraṇaṃ kṛtvā prāṇaṃ tyaktvā divaṃ yayau // Rm_20.120{10} //
K14ratnml_u:8518: abhyarcya dharmam ākarṇya dṛṣṭasatyo divaṃ yayau // Rm_20.121{11} //
K14ratnml_u:8519: svarge 'pi tat tathā nityaṃ sadguroḥ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:8520: śraddhayā bhajanaṃ kurvaṃ chubhe 'carat samāhitaḥ // Rm_20.122{12} //
K14ratnml_u:8522: yatra cittaṃ prasādyaiva paśur api divaṃ gataḥ // Rm_20.123{13} //
K14ratnml_u:8523: vayaṃ tu mānavāḥ sarve katham enaṃ munīśvaraṃ /
K14ratnml_u:8524: sadguruṃ samupāsādya śraddhayā na bhajemahi // Rm_20.124{14} //
K14ratnml_u:8526: tathā saddharmam ākarṇya prasādād asya sadguroḥ /
K14ratnml_u:8527: atkṛtya sarvadā bhadraṃ na lābhema kathaṃ vayaṃ // Rm_20.125{15} //
K14ratnml_u:8529: triratnabhajanaṃ kṛtvā nūnaṃ gachema sadgatiṃ // Rm_20.126{16} //
K14ratnml_u:8530: tad atra sadguror asya munīndrasyādhunā vayaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:8533: triratnabhajanaṃ kṛtvā caremahi śubhe sadā // Rm_20.128{18} //
K14ratnml_u:8536: iti saṃbhāṣaṇāṃ kṛtvā sarve te pratimoditāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:8537: tatheti saṃmataṃ kṛtvā tatra buddhāśrame yayuḥ // Rm_20.130{19} //
K14ratnml_u:8538: tatra taṃ śrīghanaṃ dṛṣṭvā sasaṃghaṃ taṃ pramoditāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:8539: sarvasāṃjalayo natvā prārthayann evam ādarāt // Rm_20.131{20} //
K14ratnml_u:8541: pūjayituṃ samichāmas tann atrānugrahaṃ kuru // Rm_20.132{21} //
K14ratnml_u:8542: iti taiḥ prārthitaṃ śrutvā bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:8545: pādau tasya munīndrasya natvā nijālayaṃ yayuḥ // Rm_20.134{23} //
K14ratnml_u:8548: tatas te samaye gatvā tatra buddhāśrame mudā /
K14ratnml_u:8549: sasāṃghikaṃ munīndraṃ taṃ praṇatvaivaṃ nyavedayan // Rm_20.136{25} //
K14ratnml_u:8551: tat saṃgha bhagavān pūjāṃ pratigrahitum arhati // Rm_20.137{26} //
K14ratnml_u:8552: iti taiḥ prārthite sarve bhagavān sasasāṃghikaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:8555: sarve te sāṃghikās tatra svasvāsane samāśrayan // Rm_20.139{28} //
K14ratnml_u:8557: dṛṣṭvā te muditā sarve sāmānarcur yathākramaṃ // Rm_20.140{29} //
K14ratnml_u:8558: tatas te surasair bhojyaiḥ kṣīrodanaiḥ savyaṃjanaiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:8559: praṇītair bhagavaṃtaṃ taṃ sasaṃghaṃ samatoṣayan // Rm_20.141{30} //
K14ratnml_u:8560: tatas taṃ sugataṃ tṛptaṃ sasāṃghikaṃ samīkṣya te /
K14ratnml_u:8561: tat pātrāṇy apanīyāśu tad dhastādi samaśodhayan // Rm_20.142{31} //
K14ratnml_u:8563: saṃbuddhapramukhebhyas te saṃghebhyaḥ pradadur mudā // Rm_20.143{32} //
K14ratnml_u:8565: śrīghanaṃ taṃ sasaṃghaṃ ca natvā samupatasthire // Rm_20.144{33} //
K14ratnml_u:8566: tathā tan samupāsīnān sarvān dṛṣṭvā sa sarvavit /
K14ratnml_u:8572: kṛtāṃjalipuṭā natvā prārthayan taṃ munīśvaraṃ // Rm_20.147{36} //
K14ratnml_u:8573: bhāgavaṃ nātha sarvajña bhavatāṃ śāsane vayaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:8574: pravrajituṃ samichāmas tan no 'nvāhartum arhati // Rm_20.148{37} //
K14ratnml_u:8575: iti taiḥ prārthitaṃ śrutvā bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:8576: tān viśuddhāśayān sarvān samālokyaivam ādiśat // Rm_20.149{38} //
K14ratnml_u:8577: mātāpitror vinānujñāṃ pravrajyāṃ na dadāmy ahaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:8578: tad anujñāṃ samādāya preta dāsyāmi vas tadā // Rm_20.150{39} //
K14ratnml_u:8579: ity ādiṣṭe munīndreṇa sarve te pratinaṃditāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:8580: taṃ munīndraṃ praṇatvāśu svasvagehaṃ yayur mudā // Rm_20.151{40} //
K14ratnml_u:8583: tatra te sahasā gatvā bhagavata upāsṛtāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:8584: pādau sāṃjalayor natvā prārthayann evam ādarāt // Rm_20.153{42} //
K14ratnml_u:8586: tatrānugraham ādhāya pravrajyāṃ dātum arhati // Rm_20.154{43} //
K14ratnml_u:8587: iti taiḥ prārthite śāstā bhagavān savyapāṇinā /
K14ratnml_u:8588: teṣāṃ śiras susaṃspṛṣṭvā samālokyaivam ādiśat // Rm_20.155{44} //
K14ratnml_u:8591: ity ādiṣṭe munīndreṇa sarve te muṇḍitā vabhuḥ /
K14ratnml_u:8593: tataḥ śastuḥ prasādena sarve te vimalāśayāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:8602: sākṣād arhatvam āsādya pracerur brahmacārikāḥ // Rm_20.162{51} //
K14ratnml_u:8608: pūjyā mānyāś ca vaṃdyāś ca babhūvur bodhicāriṇaḥ // Rm_20.165{54} //
K14ratnml_u:8611: bhagavaṃtaṃ muniṃ natvā papracbus tat purākṛtaṃ // Rm_20.166{55} //
K14ratnml_u:8613: kṛtāni devaputreṇa yair asau mahiṣo 'bhavat // Rm_20.167{56} //
K14ratnml_u:8614: ebhiś ca mahiṣīpālaiḥ kiṃ karma prakṛtaiḥ purā /
K14ratnml_u:8616: etat sarvaṃ samādiśya bhavāñ chāstātra sāṃprataṃ /
K14ratnml_u:8617: asmākaṃ api cetāṃsi prabodhayitum arhati // Rm_20.169{58} //
K14ratnml_u:8618: iti tair bhikṣubhiḥ pṛṣṭe bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:8619: tān sarvān sāṃghikān bhikṣūn samālokyaivam ādiśat // Rm_20.170{59} //
K14ratnml_u:8621: purā kṛtāni karmāṇi tāni vakṣyāmi sāṃprataṃ // Rm_20.171{60} //
K14ratnml_u:8622: ebhiś ca mahiṣipālaiḥ purā yāni kṛtāny api /
K14ratnml_u:8623: tāni sarvāṇi karmāṇi vakṣyāmi ca tathā 'dhunā // Rm_20.172{61} //
