K14ratnml_u:10159: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā bhagavān sa jagadguruḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10160: taṃ dūtaṃ puruṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā tatraivaṃ samupādiśat // Rm_25.61{60} //
K14ratnml_u:10163: pracarāmi mahīṃ kṛtsnām akṣataḥ kleśakaṣṭakaiḥ // Rm_25.62{61} //
K14ratnml_u:10164: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa sa dūtaḥ pratibodhitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10165: bhūyo 'pi sāṃjalir natvā prārthayat taṃ munīśvaraṃ // Rm_25.63{62} //
K14ratnml_u:10166: yady api bhagavān ṛddhiyānayāyī tathāpi tu /
K14ratnml_u:10169: ṛddhyā rathopari sthitvā saṃpratasthe prabhāsayan // Rm_25.65{64} //
K14ratnml_u:10171: bhāsayan maṃgalaṃ kṛtvā śrāvastīpuram āyayau // Rm_25.66{65} //
K14ratnml_u:10172: tatra sa puruṣo dūtaḥ sahasā pracaran puraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10174: jaya deva mahārāja diṣṭyā varddhasva sāṃprataṃ /
K14ratnml_u:10175: yad asau bhagavāṃc chāstā sasaṃgho 'tra samāgataḥ // Rm_25.68{67} //
K14ratnml_u:10176: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā prasenajit sa bhūpatiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10180: sajano bhagavantaṃ taṃ pratyudyayau mahotsavaiḥ // Rm_25.70{69} //
K14ratnml_u:10182: dūrāt taṃ śrīghanaṃ dṛṣṭvā padbhyāṃ carann upācarat // Rm_25.71{70} //
K14ratnml_u:10183: tatropetya sa bhūpālaḥ sasaṃghan taṃ munīśvaraṃ /
K14ratnml_u:10184: praṇatvā sāṃjaliḥ sthitvā puro dṛṣṭvaivam abravīt // Rm_25.72{71} //
K14ratnml_u:10185: bhagavan nātha sārvajña kaccic ca kuśalaṃ tanau /
K14ratnml_u:10186: bhavatāṃ viṣaye hy atra viharasva sasāṃghikaḥ // Rm_25.73{72} //
K14ratnml_u:10188: sāṃjalayaḥ praṇatvaivaṃ prārthayaṃs taṃ munīśvaraṃ // Rm_25.74{73} //
K14ratnml_u:10191: ity uktvā sarvalokās te nṛpatipramukhā mudā /
K14ratnml_u:10192: pūjādi maṃgalotsāhaiḥ prāveśayaṃs tataḥ pure // Rm_25.76{75} //
K14ratnml_u:10193: tataḥ sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā sarvāṃs tān saṃpramoditān /
K14ratnml_u:10195: tatra sa bhagavāṃs tasyāḥ śrāvastyā gopurāntike /
K14ratnml_u:10196: avatīrya yathā padbhyāṃ pracakrāma sasāṃghikaḥ // Rm_25.78{77} //
K14ratnml_u:10197: tatra sa śrīghano nāthaḥ prabhāsayan samaṃtataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10198: sarveṣāṃ bhadratāṃ kurvan praviveśa sasāṃghikaḥ // Rm_25.79{78} //
K14ratnml_u:10199: praviṣṭe nagare tatra saṃbuddhe sugate jine /
K14ratnml_u:10201: aṃdhā rūpāṇi prādrākṣur vadhirāḥ śuśruvu ravaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:10202: ye ca hīneṃdriyās te 'pi sarve pūrṇendriyā vabhuḥ // Rm_25.81{80} //
K14ratnml_u:10209: ciravairānuvaddhā ye te 'py āsan maitrabhāvinaḥ // Rm_25.84{83} //
K14ratnml_u:10211: labdhāś ca niḥspṛhā āsan īrṣyālavaś ca sādhavaḥ // Rm_25.85{84} //
K14ratnml_u:10214: mṛṣāvādaratā ye ca te 'py āsan satyabhāṣiṇaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10215: paiśunyābhiratā ye ca te 'pi viśrambhabhojanāḥ // Rm_25.87{86} //
K14ratnml_u:10217: pāruṣyaṃvādinaḥ krūrās te āsan priyavādinaḥ // Rm_25.88{87} //
K14ratnml_u:10219: vyāpādaniratā ye ca te 'pi satvahitārthinaḥ // Rm_25.89{88} //
K14ratnml_u:10222: evam anye 'pi ye satvā duḥkhinaḥ pāpasaṃratāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10223: sarve te sukhinaḥ saṃtaḥ saddharmavāṃchino 'bhavan // Rm_25.91{90} //
K14ratnml_u:10225: prasedire diśaḥ sarvāḥ puṣpāṇi vavṛṣur ghanāḥ // Rm_25.92{91} //
K14ratnml_u:10227: pracacāra mahī ṣaḍdhā prajujvaluḥ śubhāgnayaḥ // Rm_25.93{92} //
K14ratnml_u:10233: rasāś ca suguṇā āsan phalāni surasāni ca // Rm_25.96{95} //
K14ratnml_u:10234: evaṃ tatra subhadrāṇi sarvatrāpy abhavaṃs tadā /
K14ratnml_u:10235: upadravāś ca sarve 'pi sarvatra vilayaṃ gatāḥ // Rm_25.97{96} //
K14ratnml_u:10236: sarve vighnagaṇā duṣṭā te 'py atra vilayaṃ yayuḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10237: sarve satvāḥ sukhāḍhyāś ca pracerire praharṣitāḥ // Rm_25.98{97} //
K14ratnml_u:10240: evaṃ sa bhagavāṃs tatra kṛtvā bhadraṃ prabhāsayan /
K14ratnml_u:10245: bhagavān bhāsayaṃs tatra śuddhāsane samāśrayan // Rm_25.102{1} //
K14ratnml_u:10246: tathā te sāṃghikāś cāpi sarve dattaṃ mahībhujā /
K14ratnml_u:10248: evaṃ tatra samāsīnaṃ śrīghanaṃ taṃ sasāṃghikaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:10249: nṛpatipramukhāḥ sarve lokā dṛṣṭvā pramoditāḥ // Rm_25.104{3} //
K14ratnml_u:10253: tatas taṃ sugataṃ tṛptaṃ sasamahaṃ sa narādhipaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10254: dṛṣṭvāpanīya pātrāṇi tad dhastādīn aśodhayat // Rm_25.106{5} //
K14ratnml_u:10256: datvā kṣamārthanāṃ kṛtvā nanāma taṃ sasāṃghikaṃ // Rm_25.107{6} //
K14ratnml_u:10257: tatra samudito rājā tasya śāstur jagadguroḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10258: puro nīcāsanāsīno tasthau śrotuṃ vṛṣaṃ mudā // Rm_25.108{7} //
K14ratnml_u:10259: tathā maṃtrijanādyāś ca sarve lokāḥ pramoditāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10260: natvā taṃ śrīghanaṃ tatra dharmam śrotum upāśrayan // Rm_25.109{8} //
K14ratnml_u:10261: tataḥ sa bhagavāṃ dṛṣṭvā sarvāṃs tān samupāśritān /
K14ratnml_u:10262: nṛpatiṃ taṃ samāmaṃtrya saddharmaṃ samupādiśat // Rm_25.110{9} //
K14ratnml_u:10263: śṛṇu rājan mahābhāga sarvadārogyam astu vaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10264: sarve satvāś ca saddharmaniratā santu sarvadā // Rm_25.111{10} //
K14ratnml_u:10265: evaṃ tvaṃ bho mahārāja sādhayitvā prayatnataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10266: sarvāṃ satvāṃ śubhe dharme yojayitvābhipālaya // Rm_25.112{11} //
K14ratnml_u:10267: evaṃ loke śubhaṃ kṛtvā bodhicaryāṃ samāhitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10268: triratnabhajanaṃ kṛtvā cinu dharmaṃ samādarāt // Rm_25.113{12} //
K14ratnml_u:10270: jīvitaṃ ca kṣaṇasthāyi dharma eva sahānugaḥ // Rm_25.114{13} //
K14ratnml_u:10271: iti matvā mahārāja kleśān durjayān valaiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10272: jitvā satvāṃc chubhe sthāpya pālaya sadvṛṣaṃ cinuḥ // Rm_25.115{14} //
K14ratnml_u:10273: dharmeṇa sadgatiṃ yāyāḥ sadgatau sarvadā sukhaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:10274: bhuktvā bodhicariṃ dhṛtvā caraṃ bodhim avāpnuyāḥ // Rm_25.116{15} //
K14ratnml_u:10275: evaṃ vijñāya rājeṃdra svayaṃ dharme samāhitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10276: sarvasatvahitaṃ kṛtvā cara nityaṃ samāhitaḥ // Rm_25.117{16} //
K14ratnml_u:10278: sasaṃgho bhagavān buddhaḥ svāśrame gaṃtum utthitaḥ // Rm_25.118{17} //
K14ratnml_u:10279: bhāsayaṃ sakalāṃl lokāṃ bhadraṃ kṛtvā samaṃtataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10280: svāśramābhimukhas tasmāt pratasthe kramataḥ purāt // Rm_25.119{18} //
K14ratnml_u:10282: śāstus tasya sasaṃghasya prānuyayuḥ sahotsavaiḥ // Rm_25.120{19} //
K14ratnml_u:10283: tathā sa bhagavān gatvā sasāṃghiko nṛpādibhiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10284: lokaiḥ saha mahotsāhaiḥ svāśramaṃ samupāyayau // Rm_25.121{20} //
K14ratnml_u:10286: sasāṃghikaḥ sabhāsīnaḥ sa śāstā dharmam ādiśat // Rm_25.122{21} //
K14ratnml_u:10287: tad dharmadeśanāṃ śrutvā tatraiva te nṛpādayaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10288: sarve lokāḥ pramodanto rātrau nyūṣuḥ sahotsavaiḥ // Rm_25.123{22} //
K14ratnml_u:10289: tasyām eva niśāyāṃ sa dūto 'lpāyūr jvarānvitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10290: triratnasmaraṇaṃ kurvan dehaṃ tyaktvā divaṃ yayau // Rm_25.124{23} //
K14ratnml_u:10292: tatra svarge samutpannaḥ sa dūto vismayānvitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10293: kutaś cyutaḥ kuhotpannaḥ katham iti vyaciṃtayat // Rm_25.125{24} //
K14ratnml_u:10294: tadā sa manasādrākṣīn manuṣyebhyaś cyutāsmy ahaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:10295: iha svarge samutpannaḥ saṃbuddhabhajanād iti // Rm_25.126{25} //
K14ratnml_u:10296: atha sa dūtapūrvī sa devaputraḥ prasāditaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10297: saṃbuddhasya guṇān smṛtvā punar evaṃ vyaciṃtayat // Rm_25.127{26} //
K14ratnml_u:10298: aho hy ahaṃ munīndrasya prasādād divi sāṃprataṃ /
K14ratnml_u:10299: jāto 'smi tan munīndrasya kuryāṃ saṃdarśanaṃ punaḥ // Rm_25.128{27} //
K14ratnml_u:10300: iti hi dūtapurvī sa devaputro viciṃtayan /
K14ratnml_u:10304: tasyām eva niśāyāṃ sa devaputraḥ suraiḥ saha /
K14ratnml_u:10305: avabhāsya prabhās tasmij jetāraṇye upācarat // Rm_25.131{30} //
K14ratnml_u:10307: ālokya sāṃjalir natvā purataḥ samupācarat // Rm_25.132{31} //
K14ratnml_u:10308: tatas taṃ śrīghanaṃ nāthaṃ samabhyarcya yathāvidhiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10310: atha sa bhagavāṃs tasya dṛṣṭvā cittaṃ viśodhitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:10312: tad āryyadharmam ākarṇya devaputraḥ sa bodhitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10317: śāstus tasya padau natvā sāṃjalir evam abravīt // Rm_25.137{36} //
K14ratnml_u:10318: bhagavann idam asmākaṃ gurubhir na kṛtaṃ khalu /
K14ratnml_u:10319: na mātrā nāpi pitrā vā na jñātimitravāṃdhavaiḥ // Rm_25.138{37} //
K14ratnml_u:10320: na ceṣṭair brāhmaṇair vāpi na cāpi pūrvapretakaiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10321: na rājñā śramaṇaiś cānyair devair api kṛtaṃ khalu // Rm_25.139{38} //
K14ratnml_u:10323: laṃghitā rudhirā cābdhir uchoṣitāś ca sāṃprataṃ // Rm_25.140{39} //
K14ratnml_u:10324: pihito pāpamārgaś ca svargamārgaś ca vaivṛtaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10325: darśito mokṣamārgo 'pi tīrṇo duḥkhārṇavāpi ca // Rm_25.141{40} //
K14ratnml_u:10326: prasādād bhavatām adya prāptaṃ śuddheṃdriyaṃ mayā /
K14ratnml_u:10328: adya me saphalaṃ janma bhavatāṃ darśanād iha /
K14ratnml_u:10330: ity uktvā dūtapurvī sa devaputraḥ pramoditaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10331: tasya śāstur jagadvaṃdhoḥ pādau natvā kṛtāṃjaliḥ // Rm_25.144{43} //
K14ratnml_u:10333: tato 'nujñāṃ samāsādya suraiḥ saha divaṃ yayau // Rm_25.145{44} //
K14ratnml_u:10335: tatra svarge sa samyātaḥ suramye svālaye sthitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10337: tatra dṛṣṭvāvabhāsaṃ taṃ prasenajit sa kauśalaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10338: vismitaḥ prātar utthāya vihāre samupācarat // Rm_25.147{56/} //
K14ratnml_u:10339: tatra taṃ śrīghanaṃ dṛṣṭvā nṛpatiḥ sa pramoditaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10341: tataḥ sa nṛpa utthāya sūttarāsaṅgam udvahan /
K14ratnml_u:10342: jānubhyāṃ bhuvi saṃsthitvā prārthayat taṃ munīśvaraṃ // Rm_25.149{58} //
K14ratnml_u:10343: bhagavann atra niśāyāṃ ko bhavatāṃ samupāgataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10344: tad bhavatāṃ samupādiśyā māṃ bodhayitum arhati // Rm_25.150{59} //
K14ratnml_u:10345: iti saṃprārthite rājñā bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10346: nṛpatiṃ taṃ mahīpālaṃ samālokyaivam ādiśat // Rm_25.151{60} //
K14ratnml_u:10347: anyo na hi sa rājeṃdra yo 'dya rātrāv ihāgātaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10348: api tu tāvako dūto devabhūtaḥ sa āgataḥ // Rm_25.152{61} //
K14ratnml_u:10349: ity ādiṣṭe munīndreṇa nṛpatiḥ sa savismayaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10350: bhagavaṃtaṃ punar natvā tat karma paryapṛchataḥ // Rm_25.153{62} //
K14ratnml_u:10351: bhavan kiṃ kadā tena dūtena sukṛtaṃ kṛtaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:10352: yenāsau divi saṃjāto dṛṣṭasatyo bhavaty api // Rm_25.154{63} //
K14ratnml_u:10353: tad bhavān bhagavaṃc chāsta yat tena sukṛtaṃ kṛtaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:10354: tat sarvaṃ samupākhyāya bodhayitum anāśayaṃ // Rm_25.155{64} //
K14ratnml_u:10355: iti saṃprārthite rājñā bhagavān sa jagadguruḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10356: kauśalaṃ taṃ mahārājaṃ samālokyaivam ādiśat // Rm_25.156{65} //
K14ratnml_u:10357: śṛṇu rājan mahābhāga tena devena yat kṛtaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:10358: tad atra saṃpravakṣyāmi tava cittaprabodhane // Rm_25.157{66} //
K14ratnml_u:10359: yat tvayā preṣito dūto mayi rājagṛhe sthite /
K14ratnml_u:10360: yena saṃprārthitaṃ śrutvā tathā hy ahaṃ samāgataḥ // Rm_25.158{67} //
K14ratnml_u:10361: sa sādhus tāvako dūto mayā sārddham ihāgataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10364: ālpāyuṣko hy asau bhadrī vihāre 'tra nivāsitaḥ // Rm_25.160{69} //
K14ratnml_u:10365: kāladharmābhisaṃyukte tyaktvā dehaṃ divaṃ yayau // Rm_25.161{70} //
K14ratnml_u:10366: sa hy asau tāvako dūto rātrāv adyeha bhāsayan /
K14ratnml_u:10367: mama saṃdarśanaṃ kartuṃ devalokaiḥ sahāgataḥ // Rm_25.162{71} //
K14ratnml_u:10368: mama pūjāṃ vidhāyāsau kṛtvā cāpi pradakṣiṇāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:10369: natvā sādaram āśritya saddharmaṃ śraddhayāśṛṇot // Rm_25.163{72} //
K14ratnml_u:10371: natvā māṃ sa punaḥ svarge devalokaiḥ sahācarat // Rm_25.164{73} //
K14ratnml_u:10372: tatra sa svālaye ramye sthitvā devaiḥ sahāraman /
K14ratnml_u:10373: triratnabhajanaṃ kurvan prācaraṃ vasate sukhaṃ // Rm_25.165{74} //
K14ratnml_u:10375: svarge saukhyaṃ ciraṃ bhuktvā kramād bodhim avāpsyati // Rm_25.166{75} //
K14ratnml_u:10378: yadīchasi sadā bhadre caritavyaṃ tvayādarāt // Rm_25.167{76} //
K14ratnml_u:10380: tat triratnam upāśritya bhaja nityaṃ samāhitaḥ // Rm_25.168{77} //
K14ratnml_u:10381: triratne yat kṛtaṃ karmaṃ tan naiva kṣiṇuyā kvacit /
K14ratnml_u:10382: yāvad bodhipadaṃ dadyā evaṃ mahattaraṃ vṛṣaṃ // Rm_25.169{78} //
K14ratnml_u:10383: ye triratnaṃ bhajanty atra na te gachanti durgatiṃ /
K14ratnml_u:10384: sadaiva sadgatiṃ yānti bodhiṃ ca samavāpnuyuḥ // Rm_25.170{79} //
K14ratnml_u:10385: tisro hīmāḥ samākhyātā agrāḥ prajñaptayo nṛpa /
K14ratnml_u:10386: yatra kiṃ cit kṛtaṃ karma tadvipāko mahān smṛtāḥ // Rm_25.171{80} //
K14ratnml_u:10387: tadyathā katamās tisro agrāḥ prajñaptayaḥ smṛtāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10388: triratne prakṛtā yās tā agrāḥ prajñaptayaḥ smṛtāḥ // Rm_25.172{81} //
K14ratnml_u:10390: buddha eva mahān agro jyeṣṭhaḥ śreṣṭho varottamaḥ // Rm_25.173{82} //
K14ratnml_u:10392: sarve 'tyagraprasannās te jyeṣṭhāḥ śreṣṭhā varottamāḥ // Rm_25.174{83} //
K14ratnml_u:10394: tathā dharmāś ca ye sarve saṃskṛtā vāpy asaṃkṛtāḥ // Rm_25.175{84} //
K14ratnml_u:10395: teṣām api ca sarveṣāṃ buddhadharmāgra ucyate /
K14ratnml_u:10396: tatra dharme prasannā ye te 'gre hi saṃprasannitāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10397: tad agrābhiprasannānāṃ vipāko 'py agra ucyate // Rm_25.176{85} //
K14ratnml_u:10398: ye ca saṃghā gaṇās teṣāṃ buddhasaṃgho 'gra ucyate /
K14ratnml_u:10399: tatra saṃghe prasannā ye te 'gre 'bhisaṃprasādinaḥ // Rm_25.177{86} //
K14ratnml_u:10401: etāḥ prajñaptayas tisro hy agrāḥ khyāto munīśvaraiḥ // Rm_25.178{87} //
K14ratnml_u:10402: tad atra śraddhayā rāja triratne saṃprasannadhīḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10403: satkāraiḥ samupāśritya bhaja nityaṃ samādarāt // Rm_25.179{88} //
K14ratnml_u:10406: evaṃ matvā mahatpuṇyaṃ sarvān satvān prabodhayat /
K14ratnml_u:10408: evaṃ te sarvadā bhadraṃ sarvatrāpi bhaved dhruvaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:10409: kramād bodhiṃ samāsādya saṃbuddhapadam āpnuyāḥ // Rm_25.182{91} //
K14ratnml_u:10410: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā sa nṛpatir mudā /
K14ratnml_u:10411: tatheti hi pratijñāya prābhyanaṃdat prasāditaḥ // Rm_25.183{92} //
K14ratnml_u:10412: tataḥ sa nṛpa utthāya natvā taṃ jagadīśvaraṃ /
K14ratnml_u:10414: tatra sa nṛpatī rājā prāsādatalam āśritaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10415: sa maṃtripaurikān sarvān samāmaṃtryaivam ādiśat // Rm_25.185{94} //
K14ratnml_u:10416: maṃtriṇaḥ paurikāḥ sarve śṛṇudhvaṃ vacanaṃ mama /
K14ratnml_u:10418: yadi vāṃchāsti vo bhadre triratnaṃ bhajatādarat // Rm_25.186{95} //
K14ratnml_u:10419: yavad ayaṃ jagacchāstā viharaty atra sāṃghikaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10420: tāvad asya munīndrasya bhajata sarvadotsavaiḥ // Rm_25.187{96} //
K14ratnml_u:10422: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pītvā mudā carata sadvṛtau // Rm_25.188{97} //
K14ratnml_u:10423: sarvāṃś ca saugatān bhikṣūn sarvopakaraṇair api /
K14ratnml_u:10425: etan me vacanaṃ śrutvā triratnaśaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10427: tathā te maṃgalaṃ nityaṃ sarvatrāpi bhaved dhruvaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:10428: kramād bodhiṃ samāsādya labhata saugatiṃ gatiṃ // Rm_25.191{100} //
K14ratnml_u:10429: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā te maṃtriṇo janāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10430: sarve vīrādayo lokās tatheti pratiśuśruvuḥ // Rm_25.192{1} //
K14ratnml_u:10435: iti me guruṇādiṣṭaṃ tathā te kathyate mayā /
K14ratnml_u:10436: tvam apy evaṃ sadā rājan triratnaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ // Rm_25.195{4} //
K14ratnml_u:10437: saddharmaṃ samupāśritya cara nityaṃ sadā śubhe /
K14ratnml_u:10439: triratnaśaraṇe sthāpya pālanīyāḥ sadā tvayā // Rm_25.196{5} //
K14ratnml_u:10440: evaṃ te maṃgalaṃ nityaṃ sarvatrāpi bhaved dhruvaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:10441: kramād bodhiṃ samāsādya saṃbuddhapadam āpnuyāḥ // Rm_25.197{6} //
K14ratnml_u:10444: dūtāvadānaṃ yad idaṃ mudā ye śṛṇvaṃti ye cāpi niśāmayanti /
K14ratnml_u:10445: te sarva evaṃ tridive vrajanti saṃbuddhaloke 'pi saranti cānte // Rm_25.199{8} //
K14ratnml_u:10450: upaguptaṃ tam arhantaṃ praṇatvaivam abravīt // Rm_26.1{1} //
K14ratnml_u:10451: bhadanta śrotum ichāmi punar anyat subhāṣitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:10452: tadyathā guruṇādiṣṭaṃ tathādeṣṭuṃ ca me 'rhati // Rm_26.2{2} //
K14ratnml_u:10453: iti saṃprārthitaṃ rājñā śrutvā sa sugatātmajaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10454: upagupto nareṃdraṃ taṃ samāmaṃtryaivam ādiśat // Rm_26.3{3} //
K14ratnml_u:10455: sādhu śṛṇu mahārāja yathā me guruṇoditaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:10458: sarvajñaḥ sugato nātho dharmarājo vināyakaḥ // Rm_26.5{5} //
K14ratnml_u:10459: bhikṣubhiḥ śrāvakaiḥ sārddhaṃ tathā sarvaiś ca sāṃghikaiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10460: tatraiva jetakodyāne vihāre vyaharat purā // Rm_26.6{6} //
K14ratnml_u:10461: tad dharmadeśanāṃ śrotuṃ sarve lokaiḥ samāgataiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10463: siddhair vidyādharaiś cāpi nāgendrair garuḍair api /
K14ratnml_u:10464: lokapālaiḥ sasainyaiś ca brāhmaṇaiś ca maharṣibhiḥ // Rm_26.8{8} //
K14ratnml_u:10465: yogibhir yatibhiś cāpi nirgranthibhiś ca tāpasaiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10466: rājabhiḥ kṣatriyaiś cāpi tathā rājakumārakaiḥ // Rm_26.9{9} //
K14ratnml_u:10467: vaiśyaiś ca maṃtribhiḥ śreṣṭhair gṛhasthaiś ca mahājanaiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10468: vaṇigbhiḥ sārthavāhaiś ca śilpibhiḥ paurikair api // Rm_26.10{10} //
K14ratnml_u:10473: tadā tatra pure rājā prasenajin nṛpādhipaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10474: saṃbuddhaśāsanaṃ dhṛtvā triratnam abhajan mudā // Rm_26.13{13} //
K14ratnml_u:10476: saṃmīlya saugataṃ dharmaṃ pratikṣipyaivam abruvan // Rm_26.14{14} //
K14ratnml_u:10477: bhavanto yad ayaṃ buddhaḥ sarvajña ṛddhimān kṛtī /
K14ratnml_u:10478: tatsarvān imāṃ lokān svaṃ dharme saṃniyojayet // Rm_26.15{15} //
K14ratnml_u:10480: sarve naḥ śrāvakāś cāpi bhajeyuḥ sugataṃ jinaṃ // Rm_26.16{16} //
K14ratnml_u:10481: tadā sarve vayaṃ lokai niṃdyamānaḥ samaṃtataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10482: katham atra cariṣyāmas tad anyatra caremahi // Rm_26.17{17} //
K14ratnml_u:10483: iti sarvair api prokte tīrthikopāsako dvijaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10484: sarvāns tāns tīrthikaṃ dṛṣṭvā punar evam abhāṣata // Rm_26.18{18} //
K14ratnml_u:10486: bhavaṃto ma viṣīdatvaṃ kartuṃ arhati sarvathā /
K14ratnml_u:10487: tad upāyaṃ kariṣyāmi yenānyatra carej jinaḥ // Rm_26.19{19} //
K14ratnml_u:10488: iti tāns tīrthikān sarvān bodhayitvā sa durmatiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10489: nṛpater antike gatvā sādaram evam abravīt // Rm_26.20{20} //
K14ratnml_u:10490: śṛṇu rājan mahābhāga yad dhitaṃ te tad ucyate /
K14ratnml_u:10491: tathā tvayā samādhāya caritavyaṃ sadādarāt // Rm_26.21{21} //
K14ratnml_u:10495: svayaṃ naṣṭaḥ parāṃś cāpi nāśayitum ihāgataḥ // Rm_26.23{23} //
K14ratnml_u:10496: tad asya darśanaṃ rājaṃ karttavyaṃ na kadā cana /
K14ratnml_u:10497: grahītavyaṃ na nāmāpi śrotavyaṃ nāpi tad vacaḥ // Rm_26.24{24} //
K14ratnml_u:10498: satkāraṃ na ca karttavyaṃ dātavyaṃ nāpi kiṃ cana /
K14ratnml_u:10499: āśrame 'pi na gantavyaṃ sthātavyaṃ na tadantike // Rm_26.25{25} //
K14ratnml_u:10500: darśanaṃ ye prakurvanti tasya bhikṣor durātmanaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10501: te sarve narake yāyuḥ sadgatiṃ na kadā cana // Rm_26.26{26} //
K14ratnml_u:10502: ye ca śṛṇvanti tad vākyaṃ sarve te nilayaṃ gatāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10504: satkāraṃ ye ca kurvaṃti sarve te vilayaṃ gatāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10505: daridrā durgatiṃ gatvā bhrameyur nihatāśayāḥ // Rm_26.28{28} //
K14ratnml_u:10507: te 'pi ca narake yātā duḥkhāny evam avāpnuyuḥ // Rm_26.29{29} //
K14ratnml_u:10508: tadāśrame ca gachaṃti sarve te duritāṅkitāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10509: kuṣṭhādi rogasaṃtaptā yāyuś ca niraye 'cirāt // Rm_26.30{30} //
K14ratnml_u:10510: ye ca taiḥ saha tiṣṭhanti te sarve pāpasaṃgitāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10512: gṛhnanti ye ca mannāma teṣāṃ geheṣu sarvadā /
K14ratnml_u:10513: lakṣmīr maiva śrayet tatra nairṛtir eva saṃśrayet // Rm_26.32{32} //
K14ratnml_u:10514: ye buddhaṃ bhajanty atra te te sarve 'py adharmiṇaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10515: kadāpi sadgatiṃ naiva yāṃti dūragatim eva hi // Rm_26.33{33} //
K14ratnml_u:10516: iti matvā mahārāja sadā bhadraṃ yadīchasi /
K14ratnml_u:10517: satkāraṃ darśanaṃ tasya karttavyaṃ naiva ke cana // Rm_26.34{34} //
K14ratnml_u:10518: kiṃ dharmaṃ saugataṃ dharmaṃ yan mithyā parikalpitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:10519: tat tasya duryater dharmaṃ śrotavyaṃ naiva kena cit // Rm_26.35{35} //
K14ratnml_u:10520: yasya dharmo hi sarvatra vedaśāstre na gaṇyate /
K14ratnml_u:10521: sa kiṃ dharmātmako buddhas tat tatra maṃgalaṃ na hi // Rm_26.36{36} //
K14ratnml_u:10524: tatas tasya vacaḥ śrutvā tīrthikopāsakasya saḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10528: taṃ tīrthyopāsakaṃ dṛṣṭvā bodhayitum abhāṣata // Rm_26.39{39} //
K14ratnml_u:10529: kim evaṃ durmate buddho dharmarājo 'pi niṃdyate /
K14ratnml_u:10530: mā maivaṃ vadatām atra tvam eva narakaṃ vrajeḥ // Rm_26.40{40} //
K14ratnml_u:10532: jitvā māragaṇān sarvān saṃbodhijñānam āptavān // Rm_26.41{41} //
K14ratnml_u:10534: mānitaḥ satkṛto buddhas tvayaiva niṃdyate kathaṃ // Rm_26.42{42} //
K14ratnml_u:10536: pūjanīyaḥ kathaṃ nāthaṃ dharmarājo munīśvaraḥ // Rm_26.43{43} //
K14ratnml_u:10542: saṃbuddho 'rhañ jinas trāyī dharmarājo munīśvaraḥ // Rm_26.46{46} //
K14ratnml_u:10543: tataḥ sa bhagavānn eva sarvatraidhātukeṣv api /
K14ratnml_u:10544: agraḥ śreṣṭho mahāñ jeṣṭho nānyaḥ kaścid ato 'dhikaḥ // Rm_26.47{47} //
K14ratnml_u:10545: tasmād asya munīndrasya satkāraṃ śraddhayā sadā /
K14ratnml_u:10546: śaraṇagamanaṃ kṛtvā śrotavyaṃ dharmam ādarāt // Rm_26.48{48} //
K14ratnml_u:10547: ye buddhe śaraṇaṃ yānti na te gachaṃti durgatiṃ /
K14ratnml_u:10548: sarvadā sadgatau saukhyaṃ bhuktvā yānti jinālaye // Rm_26.49{49} //
K14ratnml_u:10549: śṛṇvanti ye ca tad dharmaṃ te 'pi no yānti durgatiṃ /
K14ratnml_u:10550: sadā svarge sukhaṃ bhuktvā yāyuś cānte sunirvṛtiṃ // Rm_26.50{50} //
K14ratnml_u:10551: bhajanti ye ca saṃgheṣu te 'pi na yānti durgatiṃ /
K14ratnml_u:10552: sadā dharmaratāḥ saukhyaṃ bhuktvā yānti sukhāvatiṃ // Rm_26.51{51} //
K14ratnml_u:10553: evaṃ ye ye triratnānāṃ sarvadā śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10554: satkṛtya śraddhayā nityaṃ bhajanti bodhimānasāḥ // Rm_26.52{52} //
K14ratnml_u:10556: kramād bodhicarīḥ pūrya saṃbuddhapadam āpnuyuḥ // Rm_26.53{53} //
K14ratnml_u:10559: tenāsya sadguroḥ śāstuḥ śraddhayā śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10560: saddharmaṃ sarvadā śrutvā kartum arhati satkṛtiṃ // Rm_26.55{55} //
K14ratnml_u:10561: ye cāpy asya munīndrasya pratikṣipanti śāsanaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:10562: sadgatiṃ naiva te yānti durgatim eva sarvadā // Rm_26.56{56} //
K14ratnml_u:10563: iti matvā na karttavyā buddhe niṃdā kathaṃ cana /
K14ratnml_u:10565: ye triratnaṃ bhajanty atra sarve te bodhibhāginaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10568: śraddhayā praṇatiṃ tesāṃ karttum arhanti sarvadā // Rm_26.59{59} //
K14ratnml_u:10569: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā tīrthikopāsakaś ca saḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10571: taṃ buddhopāsakaṃ dṛṣṭvā punar evam abhāṣata // Rm_26.60{60} //
K14ratnml_u:10572: ā kim evaṃ tvayā proktaṃ kiṃ buddho 'tāpasā 'yatiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10573: pūraṇo brahmavijñas tapasvī saṃyamī sudhīḥ // Rm_26.61{61} //
K14ratnml_u:10574: tat tasya pūraṇasyāgre buddhaḥ kiṃ vaktum utsahet /
K14ratnml_u:10575: bālakān eva vañcitvā hy asaddharmme yunakti saḥ // Rm_26.62{62} //
K14ratnml_u:10577: ṛddhimatāṃ mahān agro mātraikaś cit tato 'dhikaḥ // Rm_26.63{63} //
K14ratnml_u:10578: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā sa buddhopāsakas tataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10579: tīrthikopāsikaṃ dṛṣṭvā punar eva tam abravīt // Rm_26.64{64} //
K14ratnml_u:10580: are kiṃ jñāyate tasya saṃbuddhasya guṇas tvayā /
K14ratnml_u:10581: yenaiva kṛpayā dṛṣṭvā pālitaṃ putravaj jagat // Rm_26.65{65} //
K14ratnml_u:10582: yasya loke dayā nāsti tena kiṃ pālyate jagat /
K14ratnml_u:10584: tapasvī yogavit prājña ṛddhimān siddhimān api /
K14ratnml_u:10585: yasya nāsti dayā satve sa kim śāstā jagadguruḥ // Rm_26.67{67} //
K14ratnml_u:10586: yo dṛṣṭvā sakalān satvān kṛpayā saṃprabodhayan /
K14ratnml_u:10587: saddharme yojayaty atra sa eva jagatāṃ guruḥ // Rm_26.68{68} //
K14ratnml_u:10589: buddha eva jagannātho jagattrāyī jagadguruḥ // Rm_26.69{69} //
K14ratnml_u:10591: tena brahmādidevaiḥ sa vaṃdanīyo munīśvaraḥ // Rm_26.70{70} //
K14ratnml_u:10593: munīndro 'rhaṃ subhadrāṃśas tena tasyādhiko hi kaḥ // Rm_26.71{71} //
K14ratnml_u:10595: satkṛtya śraddhayā sarve bhajanīyaḥ śubhechubhiḥ // Rm_26.72{72} //
K14ratnml_u:10597: roṣāgniparidagdhāsyas taṃ bauddham evam abravīt // Rm_26.73{73} //
K14ratnml_u:10598: ā evam ucyate ko 'tra pūraṇāt para uttamaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10599: yatīr vijño mahābhijñaḥ sa eva trijagadguruḥ // Rm_26.74{74} //
K14ratnml_u:10601: sāṃjaliḥ praṇatiṃ kṛtvā bhūmāv evaṃ tam abravīt // Rm_26.75{75} //
K14ratnml_u:10602: buddhād anyo viśiṣṭaḥ kas traidhātubhuvaneṣv api /
K14ratnml_u:10603: bahudhā kiṃ pravādena buddha eva jagatprabhuḥ // Rm_26.76{76} //
K14ratnml_u:10604: tenety ukte sa ruṣṭātmā tīrthikopāsakas tadā /
K14ratnml_u:10605: kopāgniparidagdhāṃgas taṃ buddham evam abravīt // Rm_26.77{77} //
K14ratnml_u:10606: yadi buddho viśiṣṭaḥ syāt pūraṇād arhato yateḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10607: sarvasvaṃ me tavādhīnaṃ dāsaś cāpi bhavāmy ahaṃ // Rm_26.78{78} //
K14ratnml_u:10608: yadi buddhād viśiṣṭo hi pūraṇo 'rhaṃ mahāmatiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10609: sarvasvaṃ te mamādhīnaṃ dāsaś cāpi bhaveḥ khalu // Rm_26.79{79} //
K14ratnml_u:10611: tatheti vaṃdhanikṣepaṃ kṛtvā svīkaraṇaṃ vyadhāt // Rm_26.80{80} //
K14ratnml_u:10614: matvāmātyān samāhūya purar evam abhāṣata // Rm_26.81{81} //
K14ratnml_u:10616: nirṇayitvā vivādatve mimāṃsā kriyatām iha // Rm_26.82{82} //
K14ratnml_u:10617: iti rājñā samādiṣṭaṃ śrutvā te maṃtriṇo janāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10618: sahasā taj janān sarvān samāhūyaivam ādiśat // Rm_26.83{83} //
K14ratnml_u:10619: bhavanto nṛpater evam ājñāṃ śrutvā samāhitāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10620: sarvatra vijite ghaṇṭānādaiś codaya tad drutaṃ // Rm_26.84{84} //
K14ratnml_u:10621: iti tair maṃtribhiḥ proktaiḥ śrutvā te sajanās tathā /
K14ratnml_u:10625: ye ye 'tra draṣṭum ichanti sarve te samupāgatāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10626: buddhasya tīrthikasyāpi prabhāvaṃ draṣṭum arhata // Rm_26.87{87} //
K14ratnml_u:10627: evaṃ te vijite tatra sarvatra viṣayeṣv api /
K14ratnml_u:10628: ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā maṃtriṇāṃ pura āyayuḥ // Rm_26.88{88} //
K14ratnml_u:10629: tatas te sajanāḥ sarve rājño 'ntikam upāgatāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10631: tato 'hni saptame prāpte sarve lokāḥ samāgatāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10632: vistīrṇe bhūtale ramye tad draṣṭum upatasthire // Rm_26.90{90} //
K14ratnml_u:10639: tataḥ sa sāṃjalir natvā jānubhyāṃ bhuvi saṃsthitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10640: udvahann uttarāsaṃgaṃ prārthayad evam ādarāt // Rm_26.94{94} //
K14ratnml_u:10648: patitāny astaṃgatāny eva sahasādarśane yayuḥ // Rm_26.98{98} //
K14ratnml_u:10649: tad dṛṣṭvā sasurā lokāḥ sarve te bhūmipādayaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10650: uccair nādair hasantas taṃ tairthikam eva menire // Rm_26.99{99} //
K14ratnml_u:10651: tad dṛṣṭvā dhikpravādaṃ ca śrutvā sa tairthiko 'patat /
K14ratnml_u:10654: bhrastaskaṃdhaḥ kare kaṇḍaṃ sthāpya tasthau vimurchitaḥ // Rm_26.101{1} //
K14ratnml_u:10655: tad dṛṣṭvā sa prasannātmā buddhopāsako mudā /
K14ratnml_u:10659: udvahann uttarāsaṅgaṃ jānubhyāṃ bhuvi saṃsthitaḥ // Rm_26.103{3} //
K14ratnml_u:10660: sāṃjaliḥ purataḥ sthitvā saṃbuddhaṃ taṃ munīśvaraṃ /
K14ratnml_u:10661: smṛtvā natvā tathā satyaṃ prārthayad evam ādarāt // Rm_26.104{4} //
K14ratnml_u:10663: tena satyena sarvāṇi puṣpāṇīmāni sūdakaṃ // Rm_26.105{5} //
K14ratnml_u:10665: saṃbuddhaṃ śrīghanaṃ nāthaṃ prābhiyāntu vihāyasā // Rm_26.106{6} //
K14ratnml_u:10666: iti saṃprārthanāṃ kṛtvā sa buddhopāsako mudā /
K14ratnml_u:10669: tāni sarvāṇi puṣpāṇi chatrībhūtvācaran kramāt // Rm_26.108{8} //
K14ratnml_u:10671: tad dṛṣṭvā janatā sarvā mahāścaryyaṃ pralehire // Rm_26.109{9} //
K14ratnml_u:10673: jhaṭiti jetakāraṇye vihāre saṃmukhaṃ yayuḥ // Rm_26.110{10} //
K14ratnml_u:10678: tad dhūpam agratas tasya tasthau kṛtvā pradakṣiṇāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:10679: padāmbujaṃ tad ambho 'pi papāta viyataḥ sarat // Rm_26.113{13} //
K14ratnml_u:10680: tat samālokya sarve te dvijādi paurikā janāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10683: bhagāvantaṃ muniṃ natvā sarve te samupāśrayan // Rm_26.115{15} //
K14ratnml_u:10684: sa buddhopāsakaś cāpi natvā taṃ śrīghanaṃ mudā /
K14ratnml_u:10685: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pātum upatasthau kṛtāṃjaliḥ // Rm_26.116{16} //
K14ratnml_u:10687: mahad buddhānubhāvatvaṃ matvā draṣṭum upāśrayat // Rm_26.117{17} //
K14ratnml_u:10688: tataḥ sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā sarvāns tān samupasthitān /
K14ratnml_u:10689: āryasatyam upādiśya punar evam upādiśat // Rm_26.118{18} //
K14ratnml_u:10691: yat triratnaṃ samākhyātaṃ tat trilokye mahattaraṃ // Rm_26.119{19} //
K14ratnml_u:10693: sarveṣām api bhadrārthaṃ saddharmaṃ saṃprakāśaye // Rm_26.120{20} //
K14ratnml_u:10695: jagannātho jagattrātā buddharatnam idaṃ varaṃ // Rm_26.121{21} //
K14ratnml_u:10696: atra yaiḥ śraddhayā karmaṃ dānādi sukṛtaṃ kṛtaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:10697: teṣām agraprasannānāṃ vipākaiḥ phalam uttamaṃ // Rm_26.122{22} //
K14ratnml_u:10700: evaṃ matvātra saṃbuddhaṃ bhajata sarvadā mudā // Rm_26.123{23} //
K14ratnml_u:10701: yāvataś cātra saṃsāre saṃskṛtā vāpy asaṃskṛtāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10702: dharmās teṣāṃ mahān agro virāgo dharmaṃ uttamaḥ // Rm_26.124{24} //
K14ratnml_u:10704: teṣām agraprasannānāṃ vipāke phalam uttamaṃ // Rm_26.125{12} //
K14ratnml_u:10706: tad etat saugataṃ dharmaṃ śrutvā bhajaṃti saṃvaraṃ // Rm_26.126{13} //
K14ratnml_u:10707: yāvantaś cātra trailokye saṃghāḥ pūgā gaṇāḥ smṛtāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10708: teṣām agro mahān khyāto buddhasaṃgho jagadvaraḥ // Rm_26.127{14} //
K14ratnml_u:10709: saṃgharatnam idaṃ ye 'tra bhajanti śraddhayā mudā /
K14ratnml_u:10710: teṣām agraprasannānāṃ vipāke phalam uttamaṃ // Rm_26.128{15} //
K14ratnml_u:10712: tad atra saugate saṃghe bhajata śraddhayādarāt // Rm_26.129{16} //
K14ratnml_u:10716: satkṛtya śraddhayā nityaṃ pūjanīyaṃ samādarāt // Rm_26.131{18} //
K14ratnml_u:10717: ye triratnaṃ sadā nityaṃ pūjayanti prasāditāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10718: na te māravaśaṃ yātā bhavaṃti bodhilābhinaḥ // Rm_26.132{19} //
K14ratnml_u:10719: iti matvā triratnaṃ tad dṛṣṭvā kṛtvānumodanāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:10720: sāñjalipraṇatiṃ kṛtvā dūrād vanditum arhatha // Rm_26.133{20} //
K14ratnml_u:10721: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā te brāhmaṇādayaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10722: sarve lokāḥ prasīdantas triratnaśaraṇaṃ yayuḥ // Rm_26.134{21} //
K14ratnml_u:10723: tatra ke cij janā bhadrāḥ saṃbuddhaśaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10724: śikṣāpadaṃ samādāya prācarat saugataṃ vrataṃ // Rm_26.135{22} //
K14ratnml_u:10725: ke cid bhadrāśayā vijñā saṃbuddhaśaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10728: sākṣād arhatpadaṃ prāpya babhūva brahmacāriṇaḥ // Rm_26.137{24} //
K14ratnml_u:10730: vismitaḥ suprasannātmā triratnaṃ śaraṇaṃ yayau // Rm_26.138{25} //
K14ratnml_u:10731: tataḥ sa tairthikas tasya munīndrasya padāmbuje /
K14ratnml_u:10732: sāñjalipraṇataś caivaṃ praṇidhānaṃ vyadhān mudā // Rm_26.139{26} //
K14ratnml_u:10736: saṃbodhijñānam āsādya bhaveyaṃ sugato jinaḥ // Rm_26.141{28} //
K14ratnml_u:10738: sarvān āśvāsayiṣyāmi hy anāśvastān suduḥkhinaḥ // Rm_26.142{29} //
K14ratnml_u:10740: kariṣyāmi sadā bhadraṃ traidhātubhuvaneṣv api // Rm_26.143{30} //
K14ratnml_u:10743: matvā sa bhagavān smitaṃ visasarja saraśmikaṃ // Rm_26.144{31} //
K14ratnml_u:10744: tadā tā raśmayaḥ paṃcavarṇāḥ sarvāḥ samaṃtataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10745: lokeṣu prasṛtā bhadraṃ saukhyaṃ kṛtvā praserire // Rm_26.145{32} //
K14ratnml_u:10746: yā adhastād gatābhāso sarvatra narakeṣu tāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10749: nirduḥkhā saukhyam āsādya vismayaṃ samupāyayuḥ // Rm_26.147{34} //
K14ratnml_u:10750: tatas te nārakāḥ satvāḥ sarve te narake sthitāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10752: aho citraṃ kim adyaivaṃ mahat saukhyaṃ prajāyate /
K14ratnml_u:10753: itaś cyutāḥ kim anyatra samutpannā vayaṃ khalu // Rm_26.149{36} //
K14ratnml_u:10755: bhagavān nirmitaṃ buddhaṃ prerayan narake prati // Rm_26.150{37} //
K14ratnml_u:10756: taṃ dṛṣṭvā nārakāḥ sarve vismitāḥ saṃprasāditāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10757: bhūya ekatra saṃmīlya mitha evaṃ vabhāṣire // Rm_26.151{38} //
K14ratnml_u:10758: aho vayam itaś cyutvā naivānyatra gatāḥ khalu /
K14ratnml_u:10759: kiṃ tv asyāpūrvarūpasya prabhāvān naḥ śubhāyate // Rm_26.152{39} //
K14ratnml_u:10761: samīkṣya kṛpayā dṛṣṭyā samuddharttum ihāgataḥ // Rm_26.153{40} //
K14ratnml_u:10762: tad asyātra vayaṃ sarve satkṛtya śraddhayādarāt /
K14ratnml_u:10763: sarvadā śaraṇaṃ gatvā bhaktum arhāmahe 'dhunā // Rm_26.154{41} //
K14ratnml_u:10764: iti saṃbhāṣaṇāṃ kṛtvā sarve te saṃprasāditāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10765: asyaiva śaraṇaṃ gatvā praṇatvā saṃprabhejire // Rm_26.155{41/} //
K14ratnml_u:10767: pariśuddhāḥ śubhātmānaḥ sadgatiṃ sahasā yayuḥ // Rm_26.156{42} //
K14ratnml_u:10768: evaṃ tān nārakān sarvāḥ samuddhṛtya prabhāś ca tāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10769: sarvāḥ pratyāgatās tatra saṃbuddhasya puro 'saran // Rm_26.157{43} //
K14ratnml_u:10770: evam ūrddhaṃ gatāyāś ca raśmayas tāḥ samaṃtataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10771: sarvān devālayāṃ lokān avabhāsya praserire // Rm_26.158{44} //
K14ratnml_u:10773: prasāritāḥ tato gāthā nisṛtāḥ samacodayan // Rm_26.159{45} //
K14ratnml_u:10774: anityaṃ khalu saṃsāraṃ duḥkhaṃ śūnyam anātmakaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:10775: puṇyam eva jagatsāraṃ tat puṇyaṃ cinutādarāt // Rm_26.160{46} //
K14ratnml_u:10777: dhunīta mṛtyusainyāni carata saugataṃ vrataṃ // Rm_26.161{47} //
K14ratnml_u:10778: yo hy asmin saugate dharme cariṣyati samāhitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10779: sa hitvā janma saṃsāre duḥkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyati // Rm_26.162{48} //
K14ratnml_u:10780: tat triratnaṃ sadā yūyaṃ saṃsmṛtvā śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10781: satkṛtya śraddhayā nityaṃ bhajata bodhiprāptaye // Rm_26.163{49} //
K14ratnml_u:10782: evaṃ tad ghoṣam ākarṇya sarvadevāḥ prabodhitāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10783: triratnaṃ śaraṇaṃ kṛtvā prabhejire sadādarāt // Rm_26.164{50} //
K14ratnml_u:10785: evaṃ tā raśmayo devāñ codayitvā samaṃtataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10786: punaḥ pratyāgatās tatra buddhāntikam upāyayuḥ // Rm_26.165{51} //
K14ratnml_u:10790: śāstā kim ādiśed dharmam iti dhyātvā niṣedire // Rm_26.167{53} //
K14ratnml_u:10792: utthāya sāṃjālir natvā papracha taṃ munīśvaraṃ // Rm_26.168{54} //
