K14ratnml_u:10796: munivṛṣa vāgbhir uttamābhir utpannaṃ vyapanaya saṃśayaṃ śubhābhiḥ // Rm_26.170{56} //
K14ratnml_u:10797: nākasmāl lavaṇajalādrirājadhairyāḥ saṃbuddhāḥ smitam upadarśayanti nāthāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10798: yasyārthe smitam upadarśayaṃti dhīrās taṃ śrotuṃ samabhilaṣanti janoghāḥ // Rm_26.171{57} //
K14ratnml_u:10800: yad abhilaṣitaṃ kāryaṃ tad upadeṣṭum arhati // Rm_26.172{58} //
K14ratnml_u:10801: iti saṃprārthite tena bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10802: āyuṣmantaṃ tam ānaṃdaṃ samālokyaivam ādiśat // Rm_26.173{59} //
K14ratnml_u:10804: saṃbuddhāḥ sugatāḥ sarve darśayanti smitaṃ kvacit // Rm_26.174{60} //
K14ratnml_u:10805: śṛṇv ānaṃda yadarthe 'haṃ smitaṃ muñcāmi sāṃprataṃ /
K14ratnml_u:10807: paśyasi yad ayaṃ śreṣṭhī tīrthikopāsako mudā /
K14ratnml_u:10808: mamātra śaraṇaṃ gatvā praṇidhānaṃ karoti hi // Rm_26.176{62} //
K14ratnml_u:10810: kramād bodhicārīḥ sarvāḥ paripūrya bhavet sudhīḥ // Rm_26.177{63} //
K14ratnml_u:10811: tataḥ kleśagaṇāñ jitvā sarvān māragaṇān api /
K14ratnml_u:10812: bodhiṃ prāpyācalo nāma tathāgato bhaviṣyati // Rm_26.178{64} //
K14ratnml_u:10814: sarve te suprasannāsyāḥ prābhyanandan savismayāḥ // Rm_26.179{65} //
K14ratnml_u:10815: tathā tena munīndreṇa vyākhyātaṃ sa tairthikaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10817: tataḥ sa sarvadā nityaṃ satkṛtya śraddhayā mudā /
K14ratnml_u:10818: triratnabhajānaṃ kṛtvā prācarat saugataṃ vrataṃ // Rm_26.181{67} //
K14ratnml_u:10819: iti me guruṇākhyātaṃ śrutaṃ mayā tathocyate /
K14ratnml_u:10820: tvam apy evaṃ mahārāja triratnasevako bhava // Rm_26.182{68} //
K14ratnml_u:10821: prajāś cāpi tathā rājaṃ bodhayitvā prayatnataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10823: tathā te sarvadā nityaṃ sarvatrāpi śubhaṃ bhavet /
K14ratnml_u:10825: kramād bodhiṃ samāsādya saṃbuddhapadam āpnuyāt // Rm_26.184{70} //
K14ratnml_u:10827: satyam iti pratijñāya prābhyanāndat sa pārthikaḥ // Rm_26.185{71} //
K14ratnml_u:10828: śṛṇvantīdaṃ narā ye munivarakathitaṃ tairthikasyāvadānaṃ ye cāpi śrāvayanti pramuditamānasaḥ śraddhayā bhaktiyuktāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10829: te sarve bodhisatvāḥ sakalaguṇabharā bhadracaryā caranto bhuktvā satsaukhyabhadraṃ jinavaranilaye saṃprayānti pramodāḥ // Rm_26.186{72} //
K14ratnml_u:10834: upaguptaṃ tam arhantaṃ praṇatvā prārthayat punaḥ // Rm_27.1{1} //
K14ratnml_u:10835: bhadanta śrotum ichāmi punar anyat subhāṣitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:10836: tadyathā guruṇādiṣṭaṃ tathādeṣṭuṃ tvaṃ arhati // Rm_27.2{2} //
K14ratnml_u:10837: iti tena narendreṇa prārthitaṃ sa yatīśvaraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10838: upagupto narendran taṃ samālokyaivaṃ ādiśat // Rm_27.3{3} //
K14ratnml_u:10839: śṛṇu sādhu mahārāja yathā me guruṇoditaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:10840: tathāhaṃ tat pravakṣyāmi tava puṇyavivṛddhaye // Rm_27.4{4} //
K14ratnml_u:10842: sarvajñaḥ sugataḥ śāstā dharmarājo munīśvaraḥ // Rm_27.5{5} //
K14ratnml_u:10844: jetāraṇye mahodyāne vihāre śrāvakaiḥ saha // Rm_27.6{6} //
K14ratnml_u:10846: upāsikābhir anyaiś ca bodhisatvagaṇair api // Rm_27.7{7} //
K14ratnml_u:10849: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pātuṃ sarve lokāḥ samāgatāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10852: siddhā vidyādharāś cāpi rākṣasāś ca maharddhikāḥ // Rm_27.10{10} //
K14ratnml_u:10853: ṛṣayo brāhmaṇā cāpi kṣatriyāś ca narādhipāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10854: vaiśyā rājakumārāś ca maṃtriṇo 'mātyakā janāḥ // Rm_27.11{11} //
K14ratnml_u:10855: gṛhasthāḥ sārthavāhāś ca vaṇijaḥ śilpino 'pi ca /
K14ratnml_u:10856: paurā jānapadā grāmyā anye kārpaṭikā api // Rm_27.12{12} //
K14ratnml_u:10857: sarve te samupāgatya tatra taṃ śrīghanaṃ muniṃ /
K14ratnml_u:10860: parivṛtya puraskṛtya sarve te samupāśrayan // Rm_27.14{14} //
K14ratnml_u:10861: tān sarvān samupāsīnāṃ dṛṣṭvā sa bhagavān muniḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10862: āryasatyaṃ samārabhya dideśa dharmam uttamaṃ // Rm_27.15{15} //
K14ratnml_u:10863: tad dharmaṃ samupākarṇya sarve te saṃprabodhitāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10865: tadā tatra pure rājā prasenajit kauśalaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10866: yadā na sugatas tatra tadā tīrthikabhāg abhūt // Rm_27.17{17} //
K14ratnml_u:10867: yadā tu sugatas tatra sasāṃghikaḥ samāgataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10868: tadā sa nṛpatir nityaṃ śrīghanaṃ taṃ sadābhajat // Rm_27.18{18} //
K14ratnml_u:10869: tasmiṃś ca samaye tatra kaścid ārāmiko vanāt /
K14ratnml_u:10871: navaṃ padmaiḥ samādāya rājñe dātuṃ pure 'viśat // Rm_27.19{19} //
K14ratnml_u:10873: sahasā tasya puro gatvā prārthayat taṃ saroruhaṃ // Rm_27.20{20} //
K14ratnml_u:10874: bho mālinn idaṃ padmaṃ yadi vikretum ichasi /
K14ratnml_u:10875: ucitaṃ mūlyam ādāya mahyaṃ dātuṃ tvam arhasi // Rm_27.21{21} //
K14ratnml_u:10877: yadīchati bhavān dadyām iti taṃ dātum aichata // Rm_27.22{22} //
K14ratnml_u:10879: puṣpārthī samupāyāto mālikaṃ tam apṛchata // Rm_27.23{22} //
K14ratnml_u:10880: bho mālinn idaṃ padmaṃ yadi vikretum ichati /
K14ratnml_u:10881: dviguṇaṃ mūlyam ādāya bhavān me dātum arhati // Rm_27.24{23} //
K14ratnml_u:10883: taddviguṇena mūlyena tad padmaṃ samayācata // Rm_27.25{24} //
K14ratnml_u:10884: iti tenārthitaṃ śrutvā sa cāpy anāthapiṇḍadaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10885: taddvaiguṇyena mūlyena kamalaṃ tam ayācata // Rm_27.26{25} //
K14ratnml_u:10889: caturguṇena mūlyena padmaṃ tam abhyayācata // Rm_27.28{27} //
K14ratnml_u:10890: evaṃ tau gṛhapatī so tha yāvac chatasaharsrakaiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10891: mūlya taṃ padmam ādāya mālinaṃ taṃ yayācatuḥ // Rm_27.29{28} //
K14ratnml_u:10893: tayor dvayor adatvaiva manasaivaṃ vyaciṃtayat // Rm_27.30{29} //
K14ratnml_u:10894: ayaṃ gṛhapatiḥ śreṣṭho hy anāthapiṇḍadaḥ sudhīḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10896: kasyārthe nv idaṃ padmam iyan mūlyena yācate /
K14ratnml_u:10897: nūnam atra mahaddhetur bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // Rm_27.32{31} //
K14ratnml_u:10898: tad etat paripṛchāva dāsyāmi sadguṇārthine // Rm_27.33{32} //
K14ratnml_u:10899: iti dhyātvā svacittena sa ārāmika utsukaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10900: tairthikaṃ taṃ samālokya paprachaivaṃ samādarāt // Rm_27.34{33} //
K14ratnml_u:10901: bho puruṣa bhavān kasya kāryasyārthe idaṃ kajaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:10902: iyanmūlyena vikretum ichati tad vadasva me // Rm_27.35{34} //
K14ratnml_u:10903: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā sa tairthikaḥ pramoditaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10904: ārāmikaṃ tam ālokya prabodhayitum abravīt // Rm_27.36{35} //
K14ratnml_u:10906: tasya pūjāṃ kariṣyāmi tad idaṃ dehi me 'mbujaṃ // Rm_27.37{36} //
K14ratnml_u:10908: anāthapiṇḍadaṃ taṃ ca dṛṣṭvā kāryam apṛchata // Rm_27.38{37} //
K14ratnml_u:10909: bho sādho bhavaṃś cāpi kim artham idam ambujaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:10910: bahumūlyaiva samāharttum ichati tad vadasva me // Rm_27.39{38} //
K14ratnml_u:10911: iti tad vacanaṃ śrutvā so 'nāthapiṇḍadaḥ sudhīḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10912: ārāmikaṃ tam ālokya prabodhayitum abravīt // Rm_27.40{39} //
K14ratnml_u:10913: sādhu sādhu mahābhāga yad idaṃ te saroruhaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:10914: bahumūlyena vāṃchāmi tad arthaṃ kathyate śṛṇu // Rm_27.41{40} //
K14ratnml_u:10921: sarvarājyaṃ parityajya sarvāṃś cāpi parigrahān // Rm_27.44{43} //
K14ratnml_u:10923: gayāśīrṣe nage gatvā kṛtvā tapaḥ suduṣkaraṃ // Rm_27.45{44} //
K14ratnml_u:10924: tato loke hitaṃ kartuṃ samutthāya samāhitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10926: tatra māragaṇān sarvāñ jitvā kleśagaṇān api /
K14ratnml_u:10927: saṃbodhijñānaṃ āsādya buddho bhavati sāṃprataṃ // Rm_27.47{46} //
K14ratnml_u:10948: bhāsayan sakalān lokān bhadraṃ kṛtvā samaṃtataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10949: ihāpi sarvasatvānāṃ bhadraṃ kartuṃ samāgataḥ // Rm_27.58{57} //
K14ratnml_u:10951: saddharmam ādiśan nityaṃ viharati prabhāsayan // Rm_27.59{58} //
K14ratnml_u:10952: tasya pūjām ahaṃ kartum ichāmi sāṃprataṃ khalu /
K14ratnml_u:10954: tad bhavān mūlyam ādāya dehi me idam ambujaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:10955: yathābhilaṣitaṃ dravyaṃ dāsyāmi te prasāṇayan // Rm_27.61{60} //
K14ratnml_u:10958: sarvadā sadgatiṃ yāyād durgatiṃ na kadā cana /
K14ratnml_u:10959: kramād bodhicarīḥ pūrya saṃbodhim api prāpnuyāḥ // Rm_27.63{62} //
K14ratnml_u:10961: evaṃ matvā bhavān sādho yadi saṃbodhim ichati /
K14ratnml_u:10962: yathābhilaṣitaṃ dravyam ādāyedaṃ pradehi me // Rm_27.64{63} //
K14ratnml_u:10963: iti tenārthitaṃ śrutvā sa mālikaḥ pramoditaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10964: taṃ gṛhastham anāthānāṃ bharttāram evam abravīt // Rm_27.65{64} //
K14ratnml_u:10965: aho buddho mahābhijño dṛśyate na kadā cana /
K14ratnml_u:10966: īdṛg mahad guṇaṃ cāpi śruyate na kvacin mayā // Rm_27.66{65} //
K14ratnml_u:10967: tad ahaṃ taṃ jagannāthaṃ draṣṭum ichāmi sāṃprataṃ /
K14ratnml_u:10968: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pātuṃ vāṃchā me jāyate khalu // Rm_27.67{66} //
K14ratnml_u:10969: tasmāt tatra svayaṃ gatvā saṃbuddhaṃ taṃ munīśvaraṃ /
K14ratnml_u:10971: tad bhavān kṛpayā sādho saṃbuddhasya jagadguroḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10972: nītvā mām āśrame tatra saddharme yoktum arhati // Rm_27.69{68} //
K14ratnml_u:10974: mālikaṃ taṃ samālokya punar evam abhāṣata // Rm_27.70{67} //
K14ratnml_u:10976: prāgacha tvaṃ mayā sārddhaṃ pūjaye taṃ munīśvaraṃ // Rm_27.71{68} //
K14ratnml_u:10977: ity uktvā mālikaṃ taṃ sa gṛhapatiḥ prasādayan /
K14ratnml_u:10980: sāṃjalis taṃ jagannāthaṃ natvaikānte samāśrayat // Rm_27.73{70} //
K14ratnml_u:10981: tataḥ sa māliko drākṣīc chrīghanaṃ taṃ munīśvaraiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10986: dṛṣṭvā sa mudito natvā kṛtvā tridhā pradakṣiṇaṃ // Rm_27.76{73} //
K14ratnml_u:10987: tat padmaṃ purataḥ kṣiptvā kṛtāṃjaliḥ puro mudā /
K14ratnml_u:10988: natvā pādau munes tasya tatraikānte samāśrayat // Rm_27.77{74} //
K14ratnml_u:10990: chatrībhūtvā mune mūrddhnar uparisthaṃ vyarājata // Rm_27.78{75} //
K14ratnml_u:10991: tad dṛṣṭvā te sabhālokaḥ sarve te vismayānvitāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10992: aho buddhasya māhātmyam iti proktvā prasedire // Rm_27.79{76} //
K14ratnml_u:10994: utthāya sahasā śastuḥ pādayo nyapatan nataḥ // Rm_27.80{77} //
K14ratnml_u:10995: tataḥ sa sāṃjalir natvā pādābjavor jagadguroḥ /
K14ratnml_u:10998: kleśākule vinaṣṭe 'haṃ bhūyāsaṃ sugato jinaḥ // Rm_27.82{79} //
K14ratnml_u:11004: iti tena kṛtaṃ matvā praṇidhānam sa sarvavit /
K14ratnml_u:11005: bhagavān muditaḥ prāvirakārṣīt sa smitaṃ tadā // Rm_27.85{82} //
K14ratnml_u:11007: suraśmayaḥ paṃcavarṇāḥ prasesrus trijagatsv api // Rm_27.86{83} //
K14ratnml_u:11008: yā adhastād gatābhāsas tā sarvanarakeṣv api /
K14ratnml_u:11009: avabhāsya śubhaṃ kṛtvā pracakru duḥkhanāśaṇaṃ // Rm_27.87{84} //
K14ratnml_u:11011: duḥkhamuktā sukhaspṛṣṭā vismitā evam abruvan // Rm_27.88{85} //
K14ratnml_u:11012: aho kiṃ nu mahāsaukhyam asmākaṃ jāyate 'dhunā /
K14ratnml_u:11013: itaś cyutāḥ kuhānyatra samutpannā vayaṃ nu kiṃ // Rm_27.89{86} //
K14ratnml_u:11015: bhagavān nirmitaṃ buddhaṃ preṣayat prati nairayaṃ // Rm_27.90{87} //
K14ratnml_u:11017: parasparaṃ samālokya punar evaṃ vabhāṣire // Rm_27.91{88} //
K14ratnml_u:11018: bhavanto no itaś cyutvā nānyatra saṃgatā vayaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:11019: ihaiva narake sthāḥ sma kutrāpi calitā na hi // Rm_27.92{89} //
K14ratnml_u:11020: kiṃ tv ayaṃ samupāyātā hy apūrvadarśanaḥ pumān /
K14ratnml_u:11024: tad asya samupāśritya prakṛtvā śaraṇaṃ sadā /
K14ratnml_u:11025: praṇatvā śraddhayā nityaṃ bhajemahi samādarāt // Rm_27.95{92} //
K14ratnml_u:11026: iti saṃbhāṣya te sarve nārakīyāḥ prabodhitāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11027: taṃ buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatvā praṇatvā prābhajan mudā // Rm_27.96{93} //
K14ratnml_u:11029: sahasā sadgatiṃ yātā babhūvur dharmabhājanāḥ // Rm_27.97{94} //
K14ratnml_u:11030: evaṃ tā raśmayaḥ sarvāḥ sarvāṃs tān narakāśritān /
K14ratnml_u:11031: samuddhṛtya punas tatra jagacchāstur upāyayuḥ // Rm_27.98{95} //
K14ratnml_u:11032: yā cāpy ūrddhvaṃ gatābhāsas tāvabhāsya diśo 'ṣṭa ca /
K14ratnml_u:11035: samantato mahacchabdaṃ ruccair evam acodayan // Rm_27.100{97} //
K14ratnml_u:11037: iti matvā śubhe dharmaṃ sarvadā caratādarāt // Rm_27.101{98} //
K14ratnml_u:11040: yo hy asmiṃ saugate dharme cariṣyati samāhitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11041: sa hitvā janma saṃsāre duḥkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyati // Rm_27.103{100} //
K14ratnml_u:11042: etac chabdaṃ samākarṇya sarve devāḥ prabodhitāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11044: evaṃ tāḥ raśmayaḥ paṃcaḥ sarvāṃl lokān surān api /
K14ratnml_u:11045: triratnaśaraṇe sthāpya punar muner upāyayuḥ // Rm_27.105{2} //
K14ratnml_u:11046: tatra tā raśmayaḥ sarvā ekībhūtā ca piṇḍitāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11048: jinaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya tad uṣṇīṣe viśet punaḥ // Rm_27.106{3} //
K14ratnml_u:11049: tad dṛṣṭvā te sabhālokāḥ sarve te vismayānvitāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11050: kim ādeśen munīndro 'yam iti dhyātvā niṣedire // Rm_27.107{2} //
K14ratnml_u:11051: athā yuṣmān sa ānando matvā teṣāṃ vitarkitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:11052: utthāya sāṃjalir natvā bhagavantaṃ tam abravīt // Rm_27.108{5} //
K14ratnml_u:11053: bhagavan bhavatā kena hetunā sṛjyate smitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:11054: nāhetu sugatāḥ sarve vihasanti kadā cana // Rm_27.109{6} //
K14ratnml_u:11055: yadarthe hetunā smitaṃ bhavān muṃcati sāṃprataṃ /
K14ratnml_u:11056: tadarthaṃ śrotum ichanti sarve lokā ime khalu // Rm_27.110{7} //
K14ratnml_u:11058: tadarthaṃ samupādiśya sarvān lokān prabodhaya // Rm_27.111{8} //
K14ratnml_u:11059: ity ānandoditaṃ śrutvā bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11060: sarvān lokān samālokya tam ānaṃdaṃ cābravīt // Rm_27.112{9} //
K14ratnml_u:11062: sarvabuddhāḥ pramuṃcanti smitaṃ kiṃcit kadā cana // Rm_27.113{10} //
K14ratnml_u:11063: paśya tvaṃ yad ayaṃ sādhu ārāmikaḥ prasāditaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11064: mamaivaṃ śraddhayā pūjāṃ karoti śraddhayā mudā // Rm_27.114{11} //
K14ratnml_u:11066: bodhicittaṃ samāsādya bodhicaryāṃ caran kramāt // Rm_27.115{12} //
K14ratnml_u:11067: sarvāḥ pāramitāḥ pūryya sarvān māragaṇān vinijayan /
K14ratnml_u:11073: evaṃ ye śraddhayā nityaṃ triratnaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11074: bhajanti te janāḥ sarve bhaveyuḥ sugatātmajāḥ // Rm_27.119{16} //
K14ratnml_u:11078: tataḥ saṃbodhim āsādya bhaveyuḥ sugatā api // Rm_27.121{18} //
K14ratnml_u:11080: triratnabhajanaṃ kṛtvā caritavyaṃ sadā śubhe // Rm_27.122{19} //
K14ratnml_u:11082: bhikṣavaḥ sāṃghikāḥ sarve prābhyanandan prabodhitāḥ // Rm_27.123{20} //
K14ratnml_u:11083: sarve lokāś ca te sarve śrutvaivaṃ śrīghanoditaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:11085: evaṃ śāstrā munīndreṇa vyākṛtaṃ svayam ātmanaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11086: śrutvā sabhāntikaś cāpi prābhyanandat pramoditaḥ // Rm_27.125{22} //
K14ratnml_u:11090: sāṃjalis taṃ jagannāthaṃ natvā sve nilaye yayau // Rm_27.127{24} //
K14ratnml_u:11092: tatra sa māliko gehe bhāryayā saha moditaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11093: triratnaśaraṇaṃ kṛtvā prācarat sarvadā śubhaṃ // Rm_27.128{25} //
K14ratnml_u:11094: tatas taṃ saugate dharme 'nucarantaṃ niśamya saḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11096: are re durmate pāpin kim evaṃ carase 'śubhe /
K14ratnml_u:11097: sarvathā tvaṃ paribhraṣṭo narake duḥkham āpsyasi // Rm_27.130{27} //
K14ratnml_u:11099: upetya bhajanaṃ kṛtvā vinoṣi kilviṣaṃ mahat // Rm_27.131{28} //
K14ratnml_u:11100: bhajante ye narā buddhaṃ na te gachanti sadgatiṃ /
K14ratnml_u:11101: durgatim eva te yātāś caranty aśubhe sadā // Rm_27.132{29} //
K14ratnml_u:11102: kadā cid api tad gehe bhadraṃ na jāyate kvacit /
K14ratnml_u:11103: lakṣmīś cāpi vasen naiva yato dharmo vinaśyate // Rm_27.133{30} //
K14ratnml_u:11104: kiṃ cin nāsti śubhācāraṃ tasya bhikṣāśino 'yateḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11105: kim evaṃ śraddhayā nityaṃ bhajase sadguror iva // Rm_27.134{31} //
K14ratnml_u:11106: kṛpaṇo yaḥ svayaṃ bhraṣṭaḥ parāṃś ca bhraṃśayed iha /
K14ratnml_u:11107: adharme ye 'pi saddharmam ity ākhyāyābhivaṃcate // Rm_27.135{32} //
K14ratnml_u:11108: sa kiṃ śāstā sudhīr vijño dharmarājo munīśvaraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11109: sadbhir na pūjanīyo 'sau niṃdanīyo hi durgatiḥ // Rm_27.136{33} //
K14ratnml_u:11110: iti satyaṃ mayākhyātaṃ hitārthaṃ te śubhārthinaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11111: yadi dharme 'sti te vāṃchā śrutvāsmadvacanaṃ cara // Rm_27.137{34} //
K14ratnml_u:11112: tad buddhasaṃgatiṃ tyaktvā tīrthe snātvā samāhitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11113: brahmaṇaṃ viṣṇum īśānaṃ bhaja nityaṃ yathāvidhiṃ // Rm_27.138{35} //
K14ratnml_u:11114: brāhmaṇaṃ ye bhajaṃty atra sarve te brahmacāriṇaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11116: ye bhajanti sadā viṣṇuṃ na te gachaṃti durgatiṃ /
K14ratnml_u:11117: sadgatiṃ sarvadā yātā bhavanti manujādhipāḥ // Rm_27.140{32} //
K14ratnml_u:11118: ye bhajanti mahārudraṃ na te gachanti nārake /
K14ratnml_u:11119: sarvasaukhyāni saṃbhuktvā yānti cānte śivālayaṃ // Rm_27.141{33} //
K14ratnml_u:11120: evaṃ matvātra saṃsāre yadi saukhyaṃ sadechasi /
K14ratnml_u:11121: tad etāṇ trijagannāthān bhaja nityaṃ prapūjayan // Rm_27.142{34} //
K14ratnml_u:11122: etan me vacanaiḥ śrutvā bhaja tān sadgurūn yatīn /
K14ratnml_u:11123: teṣāṃ saddharmam ākarṇya cara nityaṃ śubhe vrate // Rm_27.143{35} //
K14ratnml_u:11124: tathā te maṃgalaṃ nityaṃ sarvadātra bhaved dhruvaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:11126: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā mālikaḥ sa viroṣitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11127: tairthikaṃ taṃ samārabhya paribhāṣyaivam abravīt // Rm_27.145{37} //
K14ratnml_u:11128: ā kim evaṃ vadasy atra mā maivaṃ vadathāḥ punaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11129: tvam eva narakaṃ yāyā nindase yan munīśvaraṃ // Rm_27.146{38} //
K14ratnml_u:11130: śṛṇv atrāhaṃ pravakṣyāmi saṃbuddhe guṇam alpakaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:11131: vistareṇa kathaṃ vaktuṃ śakyate 'lpaśiyā mayā // Rm_27.147{39} //
K14ratnml_u:11134: śrutvā tvayā vicāryaiva sad asac ca parīkṣyatāṃ // Rm_27.148{40} //
K14ratnml_u:11135: saṃbuddha eva bhagavān suguṇī na viṣṇuḥ saṃśasyate na hiraṇyagarbhaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11136: teṣāṃ subhadracaritātiśayaprabhāvāñ chrutvā vicārayata ko guṇavān na veti // Rm_27.149{41} //
K14ratnml_u:11141: duryodhanādi nṛpanāśakaraḥ sa cakrī haras tripūranāśakaḥ pinākī /
K14ratnml_u:11142: krauṃcaṃ guho 'pi dṛḍhaśakti hate cakāra buddhastokavalamayas tu jagatāṃ hiteṣī // Rm_27.151{67} //
K14ratnml_u:11143: pīḍyāmamāyamayam eva tu rakṣaṇīyo vadhyo yam ity api surottamanītir eṣā /
K14ratnml_u:11145: rāgādi doṣajanitāni vacānsi viṣṇor unmattaceṣṭitakarāṇi ca yāni śambhoḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11146: niḥśeṣadoṣaśamakāritatathāgatasya vaṃdyatvam arhati ca ko 'tra vicārayadhvaṃ // Rm_27.153{69} //
K14ratnml_u:11147: yaś codyataḥ parivadhāya ghṛṇāṃ vihāya trāṇāya yaś ca jagataḥ kṛpayā pravṛttaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11148: rāgī ca yo bhavati yaś ca vimuktarāgaḥ pūjyaṃs tayoḥ ka iha taṃ vadatānucintya // Rm_27.154{70} //
K14ratnml_u:11149: śakraṃ vajradharaṃ balaṃ haladharaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ ca cakrāyudhaṃ skaṃdaṃ śaktidharaṃ śmaśānavilayaṃ rudraṃ triśūlāyudhaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:11150: etān duḥkhabhayāṅkitān gataghṛṇān bālān vicitrāyudhān nityaṃ prāṇivadhodyute praharaṇān kas tān namasyed budhaḥ // Rm_27.155{71} //
K14ratnml_u:11151: na yaḥ śūlaṃ dhatte na ca suratim aṅke suvadanāṃ na cakraṃ śaktiṃ vā na ca kuliśam ugraṃ rava halaṃ vinirmuktaṃ kleśaiḥ parahitavidhānādyatadhiyaṃ
K14ratnml_u:11152: śaraṇyaṃ lokānaṃ tam ṛṣim upayātāsmi śaraṇaṃ // Rm_27.156{72} //
K14ratnml_u:11153: rudro rāgavaśāt striyaṃ vahati yo hiṃsyā hriyā varjitā viṣṇuḥ krūrataraḥ kṛtaghnacaritaḥ skaṃdhaḥ svayaṃjñāti ha /
K14ratnml_u:11154: krūrāsyā mahiṣāntakṛn naravaśā mānsāśinī pārvatī pānepsī ca vināyako daśabalo srasto hy adoṣaḥ suhṛt // Rm_27.157{73} //
K14ratnml_u:11155: vaṃdhur nabhe sa bhagavān na ripur na cānyaḥ śāstā trilokagurur ekatamo 'pi dhīraḥ śrutvā vacaḥsucaritātiśayaprabhāvaṃ buddhaṃ guṇātiśayalobhatayāśritāḥ smaḥ // Rm_27.158{74} //
K14ratnml_u:11156: nāsmākaṃ sugataḥ pitā na ripavas tīrthyāṃdhanaṃ naiva te /
K14ratnml_u:11157: dattaṃ tena tathāgatena ca hṛtaṃ kiṃcit kaṇādādibhiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11158: kiṃ tv ekāṃtajagaddhitaḥ sa bhagavān buddho yataś cāmalaṃ vākyaṃ sarvamalāpahārica yatas tad bhiktavaṃto vayaṃ // Rm_27.159{75} //
K14ratnml_u:11159: hiteṣī yo nityaṃ satatam upakārīva jagataḥ kṛtaṃ yena svāsthyaṃ bahuvidharujārttasya jagataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11161: gūḍhaṃ yaś ca jñe bhayaṃ karatalam ivāvaiti sakalaṃ prapadyadhvaṃ santas temṛṣivaradaraṃ bhaktimanasaḥ // Rm_27.160{76} //
K14ratnml_u:11162: asarvabhāvena yadṛcchayā vā parānuvṛtya vicikitsayā vā /
K14ratnml_u:11163: ye taṃ namasyanti munīndracaṃdraṃ te 'py āmarīsaṃpadam āpnuvaṃti // Rm_27.161{77} //
K14ratnml_u:11164: paurāṇīśrutineṣa lokamahito buddhaḥ kilāyaṃ harir dṛṣṭvā janmajarāvipattivaśagaṃ lokaṃ kṛpābhyudyataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11165: jātaḥ śākyakulenduracyutamatis trātā nṛṇāṃ gautamaḥ śāstāraṃ hitam eva kas tam adhunā nāvaiti mūḍho janaḥ // Rm_27.162{78} //
K14ratnml_u:11166: yadā rāgadveṣād asurasuradārāpaharaṇaṃ kṛtaṃ māyādvitvaṃ dharaṇiharaṇāśaktamatinā /
K14ratnml_u:11167: tadā pūjyo vandyo harir aparimukto 'budhatayā vinirmuktaṃ buddhaṃ na namati jano māhavahulaḥ // Rm_27.163{79} //
K14ratnml_u:11168: caturjaladhimekhalākuratambabhārālasāṃ mahīṃ mahatīṃ visṛjya harayevāpakaṣṭāṃ valiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11169: pradāya munaye tu pāṃśulavam apy aśoko nṛpaḥ kṣitiṃ sakalacaṃdramaṇḍalatarāñ ca saṃprāptavān // Rm_27.164{80} //
K14ratnml_u:11171: muktimac ca vaco yasya kāryas tasya parigrahaḥ // Rm_27.165{81} //
K14ratnml_u:11173: sa eva mṛgyo hy atisūkṣmacetasā janena śeṣaiḥ kim anarthapaṇḍitaiḥ // Rm_27.166{82} //
K14ratnml_u:11174: yasyāpi kiñcin na hi doṣaleśaṃ śaradguṇāḥ santi jagaddhitārthe /
K14ratnml_u:11175: brahmāpi viṣṇutiriṇo harir vā samehi śāstā śubhakārimitraṃ // Rm_27.167{83} //
K14ratnml_u:11176: yasya na vidyate doṣo vidyante sakalā guṇāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11177: sarvajñaḥ sa jagacchāstā tam ahaṃ śaraṇaṃ vraje // Rm_27.168{84} //
K14ratnml_u:11179: tasyāhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatvā bhajāmi satataṃ mudā // Rm_27.169{85} //
K14ratnml_u:11180: yaṃ dṛṣṭvā suprasannās te bhavanti nirmalāśayāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11181: tam eva sugataṃ nāthaṃ bhajāmi śaraṇaṃ gataḥ // Rm_27.170{86} //
K14ratnml_u:11183: tam eva trijagannāthaṃ bhajāmi śaraṇaṃ tataḥ // Rm_27.171{87} //
K14ratnml_u:11184: yasmai suśraddhayā dattaṃ tat phalaṃ bodhisādhanaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:11185: tam eva śrīghanaṃ bhaktyā bhajāmi śaraṇaṃ gataḥ // Rm_27.172{88} //
K14ratnml_u:11186: yasmād dharmāmṛtaṃ pītvā sarve satvāḥ pramodinaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11188: tam eva śrīpradātāraṃ bhajāmi śraddhayādarāt // Rm_27.173{89} //
K14ratnml_u:11189: buddha eva jagacchāstā buddha eva jagadguruḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11190: buddha eva jagannātho buddha eva munīśvaraḥ // Rm_27.174{90} //
K14ratnml_u:11191: tad ahaṃ sarvabhāvena buddhasya śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11192: śraddhayā dharmam āsādya bhajāmi bodhiprāptaye // Rm_27.175{91} //
K14ratnml_u:11193: ye buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ yānti na te gachanti durgatiṃ /
K14ratnml_u:11194: nirmuktapāpakāḥ saukhyaṃ bhuktvā yāṃti jinālayaṃ // Rm_27.176{92} //
K14ratnml_u:11196: śṛṇvanti saugataṃ vākyaṃ ye te na yānti durgatiṃ /
K14ratnml_u:11198: bhajanti lokanāthaṃ ye te 'pi na yānti durgatiṃ /
K14ratnml_u:11199: pāpamuktāḥ sukhāny eva bhuktvā yāṃti surālayaṃ // Rm_27.178{94} //
K14ratnml_u:11201: tad ahaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatvā bhajāmi samupāsikaḥ // Rm_27.179{95} //
K14ratnml_u:11203: kramād bodhicarāḥ pūrya saṃbuddhapadam āpnuyāt // Rm_27.180{96} //
K14ratnml_u:11205: satvān bodhau pratiṣṭhāpya nirvṛtiṃ samavāpnuyāt // Rm_27.181{97} //
K14ratnml_u:11206: evaṃ vijñāya saddharmaṃ yadīchati bhavān api /
K14ratnml_u:11207: triratnaśaraṇaṃ gatvā bhaja nityaṃ samādarāt // Rm_27.182{98} //
K14ratnml_u:11209: bodhiṃ cāpi samāsādya saṃbuddhapadam āpnuyāḥ // Rm_27.183{99} //
K14ratnml_u:11210: iti tena samākhyātaṃ śrutvā sa paribodhitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11213: vihāre samupāśritya prābhajat taṃ munīśvaraṃ // Rm_27.185{1} //
K14ratnml_u:11214: iti me guruṇādiṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ mayā tathocyate /
K14ratnml_u:11215: tvaṃ cāpy evaṃ mahārāja triratnaṃ sarvadā bhaja // Rm_27.186{2} //
K14ratnml_u:11219: kramād bodhicarīḥ pūrya saṃbuddhapadam āpnuyāḥ // Rm_27.188{4} //
K14ratnml_u:11222: śṛṇvantīdaṃ mudā ye jinavarakathitaṃ mālikasyāvadānaṃ ye cāpi śrāvayanti pramuditamanasaḥ śraddhayā bhadrakāmāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11223: te sarve lokanāthās trimalakalijitā bodhisatvā maheśā bhuktvā saukhyaṃ sadānte jinavaranilaye saṃprayānti prasannāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11228: upaguptaṃ guruṃ bhikṣuṃ natvaivaṃ punar abravīt // Rm_28.1{1} //
K14ratnml_u:11229: bhadanta śrotum ichāmi punar anyat subhāṣitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:11230: tadyathā guruṇākhyātaṃ tathādeṣṭuṃ ca me 'rhati // Rm_28.2{2} //
K14ratnml_u:11231: iti saṃprārthite rājñā sa upagupta ātmavit /
K14ratnml_u:11232: tam aśokaṃ mahīpālaṃ samāmaṃtryaivam abravīt // Rm_28.3{3} //
K14ratnml_u:11233: sādhu śṛṇu mahārāja yathā me guruṇoditaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:11234: tathāhaṃ te pravakṣyāmi śrutvānumodanāṃ kuru // Rm_28.4{4} //
K14ratnml_u:11236: sarvajñaḥ sugato nātho dharmarājā munīśvaraḥ // Rm_28.5{5} //
K14ratnml_u:11237: ekasmin samaye tatra śrāvastyā bahir āśrame /
K14ratnml_u:11239: tadā sa bhagavāṃs tatra bhikṣusaṃghaiḥ puraskṛtaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11241: tad dharmadeśanāṃ śrotuṃ sarve lokāḥ samāgatāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11242: devā daityāś ca nāgāś ca yakṣagaṃdharvakinnarāḥ // Rm_28.8{8} //
K14ratnml_u:11243: siddhā vidyādharāś cāpi garuḍā rākṣasā api /
K14ratnml_u:11244: ṛṣayo brāhmaṇā vijñā rājānaḥ kṣatriyā api // Rm_28.9{9} //
K14ratnml_u:11245: vaiśyā rājakumārāś ca maṃtriṇaś ca mahājanāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11246: vaṇijaḥ sārthavāhāś ca gṛhasthāḥ śilpino 'pi ca // Rm_28.10{10} //
K14ratnml_u:11248: tīrthikā api te sarve jetārāme upāgatāḥ // Rm_28.11{11} //
K14ratnml_u:11249: vihāre taṃ jagannāthaṃ dṛṣṭvā sāṃjalayo mudā /
K14ratnml_u:11251: tatas te muditāḥ sarve parivṛtya samaṃtataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11252: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ patum upatasthuḥ samāhitāḥ // Rm_28.13{13} //
K14ratnml_u:11253: tadā sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā sarvāns tān samupasthitān /
K14ratnml_u:11255: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pītvā sarve lokāḥ prabodhitāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11256: saṃbuddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ kṛtvā pracerur bodhisaṃvaraṃ // Rm_28.15{15} //
K14ratnml_u:11261: pravarttite sadā yuddhe tayo rājño hi māninoḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11265: viruddhamānasau vīrau vairaśāmyaṃ na jagmataḥ // Rm_28.19{19} //
K14ratnml_u:11266: tad dṛṣṭvā nṛpatī rājā prasenajin sa kauśalaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11267: tad vairaśamanopāyaṃ ciraṃ dhyātvā vyaciṃtayat // Rm_28.20{20} //
K14ratnml_u:11268: yad etau nṛpatī vīrau nityaṃ yuddhābhikāṃkṣiṇau /
K14ratnml_u:11270: sarve 'pi maṃtriṇo 'mātyāḥ sarve lokāś ca yodhinaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11271: saṃbuddhadarśane cāpi nātrāgachanti ke cana // Rm_28.22{22} //
K14ratnml_u:11273: saddharme śravaṇe vāpi gocaraṃ naiva vidyate // Rm_28.23{23} //
K14ratnml_u:11274: dharmaṃ vinātra saṃsāre kiṃ sāraṃ janma mānuṣe /
K14ratnml_u:11275: parasparaṃ nihatyaiva yāsyaṃti narake dhruvaṃ // Rm_28.24{24} //
K14ratnml_u:11276: dhig janma mānuṣe teṣāṃ kevalaṃ pāpasādhanaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:11277: ye kleśamānadarpyāndhā na paśyaṃti munīśvaraṃ // Rm_28.25{25} //
K14ratnml_u:11278: ye cātra saugataṃ dharmaṃ na śṛṇvanti kadā cana /
K14ratnml_u:11279: kathaṃ te bhadracaryāyāṃ gocaraṃ samavāpnuyuḥ // Rm_28.26{26} //
K14ratnml_u:11282: tataḥ svayaṃ paribhraṣṭā bhraṃśayantaḥ parān api /
K14ratnml_u:11283: yathechayā carantas te cinuyur bahupātakaṃ // Rm_28.28{28} //
K14ratnml_u:11289: sarvathopāyam ādhātum arhāmi sāṃprataṃ drutaṃ // Rm_28.31{31} //
K14ratnml_u:11290: yāvad etau nṛpau vīrau viruddhau nopaśāmyataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11291: tāvad atra bhuvi kvāpi maṃgalaṃ na bhavet sadā // Rm_28.32{32} //
K14ratnml_u:11292: tad etau nṛpatī tāvad bodhayitvā prayatnataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11294: etau hi kṣatriyau vīrau pāṃcālau mānagarvitau /
K14ratnml_u:11295: anayor mitravaṃdhaṃ ko bodhayitvā kariṣyati // Rm_28.34{34} //
K14ratnml_u:11298: tad atra sahasā gatvā prārthayeyaṃ munīśvaraṃ /
K14ratnml_u:11299: nūnaṃ buddhānubhāvāt tau nṛpau mitratvam āpsyataḥ // Rm_28.36{36} //
K14ratnml_u:11300: iti niścitya rājā sa prasenajit samutthitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11301: vihāre sahasā gatvā nanāma taṃ munīśvaraṃ // Rm_28.37{37} //
K14ratnml_u:11302: tatra sa purato gatvā sāṃjaliḥ samupāśrayan /
K14ratnml_u:11304: bhagavan nātha sarvajña vijānīyād bhavān api /
K14ratnml_u:11305: yat tau pāṃcālabhūpālau viruddhau bhavato 'dhunā // Rm_28.39{39} //
K14ratnml_u:11306: yad etayor viruddhe ta sarve lokā virodhitāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11307: tad atra sarvadā yuddhaṃ pravarttate divāniśaṃ // Rm_28.40{40} //
K14ratnml_u:11309: tat tesāṃ sarvalokānāṃ saddharme gocaraṃ kadā /
K14ratnml_u:11310: sadā yuddhābhisaktās te sādhayeyuḥ śubhaṃ kathaṃ // Rm_28.41{41} //
K14ratnml_u:11311: tad atra bhagavāñc chāstā bodhayaṃs tau narādhipau /
K14ratnml_u:11312: saṃbodhimārgam ādiśya śubhe cārayitum arhati // Rm_28.42{42} //
K14ratnml_u:11313: iti saṃprārthite tena rājñā sa bhagavān muniḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11314: tasya rājñe nareṃdrasya tūṣṇībhūtvādhyuvāsa tat // Rm_28.43{43} //
K14ratnml_u:11315: tataḥ sa nṛpatī rājā matvā śāstrādhivāsitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:11316: sāṃjalis taṃ muniṃ natvā muditaḥ svālayaṃ yayau // Rm_28.44{44} //
K14ratnml_u:11317: tataḥ sa bhagavān pātram ādāya cīvarāvṛtaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11318: bhāsayan bhadratāṃ kurvan pratasthe saha sāṃghikaiḥ // Rm_28.45{45} //
K14ratnml_u:11319: evaṃ sarvatra mārgeṣu bhāsayaṃ sa munīśvaraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11320: kṛtvā bhadraṃ krameṇaivaṃ vārāṇasīm upācarat // Rm_28.46{46} //
K14ratnml_u:11321: tatra sa bhagavāṃ prāpto bhābhiḥ saṃbhāsayan kramāt /
K14ratnml_u:11322: caraṃ kṛtvā subhadratvaṃ mṛgadāve upācarat // Rm_28.47{47} //
K14ratnml_u:11323: tatra sa bhagavān prātaḥ sasaṃghaḥ saugatāśrame /
K14ratnml_u:11325: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pītvā sarve lokāḥ pramoditāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11326: triratnaṃ śaraṇaṃ kṛtvā prabhejire samādarāt // Rm_28.49{49} //
K14ratnml_u:11329: tatra taṃ śrīghanaṃ dṛṣṭvā nṛpatiḥ sa pramoditaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11330: sāṃjaliḥ purato gatvā natvaikānte upāśrayat // Rm_28.51{51} //
K14ratnml_u:11334: taṃ nṛpaṃ yāmyapāṃcālaṃ parājetum upācarat // Rm_28.53{53} //
K14ratnml_u:11335: tatra sa nṛpatir vīraś caturaṃgavalaiḥ saha /
K14ratnml_u:11337: tatra sa yāmyapāṃcālarājā taṃ ripum āgataṃ /
K14ratnml_u:11338: niśamya sahasotthāya natvā ha taṃ munīśvaraṃ // Rm_28.55{55} //
K14ratnml_u:11339: bhagavan nātha sarvajña sa me vairā ihāgataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11340: tad atra kiṃ kariṣyāmi tad anujñāṃ dadātu me // Rm_28.56{56} //
K14ratnml_u:11341: iti tena narendreṇa prārthite sa jineśvaraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11342: dṛṣṭvā taṃ yāmyapāṃcālaṃ samāśvāsyaivam ādiśat // Rm_28.57{57} //
K14ratnml_u:11343: nṛpate mā vibheṣī tvaṃ dhairyyam ālambya tiṣṭhata /
K14ratnml_u:11344: tad upāyaṃ kariṣyāmi yenāsau te vaśe caret // Rm_28.58{58} //
K14ratnml_u:11354: tatra sa dūrato dṛṣṭvā śrīghanaṃ taṃ sabhāśritaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:11355: avatīrya rathāt tatra mṛgadāve upācarat // Rm_28.63{63} //
K14ratnml_u:11356: tatra sa nṛpati rājā samupetya kṛtāṃjaliḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11357: tridhā pradakṣiṇīkṛtya nanāma śaraṇaṃ gataḥ // Rm_28.64{64} //
K14ratnml_u:11358: tataś cirāt samutthāpya sa pāṃcalo narādhipaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11359: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pātuṃ tatraikānte samāśrayat // Rm_28.65{65} //
K14ratnml_u:11360: tadā sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā nṛpatiṃ taṃ samāśritaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:11361: āryyasatyaṃ samārabhya dideśa dharmam uttamaṃ // Rm_28.66{66} //
K14ratnml_u:11363: saṃsārasādhanaṃ dharmaṃ punaḥ śrotuṃ samaichata // Rm_28.67{67} //
K14ratnml_u:11364: tataḥ sa nṛpatī rājā samutthāya kṛtāṃjaliḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11365: praṇatvā bhagavaṃtaṃ taṃ prārthayad evam ādarāt // Rm_28.68{68} //
K14ratnml_u:11366: bhagavan nātha sarvajña bhavatāṃ śaraṇaṃ vraje /
K14ratnml_u:11367: tan me 'trānugrahaṃ kṛtvā samyag ādeṣṭum arhati // Rm_28.69{69} //
K14ratnml_u:11368: yad atra bhagavan satvāḥ pravarttanto bhavodadhau /
K14ratnml_u:11370: karmaṇā kena devāḥ syur mānuṣāḥ kena karmaṇā /
K14ratnml_u:11371: daityāś ca karmaṇā kena tat samyak samupādiśa // Rm_28.71{71} //
K14ratnml_u:11372: tiryañcaḥ karmaṇā kena pretāś ca kena karmaṇā /
K14ratnml_u:11373: nārakāḥ karmaṇā kena tat sarvaṃ samupādiśa // Rm_28.72{72} //
K14ratnml_u:11374: tatrāpy anekarūpāś ca sarve bhinnāśayā api /
K14ratnml_u:11376: etat sarvaṃ samākhyāya bhavāñ chāstā jagad guruḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11378: iti saṃprārthite tena rājñā sa bhagavān sudhīḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11379: taṃ viśuddhāśayaṃ bhūpaṃ dṛṣṭvaivaṃ samupādiśat // Rm_28.75{75} //
K14ratnml_u:11381: samyag dharmaṃ pravakṣyāmi yuṣmākaṃ paribodhane // Rm_28.76{76} //
K14ratnml_u:11383: lokas tasya phalaṃ bhukte karttā nānyo 'sti kasya cit // Rm_28.77{77} //
K14ratnml_u:11384: iti sarve kṛpāviṣṭās trailokye guravo jināḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11385: uktavantas tathā tad dhi karmaṇo yasya yat phalaṃ // Rm_28.78{78} //
K14ratnml_u:11388: saṃvaddhyānyāñ ca hi santi saṃjīvaṃ yānti te dhruvaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:11390: saṃjīvanti yatas tatra tena saṃjīva ucyate // Rm_28.81{81/} //
K14ratnml_u:11394: jvaladbhiḥ krakacais tatra kālasūtras tataḥ smṛtaḥ // Rm_28.83{83} //
K14ratnml_u:11395: dāvādau dahanair dāhaṃ dehināṃ vidadhāti ye /
K14ratnml_u:11396: sa tīvrajvalanair jantus tapyate tapane raṭan // Rm_28.84{84} //
K14ratnml_u:11399: yat tato 'nvartham āloke khyātas tapanasaṃjñayā // Rm_28.85{85} //
K14ratnml_u:11401: saṃtāpayati cānyāṃś ca tapyate sa pratāpane // Rm_28.86{86} //
K14ratnml_u:11405: anyāṃś ca prāṇino ghnaṃti saṃghātaṃ yānti te narāḥ // Rm_28.88{88} //
K14ratnml_u:11407: tasmāt saṃghāta ity evaṃ vikhyāto 'nvarthasaṃjñayā // Rm_28.89{89} //
K14ratnml_u:11409: kaṭukyapaṭikā ye ca rauravaṃ yānti te nārāḥ // Rm_28.90{90} //
K14ratnml_u:11411: raudraṃ ravaṃ vimuṃcanti yatas tasmāt sa rauravaṃ // Rm_28.91{91} //
K14ratnml_u:11412: devadvijaguror dravyaṃ hṛtaṃ yair duḥkhinām iha /
K14ratnml_u:11413: te mahārauravaṃ yānti ye cānyasvāpahāriṇaḥ // Rm_28.92{92} //
K14ratnml_u:11415: rauravo hi mahāṃs tasya mantva rauravād api // Rm_28.93{93} //
K14ratnml_u:11416: kṛtvā guṇādhike tīvram apakāraṃ nihatya ca /
K14ratnml_u:11417: mātāpitṛgurun kalpam avīcau pacyate dhruvaṃ // Rm_28.94{94} //
K14ratnml_u:11418: asthīny api viśīryyante raudrāgnau tatra dehināṃ /
K14ratnml_u:11419: yato na vīciḥ saukhyasya nāvīcir udāhṛtaḥ // Rm_28.95{95} //
K14ratnml_u:11421: pāpād asinakhās te tu jāyante duḥkhabhāginaḥ // Rm_28.96{96} //
K14ratnml_u:11422: nakhā evāsayas teṣām āyasā jvalitāḥ kharāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11423: tair anyonyaṃ nikṛntanti yat tenāsinakhāḥ smṛtāḥ // Rm_28.97{97} //
K14ratnml_u:11425: balād ārohyata hraṃdan śālmalīḥ pāladārikaḥ // Rm_28.98{98} //
K14ratnml_u:11429: aśivaṃ kurvate chinnā viśvāsaghāṭino narāḥ // Rm_28.100{100} //
K14ratnml_u:11431: yāpyante kvathitaṃ tāmraṃ ye parasvāpahāriṇaḥ // Rm_28.101{1} //
K14ratnml_u:11432: krūraiḥ śvabhir ayodraṃṣṭraiḥ kṛtyante vivaśā bhṛśaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:11433: varṣakoṭi raṭanto 'pi ye narāḥ kheṭake ratāḥ // Rm_28.102{2} //
K14ratnml_u:11435: yāti vaitaraṇīṃ śaśvad vahninā dahyate naraḥ // Rm_28.103{3} //
K14ratnml_u:11437: karoti narake kradan sa cakreṇābhipīḍyate // Rm_28.104{4} //
K14ratnml_u:11438: pīḍā vahubhir ākāraiḥ kṛtā yair duḥkhinām iha /
K14ratnml_u:11439: pīḍyante te ciraṃ taptair yatra mudgaraparvataiḥ // Rm_28.105{5} //
K14ratnml_u:11442: kṣuradhārācitaṃ mārgaṃ gatvā krāmanti te narāḥ // Rm_28.106{6} //
K14ratnml_u:11444: bhūyo bhūyo mahākāyāḥ krandantas te śaracchataṃ // Rm_28.107{7} //
K14ratnml_u:11445: vrataṃ yas tu samāśritya saṃpanno parirakṣati /
K14ratnml_u:11447: aṇunāpi hi yaḥ kaścin mithyājīvena jīvati /
K14ratnml_u:11448: bhakṣyate krimibhiś caṇḍaiḥ saṃmagno gūthamṛttike // Rm_28.109{9} //
K14ratnml_u:11450: āyasai mukhalais taptaiḥ kṣobhyante te punaḥ punaḥ // Rm_28.110{10} //
K14ratnml_u:11453: sarveṣām eva duḥkhānāṃ vījaṃ mṛd vābhibhedataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11454: kāyavāgmānasaṃ karma pāpaṃ yat tad aṇv api varttayet /
K14ratnml_u:11457: yena rāgeṇa jāyante mūḍhāḥ kīṭādiyoniṣu // Rm_28.112{1} //
K14ratnml_u:11461: jāyante mukharā dhṛṣṭāś capalātmānaś ca vāyasāḥ // Rm_28.114{3} //
K14ratnml_u:11465: jāyante pretamansādoḥ krodhanā matsarā narāḥ // Rm_28.116{5} //
K14ratnml_u:11467: bhavāntatyāgino darppāt krodhāc ca garuḍeśvarāḥ // Rm_28.117{6} //
K14ratnml_u:11468: kṛtaṃ yat pāpakaṃ karma svayaṃ vākkāyamānasaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:11469: tiryañcas tena jāyante tan manogatim ākṛthāḥ // Rm_28.118{7} //
K14ratnml_u:11472: bhavanti kuṇapāhārāḥ pretās te kaṭapūtanāḥ // Rm_28.119{1} //
K14ratnml_u:11473: viheṭhayanti ye bālā vaṃcayanty api tṛṣṇayā /
K14ratnml_u:11476: jāyaṃte ye narāḥ pretā 'ṣṭās te galagaṇḍakāḥ // Rm_28.121{3} //
K14ratnml_u:11477: dānaṃ nivārayaty eva na hi kiṃ tid dadāti yaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11478: kṣutkṣāmāsau mahākukṣiḥ pretaḥ śūcimukho bhavet // Rm_28.122{4} //
K14ratnml_u:11479: dhanaṃ rakṣati vaṃśārthe na bhuṃkte na dadāti yaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11480: dattādāyī tataḥ pretaḥ śrāddhabhoktā sa jāyate // Rm_28.123{5} //
K14ratnml_u:11482: bhoktā viṭśleṣmavāntānāṃ pretya pretaḥ sa jāyate // Rm_28.124{6} //
K14ratnml_u:11483: apriyaṃ vakti yaḥ krodhād vākyaṃ marmavibhedataṃ /
K14ratnml_u:11484: bbavanty ulkāmukhaḥ pretaḥ suciraṃ tena karmaṇā // Rm_28.125{7} //
K14ratnml_u:11486: kurute kalahaṃ yas tu niṣkṛpaḥ krūramānasaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11488: grāmakūṭau dadāty eva yo janaṃ pīḍayanty api /
K14ratnml_u:11489: kumbhāṇḍo vikṛtākāraḥ pūyāhāraś ca jāyate // Rm_28.127{9} //
K14ratnml_u:11490: nirdayāḥ prāṇino ghnanti bhakṣyārthaṃ ye dadanty api /
K14ratnml_u:11491: māṃsāhārāś ca te 'vaśyaṃ bhavanti pretarākṣasāḥ // Rm_28.128{10} //
K14ratnml_u:11493: gaṃdharvāḥ pretya jāyante devānāṃ ratihetavaḥ // Rm_28.129{11} //
K14ratnml_u:11495: sa piśācaṃ praduṣṭātmā jāyate vikṛtānanaḥ // Rm_28.130{12} //
K14ratnml_u:11497: saṃpradānaratā nityaṃ bhūtāḥ pretya bhavanti te // Rm_28.131{13} //
K14ratnml_u:11498: krūrāḥ krūddhāḥ pradātāraḥ priyā sarvasurā ca ye /
K14ratnml_u:11499: jāyante pretya yakṣās tu krūrātmānaḥ surāpriyāḥ // Rm_28.132{14} //
K14ratnml_u:11503: yakṣādayaḥ śubhaiḥ kliṣṭair atas tān parivarjayet // Rm_28.134{16} //
K14ratnml_u:11506: jāyate hinsayā svalpām ato hiṃsāṃ vivarjayet // Rm_28.135{1} //
K14ratnml_u:11509: yo na harttā parasvānāṃ na vañcavit prayachati /
K14ratnml_u:11510: mahatāpi prayatnena sa dravyaṃ nādhigachati // Rm_28.137{3} //
K14ratnml_u:11511: adattaṃ vittam ādāya dānāni ca dadāti yaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11512: sa pretya dravyavān bhūtvā bhūyo bhavati nirdhanaḥ // Rm_28.138{4} //
K14ratnml_u:11513: yo na harttā na dātā ca na cātikṛpaṇo naraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11514: kṛtsnena mahatā dravyaṃ sthiraṃ sa labhate dhruvaṃ // Rm_28.139{5} //
K14ratnml_u:11515: na harttā yaḥ parasvānāṃ tyāgavān vītamatsaraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11516: ahāryaṃ vipulaṃ vittam iṣṭam ca labhate naraḥ // Rm_28.140{6} //
K14ratnml_u:11518: sukhī ca sa labhen nityaṃ yo dadātīha bhojanaṃ // Rm_28.141{7} //
K14ratnml_u:11519: salajjo rūpavān bhogī suchāyaḥ prāṇināṃ priyaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11520: sa bhaved vastralābhī ca yo vāsānsi prayachati // Rm_28.142{8} //
K14ratnml_u:11522: prāsādāḥ sarvakāmāś ca jāyante tasya dehinaḥ // Rm_28.143{9} //
K14ratnml_u:11524: bhavanti sukhino nityaṃ yānāni ca labhanti te // Rm_28.144{10} //
K14ratnml_u:11526: sukhinas tyaktasaṃtāpā niḥpipāsā bhavanti te // Rm_28.145{11} //
K14ratnml_u:11528: samṛddhitaḥ sa syād ārāmaṃ yaḥ prayachati // Rm_28.146{12} //
K14ratnml_u:11535: balavān varṇavān bhogī dīrghāyuḥ sa bhaven naraḥ // Rm_28.149{15} //
K14ratnml_u:11538: patraṃ puṣpaṃ phalaṃ toyam abhayaṃ vacanaṃ priyaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:11539: yad yad evepsitaṃ śaktyā dātavyaṃ tat tad arthinaḥ // Rm_28.151{17} //
K14ratnml_u:11540: kleśayitvā dadātīha svakārthaṃ vā ha yena vā /
K14ratnml_u:11541: yaśaḥsaukhyābhilākhād vā sa kliṣṭaṃ labhate phalaṃ // Rm_28.152{18} //
K14ratnml_u:11543: parārthaṃ yo dadātīha so 'kliṣṭaṃ phalam aśnute // Rm_28.153{19} //
K14ratnml_u:11545: tena tena prakāreṇa tat sarvam upatiṣṭhate // Rm_28.154{20} //
K14ratnml_u:11549: dānaṃ hi sarvasaukhyānām ananyat kāraṇaṃ mataṃ // Rm_28.156{22} //
K14ratnml_u:11551: svebhyo 'py adeśakālau ca varjayet puṃstvam archati // Rm_28.157{23} //
K14ratnml_u:11552: paradāreṣu saṃsaktaṃ cittaṃ yo na niyachati /
K14ratnml_u:11553: anaṃgeṣu cakṣyeta sa pumāṃ strītvam archati // Rm_28.158{24} //
K14ratnml_u:11555: puṃstvam ākāṃkṣate nityaṃ sā nārī naratāṃ vrajet // Rm_28.159{25} //
K14ratnml_u:11557: tejasvī sadguṇaḥ śrīmān devair api sa lakṣyate // Rm_28.160{26} //
K14ratnml_u:11559: jāyate satyavādī ca yaśaḥsaukhyānvitaḥ pumān // Rm_28.161{27} //
K14ratnml_u:11560: bhinnānām api satvānāṃ bhedaṃ naiva karoti yaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11562: yas tv ājñāṃ kurute nityaṃ gurūṇāṃ hṛṣṭamānasaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11563: hitāhitābhidhāyī ca sa syād ādeyavākkṛtī // Rm_28.163{29} //
K14ratnml_u:11565: bhavanti sukhinaḥ saukhyaṃ duḥkhaṃ datvā ca duḥkhinaḥ // Rm_28.164{30} //
K14ratnml_u:11567: kubjavāmanatāṃ yānti ye ca rūpābhimāninaḥ // Rm_28.165{31} //
K14ratnml_u:11570: duḥkham pāpasya puṇyasya sukhaṃ miśrasya miśritaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:11571: sarvaṃ sādṛśyaniḥsyandam abhyuhyaṃ karmaṇaḥ phalaṃ // Rm_28.167{33} //
K14ratnml_u:11574: kalipriyaḥ pradātā ca sa bhaved asureśvaraḥ // Rm_28.168{1} //
K14ratnml_u:11577: nātmanā yaḥ sukhākāṃkṣī na ca kṛvyeta parigrahaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:11578: grahāṇām agraṇī cāsau mahārājikatāṃ vrajet // Rm_28.169{1} //
K14ratnml_u:11580: hṛṣyame yo na kalahais tridaśeṣu sa jāyate // Rm_28.170{2} //
K14ratnml_u:11581: na vigrahe ratā naiva kalahe hṛṣṭamānasāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11582: ekāntakuśalodyuktā ye ca moyāpagās tu te // Rm_28.171{3} //
K14ratnml_u:11584: ye parihṛṣṇāś ca narās te tuṣitopagāḥ // Rm_28.172{4} //
K14ratnml_u:11588: guṇādhikāś ca ye yānti paranirmitatāṃ dhruvaṃ // Rm_28.174{6} //
K14ratnml_u:11589: śīlena svargam āpnoti dhyānena ca viśeṣataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11591: śubhāśubhaphalaṃ karma yad etat kathitaṃ sphuṭaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:11592: śubhena labhyate saukhyaṃ duḥkhaṃ tv aśubhasaṃbhavaṃ // Rm_28.176{8} //
K14ratnml_u:11593: mṛtyur vyādhir jarā caiva cintanīyam idaṃ trayaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:11594: viprayogā priyaiḥ sārddhaṃ karmaṇāṃ ca svakaṃ phalaṃ // Rm_28.177{9} //
K14ratnml_u:11595: evaṃ virāgam āpnoti viviktaḥ puṇyam archati /
K14ratnml_u:11596: pāpaṃ ca nārjayed evaṃ tac ca saṃkṣepataḥ śṛṇu // Rm_28.178{10} //
K14ratnml_u:11598: puṇyaṃ viparyayāt pāpabhuktam eva munīśvaraiḥ // Rm_28.179{11} //
K14ratnml_u:11601: saṃbodhidharmam ādhāya caritavyaṃ sadā śubhe // Rm_28.180{1} //
K14ratnml_u:11604: evaṃ vijñāya rājendra sadā bhadraṃ yadīchasi /
K14ratnml_u:11605: triratnaṃ śaraṇaṃ kṛtvā bhaja nityaṃ samādarāt // Rm_28.182{3} //
K14ratnml_u:11607: kramād bodhiṃ samāsādya saṃbuddhapadam āpnuyāḥ // Rm_28.183{4} //
K14ratnml_u:11608: iti tena munīndreṇa samākhyātaṃ niśamya saḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11610: tataḥ sa nṛpatī rājā samutthāya kṛtāṃjaliḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11611: bhagavantam ānatvā prārthayad evam ādarāt // Rm_28.185{6} //
K14ratnml_u:11612: bhagavan nātha sarvajña bhavatāṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11613: saṃbodhivratam ādhāya prechāmi carituṃ sadā // Rm_28.186{7} //
K14ratnml_u:11615: tan me 'nugrahatāṃ kṛtvā pravrajyāṃ dātum arhati // Rm_28.187{8} //
K14ratnml_u:11616: iti saṃprārthite tena rājñā sa bhagavān sudhīḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11617: tasya rājño manaḥśuddhaṃ vijñāyaivam upādiśat // Rm_28.188{9} //
K14ratnml_u:11618: sādhu rājan mahābhāga yadīchasi śubhāṃ gatiṃ /
K14ratnml_u:11619: ehi cara samādhāya cara me śāsane vrataṃ // Rm_28.189{10} //
K14ratnml_u:11620: ity ādiśya munīndro 'sau pāṇinā tac chiraḥ spṛśan /
K14ratnml_u:11622: saṃbuddhe śāsane dharme taṃ nareṃdraṃ samagrahīt // Rm_28.190{11} //
K14ratnml_u:11623: ehīti tena śāstrokte nṛpatiḥ sa prabodhitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11625: tataḥ sa bhūpatiś cāpi virakto bhogyanispṛhaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11629: tataḥ sa brahmavid yogī traidhātuvāsinām api /
K14ratnml_u:11632: utthāya sāṃjalir natvā prārthyat taṃ munīśvaraṃ // Rm_28.195{16} //
K14ratnml_u:11633: bhagavan nātha sarvajña kṛpayā me prasīdatu /
K14ratnml_u:11634: traimāsyaṃ bhaktum ichāmi tat kurutām anugrahaṃ // Rm_28.196{17} //
K14ratnml_u:11635: iti saṃprārthite rājñā bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11636: nṛpatiṃ taṃ samālokya tūṣṇībhūtvādhyuvāsa tat // Rm_28.197{18} //
K14ratnml_u:11642: āchādya sāṃjalir natvā praṇidhānaṃ mudā vyadhāt // Rm_28.200{21} //
K14ratnml_u:11644: saddharmabhāskaraḥ śāstā saṃbuddho 'rhaṃ bhaveya hi // Rm_28.201{22} //
K14ratnml_u:11645: evaṃ tena narendreṇa praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ mudā /
K14ratnml_u:11646: matvā sa bhagavān smitaṃ prāmuñcac chubharociṣaṃ // Rm_28.202{23} //
K14ratnml_u:11651: tadā te vismitāḥ sarve nārakīyāḥ pramoditāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11652: kim evaṃ jāyate saukhyam iti dhyātvā niṣedire // Rm_28.205{26} //
K14ratnml_u:11654: manāṃsi paribodhārthaṃ praiṣayat tatra nairmitaṃ // Rm_28.206{27} //
K14ratnml_u:11655: tadā te nārakāḥ sarve dṛṣṭvā taṃ sugataṃ mudā /
K14ratnml_u:11656: upetya praṇatiṃ kṛtvā prābhajañ charaṇaṃ gatāḥ // Rm_28.207{28} //
K14ratnml_u:11657: tatas tat puṇyaliptās te sarve vimuktapāpakāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11659: tatas tā raśmayaḥ sarvā avabhāsya samaṃtataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11661: gāthāghoṣaiś ca sarvatra sarvān devān pramodinaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11662: bodhayitvā śubhe dharme pratiṣṭhāpya pacerire // Rm_28.210{31} //
K14ratnml_u:11663: tatas tā raśmayaḥ sarvā piṇḍībhūtā muneḥ puraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11667: śāstā kim ādiśed dharmam iti dhyātvā niṣedire // Rm_28.212{33} //
K14ratnml_u:11669: upetya sāṃjalir natvā prārthayet taṃ munīśvaraṃ // Rm_28.213{34} //
K14ratnml_u:11670: bhagavan hetunā kena smitaṃ muṃcati sāṃprataṃ /
K14ratnml_u:11671: nāhetvapratyayaṃ smitaṃ na muṃcaṃti munīśvarāḥ // Rm_28.214{35} //
K14ratnml_u:11672: tad yadarthe bhavān smitaṃ muṃcatīme sabhājanāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11673: śrotum ichaṃti sarve tad artham ādeṣṭum arhati // Rm_28.215{36} //
K14ratnml_u:11674: ity ānaṃdoditaṃ śrutvā bhagavān sa jagadguruḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11675: sarvāṃl lokān samālokya tam ānaṃdaṃ samabravīt // Rm_28.216{37} //
K14ratnml_u:11676: evam eva sadānaṃda sarve buddhā munīśvarāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11677: nāhetupratyayaṃ smitaṃ vimuṃcanti kadā cana // Rm_28.217{38} //
K14ratnml_u:11679: satkṛtya śraddhayāsmākaṃ traimāsyaṃ bhajate mudā // Rm_28.218{39} //
K14ratnml_u:11681: kramāt pāramitāḥ sarvāḥ paripūrya balānvitaḥ // Rm_28.219{40} //
K14ratnml_u:11683: bodhim āsādya sarvajñas tathāgato munīśvaraḥ // Rm_28.220{41} //
K14ratnml_u:11685: vijayo nāma saṃbuddho bhaviṣyati bhavāntare // Rm_28.221{42} //
K14ratnml_u:11689: saṃbodhivāñchibhir lokaiś caritavyaṃ śubhe mudā // Rm_28.223{44} //
K14ratnml_u:11691: sarve lokās tathety uktvā prābhyanandan prasāditāḥ // Rm_28.224{45} //
K14ratnml_u:11693: triratnabhajanaṃ kṛtvā pracacāra śubhe sadā // Rm_28.225{46} //
K14ratnml_u:11696: iti me guruṇākhyātaṃ śrutaṃ mayā tathā 'dhunā /
K14ratnml_u:11697: kathyate 'tra tvayāpy evaṃ caritavyaṃ śubhe sadā // Rm_28.227{48} //
K14ratnml_u:11699: bodhimārge pratiṣṭhāpya pālanīyāḥ sadā tvayā // Rm_28.228{49} //
K14ratnml_u:11700: tathā te sarvadā bhadraṃ sarvatrāpi bhaved dhruvaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:11701: kramād bodhiṃ samāsādya saṃbuddhapadam āpnuyāḥ // Rm_28.229{50} //
K14ratnml_u:11704: rājño pāñcālayor yan munikathitam idaṃ tat prasiddhāvadānaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:11705: śṛṇvanti śrāvayanti pramuditamanasaḥ śraddhayā ye prasannāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11707: kṛtvā lokeṣu bhaddraṃ munivaranilaye saṃprayānti pramodāḥ // Rm_28.231{52} //
K14ratnml_u:11713: upaguptaṃ yatiṃ natvā prārthayad evam ādarāt // Rm_29.1{1} //
K14ratnml_u:11714: bhadanta śrotum ichāmi punar anyat subhāṣitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:11715: tadyathā guruṇādiṣṭaṃ tathākhyātuṃ ca me 'rhati // Rm_29.2{2} //
K14ratnml_u:11716: iti saṃprarthitaṃ rājñā śrutvā so 'rhan mahāmatiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11717: upagupto nareṃdraṃ taṃ samālokyaivam ādiśat // Rm_29.3{3} //
K14ratnml_u:11718: sādhu śṛṇu maharāja yathā me guruṇoditaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:11719: tathāhaṃ te pravakṣyāmi śrutvā cāpy anumodaya // Rm_29.4{4} //
K14ratnml_u:11721: sarvajñaḥ sugataḥ śāstā dharmarājo vināyakaḥ // Rm_29.5{5} //
K14ratnml_u:11724: tatra sa bhagavān gatvā suramye naṃdane vane /
K14ratnml_u:11726: tatra śakrādayo devāḥ sarve taṃ sadguṇākaraṃ /
K14ratnml_u:11728: tatra taṃ śrīghanaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve devāḥ pramoditāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11734: tadā sā jananī mātā māyādevī samāgatā /
K14ratnml_u:11735: tam ātmajaṃ jagannāthaṃ saṃdṛṣṭvā samupācarat // Rm_29.12{12} //
K14ratnml_u:11736: tatra sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā mātaraṃ tāṃ samāgatāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:11738: svāgataṃ kuśalaṃ mātar ārogyam astu te sadā /
K14ratnml_u:11739: tvatmukhaṃ draṣṭum āyāmi tat prasāditum arhasi // Rm_29.14{14} //
K14ratnml_u:11741: upadikṣyāmi saddharmaṃ tac chṛṇuṣva samāhitā // Rm_29.15{15} //
K14ratnml_u:11742: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā sā jananī satī /
K14ratnml_u:11743: māyādevī samālokya tam ātmajaṃ samavrāvīt // Rm_29.16{16} //
K14ratnml_u:11744: prāyāmi te mukhaṃ draṣṭuṃ kuśalaṃ te sadātmaja /
K14ratnml_u:11745: tan mamānugrahārthena dharmam ādeṣṭum arhasi // Rm_29.17{17} //
K14ratnml_u:11746: ity uktvā sā satī māyādevī mātā jagadguroḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11748: tataḥ śakrādayo devāḥ sarve te saṃpraharṣitāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11750: pūjāṃgais taṃ jagannāthaṃ māyādevīṃ ca prārcayan // Rm_29.19{19} //
K14ratnml_u:11751: tataḥ pādāns tayor natvā kṛtvā ca tripradakṣiṇaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:11752: parivṛtya puraskṛtvā dharmaṃ śrotum upāśrayan // Rm_29.20{20} //
K14ratnml_u:11753: tatas ta bhagavān dṛṣṭvā tān devān samupasthitān /
K14ratnml_u:11755: tataś ca bhagavāṃs teṣāṃ devānāṃ sukhamāninaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:11757: anityaṃ khalu saṃsāre duḥkhaṃ śūnyaṃ hy anātmakaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:11758: kāme kiṃcit sukhaṃ nātra kleśasaṃghe samākule // Rm_29.23{23} //
K14ratnml_u:11759: iti matvātra saṃsāre sadā saukhyaṃ yadīchatha /
K14ratnml_u:11760: bodhicaryāvrataṃ dhṛtvā saṃcaradhvaṃ sadā śubhaṃ // Rm_29.24{24} //
K14ratnml_u:11764: sa samyag bodhim āsādya saṃbuddhapadam āpsyati // Rm_29.26{25} //
K14ratnml_u:11765: evaṃ matvātra saṃsāre sarve yūyaṃ samāhitāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11767: ye triratnaṃ bhajanty atra na te gachaṃti durgatiṃ /
K14ratnml_u:11768: sadā sadgatisaṃyātāḥ kramād bodhim avāpnuyuḥ // Rm_29.28{27} //
K14ratnml_u:11769: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā sarve 'pi te 'marāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11770: satyam eva parijñāya prābhyanandan prabodhitāḥ // Rm_29.29{28} //
K14ratnml_u:11772: bhagavaṃtaṃ tam ānamya prārthayad evam ādarāt // Rm_29.30{29} //
K14ratnml_u:11774: saddharmaṃ naḥ samādiśya bhavan vihartum arhati // Rm_29.31{30} //
K14ratnml_u:11775: vayaṃ sarve surā nityaṃ bhavatāṃ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11776: saddharmaṃ sarvadākarṇya cariṣyāmaḥ śubhāṃ cariṃ // Rm_29.32{31} //
K14ratnml_u:11778: upetya sāṃjalir natvā bhagavantaṃ tam abravīt // Rm_29.33{32} //
K14ratnml_u:11779: dhanyo 'si yat tvayā putra pratijñātaṃ yathāpurā /
K14ratnml_u:11780: tathā tvaṃ pūryate sarvaṃ sarvārthasiddhir astu te // Rm_29.34{33} //
K14ratnml_u:11783: iti mātrārthitaṃ śrutvā bhagavān sa jagadguruḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11784: jananīṃ tāṃ sabhāṃ cāpi samālokyaivam ādiśat // Rm_29.36{35} //
K14ratnml_u:11786: sarveṣām api satvānāṃ hitārthe 'haṃ jino bhave // Rm_29.37{36} //
K14ratnml_u:11787: tad atra sarvadā naivaṃ tiṣṭheyaṃ tridaśaiḥ saha /
K14ratnml_u:11788: varṣā māsatrayaṃ sthātum ichāmi dharmam ādiśan // Rm_29.38{37} //
K14ratnml_u:11789: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā sā jananī mudā /
K14ratnml_u:11790: tathāstv iti prabhāṣitvā prābhyanaṃdat prabodhitā // Rm_29.39{38} //
K14ratnml_u:11791: tathā sa bhagavāns tatra bodhicaryāṃ prakāśayan /
K14ratnml_u:11792: saddharmaṃ samupādiśya tasthau māsatrayaṃ divi // Rm_29.40{39} //
K14ratnml_u:11795: satkṛtya śraddhayā nityaṃ dharmaṃ śrutvā prabhejire // Rm_29.41{40} //
K14ratnml_u:11796: tadā tatra sadā svarge maṃgalaṃ nirupadravaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:11798: tasmiṃś cā samaye tatra srāvastyā vahir āśrame /
K14ratnml_u:11799: jetodyāne vihāre sa maudgalyāyana āśrayat // Rm_29.43{42} //
K14ratnml_u:11800: tadā te sāṃghikāḥ sarve taṃ maudgalyāyanaṃ yatiṃ /
K14ratnml_u:11801: vihāre saṃsthitaṃ dṛṣṭvā dharmaṃ śrotuṃ samīchire // Rm_29.44{43} //
K14ratnml_u:11802: tatas te sāṃghikāḥ sarve lokāś cānye 'pi sajjanāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11803: tat saddharmadeśanāṃ śrotuṃ muditāḥ samupācaran // Rm_29.45{44} //
K14ratnml_u:11804: tatra sarve 'pi te lokās taṃ maudgalyāyanaṃ guruṃ /
K14ratnml_u:11805: samabhyarcya samānamya dharmaṃ śrotu]m upāśrayan // Rm_29.46{45} //
K14ratnml_u:11806: tān dṛṣṭvā samupāsīnān sa maudgalyo jinātmajaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11808: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pītvā sarve lokāś ca sāṃghikāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11810: atha te bhikṣavaḥ sarve kṛtāṃjaliḥ puṭo mudā /
K14ratnml_u:11811: taṃ maudgalyāyanaṃ natvā paprachur evam ādarāt // Rm_29.49{48} //
K14ratnml_u:11813: saddharmaṃ samupādiśya viharati na manyate // Rm_29.50{49} //
K14ratnml_u:11814: tad asmākaṃ manānsy atra bhagavāñ chāstā yataḥ sthitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11815: tat satyaṃ samupādiśya prabodhayitum arhati // Rm_29.51{50} //
K14ratnml_u:11816: iti taiḥ prārthitaṃ śrutvā sa maudgalyāyanaḥ sudhīḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11817: sarvāns tān saṃghikān bhikṣūn samālokyaivam abravīt // Rm_29.52{51} //
K14ratnml_u:11818: śrutaṃ mayā bhavanto 'sau bhagavāñ chāstā 'dhunā divi /
K14ratnml_u:11819: tato mātuḥ surāṇāṃ cā tiṣṭhate dharmam ādiśat // Rm_29.53{52} //
K14ratnml_u:11821: atra lokahitaṃ kartum avataret svayaṃ khalu // Rm_29.54{53} //
K14ratnml_u:11822: iti tenārhatākhyātaṃ śrutvā te sāṃghikā janāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11824: sadā te sāṃghikās tasya maudgalyasya mahāmateḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11826: tato varṣātrimāsānte sarve te sāṃghikā janāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11827: api taṃ maudgalyam ānatvā prārthayad evam ādarāt // Rm_29.57{56} //
K14ratnml_u:11829: draṣṭum ichāmahe śāstuḥ saddharmaṃ tṛṣitā vayaṃ // Rm_29.58{57} //
K14ratnml_u:11830: ciradṛṣṭo yad asmābhir bhagavāṃ sa munīśvaraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11831: tad asyāgramunīndrasya darśanaṃ dātum arhati // Rm_29.59{58} //
K14ratnml_u:11833: gatvā svarge munīndrasya sahasā samupakramet // Rm_29.60{59} //
K14ratnml_u:11834: tatra gatvā bhavāc chāstur munīndrasya jagadguroḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11835: asmākaṃ vacanaiś cāpi vaṃdatāṃ caraṇāmbujau // Rm_29.61{60} //
K14ratnml_u:11837: dehe ca kauśalaṃ saukhyaṃ pṛchatāṃ vacanaiś ca naḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11838: evaṃ cāpi puraḥ śāstur nivedituṃ samarhati // Rm_29.62{61} //
K14ratnml_u:11839: bhagavaṃ nātha sarvajña te jāmbūdvīpikā narāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11841: yad bhavān sarvasatvānāṃ hitaṃ kartuṃ samudyataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11842: tad bhagavān manuṣyāṇāṃ dharmam ādeṣṭum arhati // Rm_29.64{63} //
K14ratnml_u:11843: narāḥ svarge samāgaṃtuṃ śaknuvanti na ke cana /
K14ratnml_u:11844: devās tu sarvalokeṣu pracaranti yathechayā // Rm_29.65{64} //
K14ratnml_u:11847: vayaṃ sarve sadā nityaṃ bhavatāṃ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11848: satkṛtya śraddhayā dharmmaṃ śrutvā saṃprabhajemahi // Rm_29.67{66} //
K14ratnml_u:11849: evaṃ śāstar mahāvijña gatvā tatra surālaye /
K14ratnml_u:11851: iti taiḥ prārthitaiḥ śrutvā sa maudgalyo mahārddhimān /
K14ratnml_u:11852: evam iti pratijñāya tūṣṇībhūtvādhyuvāsa tat // Rm_29.69{68} //
K14ratnml_u:11853: atha te sāṃghikāḥ sarve lokāś cāpi mahātmanā /
K14ratnml_u:11854: tenādhivāsitaṃ matvā muditāḥ svasvālayaṃ yayuḥ // Rm_29.70{69} //
K14ratnml_u:11856: svarge gaṃtuṃ samādhāya samādhiṃ vidadhe kṣaṇaṃ // Rm_29.71{70} //
K14ratnml_u:11857: tataḥ sa ṛddhivīryeṇa suparṇa iva khe 'gamat /
K14ratnml_u:11858: bhāsayan sahasā gatvā divi śāstur upācarat // Rm_29.72{71} //
K14ratnml_u:11859: tatra taṃ samupāyātaṃ dṛṣṭvā sa bhagavān mudā /
K14ratnml_u:11860: svāgataṃ prehi maudgalya niṣīdeti samabravīt // Rm_29.73{72} //
K14ratnml_u:11861: ity ādiṣṭe munīndreṇa sa maudgalyaḥ pramoditaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11862: sāñjaliḥ pādayoḥ śāstuḥ praṇatvaivaṃ samabravīt // Rm_29.74{73} //
K14ratnml_u:11863: bhagavan nātha sarvajña prāgato 'haṃ mudā divi /
K14ratnml_u:11864: bhavatāṃ darśanaṃ kartuṃ tat prasīda dayānidhe // Rm_29.75{74} //
K14ratnml_u:11865: kaccit te kuśalaṃ śāstaḥ kiñcid vādhāpi naiva hi /
K14ratnml_u:11866: yātrā sukhaṃ valaṃ vīryaṃ kaccit kāye na cānyathā // Rm_29.76{75} //
K14ratnml_u:11868: tathāpi bhagavann atra vijñāpayeya sarvathā // Rm_29.77{76} //
K14ratnml_u:11869: bhavatāṃ sāṃghikaiḥ sarvair lokaiś cāpi mahājanaiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11870: bhavantaṃ draṣṭum ichadbhiḥ preṣito 'ham ihāgataḥ // Rm_29.78{77} //
K14ratnml_u:11871: te sarve sāṃghikā lokā bhavatāṃ caraṇāmbuje /
K14ratnml_u:11872: vandanti kauśalaṃ kāye paripṛchanti cādarāt // Rm_29.79{78} //
K14ratnml_u:11873: evaṃ cāpi vadante te sarve lokāś ca sāṃghikāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11876: tat tathātra manuṣyāṇāṃ dharmam ādeṣṭum arhati // Rm_29.81{80} //
K14ratnml_u:11877: tataḥ svarge samāgaṃtuṃ śaknuvanti na ke cana /
K14ratnml_u:11878: devās tu sarvalokeṣu pracaranti yathechayā // Rm_29.82{81} //
K14ratnml_u:11882: vayaṃ sarve sadā nityaṃ bhavatāṃ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11883: satkṛtya śraddhayā dharmaṃ śrutvā saṃprabhajemahi // Rm_29.84{83} //
K14ratnml_u:11884: evam asmadvacobhis tvaṃ gatvā tatra surālaye /
K14ratnml_u:11887: bhavatāṃ vijñāpanāṃ kartuṃ sahasā samupācare // Rm_29.86{85} //
K14ratnml_u:11889: saddharmaṃ samupādeṣṭuṃ bhuvy eva tarttum arhati // Rm_29.87{86} //
K14ratnml_u:11890: iti tenārthitaṃ śrutvā bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11891: taṃ maudgalyāyanaṃ dṛṣṭvā tūṣṇībhūtvādhyuvāsa tat // Rm_29.88{87} //
K14ratnml_u:11892: tasmiṃś ca samaye tatra sarve śakrādayo 'marāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11895: parivṛtya puraskṛtya dharmaṃ śrotum upāśrayan // Rm_29.90{89} //
K14ratnml_u:11896: tadā sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā tān sarvan samupāśritān /
K14ratnml_u:11898: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pītvā sarve śakrādayo 'pi te /
K14ratnml_u:11900: tat samīkṣya sa maudgalyaḥ kiñcid vihasito mudā /
K14ratnml_u:11901: bhagavaṃtaṃ munīndraṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvaivaṃ samaciṃtayat // Rm_29.93{92} //
K14ratnml_u:11904: atha sa bhagavāṃs tasya maudgalyasya mahāmateḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11905: manaścintitam ājñāya taṃ maudgalyaṃ samabravīt // Rm_29.95{94} //
K14ratnml_u:11906: na me maudgalya satkāravaṃdhitaṃ bhavate manaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11907: api tv ahaṃ yathechāmi tathā sarvaṃ samṛddhyati // Rm_29.96{95} //
K14ratnml_u:11908: āyāntv ihāmarāḥ sarve iti mayā yadecchyate /
K14ratnml_u:11909: tadā sarva ime devā āgachaṃti samaṃtataḥ // Rm_29.97{96} //
K14ratnml_u:11910: gachantu ca surāḥ sarve iti mayā yadehyate /
K14ratnml_u:11911: tadā sarva ime devā gachaṃti ca svam ālayaṃ // Rm_29.98{97} //
K14ratnml_u:11913: tathātra sarvakāryāṇi siddhyaṃte hi sadā tadā // Rm_29.99{98} //
K14ratnml_u:11914: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā maudgalya ātmavit /
K14ratnml_u:11915: śāstuḥ pādāmbujau natvā sāṃjaliḥ samupāśrayat // Rm_29.100{99} //
K14ratnml_u:11916: tataḥ sabhāṃ surāṃ kīrṇāṃ sa maudgalyāyano yatiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11917: tāra sarvāṃ saṃnirīkṣyaivaṃ bhagavantam abhāṣata // Rm_29.101{100} //
K14ratnml_u:11919: nūnam ime surāḥ sarve saṃbuddhapadalābhinaḥ // Rm_29.102{1} //
K14ratnml_u:11920: santi hy asyāṃ sabhāyāṃ ye saṃbuddhe saṃprasāditāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11922: santi dharme prasannā ye āryaśīlaiḥ samanvitāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11927: iti maudgalyasaṃproktaṃ śrutvā sa bhagavāṃs tathā /
K14ratnml_u:11929: evam etad dhi maudgalya vicitreyaṃ mahāsabhā /
K14ratnml_u:11930: surendrapramukhā devā yatra santi pramoditāḥ // Rm_29.107{6} //
K14ratnml_u:11937: evaṃ śāstrā samākhyātaṃ śrutvā devādhipo 'pi saḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11938: bhagavaṃtaṃ samālokya maudgalyaṃ ca tathābravīt // Rm_29.111{10} //
K14ratnml_u:11941: santi buddhe prasannā ye śraddhayā śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11943: saṃti dharme prasannā ye śraddhayā śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11945: santi dharme prasannā ye śraddhayā śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11947: saṃti saṃghe prasannā ye śraddhayā śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11950: maudgalyaṃ śrīghanaṃ cāpi śakraṃ caikṣyaivam abravīt // Rm_29.117{16} //
K14ratnml_u:11953: santi saṃghe prasannā ye satkṛtya prabhajanti te /
K14ratnml_u:11955: santi dharme prasannā ye bhajanti śraddhayā mudā /
K14ratnml_u:11957: santi buddhe prasannā ye bhajaṃti śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11960: munīndraśakradevaiś ca śrutvā sarve surā mudā // Rm_29.122{21} //
K14ratnml_u:11962: tatra sarve 'pi te devās triratnabhajanodyatāḥ // Rm_29.123{22} //
K14ratnml_u:11964: tatas tāṃ śrīghanaṃ nātvā maudgalyaṃ ca prasāditāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11965: te śakrādayo devāḥ sarve svasvālayāṃ yayuḥ // Rm_29.125{24} //
K14ratnml_u:11967: bhagavantaṃ tam ānamya sāṃjalir evam abravīt // Rm_29.126{25} //
K14ratnml_u:11970: atra sarve surā bhadraiś caranti bodhimānasāḥ // Rm_29.127{26} //
K14ratnml_u:11971: tat tatrāpi manuṣyāṇāṃ hitāya bhagavān api /
K14ratnml_u:11974: bhagavāṃs taṃ mahāsatvaṃ maudgalyam evam ādiśat // Rm_29.129{28} //
K14ratnml_u:11978: sāṃkāśe nagare hy āpajjure vana udumvare // Rm_29.131{30} //
K14ratnml_u:11979: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā maudgalya ātmavit /
K14ratnml_u:11980: tatheti prativijñapya tathā kartuṃ samaichata // Rm_29.132{31} //
K14ratnml_u:11981: atha sa ṛddhimān yogī maudgalyāyana ātmavit /
K14ratnml_u:11982: sāṃjalis taṃ muniṃ natvā samādhiṃ vidadhe tadā // Rm_29.133{32} //
K14ratnml_u:11984: kṣaṇāt pakṣī yathākāśāj jambudvīpam avātarat // Rm_29.134{33} //
K14ratnml_u:11988: matvā te sāṃghikāḥ sarve muditāḥ samupācaran // Rm_29.136{35} //
K14ratnml_u:11989: tac chrutvā muditāḥ sarve lokāś cāpi nṛpādayaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:11992: dṛṣṭvā sarve 'pi te natvā parivṛtyopatasthire // Rm_29.138{37} //
K14ratnml_u:11993: tatas te bhikṣavaḥ sarve maudgalyaṃ taṃ maharddhikaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:11994: kṛtāṃjalipuṭā natvā paprachur evam ādarāt // Rm_29.139{38} //
K14ratnml_u:11996: kutra sa bhagavān dharmam ādiśaṃs tiṣṭhate divi // Rm_29.140{39} //
K14ratnml_u:11997: kadā sa bhagavāṃc chāstā svargād iha samācaret /
K14ratnml_u:11998: kathaṃ cāpi samākhyāti tat sarvaṃ samupādiśa // Rm_29.141{40} //
K14ratnml_u:11999: iti taiḥ prārthitaṃ śrutvā sa maudgalyāyano yatiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12000: tāṃ sarvān saṃghikāl lokāṃś cāpi dṛṣṭvaivam abravīt // Rm_29.142{41} //
K14ratnml_u:12001: bhavantaḥ kuśalaṃ śāstu munīndrasya mamāpi ca /
K14ratnml_u:12002: yuṣmākam api nāmno 'ham avandaṃ taṃ munīśvaraṃ // Rm_29.143{42} //
K14ratnml_u:12004: mātuḥ sa bhagavān dharmam ādiśaṃs tiṣṭhate divi // Rm_29.144{43} //
K14ratnml_u:12005: yathā yuṣmābhir ākhyātaṃ tathā niveditaṃ mayā /
K14ratnml_u:12006: śrutvā sa bhagavāṃc chāstā mamaivaṃ samupādiśat // Rm_29.145{44} //
K14ratnml_u:12010: etad yūyaṃ parijñāya prābhyanandata sāṃprataṃ // Rm_29.147{46} //
K14ratnml_u:12011: iti tenārhatākhyātaṃ śrutvā te saṃghikā mudā /
K14ratnml_u:12012: sevaṃ nṛpādi lokāś ca prābhyanandan pramoditāḥ // Rm_29.148{47} //
K14ratnml_u:12014: tatas te sāṃghikāḥ sarve lokā bhūpādayo 'pi ca /
K14ratnml_u:12016: tadā sa bhagavāṃs tatra svarge sendrān surān api /
K14ratnml_u:12017: mātaraṃ samupāmaṃtrya pura evam upādiśat // Rm_29.150{49} //
K14ratnml_u:12018: mātaḥ sendrādi devāś ca yūyaṃ sarve samādarāt /
K14ratnml_u:12019: triratnabhajanaṃ kṛtvā pracaradhvaṃ sadā śubhe // Rm_29.151{50} //
K14ratnml_u:12021: nṛṇām api hitārthena gantum ichāmi nānyathā // Rm_29.152{51} //
K14ratnml_u:12022: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa sarve sendrāḥ surā api /
K14ratnml_u:12023: mātāpi sāṃjalir natvā prārthayat taṃ munīśvaraṃ // Rm_29.153{52} //
K14ratnml_u:12024: bhagavan nātha sarvajña ko 'smākaṃ dharmam ādiśet /
K14ratnml_u:12025: tad atra kṛpayā dharmam ādeṣṭuṃ sthātum arhati // Rm_29.154{53} //
K14ratnml_u:12026: iti taiḥ prārthite bhūyo bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12027: mātaraṃ tān surān sarvān dṛṣṭvaivaṃ ca samādiśat // Rm_29.155{54} //
K14ratnml_u:12028: mātar nāhaṃ sadaikatra tiṣṭheyaṃ dharmam ādiśan /
K14ratnml_u:12030: tan mātar aham ālokya martyānāṃ hitakāmpayā /
K14ratnml_u:12032: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā mātā surā api /
K14ratnml_u:12033: sendrāḥ sarve 'pi te śāstuḥ pādāmbuje praṇemire // Rm_29.158{57} //
K14ratnml_u:12034: tatas te tridaśāḥ sarve mātāpi tasya tāyinaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12035: tridhā pradakṣiṇīkṛtya natvā svasvālayaṃ yayuḥ // Rm_29.159{58} //
K14ratnml_u:12036: tataḥ sa bhagavāṃs tatra devālaye samāhitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12037: tat samādhiṃ samādhāya kṣaṇād antarhito 'carat // Rm_29.160{59} //
K14ratnml_u:12038: tataḥ sa bhagavāṃs tatra jambudvīpe prabhāsayan /
K14ratnml_u:12043: sarve te sāṃghikā lokā bhūpādayo 'py upācaran // Rm_29.163{62} //
K14ratnml_u:12044: tatra taṃ śrīghanaṃ natvā sarve te saṃpramoditāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12047: daityā vidyādharā nāgā garuḍāḥ siddhādayo 'pi ca // Rm_29.165{64} //
K14ratnml_u:12051: devādi sarvalokāṃś ca bhojayituṃ nyamaṃtrayat // Rm_29.167{66} //
K14ratnml_u:12052: bhagavān api devādi lokāḥ sarve prasāditāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12057: tathāsanāṃ vastrāṇi divyāni rucirāni ca // Rm_29.170{69} //
K14ratnml_u:12062: bhagavaṃtaṃ sasaṃghaṃ taṃ natvaivaṃ prārthayan mudā // Rm_29.172{71} //
K14ratnml_u:12064: tat sasaṃgho bhavān atra svasvāsane niṣīdatu // Rm_29.173{72} //
K14ratnml_u:12065: tataḥ sa bhagavāṃs tatra pādyaṃ gṛhya sasāṃghikaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12067: tathā devādi lokāś ca sarvasvasvāsaneṣu tat /
K14ratnml_u:12070: dṛṣṭvā sa mudito bhikṣur yathāvidhiṃ samarcayat // Rm_29.176{75} //
K14ratnml_u:12072: tān buddhapramukhān sarvan yathechaiḥ samatoṣayat // Rm_29.177{76} //
K14ratnml_u:12074: tad divyabhojanaṃ bhuktvā vismitās tṛptim āyayuḥ // Rm_29.178{77} //
K14ratnml_u:12075: tataḥ sa bhikṣur ālokya sarvāns tān saṃpratoṣitān /
K14ratnml_u:12078: tān buddhapramukhān sarvān saṃmoditān akārayat // Rm_29.180{79} //
K14ratnml_u:12080: sasāṃghikaṃ munīndraṃ taṃ natvā tatpura āśrayat // Rm_29.181{80} //
K14ratnml_u:12081: tataḥ sa bhagavāṃs tasya bhikṣor matvā śubhāśayaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:12082: āryasatyaṃ samārabhya dideśa dharmam uttamaṃ // Rm_29.182{81} //
K14ratnml_u:12093: bhagavaṃtaṃ tam ānamya paprachus tat purākṛtaṃ // Rm_29.188{87} //
K14ratnml_u:12094: bhagavan kiṃ purānena bhikṣuṇā sukṛtaṃ kṛtaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:12095: yenopapāduko 'rhaṃ ca bhavaty ayaṃ mahāsudhīḥ // Rm_29.189{88} //
K14ratnml_u:12096: yac cāpy asya yater bhikṣoḥ prārthitaṃ tat samṛdhyati /
K14ratnml_u:12097: etat sarvaṃ samākhyāya sarvān asmān prabodhaya // Rm_29.190{89} //
K14ratnml_u:12098: evaṃ tair bhikṣubhiḥ prārthite sa munīśvaraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12099: tān sarvān sāṃghikāl lokān samālokyaivam ādiśat // Rm_29.191{90} //
K14ratnml_u:12103: purāsīn bhagavān buddho vipaścī nāma sarvavit /
K14ratnml_u:12110: anyasmin mahodyāne varṣāsu vyaharans tadā // Rm_29.196{95} //
K14ratnml_u:12113: tatas te bhikṣavas sarve catvāras tatprasādhanāt /
K14ratnml_u:12117: tān arhato mahābhijñān dṛṣṭvā sa paṃcamo yatiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12118: muditas taccaraṇān natvā praṇidhānaṃ tathā vyadhāt // Rm_29.200{99} //
K14ratnml_u:12119: yad etebhir mamāgamya sākṣād arhattvam āgataṃ /
K14ratnml_u:12122: tat tathā sarvam apy eva sarvatrāpi samṛddhyatu // Rm_29.202{1} //
K14ratnml_u:12124: ayam eva mahābhijño bhavati hīti manyatāṃ // Rm_29.203{2} //
K14ratnml_u:12125: punar api bhavaty atra yenāyam upapādukaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12126: tat karmaṃ pravakṣyāmi śṛṇuta yūyam ādarāt // Rm_29.204{3} //
K14ratnml_u:12127: purāsīd bhagavān buddhaḥ kāśyapo nāma sarvavit /
K14ratnml_u:12128: arhan nātho jagacchāstā dharmarājas tathāgataḥ // Rm_29.205{4} //
K14ratnml_u:12131: tasmiṃś ca samaye tatra vārāṇasyaṃ gṛhādhipaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12132: āsīt tasya priyā bhāryyā garbhiṇī garbhapīḍitā // Rm_29.207{6} //
K14ratnml_u:12134: tasyā ārttaravaṃ śrutvā sa bharttā karuṇārditaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12136: hā duḥkhaṃ garbbhapīḍāsyā jāyate kiṃ kariṣyate /
K14ratnml_u:12137: evaṃ duḥkhaṃ hi saṃsāre rogiṇāṃ bhavacāriṇāṃ // Rm_29.209{8} //
K14ratnml_u:12138: mātur evaṃ mahad duḥkhaṃ garbbhasthasya śiśor na kiṃ /
K14ratnml_u:12139: etad duḥkham ahaṃ soḍhuṃ na śaknuyāṃ kathaṃ cana // Rm_29.210{9} //
K14ratnml_u:12140: tad atra kāśyapasyāhaṃ śāsane śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12141: pravrajya saṃvaraṃ dhṛtvā careyaṃ saṃvṛtiṃ sadā // Rm_29.211{10} //
K14ratnml_u:12142: iti niścitya sa śreṣṭhī gatvā kāśyapaśāsane /
K14ratnml_u:12143: pravrajya saṃvaraṃ dhṛtvā cacāra saṃvṛtiṃ sadā // Rm_29.212{11} //
K14ratnml_u:12144: tataḥ kāle samāghrāte śreṣṭhī sa parikheditaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12145: triratnasmaraṇaṃ kṛtvā praṇidhānaṃ vyadhāt tadā // Rm_29.213{12} //
K14ratnml_u:12148: mātur garbhe hy ajāyeyaṃ bhaveyam upapādukaḥ // Rm_29.214{13} //
K14ratnml_u:12152: bhavaty ayaṃ mahābhijñaḥ sāṃpratam upapādukaḥ // Rm_29.216{15} //
K14ratnml_u:12153: yathānena tadā tatra praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ mudā /
K14ratnml_u:12154: tathātra śāsane bauddhe pravrajyārhattvam āpyate // Rm_29.217{16} //
K14ratnml_u:12155: evaṃ hi manyatāṃ sarve saṃsāre karma yat kṛtaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:12156: tat phalaṃ bhujyate nūnaṃ yathehitaṃ tathā dhruvaṃ // Rm_29.218{17} //
K14ratnml_u:12157: yenaiva yat kṛtaṃ karmaṃ tenaiva bhujyate phalaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:12158: abhuktaṃ kṣīyate naiva kṛtakarmaphalaṃ kvacit // Rm_29.219{18} //
K14ratnml_u:12159: nāgnibhir dahyate karmaṃ kriyate nāpi codakaiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12160: vāyubhiḥ śuṣyate nāpi kṣīyate naiva bhūmiṣu // Rm_29.220{19} //
K14ratnml_u:12161: anyāthāpi bhaven naiva yat kṛtaṃ tat phalaṃ khalu /
K14ratnml_u:12162: sarvatra bhujyate sarvair jantubhir bhavacāribhiḥ // Rm_29.221{20} //
K14ratnml_u:12163: kṛṣṇasya karmaṇaḥ pāke duḥkhataiva sadā bhave /
K14ratnml_u:12164: śubhasya sukhatā nityaṃ miśritasyāpi miśritaṃ // Rm_29.222{21} //
K14ratnml_u:12166: triratnabhajanaṃ kṛtvā caritavyaṃ śubhe sadā // Rm_29.223{22} //
K14ratnml_u:12167: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā te bhikṣavas tathā /

K14ratnml_u:12448: ehi cara samādhāya brahmacaryaṃ vratottamaṃ // Rm_31.31{31} //
K14ratnml_u:12449: ity uktvā sa jagacchāstā savyahastena tac chiraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12450: saṃspṛṣṭvā śāsane bauddhe śreṣṭhinaṃ taṃ samagrahīt // Rm_31.32{32} //
K14ratnml_u:12451: tatra pravrajitas tena munīndreṇa sa muṇḍitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12453: tataḥ sa bhikṣur ātmajño lābhī lokābhipūjitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12455: tallabdhaṃ saṃcitaṃ dravyaṃ sa saha brahmacāribhiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12456: saṃvibhāgaṃ guroḥ kiṃcid apy akarot kadā cana // Rm_31.35{35} //
K14ratnml_u:12458: svayam eva prabhuṃjānaḥ kiṃcin naiva dadau kvacit // Rm_31.36{36} //
K14ratnml_u:12460: tad dravyasaṃcayaṃ smṛtvā nitaḥ pretālayaṃ yayau // Rm_31.37{37} //
K14ratnml_u:12461: pretībhūto 'pi sa smṛtvā tad dravyasaṃcayaṃ punaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12462: svakoṣṭhālaya āgatya tasthau svāsana āśrayan // Rm_31.38{38} //
K14ratnml_u:12463: tatas te bhikṣavaḥ sarve tatkoṣṭhe taṃ mṛtakaṃ yatiṃ /
K14ratnml_u:12464: dṛṣṭvā gaṇḍīṃ parāhatya saṃskārtuṃ vidhi cārcayan // Rm_31.39{39} //
K14ratnml_u:12466: tataḥ pratyāgatāḥ sarve tat koṣṭhadvāram āyayuḥ // Rm_31.40{40} //
K14ratnml_u:12468: pratyaveksitum ālabdhās taṃ pretaṃ samapaśyata // Rm_31.41{41} //
K14ratnml_u:12470: taṃ pretaṃ vikṛtaṃ pātraṃ dhṛtaṃ cīvaraprāvṛtaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:12471: dṛṣṭvā te bhikṣavaḥ sarve samudvignā vicerire // Rm_31.42{42} //
K14ratnml_u:12472: tatas te bhikṣavaḥ sarve bhagavataḥ purogatāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12475: sa lokodvejanārthaṃ ca tad deśaṃ samupācarat // Rm_31.44{44} //
K14ratnml_u:12476: tatrāsau preta ārāt taṃ bhagavaṃtam upāgataṃ /
K14ratnml_u:12479: ratnāṃgam iva bhadrāṃśaṃ dadarśa śrīghanaṃ muniṃ // Rm_31.46{46} //
K14ratnml_u:12481: prarudan sāṃjalir natvā tasthau prasāditāśayaḥ // Rm_31.47{47} //
K14ratnml_u:12482: tataḥ sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā taṃ pretaṃ saṃprasāditaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:12485: pātracīvaram ādhāya caritaṃ saṃvaraṃ vṛthā // Rm_31.49{49} //
K14ratnml_u:12487: kim idānīṃ ruditvātra svakṛtaṃ paribhuktavān // Rm_31.50{50} //
K14ratnml_u:12488: sādhv atra sāṃprataṃ cittaṃ prasādaya mamāntike /
K14ratnml_u:12489: asmāc cāpi pariṣkāradravyāc cittaṃ virāgaya // Rm_31.51{51} //
K14ratnml_u:12490: mā haivetaḥ punaḥ kālaṃ kṛtvā yāsyasi nairaye /
K14ratnml_u:12491: tat saṃghe śaraṇaṃ gaccha tena tvaṃ sadgatiṃ vraje // Rm_31.52{52} //
K14ratnml_u:12492: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā sa preta utthitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12493: sa pātracīvaraṃ dravyaṃ saṃghebhyo nirayātayat // Rm_31.53{53} //
K14ratnml_u:12495: nipatya svakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ dideśa sāṃjalir mudā // Rm_31.54{54} //
K14ratnml_u:12496: bhagavan nātha sarvajña yat pāpaṃ prakṛtaṃ mayā /
K14ratnml_u:12498: tat sarvaṃ sāṃprataṃ śāstar darśayāmi bhavatpuraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12499: tat kṣamasvāparādhaṃ me prasīdatu bhavān guruḥ // Rm_31.56{56} //
K14ratnml_u:12500: iti saṃprārthite tena bhagavān sa kṛpānvitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12501: tat pretaṃ sudṛśālokya samapaśyac ciraṃ mudā // Rm_31.57{57} //
K14ratnml_u:12504: etaddānād dhi yat puṇyaṃ tat puṇyaṃ tvam avāpnuyāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12505: uttiṣṭha kṣipram etasmāt pretalokāt sudāruṇāt // Rm_31.59{59} //
K14ratnml_u:12506: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā pretaḥ sa moditaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12508: tataḥ sa bhagavāṃs tasya pretasya śubhasādhanaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:12509: saddharmaṃ samupādiśya sasaṃghaḥ svāśraye yathā // Rm_31.61{61} //
K14ratnml_u:12510: tathā sa preta ākarṇya saddharmaṃ taj jinoditaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:12511: triratnaśaraṇaṃ kṛtvā bheje nityaṃ prabodhitaḥ // Rm_31.62{62} //
K14ratnml_u:12512: tataḥ kāle samāghrātaḥ ca preto jvaradāhitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12514: triratnasmaraṇaṃ kṛtvā mṛto yayau yamālayaṃ // Rm_31.63{63} //
K14ratnml_u:12516: yamena preritas tasmāt pretamaharddhike yāyau // Rm_31.64{64} //
K14ratnml_u:12517: tatrāpi sa samutpanne vismitas taṃ munīśvaraṃ /
K14ratnml_u:12518: smṛtvā nityaṃ sadā bheje śraddhayā śaraṇaṃ gataḥ // Rm_31.65{65} //
K14ratnml_u:12519: tataḥ so cintayed evaṃ kutaḥ kutrāham āgataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12520: kena puṇyānubhāvena mahatsaukhyaṃ labhe nv iti // Rm_31.66{66} //
K14ratnml_u:12522: triratnasmaraṇāt puṇyād iti mene sa puṇyabhāk // Rm_31.67{67} //
K14ratnml_u:12525: aho mayā sukhaṃ labdhaṃ tat saṃbuddhaprasādataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12526: tad idāniṃ munīṃdraṃ taṃ draṣṭum arhāmi sarvathā // Rm_31.69{69} //
K14ratnml_u:12527: ity evaṃ manasā dhyātvā so 'pi pretamaharddhikaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12532: vihāre śrīghanaṃ draṣṭuṃ muditaḥ samudācarat // Rm_31.72{72} //
K14ratnml_u:12533: tatra taṃ śrīghanaṃ dṛṣṭvānaṃditaḥ sa kṛtāṃjaliḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12535: tatas taṃ sugataṃ nāthaṃ samabhyarcya pramoditaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12536: natvā sa sāṃjalir dharmaṃ śrotum ekāṃta āśrayat // Rm_31.74{74} //
K14ratnml_u:12537: tataḥ sa bhagavāṃs tasya dṛṣṭvā cittaṃ viśodhitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:12538: bodhicaryāṃ samārabhya saddharmam evam ādiśat // Rm_31.75{75} //
K14ratnml_u:12540: vakṣyāmy etat parijñāya samādhāya śubhe cara // Rm_31.76{76} //
K14ratnml_u:12541: yaḥ pumān atra saṃsāre satsaukhyaṃ sarvadechati /
K14ratnml_u:12542: sa ādau śraddhayā bhaktyā triratnaśaraṇaṃ gataḥ // Rm_31.77{77} //
K14ratnml_u:12545: itthaṃ kṛtaṃ pradānaṃ yat tad vipāke mahat phalaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:12546: kramād vṛddhitaraṃ yāyān na kṣiṇuyāt kadā cana // Rm_31.79{79} //
K14ratnml_u:12548: śāstā dharmādhipo rājā bodhisatvaḥ sudhīr bhavet // Rm_31.80{80} //
K14ratnml_u:12550: triratnabhajaṇaṃ kṛtvā dadyād dānaṃ yathepsitaṃ // Rm_31.81{81} //
K14ratnml_u:12552: suśīlasaṃvaraṃ dhṛtvā triratnaṃ sarvadā bhajan // Rm_31.82{82} //
K14ratnml_u:12554: tatrāpi śraddhayā nityaṃ triratnaṃ sarvadā bhajan // Rm_31.83{83} //
K14ratnml_u:12563: tatrāpi śraddhayā nityaṃ triratnaśaraṇaṃ gataḥ // Rm_31.87{87} //
K14ratnml_u:12571: tatrāpi śraddhayā nityaṃ triratnabhajano rataḥ // Rm_31.91{84} //
K14ratnml_u:12589: tatpuṇyair bodhisaṃprāpto dharmarājo jino bhavet // Rm_31.100{93} //
K14ratnml_u:12590: tataḥ sa sugataḥ śāstā jagannātho vināyakaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12593: sarvasatvāñ chubhe sthāpya nirvṛtaḥ saugatiṃ vrajet // Rm_31.102{95} //
K14ratnml_u:12594: evaṃ matvātra saṃsāre ya ichati śivāṃ gatiṃ /
K14ratnml_u:12595: sa evaṃ śraddhayā nityaṃ triratnabhajanodyataḥ // Rm_31.103{96} //
K14ratnml_u:12597: tataḥ kramāt sa tatpuṇyaiḥ sarvāḥ pāramitā api // Rm_31.104{97} //
K14ratnml_u:12599: iti matvā śubhe nityaṃ caritavyaṃ śubhārthibhiḥ // Rm_31.105{98} //
K14ratnml_u:12600: śubhena sadgatiṃ yāyā pāpena durgatīṃ vrajet /
K14ratnml_u:12601: pāpas tu jāyate lobhāt mātsaryamalināśrayāt // Rm_31.106{99} //
K14ratnml_u:12602: vopakārāṃ sukhecho 'pi na kiṃ cit sukham āpnuyāt /
K14ratnml_u:12607: saṃbodhipraṇidhiṃ kṛtvā caren nityaṃ susaṃvare // Rm_31.108{1} //
K14ratnml_u:12611: śivāṃ bodhiṃ samāsādya saṃbuddhapadam āpnuyāt // Rm_31.110{3} //
K14ratnml_u:12612: evaṃ tvaṃ vā parijñāya triratnaśaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12613: bodhicittaṃ samādhāya cara nityaṃ susaṃvare // Rm_31.111{4} //
K14ratnml_u:12614: tathā te sarvadā bhadraṃ bhaven nityaṃ samantataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12615: kramād bodhiṃ samāsādya saṃbuddhapadam āpnuyāḥ // Rm_31.112{5} //
K14ratnml_u:12616: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā sa paribodhitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12617: tatheti hi pratiśrutvā prābhyanaṃdat prasāditaḥ // Rm_31.113{6} //
K14ratnml_u:12618: tataḥ sa taṃ jagannāthaṃ praṇatvā sāṃjalir mudā /
K14ratnml_u:12621: triratnaṃ śaraṇaṃ kṛtvā pracaran sarvadā mudā // Rm_31.115{8} //
K14ratnml_u:12622: tad rātrau tatprabhāṃ dṛṣṭvā bhikṣavo vismayānvitāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12623: sarve te prātar utthāya natvāpṛchan munīśvaraṃ // Rm_31.116{9} //
K14ratnml_u:12624: bhagavan nātha sarvajña ko 'dya rātrāv ihāgataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12625: etad vṛttaṃ samākhyāya sarvān naḥ paribodhaya // Rm_31.117{10} //
K14ratnml_u:12626: iti tair bhikṣubhiḥ pṛṣṭe bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12627: tān sarvān sāṃghikān dṛṣṭvā bodhayitum upādiśat // Rm_31.118{11} //
K14ratnml_u:12628: śṛṇuta bhikṣavaḥ sarve yo 'dya rātrāv ihāgataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12629: etat sarvaṃ pravṛttāṃtaṃ pravakṣyāmi suvistaraṃ // Rm_31.119{12} //
K14ratnml_u:12630: yo 'sau śreṣṭhī mahāśrāddhaḥ saugate śāsane mudā /
K14ratnml_u:12631: śraddhayā pravrajitvātra brahmacaryaṃ mudā caran // Rm_31.120{13} //
K14ratnml_u:12633: labdhadravyaṃ na kasmai cid dadau kiñcit kadā cana // Rm_31.121{14} //
K14ratnml_u:12634: kevalaṃ saṃcayaṃ kṛtvā koṣṭhāgāre nidhāya tat /
K14ratnml_u:12635: guptīkṛtvā prayatnena vyabhajan naiva kiṃ cana // Rm_31.122{15} //
K14ratnml_u:12636: tataḥ kāle samāghrāte dhyātvā tad dravyasaṃcayaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:12639: punaḥ pratyāgatas tatra svālaye saṃnyaṣīdata // Rm_31.124{17} //
K14ratnml_u:12640: tatra taṃ saṃsthitaṃ pretaṃ dṛṣṭvāhaṃ samupācaran /
K14ratnml_u:12643: sa pātracīvaraṃ sarvaṃ taddravyaṃ nirayātayat // Rm_31.126{19} //
K14ratnml_u:12646: tatra sa suprasannātmā smṛtvā ratnatrayaṃ mudā /
K14ratnml_u:12647: matsaddharmāmṛtaṃ pātum iha rātrau samāgataḥ // Rm_31.128{21} //
K14ratnml_u:12651: yo 'yaṃ śreṣṭhī na cānyo hi rātrāv iha samāgataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12652: yat sa mṛto 'bhavat pretas mātsaryaduritāśrayāt // Rm_31.130{23} //
K14ratnml_u:12654: mātsaryaṃ hi trilokeṣu pāpamūlaṃ nigadyate // Rm_31.131{24} //
K14ratnml_u:12656: mātsaryaṃ sumaduṣṭaṃ ripuṃ jayata sarvathā // Rm_31.132{25} //
K14ratnml_u:12657: mātsaryaṃ jīyate yair hi samuddhṛtya svamānasāt /
K14ratnml_u:12658: te eva mānino vīrāḥ śūrāḥ prājñā vicakṣaṇāḥ // Rm_31.133{26} //
K14ratnml_u:12659: ye ca jetuṃ na mātsaryaṃ śaknuvaṃti kathaṃ cana /
K14ratnml_u:12660: kiṃ te śūrā vijetāro virā na kleśabhojinaḥ // Rm_31.134{27} //
K14ratnml_u:12661: yeṣāṃ na jāyate citte mātsaryan duḥkṛtākaraṃ /
K14ratnml_u:12662: te eva sukhino virā jayinaḥ kleśaghātakāḥ // Rm_31.135{28} //
K14ratnml_u:12663: yāvan na jīyate citte mātsaryaṃ duritāśayaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:12664: tāvat kiṃ te suvīrā vā kṣaṇāt kleśānucāriṇaḥ // Rm_31.136{29} //
K14ratnml_u:12665: ye ca kleśavaśā vīrā na te dhīrā vicakṣaṇāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12666: kṣaṇāt kiṃ cin nimitteti careyur vikṛtāśayāḥ // Rm_31.137{30} //
K14ratnml_u:12668: duṣṭāḥ krodhāgnisaṃdagdhāḥ saṃpaśyeyur na kiṃ cana // Rm_31.138{31} //
K14ratnml_u:12669: tatas te 'ndhā ivāloke careyur na ca satpathe /
K14ratnml_u:12670: kumārga eva saṃraktāḥ pracareyuḥ pramāditāḥ // Rm_31.139{32} //
K14ratnml_u:12674: vighnaṃ kartuṃ samudyogaṃ kuryur nityaṃ samāhitāḥ // Rm_31.141{34} //
K14ratnml_u:12675: tatas te pāpino duṣṭā unmattā iva tāyinaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12676: svayaṃ naṣṭāḥ parāṃś cāpi nāśayeyuḥ pravaṃcakāḥ // Rm_31.142{35} //
K14ratnml_u:12683: tatra yamo mahārājā dṛṣṭvā taṃ duritāśayaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:12685: tatra tair yamadūtās tāṃ gṛhītvā sahasā balāt /
K14ratnml_u:12687: tatra te daivabhogyāṃ bhuktvā bhoktuṃ samaṃtataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12688: coditā yamadūtaiś ca bhrameyur narakeṣv api // Rm_31.148{41} //
K14ratnml_u:12691: evaṃ te daivabhogyāṃ bhuktvā tathā ciraṃ sadā /
K14ratnml_u:12693: narakān narake gatvā duḥkhāny evāśnuyu vabha // Rm_31.150{43} //
K14ratnml_u:12696: tadā tān sugatān dṛṣṭvā kṛpayā saṃpracoditāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12698: tatra te sukhasaṃpannāḥ smṛtvā ratnatrayaṃ mudā /
K14ratnml_u:12699: sarvadā śaraṇaṃ kṛtvā pracareyuḥ samāhitāḥ // Rm_31.153{46} //
K14ratnml_u:12701: śraddhayā satkṛtiṃ kṛtvā śṛṇuyur dharmam ādarāt // Rm_31.154{47} //
K14ratnml_u:12703: bodhicittaṃ samāsādya prakuryu dānam ādarāt // Rm_31.155{48} //
K14ratnml_u:12705: sarvasatvahitaṃ kṛtvā sādhayeyuḥ śubhāṃ cariṃ // Rm_31.156{49} //
K14ratnml_u:12707: tatas te vimalātmāno dhyātvā yogasamāhitāḥ // Rm_31.157{50} //
K14ratnml_u:12709: tato māragaṇāṃ jitvā pariśuddhās trimaṇḍalāḥ // Rm_31.158{51} //
K14ratnml_u:12711: evaṃ matvātra saṃsāre mātsaryaṃ mūlam enasāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:12713: tato vo maṃgalaṃ nityaṃ bhaved bhave samaṃtataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12714: kramād bodhiṃ samāsādya saṃbuddhapadam āpsyatha // Rm_31.161{54} //
K14ratnml_u:12715: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā te sāṃghikā mudā /
K14ratnml_u:12717: iti me guruṇādiṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ mayā tathocyate /
K14ratnml_u:12718: evaṃ tvaṃ nṛpa mātsaryyaṃ tyaktvā cara śubhe sadā // Rm_31.163{56} //
K14ratnml_u:12719: prajāś cāpi tvayā rājan bodhayitvā prayatnataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12720: bodhicaryāśayāḥ kṛtvā pratiṣṭhāpyāḥ śubhe sadā // Rm_31.164{57} //
K14ratnml_u:12721: evaṃ te sarvadā bhadraṃ bhaved bhave samaṃtataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12722: kramād bodhiṃ samāsādya saṃbuddhapadam āpnuyāḥ // Rm_31.165{58} //
K14ratnml_u:12725: pretībhūtāvadānaṃ duritahṛtamataiḥ śreṣṭhino lobhino ye śṛṇvaṃti śravayaṃti pramuditamanasaḥ śraddhayedaṃ manuṣyāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12726: mātsaryaṃ te vihāya trimaṇiśaraṇagāḥ sarvasatvānurāgā dānaṃ datvā prasannāḥ satataśubhacarā yānti buddhālayaṃ te // Rm_31.167{60} //
K14ratnml_u:12731: upaguptaṃ yatiṃ natvā prārthayec caivam ādarāt // Rm_32.1{1} //
K14ratnml_u:12732: bhadanta śrotum ichāmi punar anyat subhāṣitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:12733: tad yathā guruṇādiṣṭaṃ tathādeṣṭuṃ ca me 'rhati // Rm_32.2{2} //
K14ratnml_u:12734: iti saṃprārthite rājñā śrutvā so 'rhan sudhīr yatiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12735: tam aśokaṃ mahārājaṃ samālokyaivam ādiśat // Rm_32.3{3} //
K14ratnml_u:12736: sādhu śṛṇu mahārāja yathā me guruṇoditaṃ /
