K14ratnml_u:12737: tathāhaṃ te pravakṣyāmi tava dharmapravṛddhaye // Rm_32.4{4} //
K14ratnml_u:12738: tad yathaivaṃ puraikasmin samaye sa munīśvaraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12744: tatra te bhikṣavaḥ sarve bhikṣuṇyo 'pi samāgatāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12745: yatinaś cailakāś caivam upāsakā upāsikāḥ // Rm_32.8{8} //
K14ratnml_u:12747: nirgranthās tīrthikāś cāpi tāpasāś ca maharṣayaḥ // Rm_32.9{9} //
K14ratnml_u:12749: daityā yakṣāś ca gaṃdharvāḥ kinnarāś cāpi rākṣasāḥ // Rm_32.10{10} //
K14ratnml_u:12750: siddhā vidyādharāś cāpi nāgāś ca garuḍā api /
K14ratnml_u:12751: sādhyā grahāḥ satārāś ca vasavaś cāpsarogaṇāḥ // Rm_32.11{11} //
K14ratnml_u:12753: vaiśyāś ca maṃtriṇo 'mātyāḥ śreṣṭhinaś ca mahājanāḥ // Rm_32.12{12} //
K14ratnml_u:12754: gṛhasthā vaṇijaḥ sārthavāhāś ca dhanino 'pi ca /
K14ratnml_u:12755: śilpinaḥ paurikāś cāpi jānapadāś ca nairgamāḥ // Rm_32.13{13} //
K14ratnml_u:12757: sarve te samupāgatya vihāre samupāviśan // Rm_32.14{14} //
K14ratnml_u:12758: tatra taṃ śrīghanaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve te saṃprasāditāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12760: tatra sarve 'pi te lokāḥ samabhyarcya yathākramaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:12761: taṃ munīndraṃ praṇatvaiva dharmaṃ śrotum upāśrayan // Rm_32.16{16} //
K14ratnml_u:12762: tataḥ sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā tān sarvān samupāśritān /
K14ratnml_u:12764: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pītvā sarve te tridaśādayaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12765: lokāḥ satyam iti jñātvā prābhyanandan prabodhitāḥ // Rm_32.18{18} //
K14ratnml_u:12767: tasminn avasare tatra śrāvastyāḥ pauriko gṛhī /
K14ratnml_u:12768: āsīn mahādhanaḥ śrīmāñ chṛdopamo mahājanaḥ // Rm_32.19{19} //
K14ratnml_u:12770: kāṃtāṃ bhāryyāṃ samānīya samyakvyūhe yathāvidhiḥ // Rm_32.20{20} //
K14ratnml_u:12771: tataḥ sa kāmasaṃraktaḥ sukāminyā tayā saha /
K14ratnml_u:12772: yathechayā sukhaṃ bhuktvā reme nityaṃ pracoditaḥ // Rm_32.21{21} //
K14ratnml_u:12774: samaye sā satī bhārya garbhitābhūt kṛśāṃgikā // Rm_32.22{22} //
K14ratnml_u:12777: dṛṣṭvā taṃ dārakaṃ mātā bhinnāśayā viṣeditāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12778: kiṃ īdṛg ātmajenāpi dhig mām iti vyaciṃtayat // Rm_32.24{24} //
K14ratnml_u:12779: tataḥ sa janakaḥ śrutvā taṃ jātaṃ vikṛtāśrayaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:12780: virūpaṃ durbhagākāram ity evaṃ samaciṃtayat // Rm_32.25{25} //
K14ratnml_u:12781: aho kiṃ prakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ janmāṃtare purā mayā /
K14ratnml_u:12782: yenāyaṃ durbhagākāro virūpo jāyate sutaḥ // Rm_32.26{26} //
K14ratnml_u:12783: tad atra kiṃ mayopāyaṃ karttavyaṃ nāpi manyate /
K14ratnml_u:12784: dhig māṃ yena sute jāte lajjayā me sukhaṃ hṛtaṃ // Rm_32.27{27} //
K14ratnml_u:12785: tathāpi kiṃ kariṣyāmi daivāt me jāyate hy ayaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:12786: tad virūpo 'pi putro 'yaṃ pālanīyo mayātmajaḥ // Rm_32.28{28} //
K14ratnml_u:12787: iti bhartroditaṃ śrutvā sā bhāryyāpy evam abravīt /
K14ratnml_u:12788: yad ābhyāṃ prakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ tatphalaṃ bhujyate khalu // Rm_32.29{29} //
K14ratnml_u:12789: yad abhāvi na tad bhogyaṃ bhāvi cen na tad anyathā /
K14ratnml_u:12790: sarvatra bhāvino bhogyaṃ bhuṃjate sarvajaṃtavaḥ // Rm_32.30{30} //
K14ratnml_u:12791: tad atrāham imaṃ bālaṃ pālayeyaṃ prayatnataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12792: ity uktvā sā vibhinnāsyā nārī tasthau pralajjitā // Rm_32.31{31} //
K14ratnml_u:12793: taṃ virūpaṃ sutaṃ jātaṃ vīkṣya sa janako 'pi ca /
K14ratnml_u:12795: hā mayā kiṃ kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ manyate na bhavāṃtare /
K14ratnml_u:12796: yato 'yaṃ dārako jāto virūpo durbhagākṛtiḥ // Rm_32.33{33} //
K14ratnml_u:12797: tathāpi kiṃ kariṣyāmi daivān no jāyate hy ayaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:12798: daivabhogyaṃ prabhoktavyaṃ sarvair api hi jaṃtubhiḥ // Rm_32.34{34} //
K14ratnml_u:12800: tad ayaṃ svātmajo bālaḥ pālanīyotmayā mayā // Rm_32.35{35} //
K14ratnml_u:12801: iti dhyātvā pitā so 'thadṛṣṭvā tasya śiśor mukhaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:12803: tato jñātīn samāhūya kṛtvā jātimahaṃ sa ca /
K14ratnml_u:12804: pitāsya nāma vikhyāte kuruteti samabravīt // Rm_32.37{37} //
K14ratnml_u:12805: tatas te jñātayaḥ sarve saṃkṛtvā samataṃ tathā /
K14ratnml_u:12806: tad gṛhasthaṃ samāmaṃtrya pura evam upādiśan // Rm_32.38{38} //
K14ratnml_u:12807: gṛhapate virūpo 'yaṃ putro yat tava jāyate /
K14ratnml_u:12808: tasmād bhavatun āmnāyaṃ prasiddho bālako bhuvi // Rm_32.39{39} //
K14ratnml_u:12810: tataḥ snehād virūpo 'sau mātrā yatnena pālitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12811: krāmāt puṣṭo vivṛddhābhūd hradastham iva paṃkajaṃ // Rm_32.40{40} //
K14ratnml_u:12812: tadā yadā kumāratvaṃ prāptaḥ sa vikṛtāśrayaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:12813: svarūpaṃ darppaṇe dṛṣṭvā virūpo lajjito 'bhavat // Rm_32.41{41} //
K14ratnml_u:12816: hā mayā kiṃ kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ yenāhaṃ duritākṛtiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12817: kiṃ mamānena kāyena mṛtyuṃ me 'tra varaṃ dhruvaṃ // Rm_32.43{43} //
K14ratnml_u:12818: kiṃ kariṣye virūpo 'haṃ kva yāsyāmi durākṛtiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12819: kiṃ mamānena jīvena kevalaṃ duḥkhabhoginā // Rm_32.44{44} //
K14ratnml_u:12820: tad atrāhaṃ gṛhaṃ tyaktvā vanodyāne samāśrayan /
K14ratnml_u:12821: saṃbuddhaṃ sugataṃ dhyātvā mṛtyuṃ gaccheya muktaye // Rm_32.45{45} //
K14ratnml_u:12822: avaśyam eva sarveṣāṃ jaṃtūnaṃ maraṇaṃ bhave /
K14ratnml_u:12823: tan mamedṛg virūpo 'smin śarīre jīvite spṛhā // Rm_32.46{46} //
K14ratnml_u:12824: yady atrāhaṃ ciraṃ jīvī nindito duḥkham āpnuyāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:12825: tad buddhaṃ sugataṃ dhyātvā tiṣṭheyaṃ prāṇamuktaye // Rm_32.47{47} //
K14ratnml_u:12826: tat saṃbuddhaṃ jinaṃ dhyātvā mṛto 'haṃ yadi sāṃprataṃ /
K14ratnml_u:12827: tat puṇyaḥ paritātmā sugatiṃ gacheya sarvathā // Rm_32.48{48} //
K14ratnml_u:12828: ye buddhaṃ sugataṃ smṛtvā gachanti mṛtyum ātmanā /
K14ratnml_u:12829: durgatiṃ te na gachanti samyānty eva sukhāvatīṃ // Rm_32.49{49} //
K14ratnml_u:12830: tasmāt te sudhiyaḥ santaḥ tyaktvā yāyāt kulaṃ gṛhaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:12831: saṃbuddhasmaraṇaṃ dhyātvā tiṣṭhanti nirjane vane // Rm_32.50{50} //
K14ratnml_u:12832: tathāhaṃ tat samālokya saṃbuddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12833: samādhāya sadā smṛtvā vaseyaṃ vijane vane // Rm_32.51{51} //
K14ratnml_u:12834: ity evaṃ manasā dhyātvā virūpaḥ sa prasannadhīḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12835: sa saṃpadaṃ gṛhaṃ tyaktvā jīrṇodyānaṃ samāśrayat // Rm_32.52{52} //
K14ratnml_u:12838: tadā sa bhagavāñ chāstā taṃ tathā sthitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:12841: tatrodyāne virūpaṃ taṃ paśyan bhāsvān upācarat // Rm_32.55{55} //
K14ratnml_u:12843: vismitas taṃ samāyātaṃ sasāṃghikam apaśyata // Rm_32.56{56} //
K14ratnml_u:12844: taṃ munīṃdraṃ samālokya virūpaḥ sa vimohitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12846: tatra sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā virūpaṃ taṃ parāyitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:12848: tathā nirudhyamānaḥ sa virūpas tena śāsinā /
K14ratnml_u:12849: parāyituṃ prayatnena na śaśāka kathaṃ cana // Rm_32.59{59} //
K14ratnml_u:12852: tatra sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā nilīnaṃ lajjayāsane /
K14ratnml_u:12855: tataḥ sa bhagavañ chāstā tat samādheḥ samutthitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12856: svayaṃ virūpam ātmānaṃ nirmāya vikṛtāśrayaṃ // Rm_32.62{62} //
K14ratnml_u:12860: sa virūpaḥ samālokya harṣita evam abravīt // Rm_32.64{64} //
K14ratnml_u:12861: svāgataṃ bho sahāye hi kutra gantum ihāgataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12863: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā bhagavān sa virūpadhṛk /
K14ratnml_u:12864: tvāṃ draṣṭum ihāyāmi proktveti samupāśrayet // Rm_32.66{66} //
K14ratnml_u:12865: tatra sthitaḥ kathāṃ kṛtvā bhagavān sa virūpadhṛk /
K14ratnml_u:12867: tat pradattaṃ prabhuktvānnaṃ sa virūpaḥ sa moditaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12869: tataḥ sa bhagavāñ chāstā dṛṣṭvā taṃ saṃpramoditaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:12870: svarūpeṇa sthitas tatra vyarājat saṃprabhāsayan // Rm_32.69{69} //
K14ratnml_u:12872: sa virūpaḥ samālokya vismitaś caivam abravīt // Rm_32.70{70} //
K14ratnml_u:12873: aho kathaṃ bhavaty evam abhirūpataro bhavān /
K14ratnml_u:12874: kasya puṇyavipākān tad vaktum arhati me puraḥ // Rm_32.71{71} //
K14ratnml_u:12875: iti saṃprārthite tena bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12876: bodhayituṃ virūpaṃ taṃ samālokyaivam ādiśat // Rm_32.72{72} //
K14ratnml_u:12879: tasyā eva prabhāvena bhavāmy ahaṃ śubheṃdriyaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12881: ity ādiśya munīndraḥ sa bhagavāṃs tatra śubhāsane /
K14ratnml_u:12883: tatas te sāṃghikāḥ sarve saumyarūpāḥ śubheṃdriyāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12886: dṛṣṭvā taṃ sugataṃ matvā babhūva vismayānvitaḥ // Rm_32.77{77} //
K14ratnml_u:12887: aho bhāgya mayā labdhaṃ mahatpuṇyam ihādhunā /
K14ratnml_u:12888: yan mamārthe munīndro 'yaṃ sasāṃghika upāgataḥ // Rm_32.78{78} //
K14ratnml_u:12891: tad aham asya munīndrasya śraddhayā śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12892: satkṛtya saugataṃ dharmaṃ śrotum arhe samāhitaḥ // Rm_32.80{80} //
K14ratnml_u:12893: ity evaṃ manasā dhyātvā virūpaḥ sa pramoditaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12894: upetya sāṃjalir natvā taṃ munīndram upāśrayat // Rm_32.81{81} //
K14ratnml_u:12901: mudā tasya muneḥ pādau vavande sa kṛtāṃjaliḥ // Rm_32.84{84} //
K14ratnml_u:12902: tataḥ utthāya taṃ nāthaṃ bhagavaṃtaṃ sasāṃghikaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:12903: samālokya prasannātmā prārthayat sa samādarāt // Rm_32.85{85} //
K14ratnml_u:12905: prādurbhūtātra me lakṣmī bhavāmi yātisuṃdaraḥ // Rm_32.86{86} //
K14ratnml_u:12906: tad etan mahad āścaryaṃ dṛṣṭvā me rocate manaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12907: bhavatāṃ śaraṇe sthitvā carituṃ saṃvaraṃ sadā // Rm_32.87{87} //
K14ratnml_u:12908: tad atra bhagavan nātha kṛpayā buddhaśāsane /
K14ratnml_u:12909: anvāhṛtya śubhe dharme niyoktuṃ māṃ samarhati // Rm_32.88{88} //
K14ratnml_u:12911: pravrajya saṃvaraṃ dhṛtvā cariṣye 'tra samāhitaḥ // Rm_32.89{89} //
K14ratnml_u:12912: iti tat saṃprārthitaṃ śrutvā bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12913: tasya śuddhāśayam ālokya samāmaṃtryaivam ādiśat // Rm_32.90{90} //
K14ratnml_u:12914: yadi vāṃchāsti te vatsa carituṃ saugataṃ vrataṃ /
K14ratnml_u:12915: pitur ājñāṃ samāsādya prāgacha dāsyate tadā // Rm_32.91{91} //
K14ratnml_u:12916: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā sa pratiharṣitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12917: mudā tasya muneḥ pādau praṇatvaiva tato 'carat // Rm_32.92{92} //
K14ratnml_u:12918: tatra sa svagṛhe gatvā pādau pituḥ kṛtāṃjaliḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12919: praṇatvā purataḥ sthitvā prāvadad evam ādarāt // Rm_32.93{93} //
K14ratnml_u:12921: parṇakuṭyāṃ samāsīno dhyatvā vasāmi yogavit // Rm_32.94{94} //
K14ratnml_u:12922: tatra sa bhagavān buddhaḥ sasaṃghaḥ svayam āgataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12924: tad dattam amṛtaṃ bhuktvā bhavāmi suṃdarākṛtiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12925: lakṣmīś cāpi samudbhūtā mamaivaṃ jāyate śubhaṃ // Rm_32.96{96} //
K14ratnml_u:12927: nānyathā hīti vijñāya prasīda sugate sadā // Rm_32.97{97} //
K14ratnml_u:12928: evam etat mahaccitraṃ dṛṣṭvā me saṃprasāditaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:12929: mano 'dya śāsane bauddhe carituṃ rocate vrataṃ // Rm_32.98{98} //
K14ratnml_u:12931: tad atra kṛpayā tāta tad anujñāṃ pradehi me // Rm_32.99{99} //
K14ratnml_u:12933: tatra ca sarvadā saukhyaṃ bhuktvā yāyāj jinālayaṃ // Rm_32.100{100} //
K14ratnml_u:12934: iti matvā prasīdātra mā kuruṣva mano 'nyathā /
K14ratnml_u:12935: śraddhayānugrahaṃ kṛtvā tad anujñāṃ pradehi me // Rm_32.101{1} //
K14ratnml_u:12936: iti saṃprārthitaṃ śrutvā sa gṛhasthaḥ savismayaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12937: pitā taṃ svātmajaṃ dṛṣṭvā sucirād evam abravīt // Rm_32.102{2} //
K14ratnml_u:12938: aho hi bhāgyavān putra puṇyavāñchābhi sāṃprataṃ /
K14ratnml_u:12939: yato 'sau kṛpayopetya buddhat tvām abhirakṣati // Rm_32.103{3} //
K14ratnml_u:12940: tat te 'sti yadi vāñchati carituṃ saugataṃ vrataṃ /
K14ratnml_u:12941: taṃ buddhaśaraṇaṃ gatvā vrataṃ cara samāhitaḥ // Rm_32.104{4} //
K14ratnml_u:12943: iti pitroditaṃ śrutvā sa virūpaḥ prasāditaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12944: pādau pitroḥ praṇatvaiva sahasā prācarad gṛhāt // Rm_32.105{5} //
K14ratnml_u:12945: tato jetāśrame gatvā sa virūpaḥ pramoditaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12946: pādau tasya muner natvā prārthayed evam ādarāt // Rm_32.106{6} //
K14ratnml_u:12948: tad bhavān kṛpayā mahyaṃ saṃvaraṃ dātum arhati // Rm_32.107{7} //
K14ratnml_u:12949: iti saṃprārthite tena bhagavāṃs tasya mastake /
K14ratnml_u:12950: savyahastena saṃspṛṣṭvā śāsane taṃ samagrahīt // Rm_32.108{8} //
K14ratnml_u:12951: tatra sa vrājitaḥ sāstrā virūpo muṇḍito 'pi saḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12953: tataḥ sa bhikṣur ātmajñaḥ saṃyamī vijiteṃdriyaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12957: sarvakleśagaṇāñ jitvā sākṣād arhatvam āptavān // Rm_32.112{11} //
K14ratnml_u:12961: mānyaḥ pūjyo 'bhivandyo 'bhūd brahmacarī sa yogavit // Rm_32.114{13} //
K14ratnml_u:12962: tadā te bhikṣavaḥ sarve dṛṣṭvā taṃ yatim uttamaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:12963: vismitās taṃ muniṃ natvā paprachus tat purākṛtaṃ // Rm_32.115{14} //
K14ratnml_u:12964: bhagavann arhatānena kiṃ karma prakṛtaṃ purā /
K14ratnml_u:12966: yac cāyaṃ bhagavāc chāsta bhavatā saṃprasāditaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12967: lakṣmīvān abhirūpaś ca bhavati sadguṇārataḥ // Rm_32.117{16} //
K14ratnml_u:12968: yac cāyaṃ śāsane bauddhe śraddhayā śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12970: tad asya sarvavṛttāṃtaṃ yad anena purākṛtaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:12971: suvistaraṃ samākhyāya sarvān naḥ paribodhaya // Rm_32.119{18} //
K14ratnml_u:12972: iti tair bhikṣubhiḥ sarvaiḥ prārthite sa munīśvaraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12973: sarvāṃs tān sāṃghikān bhikṣūn samālokyaivam ādiśat // Rm_32.120{19} //
K14ratnml_u:12974: śṛṇuta bhikṣavaḥ sarve yad anena purākṛtaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:12975: tat sarvaiḥ karma vakṣyāmi sarvalokaprabodhane // Rm_32.121{20} //
K14ratnml_u:12978: sa bhagavāñ jagannāthaḥ kṛtvā bhadraṃ samaṃtataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12979: sarvatra saugataṃ dharmam upadeṣṭum upācarat // Rm_32.123{22} //
K14ratnml_u:12980: evaṃ sarvatra lokeṣu sasāṃghikaḥ sa mārajit /
K14ratnml_u:12984: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pītvā sarve lokaḥ prabodhitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12985: triratnabhajanaṃ kṛtvā pracerire śubhe sadā // Rm_32.126{25} //
K14ratnml_u:12987: tatra sa bhagavān puṣyo buddhadṛṣṭya samaṃtataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12988: loke paśyan hitaṃ kartuṃ dadarśa dvau jinātmajau // Rm_32.127{26} //
K14ratnml_u:12989: ekaḥ śākyamunir nāma maitreyaś cāparaḥ sudhīḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12990: tasmin kāle ubhav etau bodhisatvau jinātmajau // Rm_32.128{27} //
K14ratnml_u:12992: tasya śāstuś ca vaineyāḥ satvā na paripācitāḥ // Rm_32.129{28} //
K14ratnml_u:12993: śākyamunes tu vaineyāḥ paripakvā na saṃtatiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12994: evaṃ sa sugataḥ puṣyo dṛṣṭvaivaṃ samaciṃtayat // Rm_32.130{29} //
K14ratnml_u:12997: iti vicintya puṣyaḥ sa tathāgataḥ sasāṃghikaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:12998: himavaṃtaṃ giriṃ gatvā pracakrāma prabhāsayan // Rm_32.132{31} //
K14ratnml_u:12999: tatra ratnaguhāyāṃ sa praviśya sa munīśvaraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13001: tasmiṃś ca samaye tatra śākyamuniḥ sa sanmatiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13003: tatra ratnaguhāyāṃ taṃ puṣyaṃ tathāgataṃ muniṃ /
K14ratnml_u:13009: tatra taṃ sugataṃ dṛṣṭvā śākyamuniḥ sa moditaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13010: sahasā sāṃjalir natvā pūjāṃgainārcayan mudā // Rm_32.138{37} //
K14ratnml_u:13011: tataḥ sa ekapādena sthitvā saptaniśāṃ mudā /
K14ratnml_u:13012: sāṃjaliḥ praṇatiṃ kṛtvā tuṣṭāva gāthayānayā // Rm_32.139{38} //
K14ratnml_u:13013: na divi bhuvi vā nāsmil loke na vaiśravaṇālaye /
K14ratnml_u:13014: na marubhavane divye sthāne na dikṣu vidikṣu vā // Rm_32.140{39} //
K14ratnml_u:13017: etayo gāthayā stutvā taṃ puṣyaṃ sugataṃ muniṃ /
K14ratnml_u:13018: sa śākyamunir utsāhāt saptarātriṃ mudā bhajan // Rm_32.142{41} //
K14ratnml_u:13020: paristutas tam ālokya śākyamunim abhāṣata // Rm_32.143{42} //
K14ratnml_u:13021: sādhu sādhu mahāsatva tvam evaṃ yat samudyataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13024: kramāt pāramitāḥ pūrya saṃbodhiṃ samavāpnuyāḥ // Rm_32.145{44} //
K14ratnml_u:13025: ity ādiśya munīndro 'sau puṣyo dharmādhipo jinaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13028: tasya puṣyasya sadbhaktya śaraṇasthaḥ sadābhajat // Rm_32.147{46} //
K14ratnml_u:13029: tatra tasmin sthite buddhe devī guhānivāsinī /
K14ratnml_u:13031: tadguhāyāṃ praveṣṭum 'sau na śaśāka kathaṃ cana // Rm_32.148{47} //
K14ratnml_u:13033: bhūtvā taṃ sugataṃ puṣyaṃ dhyānālīnam abhīṣapat // Rm_32.149{48} //
K14ratnml_u:13035: kiñcit tasya muneś cittaṃ cārayituṃ śaśāka na // Rm_32.150{49} //
K14ratnml_u:13037: svarūpeṇaiva taṃ draṣṭuṃ praṇatā samupācarat // Rm_32.151{50} //
K14ratnml_u:13038: tatra taṃ sugataṃ puṣyaṃ tathāgatam munīśvaraṃ /
K14ratnml_u:13043: iti dhyātvā surūpeṇa tadantikam upācarat // Rm_32.154{53} //
K14ratnml_u:13044: tatra sā sāṃjalir natvā pādau tasya muneḥ puraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13045: sthitvā kṣamārthanāṃ karttuṃ prārthayad evam ānatā // Rm_32.155{54} //
K14ratnml_u:13046: bhagavan nātha sarvajña yan mayā prakṛtaṃ tvayi /
K14ratnml_u:13047: tat kṣamasva jagannātha kṣāntidharmādhipo 'si hi // Rm_32.156{55} //
K14ratnml_u:13048: tad atrāhaṃ jagacchāstar bhavatāṃ śaraṇaṃ gatā /
K14ratnml_u:13049: sarvadā samupāśritya bhajeyaṃ śraddhayā mudā // Rm_32.157{56} //
K14ratnml_u:13050: yad atra te sasaṃghasya yathāvidhi samarcituṃ /
K14ratnml_u:13051: ichāmy ahaṃ jagannātha tad adhyuṣitum arhati // Rm_32.158{57} //
K14ratnml_u:13052: iti tenārthite puṣyo bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13053: tāṃ viśuddhāśayāṃ dṛṣṭvā tūṣṇībhūtvādhyuvāsa tat // Rm_32.159{58} //
K14ratnml_u:13056: tataḥ sā muditopetya pūjāṃgais taṃ munīśvaraṃ /
K14ratnml_u:13057: abhyarcya bhojanair divyaiḥ sasaṃghaṃ samatoṣayat // Rm_32.161{60} //
K14ratnml_u:13058: tataḥ sā bhojanānte 'pi praṇatvā sāñjalir mudā /
K14ratnml_u:13059: bhūtvā kṣamāpayitvā ca prārthayad evam ānatā // Rm_32.162{61} //
K14ratnml_u:13060: bhagavan nātha sarvajña bhavatāṃ śaraṇe sthitā /
K14ratnml_u:13062: tat kṣamasva jagannātha yan mayāpakṛtaṃ vṛthā /
K14ratnml_u:13063: prasīdatu bhavāñ chāstā saṃbuddho hi kṣamākaraḥ // Rm_32.164{63} //
K14ratnml_u:13064: iti tayārthitaṃ śrutvā puṣyaḥ sa bhagavān muniḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13065: devatāṃ tāṃ samālokya saddharmaṃ samupādiśat // Rm_32.165{64} //
K14ratnml_u:13067: dharmeṇa rakṣitā loke sarvatrāpi sukhī bhavet // Rm_32.166{65} //
K14ratnml_u:13068: tad ādau śraddhayā dharmaṃ śrotavyaṃ saugataṃ varaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:13069: tatas triratnam abhyarcya dātavyaṃ dānam arthine // Rm_32.167{66} //
K14ratnml_u:13078: dharmaṃ śrutvā sadā dānaṃ prakarttavyaṃ yathepsitaṃ // Rm_32.171{70} //
K14ratnml_u:13079: tvaṃ cāpy evaṃ sadā saukhyaṃ yadīchasi śubhānvitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:13080: triratnaṃ bhajanaṃ kṛtvā kuru dānaṃ yathepsitaṃ // Rm_32.172{71} //
K14ratnml_u:13083: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā sā devatā mudā /
K14ratnml_u:13085: tataḥ sa sugataḥ puṣyas tathāgataḥ sasāṃghikaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13087: eṣa hy ayaṃ virūpo 'sau devatā yā guhāśritā /
K14ratnml_u:13088: yuṣmābhiḥ satyam eveti manyatāṃ nānyathā khalu // Rm_32.176{75} //
K14ratnml_u:13090: triratnabhajanaṃ kṛtvā caritavyaṃ śubhe sadā // Rm_32.177{76} //
K14ratnml_u:13091: śubhasya karmaṇaḥ pāke śubhataivaṃ sadā bhave /
K14ratnml_u:13092: kṛṣṇasya duḥkhataivaṃ hi miśritasyāpi miśritaṃ // Rm_32.178{77} //
K14ratnml_u:13093: abhuktaṃ kṣīyate naiva karma kvāpi kadā cana /
K14ratnml_u:13094: yenaiva yat kṛtaṃ karma tenaiva bhujyate phalaṃ // Rm_32.179{78} //
K14ratnml_u:13095: nāgnibhir dahyate karma klidyate nāpi codakaiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13096: śuṣyate vāyubhir naiva kṣīyate ca na bhūmiṣu // Rm_32.180{79} //
K14ratnml_u:13097: nānyathāpi bhave naiva karma kvāpi kathaṃ cana /
K14ratnml_u:13098: yad yathā prakṛtaṃ karmaṃ tat tathaiva kuled dhruvaṃ // Rm_32.181{80} //
K14ratnml_u:13099: yad asau devatā tatra guhāśritā durāśayā /
K14ratnml_u:13100: vikṛtāṅgā virūpākṣā bhūtvā puṣyaṃ vyabhīṣapat // Rm_32.182{81} //
K14ratnml_u:13102: vikṛtāṅgo virūpākṣo babhūvāyaṃ bhave sadā // Rm_32.183{82} //
K14ratnml_u:13104: vibhransyo durbhagākāro bhavaty atrāpi sāṃprataṃ // Rm_32.184{83} //
K14ratnml_u:13106: tasya puṣyasya buddhasya prasannā śaraṇaṃ gatā // Rm_32.185{84} //
K14ratnml_u:13107: śraddhayā bhojanair divyaiḥ satkṛtya prābhajan mudā /
K14ratnml_u:13111: iti yūyaṃ parijñāya caradhvaṃ sarvadā śubhe /
K14ratnml_u:13112: tato bodhiṃ samāsādya saṃbuddhapadam āpnuyuḥ // Rm_32.188{87} //
K14ratnml_u:13113: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa sarve te sāṃghikā api /
K14ratnml_u:13114: śrutvānumoditāḥ satyam ity uktvā parimenire // Rm_32.189{88} //
K14ratnml_u:13116: tvayāpy evaṃ mahārāja caritavyaṃ śubhe sadā // Rm_32.190{89} //
K14ratnml_u:13117: prajāś cāpi tathā rājan bodhayitvā prayatnataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13119: tena te sarvadā nityaṃ sarvatrāpi śubhaṃ bhavet /
K14ratnml_u:13121: kramād bodhiṃ samāsādya saṃbuddhapadam āpnuyāḥ // Rm_32.192{91} //
K14ratnml_u:13123: tathā hīti pratijñāya prābhyanandat prabodhitaḥ // Rm_32.193{92} //
K14ratnml_u:13124: śāstrādiṣṭaṃ prasannā idam api manuja ye virūpāvadānaṃ śṛṇvanti śrāvayanti pramuditamanaso ye ca puṇyābhirāgāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13125: sarve te śrīsametāḥ sakalaguṇadharāḥ satsukhāni prabhuktvā saṃbuddhabhaktiraktāḥ sugatavaragṛhe saṃprayānti pramodaṃ // Rm_32.194{93} //
K14ratnml_u:13130: upaguptaṃ yatiṃ natvā punar evam abhāṣata // Rm_33.1{1} //
K14ratnml_u:13131: bhadanta śrotum ichāmi punar anyat subhāṣitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:13133: iti saṃprārthite rājñā śrutvā so 'rhan sudhīr yatiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13134: aśokaṃ taṃ mahīpālaṃ samālokyaivam abravīt // Rm_33.3{3} //
K14ratnml_u:13135: śṛṇu rājan mahābhāga yathā me guruṇoditaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:13136: tathāhaṃ tat pravakṣyāmi tava dharmavivṛddhaye // Rm_33.4{4} //
K14ratnml_u:13138: prasenajid iti khyāto mahārājā mahīpatiḥ // Rm_33.5{5} //
K14ratnml_u:13143: tatra sa kṣatriyo rājā prasenajin narādhipaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13148: vadhvā kāṣṭapaṭaṃ tatra prāvatasthe pure yathā // Rm_33.10{10} //
K14ratnml_u:13149: tac chrutvā brahmadatto 'pi kṣatriyo bhūpatir nṛpaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13152: vaijayantīṃ samucchrāya nadyā tīram upācarat // Rm_33.12{12} //
K14ratnml_u:13154: vadhvā kāṣṭapaṭaṃ tatra saṃtasthe nagare yathā // Rm_33.13{13} //
K14ratnml_u:13155: tatra sa bhūpatī rājā brahmadatto narādhipaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13157: tadā sa mahiṣī rājñā saha krīḍāratā satī /
K14ratnml_u:13159: tathā tasmin kṣaṇe so 'pi prasenajin narādhipaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13160: mahiṣyā saha saṃraktaḥ prareme paricārayan // Rm_33.16{16} //
K14ratnml_u:13167: sā sūta samaye putraṃ divyāṃśam atisuṃdaraṃ // Rm_33.19{19} //
K14ratnml_u:13168: tac chrutvā sa bhūpālo brahmadattaḥ pramoditaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13169: sahasopetya taṃ putraṃ dṛṣṭvā na tṛptim āyayau // Rm_33.20{20} //
K14ratnml_u:13170: tasminn eva dine tasya prasenajin mahīpateḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13171: bhāryāpi samaye sūta sutāṃ divyātisuṃdarīṃ // Rm_33.21{21} //
K14ratnml_u:13174: tac chrutvā sa mahīpālaḥ prasenajit prasāditaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13176: tāṃ dṛṣṭvā sa nareṃdro 'pi me vabhūva samāgataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13177: tām eva suciraṃ paśyann avatasthe suniścalaḥ // Rm_33.24{24} //
K14ratnml_u:13178: tayor apy ubhayo rājñoḥ skaṃdhācārāḥ pravarttitāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13179: ye nityaṃ tatpravṛttāṃtaṃ svaprabhor upahārakāḥ // Rm_33.25{25} //
K14ratnml_u:13181: putro jāta iti śrutvā parijñāya prasedire // Rm_33.26{26} //
K14ratnml_u:13183: kṛtāṃjalipuṭo natvā pura evaṃ nyavedayan // Rm_33.27{27} //
K14ratnml_u:13184: jaya deva mahārāja śṛṇu tatra pravarttitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:13185: brahmadattasya bhūpasya putro jāto 'dhunā khalu // Rm_33.28{28} //
K14ratnml_u:13187: tat tvayā saha saṃvaṃdhaṃ kṛtvā sa svapuraṃ vrajet // Rm_33.29{29} //
K14ratnml_u:13188: tat prasīda mahārāja mā vibhaiṣīḥ śubhaṃ bhavet /
K14ratnml_u:13189: tena saṃdhiṃ bhavān kṛtvā viharatāṃ yathāsukhaṃ // Rm_33.30{30} //
K14ratnml_u:13190: iti taiḥ kathitaṃ śrutvā sa prasenajin narādhipaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13191: satyam etad iti jñātvā prasasāda 'viśaṃkitaḥ // Rm_33.31{31} //
K14ratnml_u:13193: te prasenajitaḥ putrī jāteti śuśruvus tadā // Rm_33.32{31} //
K14ratnml_u:13194: tatas te sahasā tatra brahmadattasya bhūpateḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13196: jaya deva mahārāja śṛṇu tatra pravarttitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:13201: tena sahātra saṃvaṃdhaṃ karttum arhati sarvathā // Rm_33.36{36} //
K14ratnml_u:13202: iti taiḥ kathitaṃ śrutvā brahmadatto narādhipaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13203: bhadram iti parijñāya tatraivaṃ samaciṃtayat // Rm_33.37{37} //
K14ratnml_u:13204: aho citra mahotsāho bhadram ekasmin divase yataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13205: jāto me 'tra suto bhadras tasyāpi jāyate sutā // Rm_33.38{38} //
K14ratnml_u:13206: tat tāṃ bhadrāṃ ramākārāṃ taṃ prasenajitam ādarat /
K14ratnml_u:13207: prārthayitvātra putrāya sandhiṃ kṛtvā carevahi // Rm_33.39{39} //
K14ratnml_u:13208: iti niścitya sa brahmadatto rājā prasāditaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13210: sujanaṃ dūtam āmaṃtrya pura evaṃ samabravīt // Rm_33.40{40} //
K14ratnml_u:13211: gacha dūta mahīpālaṃ taṃ prasenajitam ādarāt /
K14ratnml_u:13214: bhavatā saha saṃvaṃdhaṃ karttum ichāmi sāṃprataṃ // Rm_33.42{42} //
K14ratnml_u:13215: yad ekasmin dine jātau dārakāv āvayor api /
K14ratnml_u:13216: sutā te bhadrikā khyātā mama putro 'pi bhadrikaḥ // Rm_33.43{43} //
K14ratnml_u:13217: tad etayor hi saṃvaṃdhaṃ karttum arhāvahe dhruvaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:13218: tad bhavān mama putrāya svātmajāṃ dātum arhati // Rm_33.44{44} //
K14ratnml_u:13220: vairotsargo bhaven nūnaṃ prītisaṃdhir na bhetsyati // Rm_33.45{45} //
K14ratnml_u:13222: nirītikaṃ śubhotsāhaṃ bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // Rm_33.46{46} //
K14ratnml_u:13223: iti me vacasā rājā prasenajit sa kauśalaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13224: prārthanīyas tvayā sādho gachāstu te sumaṃgalaṃ // Rm_33.47{47} //
K14ratnml_u:13225: ity ādiṣṭaṃ narendreṇa śrutvā dūtaḥ sa bodhitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13226: tathety uktvā nṛpaṃ natvā samutthāya tato 'carat // Rm_33.48{48} //
K14ratnml_u:13227: tatra sa sahasā gatvā taṃ prasenajitaṃ nṛpaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:13228: upetya sāṃjalir natvā purastha evam abravīt // Rm_33.49{49} //
K14ratnml_u:13230: tadarthaṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi bhavāṃ śrotuṃ samarhati // Rm_33.50{50} //
K14ratnml_u:13232: pṛchati sarvadā nityaṃ sarvatra viṣayeṣv api // Rm_33.51{51} //
K14ratnml_u:13233: punar evaṃ sa bhūpālo brahmadatto bravīty api /
K14ratnml_u:13234: bhavatā saha saṃvaṃdhaṃ kartum ichāmi sāṃprataṃ // Rm_33.52{52} //
K14ratnml_u:13235: yad ekasmin dine jātau dārakāv āvayor iha /
K14ratnml_u:13236: sutā te bhadrikā khyāto mama putro 'pi bhadrikaḥ // Rm_33.53{53} //
K14ratnml_u:13237: tad etayor hi saṃvaṃdhaṃ kartum arhāmahe dhruvaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:13238: tad bhavān mama putrāya svātmajāṃ dātum arhati // Rm_33.54{54} //
K14ratnml_u:13240: vairotsargo bhaven nūnaṃ prītisaṃdhir na bhetsyate // Rm_33.55{55} //
K14ratnml_u:13242: nirītikaṃ śubhotsāhaṃ bhaved eva na saṃśayaḥ // Rm_33.56{56} //
K14ratnml_u:13243: iti me vacasā rājā prasenajit sa kauśalaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13244: prārthanīyas tvayā sādho gachāstu tvaṃ samāhitaḥ // Rm_33.57{57} //
K14ratnml_u:13246: preṣito 'haṃ mahārāja bhavatām aṃtike khalu // Rm_33.58{58} //
K14ratnml_u:13248: bhavān api tathā kartum arhaty edan na nānyathā // Rm_33.59{59} //
K14ratnml_u:13249: evaṃ hi bhavatāṃ bhadraṃ yāvājjīvaṃ sukhaiḥ sadā /
K14ratnml_u:13250: sarvatra maṅgalotsāhaṃ bhaven nūnaṃ na saṃśayaḥ // Rm_33.60{60} //
K14ratnml_u:13251: tad bhavān api rājendra brahmadattasya bhūpateḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13252: putrāya svātmajāṃ bhadrāṃ saṃpradātum ihārhati // Rm_33.61{61} //
K14ratnml_u:13254: iti tena samākhyātaṃ śrutvā sa kośalādhipaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13255: tuṣṇībhūtvā kṣaṇaṃ tatra manasaivaṃ vyaciṃtayet // Rm_33.62{62} //
K14ratnml_u:13256: aho me jāyate kṣemaṃ yad asau kṣatriyādhipaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13257: vairaṃ vihāya saṃvandhaṃ karttum ichati sāṃprataṃ // Rm_33.63{63} //
K14ratnml_u:13258: tad ahaṃ tena bhūpena yathādiṣṭaṃ tathā 'dhunā /
K14ratnml_u:13259: datvaināṃ svātmajāṃ bhadrāṃ saṃdhiṃ kuryāṃ śubhāptaye // Rm_33.64{64} //
K14ratnml_u:13260: evaṃ kṛte sadā kṣemaṃ sarvatra viṣayeṣv api /
K14ratnml_u:13261: mama tasyāpi bhūpasya bhaven nūnaṃ na cānyathā // Rm_33.65{65} //
K14ratnml_u:13262: iti dhyātvā viniścitya prasenajit sa kauśalaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13263: taṃ dūtaṃ samupāmaṃtrya samālokyaivam abravīt // Rm_33.66{66} //
K14ratnml_u:13265: ājñāṃ śirasā dhṛtivā kariṣyāmi sadāpy ahaṃ // Rm_33.67{67} //
K14ratnml_u:13266: evaṃ me vacasā sādho sarvam etat suvistaraṃ /
K14ratnml_u:13267: samākhyāya narendraṃ taṃ prasādayitum arhasi // Rm_33.68{68} //
K14ratnml_u:13268: iti tena narendreṇa samākhyātaṃ niśamya saḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13269: dūtas tatheti vijñapya prābhyanandat prasāditaḥ // Rm_33.69{69} //
K14ratnml_u:13270: tataḥ sa dūtas taṃ bhūpaṃ kośalādhipatiṃ mudā /
K14ratnml_u:13271: natvā dṛṣṭvā samāmaṃtrya tato 'carat pramoditaḥ // Rm_33.70{70} //
K14ratnml_u:13272: tataḥ sa sahasā gatvā brahmadattasya bhūpateḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13273: upetya sāṃjaliḥ pādau praṇatvevam abhāṣata // Rm_33.71{71} //
K14ratnml_u:13274: jaya deva mahārāja diṣṭyā varddhasva sāṃprataṃ /
K14ratnml_u:13275: yathābhilaṣitaṃ sarvaṃ tat siddham iti manyatāṃ // Rm_33.72{72} //
K14ratnml_u:13276: tad yathā bhavatādiṣṭaṃ tathā vijñāpitaṃ mayā /
K14ratnml_u:13279: sarvadā te bhaved bhadraṃ sarvatra viṣayeṣv api // Rm_33.74{74} //
K14ratnml_u:13280: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā brahmadattaḥ sa bhūpatiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13282: tataḥ sa bhūpatī rājā brahmadatto mahotsavaiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13284: tataḥ saṃprasthito lokaiḥ stūyamānaḥ surair api /
K14ratnml_u:13285: pracaran sahasā tatra svapuraṃ samupāyayau // Rm_33.77{77} //
K14ratnml_u:13289: pracaran sa nṛpo tatra śrāvastyāṃ samupācarat // Rm_33.79{79} //
K14ratnml_u:13290: tatra svanagare prāptaḥ prasenajit sa kauśalaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13292: tāṃ bhadarikāṃ sutāṃ dṛṣṭvā suprasannāśayo mudā /
K14ratnml_u:13293: aho kṣemaṃ prajātaṃ me ity evaṃ muhur abravīt // Rm_33.81{81} //
K14ratnml_u:13294: tatas tasyāḥ sutāyāḥ sa kṛtvā jātimahaṃ mudā /
K14ratnml_u:13295: sarvañ jñātīn samāhūya pura evam upādiśat // Rm_33.82{82} //
K14ratnml_u:13297: bhadantaḥ śrūyatām asyā bhadrāyā duhitur mama /
K14ratnml_u:13300: saṃpaśyañ jñātayas tatra saṃmīlyaivaṃ samabruvan // Rm_33.84{84} //
K14ratnml_u:13301: yasmin dine prajāteyaṃ tasminn eva dine yataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13302: kṣemaṃ no jāyate tasmāt kṣemābhidhā bhavantv iyaṃ // Rm_33.85{85} //
K14ratnml_u:13303: iti te jñātayaḥ sarve kṛtvaivaṃ saṃmataṃ tataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13304: kauśalendraṃ tam āmaṃtrya praṇatvaivaṃ samabruvan // Rm_33.86{86} //
K14ratnml_u:13305: śṛṇu rājan yad asmākam abhiprāyaṃ pracakṣyate /
K14ratnml_u:13306: tad asyā nāmadheyaṃ karotu bhuvi viśrutaṃ // Rm_33.87{87} //
K14ratnml_u:13307: yasmin dine prajāteyaṃ kṣemaṃ bhavati sarvataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13308: tenāsyā kriyatāṃ nāma kṣemeti viśrutaṃ bhuvi // Rm_33.88{88} //
K14ratnml_u:13309: tathā tair gaditaṃ śrutvā rājā sa janako mudā /
K14ratnml_u:13310: tasyāḥ putryās tathā nāma kṣemeti prārthitaṃ vyadhāt // Rm_33.89{89} //
K14ratnml_u:13312: paripuṣṭā pravṛddhābhūd dhradastham iva paṃkajaṃ // Rm_33.90{90} //
K14ratnml_u:13313: tathā sa brahmadatto 'pi rājā svāntargṛhe gataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13314: taṃ putrāṃ muhur ālokya prābhyanaṃdat pramoditaḥ // Rm_33.91{91} //
K14ratnml_u:13315: tatra tasya śiśo rājā kṛtvā jātimahaṃ pitā /
K14ratnml_u:13316: sarvāñ jñātīn samāhūya pura evam abhāṣata // Rm_33.92{92} //
K14ratnml_u:13319: ity ādiṣṭaṃ narendreṇa śrutvā te jñātayo mudā /
K14ratnml_u:13320: sarve 'py ekatra saṃgamya mithar evaṃ samabruvan // Rm_33.94{94} //
K14ratnml_u:13321: yad ayaṃ jātamātro 'pi kṣemaṃ karoti sarvataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13322: tathāsya bhavatu kṣemaṃkara ity āhvayaṃ dhruvaṃ // Rm_33.95{95} //
K14ratnml_u:13323: iti te jñātayaḥ sarve brahmadattasya bhūpateḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13325: śṛṇu rājan yad asmābhir nāmāsya kriyate śiśoḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13326: tan nāma kṣemasaṃpannaṃ prathayatu bhāvān bhuvi // Rm_33.97{97} //
K14ratnml_u:13327: yad ayaṃ jātamātro 'pi kṣemaṃ karoti sarvataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13329: etat taiḥ kathitam śrutvā brahmadattaḥ sa bhūpatiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13330: tad eva nāme putrasya tasyākarot pravisṛtaṃ // Rm_33.99{99} //
K14ratnml_u:13332: paripuṣṭaḥ pravṛddho 'bhūd dhradasthaṃ kamalaṃ yathā // Rm_33.100{100} //
K14ratnml_u:13333: tataḥ kramāt kumāratvam āptavān sa nṛpātmajaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13334: gurūṇāṃ samupāśritya lipī kramād aśikṣat // Rm_33.101{1} //
K14ratnml_u:13336: sarvaśāstrakalāsv ādi vidyāparaṃ yayau laghu // Rm_33.102{2} //
K14ratnml_u:13337: tataḥ sa daharaḥ kāntaḥ kumāro ratilālitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13339: savayeḥsacivaiḥ sārddhaṃ reme pure paribhraman // Rm_33.103{3} //
K14ratnml_u:13340: tadā sa dārikā kṣemā prasenajitsutāpi ca /
K14ratnml_u:13342: tataḥ sā bhadrikā kanyā sumatir guṇalālasāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13343: gurūṇāṃ samupāśritya kramāl lipir aśikṣata // Rm_33.105{5} //
K14ratnml_u:13346: tadā sā bhāvinī kṣemā svasakhībhiḥ samanvitā /
K14ratnml_u:13349: tāṃ kṣemāṃ suṃdarīṃ draṣṭuṃ samaichad ratilālasaḥ // Rm_33.108{8} //
K14ratnml_u:13350: tataḥ sa dūtam āhūya bodhayitvā prasādayan /
K14ratnml_u:13351: datvā suratnamālāṃ taṃ kṣemāyāḥ preṣayet svayaṃ // Rm_33.109{9} //
K14ratnml_u:13352: tataḥ sa dūta ādāya tāṃ mālāṃ sahasā caran /
K14ratnml_u:13353: śrāvastyāḥ puri saṃprāptaḥ kṣemāyāḥ sadane 'carat // Rm_33.110{10} //
K14ratnml_u:13354: tatra sa dūta ālokya sakhīm ekām upāgatāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:13355: tām upetya samāmaṃtrya suguptam evam abravīt // Rm_33.111{11} //
K14ratnml_u:13357: ratnamālāṃ tvam ādāya bhadre tasyai samarpaya // Rm_33.112{12} //
K14ratnml_u:13358: ity uktvā ratnamālāṃ tāṃ kṣemāsakhīkare rahaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13359: datvā sa dūta āmaṃtrya sahasā svapuraṃ yayau // Rm_33.113{13} //
K14ratnml_u:13360: tatra sāpi sakhī tasyāḥ kṣemāyāḥ purato gatā /
K14ratnml_u:13361: prābhṛtaṃ tam upasthāpya rahasy evaṃ nyavedayat // Rm_33.114{14} //
K14ratnml_u:13362: ayi bhadram imaṃ paśya prahitaṃ svāminā tava /
K14ratnml_u:13363: tad idaṃ tvaṃ samāśliṣya patim iva vibhāvaya // Rm_33.115{15} //
K14ratnml_u:13364: iti tayoditaṃ śrutvā sā kṣemā lajjitāśayā /
K14ratnml_u:13366: tataḥ sā kanyakā kṣemā tāṃ sakhīṃ purataḥ sthitāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:13367: sucirāt samupārabhya hartsayanty evam abravīt // Rm_33.117{17} //
K14ratnml_u:13368: are re kiṃ vadasy evaṃ svāmī me kātra vidyate /
K14ratnml_u:13369: nilajje vada tat kena prahitaṃ prābhṛtaṃ tava // Rm_33.118{18} //
K14ratnml_u:13370: ity uktaṃ sā sakhī śrutvā kṣemāyā durituḥ prabhoḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13372: evaṃ sakhyā samākhyātaṃ śrutvā sā nṛpanaṃdinī /
K14ratnml_u:13374: tata utthāya sā kṣemā kanyāpi sahasā pituḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13375: upetya caraṇau natvā sāṃjalir evam abravīt // Rm_33.121{21} //
K14ratnml_u:13376: tāta kāmārthinī nāham api tu sadguṇārthinī /
K14ratnml_u:13377: sadguṇāṃ sādhayiṣyāmi tad anujñāṃ dadātu me // Rm_33.122{22} //
K14ratnml_u:13378: yad ahaṃ śāsane bauddhe pravrajitvā samāhita /
K14ratnml_u:13379: brahmacaryaṃ samādhāya prechāmi carituṃ prabho // Rm_33.123{23} //
K14ratnml_u:13381: anujñāṃ saṃpradatv me sarvathānugrahaṃ kuru // Rm_33.124{24} //
K14ratnml_u:13383: ity arthitaṃ tayā putryā śrutvā sa kośalādhipaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13384: tāṃ kumārīṃ samālokya tasthau saṃdigdhamānasaḥ // Rm_33.125{25} //
K14ratnml_u:13385: tataḥ sa janako rājā tāṃ kṣemāṃ svātmajāṃ priyāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:13387: naivaṃ putri mayā kartuṃ śakyate tat kṣamasva me /
K14ratnml_u:13388: yat te janmani me rāṣṭre kṣemam evaṃ prajāyate // Rm_33.127{27} //
K14ratnml_u:13391: tad yathā me pratijñātaṃ vacanaṃ pūrayātmaje /
K14ratnml_u:13392: mā kṛthāḥ sarvathā kṣeme pravrajyāsādhane mama // Rm_33.129{29} //
K14ratnml_u:13393: yathā mayā pratijñātaṃ kariṣye na tad anyathā /
K14ratnml_u:13394: matveti me vacaḥ śrutvā kuladharme carātmaje // Rm_33.130{30} //
K14ratnml_u:13395: evaṃ pitroditaṃ śrutvā sā kṣemā prahatāśayā /
K14ratnml_u:13396: utthāya svālaye gatvā tūṣṇībhūtā nyaṣīdata // Rm_33.131{31} //
K14ratnml_u:13397: tadā sa janako rājā dūtam āhūya sādaraṃ /
K14ratnml_u:13398: sarvam etat pravṛttāṃtaṃ samākhyāyaivam abravīt // Rm_33.132{32} //
K14ratnml_u:13400: pura etat pravṛttāṃtaṃ nivedyaivaṃ prabodhaya // Rm_33.133{33} //
K14ratnml_u:13401: yad iyaṃ me sutā kṣemā pravrajituṃ samichati /
K14ratnml_u:13402: tad imāṃ sahasāgatvā bhavān ādātum arhati // Rm_33.134{34} //
K14ratnml_u:13403: iti rājñā samādiṣṭaṃ śrutvā puraḥ sa sādaraṃ /
K14ratnml_u:13404: tatheti saṃpratijñāya praṇatvā taṃ tato 'carat // Rm_33.135{35} //
K14ratnml_u:13405: tatra sa sahasā gatvā brahmadattasya bhūpateḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13406: upetya sāṃjalir natvā pura evaṃ nyavedayat // Rm_33.136{36} //
K14ratnml_u:13408: kośalendreṇa tad bhavāṃ śṛṇotv evaṃ bravīti saḥ // Rm_33.137{37} //
K14ratnml_u:13409: yad iyaṃ me sutā kṣemā pravrajituṃ samichati /
K14ratnml_u:13410: tad imāṃ sahasāgatvā bhavān āhartum arhati // Rm_33.138{38} //
K14ratnml_u:13411: yathā mayā pratijñātaṃ karttuṃ na śakyate 'nyathā /
K14ratnml_u:13412: tad ahaṃ te kumārāya dāsyāmi svātmajām imāṃ // Rm_33.139{39} //
K14ratnml_u:13414: preṣito 'ham iti jñātvā tat tatrāgaṃtum arhati // Rm_33.140{40} //
K14ratnml_u:13415: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā brahmadattaḥ sa bhūpatiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13416: taṃ dūtaṃ sahasāmaṃtrya pura evam abhāṣata // Rm_33.141{41} //
K14ratnml_u:13418: yat tat kṛtyaṃ hi tat sarvaṃ karttavyam iti kathyatāṃ // Rm_33.142{42} //
K14ratnml_u:13420: natvā tatheti vijñapya samutthāya tato 'carat // Rm_33.143{43} //
K14ratnml_u:13421: tatra sa sahasā gatvā svapuraṃ samupācaran /
K14ratnml_u:13422: nṛpatiṃ sāṃjalir natvā pura evaṃ nyavedayat // Rm_33.144{44} //
K14ratnml_u:13424: tathā vijñāpitaṃ sarvaṃ tad uktaṃ yācyate śṛṇu // Rm_33.145{45} //
K14ratnml_u:13427: tad yat kṛtyaṃ hi tat sarvaṃ sādhayituṃ tvam arhasi // Rm_33.146{46} //
K14ratnml_u:13429: iti satyaṃ parijñāya sarvaṃ kṛtyaṃ prakāraya // Rm_33.147{47} //
K14ratnml_u:13430: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā prasenajit sa bhūpatiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13432: tadaitat sarvavṛttāṃtaṃ śrutvā cā dārikā sudhīḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13434: hā kiṃ mayātra karttavyaṃ vivāhāṃ me bhave yataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13436: kāmā hi garhyate sadbhi varṇyate saugataṃ vrataṃ /
K14ratnml_u:13437: tad atra kiṃ kariṣyāmi yan me na gocaraṃ vrate // Rm_33.151{51} //
K14ratnml_u:13438: dhig janma tasya saṃsāre yasya na gocaraṃ vrate /
K14ratnml_u:13439: vrataṃ vinātra kiṃ sāraṃ kāmabhogyai guṇair api // Rm_33.152{52} //
K14ratnml_u:13440: tad atra kva gamiṣyāmi nimagnā kāmapaṃkile /
K14ratnml_u:13441: ko me trātā bhaved atra saṃbuddhād aparaḥ kṛtī // Rm_33.153{53} //
K14ratnml_u:13442: tad atra taṃ jagannāthaṃ sarvajñaṃ sarvatāyinaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:13443: saṃsmṛtvā śaraṇaṃ gatvā prārthaye sādhunādarāt // Rm_33.154{54} //
K14ratnml_u:13445: kṛpayā māṃ samālokya buddhavrate niyojayet // Rm_33.155{55} //
K14ratnml_u:13446: yadi me daivayogena vrataṃ naiva labheya hi /
K14ratnml_u:13447: saṃbuddhaśaraṇodbhūtaṃ puṇyaṃ tu labhyate dhruvaṃ // Rm_33.156{56} //
K14ratnml_u:13448: saṃbuddhasmṛtijaṃ puṇyaṃ na kṣiṇoti kadā cana /
K14ratnml_u:13449: saṃbuddhasaṃvaraṃ dadyād iti prajñair nigadyate // Rm_33.157{57} //
K14ratnml_u:13450: tad ahaṃ taṃ jagannāthaṃ smṛtvātra maraṇaṃ varaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:13451: na tu kāmaviṣaṃ bhokṣye bhojye puṇyāmṛtaṃ dhruvaṃ // Rm_33.158{58} //
K14ratnml_u:13452: iti niścitya sā kṣemā snātvā śuddhāmvarāvṛtā /
K14ratnml_u:13453: śaraṇapṛṣṭham āruhya abhavad dinmukhā sthitā // Rm_33.159{59} //
K14ratnml_u:13455: bhagavantam anusmṛtvā natvaivaṃ prārthayat tridhā // Rm_33.160{60} //
K14ratnml_u:13459: tvam eva hi jagannātha tat te 'haṃ śaraṇaṃ vraje // Rm_33.162{62} //
K14ratnml_u:13460: tan māṃ bhavodadhau magnāṃ kṛpayoddhartum arhati /
K14ratnml_u:13461: iti saṃprārthite satyo kanyayā kṣemayā tayā /
K14ratnml_u:13462: bhagavān kṛpayā dṛṣṭyā dadarśa tāṃ śubhāśayāṃ // Rm_33.163{63} //
K14ratnml_u:13463: tataḥ sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā tāṃ kṣemāṃ bodhibhāvinīṃ /
K14ratnml_u:13464: ṛddhyākaśāt samāgatya tatra kṣemāntike yayau // Rm_33.164{64} //
K14ratnml_u:13465: tatra taṃ śrīghanaṃ dṛṣṭvā sā kṣemā sahasotthitā /
K14ratnml_u:13466: prajñapya svāsanaṃ natvā sāṃjalir evam abravīt // Rm_33.165{65} //
K14ratnml_u:13468: prasīda kṛpayapāyān māṃ samuddhartuṃ arhasi // Rm_33.166{66} //
K14ratnml_u:13470: iti tasyārthitaṃ śrutvā bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13471: tāṃ kṣemāṃ bhadrikāṃ kanyāṃ samālokyaivam ādiśat // Rm_33.167{67} //
K14ratnml_u:13472: mā bhaiṣi bhadrike kanye tvadīhitaṃ samṛdhyati /
K14ratnml_u:13473: tathā me śaraṇaṃ gatvā cara śubhe samāhitā // Rm_33.168{68} //
K14ratnml_u:13478: tataḥ sā muditā kanyā dṛṣṭasatyā prasāditā /
K14ratnml_u:13479: sāṃjalis taṃ muniṃ natvā prārthayac caivam ādarāt // Rm_33.171{71} //
K14ratnml_u:13480: bhagavan sarvavin nātha sadaivaṃ kṛpayā bhavān /
K14ratnml_u:13481: dṛṣṭvā māṃ saugate dharme niyojya trātum arhati // Rm_33.172{72} //
K14ratnml_u:13482: ity arthitaṃ tayā śrutvā bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13483: tathā hīti pratijñāya tathārddhyā cāśrame yayau // Rm_33.173{73} //
K14ratnml_u:13484: tadā sā kanyakā kṣemā saṃbuddhaśaraṇaṃ gatā /
K14ratnml_u:13485: saṃsmṛtya śraddhayā nityaṃ prācaran muditā śubhe // Rm_33.174{74} //
K14ratnml_u:13489: sahasā maṃgalotsāhaiḥ pratyudyayau tam ādarāt // Rm_33.176{76} //
K14ratnml_u:13490: tatra sa kośaleśas taṃ brahmadattaṃ narādhipaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:13491: upetya kuśalaṃ dṛṣṭvā svapure saṃnyaveśayat // Rm_33.177{77} //
K14ratnml_u:13494: tataḥ sa kauśalo rājā tadvivāhadine śubhe /
K14ratnml_u:13497: mātrā saha samāgatya tatrāsane samāśrayat // Rm_33.180{80} //
K14ratnml_u:13499: pitrā saha samāgatya tatrāsane upāviśat // Rm_33.181{81} //
K14ratnml_u:13500: tataḥ sa vidhivid dhotā śuddhāsane samāśrayan /
K14ratnml_u:13501: vidhināgniṃ samāvāhya sa havyaiḥ samatarpayat // Rm_33.182{82} //
K14ratnml_u:13503: kṣemaṃkarāya tāṃ kṣemāṃ saṃkalpayitum ārabhat // Rm_33.183{83} //
K14ratnml_u:13505: kṣemāyā hastam ādāya kumārasyāsya prāgrahīt // Rm_33.184{84} //
K14ratnml_u:13506: tasminn eva kṣaṇe tatra sā kṣemā sahasodgatā /
K14ratnml_u:13507: pakṣivat khaṃ samāśritya tasthau dhyātvā munīśvaraṃ // Rm_33.185{85} //
K14ratnml_u:13508: tātra sā bhāsayanty eva sthitā ciraṃ samāhitā /
K14ratnml_u:13510: tad dṛṣṭvā kauśalo rājā prasenajit pitāpi saḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13511: brahmadatto narendro 'pi purohito dvijo 'pi saḥ // Rm_33.187{87} //
K14ratnml_u:13512: kṣemaṃkaraḥ kumāro 'pi sarve 'pi brāhmaṇāś ca te /
K14ratnml_u:13513: amātyā maṃtriṇaś cāpi sarve sainyagaṇā api // Rm_33.188{88} //
K14ratnml_u:13515: paurāś cāpi striyo 'nye 'pi dārakā dārikā api /
K14ratnml_u:13518: tāṃ kṣemāṃ sāṃjalir natvā prārthayad evam ādarāt // Rm_33.190{90} //
K14ratnml_u:13519: namas te bhagini kṣeme yat te 'haṃ kāmalālasāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13520: pāṇiṃ grahītum ichāmi tat kṣamasva dayānidhe // Rm_33.191{91} //
K14ratnml_u:13522: yat kāmān paribhuṃjīthā ity asthānam eva hi // Rm_33.192{92} //
K14ratnml_u:13523: tat kṣamasva tvam ākāśād avatīrya mahītale /
K14ratnml_u:13525: iti saṃprārthitaṃ tena kumāreṇa niśamya sā /
K14ratnml_u:13529: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pītvā sarve lokāḥ prabodhitāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13530: satyam iti parijñāya prābhyanandan prasāditāḥ // Rm_33.196{96} //
K14ratnml_u:13531: tataḥ kṣemaṃkaraḥ pitrā saha taṃ kośalādhipaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:13532: āmaṃtrya tadguṇāhṛṣṭamanāḥ svaṃ nagaraṃ yayau // Rm_33.197{97} //
K14ratnml_u:13533: tataḥ sā kanyakā kṣemā sāñjaliḥ purato gatā /
K14ratnml_u:13534: pituḥ pādāmbuje natvā prārthayed evam ādarāt // Rm_33.198{93} //
K14ratnml_u:13536: tad itaḥ śāsane bauddhe gantum ichāmi sāṃprataṃ // Rm_33.199{99} //
K14ratnml_u:13537: tad yadi te mayi prītir asti dhārme 'pi vā ruciḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13538: tad atra kṛpayānujñāṃ dātum arhati me pita // Rm_33.200{100} //
K14ratnml_u:13539: iti saṃprārthitaṃ putryā śrutvā sa kauśalādhipaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13540: tāṃ kṣemāṃ svātmajāṃ kanyāṃ ciraṃ dṛṣṭvaivam abravīt // Rm_33.201{1} //
K14ratnml_u:13541: kimetra vakṣyate putri yat tvaṃ saddharmavāṃchinī /
K14ratnml_u:13542: kiṃ cāpy asi mahābhijñāvatī prajñāvatī sudhīḥ // Rm_33.202{1} //
K14ratnml_u:13543: kiṃ tu tvaṃ dārikā kanyā śītavātātapāhatā /
K14ratnml_u:13544: tat pravrajyāvrataṃ vālye carituṃ śaknuyāḥ kathaṃ // Rm_33.203{3} //
K14ratnml_u:13545: saddharma yadi te vāṃchā gṛhe sthitvā samāhitā /
K14ratnml_u:13548: tena saṃbodhim āsādya saṃbuddhapadam āpnuyāḥ // Rm_33.205{5} //
K14ratnml_u:13550: triratnabhajanaṃ kṛtvā cara nityaṃ śubhe sadā // Rm_33.206{6} //
K14ratnml_u:13551: iti pitroditaṃ śrutvā śā kṣemā kāmaniḥspṛhā /
K14ratnml_u:13552: pitaraṃ taṃ samālokya punar evam abhāṣata // Rm_33.207{7} //
K14ratnml_u:13554: kṣaṇaṃ sthātuṃ manas tena vāṃchati saugataṃ vrataṃ // Rm_33.208{8} //
K14ratnml_u:13556: sadā dharmāmṛtaṃ bhuktvā vasanti sadguṇodyatāḥ // Rm_33.209{9} //
K14ratnml_u:13559: yāvajjīvaṃ vrataṃ dhṛtvā yānti cānte jinālayaṃ // Rm_33.210{10} //
K14ratnml_u:13561: tad bhavān kṛpayānujñāṃ dātum arhati me prabho // Rm_33.211{11} //
K14ratnml_u:13562: iti saṃprārthitaṃ putryā śrutvā sa bodhitaḥ pitā /
K14ratnml_u:13563: tathānumodanāṃ kṛtvā tāṃ kṣemām evam abravīt // Rm_33.212{12} //
K14ratnml_u:13564: kiṃ mayā vakṣyate vatse tvam evaṃ satsubhārthinī /
K14ratnml_u:13565: tad vraja śāsane bauddhe vrataṃ cara samāhitā // Rm_33.213{13} //
K14ratnml_u:13567: kṣemā tasya pituḥ pādau natvaiva niryayau tataḥ // Rm_33.214{14} //
K14ratnml_u:13568: tataḥ sā muditā kṣemā sahasā tatra jināśrame /
K14ratnml_u:13569: gatā taṃ śrīghanaṃ dṛṣṭvā muditā samupācarat // Rm_33.215{15} //
K14ratnml_u:13570: tatra sā sāñjalir natvā sāstāraṃ taṃ munīśvaraṃ /
K14ratnml_u:13571: purataḥ samupāsīnā prārthayad evam ādarāt // Rm_33.216{16} //
K14ratnml_u:13572: bhagavan nātha sarvajña bhavatāṃ śaraṇaṃ vraje /
K14ratnml_u:13573: tat pravrajyāvrataṃ datvā sadā me 'nugrahaṃ kuru // Rm_33.217{17} //
K14ratnml_u:13574: ity arthitaṃ tayā śrutvā bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13575: tac chiro dakṣahastena pṛṣṭvā tām evam abravīt // Rm_33.218{18} //
K14ratnml_u:13576: ehi vatse pragacha tvaṃ gautamyāḥ śaraṇaṃ vraja /
K14ratnml_u:13577: sā mātā bhikṣuṇīśāstā pravrajyāṃ te pradāsyati // Rm_33.219{19} //
K14ratnml_u:13578: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā sā muditāśayā /
K14ratnml_u:13579: kṣemā tasyā jaganmātur gautamyāḥ samupācarat // Rm_33.220{20} //
K14ratnml_u:13580: tatra sā samupāsṛtya dṛṣṭvā tāṃ gautamīṃ mudā /
K14ratnml_u:13581: kṛtāñjalipuṭo natvā prārthayad evam ādarāt // Rm_33.221{21} //
K14ratnml_u:13582: jaganmātar ahaṃ kṣemā bhavatyāḥ śaraṇaṃ vraje /
K14ratnml_u:13583: tan pravrajyāvrataṃ mahyaṃ bhavantī dātum arhati // Rm_33.222{22} //
K14ratnml_u:13584: ity arthitaṃ tayā śrutvā gautāmī sā prasāditā /
K14ratnml_u:13585: tac chiro dakṣahastena pṛṣṭvaivaṃ tām abhāṣata // Rm_33.223{23} //
K14ratnml_u:13586: ehi bhikṣuṇi vatse śāsane saugate śubhe /
K14ratnml_u:13590: tataḥ sā bhikṣuṇī kṣemā saumyarūpā jitendriyā /
K14ratnml_u:13594: tataḥ sā sumatīr matvā bhavacakraṃ calācalaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:13595: matvā ca sarvasaṃskāragatiś cāpi vighātinīḥ // Rm_33.228{28} //
K14ratnml_u:13597: sākṣād arhatpadaṃ prāpya babhūva brahmacāriṇī // Rm_33.229{29} //
K14ratnml_u:13602: sa devāsuralokānāṃ vaṃdyā pūjyābhavat satī // Rm_33.231{31} //
K14ratnml_u:13603: tataḥ sa bhagavāñ chāstā sarvajño 'rhan munīśvaraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13604: sarvāns tāṃ śrāvakāṃ bhikṣūn samāmaṃtryaivam ādiśat // Rm_33.232{32} //
K14ratnml_u:13609: ity ādiṣṭe munīndreṇa sarve te sāṃghikā api /
K14ratnml_u:13610: vismitās taṃ muniṃ natvā paprachus tat purākṛtaṃ // Rm_33.235{35} //
K14ratnml_u:13611: bhagavann anayā karma kiṃ purā sukṛtaṃ kṛtaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:13612: yeneyaṃ bhadrikā kṣemā prajñāvatī maharddhikā // Rm_33.236{36} //
K14ratnml_u:13615: tad ime sāṃghikāḥ sarve śrotum ichaṃti sāṃprataṃ /
K14ratnml_u:13616: tat sarvaṃ samupādiśya sarvāl lokān prabodhaya // Rm_33.238{38} //
K14ratnml_u:13617: iti taiḥ prārthitaṃ śrutvā bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13618: sarvāns tān sāṃghikān bhikṣūn samālokyaivam ādiśat // Rm_33.239{39} //
K14ratnml_u:13619: śṛṇuta bhikṣavaḥ sarve purā yad anayā kṛtaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:13622: sarvajño 'rhañ jagacchāstā sugato dharmādhipo jinaḥ // Rm_33.241{41} //
K14ratnml_u:13625: tac chāsane tadā śreṣṭhiduhitā śaraṇaṃ gatā /
K14ratnml_u:13627: sā tatra śāsane bauddhe dadau dānaṃ samādarāt /
K14ratnml_u:13628: dvādaśābda sahasrāṇi brahmacaryaṃ cacāra ca // Rm_33.244{44} //
K14ratnml_u:13629: na kesmiṃ viguṇe 'bhyāsaṃ cakāra sā nirudyamā /
K14ratnml_u:13630: kevalaṃ saṃvaraṃ dhṛtvā triratnaṃ sarvadābhajat // Rm_33.245{45} //
K14ratnml_u:13633: tat samākarṇya sā sādhvī bhikṣuṇī cānumoditā /
K14ratnml_u:13634: manasaivaṃ samādhāya praṇidhānaṃ vyadhān mudā // Rm_33.247{47} //
K14ratnml_u:13635: yathāyam uttaro vipro vyākṛtas tena tāyinā /
K14ratnml_u:13636: kalau śākyamunir nāma tathāgato bhaved iṭi // Rm_33.248{48} //
K14ratnml_u:13637: tadā tasya munīndrasya śāsane śaraṇaṃ gatā /
K14ratnml_u:13640: bhaveya hi yathāpīyam upādhyāyā mamādhunā // Rm_33.250{50} //
K14ratnml_u:13642: triratnasmaraṇaṃ kṛtvā samaye maraṇaṃ yayau // Rm_33.251{51} //
K14ratnml_u:13643: yāsau śreṣṭhisutā hy eṣā kṣemā rājasutādhunā /
K14ratnml_u:13644: yānmeti bhikṣavo yūyaṃ manyadhvaṃ vratam eva hi // Rm_33.252{52} //
K14ratnml_u:13648: yac cāpi hy anayā tatra brahmacaryaṃ supālitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:13650: yadyāpi hy anayā tatra praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ yathā /
K14ratnml_u:13651: tatheyaṃ bhavati hy atra prajñāvatīgaṇādhipā // Rm_33.255{55} //
K14ratnml_u:13652: evaṃ hi yat kṛtaṃ yena tenaiva bhujyate phalaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:13653: abhuktaṃ kṣīyate naiva karma kvāpi kadā cana // Rm_33.256{56} //
K14ratnml_u:13654: nāgnibhir dahyate karma klidyate nodakair api /
K14ratnml_u:13655: vāyubhiḥ śuṣyate naiva kṣīyate nāpi bhūmiṣu // Rm_33.257{57} //
K14ratnml_u:13657: sāmāgrīṃ prāpya kāle hi phalanti prāṇināṃ khalu // Rm_33.258{58} //
K14ratnml_u:13659: kṛṣṇakarmavipāke hi duḥkhataiva sadā bhave // Rm_33.259{59} //
K14ratnml_u:13662: yathaiva yat kṛtaṃ karma tathaiva tat phalaṃ dhruvaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:13663: evaṃ matvātra saṃsāre sarvadā śubhavāṃchibhiḥ // Rm_33.261{61} //
K14ratnml_u:13664: triratnabhajanaṃ kṛtvā caritavyaṃ sadā śubhe // Rm_33.262{62} //
K14ratnml_u:13665: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā te sarvasāṃghikāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13667: etan me guruṇādiṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ mayā tathocyate /
K14ratnml_u:13668: tvaṃ cāpy evaṃ mahārāja cara nityaṃ śubhe sadā // Rm_33.264{64} //
K14ratnml_u:13669: prajāś cāpi tathā rājan bodhayitvā prayatnataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13671: tena te sarvadā nityaṃ sarvatrāpi śubhaṃ bhavet /
K14ratnml_u:13672: kramād bodhiṃ ca saṃprāpya saṃbuddhapadam āpnuyāḥ // Rm_33.266{66} //
K14ratnml_u:13675: kṣemāvadānaṃ manujā idaṃ ye śṛṇvaṃti cāpi niśāmayanti /
K14ratnml_u:13676: te sarva evaṃ satataṃ sukhāni bhuktvā prayānty eva jinālayan te // Rm_33.268{68} //
K14ratnml_u:13681: upaguptaṃ yatiṃ natvā punar evam abhāṣata // Rm_34.1{1} //
K14ratnml_u:13682: bhadanta śrotum ichāmi punar anyat subhāṣitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:13683: tadyathā guruṇādiṣṭaṃ tathādeṣṭuñ ca me 'rhati // Rm_34.2{2} //
K14ratnml_u:13684: iti saṃprārthitaṃ rājñā śrutvā so 'rhan mahāmatiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13685: tam aśokaṃ mahārājaṃ samālokyaivam ādiśat // Rm_34.3{3} //
K14ratnml_u:13686: śṛṇu sādhu mahārāja yathā me guruṇoditaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:13689: sarvajñaḥ sugato śāstā dharmarājas tathāgataḥ // Rm_34.5{5} //
K14ratnml_u:13691: upāsikāgaṇaiś cāpi cailakaiś cāpi tīrthikaṃ // Rm_34.6{6} //
K14ratnml_u:13693: ṛṣibhir yogibhiś cāpi yatibhir brahmacāribhiḥ // Rm_34.7{7} //
K14ratnml_u:13695: vihāre vyaharal lokahitārthaṃ dharmam ādiśan // Rm_34.8{8} //
K14ratnml_u:13696: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pātuṃ sarve satvāḥ pramoditāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13699: siddhā vidyādharāḥ sādhyā garuḍā rākṣasā api // Rm_34.10{10} //
K14ratnml_u:13700: brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā bhūpā rājaputrāś ca maṃtriṇaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13701: amātyāḥ śreṣṭhinaḥ paura gṛhādhipā mahājanāḥ // Rm_34.11{11} //
K14ratnml_u:13704: sarve te samupāśritya vihāre taṃ munīśvaraṃ /
K14ratnml_u:13705: dṛṣṭvā sāñjalayo natvā muditāḥ samunpāviśan // Rm_34.13{13} //
K14ratnml_u:13706: tatra sarve 'pi te nāthaṃ tam abhyarcya yathākramaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:13708: tadā tān samupāsīnāṃ dṛṣṭvā sa bhagavāñ jinaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13710: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pītva sarve brahmādayo 'pi te /
K14ratnml_u:13711: lokāḥ satyam iti matvā prābhyanandan prabodhitāḥ // Rm_34.16{16} //
K14ratnml_u:13715: dṛṣṭvā tad dantakāṣṭhaṃ ca samālokyaivam upāgamat // Rm_34.18{18} //
K14ratnml_u:13718: nūnam ṇataraṇaṃ bhogyaṃ prabhokṣyati sa bhāgyavān // Rm_34.19{19} //
K14ratnml_u:13719: etat tenoditaṃ śrutvā sa āramika unmukhaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13720: tatraiva kṣaṇam āśritya manasaivaṃ vyacintayat // Rm_34.20{20} //
K14ratnml_u:13721: kasmāy etad ahaṃ dadyāṃ saṃmāno yena me bhavet /
K14ratnml_u:13722: evaṃ dhyātvā punas tatra manasaivaṃ vyacintayat // Rm_34.21{21} //
K14ratnml_u:13725: yad asmai dīyate kiñcid api tat phalam uttamaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:13726: aprameyam asaṃkhyeyaṃ mahatkhyātaṃ śrutaṃ mayā // Rm_34.23{23} //
K14ratnml_u:13728: jagacchāstre munīndrāya dadyāṃ kāṣṭham idaṃ nv ahaṃ // Rm_34.24{24} //
K14ratnml_u:13729: iti dhyātvā viniścitya sa āramika ādarāt /
K14ratnml_u:13730: dantakāṣṭhaṃ tad ādāya jetodyāne upācarat // Rm_34.25{25} //
K14ratnml_u:13732: vihāre sa prasannāsyāḥ praviṣṭaḥ samupācarat // Rm_34.26{26} //
K14ratnml_u:13733: tatra tasya munīndrasya dantakāṣṭhaṃ tad ādarāt /
K14ratnml_u:13734: upasthāpya praṇatvā sa sāṃjalir evam abravīt // Rm_34.27{27} //
K14ratnml_u:13736: dantakāṣṭham imaṃ śāstā bhavān ādātum arhati // Rm_34.28{28} //
K14ratnml_u:13737: evaṃ saṃprārthite tena bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13738: dṛṣṭvā tat kāṣṭham ādāya tasyāgrato vyasṛjata // Rm_34.29{29} //
K14ratnml_u:13739: tadā tat kāṣṭham ādāya sa udyānapālako mudā /
K14ratnml_u:13740: tatraiva saugatārāme nikhanya nidadhe bhuvi // Rm_34.30{30} //
K14ratnml_u:13745: tatra sa bhagavān gatvā tacchāyāṃ samupāśrayan /
K14ratnml_u:13747: etad adbhutam ālokya sarve lokāḥ savismayāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13748: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pītvā prābhyanandan pramoditāḥ // Rm_34.34{34} //
K14ratnml_u:13750: samāgatya munīndraṃ taṃ natvaivaṃ prārthayan mudā // Rm_34.35{35} //
K14ratnml_u:13752: pūjayituṃ samichāmi tan mamānugrahaṃ kuru // Rm_34.36{36} //
K14ratnml_u:13753: iti tat prārthitaṃ śrutvā bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13754: tatheti taṃ samālokya tūṣṇīṃ bhūtvādhyuvāsa tat // Rm_34.37{37} //
K14ratnml_u:13756: tatrāsanāni prajñapya tat sāmagrīṃ samānayat // Rm_34.38{38} //
K14ratnml_u:13757: tadā sa bhagavāns tatra sasāṃghikaḥ samutthitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13758: tad dattaṃ pādyam ādāya svasvāsane samāśrayat // Rm_34.39{39} //
K14ratnml_u:13761: dṛṣṭvā sa muditaḥ śreṣṭhī yathākramaṃ samarcayet // Rm_34.40{40} //
K14ratnml_u:13762: tataḥ śatarasai bhojyaiḥ supraṇītaiḥ sa dīnabhṛt /
K14ratnml_u:13764: tataḥ sa śrīghanaṃ sarvasaṃghaṃ ca parituṣṭitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:13765: matvā panīyapātrāṇi tad dhastādīṃ vyaśodhayat // Rm_34.42{42} //
K14ratnml_u:13767: datvā sa sāṃjalir natvā sasaṃghaṃ tam upāśrayat // Rm_34.43{43} //
K14ratnml_u:13768: tataḥ sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā taṃ gṛhastham upasthitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:13770: tad dṛṣṭva samahotsāham āramikaḥ sa mohitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13774: tatra tasya munīndrasya pādayoḥ sa kṛtāñjaliḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13775: praṇatvā manasā bodhipraṇidhānaṃ vyadhān mudā // Rm_34.47{47} //
K14ratnml_u:13779: pratyekāṃ bodhim āsādya nirvṛtipadam āpnuyāṃ // Rm_34.49{49} //
K14ratnml_u:13780: iti tena sucittena praṇidhānam kṛtaṃ sadā /
K14ratnml_u:13781: matvā sa bhagavān smitaṃ visasarja saraśmikaṃ // Rm_34.50{50} //
K14ratnml_u:13783: nānā varṇāḥ samanteṣu bhuvaneṣu sa bhāsayan // Rm_34.51{51} //
K14ratnml_u:13784: ye cādho bhuvane yātāḥ sarvatra narakeṣu te /
K14ratnml_u:13787: nirduḥkhāḥ sukhasaṃpannā vismitā evam ūcire // Rm_34.53{53} //
K14ratnml_u:13788: aho citraṃ kathaṃ duḥkhaṃ prasrabdhaṃ jāyate sukhaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:13789: itaś cyutāḥ kuhānyatra saṃprāptāḥ sāṃprataṃ vayaṃ // Rm_34.54{54} //
K14ratnml_u:13791: bodhārthaṃ nirmitaṃ buddhaṃ bhagavān vyasṛjat tadā // Rm_34.55{55} //
K14ratnml_u:13792: tan nirmitaṃ muniṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve te narakasthititāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13794: naivānyatra gatā sarve ihaiva saṃsthitā vayaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:13797: kṛpayā coditaḥ sarvān samuddharttum ihāgataḥ // Rm_34.58{58} //
K14ratnml_u:13798: tad asya puruṣasyātra sarvair asmābhir ādarāt /
K14ratnml_u:13799: śraddhayā śaraṇaṃ gatvā karttavyaṃ bhajanaṃ mudā // Rm_34.59{59} //
K14ratnml_u:13800: iti saṃbhāṣya te sarve nārakīyā prasāditāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13801: tasya nirmitabuddhasya prābhajañ charaṇaṃ gatāḥ // Rm_34.60{60} //
K14ratnml_u:13804: nirmuktapātakāḥ sarve śuddhakāyā divaṃ yayuḥ // Rm_34.61{61} //
K14ratnml_u:13805: evaṃ te raśmayaḥ sarve sarvāns tān nirayāśṛtān /
K14ratnml_u:13806: avabhāsya samuddhṛtya pratyāyayur muneḥ puraḥ // Rm_34.62{62} //
K14ratnml_u:13807: evam urddhagatā ye ca raśmayas te prasāritāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13808: avabhāsya diśaḥ sarvāḥ saṃprasusruḥ surālayān // Rm_34.63{63} //
K14ratnml_u:13812: puṇyam eva jagatsāraṃ matvā tac cinutādarāt // Rm_34.65{65} //
K14ratnml_u:13814: mārasainyān vinirjitya caradhvaṃ saṃvare sadā // Rm_34.66{66} //
K14ratnml_u:13816: sa hitvā janma saṃsāre duḥkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyati // Rm_34.67{67} //
K14ratnml_u:13817: ity udghoṣaiḥ surān sarvāñ codayitvā samantataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13818: sarve te raśmayas tatra puraḥ pratyāyayur muneḥ // Rm_34.68{68} //
K14ratnml_u:13819: tatra te raśmayaḥ sarve 'py ekībhūtāś ca piṇḍitāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13820: muniṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya tad ūrṇāyāṃ samāviśan // Rm_34.69{69} //
K14ratnml_u:13821: tad dṛṣṭvā sabhāsīnāḥ sarve lokāḥ savismayāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13822: kiṃ śāstehādiśed dharmam ity evaṃ samacintayat // Rm_34.70{70} //
K14ratnml_u:13824: bhagavantaṃ tam ānamya prārthayad evam ādarāt // Rm_34.71{71} //
K14ratnml_u:13826: tat kim arthañ jagannātha bhavān hasati sāṃprataṃ // Rm_34.72{72} //
K14ratnml_u:13827: yad bhavataḥ smitaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve ime sabhājanāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13829: tad yad arthe bhavān smitaṃ muṃcati taj jagadguro /
K14ratnml_u:13830: samupādiśya sarveṣāṃ saṃśayaṃ chetum arhati // Rm_34.74{74} //
K14ratnml_u:13832: tam ānandaṃ sabhāṃ cāpi samālokyaivam ādiśat // Rm_34.75{75} //
K14ratnml_u:13833: evam etat tathānaṃda yathākhyātaṃ tvayā kila /
K14ratnml_u:13834: nāhetupratyayaṃ buddhā muñcaṃti hi smitaṃ kva cit // Rm_34.76{76} //
K14ratnml_u:13836: tat satyaṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi śṛṇuta yūyam ādarāt // Rm_34.77{77} //
K14ratnml_u:13838: dantakāṣṭham upasthāpya satkāraṃ kurute mama // Rm_34.78{78} //
K14ratnml_u:13840: vinipātam ayaṃ kvāpi gamiṣyati kadā cana // Rm_34.79{79} //
K14ratnml_u:13844: pratyekaṃ bodhim āsādya pratyekasugato jinaḥ // Rm_34.81{81} //
K14ratnml_u:13849: kiñcid vāpi pradātavyaṃ tat phalaṃ syān mahattaraṃ // Rm_34.83{83} //
K14ratnml_u:13850: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā te sāṃghikādayaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13851: sarve lokāḥ sabhāsīnāḥ prābhyanandan prabodhitāḥ // Rm_34.84{84} //
K14ratnml_u:13852: so 'pi cārāmikaḥ śrutvā vyākṛtaṃ sugatena tat /
K14ratnml_u:13853: triratnabhajanaṃ kartuṃ samaichan muditaḥ sadā // Rm_34.85{85} //
K14ratnml_u:13855: sāñjalis taṃ jinaṃ natvā muditaḥ svagṛhaṃ yayau // Rm_34.86{86} //
K14ratnml_u:13856: tataḥ sa bhagavāṃc chāstā samutthāya sasāṃghikaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13860: iti me guruṇādiṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ mayā tathocyate /
K14ratnml_u:13861: tvayāpy evaṃ mahārāja bhaja ratnatrayaṃ sadā // Rm_34.89{89} //
K14ratnml_u:13862: lokāś cāpi tathā rājaṃ bodhayitvā prayatnataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13864: tena te maṅgalaṃ nityaṃ sarvatrāpi bhavet sadā /
K14ratnml_u:13865: kramād bodhiṃ samāsādya saṃbuddhapadam āpnuyāḥ // Rm_34.91{91} //
K14ratnml_u:13868: āramikasyedam ihāvadānaṃ śṛṇvanti ye ye ca niśāmayanti /
K14ratnml_u:13869: te sarvam evaṃ śubhasatsukhāni bhuktvā prayaāsyanti jinālayan te // Rm_34.93{93} //
K14ratnml_u:13874: upaguptaṃ yatiṃ natvā prārthayec caivam ādarāt // Rm_35.1{1} //
K14ratnml_u:13875: bhadanta śrotum ichāmi punar anyat subhāṣitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:13876: tadyathā guruṇādiṣṭaṃ tathākhyātuṃ ca me 'rhati // Rm_35.2{2} //
K14ratnml_u:13877: iti saṃprārthitaṃ tena śrutvā so 'rhaṃ sudhīr yatiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13878: upagupto nareṃdraṃ taṃ samālokyaivam abravīt // Rm_35.3{3} //
K14ratnml_u:13879: śṛṇu rājan mahābhāga yathā me gurubhāṣitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:13880: tathātra hi pravakṣyāmi tava cittābhibodhane // Rm_35.4{4} //
K14ratnml_u:13883: saṃbuddhaḥ sa tathā tatra pure kapilavastuni /
K14ratnml_u:13885: tasmiṃś ca samaye tatra pure kapilavastuni /
K14ratnml_u:13886: śākya āsīn mahāsādhuḥ śrīmān yakṣādhipopamaḥ // Rm_35.7{7} //
K14ratnml_u:13888: tasya bhāryā surūpākhyā suṃdarī ratisaṃnibhā // Rm_35.8{8} //
K14ratnml_u:13890: tayā saha samāraktaḥ sa śrīmān paricārayan // Rm_35.9{9} //
K14ratnml_u:13893: kramād vṛddhodarā pāṇḍuvarṇā svalpāśinī kṛśā // Rm_35.10{10} //
K14ratnml_u:13894: tataḥ sā samaye sūta dārakaṃ divyasuṃdaraṃ /
K14ratnml_u:13897: prādurbhūtāni taiḥ sarvaṃ nagaraṃ pariśobhitaṃ // Rm_35.12{12} //
K14ratnml_u:13898: tam abhiśobhitaṃ jātam śrutvā sa janako mudā /
K14ratnml_u:13900: tataḥ sa mudito jñātīn āhūya saha vāṃdhavaiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13901: kṛtva jātimahaṃ tasya nāmā hi khyātum abravīt // Rm_35.14{14} //
K14ratnml_u:13902: bhavanto jñātayaḥ sarve dṛṣṭvāsya lakṣaṇaṃ yathā /
K14ratnml_u:13904: iti tenoditaiḥ śrutvā sarve te jñātayas tathā /
K14ratnml_u:13905: tasya nimittam ālokya taṃ śākyam evam abruvan // Rm_35.16{16} //
K14ratnml_u:13906: sādho yaj jāyate ātmābhaiḥ śobhayati puraṃ tataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13907: śobhita iti nāmāsya bhavatu prathitaṃ bhuvi // Rm_35.17{17} //
K14ratnml_u:13908: iti tai jñātibhiḥ sarve samākhyātaṃ niśamya saḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13909: tathā tenābhidhānena prākhyāpayat tam ātmajaṃ // Rm_35.18{18} //
K14ratnml_u:13913: yadā so dārakaḥ prauḍhaḥ kumāratvam avāptavān /
K14ratnml_u:13914: tadā pitrā sa vidyārthī guruhaste samarppitaḥ // Rm_35.20{20} //
K14ratnml_u:13915: tataḥ sa guruṇā śāstrā kramāl lipir aśiṣyate /
K14ratnml_u:13917: tataḥ sa śobhito dhīmān sarvavidyāṃ vicaksaṇaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13919: sadā sa tīrthikārāme gatvā sa tīrthikaiḥ saha /
K14ratnml_u:13922: sa bhagavān sabhāsīno dharmam ādeṣṭum ārabhat // Rm_35.24{24} //
K14ratnml_u:13923: tadā te bhikṣavaḥ sarve bhikṣuṇyo 'pi samāgatāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13924: vratinaś cailakāś cānye upāsakā upāsikāḥ // Rm_35.25{25} //
K14ratnml_u:13926: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pātuṃ sarve te samupācaran // Rm_35.26{26} //
K14ratnml_u:13927: tatra taṃ śrīghanaṃ natvā parivṛtya samaṃtataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13928: puraskṛtya samālokya sarve te upatasthire // Rm_35.27{27} //
K14ratnml_u:13930: catvāro lokapālāś ca sarve lokādhipā api // Rm_35.28{28} //
K14ratnml_u:13932: rakṣasā garuḍā nāgās tathānye 'pi maharddhikāḥ // Rm_35.29{29} //
K14ratnml_u:13933: yatayo yoginaś cāpi nirgranthās tīrthikā api /
K14ratnml_u:13934: ṛṣayo brāhmaṇāś cāpi tāpasā brahmacāriṇaḥ // Rm_35.30{30} //
K14ratnml_u:13935: rājānaḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyā amātyā maṃtriṇo janāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13936: śreṣṭhino dhaninaḥ paurāḥ sārthavāhā mahājanāḥ // Rm_35.31{31} //
K14ratnml_u:13938: grāmyā jānapadāś cāpi tathā kārpaṭikā api // Rm_35.32{32} //
K14ratnml_u:13939: sarve te samupāgatya dṛṣṭvā taṃ śrīghanaṃ mudā /
K14ratnml_u:13940: yathākramaṃ samabhyarcya natvā kṛtvā pradakṣiṇāṃ // Rm_35.33{33} //
K14ratnml_u:13942: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pātum upatasthuḥ samāhitāḥ // Rm_35.34{34} //
K14ratnml_u:13943: tataḥ sa śobhitaś cāpi tac chrutvā kauṭukānvitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13944: tatra tāṃ parṣadaṃ draṣṭuṃ sahasā samupācarat // Rm_35.35{35} //
K14ratnml_u:13945: tatra sa sahasopetya prādrakṣīt taṃ munīśvaraṃ /
K14ratnml_u:13950: dṛṣṭvā sa suprasannātmā natvā kṛtvā pradakṣiṇāṃ // Rm_35.37{37} //
K14ratnml_u:13952: tadā sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā tāṃ sarvāṃ samupasthitān // Rm_35.38{38} //
K14ratnml_u:13954: tadāryadharmam ākarṇya sarve te sa surādayaḥ // Rm_35.39{39} //
K14ratnml_u:13959: tadā sa śobhitaś cāpi śrutvāryasatyam uttamaṃ // Rm_35.41{41} //
K14ratnml_u:13966: taṃ munīndraṃ jagannāthaṃ svaivaṃ prārthayan mudā // Rm_35.45{45} //
K14ratnml_u:13967: bhagavan nātha sarvajña bhavatāṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13969: iti tenārthitaṃ śrutvā bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13970: śobhitaṃ taṃ samālokya samāmaṃtryaivam ādiśat // Rm_35.47{47} //
K14ratnml_u:13971: yadi tvaṃ śāsane bauddhe pravrajituṃ samichasi /
K14ratnml_u:13972: pitur ājñāṃ samāsādya prehi dāsyāmi te vrataṃ // Rm_35.48{48} //
K14ratnml_u:13973: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā sa śobhito mudā /
K14ratnml_u:13974: pādau tasya muner natvā sahasā niryayau tataḥ // Rm_35.49{49} //
K14ratnml_u:13975: tatra sa svagṛhe gatvā pādau natvā puraḥ sthitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13976: pitror etat samākhyāya prārthayad evam ādarāt // Rm_35.50{50} //
K14ratnml_u:13978: tatra taṃ śrīghanaṃ buddhaṃ paśyāmi parṣadāśritaṃ // Rm_35.51{51} //
K14ratnml_u:13979: dhanyās te śrāvakāḥ sarve bhikṣavo bhadrikāśikāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:13981: teṣām eva hi saṃsāre sāphalyaṃ janma mānuṣe /
K14ratnml_u:13982: ye bhajanti munīndrasya śāsane śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ // Rm_35.53{53} //
K14ratnml_u:13983: teṣāṃ caivaṃ susāraṃ syān saṃsāre bhavacāraṇe /
K14ratnml_u:13984: ye saddharmaṃ munīndrasya śrutvā caraṃti saṃvaraṃ // Rm_35.54{54} //
K14ratnml_u:13986: satkāraiḥ sāṃghike sevāṃ kṛtvā caranti ye vrataṃ // Rm_35.55{55} //
K14ratnml_u:13987: kiṃ teṣāṃ mānuṣe janma nisphalaṃ sarvasādhanaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:13988: ye dhyātvāpi jinaṃ smṛtvā bhajaṃti na kadā cana // Rm_35.56{56} //
K14ratnml_u:13989: teṣāṃ ca kiṃ bhave janma kevalaṃ pāpasādhanaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:13990: ye na śṛṇvaṃti saddharmaṃ saṃbuddhabhāṣitaṃ kva cit // Rm_35.57{57} //
K14ratnml_u:13991: teṣāṃ ca nisphalaṃ janma mānuṣye duḥkhasādhanaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:13992: ye na kurvanti satkāraṃ sāṃghikeṣu kadā cana // Rm_35.58{58} //
K14ratnml_u:13993: evaṃ ye paśuvad gehe bhogyaṃ bhuktvā vasaṃti vai /
K14ratnml_u:13994: teṣāṃ kiṃ janma saṃsāre pāpaduḥkhārtham eva hi // Rm_35.59{59} //
K14ratnml_u:13995: evaṃ te prāṇinaḥ sarve bhramaṃti bhavasāgare /
K14ratnml_u:13996: yato yair dṛśyate kvāpi triratnaṃ na kadā cana // Rm_35.60{60} //
K14ratnml_u:13997: tathāsmākam api cātra saṃsāre janma nisphalaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:13998: saṃpado 'pi nirarthā hi triratnabhajanaṃ vinā // Rm_35.61{61} //
K14ratnml_u:14002: tad varaṃ mṛtyur adyevaṃ vinā dhārmārthasādhanaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:14003: kiṃ tena jīvitenāpi yan mithyāduḥkhasādhanaṃ // Rm_35.63{63} //
K14ratnml_u:14004: na prāptaṃ bhagavatpūjā mahotsāhaṃ kadāpi yaiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:14005: dharmo 'pi na śrutaḥ kaścin na kārāḥ sāṃghike kṛtāḥ // Rm_35.64{64} //
K14ratnml_u:14006: bhītebhyo nābhayaṃ dattaṃ daridrāśā na pūritā /
K14ratnml_u:14007: duḥkhāya kevalaṃ mātur gatās te garbhaśalyatāṃ // Rm_35.65{65} //
K14ratnml_u:14008: dhanyās te sukhino loke subhadrāḥ śubhabhāvinaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:14010: ye buddhe śaraṇaṃ gatvā dhyātvā smṛtvā samāhitāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:14011: saddharmāmṛtam āpīya carantaḥ saugataṃ vrataṃ // Rm_35.67{67} //
K14ratnml_u:14012: sarve satvahitārthaṃ ca dānaṃ datvā yathepsitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:14027: vaṃdyāḥ pūjyāḥ pramānyāś ca caturbrahmavihāriṇaḥ // Rm_35.75{75} //
K14ratnml_u:14028: te eva sugatiṃ yāṃti yāṃti cānte jinālaye /
K14ratnml_u:14029: saṃbodhiṃ ca samāsādya bhaveyuḥ sugatā api // Rm_35.76{76} //
K14ratnml_u:14030: iti satyaṃ munīndreṇa samādiṣṭaṃ niśamya me /
K14ratnml_u:14033: pravrajyāsaṃvaraṃ dhṛtvā caritum ichati sāṃprataṃ // Rm_35.78{78} //
K14ratnml_u:14034: kiṃ ca me janmakāle yad idaṃ yuḥ śobhitāruṣā /
K14ratnml_u:14037: saṃpadyate 'dhunā nūnaṃ viddhi mā tv anyathā pita // Rm_35.80{80} //
K14ratnml_u:14038: etan nūnam iti matvā bhūyo 'pi me manas tathā /
K14ratnml_u:14039: saddharmasādhanaṃ kartum ichati saugataṃ vrataṃ // Rm_35.81{81} //
K14ratnml_u:14040: etad dhetor ahaṃ tāta prārthayāmy evam ādarāt /
K14ratnml_u:14041: tad anujñāṃ pradattaṃ me yadi vāṃchāsti vā śubhe // Rm_35.82{82} //
K14ratnml_u:14043: gatvā divyasukhāny eva bhuktvā ciraṃ nivatsyatha // Rm_35.83{83} //
K14ratnml_u:14045: tataḥ kāle divaś cyutvā martyaloka ihāgatāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:14046: triratnabhajanaṃ kṛtvā cariṣyatha śubhe sadā // Rm_35.84{84} //
K14ratnml_u:14049: tatas tat puṇyapākena saṃghānāṃ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:14054: tato bodhiṃ samāsādya saṃbuddhapadam āpsyatha // Rm_35.88{88} //
K14ratnml_u:14056: tad anujñāṃ pradattaṃ me saṃbuddhapadavāṃchire // Rm_35.89{89} //
K14ratnml_u:14059: saṃpado 'pi sthirā naiva satkṣaṇaṃ ca sudurlabhaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:14060: mānuṣye sarvadā janma labhyate na sudurllabhaṃ // Rm_35.91{91} //
K14ratnml_u:14061: tatrāpi durlabhā dharme matir jātāpi na sthirāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:14062: dharmaṃ tu saugataiḥ śreṣṭhaṃ yat saṃbodhipadasādhanaṃ // Rm_35.92{92} //
K14ratnml_u:14064: tad anujñāṃ pradatvā me mano harṣayata drutaṃ // Rm_35.93{93} //
K14ratnml_u:14065: dharmaṃ vinātra kiṃ sāraṃ bhogyair arthair guṇair api /
K14ratnml_u:14066: kiṃ kāmasukhaṃ bhuktvā sthitvā ca paśuvad gṛhe // Rm_35.94{94} //
K14ratnml_u:14067: tad anujñāṃ na datyaśyen sthāsyāmi na gṛhe 'py ahaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:14068: sarvān parigrahāns tyaktvā gamiṣyāmi tapovanaṃ // Rm_35.95{95} //
K14ratnml_u:14069: tatra ko nirjane sthitvā caritvā duṣkaraṃ tapaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:14070: anāhāro mariṣye 'haṃ sarvatra maraṇaṃ dhruvaṃ // Rm_35.96{96} //
K14ratnml_u:14071: kasya mṛtyu bhave nāsti kutra mṛtyor bhayaṃ na hi /
K14ratnml_u:14072: sarvalokān grasen mṛtyur eko 'pi sa mahāvaliḥ // Rm_35.97{97} //
K14ratnml_u:14073: tad atra kiṃ viṣādena yad damopāyam atra na /
K14ratnml_u:14074: avaśyaṃ bhāvino bhāvā bhavanti mahatām api // Rm_35.98{98} //
K14ratnml_u:14076: dharma eva tadaiko hi sahāyaḥ syāt sahānugaḥ // Rm_35.99{99} //
K14ratnml_u:14077: evaṃ matvātra saṃsāre sthātuṃ nechanti sajjanāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:14078: sarvān parigrahāns tyaktvā pravrajanti śubhārthinaḥ // Rm_35.100{100} //
K14ratnml_u:14080: saṃbuddhaśaraṇaṃ gatvā carituṃ vratam utsahe // Rm_35.101{1} //
K14ratnml_u:14081: iti dharme nidheddhaṃ mā kiṃ cid vā vaktum arhatha /
K14ratnml_u:14085: tatas tau dhairyam ālambya tam eva svātmajaṃ cirāt /
K14ratnml_u:14086: dṛṣṭvā viyogaduḥkhārttau taṣṭhatur likhitāv iva // Rm_35.104{4} //
K14ratnml_u:14089: galadaśrumukho dṛṣṭvā taṃ putram evam abravīt // Rm_35.105{5} //
K14ratnml_u:14090: hā putra kiṃ atrāhaṃ vadeya sāṃprataṃ khalu /
K14ratnml_u:14091: yat tvam eva sudhīr vijñaḥ paṇḍito 'si vicakṣaṇaḥ // Rm_35.106{6} //
K14ratnml_u:14092: yat tvaṃ śāsane bauddhe pravrajituṃ samichasi /
K14ratnml_u:14093: tac chāstuḥ śaraṇaṃ kṛtvā vrataṃ cara samāhitaḥ // Rm_35.107{7} //
K14ratnml_u:14094: iti pitroditaṃ śrutvā sa sobhitaḥ pramoditaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:14095: pitroḥ pādān praṇatvaiva sahasā niryayau gṛhāt // Rm_35.108{8} //
K14ratnml_u:14098: yatra sa purato gatvā kṛtāṃjalipuṭo mudā /
K14ratnml_u:14099: praṇatvā taṃ jagannāthaṃ prārthayad evam ādarāt // Rm_35.110{10} //
K14ratnml_u:14101: tad bhavān sāṃprataṃ mahyaṃ pravrajyāṃ dātum arhati // Rm_35.111{11} //
K14ratnml_u:14103: dhṛtvā sadā samādāya cariṣye bodhicārikāṃ // Rm_35.112{12} //
K14ratnml_u:14104: iti saṃprārthitaṃ tena bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:14105: savyena pāṇinā tasya śiraḥ spṛṣṭvaivam ādiśat // Rm_35.113{13} //
K14ratnml_u:14106: ehi ca vatsa samādhāya vrataṃ carasva saugataṃ /
K14ratnml_u:14107: ity uktvā sa munīndraḥ svasāṃghike taṃ samagrahīt // Rm_35.114{14} //
K14ratnml_u:14108: ehīty ukte munīṃdreṇa śobhito 'bhūt sa muṇḍitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:14112: sarvakleśagaṇāṃ jitvā sākṣād arhatvam āptavān // Rm_35.117{17/} //
K14ratnml_u:14118: mānyaḥ pūjyo 'bhivaṃdyaś ca babhūva sa jinātmajaḥ // Rm_35.120{20} //
K14ratnml_u:14120: bhavantaṃ praṇatvaivaṃ paprachus tat purākṛtaṃ // Rm_35.121{21} //
K14ratnml_u:14121: bhagavan kiṃ purānena sukṛtaṃ prakṛtaṃ kuha /
K14ratnml_u:14124: yair etan nagaraṃ sarvaṃ caṃdrābhair iva śobhitaṃ // Rm_35.123{23} //
K14ratnml_u:14126: pravrajyāsaṃvaraṃ dhṛtvā yatir arhan bhavaty api // Rm_35.124{24} //
K14ratnml_u:14127: etat sarvaṃ samākhyāya bhavāṃc chāstā jagadguruḥ /
K14ratnml_u:14128: sarvān asmān sabhāṃś cāpi prabodhayitum arhati // Rm_35.125{25} //
K14ratnml_u:14129: iti tair bhikṣubhiḥ sarvaiḥ prārthite sa munīśvaraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:14130: sarvān yatīn sabhāṃ cāpi samālokyaivam ādiśat // Rm_35.126{26} //
K14ratnml_u:14132: śṛṇuta bhikṣavaḥ sarve yad anena purākṛtaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:14133: tat sarvaṃ samāśakhye yuṣmākaṃ paribodhane // Rm_35.127{27} //
K14ratnml_u:14136: tadā sa bhagavān loke bodhicaryāṃ prakāśayan /
K14ratnml_u:14138: evaṃ sa bhagavāṃ chāstā kṛtvā sarvatra maṃgalaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:14143: śrutvā śobho mahārājo draṣṭuṃ sa samupācarat // Rm_35.132{32} //
K14ratnml_u:14144: tatra sa nṛpatiḥ śobho dṛṣṭvā taṃ sugataṃ muniṃ /
K14ratnml_u:14147: praṇatvā suprasannāsyaḥ prārthayam evam ādarāt // Rm_35.134{34} //
K14ratnml_u:14148: bhagavan nātha sarvajña bhavāñ chāstā jagadguruḥ /
K14ratnml_u:14149: tad asmākaṃ hitārthena dharmam ādeṣṭum arhati // Rm_35.135{35} //
K14ratnml_u:14150: iti saṃprārthite tena rājñā sa bhagavān api /
K14ratnml_u:14151: taṃ śobhaṃ kṣitipāleṃdraṃ samālokyaivam ādiśat // Rm_35.136{36} //
K14ratnml_u:14153: saṃbodhisādhanaṃ dharmaṃ vakṣyāmi te śubhārthataḥ // Rm_35.137{37} //
K14ratnml_u:14154: anityaṃ khalu saṃsāre sarvaṃ śūnyam anātmakaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:14156: tad atra kiṃ bhave sāraṃ nirarthaṃ duḥkhasādhanaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:14157: iti vijñāya rājendra kleśāñ jitvā śubhe cara // Rm_35.139{39} //
K14ratnml_u:14158: śubhena sadgatiṃ yāyā sadgatau sarvadā sukhaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:14159: sukhena sarvadā bhadre caritavyaṃ tathā bhavaṃ // Rm_35.140{40} //
K14ratnml_u:14160: śubhaṃ saṃjāyate puṇyāt sarvatrāpi sadā dhruvaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:14161: puṇyaṃ saṃjāyate hy ādau saṃbuddhadarśanād api // Rm_35.141{41} //
K14ratnml_u:14165: samudbhūtābhilāṣaś ca satkṛtya mānayen mudā // Rm_35.143{43} //
K14ratnml_u:14172: jāto lokahitārthena dānaṃ dadyād yathepsitaṃ // Rm_35.146{46} //
K14ratnml_u:14173: tad dānapuṇyapākena sa dātā sadgatiṃ vrajet /
K14ratnml_u:14174: sadgatisthaḥ sukhenaivaṃ suśīlaḥ saṃvaraṃ caret // Rm_35.147{47} //
K14ratnml_u:14178: tatas tat puṇyapākena sa sudhīro vicakṣaṇaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:14192: tataḥ sa sugataḥ śāstā kṛtvā dharmamayaṃ jagat /
K14ratnml_u:14193: bodhimārge pratiṣṭhāpya nirvṛtaḥ svālayaṃ vrajet // Rm_35.156{56} //
K14ratnml_u:14194: tataḥ sa svālaye līno dharmadhātvīśvaro jinaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:14197: triratnabhajanaṃ kṛtvā caritavyaṃ śubhe sadā // Rm_35.158{58} //
K14ratnml_u:14198: tathā taṃ sarvadā bhadraṃ sarvatrāpi bhaved dhruvaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:14199: kramāt saṃbodhim āsādya saṃbuddhapadam āpsyatha // Rm_35.159{59} //
K14ratnml_u:14200: iti śāstrā samādiṣṭaṃ śrutvā śobhaḥ sa bhūpatiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:14201: tathā hīti pravijñapya prābhyanandat prabodhitaḥ // Rm_35.160{60} //
K14ratnml_u:14203: sarvasatvahitaṃ kṛtvā prācarat sarvadā śubhe // Rm_35.161{61} //
K14ratnml_u:14205: sarva lokāś ca saddharmāratotsāhāḥ pracerire // Rm_35.162{62} //
K14ratnml_u:14206: evaṃ sa nṛpatiḥ śobhas taṃ munīndraṃ sasāṃghikaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:14209: krakuchaṃdaṃ munīndraṃ taṃ natvaivaṃ prārthayan mudā // Rm_35.164{64} //
K14ratnml_u:14211: saddharmaṃ kṛpayāsmadbhyam ādeṣṭum sthātum arhati // Rm_35.165{65} //
K14ratnml_u:14212: iti saṃprārthite rājñā bhagavān sa jagadguruḥ /
K14ratnml_u:14213: tada śobhaṃ jagatīpālaṃ samālokyaivam ādiśat // Rm_35.166{66} //
K14ratnml_u:14214: nāhaṃ rājaṃs tavaikasya hitārthe sugato bhave /
K14ratnml_u:14215: api tu sarvasatvānāṃ śubhahetau bhave jinaḥ // Rm_35.167{67} //
K14ratnml_u:14217: saddharmaṃ samupākhyātuṃ careyaṃ saha sāṃghikaiḥ // Rm_35.168{68} //
K14ratnml_u:14219: yady asti te sadā rājaṃ bhaktiśraddhāmatir mayi /
K14ratnml_u:14220: mannāmābhisamuddiśya stūpaṃ kṛtvā sadā bhaja // Rm_35.169{69} //
K14ratnml_u:14221: etasmiṃ yat kṛtaṃ karma tan mayi kṛtam eva hi /
K14ratnml_u:14222: tiṣṭhato nirvṛtasyāpi tulyaṃ bhaktimatāṃ phalaṃ // Rm_35.170{70} //
K14ratnml_u:14223: tadyathā mayi rājendra śraddhayā śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:14224: triratnabhajanaṃ kṛtvā carasvaivaṃ śubhe mudā // Rm_35.171{71} //
K14ratnml_u:14225: tathāsmin sarvadā stūpe śraddhayā śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:14226: triratnabhajanaṃ kṛtvā śubhe cara samāhitaḥ // Rm_35.172{72} //
K14ratnml_u:14227: tathā te sarvadā kṣemaṃ sarvatrāpi bhaved dhruvaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:14228: kramāt saṃbodhim āsādya saṃbuddhapadam āpnuyāt // Rm_35.173{73} //
K14ratnml_u:14229: ity ādiśya sa saṃbuddhas tasmai śobhāya bhūrbhuje /
K14ratnml_u:14230: svanakhakeśam utkṛtya dadau stūpārtham ādarāt // Rm_35.174{74} //
K14ratnml_u:14232: praṇatvā samupāgṛhya sānaṃdaḥ svālayaṃ yayau // Rm_35.175{75} //
K14ratnml_u:14233: tatra sa nṛpatī rājā tan nakhakeśam ādarāt /
K14ratnml_u:14234: garbhe nidhāya sadratnair mahastūpam akārayat // Rm_35.176{76} //
K14ratnml_u:14235: tatas taṃ sa nṛpo rājā pratiṣṭhāpya yathāvidhiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:14236: mahotsavaiḥ sadā nityaṃ samabhyarcya bhajan mudā // Rm_35.177{77} //
K14ratnml_u:14238: sametya goṣṭhikāḥ sarve taṃ stūpaṃ draṣṭum āgatāḥ // Rm_35.178{78} //
K14ratnml_u:14240: nānāpuṣpais tam abhyarcya mahotsavaiḥ sahābhajat // Rm_35.179{79} //
K14ratnml_u:14241: tatraiko goṣṭhiko dṛṣṭvā daridro 'ham iti bruvan /
K14ratnml_u:14243: tatas tair goṣṭhikaiḥ sarvair dṛṣṭvā sa svagṛhe tataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:14246: hā maṃdaḥ katham eko 'haṃ tiṣṭheyam ity aciṃtayat // Rm_35.182{82} //
K14ratnml_u:14247: tataḥ sa sugataṃ smṛtvā daridro 'pi samaṃtataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:14248: sarvapuṣpāṇi saṃgṛhya tais taṃ stūpaṃ samarcayat // Rm_35.183{83} //
K14ratnml_u:14250: tat pādayoḥ praṇatvaivaṃ praṇidhānaṃ mudākarot // Rm_35.184{84} //
K14ratnml_u:14251: yan mayātra munīndrasya stūpaḥ puṣpaiḥ samarcitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:14253: ity evaṃ praṇidhiṃ kṛtvā tat stūpaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:14254: sa daridraḥ samabhyarcya prābhajan saṃpramoditaḥ // Rm_35.186{86} //
K14ratnml_u:14255: manyatāṃ bhikṣavo yo 'sau daridro 'yaṃ hi śobhitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:14256: yat stūpo 'rcitaḥ puṣpais tenāyaṃ śrīsamṛddhimān // Rm_35.187{87} //
K14ratnml_u:14257: anyad api yathānena sukṛtaṃ prakṛtaṃ purā /
K14ratnml_u:14258: tat sarvaṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi śṛṇudhvan yūyam ādarāt // Rm_35.188{88} //
K14ratnml_u:14261: tadaikasmin dine tasya gṛhāntike śanaiś caran /
K14ratnml_u:14264: taṃ gṛhāntikam āyātaṃ dṛṣṭvā sa karuṇāhataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:14265: sahasopetya natvainam āmaṃtrya svagṛhe nayet // Rm_35.191{91} //
K14ratnml_u:14266: tatra śreṣṭhī sa taṃ glānaṃ pratyekabuddham āsane /
K14ratnml_u:14268: tasmai kṣīrodanaiḥ pūrṇaṃ pātraṃ paṃcāmṛtaiḥ saha /
K14ratnml_u:14269: pradatvā sāṃjalir natvā manasaivaṃ vyaciṃtayat // Rm_35.193{93} //
K14ratnml_u:14272: ity evaṃ praṇidhānena sa śreṣṭhī pratimoditaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:14273: satkṛtya sādaraṃ tatra svāśrame samacārayat // Rm_35.195{95} //
K14ratnml_u:14274: manyatāṃ bhikṣavo yo 'sau śreṣṭhī śrīmān mahājanaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:14275: ayam eva mahābhijñaḥ śobhito 'rhan mahāmatiḥ // Rm_35.196{96} //
K14ratnml_u:14280: bhūyo 'pi yat purānena sukṛtaṃ sādhitaṃ yathā /
K14ratnml_u:14281: tat sarvaṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi śṛṇudhvaṃ yūyam ādarāt // Rm_35.199{99} //
K14ratnml_u:14283: sarvajñaḥ sugato nātho dharmarājo munīśvaraḥ // Rm_35.200{100} //
K14ratnml_u:14286: tasmiṃś ca samaye tatra vārāṇasyām abhūd gṛhī /
K14ratnml_u:14288: sa ekasmin dine kāṣṭham āhartu parvaṭe vrajan /
K14ratnml_u:14289: tatraikatra mahat stūpaṃ dadarśāchāditaṃ tṛṇaiḥ // Rm_35.203{3} //
K14ratnml_u:14290: dṛṣṭvā sa samupāśritya tat tṛṇāni samaṃtataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:14291: sarvāṇy api samutpāṭya saṃmṛjya samaśodhayat // Rm_35.204{4} //
K14ratnml_u:14292: tatas taṃ śobhitaṃ dṛṣṭvā sa śreṣṭhī saṃpramoditaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:14294: yad ayaṃ saugatastūpo mayā saṃmṛjya śodhitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:14297: anāgatāṃś ca saṃbuddhān ārāgayeyam ādarāt // Rm_35.207{7} //
K14ratnml_u:14300: ity evaṃ praṇidhiṃ kṛtvā praṇatvā taṃ jinālayaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:14301: satataḥ kāṣṭham ādāya svagṛhaṃ samudācarat // Rm_35.209{9} //
K14ratnml_u:14302: tataḥ sa sumatiḥ śrīmān abhūt tatpuṇyavān kṛtiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:14303: sukhāni suciraṃ bhuktvā kāle mṛto divaṃ yayau // Rm_35.210{10} //
K14ratnml_u:14304: svarge sa divyabhogyāni bhuktvā reme suraiḥ saha /
K14ratnml_u:14305: paṃcajanmaśatāny evaṃ sukhaṃ bhuktvā bhramed bhave // Rm_35.211{11} //
K14ratnml_u:14307: atrāpi yadeyaṃ śrīmāñ chāsane me samāgataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:14308: pravrajyāsaṃvaraṃ dhṛtvā carann arhan bhavaty api // Rm_35.212{12} //
K14ratnml_u:14310: yathā ca ciṃtitaṃ tatra tathāsya siddhyate 'dhunā // Rm_35.213{13} //
K14ratnml_u:14311: daridrakāṣṭhahāro yo bhavet so 'yaṃ hi śobhitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:14312: anya iti na manyantavyaṃ yuṣmābhir nātra saṃśayaḥ // Rm_35.214{14} //
K14ratnml_u:14313: evaṃ sarvatra saṃsāre sarveṣām api prāṇināṃ /
K14ratnml_u:14314: yathaiva yat kṛtaṃ karma tathaiva tat phalaṃ dhruvaṃ // Rm_35.215{15} //
K14ratnml_u:14315: abhuktaṃ kṣīyate naiva karma kvāpi kadā cana /
K14ratnml_u:14316: anyathāpi bhaven naiva karmaphalaṃ kathaṃ cana // Rm_35.216{16} //
K14ratnml_u:14318: triratnabhajanaṃ kṛtvā caritavyaṃ śubhe sadā // Rm_35.217{17} //
K14ratnml_u:14319: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā te sarvasāṃghikāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:14320: sarve lokāś ca saṃbodhiprāptuṃ dharmārthino 'bhavan // Rm_35.218{18} //
K14ratnml_u:14321: iti me guruṇākhyātaṃ śrutaṃ mayā tathocyate /
K14ratnml_u:14322: tvam apy evaṃ mahārāja saddharmanirato bhava // Rm_35.219{19} //
K14ratnml_u:14325: evaṃ kṛte mahārāja sarvatra vaḥ śubhaṃ bhavet /
K14ratnml_u:14326: kramāt saṃbodhim āsādya saṃbuddhapadam āpnuyāḥ // Rm_35.221{21} //
K14ratnml_u:14328: tathā hīti pratijñapya prābhyanandat sa pārṣadaḥ // Rm_35.222{22} //
K14ratnml_u:14329: ye śraddhāḥ suprasannā idam api manujāḥ śobhitasyāvadānaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:14330: śṛṇvanti śrāvayaṃti pramuditamanasā ye ca saṃbodhikāmāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:14331: te sarve bodhisatvāḥ sakalaguṇabhṛto bodhicaryāṃ caranto /
K14ratnml_u:14332: bhuktvā saukhyaṃ prakāmaṃ daśabalanilaye saṃprayānti pramuktvā // Rm_35.223{23} //
K14ratnml_u:14337: upaguptaṃ yatiṃ natvā punar evam abhāṣata // Rm_36.1{1} //
K14ratnml_u:14338: bhadanta śrotum ichāmi punar anyat subhāṣitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:14339: tadyathā guruṇākhyātaṃ tathādeṣṭuṃ ca me 'rhati // Rm_36.2{2} //
K14ratnml_u:14340: iti saṃprārthitaṃ rājñā śrutvā so 'rhan sudhīr yatiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:14341: tam aśokaṃ mahārājaṃ samālokyaivam abravīt // Rm_36.3{3} //
K14ratnml_u:14342: śṛṇu sādhu mahārāja yathā me gurubhāṣitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:14345: śreṣṭhī mahādhanaḥ sādhuḥ puṣyābhidho mahājanaḥ // Rm_36.5{5} //
K14ratnml_u:14348: yayā patnyā subhāvinyā sārddhaṃ puṣyaḥ sa sanmatiḥ /
