K14ratnml_u:15818: śrīdevyā bhajanaṃ kṛtvā datvā dānaṃ śubhe 'carat // Rm_37.478{28} //
K14ratnml_u:15819: tathā tasyā gṛhe saṃpad dine dine pravarddhitā /
K14ratnml_u:15822: mudā lokahitaṃ kṛtvā pracacāra śubhe sadā // Rm_37.480{30} //
K14ratnml_u:15823: iti me guruṇādiṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ mayā tathocyate /
K14ratnml_u:15824: tathā tvam api rājendra vasudhārāvrataṃ cara // Rm_37.481{31} //
K14ratnml_u:15827: śrīdevyāḥ śaraṇe sthāpya vrataṃ cāraya sarvadā // Rm_37.482{32} //
K14ratnml_u:15828: tathā te sarvadā kṣemaṃ sarvatrāpi bhaved dhruvaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:15829: kramād bodhiṃ samāsādya saṃbuddhapadam āpnuyāḥ // Rm_37.483{33} //
K14ratnml_u:15832: dhīmatyā ye 'vadānaṃ śubhaphaladam idaṃ suprasannāḥ śṛṇvanti /
K14ratnml_u:15835: śrīmanto lokaśreṣṭhā jinanilayagatāḥ saṃvasaṃti sukhāḍhyāḥ // Rm_37.485{35} //
K14ratnml_u:15840: upaguptaṃ yatiṃ natvā punar evam abhāṣata // Rm_38.1{1} //
K14ratnml_u:15842: kena kuha kathaṃ martyaloke pracāritaṃ purā // Rm_38.2{2} //
K14ratnml_u:15843: tad atra no bhavāñ cchāstar yathā pravarttitaṃ purā /
K14ratnml_u:15844: tathā sarvaṃ samākhyātuṃ vistareṇa samarhati // Rm_38.3{3} //
K14ratnml_u:15845: iti saṃprārthitaṃ rājñā śrutvā so 'rhan mahāmatiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:15846: aśokaṃ taṃ mahīpālaṃ samālokyaivam abravīt // Rm_38.4{4} //
K14ratnml_u:15847: śṛṇu rājan yathākhyātaṃ guruṇā me srutaṃ mayā /
K14ratnml_u:15854: tadā śakrādayo devā brahmādi brāhmaṇā api /
K14ratnml_u:15857: siddhā vidyādharāś cāpi tathā cāpy apsarogaṇāḥ // Rm_38.9{9} //
K14ratnml_u:15859: rājāno rājaputrāś ca vaiśyāś ca maṃtriṇo janāḥ // Rm_38.10{10} //
K14ratnml_u:15860: amātyāḥ sainikāś cāpi gṛhasthāś ca mahājanāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:15861: vaṇijaḥ sārthavāhāś ca śilpinaḥ paurikā api // Rm_38.11{11} //
K14ratnml_u:15863: evam anye 'pi lokāś ca saddharmāmṛtavāṃchinaḥ // Rm_38.12{12} //
K14ratnml_u:15864: sarve te tatra kauśāṃvyā ghoṣilārāma āgatāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:15866: dṛṣṭvā te muditāḥ sarve praṇatvā samupāsṛtāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:15867: yathākramaṃ samabhyarcya kṛtvā tritvaḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ // Rm_38.14{14} //
K14ratnml_u:15868: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pātum upatasthuḥ samāhitāḥ // Rm_38.15{15} //
K14ratnml_u:15869: tatra te tatsabhāsīnā bhikṣavaḥ śrāvakā api /
K14ratnml_u:15870: bhikṣuṇyaś cailakāś caivam upāsakā upāsikāḥ // Rm_38.16{16} //
K14ratnml_u:15874: sāṃjaliḥ purataḥ sthitvā natvaivaṃ prārthayan muniṃ // Rm_38.18{18} //
K14ratnml_u:15875: bhagavan sarvavic chāstān ime sarve sabhājanāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:15880: ity ānaṃdena bhadreṇa prārthite sa munīśvaraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:15881: tān sabhāsaṃsthitān sarvān samālokyaivam ādiśat // Rm_38.21{21} //
K14ratnml_u:15885: śrīpure nagare ramye cakravarttī nṛpādhipaḥ // Rm_38.23{23} //
K14ratnml_u:15891: tataḥ sarvatra deśeṣu durbhikṣam abhavad bhuvi /
K14ratnml_u:15892: tadā te manujāḥ sarve daridrā abhavan kramāt // Rm_38.26{26} //
K14ratnml_u:15896: tataḥ sarve 'pi te lokā andhā iva kumārgagāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:15899: śoṣitevābhavad bhūmī nirguṇā nīrasā kharā // Rm_38.29{29} //
K14ratnml_u:15901: nirāśā mṛtyum ichanto niṣeduḥ parimohitāḥ // Rm_38.30{30} //
K14ratnml_u:15904: sarvās tā militā martyaloke gaṃtuṃ samipsavaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:15905: kim idānīṃ manuṣyāṇām avastheti samīkṣire // Rm_38.32{32} //
K14ratnml_u:15906: tatas tān manujān sarvān daridrān pāpacāriṇaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:15907: dṛṣṭvā tāḥ sakalā devyā dayārttā evam abruvan // Rm_38.33{33} //
K14ratnml_u:15908: aho duḥkhaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ yat pāpe niratā narāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:15909: daridrā nirdayāḥ krūrā bhavanti narakāmukhāḥ // Rm_38.34{34} //
K14ratnml_u:15912: tatas te manujāḥ sarve śrutvā dṛṣṭvānumoditāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:15913: śrīdevyāḥ śaraṇaṃ gatvā careyur vratam ādarāt // Rm_38.36{36} //
K14ratnml_u:15914: tadā tatpuṇyasaṃpūtāḥ sarve te mānavā api /
K14ratnml_u:15915: śrīmantaḥ sukhino bhadre careyuḥ sarvadādarāt // Rm_38.37{37} //
K14ratnml_u:15921: kramāt saṃbodhim āsādya saṃbuddhapadam āpnuyuḥ // Rm_38.40{40} //
K14ratnml_u:15923: iti hetor vayaṃ sarvāḥ śrīdevyāḥ purato gatāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:15925: ity evaṃ saṃmataṃ kṛtvā sarvā devvyo 'pi tās tataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:15927: tatra tāḥ sakalā devyaḥ sāṃjalaya upāsṛtāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:15928: tāṃ śrīvasuṃdharāṃ devīṃ praṇatvaivaṃ nyavedayan // Rm_38.43{43} //
K14ratnml_u:15930: yan manuṣyā daridrās te bhavanti pāpacāriṇaḥ // Rm_38.44{44} //
K14ratnml_u:15931: tad bhavatī prayatnena manujāns tān suduḥkhitān /
K14ratnml_u:15932: kṛpayā sahasālokya sarvānn uddharttum arhati // Rm_38.45{45} //
K14ratnml_u:15933: iti saṃprārthite tābhir devībhiḥ sā vasundharā /
K14ratnml_u:15934: tā devī sakalā dṛṣṭvā prasannāsyaivam abravīt // Rm_38.46{46} //
K14ratnml_u:15935: aho duḥkhaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ yatra śāstā na sadguruḥ /
K14ratnml_u:15936: tena te 'kuśalācārāḥ sarve narā daridratāḥ // Rm_38.47{47} //
K14ratnml_u:15938: durbhagā nirdayāḥ krūrāḥ pateyur narake dhruvaṃ // Rm_38.48{48} //
K14ratnml_u:15939: iti hetor ahaṃ tesāṃ martyānāṃ duḥkhaśāṃtaye /
K14ratnml_u:15940: saṃvare tānn upasthāpya bodhau niyojayemahi // Rm_38.49{49} //
K14ratnml_u:15941: iti niścitya sā devī vasulakṣmī kṛpārditā /
K14ratnml_u:15942: tatra samādhim ādhāya trimurttiṃ sā samādadhau // Rm_38.50{50} //
K14ratnml_u:15944: tṛtīyikā kumāryyāś ca trimūrttir iti sā dadhe // Rm_38.51{51} //
K14ratnml_u:15945: tataḥ sā śrīmahādevī gaṃtuṃ martyālaye svayaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:15948: tathā tan me mahatkāryaṃ harttum arhatha sarvathā // Rm_38.53{53} //
K14ratnml_u:15949: ity ādiṣṭaṃ tayā devyā niśamya tau kṛtāṃjaliḥ /
K14ratnml_u:15950: nandimukhāśvaghoṣau tāṃ devīṃ natvaivam ūcatuḥ // Rm_38.54{54} //
K14ratnml_u:15951: devi kiṃ te mahat kāryaṃ tadā jñāpayatu dhruvaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:15952: yathādiṣṭaṃ bhavaty āśu kariṣyāvas tathā khalu // Rm_38.55{55} //
K14ratnml_u:15953: iti tābhyāṃ samākhyātaṃ śrutvā sā śrīvasuṃdharā /
K14ratnml_u:15954: mahādevī prasannāsyā tau dṛṣṭvaivam abhāṣata // Rm_38.56{56} //
K14ratnml_u:15955: śṛṇuta bhadramukhau yan me kāryaṃ vāṃ tan mayocyate /
K14ratnml_u:15956: tathā yuvāṃ samādhāya karttum arhatha sāṃprataṃ // Rm_38.57{57} //
K14ratnml_u:15957: yan narā bhūtale sarve daridrā atiduḥkhitā /
K14ratnml_u:15959: tat tān sarvān samuddharttum ichāmi sarvathā 'dhunā /
K14ratnml_u:15960: tridhā mūrttim ahaṃ dhṛtvā gacheyaṃ tan mahītale // Rm_38.59{59} //
K14ratnml_u:15962: taṃ evaṃ prathamaṃ dharme vinīya yojayemahi // Rm_38.60{60} //
K14ratnml_u:15963: yatra rājā svayaṃ dharme sthitvā caret samāhitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:15964: tatra sarve 'nugā rājño dharme careyur ādarāt // Rm_38.61{61} //
K14ratnml_u:15967: tatra sarve 'pi lokās te pracareyur hi sādaraṃ // Rm_38.62{62} //
K14ratnml_u:15968: ity ādau nṛpati dharme yojanīyaḥ prayatnataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:15969: tataḥ sa nṛpatiḥ sārvāl lokān dharme niyojayet // Rm_38.63{63} //
K14ratnml_u:15971: saddharme hi ratā bhadre pracareyuḥ samāhitāḥ // Rm_38.64{64} //
K14ratnml_u:15973: triratnabhajanaṃ kṛtvā careyuḥ saṃvare sadā // Rm_38.65{65} //
K14ratnml_u:15974: tatas te sarvadā śreyaḥ kṛtvā yāyuḥ sukhāvatīṃ /
K14ratnml_u:15975: tatrāpi saṃvaraṃ dhṛtvā pracareyuḥ sukhānvitāḥ // Rm_38.66{66} //
K14ratnml_u:15977: carantaḥ sarvasatvānāṃ hitaṃ kuryuḥ sadādarāt // Rm_38.67{67} //
K14ratnml_u:15980: tataḥ sarve 'pi te dhīrāḥ pariśuddha trimaṇḍalāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:15982: iti hetor ahaṃ teṣāṃ satvānāṃ vinayārthataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:15984: tad yuvāṃ me vaco dhṛtvā gantum arhatha bhūtale /
K14ratnml_u:15985: tatra gatvā prayatnena sarvathāhara taṃ nṛpaṃ // Rm_38.71{71} //
K14ratnml_u:15987: saddharmacāriṇaṃ kṛtvā cārayiṣyāmi me vrataṃ // Rm_38.72{72} //
K14ratnml_u:15988: iti tayā mahādevyā samādiṣṭaṃ niśamya tau /
K14ratnml_u:15989: nandimukhāśvaghoṣau tāṃ devīṃ natvaivam ūcatuḥ // Rm_38.73{73} //
K14ratnml_u:15990: bhadre devi tavādeśaṃ dhṛtvāvāṃ śirasā tathā /
K14ratnml_u:15991: gatvā nṛpaṃ samāhṛtya prāṇayiṣyāvahe puraḥ // Rm_38.74{74} //
K14ratnml_u:15992: ity uktvā tau prasannāsyau kṛtāṃjalipuṭo mudā /
K14ratnml_u:15993: pādau devyāḥ praṇatvaivaṃ prajagmatus tato bhuvi // Rm_38.75{75} //
K14ratnml_u:15996: tatra tau bhūtale gatvā prāpaśyataṃ samaṃtataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:15998: dṛṣṭvā tāv ubhau tatra kṣaṇaṃ viśramya saṃsthitau /
K14ratnml_u:16001: tat katham iha rājānam apaharttuṃ carevahi // Rm_38.79{79} //
K14ratnml_u:16004: nūnaṃ sa nṛpatī rājā dṛṣṭvā nau divyasuṃdaraṃ /
K14ratnml_u:16008: iti saṃbhāṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā vidhāya ca susaṃmataṃ /
K14ratnml_u:16009: nandimukhāśvaghoṣau tau strīrūpaṃ dadhatus tathā // Rm_38.83{83} //
K14ratnml_u:16015: dṛṣṭvā te divyarūpāṃśe sarve te vismayānvitāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16016: devakanye ime nūnam iti proktvā samīkṣire // Rm_38.86{86} //
K14ratnml_u:16017: divyāṃśe te samālokya sarve te vismayoddhatāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16018: aho citram iti proktvā pratyāyayuś cirāt puraṃ // Rm_38.87{87} //
K14ratnml_u:16021: tathā te caritaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve te paurikā api /
K14ratnml_u:16024: nṛpateḥ purato gatvā praṇatvaivaṃ nyavedayet // Rm_38.90{90} //
K14ratnml_u:16025: jaya deva mahārāja vijānīyā bhavānn api /
K14ratnml_u:16026: tathāpy atra mahac citraṃ vijñaptuṃ vayam āgatāḥ // Rm_38.91{91} //
K14ratnml_u:16027: tad atra surarāmāṃśe ubhe striyau sulakṣaṇau /
K14ratnml_u:16030: gāyaṃtyo surasaṃgītaṃ bhramitvā carato mudā // Rm_38.93{93} //
K14ratnml_u:16031: tan nimittaṃ kathaṃ rājaṃ cchubhaṃ vā syād athāśubhaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:16032: iti praṣṭuṃ samāyāmo vayaṃ sarve 'pi nānyathā // Rm_38.94{94} //
K14ratnml_u:16033: iti taiḥ paurikaiḥ sarvair niveditaṃ niśamya saḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16034: mahīpatiḥ kṣaṇaṃ dhyātvā tato dṛṣṭvaivam abravīt // Rm_38.95{95} //
K14ratnml_u:16035: strībhir ālāpitaṃ gītaṃ śubhāya na bhavet kvacit /
K14ratnml_u:16036: ity uktvā sa viṣaṇṇātmā manasaivaṃ vyacintayat // Rm_38.96{96} //
K14ratnml_u:16037: kṣemaṃ neme bhaven nūnaṃ yat te striyau na mānave /
K14ratnml_u:16038: strīrūpā vahinirmāya preṣite kena māyayā // Rm_38.97{97} //
K14ratnml_u:16039: tad atra kiṃ bhaven nūnaṃ tan nimittaṃ śubhaṃ na hi /
K14ratnml_u:16040: kim upāyaṃ kariṣyāmi na manye ko hitaṃ diśet // Rm_38.98{98} //
K14ratnml_u:16041: iti ciṃttā viṣaṇṇātmā nṛpatiḥ sa viniśvasan /
K14ratnml_u:16042: śokālaye samāsīno vahi naivācaret kvacit // Rm_38.99{99} //
K14ratnml_u:16043: tathā sthitaṃ narendraṃ taṃ matvā vahir anirgataṃ /
K14ratnml_u:16045: aśvaghoṣa narendro 'sau tathāpi na vahiś caret /
K14ratnml_u:16046: tad atra kiṃ kariṣyāvo yan nṛpo na vahiś caret // Rm_38.101{1} //
K14ratnml_u:16048: taṃ nandimukham ālokya bodhayann evam abravīt // Rm_38.102{2} //
K14ratnml_u:16049: śṛṇu naṃdimukhopāyaṃ yena nṛpaḥ sa nicaret /
K14ratnml_u:16050: tad ahaṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi tan nṛpāharaṇaṃ prati // Rm_38.103{3} //
K14ratnml_u:16052: tadā sa nṛpatis trastaḥ kopito niḥsared vahi // Rm_38.104{4} //
K14ratnml_u:16053: tadā taṃ nṛpatiṃ dūrāt samāhṛtya prayatnataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16054: sahasā purato devyā upaneṣyāvahe drutaṃ // Rm_38.105{5} //
K14ratnml_u:16056: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā nandīmukhaḥ sa bodhitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16057: tathā hīti pratiśrutya tathā kartuṃ samaichata // Rm_38.106{6} //
K14ratnml_u:16058: tatas tau saṃmataṃ kṛtvā tato 'py antarhitau drutaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:16059: gatvā māyāgninā tābhyāṃ pradāhitaṃ nṛpālayaṃ // Rm_38.107{7} //
K14ratnml_u:16060: tad dṛṣṭvā nṛpatis trastaḥ sahasā niścarans tataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16061: upāyais taj jvaladvahniṃ śamayām āsa satvaraṃ // Rm_38.108{8} //
K14ratnml_u:16063: śokāgare viṣaṇṇātmā sthitaś caiva vyacintayat // Rm_38.109{9} //
K14ratnml_u:16064: aho sadyaphalaṃ hy etad yat strīgītanimittajaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:16065: tad atra kiṃ kariṣyāmi yenaitac chāmyate 'śubhaṃ // Rm_38.110{10} //
K14ratnml_u:16066: bhūyo 'py atra bhaved anyan mahotpātam amaṃgalaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:16067: katham atra pratīkāraṃ kariṣyāmi na manyate // Rm_38.111{11} //
K14ratnml_u:16069: śokāgāre samāsīno naiva vahir viniryayau // Rm_38.112{12} //
K14ratnml_u:16071: nandīmukhāśvaghoṣau tau punar evaṃ samūcatuḥ // Rm_38.113{13} //
K14ratnml_u:16072: tathāpi sa nṛpo rājā naiva vahir viniḥsaret /
K14ratnml_u:16073: tad atra kiṃ kariṣyāvo yenāśu niścaren nṛpaḥ // Rm_38.114{14} //
K14ratnml_u:16075: naṃdīmukhaṃ sahāyaṃ taṃ samāmaṃtryaivam abravīt // Rm_38.115{15} //
K14ratnml_u:16076: bho sakhe sa mahārājas tathāpi nātra niścaret /
K14ratnml_u:16077: tad atra kiṃ vilambena yatnena taṃ harevahi // Rm_38.116{16} //
K14ratnml_u:16080: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā naṃdīmukhas tatheti sā /
K14ratnml_u:16081: pratiśrutya sakhāyaṃ taṃ samālokyaivam abravīt // Rm_38.118{18} //
K14ratnml_u:16083: iti tau saṃmataṃ kṛtvā tatrodyāne prajagmatuḥ // Rm_38.119{19} //
K14ratnml_u:16086: tato nandīmukho dṛṣṭvā tam udyānaṃ manoramaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:16087: puskariṇīṃ ca prāmodya gaṃdhāḍhyām evam abravīt // Rm_38.121{21} //
K14ratnml_u:16088: ahodyānaṃ manoramyaṃ suramyaṃ ca saro varaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:16089: nedaṃ vidhvaṃsanīyaṃ hi kathaṃ vidhvaṃsayevahi // Rm_38.122{21/} //
K14ratnml_u:16091: udyānaṃ tat saro dṛṣṭvācirād evam abhāṣata // Rm_38.123{22} //
K14ratnml_u:16093: tan nṛpatim apāharttuṃ tad idaṃ dhvaṃsayāvahe // Rm_38.124{23} //
K14ratnml_u:16094: ity uktvā saumataṃ kṛtvā tāv ubhau mahadāśrayaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:16098: tatra tau prasarantau tad udyānaṃ tat saro 'pi ca /
K14ratnml_u:16102: sahasā sa vinirgatya tato rājakule yayau // Rm_38.128{27} //
K14ratnml_u:16103: tatra sa samupāsṛtya rājñaḥ pādau kṛtāṃjaliḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16104: natvā trāsavibhinnāsyaḥ pura evaṃ nyavedayat // Rm_38.129{28} //
K14ratnml_u:16105: jaya deva vijānīyā yad udyāne sarovaraṃ /
K14ratnml_u:16106: dvau varāhāv upākramya dhvaṃsituṃ caratā 'dhunā // Rm_38.130{29} //
K14ratnml_u:16107: tad atra sahasā deva sarvasainyajanānn api /
K14ratnml_u:16108: samupāhūya tau haṃtuṃ preṣayasva drutaṃ vane // Rm_38.131{30} //
K14ratnml_u:16109: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā sa rājā parikopitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16110: sahasā sainyam āhūya svayaṃ tau hantum udyayau // Rm_38.132{31} //
K14ratnml_u:16112: sahasā nādayan vādyāns tatrodyāne upācarat // Rm_38.133{32} //
K14ratnml_u:16114: tān sarvān samupāmaṃtrya punar evam upādiśat // Rm_38.134{33} //
K14ratnml_u:16115: bho bhavanto janāḥ sarve sajjīkṛtya samāhitāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16118: paścimādiśi sainānyaḥ paurās tiṣṭhantu cottare // Rm_38.136{35} //
K14ratnml_u:16121: yatra sthāne varāhau tau boddhuṃ naivābhiśaknutha /
K14ratnml_u:16122: yataś cāsau parāyetāṃ taddiksthān daṇḍayeya hi // Rm_38.138{37} //
K14ratnml_u:16123: iti me vacanaṃ śrutvā sarve yūyaṃ samāhitāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16125: iti rājñā samādiṣṭaṃ śrutvā sarve 'pi te janāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16126: tatheti prativijñapya tathā sthātuṃ pracerire // Rm_38.140{39} //
K14ratnml_u:16127: tathā rājā sthitaḥ prācyāṃ yāmye 'mātyagaṇās tathā /
K14ratnml_u:16128: senānyo paścimāyāṃ ca paurās tasthus tathottare // Rm_38.141{40} //
K14ratnml_u:16130: sajjīkṛtya samālokya sarve tasthuḥ samāhitāḥ // Rm_38.142{41} //
K14ratnml_u:16131: evaṃ te sarvato dikṣu nirudhya samavasthitāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16133: tat savādyamahārāvaṃ śrutvā tau tān upasthitān /
K14ratnml_u:16137: tatra sa nṛpatis tābhyāṃ spṛśyamāno vimūrchitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16139: tataś cirāt samutthāya kutremāv iti lokya saḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16140: sahasāśvaṃ samāruhya tad anuprāsaran yayau // Rm_38.147{46} //
K14ratnml_u:16141: tathā te maṃtriṇo 'mātyāḥ sainyalokāś ca paurikāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16142: sarve te 'py anudhāvantaḥ pradudruvur nṛpānugāḥ // Rm_38.148{47} //
K14ratnml_u:16144: maurvīyuktaiḥ samādhāya vegād vanam upāviśat // Rm_38.149{48} //
K14ratnml_u:16146: tatra tau māyikau tyaktvā vārāhadeham āśu tau /
K14ratnml_u:16148: tatra so 'śvo mahāvegād vāyunā riva mahājavi /
K14ratnml_u:16149: vilaṃghya nimnagāṃ chailāṃ pradudrāva mahāvane // Rm_38.151{50} //
K14ratnml_u:16150: tatas te maṃtriṇo 'mātyāḥ sainānyaḥ sainikāḥ prajāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16151: nṛpaṃ dūravanāviṣṭaṃ dṛṣṭvā pratyāyayuḥ śramāt // Rm_38.152{51} //
K14ratnml_u:16153: asakteḥ asahas tūrṇaṃ kamaṇḍalukaras tadā // Rm_38.153{52} //
K14ratnml_u:16154: chāyeva sahago vegād vanāṃtare tathānvagāt // Rm_38.154{53} //
K14ratnml_u:16156: aśvavṛkṣatale so 'śvād dhāvatā nyapatad bhuvi // Rm_38.155{54} //
K14ratnml_u:16157: tatra sa mūrchito rājā kṣaṇaṃ tasthāv acetanaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16159: tataḥ sena samāśvāsya dhṛtvā taṃ nṛpam ātmanā /
K14ratnml_u:16160: saha tatrāsane sthāpya vyaśrāmayec chramānvitaṃ // Rm_38.157{56} //
K14ratnml_u:16161: tataḥ sa nṛpa ālokya tam aśvaṃ samupasthitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:16162: tṛṣārtto niḥśvasan senaṃ muhur dṛṣṭvaivam abravīt // Rm_38.158{57} //
K14ratnml_u:16163: aho sena mahat kaṣṭaṃ jāyate nāv ihā 'dhunā /
K14ratnml_u:16164: yat sudūre mahāraṇye majjāvahe sudustare // Rm_38.159{58} //
K14ratnml_u:16165: tad atra kiṃ kariṣyāvo yat sarve nirvṛto janāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16166: sudūre nirjane 'raṇye ko 'tra mārgaṃ hi nirdiśet // Rm_38.160{59} //
K14ratnml_u:16169: tad atra sahasā sena mama jīvitarakṣaṇaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:16170: yatas tato 'pi vānviṣya śītalāmṛtam ānaya // Rm_38.162{61} //
K14ratnml_u:16171: iti rājñoditaṃ śrutvā sa seneḥ sahasotthitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16172: svāminaṃ taṃ samāśvāsya paśyann evam abhāṣata // Rm_38.163{62} //
K14ratnml_u:16173: mā viṣīdāta rājendra yat kṣatriyo 'si dhīravān /
K14ratnml_u:16174: tad bhavān dhairyam ālambya muhurttaṃ sthātum arhati // Rm_38.164{63} //
K14ratnml_u:16176: sahasā samupānīya dāsyāmi te narādhipa // Rm_38.165{64} //
K14ratnml_u:16178: tāvad dhairyaṃ samālambya tiṣṭhāśvena saha prabho // Rm_38.166{65} //
K14ratnml_u:16179: iti vijñapya seno 'sau svāminaṃ taṃ narādhipaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:16180: samāśvāsya supāṇīyam anveṣituṃ drutaṃ yayau // Rm_38.167{66} //
K14ratnml_u:16182: supāṇīyam anasādya paśyan dūratare yayān // Rm_38.168{67} //
K14ratnml_u:16183: tatra suranadīśabdaṃ śrutvā senaḥ sa satvaraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16184: tac chabdaṃ samanuśrutvā tatrābhyanusaran yayau // Rm_38.169{68} //
K14ratnml_u:16186: sahasā samupāśritya pānīyaṃ surasaṃ papau // Rm_38.170{69} //
K14ratnml_u:16188: tatpāre śuddhite dvīpe prādrākṣīd apsarogaṇān // Rm_38.171{70} //
K14ratnml_u:16190: tān apsarogaṇān dṛṣṭvā sa seno vismayānvitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16191: mudā vilokayann eva tasthau citrārppitā yathā // Rm_38.172{71} //
K14ratnml_u:16193: katham atrāgataḥ kas tvaṃ prehīti samakandayan // Rm_38.173{72} //
K14ratnml_u:16194: iti tābhiḥ samāhūtaṃ śrutvā sa sena ātmanā /
K14ratnml_u:16196: tatra sa samupāśritya sarvāns tān apsarogaṇān /
K14ratnml_u:16200: yan nṛpasya varāhābhyāṃ udyānaṃ dhvaṃsitaṃ tataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16201: tau varāhau nihaṃtuṃ sa nṛpo 'nudhāvati drutaṃ // Rm_38.177{76} //
K14ratnml_u:16205: śramatṛsārditas tatra sthito 'mbu pātum ichati // Rm_38.179{78} //
K14ratnml_u:16206: tad ambu sarvato 'nviṣya kutrāpi labhyate na hi /
K14ratnml_u:16209: labhāmi darśanaṃ devyo bhavāṃtīnam aho 'dhunā // Rm_38.181{80} //
K14ratnml_u:16210: ity uktvā sena ālokya sāṃjaliḥ purato gataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16211: tāḥ sarvā apsarā devīnatvaitaṃ samapṛchata // Rm_38.182{81} //
K14ratnml_u:16212: bho devyo bhavantyo 'pi kim artham iha tiṣṭhatha /
K14ratnml_u:16213: vaktavyaṃ cet tad arthaṃ me samupādeṣṭum arhatha // Rm_38.183{82} //
K14ratnml_u:16215: sā taṃ senaṃ samāmaṃtrya purar evam upādiśat // Rm_38.184{83} //
K14ratnml_u:16216: mānava tvaṃ na jānāsi yad idaṃ vratam uttamaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:16218: iti devyā tayākhyātaṃ śrutvā senaḥ sa moditaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16219: tad vrataṃ dharttum ichaṃs tāṃ devīṃ natvaivam abravīt // Rm_38.186{85} //
K14ratnml_u:16220: prasīda me mahādevi yac chrīdevyā idaṃ vrataṃ /
K14ratnml_u:16221: aham api samichāmi dhartuṃ tan me upādiśa // Rm_38.187{86} //
K14ratnml_u:16222: iti tenārthitaṃ śrutvā sā devī paritoṣitā /
K14ratnml_u:16223: taṃ senaṃ sudhiyaṃ dhīraṃ matvaivam abravīt punaḥ // Rm_38.188{87} //
K14ratnml_u:16224: mānava vadi te vāṃchāpy asti śrīvasudhāvrate /
K14ratnml_u:16225: tat tāvad iha saṃpaśya samāpyetā 'dhunā vrataṃ // Rm_38.189{88} //
K14ratnml_u:16228: ity uktvā sāpsaro devī sarvās tā apsarogaṇāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16229: prāhūya tan nadītīre vratārambhaṃ tathākarot // Rm_38.191{90} //
K14ratnml_u:16230: tatra tāḥ samupāśritya sarvā devyā yathākramaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:16231: yathāvidhi samārabhya vrataṃ pūrṇaṃ pracakrire // Rm_38.192{91} //
K14ratnml_u:16234: aṣṭāṃgapraṇatiṃ kṛtvā sāṃjalir evam abravīt // Rm_38.193{92} //
K14ratnml_u:16236: tan metiḥ kṣīyate pāpam ātmāri śuddhyate 'dhunā // Rm_38.194{93} //
K14ratnml_u:16237: prasīdata mahādevyaḥ sarvā me kṛpayā dṛśā /
K14ratnml_u:16238: paśyantyo 'nugrahaṃ kṛtvā vrate pradātum arhataṃ // Rm_38.195{94} //
K14ratnml_u:16240: tad vratavidhi saṃpūrṇaṃ samupādeṣṭum arhatha // Rm_38.196{95} //
K14ratnml_u:16241: iti saṃprārthitaṃ tena śrutvā devī pradhānikā /
K14ratnml_u:16242: sā taṃ senaṃ viśuddhāṃśaṃ dṛṣṭvaivaṃ samupādiśat // Rm_38.197{96} //
K14ratnml_u:16246: māghe māse ca tadvac ca sarveṣv api ca māsu vā // Rm_38.199{98} //
K14ratnml_u:16250: tatra ratnamayaraṅgai dhātucūrṇaiś ca paṃcabhiḥ // Rm_38.201{100} //
K14ratnml_u:16253: guruḥ śiṣyaiḥ sahālakṣya varttayen maṇḍalaṃ kramāt /
K14ratnml_u:16254: tatra devyādi cihnāni likhed yathāvidhi kramāt // Rm_38.203{2} //
K14ratnml_u:16266: tato rātrau trisaṃdhyaṃ ca samabhyarcya yathāvidhiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16267: baliṃ paṃcāmṛtair yuktaṃ datvā devīṃ smaraṃś caret // Rm_38.209{8} //
K14ratnml_u:16268: tataḥ prātas tṛtīyāyāṃ tīrthe dravyaiḥ sugaṃdhibhiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16271: maṇḍale sagaṇāṃ devīṃ dhyātvāvāhya samarcayet // Rm_38.211{10} //
K14ratnml_u:16273: paṃcagavyais tathā sarvār abhisiṃcya viśodhayet // Rm_38.212{11} //
K14ratnml_u:16274: tatas te vratinaḥ sarve ācāryyapramukhāḥ kramāt /
K14ratnml_u:16275: madhyāhne yakṣarājasya digmukhāḥ svāsanāḥ śritāḥ // Rm_38.213{12} //
K14ratnml_u:16278: ādau vajradharaṃ natvā triratnaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ // Rm_38.214{13} //
K14ratnml_u:16279: maṃtrale sagaṇāṃ devīṃ dhyātvārcaye yathākramaṃ // Rm_38.215{14/} //
K14ratnml_u:16289: tad dvitīyapuṭe pṛṣṭhe pīto vajrāsano jināḥ // Rm_38.219{18} //
K14ratnml_u:16300: bījapūrakam ekena vibhrat kroḍaṃ tathāparaṃ // Rm_38.225{24} //
K14ratnml_u:16302: bījapūrakam utsaṅge sthitiṃ dorbhyāṃ samā tathā // Rm_38.226{25} //
K14ratnml_u:16303: nairṛtye kelimālī ca śyāmavarṇas tathā sthitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16305: vāyavye ca mukhendrākhyaḥ pītavarṇas tathā sthitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16309: tat tṛtīyapuṭe pūrve guptā devī tathā sthitā /
K14ratnml_u:16310: haridvarṇā bhujābhyāṃ sa cāmaraṃ vibhratī dharā // Rm_38.230{29} //
K14ratnml_u:16311: nairṛte vasuguptākhyā devī raktās tathā sthitā /
K14ratnml_u:16313: sarasvatī ca vāyavye devī pītā tathā sthitā /
K14ratnml_u:16315: iśāne caṃdrakāṃtākhyā devī śvetā tathā sthitā /
K14ratnml_u:16324: uttare pītavarṇaś ca vaiśravaṇas tathā sthitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16326: ity etā devatā sarvāḥ śrīdevīpramukhān kramāt /
K14ratnml_u:16328: tatas tā maṇḍale sarvāḥ pratiṣṭhāpya yathā kramaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:16330: gaṃdhaṃ puṣpaṃ tathā dhūpaṃ dīpaṃ naivedyam eva ca /
K14ratnml_u:16333: pādyam arghyaṃ tathā snānaṃ madhuparkācanaṃ tathā /
K14ratnml_u:16334: gaṃdhaṃ puṣpaṃ ca dhūpaṃ ca dīpaṃ naivedyam eva ca /
K14ratnml_u:16340: prayojayed arcanāyām upacārās tu ṣoḍaśaḥ // Rm_38.243{42} //
K14ratnml_u:16341: tato devyāḥ svahṛtmaṃtraṃ tathā upahṛdayaṃ japet /
K14ratnml_u:16342: sarvāsām api maṃtrāṇi yāvac chatasahasradhā // Rm_38.244{43} //
K14ratnml_u:16344: kṛtvā pradakṣiṇāny evaṃ aṣṭāṃgaiḥ praṇayet punaḥ // Rm_38.245{44} //
K14ratnml_u:16345: tataś ca sāṃjaliḥ sthitvā prakuryāt pāpadeśanāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:16348: baliṃ gāthāḥ paṭhan dadyāt sarvabhūtā hi tuṣṭaye // Rm_38.247{46} //
K14ratnml_u:16349: tathā te vratinaḥ sarve sarvaṃ dhṛtvā samāhitāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16350: yathā śāstrā samādiṣṭam anukuryu vrataṃ kramāt // Rm_38.248{47} //
K14ratnml_u:16351: tatas te vratinaḥ sarve dānaṃ dadyuḥ sa dakṣiṇaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:16352: gurave devatābhyo 'pi praṇameyuś ca sādaraṃ // Rm_38.249{48} //
K14ratnml_u:16354: ṣoḍaśagraṃthitaṃ pītaṃ vratibhyo gurur arpayet // Rm_38.250{49} //
K14ratnml_u:16355: tat sūtraṃ te samādāya sarve 'pi vratino mudā /
K14ratnml_u:16356: rakṣārthaṃ svakare vadhvā dadhyur vratasamāptitaḥ // Rm_38.251{50} //
K14ratnml_u:16357: tatas te vratinaḥ sarve dhṛtvā saṃpattiprārthanāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:16358: natvā kṣamārthanāṃ cāpi kṛtvā careyur utthitāḥ // Rm_38.252{51} //
K14ratnml_u:16360: saha paṃcāmṛtaiḥ sarvaiḥ kuryus tadvratapālanāṃ // Rm_38.253{52} //
K14ratnml_u:16361: tatas tevratinaḥ sarve snātvā cāpi samāhitāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16362: dīpamālāḥ samujvālya tiṣṭheyu niśi jāgritāḥ // Rm_38.254{53} //
K14ratnml_u:16363: tāṃ devīṃ sagaṇāṃ smṛtvā paṭhanto dhāraṇīm api /
K14ratnml_u:16365: evaṃ te tan niśāṃ sarve vyatilaṃghya punas tathā /
K14ratnml_u:16367: prātaḥ sugaṃdhibhis tīrthe snātva śuddhāmvarāvṛtāḥ // Rm_38.256{55} //
K14ratnml_u:16368: tāṃ devīṃ sagaṇāṃ dhyātvā samāvāhya yathākramaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:16371: kṛtvā pradakṣiṇāṃ cāpi kuryur aṣṭāṅgaprāṇatiṃ // Rm_38.258{57} //
K14ratnml_u:16372: tataś ca purataḥ sthitvā prakuryuḥ pāpadeśanāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:16376: tato guruṃ samabhyarcya datvā dānaṃ sadakṣiṇaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:16377: śraddhayā praṇatiṃ kṛtvā toṣayeyuḥ samādarāt // Rm_38.261{60} //
K14ratnml_u:16379: kṛtvā kṣamārthanāṃ cāpi visarjayed yathāvidhi // Rm_38.262{61} //
K14ratnml_u:16380: tataḥ śāstā sa ācāryaḥ kṛtvā cāpi kṣamārthanāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:16381: saṃpūrṇaṃ tad vrataṃ kṛtvā vratasūtraṃ samāharet // Rm_38.263{62} //
K14ratnml_u:16383: śubhāśiṣaṃ pradatvā ca tan maṇḍalaṃ visarjayet // Rm_38.264{63} //
K14ratnml_u:16384: tatas tad rajam ādāya koṣṭhāgāre suguptite /
K14ratnml_u:16385: nikṣipya pratisaṃsthāpya nityaṃ namet sadādarāt // Rm_38.265{64} //
K14ratnml_u:16386: aparaṃ puṣpādikaṃ sarvaṃ nirmālyaṃ savid ambhasi /
K14ratnml_u:16387: nāgān abhyarcya tat sarvaṃ samarppitvā pravāhayet // Rm_38.266{65} //
K14ratnml_u:16388: tan nadījalam ādāya gṛhe tataḥ samācaret /
K14ratnml_u:16389: tatra sarvatra geheṣu tajjalair abhiṣiṃcayet // Rm_38.267{66} //
K14ratnml_u:16390: tatas tan maṇḍale sthāne samāvāhya yathāvidhi /
K14ratnml_u:16391: śrīkumārīṃ mahādevīṃ samabhyarcya hi toṣayet // Rm_38.268{67} //
K14ratnml_u:16394: evaṃ tad vratasaṃpūrṇaṃ kṛtvā sarve pramoditāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16395: śrivasudhāṃ mahādevīṃ smṛtvā careyur ābhavaṃ // Rm_38.270{69} //
K14ratnml_u:16396: evam etad vidhānena śrīdevyāḥ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16397: yathāvidhi samādhāya vrataṃ caret samādarāt // Rm_38.271{70} //
K14ratnml_u:16398: tasya gṛhe tad ārabhya śrīdevī śrīvasundharā /
K14ratnml_u:16399: svayam āgatya sarvatra kṣemaṃ kṛtvā vaset sadā // Rm_38.272{71} //
K14ratnml_u:16400: tad ārābhya sadā tasya gṛhe sarvatra maṃgalaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:16401: nirupadravam ānaṃdaṃ sarvadāpi bhaved dhruvaṃ // Rm_38.273{72} //
K14ratnml_u:16402: tatas tasya gṛhe saṃpad dine dine pravarddhitā /
K14ratnml_u:16404: atha cāpi tathā śaktau yaḥ śrāddhaḥ puruṣaḥ sudhīḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16405: snātvā śuddhāmvaro gehe śodhayitvā samaṃtataḥ // Rm_38.275{74} //
K14ratnml_u:16406: śrīdevyāḥ pratimāyaivaṃ paṭaṃ vāpi prasārya ca /
K14ratnml_u:16407: yathāśakti samabhyarcya dhāraṇīṃ sarvadā paṭhet // Rm_38.276{75} //
K14ratnml_u:16408: tasyāpi ca gṛhe tiṣṭhec chrīdevī sagaṇānvitā /
K14ratnml_u:16409: tathā tatra bhaved evaṃ maṃgalaṃ nirupadravaṃ // Rm_38.277{76} //
K14ratnml_u:16411: tadā tasya gṛhe saṃpad dine dine hi varddhate /
K14ratnml_u:16412: sarvadravyābhisaṃpūrṇā bhaven na kṣiṇuyāt kvacit // Rm_38.278{77} //
K14ratnml_u:16413: atha vā prāktane pītarajasā maṃḍalaṃ tathā /
K14ratnml_u:16418: yathāśakti samabhyarcya dhāraṇīṃ śraddhayā paṭhet // Rm_38.281{80} //
K14ratnml_u:16419: tasyāpi ca gṛhe bhadraṃ kṛtvā devī vaset sadā /
K14ratnml_u:16420: tatas tathā kramāt saṃpat parivṛddhā bhaved dhruvaṃ // Rm_38.282{81} //
K14ratnml_u:16421: atha prātas tathā snātvā śuddhavastrāvṛtaḥ sudhīḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16423: śubhe sthāne paṭaṃ cāpi devyā mūrttiṃ prasārya ca /
K14ratnml_u:16424: yāthāśakti samabhyarcya trivārān dhāraṇīṃ paṭhet // Rm_38.284{83} //
K14ratnml_u:16425: tasyāpi ca gṛhe bhadraṃ kṛtvā devī sadā vaset /
K14ratnml_u:16426: tathā tatra mahāsaṃpad abhivṛddhā bhaved dhruvaṃ // Rm_38.285{84} //
K14ratnml_u:16427: atha vā ca tathā snātvā śuddhavastrāvṛtaḥ sudhīḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16429: śubhe sthāne gṛhe devyāś candanenāpi maṃḍalaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:16430: varttayitvā tathā devīṃ dhyatvāvāhya samarcayet // Rm_38.287{86} //
K14ratnml_u:16432: kṛtvā pradakṣiṇāny evaṃ natvā saṃprārthayen nidhiṃ // Rm_38.288{87} //
K14ratnml_u:16433: tasyāpi ca gṛhe devī maṃgalaṃ nirupadravaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:16434: kṛtvā svayaṃ samāśritya nivaset sarvadā dhruvaṃ // Rm_38.289{88} //
K14ratnml_u:16436: abhivṛddhya bhaven nūnaṃ nidhiś cāpi samudbhavet // Rm_38.290{89} //
K14ratnml_u:16437: atha vā svagṛhe śuddhe kośakoṣṭhālaye 'pi ca /
K14ratnml_u:16442: vidhivan manasā dhyātvā samāvāhya samarcayet // Rm_38.293{92} //
K14ratnml_u:16445: tatas tāṃ sagaṇāṃ devīṃ dhyātvā japet samāhitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16446: saṃpaṭhed dhāraṇīṃ cāpi śraddhayā bhaktimānasaḥ // Rm_38.295{94} //
K14ratnml_u:16447: tatha caikam ahorātram avichinnaṃ paṃthen mudā /
K14ratnml_u:16448: yāvat tripaṃcasaptāhorātrāṇi ca paṭhet tathā // Rm_38.296{95} //
K14ratnml_u:16449: ācāryaś ca tathā rātrau striḥ kṛtvā divasasya ca /
K14ratnml_u:16450: sa lokapālabhūtebhyo baliṃ dadyād yathāvidhi // Rm_38.297{96} //
K14ratnml_u:16452: dāne sadakṣiṇaṃ dadyād anyebhyo 'pi tathādarāt // Rm_38.298{97} //
K14ratnml_u:16454: tataś ca sāṃjalir natvā prārthayitvā kṣamām api /
K14ratnml_u:16456: tataḥ sarvaṃ samāpyaivaiḥ kṛtvāpi tad visarjanaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:16458: tan maṇḍale rajaḥ sarvaṃ samādāya sapuṣpakaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:16460: tad rajo yatra nikṣiptaṃ tatra saṃpat pravarddhitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16461: sarvadravyābhisaṃpūrṇā bhaven na kṣiṇuyāt kvacit // Rm_38.302{1} //
K14ratnml_u:16463: nadyāṃ nāgān samabhyarya saṃprakṣipya pravāhayet // Rm_38.303{2} //
K14ratnml_u:16465: yatrāpi paṭhyate tatra saṃpat pravarddhitā bhavet // Rm_38.304{3} //
K14ratnml_u:16466: evaṃ satyaṃ samākhyātaṃ sarvair api munīśvaraṃ /
K14ratnml_u:16467: śrīdevyāḥ sādhanaṃ kalyaṃ matvaivaṃ cara tad vrataṃ // Rm_38.305{4} //
K14ratnml_u:16468: ya evaṃ śrīmahādevyāḥ śraddhayā śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16469: yathāvidhi samādhāya carate vratam ādarāt // Rm_38.306{5} //
K14ratnml_u:16471: viheṭhanāṃ sadā kvāpi karttu maivābhiśaknuyuḥ // Rm_38.307{6} //
K14ratnml_u:16473: grahās tārāś ca siddhāś ca sādhyā vidyādharā api // Rm_38.308{7} //
K14ratnml_u:16474: lokapālāś ca sarve 'pi gaṃdharvāḥ kiṃnarā api /
K14ratnml_u:16475: yakṣāś ca rākṣasāḥ sarve nāgāś ca garuḍā api // Rm_38.309{8} //
K14ratnml_u:16477: mahākālāś ca ḍākinyaḥ śākinyo 'pi tathāparāḥ // Rm_38.310{9} //
K14ratnml_u:16479: rakṣanti sarvadā nityaṃ śrīdevyāḥ śaraṇāśritaṃ // Rm_38.311{10} //
K14ratnml_u:16481: tathā bhūtagaṇāḥ sarve piśācāś ca durāśayāḥ // Rm_38.312{11} //
K14ratnml_u:16482: sarve jvarādayo rogā apasmārādayo 'pi ca // Rm_38.313{12} //
K14ratnml_u:16483: unmādā piṭakāś cāpi sarve kuṣṭhāś ca kachavaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16484: śrīdevīvratino dehe na spṛśaṃti kadācana // Rm_38.314{13} //
K14ratnml_u:16486: tasya deśe gṛhe dehe na viśanti kadā cana // Rm_38.315{14} //
K14ratnml_u:16487: vasuṃdharyā vrate yatra dhāraṇī ca pravarttate /
K14ratnml_u:16488: tatra māragaṇā duṣṭā upasargā viśanti na // Rm_38.316{15} //
K14ratnml_u:16489: nṛpāgnyudakā caurādi duṣṭāḥ śaṭhāś ca vaṃcakāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16490: śrīdevīvratinaḥ kiṃcid apakartuṃ na śaknuyuḥ // Rm_38.317{16} //
K14ratnml_u:16491: yaś ca śrīvasudhārāyā bhaktimāñ charaṇaṃ gataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16492: sarvadā smaraṇaṃ kṛtvā bhajate saṃcarad vrataṃ // Rm_38.318{17} //
K14ratnml_u:16493: yaś ca tasyā mahādevyā dhāraṇīṃ muditaḥ smaran /
K14ratnml_u:16494: paṭhate sarvadāpy evaṃ parebhyo 'pi samādiśet // Rm_38.319{18} //
K14ratnml_u:16495: yaś caitad dhāraṇīṃ samyag 'likhel likhāyayed api /
K14ratnml_u:16496: likhitāṃ samādāya saṃsthāpya bhajate gṛhe // Rm_38.320{19} //
K14ratnml_u:16497: yaś cāpi hṛdayaṃ devyā likhitvā bhūrjapatrake /
K14ratnml_u:16499: mūrddhni kaṇṭhe bhuje vāhau dadhāti nityam ādarāt // Rm_38.321{20} //
K14ratnml_u:16501: sarve 'pi sarvadā kvāpi hy apakarttuṃ na śaknuyuḥ // Rm_38.322{21} //
K14ratnml_u:16505: tathā dānaṃ sadā kṛtvā bodhimārge caranti ye // Rm_38.324{23} //
K14ratnml_u:16506: te sarve krameṇaivaṃ pūrya pāramitā daśaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16507: sarvān māragāṇāṃ jitvā prāpnuyu bodhisaṃpadaṃ // Rm_38.325{24} //
K14ratnml_u:16509: pālayanti prajā lokān dharmair lakṣmīvratodbhavaiḥ // Rm_38.326{25} //
K14ratnml_u:16510: evam anye 'pi lokāś ca ye ye saṃpatsamṛddhitāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16512: datvā dānaṃ sukhaṃ bhuktvā yāvajjīvaṃ śubhe sadā /
K14ratnml_u:16513: pracaranty api sarve te jñeyā lakṣmīprasādataḥ // Rm_38.328{27} //
K14ratnml_u:16514: ye śrīdevyā vrataṃ dhṛtvā sarvārthibhyo yathepsitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:16515: dadāti te mahāsatvāḥ śrīmantaḥ sadguṇānvitāḥ // Rm_38.329{28} //
K14ratnml_u:16525: bodhisatvā jagannāthā buddhātmajā bhavaṃty api // Rm_38.334{33} //
K14ratnml_u:16526: yatibhir nā atītās te varttamānā anāgatāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16529: bodhilabdhā bhavaṃty evaṃ lapsyaṃti nānyathā khalu // Rm_38.336{35} //
K14ratnml_u:16530: evaṃ matvā mahāvidyaṃ śrīdevīṃ dhāraṇīṃ parāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:16531: samādhāya paṭhan nityaṃ vrataṃ cara samādarāt // Rm_38.337{36} //
K14ratnml_u:16537: dāridryaduḥkhaśokāgnau na pataṃti kadāpi te // Rm_38.340{39} //
K14ratnml_u:16541: sarvair api munīndrair hi saṃkhyātuṃ nāpi śakyate // Rm_38.342{41} //
K14ratnml_u:16543: tad etadvratapuṇyānāṃ saṃkhyātuṃ kena śakyate // Rm_38.343{42} //
K14ratnml_u:16545: yad etadvratasādṛśyaṃ kutrāpi no hi vidyate /
K14ratnml_u:16546: tad adhikaṃ kuto loke sarvatrāpi na dṛśyate // Rm_38.344{43} //
K14ratnml_u:16548: triratnabhajanād eva labhyate bhuvi mānavaṃ // Rm_38.345{44} //
K14ratnml_u:16549: tad evaṃ tvaṃ parijñāya triratnaśaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16550: śrīdevīṃ vidhināvāhya vrataṃ cara samāhitaḥ // Rm_38.346{45} //
K14ratnml_u:16553: trividhāṃ bodhim āsādya saṃbuddhapadam āpnuyuḥ // Rm_38.348{47/} //
K14ratnml_u:16554: iti hetor mahādevyāḥ svayaṃ tvaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16555: vrataṃ caraṃs tathā loke pracāraya samaṃtataḥ // Rm_38.349{48} //
K14ratnml_u:16556: iti tayā mahādevyāḥ samādiṣṭaṃ niśamya saḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16557: senaḥ kṛtāṃjalir natvā tāṃ devīm evam abravīt // Rm_38.350{49} //
K14ratnml_u:16558: evaṃ devi kariṣyāmi bhavatyājñāṃ śiro vahan /
K14ratnml_u:16559: tat prasīda mahādevyā dhāraṇīṃ saṃpradehi me // Rm_38.351{50} //
K14ratnml_u:16560: iti saṃprārthitaṃ tena śrutvā sā saṃprasāditā /
K14ratnml_u:16561: devī taṃ senam ālokya samāmaṃtryaivam ādiśat // Rm_38.352{51} //
K14ratnml_u:16562: sādhu sena gṛhāṇa tvaṃ devyāyā dhāraṇīṃ varāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:16563: svayaṃ paṭhaṃ parebhyo 'pi deśayasva yathāvidhi // Rm_38.353{52} //
K14ratnml_u:16565: tasmai senāsu tāṃ devyā dhāraṇīṃ saṃpaṭhan dadau // Rm_38.354{53} //
K14ratnml_u:16566: sa senas tāṃ mahādevīṃ praṇatvā sāṃjalir mudā /
K14ratnml_u:16567: śrīdevyā dhāraṇīṃ vidyāṃ praṇatvā śraddhayādade // Rm_38.355{54} //
K14ratnml_u:16568: tataḥ sā cāpsaro devī tasmai senāya sādaraṃ /
K14ratnml_u:16569: sa paṃcāmṛtagodhūmai piṣṭakaṃ pālane dadau // Rm_38.356{55} //
K14ratnml_u:16570: tad dattaṃ piṣṭataṃ taṃ sa seno dṛṣṭvā pramoditaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16571: praṇatvādāya taṃ bhūpaṃ smṛtvā na bubhuje svayaṃ // Rm_38.357{56} //
K14ratnml_u:16575: anyā devyo 'pi rūpaṃ svaṃ dhṛtvā devīṃ vasuṃdharāṃ // Rm_38.359{58} //
K14ratnml_u:16578: tataḥ sa sena utthāya tāṃ devīṃ sagaṇāṃ mudā /
K14ratnml_u:16579: muhurmuhur vaddhagala aṣṭāṅgaiḥ praṇatiṃ vyadhāt // Rm_38.361{60} //
K14ratnml_u:16581: taṃ jalaṃ ca samādhāya sahasā nṛpāṃtike yayau // Rm_38.362{61} //
K14ratnml_u:16582: tatra sa sena ālokya nṛpaṃ durād upāgataṃ /
K14ratnml_u:16583: tad amṛtādikaṃ sarvam upasthāpyāpy adhaukayat // Rm_38.363{62} //
K14ratnml_u:16584: tataḥ sa sena ālokya taṃ nṛpaṃ sāṃjalir mudā /
K14ratnml_u:16586: tam amṛtādikaṃ sarvaṃ dṛṣṭvā sa vismito nṛpaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16587: kiṃ vilaṃvaṃ kṛtaś caitad ity evaṃ tam apṛchata // Rm_38.365{67/} //
K14ratnml_u:16589: iti pṛṣṭe narendreṇa sa senaḥ samupāśritaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16590: taṃ narendraṃ samālokya vinayann evam abravīt // Rm_38.366{68} //
K14ratnml_u:16591: kṣamasva bho mahārāja yad arthe me vilaṃvitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:16592: tat sarvaṃ samupākhyāya bhavantaṃ bodhayāny api // Rm_38.367{69} //
K14ratnml_u:16594: idaṃ paṃcāmṛtaṃ cāpi bhukṣvedaṃ ca supiṣṭakaṃ // Rm_38.368{70} //
K14ratnml_u:16595: ity uktvā sa samādāya kamaṇḍaluṃ samarppayat /
K14ratnml_u:16596: bhogyaṃ paṃcāmṛtaṃ cāpi piṣṭakaṃ cāgrataḥ prabhoḥ // Rm_38.369{71} //
K14ratnml_u:16597: tad amṛtādikaṃ sarvaṃ dṛṣṭvā sa mudito nṛpaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16598: kamaṇḍaluṃ samādāya papau tat surasāmṛtaṃ // Rm_38.370{72} //
K14ratnml_u:16600: taṃ ca paṃcāmṛtaṃ bhogyaṃ bubhuje piṣṭakāny api // Rm_38.371{73} //
K14ratnml_u:16602: taṃ senaṃ sumatiṃ dhīraṃ samālokyaivam abravīt // Rm_38.372{73/} //
K14ratnml_u:16603: tvam apīdaṃ sudhākalpam amṛtaṃ piva sanmate /
K14ratnml_u:16604: bhukṣva pacāmṛtaṃ bhogyaṃ piṣṭakaṃ cedam uttamaṃ // Rm_38.373{74} //
K14ratnml_u:16605: iti rājñā samādiṣṭe sa senaḥ pratimaṃḍitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16606: tad amṛtādikaṃ sarvam ādāya bubhuje svayaṃ // Rm_38.374{75} //
K14ratnml_u:16607: tatas tac cheṣam ādāya sa senaḥ paritoṣitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16608: aśvāya samupasthāpya sarvaṃ dadau vinodayan // Rm_38.375{76} //
K14ratnml_u:16609: so 'pi cāśvaḥ samālokya tat sarvam amṛtādikaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:16611: tataḥ sa nṛpati rājā pariśuddhāśayo mudā /
K14ratnml_u:16612: taṃ senaṃ tam upāmaṃtrya punar evam apṛchata // Rm_38.377{78} //
K14ratnml_u:16613: aho sena tvam ānītaṃ yad etad amṛtādikaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:16614: kutaḥ kathaṃ samāsādya tat satyaṃ vaktum arhasi // Rm_38.378{79} //
K14ratnml_u:16615: ity evaṃ prārthite rājñā sa senaḥ sāṃjalir mudā /
K14ratnml_u:16616: svāminaṃ taṃ nṛpaṃ natvā samālokyaivam abravīt // Rm_38.379{80} //
K14ratnml_u:16617: śṛṇu rājan samādhāya yad etad amṛtādikaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:16618: mayāsādya samānītaṃ tat saṃnivedayāni te // Rm_38.380{81} //
K14ratnml_u:16619: yad atra tvaṃ tṛṣārtto 'si tadarthe 'haṃ sasaṃbhramaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16620: jalam anveṣituṃ tatra vane paśyan bhramāmy ahaṃ // Rm_38.381{82} //
K14ratnml_u:16621: kutrāpi dṛśyate nātra pānīyaṃ nirjane vane /
K14ratnml_u:16622: tato dūrataraṃ gatvā jalam anveṣituṃ bhrame // Rm_38.382{83} //
K14ratnml_u:16623: tatrāpi dṛśyate naiva jalaṃ kvāpi samaṃtataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16624: tato 'tidūrato nadyāḥ śabdaṃ śṛṇvann anuvraje // Rm_38.383{84} //
K14ratnml_u:16626: tatra devīgaṇāś cāpi paśyāmi vratacārikāḥ // Rm_38.384{85} //
K14ratnml_u:16628: tato 'haṃ tatprabhāvena tāṃ nadīṃ laṃghayan vraje // Rm_38.385{86} //
K14ratnml_u:16629: tatra māṃ samupāhūya sarvā tā apsarogaṇāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16630: kutaḥ katham ihāyāsi tvaṃ vadeti babhāṣire // Rm_38.386{87} //
K14ratnml_u:16632: sāṃjaliḥ sādaraṃ natvā pura evaṃ nivedaya // Rm_38.387{88} //
K14ratnml_u:16635: tasyodyāne varāhau dvau prakurvāta upadravaṃ // Rm_38.388{89} //
K14ratnml_u:16637: saha bhogyaṃ samāruhya varāhau haṃtuṃ udyayau // Rm_38.389{90} //
K14ratnml_u:16639: hāhākāraṃ prakurvantas tiṣṭhanti te nṛpādayaḥ // Rm_38.390{91} //
K14ratnml_u:16640: tatas tau dvau mahāghorau varāhau saha sāgataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16641: udyānān nirgatau vegān nṛpāntikāt parāgatau // Rm_38.391{92} //
K14ratnml_u:16642: tatra sa nṛpatiḥ kopāt tau varāhāv anudrutaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16643: aśvam āruhya vegena praviṣṭo bhramate vane // Rm_38.392{93} //
K14ratnml_u:16644: tatra sa nṛpatir aśvād vegāt pradhāvato 'patat /
K14ratnml_u:16646: tasya rājñas tṛṣārttasya jalam anveṣituṃ bhraman /
K14ratnml_u:16647: kutrāpi nirjane 'raṇye jalaṃ paśyāmy ahaṃ na hi // Rm_38.394{95} //
K14ratnml_u:16648: tato dūrataraṃ gatvā jalam anviṣya sarvataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16649: bhraman dūrān nadīśabdaṃ śrutvāhaṃ samupāsare // Rm_38.395{96} //
K14ratnml_u:16650: etad artham ahaṃ devyo dūrataḥ sahasāgataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16651: tad bhavantyaḥ prasīdaṃtu dṛśyaṃte bhāgyato mayā // Rm_38.396{97} //
K14ratnml_u:16653: iti pṛṣṭe mayā tāś ca devyaḥ sarvāḥ prasāditāḥ // Rm_38.397{93} //
K14ratnml_u:16654: ādarān māṃ samāmaṃtrya pura evaṃ babhāṣire /
K14ratnml_u:16655: mānava tvaṃ na jānīṣe yad iheva mamāśritā /
K14ratnml_u:16656: tad arthaṃ samupākhyāyas tat saṃśṛṇu samāhitaḥ // Rm_38.398{99} //
K14ratnml_u:16658: tasyā vrataṃ vayaṃ sarvā caritum iha saṃsthitāḥ // Rm_38.399{100} //
K14ratnml_u:16659: tad atra no vrataṃ paśyaṃ kṣaṇaṃ tiṣṭha samāhitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16660: etaddṛṣṭe 'pi te puṇyaṃ saṃprajāyen mahattaraṃ // Rm_38.400{1} //
K14ratnml_u:16662: tatheti prativijñapya tad vrataṃ draṣṭum āśrame // Rm_38.401{2} //
K14ratnml_u:16663: tatas tā apsarodevyaḥ sarvās tatra yathākramaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:16665: tatra tā maṃḍale devīṃ sagaṇāṃ śrīvasuṃdharāṇ /
K14ratnml_u:16667: japastotrādikaṃ kṛtvā sarvāḥ sāṃjalayaś ca tāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16669: tatas tā apsarodevyaḥ sarvāḥ samāptite vrate /
K14ratnml_u:16670: sa paṃcāmṛtaiḥ pūpaiḥ kurvaṃti vratapālanāṃ // Rm_38.405{6} //
K14ratnml_u:16671: mahyam api tathā dattaṃ tābhiḥ sarvābhir ādarāt /
K14ratnml_u:16672: idaṃ paṃcāṃṛtaṃ bhojyaṃ godhūmapiṣṭakaṃ varaṃ // Rm_38.406{7} //
K14ratnml_u:16673: smṛtvā bhavaṃtam ādāya tābhir dattaṃ samādarāt /
K14ratnml_u:16674: tathā pātre pratiṣṭhāpya gopayāmi tavārthataḥ // Rm_38.407{8} //
K14ratnml_u:16675: tato 'haṃ sāṃjalir natvā tā devīḥ sakalā api /
K14ratnml_u:16676: tathā caritum ālocya prārthayāmi vidhiṃ vrate // Rm_38.408{9} //
K14ratnml_u:16677: mayā saṃprārthitaṃ śrutvā yā tad devī gaṇādhipā /
K14ratnml_u:16679: sā tad vratavidhiṃ samyak samādiśati me kramāt // Rm_38.409{10} //
K14ratnml_u:16681: tathā tad vratam ārādhya prechāmi carituṃ sadā // Rm_38.410{11} //
K14ratnml_u:16682: pratyakṣadarśanaṃ labdhvā aṣṭāṃgaiḥ praṇato 'smy ahaṃ // Rm_38.411{12} //
K14ratnml_u:16683: tatas tāḥ sakalā devīḥ prārthayitvā samādārāt /
K14ratnml_u:16684: idaṃ divyāmṛtaṃ bhojyaṃ prādāya sahasā care // Rm_38.412{13} //
K14ratnml_u:16685: iti heto mahārāja vilamvo jāyate tathā /
K14ratnml_u:16686: tat kṣamasva prabho mātra raukṣyaṃ kṛthāḥ prasīda me // Rm_38.413{14} //
K14ratnml_u:16687: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā sa rājā vismayānvitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16688: tad darśanotsuko dṛṣṭvā taṃ senam etad abravīt // Rm_38.414{15} //
K14ratnml_u:16689: aho āścaryyam atra yad vasudhārā vrataṃ śrutaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:16690: pratyakṣadarśanam api labdhaṃ seneha nirjane // Rm_38.415{16} //
K14ratnml_u:16691: mayā na śrūyate kvāpi dṛśyate na kadā cana /
K14ratnml_u:16692: tad draṣṭuṃ sena me cittaṃ samabhilaṣati dhruvaṃ // Rm_38.416{17} //
K14ratnml_u:16693: tasmāt tvaṃ tatra māṃ nītvā tā devī darśaya drutaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:16694: iti rājñoditaṃ śrutvā sa senaḥ sacivaḥ sudhīḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16695: tatheti prativijñapya tatra rājñā saha caran // Rm_38.417{18} //
K14ratnml_u:16697: daivayogāt kṣaṇāt prāptau tatra sthāne samaikṣatāṃ // Rm_38.418{19} //
K14ratnml_u:16698: tadā tatra na tā devyaḥ sthitāḥ sarvā divaṃ gatāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16699: vratanirmālyapuṣpādi tatrādrāṣṭāṃ na tāḥ kvacit // Rm_38.419{20} //
K14ratnml_u:16700: tatra sa nṛpatis tāsāṃ devīnāṃ darśanaṃ kvacit /
K14ratnml_u:16702: tatra sa nṛpatir natvā vratasthāne kṛtāṃjaliḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16703: sarvatrāpi samālokya khaṃ paśyann evam abravīt // Rm_38.421{22} //
K14ratnml_u:16704: hā mayā labhyate nātra devīnāṃ darśanaṃ kvacit /
K14ratnml_u:16705: kiṃ mayā prakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ maṃdabhāgyo 'smy ahaṃ yataḥ // Rm_38.422{23} //
K14ratnml_u:16706: vrataṃ caritum ichāmi tat kathaṃ jñāsyate vidhiṃ /
K14ratnml_u:16707: aho me daivayogena śrutam eva na darśanaṃ // Rm_38.423{24} //
K14ratnml_u:16708: tad atra kiṃ kariṣyāmi ko 'tra me vidhim ādiśet /
K14ratnml_u:16709: yadichāmi na tat siddhaṃ vṛthaivetye pariśramaṃ // Rm_38.424{25} //
K14ratnml_u:16710: iti proktvā viṣaṇṇātmā nṛpatiḥ sa vimohitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16712: hā heti ninditātmānaṃ hā me bhāgyam apīha dhik // Rm_38.426{27/} //
K14ratnml_u:16713: ity evaṃ vilapann aśrupūrṇāsyo gadgadaḥ svaraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16714: hṛdi lalāṭe vāhubhyāṃ tāḍayan mūrchito muhuḥ // Rm_38.427{28} //
K14ratnml_u:16715: smṛtimāṃś ca svayam api tasthau tatra viniḥsvasan // Rm_38.428{28/} //
K14ratnml_u:16716: ity evaṃ taṃ sthitaṃ dṛṣṭvā sā śrīdevī vasuṃdharā /
K14ratnml_u:16718: rājan mātra viṣīda tvaṃ setsyate te 'bhilāṣitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:16719: sarvaṃ seno vijānāti tat senaṃ pṛcha tad vidhiṃ // Rm_38.430{30} //
K14ratnml_u:16720: ity ākāśāt samuccāraṃ ghoṣaṃ śrutvā sa bhūpatiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16723: yā susmṛtā suruciraṃ suṣṭhutaraṃ pravṛddhaṃ dāridryaduḥkhaduritaṃ śamate narāṇāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:16724: tāṃ kalpavṛkṣasadṛśīṃ vasudhārasaṃjñāṃ bhaktyā namāmi śirasā jagato hitāya // Rm_38.432{31/} //
K14ratnml_u:16725: praṇamāmi sadā vasudhāṃ jananīṃ karuṇārdrahṛdaṃ parivīkṣya janaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:16726: bahudheti bhayānvitaduḥkhataraṃ praṇamāmi sadā vasudhāṃ jananīṃ // Rm_38.433{2/} //
K14ratnml_u:16728: kṣaṃtavyo bhūyaśaś cāgaḥ śrīvasudhe namo 'stu te // Rm_38.434{3/} //
K14ratnml_u:16729: namas te bho mahādevi prasīda me kṛpāṃ kuru /
K14ratnml_u:16730: bhavaṃty atra yathādiṣṭaṃ kariṣyāmi tathā khalu // Rm_38.435{32} //
K14ratnml_u:16731: ity uktvā sa nṛpo bhūyas tatra natvā kṛtāṃjaliḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16732: taṃ senaṃ purataḥ kṛtvā tato 'carat pramoditaḥ // Rm_38.436{33} //
K14ratnml_u:16733: tataḥ sa nṛpatir gachan sahasā muditāśayaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16735: tatra prātaḥ sa bhūyas tam aśvaṃ dṛṣṭvā pramoditaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16736: rājā taṃ senam ānatvā dṛṣṭvā evam abhāṣata // Rm_38.438{35} //
K14ratnml_u:16737: sena tam aśvam āruhya gacha tvaṃ puram āśrame /
K14ratnml_u:16738: mama tavānugachāmi sahasā gachatu dhruvaṃ // Rm_38.439{36} //
K14ratnml_u:16739: iti rājñoditaṃ śrutvā sa senaḥ sāṃjalir naman /
K14ratnml_u:16740: nṛpatiṃ taṃ mahīpālaṃ samālokyaivam abravīt // Rm_38.440{37} //
K14ratnml_u:16741: naivam atra mahārāja yan me svāmi bhavān prabhuḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16742: tad bhavadvāhanaṃ hīnaṃ katham ārohayeya vai // Rm_38.441{38} //
K14ratnml_u:16744: rājā taṃ senam ānatvā punar evam abhāṣata // Rm_38.442{39} //
K14ratnml_u:16745: mā tvayaivaṃ pravaktavyaṃ yad adyārabhya bhavān guruḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16746: yathākāśasamādiṣṭaṃ tat tathā karttum arhasi // Rm_38.443{40} //
K14ratnml_u:16749: iti rājñoditaṃ śrutvā tatheti sa prabodhitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16750: svayam agre 'śvam āruhya pṛṣṭhe prārohayen nṛpaṃ // Rm_38.445{42} //
K14ratnml_u:16751: tataḥ sa 'śvas tadārūḍho vāyur iva samuccaran /
K14ratnml_u:16754: sarve te samupālokya pratyujjagmuḥ pramoditāḥ // Rm_38.447{44} //
K14ratnml_u:16755: tatrāśvapṛṣṭham ārūḍhaṃ nṛpaṃ senaṃ puraḥ sthitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:16756: dṛṣṭvā te maṃtriṇaḥ sarve paurāś ca vismayaṃ yayuḥ // Rm_38.448{45} //
K14ratnml_u:16757: tatas te maṃtriṇo 'mātyā paurāḥ sarve pramoditāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16758: praṇatvā taṃ nṛpaṃ rājakule 'nayan mahotsavaṃ // Rm_38.449{46} //
K14ratnml_u:16760: senaṃ puraḥ sthitaṃ paścād avārohayad ādarāt // Rm_38.450{47} //
K14ratnml_u:16761: tato rājakule gatvā nṛpaḥ pṛṣṭhataś caran /
K14ratnml_u:16762: pādaprakṣālanasthāne taṃ senam evam abravīt // Rm_38.451{48} //
K14ratnml_u:16765: tvattaḥ paścād ahaṃ pādau prakṣālayāmi sāṃprataṃ // Rm_38.452{49} //
K14ratnml_u:16766: iti rājñoditaṃ śrutvā sa senaḥ sāṃjalir naman /
K14ratnml_u:16767: nṛpatiṃ taṃ mahīpālaṃ samālokyaivam abravīt // Rm_38.453{50} //
K14ratnml_u:16768: vibhramo 'si kathaṃ rājan bhavān svāmi narādhipaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16769: tat prathamaṃ tvam evātra pādau prakṣālaya prabho // Rm_38.454{51} //
K14ratnml_u:16770: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā nṛpatiḥ sa kṛtāṃjaliḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16771: namaṃs taṃ senam ālokya tatraivaṃ saṃnyavedayat // Rm_38.455{52} //
K14ratnml_u:16772: bho sena yad bhavāṃ chāstā mama sanmārgadeśakaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16773: tad atra prathamaṃ pādau prakṣālayitum arhati // Rm_38.456{53} //
K14ratnml_u:16774: iti saṃprārthite rājñā sa senaḥ paribodhitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16775: rājña ājñā hy alaṃghyeti pādau prakṣālayet puraḥ // Rm_38.457{54} //
K14ratnml_u:16776: tataḥ sa nṛpatiḥ pādau prakṣālyānusaran mudā /
K14ratnml_u:16777: taṃ senaṃ purataḥ kṛtvā prāsāde samupācarat // Rm_38.458{55} //
K14ratnml_u:16778: tatrāsane purodhāya taṃ senaṃ gurum ādarāt /
K14ratnml_u:16779: nṛpatiḥ sa sabhāmadhye tasthau lokān vilokayan // Rm_38.459{56} //
K14ratnml_u:16780: tataḥ sa nṛpatir dṛṣṭvā sarvāl lokān sabhāśritān /
K14ratnml_u:16782: tan nṛpādeśitaṃ śrutvā sarve lokāḥ pramoditāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16783: śrīdevyās tad vrataṃ dharttuṃ samaichanta dhanārthinaḥ // Rm_38.461{58} //
K14ratnml_u:16784: tatas sarve 'pi te lokā natvā taṃ senam ādarāt /
K14ratnml_u:16785: nṛpatiṃ ca samālokya svasvālayaṃ yayur mudā // Rm_38.462{59} //
K14ratnml_u:16786: tataḥ sa nṛpatis tena senena guruṇā saha /
K14ratnml_u:16787: sānaṃdaṃ prerayām āsa dināni katicin mudā // Rm_38.463{60} //
K14ratnml_u:16789: sāmātyān maṃtriṇān sarvān samāmaṃtryaivam ādiśat // Rm_38.464{16} //
K14ratnml_u:16790: bho maṃtriṇo janāḥ sarve vratasamayam āgataṃ /
K14ratnml_u:16791: tasmāt sarve mayā sārddhaṃ vrataṃ caritum arhatha // Rm_38.465{62} //
K14ratnml_u:16792: tad enaṃ senam evātra pravrajyāsadguruṃ kuru /
K14ratnml_u:16793: iti maṃtribhir ākhyātaṃ śrutvā nṛpas tatheti saḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16794: taṃ senaṃ śāsane bauddhe prāvrājayad yathāvidhi // Rm_38.466{63} //
K14ratnml_u:16795: sātha pravrajito nāmnā śrīsenagupta ity abhūt /
K14ratnml_u:16798: vajrābhiṣekam āsādya vajrācāryo 'bhavat sa ca // Rm_38.468{65} //
K14ratnml_u:16799: tataḥ sa nṛpatī rājā tad vrataṃ karttum ādarāt /
K14ratnml_u:16800: śāstāraṃ taṃ samārādhya saṃprārthayed yathāvidhiṃ // Rm_38.469{66} //
K14ratnml_u:16802: śrīdevīṃ tāṃ samārādhya pūrvasevāṃ samādadhat // Rm_38.470{67} //
K14ratnml_u:16803: tato bhādrapade māse dvitīyāyāṃ site tare /
K14ratnml_u:16804: prātas tīrthe śubhe snātvā śuddhavastrāvṛtaḥ sudhīḥ // Rm_38.471{68} //
K14ratnml_u:16808: tad rātrau ca samārādhya śrīdevīṃ vidhinārcayet /
K14ratnml_u:16810: tataḥ prātaḥ sa ācāryyas tīrthe snātvā suvastrabhṛt /
K14ratnml_u:16813: śrīdevīṃ sagaṇāṃ samyag āvāhya vidhinārcayet // Rm_38.475{72} //
K14ratnml_u:16815: vratinaḥ sanṛpān sarvān paṃcagavyair vyaśodhayat // Rm_38.476{73} //
K14ratnml_u:16816: tatas te vratinaḥ sarve guruṃ natvā yathākramaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:16817: nṛpatipramukhā evaṃ vrataṃ caritum āśrayat // Rm_38.477{74} //
K14ratnml_u:16819: yathācārya samādiṣṭaṃ tathācaran vrataṃ mudā // Rm_38.478{75} //
K14ratnml_u:16820: tatra tāṃ śrīmahādevīṃ sagaṇāṃ vidhinā kramāt /
K14ratnml_u:16823: puṇyānumodanāṃ cāpi kṛtvā ca sthitiyācanāṃ // Rm_38.480{77} //
K14ratnml_u:16824: kṛtāṃjalipuṭāḥ sarve te ca kṛtvā pradakṣiṇāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:16825: aṣṭāṅgaiḥ praṇatiṃ kṛtvā saṃprārthayan susaṃpadaṃ // Rm_38.481{78} //
K14ratnml_u:16829: yathāvidhi pradatvā saṃprārthayac chrī samṛddhitāṃ // Rm_38.483{80} //
K14ratnml_u:16830: tataḥ śāstā sa ācāryaḥ prārthayitvā kṣamāṃ mudā /
K14ratnml_u:16831: sarvebhyo vratilokebhyaḥ pratyekaṃ sūtram ārppayet // Rm_38.484{81} //
K14ratnml_u:16832: tat sūtraṃ vratinaḥ sarve ādāya guruṇārppitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:16834: yā rājño mahiṣī bhāryā cūḍadevīti viśrutā /
K14ratnml_u:16835: saikā tat sūtram ādāya ca vandhan evam ādarāt // Rm_38.486{83} //
K14ratnml_u:16837: tad vratasūtram ālokya karavaddhaṃ vyaciṃtayat // Rm_38.487{84} //
K14ratnml_u:16839: maṇḍitā yā kare vaddham iti tyaktuṃ samaihata // Rm_38.488{85} //
K14ratnml_u:16840: tataḥ sā durmatī rājñī rakṣāsūtram api svayaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:16841: karavaddham api chitvā gavākṣāt sahasākṣipat // Rm_38.489{86} //
K14ratnml_u:16842: tasminn avasare tatra nimvadevyāḥ sakhī vanāt /
K14ratnml_u:16843: svāminyai bhojanaṃ rājñai yācituṃ samupācarat // Rm_38.490{87} //
K14ratnml_u:16844: tatra sā tad vratotsāhaśabdaṃ śrutvā sa kautukā /
K14ratnml_u:16845: tac chabdanihitasvāntā tasthāv ekānta āśritā // Rm_38.491{88} //
K14ratnml_u:16846: cūḍadevyā yad utkṣiptaṃ sūtraṃ vātāyanād bahiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16847: niścaran mūrddhani tasyāḥ sakhāḥ saṃnyapatad drutaṃ // Rm_38.492{89} //
K14ratnml_u:16848: sā tat sūtraṃ samādāya paśyantī kim idaṃ nv iti /
K14ratnml_u:16849: vratasūtram iti jñātvā praṇatvā muditāgrahīt // Rm_38.493{90} //
K14ratnml_u:16851: tataḥ sa preṣikā devyā bhogyam aprārthayaṃty api /
K14ratnml_u:16852: tat sūtram eva dhṛtvāśu nimvavanaṃ mudācaran // Rm_38.494{91} //
K14ratnml_u:16853: tatra sā sahasā gatvā bhartṛkāyāḥ purogatāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16854: tat sūtraṃ samupasthāpya praṇatvaivaṃ nyavedayat // Rm_38.495{92} //
K14ratnml_u:16855: jayo 'stu te mahādevi yad ahaṃ rājamaṃdire /
K14ratnml_u:16856: tataḥ śrīvasudhārāyā vrataṃ śṛṇomi cāritaṃ // Rm_38.496{93} //
K14ratnml_u:16857: cūḍadevyā svayaṃ chitvā vratasūtram idaṃ bahiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16858: kṣiptaṃ gavākṣaraṃdhrān me mūrddhni sajati niścarat // Rm_38.497{94} //
K14ratnml_u:16859: dṛṣṭvā tad aham ādāya vratasūtram idaṃ khalu /
K14ratnml_u:16860: iti matvātra te bhogyam ayācitvā vraje drutaṃ // Rm_38.498{95} //
K14ratnml_u:16861: tathāvām api he devi dhṛtvedaṃ vratasūtrakaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:16862: śrīvasudhāṃ mahādevīṃ smṛtvā vrataṃ carāvahe // Rm_38.499{96} //
K14ratnml_u:16863: sā śrīdevī vasuṃdhārā dṛṣṭvā nau bhaktisādhanaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:16864: svayam atra samāśritya saṃdadyād api saṃpadaṃ // Rm_38.500{97} //
K14ratnml_u:16865: yadi nau daivayogena saṃpattir nātra vidyate /
K14ratnml_u:16866: puṇyaṃ tu khalu vidyeta tataḥ syāj janma sāphalaṃ // Rm_38.501{98} //
K14ratnml_u:16867: iti matvātra bho devi snātvā śuddhāmvarāvṛtau /
K14ratnml_u:16868: śrīdevīṃ manasā dhyātvā smṛtvā vrataṃ carāvahe // Rm_38.502{99} //
K14ratnml_u:16869: iti sakhyā samākhyātaṃ nimvadevī niśamya sā /
K14ratnml_u:16870: tathety abhyanumoditvā tathā caritum aichata // Rm_38.503{100} //
K14ratnml_u:16871: tatas tatheha evaṃ te snātvā śuddhāmvarāvṛte /
K14ratnml_u:16874: dhyātvā smṛtvā samādhāya saṃcarate vrataṃ mudā // Rm_38.505{2} //
K14ratnml_u:16875: tasminn avasare tatra sā śrīdevī vasuṃdharā /
K14ratnml_u:16878: upasṛtya sakhīm ekāṃ samāmaṃtryaivam abravīt // Rm_38.507{4} //
K14ratnml_u:16879: bhadrike tvam ihāgacha cūḍadevyāḥ puro gatā /
K14ratnml_u:16880: tava mātāmahī dvare tiṣṭhatīti nivedaya // Rm_38.508{5} //
K14ratnml_u:16881: iti tayā samādiṣṭaṃ śrutvā ceṭī tatheti sā /
K14ratnml_u:16883: devī mātāmahī vṛddhā jyāyasī te ihāgatā /
K14ratnml_u:16884: bhavaṃtyo darśanaṃ kartum ichantī dvāri tiṣṭhati // Rm_38.510{7} //
K14ratnml_u:16885: tad bhavaṃtī samāgacha tasyā darśanam ādarāt /
K14ratnml_u:16886: datvā saṃbhāṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā vinodayitum arhati // Rm_38.511{8} //
K14ratnml_u:16887: iti tayā samākhyātaṃ cūḍadevī niśamya sā /
K14ratnml_u:16888: na me mātāmahī kā sā dhyātvety evaṃ ca prāvadat // Rm_38.512{9} //
K14ratnml_u:16889: mama mātāmahī nāsti kāsāv iha samāgatā /
K14ratnml_u:16890: iti proktvā tvayā dvārāt sahasā preṣyatāṃ balāt // Rm_38.513{10} //
K14ratnml_u:16891: iti devyoditaṃ śrutvā tatheti sā sakhī gatā /
K14ratnml_u:16892: vṛddhāṃtikam upāśritya dṛṣṭvā tām evam abravīt // Rm_38.514{11} //
K14ratnml_u:16893: mātāmahī na me kā cid iti devī vadaty api /
K14ratnml_u:16894: ataḥ sā te mukhaṃ draṣṭuṃ naiveha samupāvrajet // Rm_38.515{12} //
K14ratnml_u:16896: atas tvam iha mā tiṣṭha gachātaḥ sahasā vahiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16897: na vrajer yadi sā devī praiṣayet tvāṃ balād api // Rm_38.516{13} //
K14ratnml_u:16898: iti tayoditaṃ śrutvā sā vṛddhā tata utthitā /
K14ratnml_u:16899: na tiṣṭheyam iti proktvā tataḥ śanair yayau vahiḥ // Rm_38.517{14} //
K14ratnml_u:16900: tataḥ sā śrīmahādevī vṛddhī rūpadharā tathā /
K14ratnml_u:16901: nimvavane sthitāṃ rājñīṃ samuddharttum upācarat // Rm_38.518{15} //
K14ratnml_u:16902: tatra sā jyāyasī vṛddhā śanair dvāram upāśritā /
K14ratnml_u:16903: dṛṣṭvā ceṭīṃ samāhūya mṛdugiraivam abravīt // Rm_38.519{16} //
K14ratnml_u:16904: dārike tvam ihāgacha kiṃ cin me vacanaṃ śṛṇu /
K14ratnml_u:16905: rājñā vicāraṇārthe 'haṃ śanair iha samāvraje // Rm_38.520{17} //
K14ratnml_u:16906: etan me vacanam śrutvā nimvadevyā purogatā /
K14ratnml_u:16907: vṛddhekā te mukhaṃ draṣṭum āgateti nivedaya // Rm_38.521{18} //
K14ratnml_u:16908: iti tayoditaṃ śrutvā sā ceṭī sādaraṃ mudā /
K14ratnml_u:16909: paśyaṃti sāṃjalir natvā tāṃ vṛddhām evam abravīt // Rm_38.522{19} //
K14ratnml_u:16911: tathā devyā niveditvā sahasātrāvrajāmy ahaṃ // Rm_38.523{20} //
K14ratnml_u:16912: ity uktvā sā sakhī tasyā nimvadevyāḥ puro gatā /
K14ratnml_u:16915: tad bhavaṃtī samāmaṃtrya saṃmānayitum arhati // Rm_38.525{22} //
K14ratnml_u:16917: sahasā samupāgatya tāṃ vṛddhām evam abravīt // Rm_38.526{23} //
K14ratnml_u:16919: śanai dhairyaṃ samālamvya samādhāya samāsara // Rm_38.527{24} //
K14ratnml_u:16920: ity uktvā sā subhadrāṃśā nimvadevī samādarāt /
K14ratnml_u:16921: tāṃ vṛddhāṃ samupāmaṃtrya svāsane samupāśrayat // Rm_38.528{25} //
K14ratnml_u:16922: tatra sā jyāyasī vṛddhā svāsane samupāśṛtā /
K14ratnml_u:16923: tāṃ rājñīṃ sudṛśālokya suprasannaivam abravīt // Rm_38.529{26} //
K14ratnml_u:16924: kiṃ ve 'tra carase vatse tan me vaktuṃ tvam arhasi /
K14ratnml_u:16925: kasminn arthe 'bhilāṣaṃ te tavāpi me puro vada // Rm_38.530{27} //
K14ratnml_u:16926: iti tayā samākhyātaṃ nimvadevī niśamya sā /
K14ratnml_u:16927: tāṃ vṛddhāṃ suprasannāsyā samālokyaivam abravīt // Rm_38.531{28} //
K14ratnml_u:16929: daridritā na me saṃpad vidyate 'tra gṛhe kvacit // Rm_38.532{29} //
K14ratnml_u:16930: vratopahārasāmagrim api kiṃ cin na vidyate /
K14ratnml_u:16931: tad idaṃ kadarīpatrakṛtam arghādi bhājanaṃ // Rm_38.533{30} //
K14ratnml_u:16933: dhyātvā smṛtvā samārādhya saṃcaritam idaṃ vrataṃ // Rm_38.534{31} //
K14ratnml_u:16935: tad vidhinā vrataiḥ karttuṃ śakyate na mayā tathā // Rm_38.535{32} //
K14ratnml_u:16937: mahādevīṃ samārādhya vratam evaṃ carāvahe // Rm_38.536{33} //
K14ratnml_u:16938: etat tayā samākhyātaṃ śrutvā sā jyāyasī mudā /
K14ratnml_u:16939: taṃ rājñīṃ sasakhīṃ bhadrāṃ samālokyaivam adiśat // Rm_38.537{34} //
K14ratnml_u:16941: siddhyatu te vrataṃ pūrṇaṃ carasvevaṃ samāhitā /
K14ratnml_u:16942: śraddhayā bhaktibhāvena smṛtvā devīṃ sadā bhaja // Rm_38.538{35} //
K14ratnml_u:16944: parituṣṭā gṛhe te 'tra sadāpi sagaṇāśnayet // Rm_38.539{36} //
K14ratnml_u:16945: tatas tasyā mahādevyāḥ prabhāvena sadā tava /
K14ratnml_u:16946: sarvatrāpi bhaven nūnaṃ maṃgalaṃ nirupadravaṃ // Rm_38.540{37} //
K14ratnml_u:16948: tatas tvaṃ svechayā dānaṃ datvārthibhyaḥ śubhe cara // Rm_38.541{38} //
K14ratnml_u:16953: triratnaśaraṇaṃ kṛtvā śrīdevīṃ bhaja sarvadā // Rm_38.543{40} //
K14ratnml_u:16954: ity uktvā sā mahādevī tyaktvā vṛddhākṛtiṃ tathā /
K14ratnml_u:16955: dhṛtvā rūpaṃ vasuṃdharyyā tasthau sarvagaṇair vṛtā // Rm_38.544{41} //
K14ratnml_u:16957: ālokya nimvadevī sā tasthau kṣaṇaṃ suvismitā // Rm_38.545{42} //
K14ratnml_u:16958: tataḥ svapnavibuddheva sākṣāt tāṃ śrīvasuṃ dharāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:16959: dṛṣṭvā sā sahasotthāya sāṃjali nyapatat puraḥ // Rm_38.546{43} //
K14ratnml_u:16960: tataḥ sā śrīmahādevī tāṃ rajñīṃ purato natāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:16961: dhṛtvā hastena he vatsa uttiṣṭhety evam abravīt // Rm_38.547{44} //
K14ratnml_u:16962: vatse dāridryaduḥkhaṃ te naśyate sāṃprataṃ khalu /
K14ratnml_u:16963: sarvadātra gṛhe saṃpat parivṛddhā bhaved api // Rm_38.548{45} //
K14ratnml_u:16964: ity ādiṣṭaṃ tayā devyā nimvadevī niśamya sā /
K14ratnml_u:16965: utthāya sāṃjali devīṃ prādrākṣīt tāṃ vasuṃdharāṃ // Rm_38.549{46} //
K14ratnml_u:16967: paśyantī kim idaṃ svapnam ity uktvā samalokayat // Rm_38.550{47} //
K14ratnml_u:16968: tataḥ sā śrivasuṃdhārā mahādevī gaṇaiḥ saha /
K14ratnml_u:16969: bhadre 'nubhūyatāṃ saukhyam ity uktvānudadhau tataḥ // Rm_38.551{48} //
K14ratnml_u:16970: tatra sā nimvadevī tāṃ śrīdevīṃ sagaṇāṃ tathā /
K14ratnml_u:16971: aṃtardhānagatāṃ dṛṣṭvā kṣaṇaṃ tasthau vimūrchitā // Rm_38.552{49} //
K14ratnml_u:16972: tataś caitanyam āṣādya sā rājñī paribodhitā /
K14ratnml_u:16973: tāṃ devīṃ sagaṇāṃ dhātvā smṛtvā tasthau samāhitaṃ // Rm_38.553{50} //
K14ratnml_u:16980: tad īdṛg bhavanaṃ dṛṣṭvā tathodyānaṃ manoramaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:16981: naṃditā nimvadevī sā tasthau divyasukhānvitā // Rm_38.557{54} //
K14ratnml_u:16982: tadā sa nṛpatiś cūḍadevyā vrataṃ na dhāritaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:16985: tataḥ so nṛpatī rājā maṃtribhiḥ paribodhitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16986: mahiṣīṃ tāṃ priyāṃ bhāryāṃ sametyevam abhāṣata // Rm_38.559{56} //
K14ratnml_u:16987: are re hetunā kena tvayā na dhāritaṃ vrataṃ /
K14ratnml_u:16988: vratasūtraṃ kathaṃ chitvā visṛṣṭaṃ tad vadasva me // Rm_38.560{57} //
K14ratnml_u:16990: svāminaṃs api taṃ bhūpam anādṛtyyaivam abravīt // Rm_38.561{58} //
K14ratnml_u:16992: kiṃ tena vratasūtreṇa vratenāpi prayojanaṃ // Rm_38.562{59} //
K14ratnml_u:16993: iti tayoditaṃ śrutvā nṛpatiḥ sa prakopitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:16994: prayatnād api tāṃ bhāryāṃ bodhayituṃ śaśāka na // Rm_38.563{60} //
K14ratnml_u:16996: sakhīm ekāṃ samāhūya pura evam abhāṣata // Rm_38.564{61} //
K14ratnml_u:16997: sakhī tvaṃ me vacaḥ śrutvā gacha nimvavane 'dhunā /
K14ratnml_u:16998: nimvadevyāḥ puro gatvā vadasvaivaṃ samādarāt // Rm_38.565{62} //
K14ratnml_u:16999: svāmī sa nṛpatī rājā vrataṃ caritum ichati /
K14ratnml_u:17000: vasulakṣmyās tvayā sārddhaṃ tad āśu gamyatām iti // Rm_38.566{63} //
K14ratnml_u:17001: sā tatheti pratiśrutya drutaṃ nimvavane gatā /
K14ratnml_u:17002: dṛṣṭvodyānaṃ manoramyaṃ kṣaṇaṃ tasthau savismayā // Rm_38.567{64} //
K14ratnml_u:17004: tatra tad bhavanaṃ ramyaṃ dṛṣṭvā tasthau sakautukā // Rm_38.568{65} //
K14ratnml_u:17005: tataḥ sā suciraṃ dṛṣṭvā muditā vismayānvitā /
K14ratnml_u:17006: nimvadevyāḥ puro gatvā pādau natvaivam abravīt // Rm_38.569{66} //
K14ratnml_u:17008: tad bhavaṃtī prabhor ājñāṃ śrotum arhati sāṃprataṃ // Rm_38.570{67} //
K14ratnml_u:17009: sa svāmī śrīvasuṃdharyyā vrataṃ carati sapriyaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:17010: cūḍadevyā vrataṃ samyakparitaṃ na pramādataḥ // Rm_38.571{68} //
K14ratnml_u:17011: tattvayā saha sa svāmī vrataṃ caritum ichati /
K14ratnml_u:17012: tat tvadāhūtaye rājñā preṣitāhaṃ tathātra hi // Rm_38.572{69} //
K14ratnml_u:17013: tad bhavaṃtī prabhor ājñāṃ śiro dhṛtvā samādarāt /
K14ratnml_u:17014: tad vrataṃ carituṃ bharttrā sahāśv āgaṃtum arhati // Rm_38.573{70} //
K14ratnml_u:17015: iti tayā samākhyātaṃ nimvadevī niśamya sā /
K14ratnml_u:17016: tāṃ ceṭīṃ svāmino dūtīṃ samālokyaivam abravīt // Rm_38.574{71} //
K14ratnml_u:17018: paśya me saṃpado jātāḥ śrīdevīsaṃprasādataḥ // Rm_38.575{72} //
K14ratnml_u:17019: tad ahaṃ sāṃprataṃ tatra nechāmi carituṃ vrataṃ /
K14ratnml_u:17021: tad ahaṃ nāgamiṣyāmi tacchaitat kathitaṃ mayā /
K14ratnml_u:17022: nṛpateḥ purato gatvā vaktavyaṃ nānyathā tvayā // Rm_38.577{74} //
K14ratnml_u:17023: iti tayā samākhyātaṃ śrutvā ceṭī tatheti sā /
K14ratnml_u:17024: tāṃ rājñīṃ sāṃjalī natvā pratyāyayau nṛpālayaṃ // Rm_38.578{75} //
K14ratnml_u:17025: tatra sā nṛpateḥ pādau praṇamya sāṃjaliḥ puraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:17027: tat tayā kathitaṃ śrutvā sa rājā vismayāhataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:17029: bhūyas tāṃ ceṭikāṃ dūtīṃ samāmaṃtryaivam ādiśat // Rm_38.580{77} //
K14ratnml_u:17030: bhūyo 'pi tatra gacha tvaṃ bodhayitvā prayatnataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:17032: ity ādiṣṭaṃ narendreṇa śrutvā sā ceṭikāpi ca /
K14ratnml_u:17033: nṛpatiṃ taṃ mahārājaṃ praṇatvaivaṃ nyavedayat // Rm_38.582{79} //
K14ratnml_u:17035: yat sā tatra mahāsaukhyaṃ bhuktvā tiṣṭhati sāṃprataṃ // Rm_38.583{80} //
K14ratnml_u:17036: yat tasyā bhavanaṃ ramyaṃ prāsādaṃ bhavate 'dhunā /
K14ratnml_u:17041: yadi tad ichasi draṣṭuṃ tatra gatvābhilokaya // Rm_38.586{83} //
K14ratnml_u:17042: evaṃ tayoditaṃ śrutvā sa rājā tṛṣitānvitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:17043: tathā tad bhavanaṃ draṣṭuṃ sahasā gaṃtum aichata // Rm_38.587{84} //
K14ratnml_u:17044: tataḥ sa nṛpatī rājā sakhimaṃtrijanaiḥ saha /
K14ratnml_u:17045: yānārūḍho vrajans tatra nimvavane upāsarat // Rm_38.588{85} //
K14ratnml_u:17047: puṣkariṇīś ca dūrāt sa rājādrākṣīn manoharāḥ // Rm_38.589{86} //
K14ratnml_u:17049: dṛṣṭvā sa mudito rājā sa śīghraṃ dvārāntike yayau // Rm_38.590{87} //
K14ratnml_u:17050: tan nṛpaṃ samupāyātaṃ dṛṣṭvā devyāḥ sakhī drutaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:17052: devī prasīda yad bharttā svāmīha svayam āgataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:17053: tad bhavaṃtī prasannāsyā darśanaṃ dātum arhati // Rm_38.592{89} //
K14ratnml_u:17056: tatra sa bhūpatī rājā praviśya maṃdire caran /
K14ratnml_u:17057: tāṃ devīṃ samupāmaṃtrya prayayau sahite janaiḥ // Rm_38.594{91} //
K14ratnml_u:17058: tatra taṃ prabhum āyātaṃ nimvadevī samīkṣya sā /
K14ratnml_u:17059: sahasotthāya paśyaṃtī nanāma caraṇe prabhoḥ // Rm_38.595{92} //
K14ratnml_u:17060: tatra sa prabhur ālokya tāṃ bhāryāṃ śrīsamāṃśikāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:17061: sarvatra kuśalaṃ praśnaṃ kṛtvāsane samāśrayat // Rm_38.596{93} //
K14ratnml_u:17062: tatra tāṃ śrīsamākāraṃ nimvadevīṃ nirīkṣya saḥ /
K14ratnml_u:17063: rājā prabhuḥ svayaṃ dhṛtvā sahāsane nyaveśayat // Rm_38.597{94} //
K14ratnml_u:17064: tatas tau daṃpatī tatra sahāsane samāśritau /
K14ratnml_u:17067: tāṃ bhāryāṃ śrīsamānāṃśaṃ dṛṣṭvaivaṃ paryapṛchata // Rm_38.599{96} //
K14ratnml_u:17068: kathaṃ te bhavanaṃ ramyaṃ prāsādaṃ bhavane 'dhunā /
K14ratnml_u:17069: udyānaṃ ca manoramyaṃ jāyate tad vadasva me // Rm_38.600{97} //
K14ratnml_u:17071: taṃ prabhuṃ sāṃjalir natvā samālokyaivam abravīt // Rm_38.601{98} //
K14ratnml_u:17073: śṛṇu svāmin mahārāja yadi śrotuṃ tvam ichasi /
K14ratnml_u:17074: tathāhaṃ kathayiṣyāmi yan me saṃpat prajāyate // Rm_38.602{99} //
K14ratnml_u:17075: pratyahaṃ yat tvayā dattaṃ tad bhogyaṃ yācituṃ sakhī /
K14ratnml_u:17076: amuṣmin divase tatra mayeyaṃ preṣitācarat // Rm_38.603{100} //
K14ratnml_u:17078: tadā vātāyanāt kṣiptaṃ vratasūtram adho 'patat // Rm_38.604{1} //
K14ratnml_u:17079: tad dṛṣṭvaivaṃ sakhī gṛhya kim idam iti vīkṣya sā /
K14ratnml_u:17081: tad dṛṣṭvāyaṃ mayā pṛṣṭā tyaktvāhāram idaṃ kutaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:17082: sūtram ādāya praiṣi tvaṃ tat katham ucyatām iti // Rm_38.606{3} //
K14ratnml_u:17084: svāmini yadi te śrotuṃ vāṃchāsti śrūyatām iti // Rm_38.607{4} //
K14ratnml_u:17085: pratyahaṃ svāmināhāraṃ dattaṃ tad yācituṃ tadā /
K14ratnml_u:17086: tatra rājakule devyā vratotsāhaṃ śṛṇomy ahaṃ // Rm_38.608{5} //
K14ratnml_u:17088: tadā vātāyanāt kṣiptaṃ sūtraṃ patati me mama // Rm_38.609{6} //
K14ratnml_u:17091: tyaktvāhāram idaṃ sūtram ādāya sahasā vraje // Rm_38.610{7} //
K14ratnml_u:17092: ity uktveyaṃ sakhī me 'gre upasthāyāpy adarśayat /
K14ratnml_u:17093: vratasūtraṃ tad ālokya natvāgṛhnān mudādarāt // Rm_38.611{8} //
K14ratnml_u:17094: tataś ceyaṃ sakhi dṛṣṭvā premnā hitārthavāṃchinī /
K14ratnml_u:17095: mātevānunayaṃ kṛtvā mamāgre evam abravīt // Rm_38.612{9} //
K14ratnml_u:17097: śrīdevīṃ manasā dhyātvā smṛtvārādhya vrataṃ cara // Rm_38.613{10} //
K14ratnml_u:17098: ity asyā vacanaṃ śrutvā tathāhaṃ bhaktimātrataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:17099: śrīdevīṃ manasā dhyātvā smṛtvārādhyācaraṃ vrataṃ // Rm_38.614{11} //
K14ratnml_u:17101: ity ākhyāya śanair atra mamāgre samupāgatā // Rm_38.615{12} //
K14ratnml_u:17103: tataś ca māṃ samālokya kuśalaṃ samapṛchata // Rm_38.616{13} //
K14ratnml_u:17105: kiṃ vrataṃ sadhyate vatsa iti māṃ paryapṛchata // Rm_38.617{14} //
K14ratnml_u:17106: tatas tāṃ sāṃjalir natvā nyavedayan samādarāt /
K14ratnml_u:17107: mātāmahi nu me kiṃ cid api dravyaṃ na vidyate // Rm_38.618{15} //
K14ratnml_u:17109: śrīdevīṃ manasā dhyātvā smṛtvārādhya vrataṃ care // Rm_38.619{16} //
K14ratnml_u:17110: iti mayoditaṃ śrutvā sā vṛddhā parimoditā /
K14ratnml_u:17113: sāṃjalis tanpadābje 'haṃ natvā tiṣṭham adhomukhaḥ // Rm_38.621{18} //
K14ratnml_u:17114: tadā sā tajjyāyasī rūpaṃ tyaktvātra ca kṣaṇād api /
K14ratnml_u:17120: sagaṇā me varaṃ datvā vyavadhānam ito 'vrajat // Rm_38.624{21} //
K14ratnml_u:17122: idaṃ me bhavanaṃ ramyaṃ prāsādaṃ bhavate kṣaṇāt // Rm_38.625{22} //
K14ratnml_u:17130: phalapuṣpādi bhogyāni saṃjāyaṃte kṣaṇād iha // Rm_38.629{26} //
K14ratnml_u:17131: īdṛśī mahatī saṃpat samudbhūtā mama kṣaṇāt /
K14ratnml_u:17132: tat sarvaṃ śrīmahādevyāḥ prasādād api nānyathā // Rm_38.630{27} //
K14ratnml_u:17133: iti vijñāya rājendra tasyā devyāḥ sadā mudā /
K14ratnml_u:17134: śraddhayā śaraṇaṃ gatvā vrataṃ caritum arhati // Rm_38.631{28} //
K14ratnml_u:17136: yāvadbhavaṃ vrajer naiva durgatīṃ ca kadā cana // Rm_38.632{29} //
K14ratnml_u:17137: sadgatau satsukhāny eva labdho sadā śubhe caran /
K14ratnml_u:17138: triratnabhajanaṃ kṛtvā bodhicaryāṃ caret kramāt // Rm_38.633{30} //
K14ratnml_u:17140: svayaṃ caraṃ parāṃ cāpi bodhimārge niyojayet // Rm_38.634{31} //
K14ratnml_u:17142: arhan saṃbodhim āsādya saṃbuddhapadam āpnuyāt // Rm_38.635{32} //
K14ratnml_u:17143: iti tayā mahādevyāḥ samupādiṣṭam atra me /
K14ratnml_u:17144: tac chrutvā sarvadā svāmi mano 'tirocate vrataṃ // Rm_38.636{33} //
K14ratnml_u:17145: tad ahaṃ sarvadā tasyāḥ śrīdevyāḥ śaraṇaṃ gatā /
K14ratnml_u:17146: śraddhayā bhaktibhāvena cariṣyāmi vrataṃ prabho // Rm_38.637{34} //
K14ratnml_u:17147: tathā bhavān api svamiñ chrīdevyāḥ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:17150: tathā sadā mahādevyā vrataṃ caritum aichata // Rm_38.639{36} //
K14ratnml_u:17151: tatraivaṃ sa mahīpālo nimvadevyā tayā saha /
K14ratnml_u:17152: yathākāmaṃ sukhaṃ bhuktvā tasthau krīḍan yathechayā // Rm_38.640{37} //
K14ratnml_u:17153: evaṃ krīḍan sa rājendro nimvadevyā sahārataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:17155: tatraivaṃ taṃ mahīpālaṃ nimvadevyā saha sthitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:17157: tataḥ sā cūḍadevī taṃ svāminaṃ tatra saṃsthitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:17158: svayaṃ gatvā samākramya saṃmānayitum aichata // Rm_38.643{40} //
K14ratnml_u:17159: tataḥ sā krodhitā caṇḍī cūḍadevī pradhāvitā /
K14ratnml_u:17160: vrajaṃtī sahasā tatra nimvavana upāsarat // Rm_38.644{41} //
K14ratnml_u:17166: tatra tāṃ sahasāyātāṃ lokān dṛṣṭvā bhayotthitāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:17167: kolamukhī praviṣṭeti śabdaṃ kṛtvā vicerire // Rm_38.647{44} //
K14ratnml_u:17168: tad virāvaṃ janāḥ sarve śrutvā tatra samutthitāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:17174: tathā sā dūrato gatvā prādrākṣīt sarasī dvayaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:17175: dṛṣṭvā sā tatra tṛṣṇārttā jalaṃ pātum upācarat // Rm_38.651{48} //
K14ratnml_u:17176: tadā te sarasī yuddhaṃ parasparaṃ pracakratuḥ /
K14ratnml_u:17177: dṛṣṭvā sā vismitā 'pītvā jalaṃ tasthau savismayā // Rm_38.652{49} //
K14ratnml_u:17178: tatra te sarasī dṛṣṭvā tāṃ kolavadanāṃ striyaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:17179: kutra gaṃtum ihaiṣi tvam ity evaṃ paryapṛchatāṃ // Rm_38.653{50} //
K14ratnml_u:17180: tat pṛṣṭaṃ sā samākarṇya sā śaṃkavismayāhatā /
K14ratnml_u:17181: kim etad iti saṃciṃtya kṣaṇaṃ tasthau vimohitā // Rm_38.654{51} //
K14ratnml_u:17183: kiṃ mayātrāpi vaktavyam iti dhyātvā vyaciṃtayat // Rm_38.655{52} //
K14ratnml_u:17184: hā katham iha prāptāhaṃ bhramāmi nirjane vane /
K14ratnml_u:17185: kiṃ mayā prakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ yena bhraṣṭā carāmy ahaṃ // Rm_38.656{53} //
K14ratnml_u:17186: hā kiṃ kuryāṃ kva gacheyaṃ sahāyaikāpi me 'sti na /
K14ratnml_u:17187: sarvathātra vinaṣṭāsmi ko māṃ rakṣed ihā 'dhunā // Rm_38.657{54} //
K14ratnml_u:17188: iti ciṃtāviṣaṇṇā sā tasthau tatra nirāśitā /
K14ratnml_u:17189: tataḥ sā daivayogena sasmāra śrīvasuṃdharāṃ // Rm_38.658{55} //
K14ratnml_u:17191: yat svayaṃ prakṛtaṃ karma tat sarvaṃ paryyabudhyatāṃ // Rm_38.659{56} //
K14ratnml_u:17192: hā mayā durdhiyā tatra samyan na dhāritaṃ vrataṃ /
K14ratnml_u:17193: etatpāpena nūnaṃ me jāte 'yam īdṛśī vipat // Rm_38.660{57} //
K14ratnml_u:17194: tad atra kiṃ kariṣyāmi kolamukhī yato 'smy ahaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:17195: tat tatra kathaṃ evaṃ hi pratiyāyaṃ nṛpālayaṃ // Rm_38.661{58} //
K14ratnml_u:17197: tad daivapreṣitā hy atra bhramāmi nirjane vane // Rm_38.662{59} //
K14ratnml_u:17198: tad atra kiṃ careyāhaṃ jīvite 'pi na me ruciḥ /
K14ratnml_u:17199: sarveṣām api jaṃtūnāṃ sarvatra maraṇaṃ dhruvaṃ // Rm_38.663{60} //
K14ratnml_u:17201: śrīdevyā darśanaṃ karttuṃ smṛtvā gacheya sāṃprataṃ // Rm_38.664{61} //
K14ratnml_u:17202: iti niścitya sā rājñī cūḍadevī samudyatā /
K14ratnml_u:17203: śrīdevyā darśanaṃ kartuṃ smṛtvā caritum aichata // Rm_38.665{62} //
K14ratnml_u:17204: tataḥ sā cūḍadevī te sarasī dve samīkṣya ca /
K14ratnml_u:17206: upetya taj jalaṃ pītvā tīre sthitvaivam abravīt // Rm_38.666{63} //
K14ratnml_u:17207: sarasī yad ahaṃ mūḍhā durmatī maṃdabhāginī /
K14ratnml_u:17208: tac chrīvasuṃdharāṃ devīṃ draṣṭum ihāvrajāmi hi // Rm_38.667{64} //
K14ratnml_u:17209: iti tayoditaṃ śrutvā puṣkariṇyāv ubhe 'pi te /
K14ratnml_u:17210: tāṃ rājñīṃ samupāmaṃtrya nṛgiraivam abhāṣatāṃ // Rm_38.668{65} //
K14ratnml_u:17211: sādhu sādhu mahābhāge vrajāstu maṃgalaṃ tava /
K14ratnml_u:17212: puna nau vacasā devīm evaṃ pṛcha tvam ādarāt // Rm_38.669{7} //
K14ratnml_u:17213: kenāvāṃ hetunā yuddhaṃ kṛtvā tiṣṭhāvahe sadā // Rm_38.670{8} //
K14ratnml_u:17214: ity etat kathitaṃ tābhyāṃ śrutvā rājñī tatheti sā /
K14ratnml_u:17216: tatrāraṇye bhramaṃtī sā kiṃ cid dūraṃ gatā tataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:17217: mahāṃtaṃ śūkaraṃ ghoraṃ dadarśa bhīṣaṇākṛtiṃ // Rm_38.672{10} //
K14ratnml_u:17218: tatra sā dūrataḥ sthitvā paśyaṃs taṃ bhīmaśūkaraṃ /
K14ratnml_u:17219: mātrā tiṣṭha vrajānyatra sahaseti tam abravīt // Rm_38.673{11} //
K14ratnml_u:17220: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā sa śūkaraḥ samutthitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:17221: sahasopetya tāṃ rājñīṃ samālokyaivam abravīt // Rm_38.674{12} //
K14ratnml_u:17222: kā tvaṃ kuta ihāyāsi kutra gaṃtuṃ pradhāvasi /
K14ratnml_u:17223: ekākinī kathaṃ bhrāṃto vana etad vadasva me // Rm_38.675{13} //
K14ratnml_u:17224: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā sā devī praticitritā /
K14ratnml_u:17225: śanair upetya taṃ pretaṃ saṃpaśyann evam abravīt // Rm_38.676{14} //
K14ratnml_u:17227: śrīdevyā darśanaṃ kartuṃ vāṃchaṃtīha samāvraje // Rm_38.677{15} //
K14ratnml_u:17228: iti tad gaditaṃ śrutvā śūkaraḥ so 'tivismitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:17229: tāṃ devīṃ samupāśritya paśyann evam abhāṣata // Rm_38.678{16} //
K14ratnml_u:17230: sādhu sādhvi mahābhāge vrajāstu te sumaṃgalaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:17232: bhūyo me vacasā sādhvī tāṃ devīṃ paripṛchatāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:17233: kenāhaṃ śūkarībhūtas tiṣṭhāmīti bhavaṃty api // Rm_38.680{18} //
K14ratnml_u:17234: etat tat kathitaṃ śrutvā cūḍadevī tatheti sā /
K14ratnml_u:17238: tatra sa preta ālokya tāṃ devīṃ samupāgatāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:17239: sahasopetya saṃpaśyan purastha evam abravīt // Rm_38.683{21} //
K14ratnml_u:17240: ko tvaṃ kuta ihāyāsi kutra gaṃtum ihāgatā /
K14ratnml_u:17241: niḥsahāyā kathaṃ bhrāṃtā carate tad vadasva me // Rm_38.684{22} //
K14ratnml_u:17242: iti tat kathitaṃ śrutvā sā devī vismayānvitā /
K14ratnml_u:17243: śanair upetya taṃ pretaṃ paśyaṃty evam avocata // Rm_38.685{23} //
K14ratnml_u:17245: śrīdevyā darśane gaṃtuṃ pathānenāvrajāmi hi // Rm_38.686{24} //
K14ratnml_u:17246: iti tad uditaṃ śrutvā sa preto 'tivicitritaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:17247: tāṃ devīṃ sāṃjalir natvā pura evam avocata // Rm_38.687{25} //
K14ratnml_u:17248: sādhu sādhvi mahābhāge carāstu te subhadrakaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:17250: bhūyo 'pi vacasā me tāṃ śrīdevīṃ paripṛchatu /
K14ratnml_u:17253: etat tat kathitaṃ śrutvā cūḍadevī tatheti sā /
K14ratnml_u:17256: kā tvaṃ kuta ihāyāsi kutra gaṃtuṃ ca tad vada // Rm_38.691{29} //
K14ratnml_u:17257: iti tair gaditaṃ śrutvā sā devī samupāsthitā /
K14ratnml_u:17258: tān sarvān pāpino dṛṣṭvā pura evam abhāṣata // Rm_38.692{30} //
K14ratnml_u:17260: śrīdevyā darśane gaṃtuṃ pathānenāvrajāmy ahaṃ // Rm_38.693{31} //
K14ratnml_u:17261: iti tad gaditaṃ śrutvā sarve te daśapāpinaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:17262: kṛtāṃjalipuṭā natvā tāṃ devīm evam abruvan // Rm_38.694{32} //
K14ratnml_u:17263: sādhu devī mahābhāge pravrajāstu jayaṃ tava /
K14ratnml_u:17264: asmākaṃ prakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ tāṃ devīṃ paripṛchatu // Rm_38.695{33} //
K14ratnml_u:17265: iti tad deśitaṃ śrutvā cūḍadevī tatheti sā /
K14ratnml_u:17266: tato 'nyatra vrajaṃty evaṃ dadarśa kṛṣṇapaṃnagaṃ // Rm_38.696{34} //
K14ratnml_u:17267: tatra sa kṛṣṇasarpas tām ālokya samupāgatāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:17269: tataḥ sā mūrchitā devī cirāt svayaṃ samutthitā /
K14ratnml_u:17270: tāṃ śrīvasuṃdharāṃ smṛtvā tatra tasthau kṣaṇaṃ tathā // Rm_38.698{36} //
K14ratnml_u:17272: kālasarpaḥ sa tām āha kā tvaṃ kutaḥ samāgatā // Rm_38.699{37} //
K14ratnml_u:17274: śrīdevīdarśanārthaṃ tu āgatā mānyatha phaṇi // Rm_38.700{38} //
K14ratnml_u:17276: bījapūrakam ālokya tad ādātum upācarat // Rm_38.701{39} //
K14ratnml_u:17277: tatra tat phalam ālokya hastābhyāṃ sahasāgrahīt /
K14ratnml_u:17278: tasya hi daivayogena tatphalaṃ na vyamuṃcyata // Rm_38.702{40} //
K14ratnml_u:17279: tatra sā tatphale lagnahastā tasthau tathā kṣaṇaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:17280: tataḥ sā trasitā dṛṣṭvā na gṛhnāmīti cāvadat // Rm_38.703{41} //
K14ratnml_u:17281: etad ukte bhujau tasyās tat phalaṃ sahasātyajat /
K14ratnml_u:17282: tataḥ sā vismitānyra bhramaṃtī dūrato 'vrajat // Rm_38.704{42} //
K14ratnml_u:17283: tataḥ sā dūrato nadyāḥ śabdaṃ śrutvā pradhāvitā /
K14ratnml_u:17284: svadaivapreṣitā tatra tīram avāpatat kṣaṇāt // Rm_38.705{43} //
K14ratnml_u:17285: tatra sā taj jalaṃ pātuṃ sahasā samupācarat /
K14ratnml_u:17286: tatra sā taj jalaṃ pītvā snātvā caiva samāśrayat // Rm_38.706{44} //
K14ratnml_u:17289: tatra sā tāḥ samālokya sahasopetya sāṃjaliḥ /
K14ratnml_u:17291: aho bhāgyaṃ mayā labdhaṃ yad bhavatyātra darśitā /
K14ratnml_u:17292: tad dṛṣṭvā kṛpayā sarvā snātum arhanti sarvathā // Rm_38.709{47} //
K14ratnml_u:17294: kutra gaṃtuṃ caraṃty atra satyam etad vadaṃtu me // Rm_38.710{48} //
K14ratnml_u:17295: iti tayoditaṃ śrutvā tāsām ekā pradhānikā /
K14ratnml_u:17296: sālokya cūḍadevīṃ tāṃ samāmaṃtryaivam abravīt // Rm_38.711{49} //
K14ratnml_u:17298: bhadre tvaṃ na jānāsi yā śrīdevī vasuṃdharāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:17299: tasyā ime 'mṛtā pūrṇā nīyaṃte snapane ghaṭāḥ // Rm_38.712{50} //
K14ratnml_u:17300: devīsnānodakaiḥ sarvair eṣā nadī vahaty api /
K14ratnml_u:17301: etan nadyamṛtenātra netre prakṣālya dṛśyatāṃ // Rm_38.713{51} //
K14ratnml_u:17302: evaṃ devyā tayādiṣṭaṃ cūḍadevī niśamya sā /
K14ratnml_u:17303: tathety abhyanumodaṃtī tathā kartuṃ samaichata // Rm_38.714{52} //
K14ratnml_u:17304: tataḥ sā tan nadītīre sthitvāmṛtena cakṣuṣī /
K14ratnml_u:17305: saṃprakṣālya tataḥ sasne papau tad amṛtaṃ mudā // Rm_38.715{53} //
K14ratnml_u:17308: tatrasthā cūḍadevī sā prādrākṣīt tat kṣaṇād api /
K14ratnml_u:17310: tatra tāṃ śrīmahādevīṃ dṛṣṭvā sā pratimaṃḍitā /
K14ratnml_u:17311: sahasā sāṃjalir natvā paśyaṃtī samupācarat // Rm_38.718{56} //
K14ratnml_u:17312: tatra sā samupetyāśu kṛtvā pradakṣiṇāṃ mudā /
K14ratnml_u:17313: sagaṇāṃ sa mahādevīṃ praṇanāma kṛtāṃjaliḥ // Rm_38.719{57} //
K14ratnml_u:17314: tataḥ sā śrīmahādevī cūḍadevīṃ samīksya tāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:17315: svāgatāsi samehi tvam ity evaṃ samabhāṣata // Rm_38.720{58} //
K14ratnml_u:17316: evaṃ devyā tayādiṣṭaṃ cūḍadevī niśamya sā /
K14ratnml_u:17317: sāṃjalir aśru mocaṃtī devyāḥ pādāmbuje 'patat // Rm_38.721{59} //
K14ratnml_u:17318: tataḥ sā śrīvasuṃdhārā mahādevī vilokya tāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:17319: pādābje patitāṃ dhṛtvā samāśvāsyaivam ādiśat // Rm_38.722{60} //
K14ratnml_u:17320: bhāgini bhadra uttiṣṭha dhairyam ālaṃvya paśyatāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:17321: mā viṣīda prasīdātra pūrayāmi tavaihitaṃ // Rm_38.723{61} //
K14ratnml_u:17322: etat tayā mahādevyā samādiṣṭaṃ niśamya sā /
K14ratnml_u:17325: bhavatyāḥ śaraṇaṃ yāmi kṣamasva me 'parādhatāṃ // Rm_38.725{63} //
K14ratnml_u:17327: yan mayā prakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ tat sarvaṃ kṣaṃtum arhati // Rm_38.726{64} //
K14ratnml_u:17328: yad etad dūrato cāhaṃ samāyātāsmy avighnataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:17329: tad bhavatyāḥ prasādena nānyatheti hi manyate // Rm_38.727{65} //
K14ratnml_u:17330: tad iha te mahādevyā śraddhayā śaraṇāsthitā /
K14ratnml_u:17331: vrataṃ caritum ichāmi tat prasīda kṛpānidhe // Rm_38.728{66} //
K14ratnml_u:17332: iti tayārthitaṃ śrutvā sā śrīdevī vasuṃdharā /
K14ratnml_u:17334: sādhu vatse punar gatvā svapure svāminā saha /
K14ratnml_u:17335: ācāryeṇa yathādiṣṭaṃ vrataṃ kuru samāhita // Rm_38.730{68} //
K14ratnml_u:17336: tadā tatra gṛhe te 'haṃ svayam āgatya saṃsthitā /
K14ratnml_u:17337: kariṣyāmi sadā bhadraṃ sarvatra nirupadravaṃ // Rm_38.731{69} //
K14ratnml_u:17338: tadā te sarvadā gehe dehe ca maṃgalaṃ bhavet /
K14ratnml_u:17340: tatas tad artham ādāya dehe 'rthibhyo yathepsitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:17341: triratnabhajanaṃ kṛtvā carasva sarvadā śubhe // Rm_38.733{71} //
K14ratnml_u:17343: tathā saṃpārapūrya tvaṃ sarvāḥ pāramitāḥ kramāt /
K14ratnml_u:17344: trividhāṃ bodhim āsādya saṃbuddhapadam āpsyasi // Rm_38.734{72} //
K14ratnml_u:17345: etad devyā samādiṣṭaṃ cūḍadevī niśamya sā /
K14ratnml_u:17347: tataḥ sā cūḍadevī ca tāṃ śrīdevīṃ vasuṃdharāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:17349: yan mārgasthitair lokaiḥ saṃdarśitaṃ vaco 'sti me /
K14ratnml_u:17350: dadehaṃ praṣṭum ichāmi bhagavati samādiśa // Rm_38.737{75} //
K14ratnml_u:17351: mārge 'haṃ sarasī dṛṣṭvā jalaṃ pātum upācaraṃ /
K14ratnml_u:17352: tadā te sarasī yuddhaṃ prākurvatāṃ parasparaṃ // Rm_38.738{76} //
K14ratnml_u:17353: tatas te vigrahāṃte māṃ dṛṣṭvaivaṃ paryapṛchatāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:17354: kutra gaṃtum ihāyāsi tat satyaṃ kathyatām iti // Rm_38.739{77} //
K14ratnml_u:17356: śrīdevīdarśanaṃ gaṃtum ihaimīty avadam api // Rm_38.740{78} //
K14ratnml_u:17357: evaṃ mayoditaṃ śrutvā sarasī ta ubhe 'pi ca /
K14ratnml_u:17358: māṃ sa kṛtāṃjalir natvā samīkṣyaivam abhāṣatāṃ // Rm_38.741{79} //
K14ratnml_u:17359: yad āvāṃ vigrahaṃ nityaṃ kṛtvā tiṣṭhāvahe mithaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:17360: tan no pāpena keneti śrīdevīṃ paripṛchatu // Rm_38.742{80} //
K14ratnml_u:17361: kiṃ tābhyāṃ prakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ yad evaṃ vigrahaṃ mithaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:17362: kṛtvā te tiṣṭhato devi tat samādeṣṭum arhati // Rm_38.743{81} //
K14ratnml_u:17363: iti tayoditaṃ śrutvā sā śrīdevī vasuṃdharā /
K14ratnml_u:17364: samīkṣya cūḍadevīṃ tāṃ samāmaṃtryaivam ādiśat // Rm_38.744{82} //
K14ratnml_u:17365: bhaginyau tau purābhūtaṃ bhojane samaye sadā /
