K14ratnml_u:17366: ākruṣya vigrahaṃ kṛtvā pratikṣepaṃ pracakratuḥ // Rm_38.745{83} //
K14ratnml_u:17367: tena pāpena tau dve 'pi sarasī bhūtvā parasparaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:17368: sarvadā vigrahaṃ kṛtvā tiṣṭhataḥ sāṃprataṃ tathā // Rm_38.746{84} //
K14ratnml_u:17369: evaṃ tayoḥ puraḥ proktvā citte tvaṃ paribodhaya /
K14ratnml_u:17370: etac chrutvaiva te vākyaṃ pāpān muktvai cyato divaṃ // Rm_38.747{85} //
K14ratnml_u:17371: tato 'sau cūḍadevī ca natvā tāṃ śrīvasuṃdharāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:17374: so 'pi māṃ samupāyātaṃ dṛṣṭvaivaṃ paryapṛchata // Rm_38.749{87} //
K14ratnml_u:17375: kutra gaṃtum ihāyāsi vadasveti niśamya tat /
K14ratnml_u:17376: śrīdevīdarśane gaṃtum ihaimīty avadam ahaṃ // Rm_38.750{88} //
K14ratnml_u:17377: tataḥ sa śūkaraś cāhaṃ prarudat purāto mama /
K14ratnml_u:17378: kiṃ mayā prakṛtaṃ pāpam iti devy abhipṛchyatāṃ // Rm_38.751{89} //
K14ratnml_u:17379: kiṃ tena prakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ purā kutra kadā kathaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:17380: tat sarvaṃ samupādiśya prabodhayatu me manaḥ // Rm_38.752{90} //
K14ratnml_u:17381: iti tat pṛchitaṃ śrutvā sā śrīdevī vasuṃdharā /
K14ratnml_u:17382: samīkṣya cūḍadevīṃ tāṃ samāmaṃtryaivam abravīt // Rm_38.753{91} //
K14ratnml_u:17384: janebhyo bhojanaṃ kiṃ cid datvā sarvaṃ gṛhe 'nayat // Rm_38.754{92} //
K14ratnml_u:17387: etat mayā yathākhyātaṃ tathā tasya puro vada // Rm_38.755{93} //
K14ratnml_u:17388: sa tvatkathitam ākarṇya pāpamukto divaṃ vrajet // Rm_38.756{94} //
K14ratnml_u:17389: iti devyā samādiṣṭaṃ cūḍadevī niśamya sā /
K14ratnml_u:17390: tatheti prativijñapya punar evaṃ nyavedayat // Rm_38.757{95} //
K14ratnml_u:17391: punar mārge mayā dṛṣṭaḥ pretaḥ sūcīmukho mahān /
K14ratnml_u:17392: kiṃ tena prakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ tava devi samādiśa // Rm_38.758{96} //
K14ratnml_u:17393: iti tat kathitaṃ śrutvā sā śrīdevī maheśvarī /
K14ratnml_u:17394: samīkṣya cūḍadevīṃ tāṃ samāmaṃtryaivam abravīt // Rm_38.759{97} //
K14ratnml_u:17395: purā sa brāhmaṇo vidvān vedavid vādasaṃrataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:17400: sa chidravacasākruṣya bauddhe dānaṃ nyavārayat // Rm_38.762{100} //
K14ratnml_u:17403: kiṃ tena na kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ saddharmavighnakāriṇā /
K14ratnml_u:17406: sūcīmukho mahākāyaḥ preto bhavati sāṃprataṃ // Rm_38.765{3} //
K14ratnml_u:17407: etan mayā yathākhyātaṃ tathā tasya puro vada /
K14ratnml_u:17408: etat te kathitaṃ śrutvā smṛtimān sa sudhīr bhavet // Rm_38.766{4} //
K14ratnml_u:17409: tataḥ sa svakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ sarvaṃ smṛtvādiśan svayaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:17410: triratnasmaraṇaṃ kṛtvā samichec carituṃ śubhe // Rm_38.767{5} //
K14ratnml_u:17412: namo buddhāya dharmāya saṃghāyeti vadan bhajet // Rm_38.768{6} //
K14ratnml_u:17413: tatas tat pretalokāt sa samutthāya vikalpakaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:17414: pretāśayaṃ parityajya tato 'pi hi divaṃ vrajet // Rm_38.769{7} //
K14ratnml_u:17415: iti tasyā mahādevyā samādiṣṭaṃ niśamya sā /
K14ratnml_u:17416: cūḍadevī prasannāsyā punar evaṃ nyavedayat // Rm_38.770{8} //
K14ratnml_u:17417: bhūyo 'pi pathi bho devi dṛśyate duḥkhitā mayā /
K14ratnml_u:17418: kiṃ kiṃ taiḥ prakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ tat sarvaṃ samupādiśa // Rm_38.771{9} //
K14ratnml_u:17419: iti saṃprārthite rājñyā sā śrīdevī vasuṃdharā /
K14ratnml_u:17420: niśamya cūḍadevīṃ tāṃ samīkṣyaivam upādiśat // Rm_38.772{10} //
K14ratnml_u:17423: yo hatvā prāṇino bhuṃkta so 'lpāyuṣko bhave bhraman /
K14ratnml_u:17424: adyāpi tadvipākena tiṣṭhaty evaṃ suduḥkhitaḥ // Rm_38.774{12} //
K14ratnml_u:17426: sa daridro mahāduṣṭo bhavaty adyāpi duḥkhabhāk // Rm_38.775{13} //
K14ratnml_u:17429: sa sveṣṭasujanais tyakto bhavaty arivaśe sthitaḥ // Rm_38.776{14} //
K14ratnml_u:17431: sa kuṣṭharogavān pūtigaṃdhavaho bhavaty api // Rm_38.777{15} //
K14ratnml_u:17433: so puṇyakalahonmādī sarvaśatrur bhavaty api // Rm_38.778{16} //
K14ratnml_u:17435: sa pāruṣyavacasā lokāt purākruyyaty abhaṃdayat // Rm_38.779{17} //
K14ratnml_u:17436: sarvabhinneva vā yo 'sau nighnito nādritaḥ kudhīḥ /
K14ratnml_u:17437: sa purā bhinnavādena lokaṃ bhinnāśayaṃ vyadhāt // Rm_38.780{18} //
K14ratnml_u:17444: iti ye daśā pāpāni prakurvanto caren mudā /
K14ratnml_u:17445: sarve te pāpino duṣṭā bhavaṃti duḥkhino 'dhunā // Rm_38.784{22} //
K14ratnml_u:17446: evaṃ mayā yathākhyātaṃ tathā teṣāṃ puro vada /
K14ratnml_u:17447: etat tvaduktam ākarṇya smareyus te purākṛtaṃ // Rm_38.785{23} //
K14ratnml_u:17450: tadā tāṃ pura āmaṃtrya sarvān evaṃ vadādarāt /
K14ratnml_u:17451: yadi cāsti śubhe vāṃchā triratnaṃ sevyatām iti // Rm_38.787{25} //
K14ratnml_u:17452: tataḥ sarve ime yūyaṃ nirmuktapātakā dhruvaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:17453: sahasā sadgatau saukhyaṃ labhedhvam iti cābruhi // Rm_38.788{26} //
K14ratnml_u:17454: tatas te te vacaḥ śrutvā sarve satsaukhya ālasāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:17456: ye buddhe śaraṇaṃ yāṃti na te gaṃchaṃti durgatīṃ /
K14ratnml_u:17457: kramāt pāramitāḥ pūrya saṃbuddhapadam āpnuyuḥ // Rm_38.790{28} //
K14ratnml_u:17458: śṛṇvaṃti ye ca saddharmaṃ na te gachaṃti durgatīṃ /
K14ratnml_u:17459: sarvadā sadgatiṃ yātāḥ pracareyuḥ śubhe mudā // Rm_38.791{29} //
K14ratnml_u:17460: ye bhajaṃti mudā saṃghe te 'pi na yāṃti durgatīṃ /
K14ratnml_u:17461: sadā lokaśubhaṃ kṛtvā saṃprayāyuḥ sukhāvatīṃ // Rm_38.792{30} //
K14ratnml_u:17462: kālasarppo mayā dṛṣṭo bhūyo mārge maheśvari /
K14ratnml_u:17463: kiṃ tena prakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ tad vadasva vasuṃdhare // Rm_38.793{31} //
K14ratnml_u:17466: saṃpadām udayair nityaṃ dānadasyeva saṃyutaḥ // Rm_38.794{32} //
K14ratnml_u:17467: tena kākavaliṃ dātuṃ na prasehe kadā cana /
K14ratnml_u:17468: dvijān vinīpakān dṛṣṭvā cittaiḥ prāduṣāyet sadā // Rm_38.795{32*} //
K14ratnml_u:17469: kasmai cid api kiṃcid vā hy adatvā bubhuje svayaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:17473: tasyāpi purataḥ sarvaṃ madādiṣṭaṃ tathā vada // Rm_38.797{34} //
K14ratnml_u:17474: so 'pi nirmuktapāpaś ca mṛtaḥ svargaṃ vrajed dhruvaṃ // Rm_38.798{35} //
K14ratnml_u:17475: yenaiva yat kṛtaṃ karma tenaiva paribhujyate /
K14ratnml_u:17476: abhuktaṃ kṣīyate naiva karma kvāpi kadā cana // Rm_38.799{36} //
K14ratnml_u:17477: ity etad evam ākhyataṃ śrutvā tvaṃ ca samādarāt /
K14ratnml_u:17478: triratnabhajanaṃ kṛtvā cara me vratam uttamaṃ // Rm_38.800{37} //
K14ratnml_u:17479: tathā lokeṣu sarvatra pracāraya mama vrataṃ /
K14ratnml_u:17480: etatpuṇyavipākena sarvadā te bhavec chubhaṃ // Rm_38.801{38} //
K14ratnml_u:17482: sarvāḥ pāramitā hodhiṃ prāpya buddhapadaṃ vrajeḥ // Rm_38.802{39} //
K14ratnml_u:17483: iti vijñāya kalyāṇi gatvā taṃ svapure punaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:17484: śraddhayā svāminā sārddhaṃ vrataṃ cara samādarāt // Rm_38.803{40} //
K14ratnml_u:17485: ity uktvā sā mahādevī sagaṇā śrīvasuṃdharā /
K14ratnml_u:17486: tataś cāṃtarhitā svarge svālayam āgamad drutaṃ // Rm_38.804{41} //
K14ratnml_u:17487: tatra sā cūḍadevī tāṃ sagaṇāṃ śrīvasuṃdharāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:17488: aṃtardhānagatāṃ dṛṣṭvā kṣaṇaṃ tasthau savismayā // Rm_38.805{42} //
K14ratnml_u:17489: tataḥ sā cūḍadevī tām sagaṇāṃ śrīvasuṃdharāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:17490: smṛtvā kṛtāṃjalir natvā tataḥ pratyāyayau mudā // Rm_38.806{43} //
K14ratnml_u:17491: tataḥ sā cūḍadevī tāṃ sagaṇāṃ śrīvasuṃdharāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:17493: taṃ kṛṣṇasarpam ālokya cūḍadevī bravīti sā /
K14ratnml_u:17494: devyā yathā copadiṣṭaṃ tathā tena purākṛtaṃ // Rm_38.808{45} //
K14ratnml_u:17495: tannāmasmaraṇāt so hityaktvā dehaṃ divaṃ yayau /
K14ratnml_u:17497: tāṃ daśapāpinaḥ sarvān samīkṣya samupācarat // Rm_38.809{46} //
K14ratnml_u:17499: pṛṣṭvā devyā yathādiṣṭaṃ tathā sarvam upādiśat // Rm_38.810{47} //
K14ratnml_u:17500: tac chrutvānusmṛtiṃ prāptāḥ sarve te vismayānvitāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:17501: satyam iti prabhāṣaṃtaḥ śrīdevīśaraṇaṃ yayuḥ // Rm_38.811{48} //
K14ratnml_u:17503: trimaṇḍalaviśuddhāś ca śubhe caritum īchire // Rm_38.812{49} //
K14ratnml_u:17504: tatas te śraddhayā nityaṃ triratnaśaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:17505: tāṃ śrīvasuṃdharāṃ devīṃ dhyātva vrataṃ samācaran // Rm_38.813{50} //
K14ratnml_u:17507: tatraivaṃ tāṃ mahādevīṃ dhyātvā mṛtā divaṃ yayuḥ // Rm_38.814{51} //
K14ratnml_u:17508: tataś ca cūḍadevī sā pracaraṃtī samāgatā /
K14ratnml_u:17509: sūcīmukhaṃ tam ālokya dūrataḥ samupācarat // Rm_38.815{52} //
K14ratnml_u:17510: tatra sā sahasā tasya pretasya purato gatā /
K14ratnml_u:17511: śrīdevyāḥ samupādiṣṭaṃ tathā sarvam abhāṣata // Rm_38.816{53} //
K14ratnml_u:17512: tac chrutvā sa purāvṛttam anusmṛtvā niciṃtayat /
K14ratnml_u:17514: tataḥ sa manasā dhyātvā tāṃ śrīdevīṃ vasuṃdharāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:17516: smarantī sāṃjalir natvā dideśa sarvapātakaṃ // Rm_38.818{55} //
K14ratnml_u:17518: śrīdevīśaraṇaṃ gatvā dehaṃ tyaktvā divaṃ yayau // Rm_38.819{56} //
K14ratnml_u:17519: tataś ca cūḍadevī sā pracaramṭī samāgatā /
K14ratnml_u:17520: śūkaraṃ taṃ samālokya dūrataḥ samupācarat // Rm_38.820{57} //
K14ratnml_u:17522: yathādiṣṭaṃ mahādivyā tathā sarvam upādiśat // Rm_38.821{58} //
K14ratnml_u:17523: tac chrutvā śūkaraḥ so 'pi samanusmṛtim āptavān /
K14ratnml_u:17525: tataḥ sa manasā dhyātvā tāṃ śrīdevīṃ vasuṃdharāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:17526: saṃsmṛtvā sāṃjalir natvā dideśa sarvapātakaṃ // Rm_38.823{60} //
K14ratnml_u:17528: śrīdevīśaraṇaṃ gatvā dehaṃ tyaktvā divaṃ yayau // Rm_38.824{61} //
K14ratnml_u:17529: tataś ca cūḍadevī sā pracaraṃtī samāgatā /
K14ratnml_u:17530: durāt te sarasī dṛṣṭvā sahasā samupāsarat // Rm_38.825{62} //
K14ratnml_u:17531: tatra sā samupāsṛtya puṣkariṇyos tayoḥ puraḥ /
K14ratnml_u:17532: mahādevyā yathādiṣṭaṃ tathā sarvam upādiśat // Rm_38.826{63} //
K14ratnml_u:17533: tac chrutvā puṣkariṇyau tau samanusmṛtim āptuḥ /
K14ratnml_u:17534: tatrānutāpataptā tau nidhāya taṣṭhatuḥ kṣaṇaṃ // Rm_38.827{64} //
K14ratnml_u:17535: tatas te manasā dhyātvā taṃ śrīdevīvasuṃdharāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:17536: saṃsmṛtvā sāṃjalir natvā dideśatuḥ svapāpakaṃ // Rm_38.828{65} //
K14ratnml_u:17539: tatra sarve 'pi te svarge gatās tat smṛtibhāvinaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:17540: dhyātvā tāṃ śrīmahādevīṃ smṛtvā nityaṃ prabhejire // Rm_38.830{67} //
K14ratnml_u:17541: tatra teṣāṃ mahādevyāḥ prasādāc chrī pravarddhitāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:17542: tac chrīsaṃpanmahatsaukhyaṃ bhuktvā sarve te 'raman // Rm_38.831{68} //
K14ratnml_u:17543: tataḥ sā cūḍadevī tān sarvān kṛtvā vimuktitān /
K14ratnml_u:17545: tatra tāṃ samupāyātāṃ dṛṣṭvā lokāḥ pramoditāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:17546: sahasā nṛpater agre gatvaivaṃ saṃnyavedayat // Rm_38.833{70} //
K14ratnml_u:17548: tad bhavān sahasopetya tāṃ samānetum arhati // Rm_38.834{71} //
K14ratnml_u:17549: iti niveditaṃ taiḥ sa rājā śrutvā pramoditaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:17552: pratyudgamya mahotsāhair ihānayata tāṃ priyāṃ // Rm_38.836{73} //
K14ratnml_u:17553: iti rājñā samādiṣṭaṃ śrutvā te maṃtriṇo janāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:17554: amātyāḥ sahasā sarve tathety uktvā mudācaran // Rm_38.837{74} //
K14ratnml_u:17555: tatas te maṃtriṇo 'mātyāḥ sajanāḥ paurikā api /
K14ratnml_u:17556: sarve pratyudgatā tatra cūḍadevī samāyayuḥ // Rm_38.838{75} //
K14ratnml_u:17557: tatra sarve 'pi te lokā dṛṣṭvā tāṃ sahasādarāt /
K14ratnml_u:17558: praṇatvā yāta āropya mahotsāhaiḥ pure 'nayat // Rm_38.839{76} //
K14ratnml_u:17561: praviśya maṃdire rājñaḥ svāminaḥ samupācarat // Rm_38.840{77} //
K14ratnml_u:17562: tatra sā svāminaṃ dṛṣṭvā sahasopetya sāṃjaliḥ /
K14ratnml_u:17563: praṇatvā svāminā tena sahāsane samāśrayat // Rm_38.841{78} //
K14ratnml_u:17564: tatra sa nṛpatiḥ svāmi tāṃ devīṃ supriyāṃ mudā /
K14ratnml_u:17565: saṃpaśyan kauśalaṃ pṛṣṭvā puna evam apṛchata // Rm_38.842{79} //
K14ratnml_u:17566: kena tvaṃ hetunā kutra gatā kuto 'dhunāgatā /
K14ratnml_u:17567: etat sarvaṃ samākhyāya mano me paribodhaya // Rm_38.843{80} //
K14ratnml_u:17568: ity etat svāminā tenādiṣṭaṃ cūḍadevī niśamya sā /
K14ratnml_u:17570: tato 'haṃ sahasā yātā draṣṭuṃ devīṃ vasuṃdharāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:17571: tatra dūrān nadīśabdaṃ śrutvāhaṃ samupācaraṃ // Rm_38.845{82} //
K14ratnml_u:17572: tatra tīre mayā dṛṣṭā devyā jalaghaṭāvahāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:17573: bhavaṃtyaḥ kuta āyātā iti pṛṣṭe 'vadaṃ ca tāḥ // Rm_38.846{83} //
K14ratnml_u:17577: tad etad amṛte nātra mukhaṃ prakṣālya dṛśyatāṃ // Rm_38.848{85} //
K14ratnml_u:17578: iti tābhiḥ samādiṣṭaṃ śrutvā tatheti bodhitā /
K14ratnml_u:17579: tan nadyā amṛtenāsyaṃ prakṣālya kṣam ahaṃ tathā // Rm_38.849{86} //
K14ratnml_u:17581: apaśyaṃ tāṃ nadīm āśu laṃghitvā samupācaraṃ // Rm_38.850{87} //
K14ratnml_u:17583: sagaṇāṃ sāṃjalir natvā tatraikāṃte upāśrayaṃ // Rm_38.851{88} //
K14ratnml_u:17584: tadā sā śrīmahādevī māṃ dṛṣṭvaivam apṛchata /
K14ratnml_u:17585: kutaḥ kim artham āyāsi tad iha kathyatām iti // Rm_38.852{89} //
K14ratnml_u:17586: tac chrutvā sāṃjalir natvā kṛtvā cāpi pradakṣiṇāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:17587: sagaṇāṃ tāṃ mahādevīm upāśrityaivam abruvaṃ // Rm_38.853{90} //
K14ratnml_u:17589: bhavatyā darśanaṃ karttuṃ mudātra samupācare // Rm_38.854{91} //
K14ratnml_u:17590: yan mayā maṃdabhāvinyā vrataṃ samyag na dhāritaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:17591: tan mahad aparādhaṃ me bhavatā kṣaṃtum arhati // Rm_38.855{92} //
K14ratnml_u:17593: samyag vrataṃ punar dharttum ichāmi sāṃprataṃ khalu // Rm_38.856{93} //
K14ratnml_u:17594: tad bhavaṃtī mahādevī kṛtvā me 'nugrahaṃ punaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:17596: iti mayārthitaṃ śrutvā sā śrīdevī vasuṃdharā /
K14ratnml_u:17597: kṛpādṛṣṭyā samālokya mām evaṃ samupādiśat // Rm_38.858{95} //
K14ratnml_u:17598: sādhu vatse 'sti te vāṃcā yadi me vratadhāraṇe /
K14ratnml_u:17599: gatvā tvaṃ svagṛhe bhartrā saha vrataṃ carādarāt // Rm_38.859{96} //
K14ratnml_u:17600: tadāhaṃ svayam āgatya drakṣyāmi maṃdiraṃ tava /
K14ratnml_u:17601: tatrāhaṃ samupāśritya dāsyāmi prārthitaṃ varaṃ // Rm_38.860{97} //
K14ratnml_u:17603: tāṃ śrīvasuṃdharāṃ devīm apṛchaṃ punar ādarāt // Rm_38.861{98} //
K14ratnml_u:17606: tad bhavaṃtī samākhyāya māṃ bodhayitum arhati // Rm_38.862{99} //
K14ratnml_u:17607: tac chrutvā sā mahādevī taiḥ sarvaiḥ prakṛtaṃ yathā /
K14ratnml_u:17608: tat tat sarvaṃ tathā teṣāṃ karma me samupādiśat // Rm_38.863{100} //
K14ratnml_u:17610: śrīdevīṃ sagaṇāṃ cāpi samārcayaṃ samādarāt // Rm_38.864{1} //
K14ratnml_u:17613: tataḥ sā sagaṇā devī kṣaṇād aṃtarhitābhavat /
K14ratnml_u:17614: tata utthāya tāṃ devīṃ naivāpaśyat kuhāpi ca // Rm_38.866{3} //
K14ratnml_u:17616: smṛtvā sagaṇāṃ devīṃ natvā śanais tato 'caraṃ // Rm_38.867{4} //
K14ratnml_u:17617: tatra mārge samāsādya sarvāns tān pāpinaḥ kramāt /
K14ratnml_u:17618: mahādevyā yad ādiṣṭaṃ tathākhyāya vyanodayaṃ // Rm_38.868{5} //
K14ratnml_u:17619: tatas te pāpinaḥ sarve vacasā me 'nutāpitāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:17620: śrīdevīśaraṇaṃ kṛtvā dehaṃ tyaktvācaran divaṃ // Rm_38.869{6} //
K14ratnml_u:17622: kṣemeṇeha samāyātā bhavatāṃ darśanaṃ labhe // Rm_38.870{7} //
K14ratnml_u:17624: śrutvā sa nṛpatiḥ svāmī vismitaś caivam abravīt // Rm_38.871{8} //
K14ratnml_u:17626: bhāryā tvaṃ mahiṣī cāpi vrataṃ śrīsaṃpado 'pi me // Rm_38.872{9} //
K14ratnml_u:17627: tathā bhūyo 'py ahaṃ devyā yathādiṣṭaṃ samādarāt /
K14ratnml_u:17628: saha tvayā mahiṣyātra carāṇi sarvadā vrataṃ // Rm_38.873{10} //
K14ratnml_u:17629: kim etad rājyabhogyena vinā tvāṃ mahiṣīṃ mama /
K14ratnml_u:17630: etad eva hi saṃsāraṃ yat sabhāryā vrataṃ caret // Rm_38.874{11} //
K14ratnml_u:17631: tad āvāṃ sarvadāpīha śrīdevyāḥ śaraṇaṃ gatau /
K14ratnml_u:17632: śraddhayā vratam ārādhya prabhajeva samādarāt // Rm_38.875{12} //
K14ratnml_u:17634: tābhyāṃ yuto mahotsāhaiḥ śrīnagaraṃ samāyayau // Rm_38.876{13} //
K14ratnml_u:17636: dinaikasmiṃś cūḍadevī tato garbhan dadhau kramāt // Rm_38.877{14} //
K14ratnml_u:17638: prāsādikaṃ supīnāṃgaṃ putraṃ brāhme muhurttake // Rm_38.878{15} //
K14ratnml_u:17641: senagupto vicāryaivaṃ bodhayan nṛpam abravīt // Rm_38.880{17} //
K14ratnml_u:17642: mā viṣīdātra rājendra yuto yad rājalakṣaṇaiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:17643: yogo 'yaṃ sārvabhaumaḥ syāt saptamāsaphalaṃ śṛṇu // Rm_38.881{18} //
K14ratnml_u:17644: prathame kalalaṃ vidyād dvitīye ghanam eva ca /
K14ratnml_u:17649: yo bālaḥ saptame māsi jāyate sa tu bhāgyabhāk /
K14ratnml_u:17650: sārvabhauma nṛpo bhūtvā mahīṃ śāsti sunītitaḥ // Rm_38.884{21} //
K14ratnml_u:17651: tasmān nṛpeṃdra taṃ bālaṃ rakṣaṇīyaḥ prayatnataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:17652: ity ācāryavacaḥ śrutvā sa rājā parimoditaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:17655: iti matvā nāma cakre maṃgalodaya ity api // Rm_38.886{23} //
K14ratnml_u:17656: tato bālaḥ śuklapakṣe caṃdra iva dine dine /
K14ratnml_u:17661: kṛtvā sa bhūpatī rājā vrataṃ caritum aichata // Rm_38.889{26} //
K14ratnml_u:17663: ācāryeṇa yathādiṣṭaṃ tathā sarvaṃ samācarat // Rm_38.890{27} //
K14ratnml_u:17664: śrīdevyā vratam ārādhya samahiṣī sa bhūpatiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:17666: tasminn avasare tatra sā śrīdevī vasuṃdharā /
K14ratnml_u:17667: sagaṇā svayam āgatya bhāsayaṃtī samāśrayat // Rm_38.892{29} //
K14ratnml_u:17669: sākṣād ālokya rājā sa sabhāryaḥ samupasthitaḥ // Rm_38.893{30} //
K14ratnml_u:17670: pādārghaṃ sahasā datvā pūjāṃgaiś ca samarcayat /
K14ratnml_u:17671: kṛtvā pradakṣiṇāṃ natvā sāṃjalir nyapatat puraḥ // Rm_38.894{31} //
K14ratnml_u:17672: tataḥ sā śrīmahādevī vasulakṣmī vilokya taṃ /
K14ratnml_u:17673: sabhāryaṃ nṛpam utthāya samālokyaivam ādiśat // Rm_38.895{32} //
K14ratnml_u:17674: śṛṇu rājan mahābhāga yathā te yat samīpsitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:17675: sarvaṃ te 'haṃ pravakṣyāmi satyam etad vaco mama // Rm_38.896{33} //
K14ratnml_u:17676: ity ādiṣṭe mahālakṣmyā sabhāryaḥ sa nṛpo mudā /
K14ratnml_u:17677: tāṃ devīṃ sāṃjalir natvā prārthayad evam ādarāt // Rm_38.897{34} //
K14ratnml_u:17679: yathā te īhitaṃ kāryaṃ tad eva dehi me varaṃ // Rm_38.898{35} //
K14ratnml_u:17680: etat saṃprārthitaṃ rājñā śrutvā sā śrīmaheśvarī /
K14ratnml_u:17681: sabhāryaṃ taṃ mahīpālaṃ samālokyaivam ādiśat // Rm_38.899{36} //
K14ratnml_u:17682: sādhu rājan svayaṃ dhṛtvā vrataṃ sarvatra cāraya /
K14ratnml_u:17683: kṛtvaitan me mahatkāryaṃ tataḥ praihi mamālayaṃ // Rm_38.900{37} //
K14ratnml_u:17684: ity ādiśya tataḥ sā śrīmahādevī vasuṃdharā /
K14ratnml_u:17685: sagaṇā tat kṣaṇād aṃtarhitā svaṃ bhuvanaṃ yayau // Rm_38.901{38} //
K14ratnml_u:17686: tataḥ sa sapriyo rājā tāṃ devīṃ sagaṇām api /
K14ratnml_u:17687: sarvām antarhitāṃ dṛṣṭvā kṣaṇaṃ tasthau savismayaḥ // Rm_38.902{39} //
K14ratnml_u:17688: tatas tathā sa bhūmīndro bhāryayā saha sarvadā /
K14ratnml_u:17689: śrīdevyāḥ śaraṇaṃ gatvā vrataṃ dhṛtvā samācarat // Rm_38.903{40} //
K14ratnml_u:17690: tathā sarvatra lokeṣu śrīdevyā vratam ādiśat /
K14ratnml_u:17692: tathā sa nṛpatir devyā vrataṃ sarvatra cārayan /
K14ratnml_u:17694: sarveṣām api satvānāṃ maṃgalaṃ sarvadākarot // Rm_38.905{42} //
K14ratnml_u:17697: tataḥ sa nṛpatī rājā sarvārthibhyo yathepsitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:17699: tathā sa bhūpatī rājā bhāryayā saha moditaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:17700: śrīdevyāḥ pradadhe bhaktyā vrataṃ sāṣṭottaraṃ śataṃ // Rm_38.908{45} //
K14ratnml_u:17701: tataḥ sa bhāryayā sārddham abhiṣiṃcyātmajaṃ sutaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:17702: svapade lokadharmārthaṃ kṛtvānte tuṣite yayau // Rm_38.909{46} //
K14ratnml_u:17703: tataḥ sa sapriyas tatra śrīdevyāḥ samupasthitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:17704: sarvadā bhajanaṃ kṛtvā śrīmāns tasthau śubhe caran // Rm_38.910{47} //
K14ratnml_u:17705: tatra sa sarvadā satvahitaṃ kṛtvā sukhānvitaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:17706: sarvāḥ pāramitāḥ pūrya saṃbuddhapadam āpsyati // Rm_38.911{48} //
K14ratnml_u:17709: tadā bhuvi tathā devyā svayaṃ vrataṃ pracāritaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:17710: ity etan munibhiḥ sarvaiḥ khyātam iti śrutaṃ mayā // Rm_38.913{50} //
K14ratnml_u:17711: etan me guruṇākhyātaṃ śrutaṃ maya tathocyate /
K14ratnml_u:17712: tvaṃ cāpy evaṃ mahārāja śrīdevyāś cara tad vrataṃ // Rm_38.914{51} //
K14ratnml_u:17713: tathā te sarvadā kṣemaṃ sarvatrāpi bhaved dhruvaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:17714: śrīdasyeva mahāsaṃpad akṣīṇā saṃbhavet khalu // Rm_38.915{52} //
K14ratnml_u:17717: evaṃ matvā mahārāja prajāś cāpi prabodhayan /
K14ratnml_u:17718: śrīdevyāḥ śaraṇe sthāpya sadā vrataṃ pracāraya // Rm_38.917{54} //
K14ratnml_u:17723: atītair api saṃbuddhaiḥ sarvair api munīśvaraṃ /
K14ratnml_u:17727: tathā cānāgataiḥ sarvai munīndrair api sarvataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:17733: śrīdevyā dhāraṇīṃ dhṛtvā caritavyaṃ jagaddhite // Rm_38.924{61} //
K14ratnml_u:17735: bhaktyā paṭhaṃti śṛṇvaṃti pāṭhayanty api sarvadā // Rm_38.925{62} //
K14ratnml_u:17736: likhitvā pustake vāpi gṛhe sthāpya sadādarāt /
K14ratnml_u:17738: satkṛtya śraddhayābhyarcya dhṛtvāṃjaliṃ namaṃti ye // Rm_38.926{63} //
K14ratnml_u:17739: tathā bhurje likhitvā ca vāhau kaṇṭhe ca mastake /
K14ratnml_u:17740: śrīdevyā dhāraṇīvidyāratnaṃ dadhati ye sadā // Rm_38.927{64} //
K14ratnml_u:17741: eteṣām api sarveṣāṃ gṛheṣu viṣayeṣv api /
K14ratnml_u:17742: sarvatra maṃgalaṃ nityaṃ nirvighnaṃ sarvadā bhavet // Rm_38.928{65} //
K14ratnml_u:17744: na teṣāṃ viṣaye kvāpi pracareyuḥ kadā cana // Rm_38.929{66} //
K14ratnml_u:17746: tesāṃ kāyeṣu sarvatra na spṛśeyuḥ kadā cana // Rm_38.930{67} //
K14ratnml_u:17747: apathyam api pathyaṃ syād viṣo 'pi cāmṛtaṃ bhavet /
K14ratnml_u:17748: teṣāṃ deheṣu sarvatra hitāyate 'hito 'pi ca // Rm_38.931{68} //
K14ratnml_u:17749: brahmaśakrādayo devā ye duṣṭā vahnayo 'pi ca /
K14ratnml_u:17750: yamasya kiṃkarāś cāpi rākṣasā garuḍā api // Rm_38.932{69} //
K14ratnml_u:17754: sarve te viṣaye teṣāṃ vighnaṃ karttuṃ na śaknuyuḥ // Rm_38.934{71} //
K14ratnml_u:17756: teṣāṃ devīprabhāvena rakṣeyuś ca prasāditāḥ // Rm_38.935{72} //
K14ratnml_u:17758: teṣāṃ sarvatra kāyeṣu kiṃcid vighnaṃ bhaven na hi // Rm_38.936{73} //
K14ratnml_u:17760: bhaved eva sadā naiva vighnatā syāt kadā cana // Rm_38.937{74} //
K14ratnml_u:17762: sarvārthasādhane siddhir bhaven na tu vighātatā // Rm_38.938{75} //
K14ratnml_u:17764: yatayo yoginaḥ siddhā ṛṣayo brahmacāriṇaḥ // Rm_38.939{76} //
K14ratnml_u:17765: grahās tārāgaṇāḥ sarvā yoginyo bhairavā api /
K14ratnml_u:17766: ḍākinyo mātṛkāṣṭāś ca mahākālagaṇā api // Rm_38.940{77} //
K14ratnml_u:17772: śrīdevī bhāvino dṛṣṭvā saṃrakṣeyuḥ prasāditāḥ // Rm_38.943{80} //
K14ratnml_u:17773: sarve pratyekabuddhāś ca tāñ chrīdevyā upāśrikān /
K14ratnml_u:17775: bodhisatvāś ca sarve 'pi tāṃc chrīdevyā upāsakān /
K14ratnml_u:17776: yathepsitaṃ varaṃ datvā pālayeyuḥ kṛpānvitāḥ // Rm_38.945{82} //
K14ratnml_u:17777: sarve 'pi sugatā buddhāḥ śrīdevyāḥ śaraṇe sthitān /
K14ratnml_u:17778: sudṛśā sarvadālokya sa bhaveyur dayānvitāḥ // Rm_38.946{83} //
K14ratnml_u:17781: evaṃ sarvair mahābhijñair munīndrair gaditaṃ khalu /
K14ratnml_u:17783: iti me guruṇādiṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ mayā tathocyate // Rm_38.948{85} //
K14ratnml_u:17784: śrutvā rājaṃs tvam apy evaṃ tac chrīdevīvrataṃ cara /
K14ratnml_u:17786: mahāsaṃpat pravṛddhā syād akṣīṇā sarvadā sthirā // Rm_38.950{87} //
K14ratnml_u:17787: tatas tvaṃ tad dravyam ādāya sarvārthibhyo yathepsitaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:17788: datvā carac chubhe saukhyaṃ bhuṃkṣva saṃpālayan prajāḥ // Rm_38.951{88} //
K14ratnml_u:17790: sarvadā sadgatīṃ yātā dharme caran sukhaṃ vaseḥ // Rm_38.952{89} //
K14ratnml_u:17791: iti matvā mahārāja śrīdevyāḥ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:17792: saddharmaṃ svayam ākarṇya lokāś ca śrāvaya prabho // Rm_38.953{90} //
K14ratnml_u:17793: sarveṣām api saṃsāre dharma eva suhṛt sakhā /
K14ratnml_u:17794: tasmād atra prayatnena dharma eva samarjyāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:17795: dharmaṃ tu sarvadharmāṇāṃ praśreṣṭhaṃ saugataṃ varaṃ // Rm_38.954{91} //
K14ratnml_u:17796: yataḥ sarvatra lokeṣu saṃsāre bhadratā sadā /
K14ratnml_u:17797: tasmāt sarvatra saṃsāre sadā bhadraṃ samīpsubhiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:17798: satkṛtya saugataṃ dharmaṃ śrotavyaṃ śraddhayādarāt // Rm_38.955{92} //
K14ratnml_u:17799: ye 'py atra saugataṃ dharmaṃ śṛṇvaṃti śraddhayādarāt /
K14ratnml_u:17800: durgatīṃ te na gachaṃti saṃyāṃti sadgatīṃ sadā // Rm_38.956{93} //
K14ratnml_u:17801: ye cāpi saugataṃ dharmaṃ śrāvayaṃti parān api /
K14ratnml_u:17802: te 'pi na durgatīṃ yāṃti yāṃti sadgatim eva hi // Rm_38.957{94} //
K14ratnml_u:17803: yaś cāpi saugataṃ dharmaṃ prabhāṣati prabedhayan /
K14ratnml_u:17804: so 'pi na durgatiṃ yāti saṃprayāyāt sukhāvatīṃ // Rm_38.958{95} //
K14ratnml_u:17806: durlabhaṃ saugataṃ dharmaṃ vaktā śrotā ca durlabhaḥ // Rm_38.959{96} //
K14ratnml_u:17807: tadā tān kleśitāl lokān dṛṣṭvā ghṛṇādayāhataḥ /
K14ratnml_u:17808: svakāyajīvitasnehaṃ tyaktvā yo dharmam ādiśet // Rm_38.960{97} //
K14ratnml_u:17809: sa eva hi mahābhijño dhīraḥ sudhīr vicakṣaṇaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:17810: sarvakleśavijetā ca mārajit syāj jinātmajaḥ // Rm_38.961{98} //
K14ratnml_u:17811: yaś cāpi ca tadā kleśasaṃghasamākule tathā /
K14ratnml_u:17812: tyaktaḥ svaprāṇakāyo yaḥ saddharmaṃ śṛṇuyān mudā // Rm_38.962{99} //
K14ratnml_u:17815: yaś cāpy eva kalau kāle saddharmāntarhite tathā /
K14ratnml_u:17816: nisnehasvāsukāyo yaḥ saddharmaṃ śrāvayet parān // Rm_38.964{1} //
K14ratnml_u:17819: yaś cāpi parataḥ śrutvā saddharmaṃ saugatoditaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:17820: anumodet prasannātmā so 'pi syāt sugatātmajaḥ // Rm_38.966{3} //
K14ratnml_u:17821: sarvatīrthābhiṣeke yat puṇyaṃ tat sarvam āpnuyuḥ /
K14ratnml_u:17822: sarvatra sajjanā nūnaṃ karttavyaṃ nātra saṃśayaṃ // Rm_38.967{4} //
K14ratnml_u:17823: yāvaṃtaḥ prāṇinaḥ satvās tān sarvān yo hi pālayet /
K14ratnml_u:17824: tasya yāvan mahatpuṇyaṃ tat sarvaṃ te samāpnuyuḥ // Rm_38.968{5} //
K14ratnml_u:17826: yāvaṃto bhikṣavo 'rhantas tān sarvān yaḥ samarcayet /
K14ratnml_u:17827: tasya puṇyaphalaṃ yāvat tat sarvaṃ te hy avāpuyuḥ // Rm_38.969{6} //
K14ratnml_u:17828: yāvat pratyekabuddhāś ca tān sarvān yo bhajen mudā /
K14ratnml_u:17829: yāvat puṇyaphalaṃ tasya labheyus te tato 'rthikaṃ // Rm_38.970{7} //
K14ratnml_u:17830: yāvaṃtaḥ sugatāś cāpi tān sarvān yaḥ sadā bhajet /
K14ratnml_u:17831: yāvat puṇyaṃ mahat tasya labheyus te tato 'dhikaṃ // Rm_38.971{8} //
K14ratnml_u:17832: yāvaṃto bhūtale gavas tān sarvāñ chraddhayā dadet /
K14ratnml_u:17833: tasya yāvan mahatpuṇyaṃ prāpnuyus te tato 'dhikaṃ // Rm_38.972{9} //
K14ratnml_u:17835: tasya puṇyam asaṃkhyeyaṃ prayāyus te tato 'dhikaṃ // Rm_38.973{10} //
K14ratnml_u:17836: sābdhiśailaṃ mahīṃ sarvāṃ śraddhayā yaḥ samarppayet /
K14ratnml_u:17837: tasya bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ samyāyus te tato 'dhikaṃ // Rm_38.974{11} //
K14ratnml_u:17839: tasya puṇyam asaṃkhyeyaṃ labheyus te tato 'dhikaṃ // Rm_38.975{12} //
K14ratnml_u:17841: yāvaṃtasya mahatpuṇyaṃ labheyus te tato 'dhikaṃ // Rm_38.976{13} //
K14ratnml_u:17843: tāvat tasya mahatpuṇyaṃ prāpnuyus te tato 'dhikaṃ // Rm_38.977{14} //
K14ratnml_u:17845: saṃti tato 'dhikaṃ puṇyaṃ te sarve samavāpnuyuḥ // Rm_38.978{15} //
K14ratnml_u:17846: iti satyaṃ samākhyātaṃ sarvair api munīśvaraiḥ /
K14ratnml_u:17847: etan me guruṇādiṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ mayā ca vakṣyate // Rm_38.979{16} //
K14ratnml_u:17848: etat satyaṃ parijñāya yadi saṃbodhim ichasi /
K14ratnml_u:17849: sadā saddharmam ākarṇya triratnabhajanaṃ kuru // Rm_38.980{17} //
K14ratnml_u:17852: tatas te maṃgalaṃ nityaṃ sarvatrāpi bhaved dhruvaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:17853: kramād bodhiṃ samāsādya saṃbuddhapadam āpnuyāḥ // Rm_38.982{19} //
K14ratnml_u:17857: so 'śoko 'pi mahārājas tathā dharmaṃ sadācarat // Rm_38.984{21} //
K14ratnml_u:17858: etad evaṃ samākhyāya jayaśrī sa jinātmajaḥ /
K14ratnml_u:17859: sarvāsāṃ śiṣyasaṃghāṃś ca samāmaṃtryaivam ādiśat // Rm_38.985{22} //
K14ratnml_u:17861: yo yatra meva śṛṇvaṃti śrāvayaṃty api ye mudā // Rm_38.986{23} //
K14ratnml_u:17862: śrutvānumodaṃti ye ca dṛṣṭvā namaṃti ye mudā /
K14ratnml_u:17863: satkṛtya śraddhayā nityaṃ samabhyarcya bhajaṃti ye // Rm_38.987{24} //
K14ratnml_u:17864: eteṣāṃ tatra sarveṣāṃ bhavaṃtu maṃgalaṃ sadā /
K14ratnml_u:17865: jayaśrī parivṛddhāstu sarvatra sarvadāpi ca // Rm_38.988{25} //
K14ratnml_u:17866: ītaya upasargāś ca sarve vighnagaṇā api /
K14ratnml_u:17867: duṣṭā māragaṇāṃś cāpi vilayaṃ yāṃtu sarvadā // Rm_38.989{26} //
K14ratnml_u:17868: gṛheṣu sarvadā teṣaṃ lakṣmīs tiṣṭhatu susthirāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:17870: dharmārthakāmabhogyāś ca saṃsiddhyaṃtu sa medhitāḥ // Rm_38.990{27} //
K14ratnml_u:17875: kramāt pāramitāḥ pūrya vrajaṃtu saugataṃ padaṃ // Rm_38.992{29} //
K14ratnml_u:17877: bhavaṃtu maṃgalaṃ nityaṃ subhikṣaṃ nirupadravaṃ // Rm_38.993{30} //
K14ratnml_u:17878: sarve satvāś ca saddharmaṃ sādhayaṃtu samudyatāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:17880: kāle varṣaṃtu meghāś ca bhūyāc chasyavatī mahī /
K14ratnml_u:17882: sarvadā suphalaiḥ puṣpaṃ vṛkṣāḥ saṃtu samanvitāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:17883: rājā bhavaṃtu dhārmiṣṭho nayasthāḥ saṃtu maṃtriṇaḥ // Rm_38.996{33} //
K14ratnml_u:17884: sarve sainyāś ca yodhāro jayaṃtu dūrjanān narīn /
K14ratnml_u:17885: sarvetayaḥ praśāmyaṃtu saṃtu saukhyānvitāḥ prajāḥ // Rm_38.997{34} //
K14ratnml_u:17888: vighnāñ jitvā śubhaṃ kṛtvā pālayaṃtu prajāḥ sadā // Rm_38.998{35} //
K14ratnml_u:17889: sarve traidhātulokāś ca kṛtvā maitrīṃ parasparaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:17891: sarve bhadrāṇi paśyaṃtu mā kaścit pāpam ācarat /
K14ratnml_u:17892: sarvatra śāsanaṃ bauddhaṃ dhṛtvā yāṃtu jinālayaṃ // Rm_38.1000{37} //
K14ratnml_u:17894: sarvān svaśiṣyān paribodhayan saḥ samādideśa śryavadānamālāṃ /
K14ratnml_u:17895: śrutvāpi te sarva udāracittāḥ śrutvā salokā abhinaṃdyamānāḥ /
K14ratnml_u:17896: saddharmam āśritya sadā triratnaṃ bhaktyā bhajaṃta vyaharan pramādā // Rm_38.1001{38} //
K14ratnml_u:17897: yatredaṃ sūtrarājeṃdraṃ prāvarttayet kalāv api bhāṣed yaḥ śṛṇuyād yaś ca śrāvayed yaś ca cārayet /
K14ratnml_u:17898: eteṣāṃ tatra sarveṣāṃ saṃbuddhāḥ sakalā sadā kṛpādṛṣṭyā samālokya kurvaṃtu bhadram ābhavaṃ sarvāḥ pāramitā devyas tesāṃ tatra sadā śivaṃ /
K14ratnml_u:17901: kleśānalaprahvarir āturāsu prajāsu duḥkhaṃ praśamo 'stu nityaṃ // Rm_38.1002{39} //
K14ratnml_u:17903: śreyo 'stu samvat 1028 māghamāse kṛṣṇapakṣe dvitīyāyāṃ tithau pūrvaphālguṇīnakṣatre
K14ratnml_u:17904: suddhayoge budhavāsare kuṃbharāśigate savitari siṃharāśigate caṃdramasi etaddine
K14ratnml_u:17906: mānadevasaṃskāritacakramahāvihāre nivāsitaḥ vajrācāryyaśrīdharmmarājena likhitam idaṃ pustakam etatpuṇyena dharmmārthakāmamokṣān prāptim astu śvapustakasunānaṃ lobhayāyamadu //
